40001001	Gittaabooda rooproobanga Yeesu Gristo, balleanda Dawdi, balleanda Abrahaamu.
40001002	Abrahaamu gwajiilu Isakka, Isakka gwajiilu Yakkobo, Yakkobo gwajiilu Yuuda ea oorjooga ghaamwat.
40001003	Yuuda gwajiilu Bereesi ea Seera nea ghaamwat ea Damaari, Bereesi gwajiilu Hesroon. Hesroon gwajiilu Araamu,
40001004	Araamu gwajiilu Aminadabu, Aminadabu gwajiilu Nashooni, Nashooni gwajiilu Salmoon,
40001005	Salmoon gwajiilu Boas nea ghaamwat ea Rahaabu, Boas gwajiilu Obeedi nea ghaamwat ea Rutti, Obeedi gwajiilu Yeese,
40001006	Nea Yeese gwajiilu sugoochcheanda was Dawdi. Dawdi gwajiilu Sulemaani nea gheamatta ea gatmooda Uriya gil,
40001007	Sulemaani gwajiilu Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu gwajiilu Abiya, Abiya gwajiilu Asa,
40001008	Asa gwajiilu Yehoshafatti, Yehoshafatti gwajiilu Yoraam, Yoraam gwajiilu Usiya,
40001009	Usiya gwajiilu Yottam, Yottam gwajiilu Ahaasi, Ahaasi gwajiilu Hesekkiya,
40001010	Hesekkiya gwajiilu Manaase, Manaase gwajiilu Amooni, Amooni gwajiilu Yosiya,
40001011	Yosiya gwajiilu Yekkoniya ea oorjooga ghaamwat, niih damanda ghayi abeeda siippaleaga fuga Yahuudi gaweay ng'eanyiida Babiloon gil.
40001012	Ing'atta gibaleakta buuneeda weay Babiloon gwajiilu Yekkoniya Shaltieli, Shaltieli gwajiilu Serubabeeli,
40001013	Serubabeeli gwajiilu Abihuudi, Abihuudi gwajiilu Eliyakkiimu, Eliyakkiimu gwajiilu Asoori,
40001014	Asoori gwajiilu Sadokki, Sadokki gwajiilu Akkimu, Akkimu gwajiilu Eliyuudi,
40001015	Eliyuudi gwajiilu Eliyasaari, Eliyasaari gwajiilu Mattani, Mattani gwajiilu Yakkobo,
40001016	Yakkobo gwajiilu Yoseefu siyeeda Mariya was gheamatta Yeesuuyda suguura Gristo.
40001017	Asi jeachcheenga sean ng'eada Abrahaamu ea ghwahitta Dawdi ea damanang'wan, ghang'eada Dawdi ea ghwahitta gibaleaktida bea Babilooniin jeachcheenga ea damana ang'wan, nea gidang'eada gibaleaktida bea Babilooniin ea ghwahitta Gristo jeachcheenga ea damana ang'wan.
40001018	Jeatta siji Yeesu Gristo ghayi gwasnu. Mariyaayda was ghaamwat damanda duu gonyearra Yoseefu, damanda miih ghabeawa heedean geadaah nea gweayiideat aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit;
40001019	iiduw Yoseefooda was siyeadaannyi aba gideaba niny siida doabiwaat gil ea magassa gideaba gayghoabwaspwas hean gagasa gwanung'usa heeda nea ghoahudaada.
40001020	Iiduw nea gudugoottemsheesa ng'asheanji ghwahidu headaannyi Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka ak gwayeeshsha, “Yoseefu, balleanda Dawdi, adibeali ea nung'waada gheenda Mariya ghoaw gatmoadang'u, aba gideaba gweayumeani iittaannyiin ghwanyas aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit.
40001021	Gaygwaji balleanda ak gayguureewana ghawungaaschi Yeesu, aba gideaba niny gaygwalealu buuneadaannyi aba jeeda riing'eega nyaawa.”
40001022	Ghwahiti ng'asheesu seaniin goomajeek ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida rukuna ghuutta sibaneeda nea gwayi:
40001023	“Ng'ulla gaygagweayiit huda miyeasat ak gaygwaji balleanda, ak gajeeguura gheawungaaschi Imanuweeli” (nea gideaba, Aseetta sindeawi).
40001024	Ing'atta nea ghang'eada Yoseefu ruweanga gwasinda baloolda girrukusiinda malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida; ak ghwaat gatmoadannyi,
40001025	ea mawa heeda ea gwaji balleanda; ak gaguura gheawungaaschi Yeesu.
40002001	Damanda sijiila Yeesu aba Betleheemooda Yudeeya, damanda waseewa Heroode sugoochcheanda. Ng'ulla, ghwahidu Yerusaleemu weaghoodiga leabu heeda ghayeawa nea gwayi,
40002002	“Gwanda yeenu jeepta siji was sugoochcheanda Yahuudi? Aba gideaba geadeaksi ming'weandaannyi heeda ghayeawa, ak geapkannyi eaghadoawana.”
40002003	Iiy sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode ng'asheesu, gwahirbaban sea Yerusaleemossean.
40002004	Gaguursa ashoohoodiga hees sean ea ng'oorshoodiga buuneeda ak ghoanyaash heeda jea eejiilsa Gristo.
40002005	Geeyeeshsha, “Jeeda Betlehemooda Yudeeya aba gideaba gidaghayi ng'waarda sibaneeda,
40002006	‘Nea ang'iing'i, Ea Betlehemooda ng'eanyiida Yuuda, ang'iing'i muwosi mwanang'eawa eara hay sugoodiga ng'eanyiida Yuuda; aba gideaba headaang'u gaygwarinna sugoochcheanda, jea ghoahaghwa buuneedeanyu was Israeeli.'"
40002007	Gaguursa Heroode aba makcheameeda weaghoodigiga ak ghoanyaash damanda daaha ming'weandideani;
40002008	ak goojeakta Betleheemu nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak ghoannyaashti muuchchi iitta jeepta, ama oanyaschi gooyeannean iitta, abeeda gaydawa eara aniini daghadoawan.”
40002009	Hean iiy ng'asheega sugoochcheanda ghwang'waay naweeda; asi ng'ulla, miing'weandida sideaksa heeda ghayeawan, goosheedeawa ea gawa ghaminaadawa deascheeda mida jeepta.
40002010	Idaah fukka ming'weandida gang'weela ng'weellooda haw muuchchi.
40002011	weay gah ghwadaah jeepta ea Mariyaayda was ghaamwat ak goobeedeay ak ghaghadoawan. Ng'atta, goottin shageeniga nyaawa ak ghoadaw haleanjeeda miyas, was lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ea hideeni ng'andit ea bureatta.
40002012	Iiduw nea sireekusa aba jeeda girgweatka eamabiiksiina Heroode, ghwala nawa nuut ak gaweay ng'eang'da nyaawa.
40002013	Ing'atta nea nuweay fukka, ng'ulla ghwahidu heeda Yoseefu Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada ak giyaadi jeepta ea ghaamwat, amng'awsiina Misri, ak gooppiidi hoowa ea darukuneey, aba gideaba gagasa Heroode gwanuus jeepta.”
40002014	Ghang'eat ak ghwaat jeepta sea ghaamwat eawa, ak gawa Misri,
40002015	goobiida hoowa ea ghami Heroode. Niih gajeenung' gwasa ng'asheandida ghayi rugu Ng'uttamiida aba ghuutta sibaneeda, “Geaguursi balleandeanyu ghoana Misri.”
40002016	Hean jeeng'u Heroode gideaba nimulsa fukka was weaghoodigean, ghwanyareas muuchchi, hean goojeakta buuneeda gwanuuseada diibiga sean was ballojiga aba Betleheemu ea geamida jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta bea gweannyew iyyeenya, ea gea hing'adawa, nea abeeda ea nisikteawa damanda rukusa weaghoodiga.
40002017	Ak gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Yeremiya nea gwayi:
40002018	“Siyiiy ghuutta siida aba Raama, shookka ea heareega raanya, Raheeli gooyyeawda diibigaaschi; Nea mwamwasa eara hawdeayda, aba gideaba mudugwanda.”
40002019	Ing'atta miyeeda Heroode, hean gabussa Yoseefu Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda girgweatka aba Misri,
40002020	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada, aada jeepta ea ghaamwat, ak gibiikti ng'eanyiida Israeeli, aba gideaba fuga ghayi gaseadayyi laknooda eaweega jeepta nimeewa.”
40002021	Ghangeat ak ghwaat jeepta ea ghaamwat ak gabikta ng'eanyiida Israeeli.
40002022	Iimuchchu nea ghwayiiy gideaba Akkelao niimbal ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ghoang'ng'waay hoorgeeda ghwaan was Heroode, hean ghoawal gawa hoowa, amaduw nea sireekusa aba jeeda giirgweatka hean ghwayam geaw ak gawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
40002023	Gawa ak goobiida mujiineeda suguura Nasareetti, ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rukuta sibanga, “Gajeeguura Nasarayajeanda.”
40003001	Askwearjoojikka ghwahidu Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi, ak gwarukkwiida ng'asheega Aseetta aba dareapcheeda Yudeeya, nea gwayeenniisa;
40003002	“Aduukkuunana, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.”
40003003	Aba gideaba niih dea ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gil nea gwayi, “Ghuutta siida nyearra dareapcheeda Asna naweeda Ng'uttamiida Olleappa naweadinngaaschi.”
40003004	Nea abeeda Yohaana gookkweali eaghwada sisna buudeega ngamiya nea gwarattiisa manandaannyi ghealooda; hamittaannyi ea deashamga gil ea maleeda ghamiilalga.
40003005	Ak gaweesa Yerusaleemu, ea ng'eanyiida Yuudeeyeeda sean, ea daroorakka sean bea murdajeega Yordaani,
40003006	ak geeppattiisan aba jeedeenda Yordaan nea ghamwas gideaba nisin ring'eega.
40003007	Hean nea ghwadaah Farisayajeega saang'a ea Sadukayajeega nea ghapka headaannyi goobattiisan, gwayeeshsha, “Ee dayeega udang'usheega! Gwareekuseeng'wa ng'eaha ea amng'awana nyarasta jea ghwahidu?
40003008	Asi ajiila haghweega miisa duukkuunooda,
40003009	nea adootteemsheesi geat aba jeesingeagwa gideaba, ‘Geandeawi ghweanda nea Abrahaamu,’ aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, Aseetta ghoammu gagatkat lagheang'su ghoaw diibiga Abrahaamu.
40003010	Nea joommooda asiyiin guumsheakka geediga, ak geetta maji haghwega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.
40003011	Geabattisananeegwa beega aba dukkuunooda, nea dea jea ghwaduupnaan geash gaburdeawean uurda, nea mammisean eara sareenda geakkaaschi; niny gaygoobattiisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea beasta.
40003012	Niny gidaannyi alleeliida gwanda geattindaannyi, ak gaygoobuus muuchchi bugharjeandaannyi, ak gooweamsa nganoadaannyi gijigooda, nea looyda gayghaghwarda aba beesta maygamis.”
40003013	Damandida ghwaan Yeesu nea gwaleabu Galilaaya ea ghwahitta Yordaan heeda Yohaana, eebaattiisan.
40003014	Hean gagasa Yohaana ghaheawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi aniini gideaba gajabaattiisan ak giwuni ang'iing'i heedeanyu?”
40003015	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwasa ghamneawa; aba gideaba niih gidamiisindaneasa gil sinooda ng'asheega sean doabiiw.” Ak ghamwas Yohaana.
40003016	Ng'atta giibaattiisanda Yeesu, nea gwascheeng'na jeeda beega; hean ng'ulla ghwajaada humng'eeda ak ghwadaah Gurorooda Aseetta nea gwashubeanda gharibajeanda, ak goobissa uhuudaannyi;
40003017	deagheatta, ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Niih Balleandeanyu abwariinyi, ahoosanani.”
40004001	Ng'atta ghwaat Yeesu Gurorooda ea ghoahiitta dareapcheeda ak gwasimsim meang'nyeandeenda.
40004002	Goluulda geaw eawooji haradam, eawa ea askweari, amaduw huydeanda ghwayeachchih.
40004003	Ghwahidu headaannyi gichchea gwasimsim ak gwayeeshsha, Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta giyami lagheang'su ghoaw mukkatte.
40004004	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'war gideaba, ‘Siida mwoammu goobiideewa ng'eanyiida mukkatte akghwahit, geaghus ng'asheanda rinna ghuutta Aseetta.'"
40004005	Ng'atta ghwaat Meang'nyeandeenda mujiineeda Ghaydit ak goodiing'da uhuuda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta heeda geaw
40004006	ak gwayeeshsha, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, gijaksi geaw ng'eanyi; aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi aba badaydaang'u; ak gayghwadeabwaneey geattinga nyaawa amwalasa geashtaang'u lagheaneeda.'"
40004007	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Geang'waar gichcha gideaba, ‘Adisimsimi Ng'uttamiida was Aseettang'u.'"
40004008	Ng'atta ghwaat gichcha Meang'nyeandeenda ak goodiing'da uhuuda giijeeda geaw muuchchi, ak goohiimsa daroorakka sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ea miyeanoadaannyi,
40004009	gwayeeshsha, “Haleanjeeni seaniin gaydagoonnyi iibeadi ak gighadoawannyaan.”
40004010	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ng'amwana hiji Shattaani! aba gideaba geang'war, ‘Ghadoawana Ng'uttamiida was Aseattaang'u ak gibwadi niny nea gaba geaw.'"
40004011	Hean ghwanung'wa heeda Meang'nyeandeenda ak ghapka malaykajeega ak gagadiyeesa.
40004012	Hean nea ghwayiiy gideaba Yohaana gwanda ghealooniga, gawa Galilaaya;
40004013	ghabeawa Nasareetti ak gawa goobiida Gapernaumu mida ghuutta basooda, mida ng'eanyiida Sablon ea Naftaali,
40004014	ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi;
40004015	“Ng'eanyiida Sablon ea ng'eanyiida Naftaali, Naweeda gal basooda, gigheawda Yordaani, Galilaayeeda emoojiga.
40004016	Fukka ghayi abiitta jeeda misaneedean nidaah weeshinda haw, Nea gea ghayi abiitta ng'eanyiida ea jirooneeda miyeeda, ea niibwaay weeshinda.”
40004017	Ghang'eada damandida ghoang'eat Yeesu rukkwiideayeayda ng'asheega Aseetta nea gwayi, “Adukkuunana aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.”
40004018	Damanda neayeewa aba ghuutta basooda Galilaaya, ghwadaah oorju iyyeenya bea ghaamwadagi, nea Simoneeda suguura Betro gil ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Andereya, nea ghoabuutta gheareedanga nyaawa jeeda basooda; aba gideaba fuga leallu ghweayeega.
40004019	Gwayeeshsha, “Ayeanni geeshteanyu ak gaydanung' ahuuwa fuga jea gwaleallu buuneeda.”
40004020	Deagheatta gwanung'sa heeda gheareedanga nyaawa ak ghwaat geeshta.
40004021	Gawa mwadi ak ghwadaah oorju iyyeenya bea ghaamwadagi, suuk Yokkobo balleanda Sebedaayo ea Yohaana oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda sea Sebedayooyda was ghweanda nyaawa nea gwasin gheareedanga nyaawa, ak gaguursa.
40004022	Deagheatta gwanung'usa heeda maleambooda ea ghweanda nyaawa ak ghwaat geeshta.
40004023	Gwaneayeewa jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Galilaaya, nea goonealshi aba jeeda ghoorajeega nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa, nea gwarukkwiida giijasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda, nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka sean ea sawanaduutka mideawa buuneeda.
40004024	Gageawiit iittannyi aba ng'eanyiisean bea Sirya, geeyeassa fuga sean miyeani, bearji heeluutka geeyoonung'weakka ea gea mideawa sawanaduutka, ea gea bearji meangeenda, ea gea ahiili, ea gea abittu damealga, ak ghoahaap.
40004025	Ghwaat geashtannyi emeetuw leabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ea Dekkapoli ea Yerusaleemu ea Yudeeya ea gigheawda Yordaani.
40005001	Idaah emeetuw, gwading'da giijeeda, hean nea gopteada gaweay headaannyi giinealangaschi.
40005002	Ghoang'eat ghuutta giinealshoodaannyi nea gwayi:
40005003	“Ghang'wana fuga barbari guroruunat, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.
40005004	Ghang'wana fuga guttu heareega, aba gideaba gayghwanyas hawdeayda.
40005005	Ghang'wana fuga ng'eeni, aba gideaba gaygoombal ng'eanyiida.
40005006	Ghang'wana fuga bearji jalooda ea muwooshta gassooda doobiiwnatta, aba gideaba gajeellang'u.
40005007	Ghang'wana fuga mideawa baydeayda, aba gideaba eara saawa gajeabwayda.
40005008	Ghang'wana fuga mideawa guroruunatka miyaas, aba gideaba gayghwahitta Aseetta.
40005009	Ghang'wana fuga aduptooschi suurja, aba gideaba fiisu gajeeguura diibiga Aseetta
40005010	Ghang'wana fuga sisawana aba doobiiwnatta, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.
40005011	“Ghoang'wani agooga iyang'eawweegwa buuneeda nea geesawaneegwa nea geerukuna badahuukkeagwa ng'asheega munyas sean aba ng'uyyeega appadaydeanyu.
40005012	Ahoosana nea goong'weelayi, aba gideaba gimeardeeng'wa ahaw aba humng'eeda, niih gidaghayi bay gwasawanda buuneeda sibanga ashooynaneegwa.”
40005013	“Agooga goowoschi balang'da ng'eanyiida; ama balang'da iimudugwasamu gil, gajeahindaan iijeagwasamu gil? Mudugwarachchi gil geaghus eahiisa jarooda ak ghoallaplaap buuneeda.
40005014	Agooga goowoschi weeshinda ng'eanyiida. Mujiineeda sideeksa uhuuda heayeeda mwoammu afunyaat.
40005015	Eara buuneeda meayeetta gheaboong'nyeanda ak geedukuteawa dahuuda iissa ghwayiin uhuuda ghamarda ak ghoabwaay buuneessean mida jeeda gheeda.
40005016	Asi eara weeshindeang'wa gagasa ghoabwaay buuneessean, amaduw nea ghwadaah gadiyoojigeagwa miyaas ghoaghambiit Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.”
40005017	“Adoaghanyi gili awunnyi dayam deaweeda ghana sibanga; mwawuni dayam ghawunnyi danung' gwasa.
40005018	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa; eara ghang'atta humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, ghanyeamanda eara hiji mwanang', ghana roobadeanagi mwanang', muuchchi bea deaweeda majeegeanda ea gwasa ng'asheega sean.
40005019	Asi siida wassean jea ghwalach diigheanjagi mwanang'eawa sean, aba jeedeaba diigheannyeeksu ak ghoanaaldunu buuneeda, gajeeguura dea mwanang' muuchchi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda; amaduw siitta jea gwasin nea ghoanaal suurjeeniin, niih gajeeguura dea haw aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
40005020	Aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, doobiiwnatteang'wa iimaburdeawana dea ng'oorshoodiga ea dea Farisayajeega, majaghanyi aweayeena jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.”
40005021	“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geerukusa fugeaba garayi gideaba, ‘Adinuusi siida; siida nuus siida gammiisa girgweaksiinda.’
40005022	Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, siida wassean jea gwanyareeksa oorjeeda ghaamwat gammiisa gimrgweaksiinda; ama dea ang'eawi oorjeeda ghaamwaat gammiisa eatta madeeda gweargwa, ama dea eeshsha oorjeeda ghaamwat, ‘Guwosi leekghteanda!’ Gammiisa beasta maloonghajeega.
40005023	Asi iyeadu haleanjeeda isabi geadi bea ghadooweeda badayda heeda wagiida ama deagheatta giipkaadi gideaba gwanda gidinndeayeesi oorjeeda geamadu,
40005024	nung'usiina haleanjeedaang'u isabi geadi bea heeda wagiida ak guwi ghanyi aduupcheena sea oorjeeda geamadu, ama ng'atta gibiigu ak giidaydi haleanjeedaang'u isabi geadi bea ghadooweeda.
40005025	Bay aduupcheewana geaw siida ahaaktaneey, damanda duuandeawana naweeda nea goondaageat heeda ogaleewi gheeda girgweageeda, ammasa gayghwaannyi siida ahaaktaneey heeda siida laja girgweaguutka, ak ghwayiinnyi ada geattinga furiischoochcheanda ak gwajakseey ghealooniga;
40005026	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey, mayrinnana jeeni ea eaghus aniidayda heelajeanda huydean.”
40005027	“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geeyi, ‘Adiiduw goomealuulli!’
40005028	Ak ghamneawa geayeeshshineegwa siida jea gang'ulla gatmooda seechmeeda nigeawiit gamealuul aba jeadaannyi.
40005029	Asi iissa iinung' ghaang'daang'u bea geattinda dugwa adiinya, giloatti ak gijakti gwasheagiit; aba gideaba amiy ghwashoadeeweey dameallanjagi ak ea meejaksiina saseadaang'u sean jeeda maloonghajeega.
40005030	Ama nung' geattindaang'u bea dugwa adiinya, gilaji ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; aba gideaba ghang'wana ghwashoadeweey dameallanjagi ak ea mejaksiina saseadang'u sean jeeda maloonghajeega.”
40005031	“Ghayi surgu gichcha gideaba, ‘Siida iinung'usa heeda gatmoadaannyi ea dadawa barawajeanda nung'ooda.’
40005032	Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa siida wassean nung' gatmoadaannyi, nea mwanung'wa aba gideaba gamealuuli, gayghwanung' gamealuul; ak siida jea ghaghi gatmooda sinung' earada gamealuuli.”
40005033	“Gichcha ea noayiinyi nea geeyeeshsha fugeaba garayi, ‘Adiiduw giyaagi habeawooda ng'uyyeega, ak giihiidi habeawajeegaagu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.’
40005034	Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, adiiduw ghoayaaji habeawooda eara gili mwanang', earaba humng'eeda aba gideaba hoorgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gil,
40005035	ghana earaba ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba hoorgeeda iina geashangaaschi, ghana earaba Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba mujiineeda sugoochcheanda hawi.
40005036	Adiiduw giyeaksi habeawooda eara uhuudaang'u, aba gideaba mimmuusi yamwa budeanjagi nung' gaweeshiit ghana gwattuudu.
40005037	Nea ng'asheegeagwa ghoanung' ghoaw ‘Eah’ ghana ‘Manda.’ Gili wassean nyooh ghwanaawda gwaleabu heedeaba diitta muyiin.”
40005038	“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geergu gideaba, ‘Gheang'da ea gheang'da, ea geeshadeeda ea geeshadeeda.’
40005039	Ak aniini geayeeshshineegwa, adigali geaw siida muy. Siida iilas madang'daang'u bea geattinda dugwa, giidawi eara meatkweeda niirja.
40005040	Nea siida jea ghoahaaktaneey ak gageanda shatteadaang'u, ginung'usi eara hang'daang'u;
40005041	siida idiing'seey beatta neekki adeayeewana niba iyyeenya.
40005042	Adawa dea musnyi, dea gasa ghoalaajaneey gida ea adifuursi muwuutta.”
40005043	“Ghayi noayiinyi nea geeyi, ‘Bwariinya gischeewoochchaandaang'u ak gisti weajoochchaandaang'u.’
40005044	Ak geayeeshshineegwa, abwariinya weajoodigeagwa amwaasha ghawooda appadahuukka fuga sawaneegwa.
40005045	Abeeda gajahuuwa balloojiga Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda; aba gideaba niny iissa daknoadaannyi gooboong'sa fuga munyas ea gea miyaas, ak gooroobassa roopta fuga doobiiweadi ea gea miih doobiiweadi.
40005046	Aba gideaba iyoabwariinyi gea bwariinyeagwa agooga, gajanyasa anagiimwaar? Neada eara fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi saawa ea masinniidunu?
40005047	Ghana iyokkeattoscheewi oorjooga giyeang'wa akghwahit goosinnyi naaha meaji ghwanaawda? Neada eara fuga emoojiga ea masinniidunu?
40005048	Awosa hidaat awuurjeewana gidahidaatta Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.”
40006001	“Ashageada adiidu goosinnyi alooheedeang'wa aba madeeda buuneeda nea goobaysiini ghwadaheagwa saawa, aba gideaba iyoosinniidunu ea mwajanyasa giimearda aba heeda Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda.
40006002	Asi ang'iing'i iidaydi haleanjeeda iiweadi fuga barbari adidiing'u geaw ak gisindi gidasinniida fuga ammiitu geat aba jeesinga ghorajeega siinnealshachcheewa ea ghuusiga naweadinga, gagwarsa buuneeda. Aba huumwa, geeyeeshshineegwa suuh ninyas gimearda nyaawa.
40006003	Asi ang'iing'i iidaydi haleanjeeda iiweadi fuga barbari eara geattindaang'u ghaadaam adaghwanal gisiin geattindaang'u bea dugwa.
40006004	Haleanjeedaang'u iiweadi fuga barbari adaydaawana makcheameeda, ak Ghweandaang'u deaha makcheamuutka gay gooheanneey.”
40006005	“Asi iyoamwaashchi Aseetta, ea adoowurjeewi fugiga ammiittu geadiin; saawa ghabwariiy ghamwaash Aseetta nea ghaminaada aba jeesinga ghorajeega siinnealshachcheewa ea ghuusiga naweadinga, ghwadaah buuneeda. Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, nigeawiit ghwanyas gimearda nyaawa.
40006006	Nea ang'iing'i iimwaashi Aseetta, guwi jeeda ghoariidaang'u hoowa bea gahiin ak giradi gidaghuut ak gimwaashi Aseetta aba heeda Ghweandaang'u mida makcheameeda; ama abeeda Ghweandaang'u deaha makcheamuutka gaygooheanneey.
40006007	Agooga iyoamwaashchi Aseetta ea adoochuurayi awuurjeewana fuga emoojiga; saawa ghaghay gili jea gooleeysiit aba ng'asheega nyaawa saang'a.
40006008	Asi adoowuurjeewi saawa, aba gideaba Ghweandeang'wa ghwanal gidoogasayi nea miyoomsa.
40006009	Asi amwaashtunu Aseetta: Ghweandeanya mida humng'eeda, Ghaawungaagu eakghambiida.
40006010	Sugoochcheandumeadaang'u nung' ghwahidu, Gidigasayi gagasa eesin, aba hiji bea ng'eanyidean gawuurji gissisinniida aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.
40006011	Goaneasa askweareani daghwardeanya;
40006012	Samseasa siileenigaasa, gawuurji gidasisammisiindi fuga mideawa siileenigaasa.
40006013	Adigealleasa jeeda simsimda, ak gighuhaneasa gitta muyiin.
40006014	Aba gideaba iyoosammiisi gidinyeannyeekka buuneeda, eara Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gaygwasamseegwa agooga;
40006015	ama moosammisiini gidinyeannyeekka buuneeda, eara Ghweandeang'wa maygwasamseegwa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa.”
40006016	“Gichcha iyoorachchi jalooda, ea adoowuurjeewi fuga ammittu geat, saawa iissa gookkaroomnyi gheamamuunatka nyaawa ghoahiimu geat ghwadaah buuneeda gideaba ghoarachchi jalooda. Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa suuh ninyas giimearda nyaawa.
40006017	Asi iluuldi geaw, giyeashi uhuudaang'u ak gihuuni gheamamdaang'u,
40006018	amwanala buuneeda gideaba giradi jalooda ak ghwanal Ghweandaang'u mida makcheameeda. Abeeda Ghweandaang'u ammu ghwadaah makcheameeda gayghoamwaarnyi.”
40006019	“Adoottiiwsi gheaseedeang'wa badayda ng'eannyiida ammu ghwaak muguyga ea girgweatka nea ghapka mareanghooga ak gwanyarja ak gwajagwadiin,
40006020	asi oottiiwa gheaseedeang'wa aba humng'eeda heeda mwoammu ghwaak muguyga ea girgweatka, ghana gwanyarja mareanghooga ak gwajagwat.
40006021	Aba gideaba heeda mida gheaseadaang'u heeda jea gwanda guroroadaang'u.”
40006022	“Gheabong'nyeanda saseeda gheang'da gil. Ama majeek gheang'daang'u, abeeda eara saseadaang'u sean gajea eesh;
40006023	ama miimajeek gheang'daang'u, abeeda eara saseadaang'u sean gaygwanda jeeda misaneeda. Abeeda weeshindida mida jeadang'uun imisana, ada misaneani gajea miih misaneeda!”
40006024	“Manda siida ammu gagadiyeesa fiisu hees iyyeenya. Aba gideaba gayghwasit agi nea ghabwariiy niirja, ghana ghoang'ngwaay geat sea niih ak gafool niirja. Majoammuusa agadiyesiina Aseetta ea baruureega.”
40006025	“Aba sareani geayeeshshineegwa, adoodeawiissi eaweegeagwa, aba gichchea ayaaga ghana gichchea aleaha, ghana gichchea ookwealsiina sasanuukkeagwa. Heappi eaweega mwang'ala hamitta, nea saseeda amwang'ala hang'weakka?
40006026	Ang'ulla dariidakka mida humng'eeda: mahissiida nea malachcha booga gabiissa ea meaweamsiina gijigoonga, eara saawa ghoarear Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda. Heappi agooga! Moang'ali saawa?
40006027	Ng'eaha gil aba jeedeang'wa ammu goodeawiit geaw ak ghoahaat geawundaannyi eara ea geattinagi gil?
40006028	Ama hang'weakka ghoanung' goodeawideegwa nea naha? Oapkaada deakghweeda mida dareabeetta, gida heettiideayda; ea masinna gadiyeeda nea mamanmanna;
40006029	ak geayeeshshineegwa, eara Sulemaani aba jeeda miyeenoadaannyi sean miyeekwa muuchchi ea gawuurji deakghweanagi aba jeedeaba suh.
40006030	Asi iinung' Aseetta gookwealsheattunu nyeega mida dareabeetta, mida askwareani ammuchchu ea niyaak beasta, heappi maygookwealshooweegwa muuchchi agooga ea fuga mwanang' masawi?.
40006031	Asi adoodeawiichchi nea gooyeennyi, ‘Gajeayaaga naaha?’ ghana ‘Gajealeaha naaha?’ ghana ‘Gajeekkweala naha?’
40006032	Aba gideaba haleanjeeni gagaseadayi fuga emoojiga; aba gideaba Ghweandeang'wa bea humng'eeda ghwanal gideaba googasayi suuseaniin.
40006033	Anyooh ghanyi oshsheeda agassa sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ea doobiiwnattaannyi, ak abeeda gajeehheaneegwa haleanjeeni seaniin gajea geagwa.
40006034	Asi adoodeawiissi ng'asheegeaba numuji, aba gideaba numuji gaygwadeawiissa geaw. Giliwas eaweechcha ghoahiit deawiitmeadaannyi.”
40007001	“Adoorgweakkiisi buuneeda gajiiduw eara agooga geergweakseegwa.
40007002	Aba gideaba gidoorgweakkisiindi buuneeda, abeeda gajeergweaksiinduneegwa agooga, ak gidoottenniidi agooga eara agooga gajeetteeneegwa.
40007003	Anda ak ging'weersi hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu, nea ming'weersiini geetta mida gheang'daang'u ang'iing'i?
40007004	Ghana gajammusa eshshiindaan oorjeeda geamadu, ‘Nung' dageanu hararooyeanda mida ghang'daang'u,’ nea ghana gwanda jeeda gheang'daang'u ang'iing'i geetta?
40007005	Ea siida ammiittu geaw, nyooh ghannyi asheeda geanda geetta mida jeeda gheang'daang'u, ak abeeda gajammuusa geanni hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu.
40007006	Adoattawji gudajeega haleanjeeda ghaydidi, ghana ahisana ukkurumajeega booshkeagwa ak ghwadattas, gajiiduw gwayamseegwa geat ak ghwageagwa.”
40007007	“Amusa, ak gajeegooneegwa, agassa ak gajanyasa, aguurdeawana dooshta ak gajeejeasseegwa.
40007008	Aba gideaba siida nyooh gamusiischi gajeattaw, ama siida gasiischi gayghwanyas, nea siida guurdeawa dooshta gajeejeassa.
40007009	Heappi gajea ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa, jea gamus balleandaannyi mukkatte, ak ghwoadaw lagheaneeda?
40007010	Ghana iimus ghweayeanda, jea ghwoadaw ichchibooda?
40007011	Abeeda iyoanalli agoogeeda munyas gideaba gajoattawa diibigeagwa haleanjeeda miyaas, ea mayghwaraanya muuchchi Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda ak ghoadaw gea miyaas fukka ikkaaschi musiini!
40007012	Haleanjeeda sean ogasayi gideaba gaygwasinneegwa buuneeda, eara agooga asissiina saawa, aba gideaba niih ng'asheanda was deaweeda ea sibanga.”
40007013	“Aweayeena ghoah nea goosku gidaghuutta mwariis; aba gideaba gidaghuut aabwara nea naweeda aabwara dea jea gahutteawweegwa ak asaang'a fuga jea gwasik gidaghudeani.
40007014	Gidaghuut amwariis nea naweeda amwariis dea jea gagal ghuhooda, ak gajea ng'ay fuga jea ghwadaah.”
40007015	“Ashageada sibanga ng'uyyeega fuga iissa ghapka heedeang'wa nea niikwa eagweega gisilga, nea aba jiih ea suyeekka ng'weani.
40007016	Gajanala aba haghweega nyaawa. buuneeda ghoammu gabinna haghweega sabiibu geetta halaghweenga ghana haghweega shaboogheechcheanda heeda ng'eamga?”
40007017	“Gwasunu eara geetta miy gwajiila haghweega miyaas, nea geetta muy gwajiila haghweega munyas.
40007018	Geetta miy mwoammu gwaji haghweega munyas, nea geetta muy amwoammu gwaji haghweega miyaas.
40007019	Gilinyooh ea geetta iimaji haghweega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.
40007020	Asi gajanalana haghweega nyaawa.”
40007021	“Miih giliwas siih ennisean, ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida,’ jea gawa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, geaghus siida sin gidagasa Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
40007022	Eaweettida gaygwayeeshshinean fuga saang'a; ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida, miyearamoorana aba ghawungaagu, nea aba ghawungaagu geerruutti meangeenda, ak geesinnyi haleanjeeda saang'a deamdeameadi aba ghawungaagu?’
40007023	Abeeda gaydayeeshsha saawa, ‘Aniini moang'wa danaleagwa eara hay, ang'amwana heedeanyu, agoogeeda sina ng'asheega munyas.’
40007024	“Asi siida wassean nyooh ghwayiiy ng'asheegeasu ak gwasin, gajeegala weaghoochcheanda fughareeda, deeksa gheannyi uhuuda harearacheanda;
40007025	Ghwaroabwan roopta, ak ghwahidu guldeayda, ghwahidu jeammeda ak ghwalas gheedida, ak ea mwoabeada, aba gideaba sindeettannyi geedeeksa uhuuda harearachcheanda.
40007026	Ama siida was sean iiy ng'asheesu ikkeasuun ak ea masna, gajeegala siida dasha, ghayi deeksa gheannyi uhuuda iseaskweanda;
40007027	ghwaroabwan, ak ghwahidu guldeayda, ghwahidu jeammeeda ak ghwalas gheedida, ak ghoabeada; ak gibeedeaydaannyi aahaw.”
40007028	Iiduw nea nihiit Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi emeeda aba ginealshoadannyi,
40007029	aba gideaba goonealsheatta siida mideawa gheambalmeeda, nea mawuurji eara ng'oorshoodiga nyaawa.
40008001	Iiduw nea ghwararang'aana giijeeda, ghwaat geeshta emeetuw;
40008002	hean ghwahidu siida bearji udamusuura ak gwatkuyi aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan.”
40008003	Ghoahakta geadi ak ghawaasa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi; miinni.” Deagheatta ghahaabwa udamusuura.
40008004	“Adaaha, adiiduw giruksi siih gil; ng'eada una, ak gihimsi geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak giidaydi haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda gawuurji gida ghayi rukuteayda Muusa, ak abeeda ghwanal buuneeda.”
40008005	Iimuchchu nea gawa Yeesu jeeda mujiineeda Gapernaumu, gawa headaannyi shirikkarajeanda haw bea Ruumi,
40008006	ak gamearmearani nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida soomjeandeanyu gwalil aba ghoah goobittu damealga nea gwasawana muuchchi.”
40008007	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Gaydoan dahaap.”
40008008	Gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeandida hawiin, “Ng'uttamiida aniini mammisean gideaba gaynyuunyi jeedeaba gheenyu; ang'iing'i rukuni ng'asheanda akghwahit, ak gayghahaap soomjeandeanyu.
40008009	Aba gideaba eara aniini geewoschi siida ghayi mida hing'eadayda gheambalmeeda, mida hing'eadaydeanyu shirikkara, ama eayeeshshi niih, ‘Una,’ gawa, ghana niih ‘Beenni,’ ghwaan, ak eara soomjeandeanyu iyeayeeshshi ‘Sina gili,’ gwasin.”
40008010	Iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi ak gwayeeshsha fukwachchi aat geeshta, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, miidadaah aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli siida mideawa masaweega uurji nih.
40008011	Asi geayeeshshineegwa, gayghapka fuga saang'a jea gwaleabu heeda ghayeawa ea heeda biyeara ak gaygoobiitpiit ak gweagiischi sea Abrahaamu, ea Isakka, ea Yakkobo aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda,
40008012	amaduw balloojiga sugoochcheandumeeda gajeehisa jeeda misaneeda jarooda; heeda jeagwanda shookka ea giwirrooda geeshatka.”
40008013	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu shirikkarajeandida hawin, “Una; ak gagasa ghoaw gitta imwasiin.” Ghahaap soomjeandaannyi bea gadiyeeda aba damandida.
40008014	Iiduw nea gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeh Betro, ghwadaah gheamatta agweaji Betro nea gwalil aba badayda bulaliida nea gabearji sheagheeda;
40008015	ghawaasa Yeesu geattindaannyi, ak goosha sheagheeda, ak ghang'eat gagadiyeesa.
40008016	Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada geeyeassa fuga saang'a bearji meangeenda; gooruutta meangeenda aba ng'asheanda, ak ghoahaap buuneessean miyeani.
40008017	Niih abeeda gayghoahiit ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi, “Ghwasar niny munyasnachcheakkaasa ak gageanda miyeannyeakkaasa.”
40008018	Hean ghwadaah Yeesu emeetuw nea gwaneaweesa, ghwanung' ghoaghaaw ginealanga.
40008019	Gaweesa Ng'orshoochcheanjagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, gaydeadu geashtaang'u heechchea una sean.”
40008020	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Fureayoonga gwandeawa shoomeanga, dariidakka gwandeawa ghoorajeega; nea Balleanda Siida ea mandeawana heechchea ghwayiin uhuudannyi.”
40008021	Gwayeeshsha nuut aba jeeda giinealangaaschi, “Ng'uttamiida, goonean beatta ghannyi dawa dabuy Bwaabwa.”
40008022	Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Eanni geeshteanyu, nung'waada fuga nimeewa gabuy muscheekka nyaawa.”
40008023	Hean nea gwading'da maleambooda gamaseaw giinealangaaschi.
40008024	Deagheatta, ghwahidu siilakghta ng'waan bea basooda, ak gooyuuk maleambooda laweajajeega; nea abeeda gwalil.
40008025	Gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak ghwaheat nea geeyeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida laalneasa sishsheali.”
40008026	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anda nung'udeagwa muuwda, Ea fuga mwanang' masawi.” Ghang'eat ak gwareekusa jeammeeda ea basooda ak ghahawuda basooda ea gwayi saw.
40008027	Ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda nea gwayi, “Siisi siidurjiini, awal gheang'da basooda ea jeammeedean?”
40008028	Iiduw nea nuwa gigheawda mida ng'eanyiida Gadarene gwaroonnyi fiih iyyeenya bearji meangeenda, nea gwaleabu heeda subunnyiisa buuneeda. Fiisu abeeda ea ng'weani ea eeyi bwak ea ghoawal buuneeda sigoodeaba naweetta.
40008029	Ng'ulla Goojuur nea gwayeena, “Geendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i, Ea Balleanda Aseetta? Guwuni sawaneasa nea miighwahidu damandeanya?”
40008030	Abeeda gwanda hawannyeanda ukkurmajeega nea sheagi nea ghoajeada.
40008031	Gamus meangiga bea endean nea gwayeeshsha, “Iiruuttaneasa ginung'waadi eeweaya eappitta jeedeaba hawandida bea ukkurmajeegean.”
40008032	Gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena;” Gwaritteawa fukka. Gaweay ak ghoabitta jeeda ukkurmajeega; ak ghoabuuttaawa geat rakghraghooneeda ak gwajaksa geat basooda ak goosha sean.
40008033	Ghwahal geat haghweadoodiga ak gaweay mujiini ak ghoadaarda iitteaba ng'asheesu seaniin sea iitteaba fukka bearji meangeendean.
40008034	Hean gaweay Buneassean bea mujiineetteani roonnyeeda Yeesu, geeyi bwak amadaah geemus gideaba ng'amwana ng'eanyiideanya.
40009001	Gwading'da maleambooda ak ghoaghawa basooda ak ghwahitta mujiineeda nyaawa.
40009002	Hean geeyeassa siida abittu damealga nea geeyeanna badayda bulaliida, hean daah Yeesu masaweega nyaawa, gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgean, “Nung' gahoosan guroroodaang'u Balleandeanyu; sisamsa riing'eagaagu.”
40009003	Hean gwayi ng'oorshoodiga mwaatkwa aba jeesinga nyaawa, “Siisi goong'eawi Aseetta.”
40009004	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloolda saawa aba jeesinga nyaawa, ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goobalooli ng'asheega munyas aba jeesingeagwa?
40009005	Awussus anneeda gideaba geeyi, ‘Sisamseey riing'eagaagu,’ ghana eeyi, ‘Ng'eada ak guwi?’
40009006	Geagasayi anala gideaba, Balleanda Siida gwandeawa gheambalmeeda aba badayda ng'eanyiida jea gwasamsiina ring'eega;” ak gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgean, “Ng'eada, sareana muundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
40009007	Ghang'eat siidida ak gawa gheannyi.
40009008	Daah emeeda siidida ghang'ut muuwda ak ghoaghaambiit Aseetta ghayi adaw buuneeda gheambalmeeda sunuun.
40009009	Damanda ng'attaawa Yeesu aba hoowa ghwadaah siisi suguura Mattayo nea gwanda jeeda ghoriida sing'ng'oonnya gwaadi; gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.” Ghang'eat ak ghwaat geeshta.
40009010	Iiduw nea goopteada aba ghoah damanda agiischooda, deagheatta ghwahidu fuga saang'a ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi, ea fuga ring'eega ama hidu goobiitpiit sea Yeesu ea ginealshoodigaaschi.
40009011	Daah Farisayajeega, gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Anda giinealshoochcheandeang'wa goombuuchchi fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega?”
40009012	Iiy niny gwayeeshsha, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi bwanamwaganga, geaghus fuga miyeani.
40009013	Asi aweayeena ak ghoanaali geat ng'asheesu, ‘Geagasayi baydeayda nea miih haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda.’ Aba gideaba mwaawuni daguursa fuga doobiiweadi, ghawunnyi daguursa gea mideawa ring'eaga.”
40009014	Hean gaweay heeda Yeesu Giinealanga Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda aseasa ea Farisaayajeega geeradayi jalooda, nea giinealangaagu ea maratta jalooda?”
40009015	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga suguursa nyeangiida ghoammu gaguuttu heareega nea gwandeawa siida geeshi? Gwanda askwearjoojiga jea ghwahidu jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi jeennyaawa, aba damani gayghwarat jalooda.
40009016	Manda siida jea ghawaasa weasteesh hang'da waas. Aba gideaba weasteesh gayghabwaash hang'dida waasiin ak abeeda gayghoahaada seawadeeda.
40009017	Eara buuneeda mayiinna difaayeeda miighwaheas jeeda ghadeatka woosi; iisihindunu gaygwanyara ghadeatka, ak gaweay difaayeeda, ak gameewa ghadeatka; buuneeda gwayiina difaayeeda miighwaheas jeeda ghadeatka eashish ak gabaseayu sean.”
40009018	Damandida rukuna ng'asheesuun, ghwahidu siisi haw bea emeeda Yahuudi ak gwatkuyi aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Nimi hudeanyu ghamneawa. Beenni eweaya iina geattindaagu uhuudaannyi ak gaygwaduudu.”
40009019	Ghang'eat Yeesu ea giinealangaaschi ak ghwaat geeshta.
40009020	Ng'atta ghwaan Gatmoonagi beardooschi miyeanda areami foojeanda gweannyeew damaniiyyeenya gweadu geeshta ak ghawaasa weeleeda hang'daannyi;
40009021	aba gideaba gwayi aba jeadaannyi, “Iyaawaaschi weeleeda hang'daannyi gaydahaap.”
40009022	Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu ak ghwadaah ak gwayeeshsha, “Hudeanyu hoosana nihapnyi masaweega imwaschaan.” Ghahaap gatmoodida aba damandida.
40009023	Ng'atta gawa Yeesu jeedeaba gheetta bea sugoochcheandean. Hean ghwadaah emeeda saang'a mida gea ayyeawda nea gaguttu heareega,
40009024	gwayeeshsha, “Ang'amwana hiji, aba gideaba huda miighami gabeachchi ruweanga.” Geebarra rear.
40009025	Iiduw nea siing'ng'aamwa buuneeda hoowa, gawa Yeesu jeeda ghoriida ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda huda ama ng'atta ghang'eat.
40009026	Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
40009027	Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa nea damandida beawaan, ghwaat geeshta fiih iyyeenya ng'oawwi, nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Dawdi eaniyean bwaydaneasa.”
40009028	Weah Yeesu jeeda gheeda gamaseaw fugiga assiyyeenya ng'oawwin ak ghoanyash gideaba “Ghoamwaschi gideaba ghammuuschi dahabeagwa?” Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Geamwaschi Ng'uttamiida.”
40009029	Hean ghawaas gheanyanga nyaawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Aba gitteenna masaweegeagwa gagasa anyasa.”
40009030	Ghwajaada gheanyanga nyaawa. Ama ng'atta gwareekusa Yeesu nea ghoang'waniit, nea gwayeeshsha “Adiiduw goorukwsi eara siih ng'asheanji.”
40009031	Ghang'eatng'eat Saawa gaweay ak ghoabwaash iitta Yeesu fugeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
40009032	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena” Hean gwaritteaysa ak gaweay jeeda ukkurmajeega.
40009033	Hean siirruutta meangeenda gabalool siidida. Ghaham ng'eanyi eemeeda nea gwayi, “Ng'asheanda sunu miyeadaaha aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli.”
40009034	Nea Farisayajeega saawa gwayeena, “Gooruutta meangeenda aba uurda dea haweewa meangeenda.”
40009035	Gwaneayeewa Yeesu jeeda mujiinajeega sean ea gharang'weakka nea goonealshi aba jeesinga ghoorajeega nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa ikkaanyaawa nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda, nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka sean ea gilinyooh ea sawanadeeda.
40009036	Hean daah emeetuw nea gabadageat ghabwayda aba jeedaannyi aba gideaba ghwadaah gwattemban gawuurji gisilga nyaah jeagischoochchean.
40009037	Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Booga asaang'a, ak eang'ay fuga gadiyeeda;
40009038	asi amwoasha Ng'uttamiida bea booga goojeagu fuga gadiyeeda ghapka ghwalachchi boagaaschi.”
40010001	Gaguursa giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya, ak ghoadaw gheambalmeeda jea gooruutteawa meangeenda munyas nea ghoahaap geeyoonung'weakka ea sawanaduutka sean.
40010002	Gheawungeaba giijasoodusu attamaniyyeenyean ea suhu, dea madeeda Simoneeda suguura Betrohi ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Andereya, ea Yakkobo balleanda Sebedaayo ea Yohaana oorjeeda ghaamwat.
40010003	Filippo ea Bartolomaayo, Domaso ea Mattayooyda ghayi ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi, ea Yakkobo balleanda Alfaayo, ea Dadaayo.
40010004	Simoneeda Ganaani ea Yudaayda Iskariyootte ghayi laabwadaw Yeesu.
40010005	Goojeakta Yeesu giijasoodigiga attamaniyyeenyean ak ghoadaw giijasta nea gwayeeshsha, “Adooweeyi jeeda daroorakka emoojiga, ghana jeeda mujiineeda wassean bea Samariya.
40010006	Ghang'wana ghoang'ng'waanyi naweeda aweayeena heeda gisilga roodeadi bea Israeeli.
40010007	Aba jeeda neayeedeang'wa arukkwiida gideaba, ‘Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda nineekkiit.’
40010008	Oahaabwa fuga miyeani, ak goottuudu fuga nimeewa, nea ghoammidu fuga bearji udamusuura, nea goorruutti meangeenda. Geegooneegwa mwadaagha, oattayda mwadaagha.
40010009	Adoayadi jeesinga shageenigeawa lappiya ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i sisinna lappiya wassean, ghana heelajeega,
40010010	ghana shageeda naweeda, ghana hang'deaba iyyeenya, ghana geekka ghana bileang'ida. Aba gideaba siida gadiyeeda gammiisa nyasitta daghwardaannyi.
40010011	Iyooweayi jeeda mujiineeda wassean ghana gharang'da, googasayi siida deaptaneagwa biissa adoabiiwaat ak gooppiidi gheannyi ea abeawana hoowa.
40010012	Iyooweayi jeeda gheeda gookkeachcheewi fuga bea gheeda.
40010013	Nea gheetta iimiisa hoyyooydeang'wa, abeeda danyasa hoyyooydeang'wa. Ama deappa ea mammisiina abeeda hooyyooydeang'wa gaygabiikseegwa agooga.
40010014	Nea siida iimwadeataneegwa ghana ghaheawa gooleeysiit ng'asheegeagwa, iyooritteawi gheetta ghana mujiineedida, ghoalalakti birjeanda mida geeshangeagwa.
40010015	Aba huumwa geayeeshsheegwa eaweetta girgweaksiinda gajeawussus ng'eanyiida Sodooma ea Gomoora gamilikghteaysa ghorjooda eaweetta girgweaksiinda ea ghang'al mujiineetta.”
40010016	“Asi Aniini geajeakteaydaneegwa gisilga jeeda suyeekka; asi andeawana weaghumeeda ea awuurjeewana ichchibooda, nea goong'eeniitti ghariibajeanda.
40010017	Ashageada buuneeda aba gideaba gayghwaadeagwa gheeda siirgweachcha nea ghabwareagwa aba jeesinga gealga nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa.
40010018	Gajeayadeagwa madeeda sugoodiga ea dea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida appadaydeanyu, ak goomuwiisi Giijasta miy saawa ea fuga emoojiga.
40010019	Asi isiyaadeagwa adootteemsheesi gichchea arukuta aba gideaba damandida gajeegooneegwa gichchea arukuta.
40010020	Aba gideaba miih agooga gil fuga jea gabalool, gaygabalool Gurorooda Ghweandeang'wa aba jeesingeagwa.
40010021	Siida gayghwalabwadaw oorjeeda ghaamwat enuus, ak ghwalabwadaw ghweanda jeaptaannyi, nea gwayamsa geat diibiga ghweaniga nyaawa ea gheamadiga nyaawa ak ghabwar gameewa.
40010022	Nea gayghwasteagwa buuneassean aba gheawungeasu. Nea siichchea ghamilikghta ea gammudean abeeda ea siichchea eelealu.
40010023	Ighabwaseagwa buuneeda aba mujiineani, goomng'awsi mujiineannuut. Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa majaduulni mujiinajeega ng'eanyiida Israeeli nea miighwahidu Balleanda Siida.
40010024	Giinealaneeda mwoammu ghang'al giinealshoochchandaannyi; nea eara soomjeanda ea mwoammu ghang'al siida haw adaw gadiyeeda.
40010025	Ghwahit iwuurji giinealaneeda sea giinealshoochcheandaannyi, ak gawuurji somjeanda sea siidaannyi haw bea gadiyeeda. Abeeda iisuguura siida bea gheeda Beelsebuuli, heappi abeeda ea maygwasissa ng'asheega munyas muuchchi fuga mida jeedeaba gheannyi.”
40010026	“Asi adoawwalli saawa aba gideaba ng'asheanda funyaat gajeajaat, nea gitta funyaadiin gajeattahaach.
40010027	Ng'asheanda earukuneegwa aba jeeda misaneeda, oorukuta aba eeshpwara; nea ng'asheanda oayiinyi meang'shooda, arukkwiida aba uhuuda gheeda.
40010028	Adoawwalli fuga ammu gwanuus saseeda ak amwoammu gwanuus gurorooda; ghang'wana giiwali siitta ammu gwanuus saseeda ak gwajaksa gurorooda jeeda maloonghajeegean.
40010029	Heappi udabwaraadaji iyyeenya meesheahhideawana heelajeanjagi? Eara akkalealla mwoammu goobissa ng'eanyi nea mwamwasa Ghweandeang'wa.
40010030	Nea agooga eara buudeega iheengeagwa ea siyiida sean.
40010031	Adoabealli, agooga; ghoang'alli udabwaraadajeega saang'a.”
40010032	Siida mwasan aba madeeda buuneeda, abeeda earanini gaydamwas niny aba madeeda Bwaabeeda mida humng'eeda;
40010033	nea siida wassean jea ghaheawanaan aba madeeda buuneeda, eara aniini gaydaheawa niny aba madeeda Bwaabeeda mida humng'eeda.
40010034	“Adiiduw ghoaghannyi gili eayeadu hoyyooh jeeda ng'eanyiida; meayeanni hoyyooh geayeadu ng'uchcheeda.
40010035	Aba gideaba ghawunnyi deang'uuchchi siida ea ghwaan, ea huda ea ghaamwat, ea gatmooda ea ghamasiyeeda;
40010036	weajoodiga siida fuga gheannyaawa.
40010037	Siida bwariiy ghwaan ea ghaamwat ea ghwalabwanaan hoowa siisi mammisean; siida bwariiy balleanda ghana huda ea ghwalabwanaana hoowa, siisi mammisean;
40010038	nea dea mwasara behiidannyi ak gweada geeshteanyu ea mammisean.
40010039	Siida agaba aweagaaschi gaygahutteawi, nea siida hutteawi aweagaschi appadaydeanyu gaygwalealu.”
40010040	“Siida deaptaneegwa ghwadeaptanaan aniini, nea siida deaptanaan, ghwadeapta siida ghayi ajeaknean.
40010041	Siitteapta sibaneeda aba gideaba sibaneeda gil, gayghwanyas giimearda sibaneeda. Dea deapta siida doabiiwaat aba gideaba ea doabiiwaat eara niny gayghwanyas giimearda doobiiwnatta.
40010042	Siida wassean jea ghoadaw siiyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu manang'iin beega garbappi aba gideaba giinealaneeda, aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa eara niny mayghwaroat giimeardaannyi.”
40011001	Iing'atta gidawda adaw Yeesu giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya iittaannyi, ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa goonealshi aba jeeda mujiinajeega nyaawa nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta miy.
40011002	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy Yohaaneeda Abaattiisachchi iitta gissina Yeesu nea gwanda ghealooniga, hean goojeakta giinealangaaschi ghoanyaash
40011003	nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iingi guwosi siida ghayi jea ghwahidu ghana jea eefurda nuut?”
40011004	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena ak goorukusi Yohaana iitta ng'asheega oayiinyi ea gea oadaayi:
40011005	fuga ng'oawwi ghoang'wearda, fuga badeeda gaweelweel, gea bearji udamusuura geammidu, gea miinyi gwayiing'shi, fuga meewa gwaduuttu nea fuga barbari geerukusa Giijasta Miy.
40011006	Nea ghang'wana siida mwasta gil appadaydeanyu.”
40011007	Ngeatng'eat gabiikta, gwarukusa Yeesu emeeda ghwanyawa badageat iitta Yohaana, “Gooweayi adaaha naaha aba dareapcheeda? Nyeeshtooda ayuuk jeammeeda?
40011008	Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Siida akkwa hang'weakka oormajeega? Ng'ulla fuga akkweali hang'weakka oormajeega goobiitta gealga sugoodiga.
40011009	Abeeda ghwasaan andagooritti? Gooweayi adaaha naaha? Sibaneeda? Eah, geayeeshshiineegwa eara daahaweewa sibaneeda.
40011010	Niih siida sung'oorsa ng'asheesuun gil, ‘Ng'ulla aniini geajeagu giijasoochcheandeanyu madeeda gheanyangaang'u, jea gwasinneey naweadang'u aba madeadaang'u.’
40011011	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda siida wassean aba geajiigadeemga dea haweewa Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi eara siitta siyi amwanang'eawa sean aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eedean ahaweewa niny.
40011012	Ghang'eada askwearjoojiga Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi ea gagul ghamneawa sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda subwasay, nea fuga bwasay gageanda aba uurda.
40011013	Aba gideaba ghang'eada sibanga ea deaweeda gwaramoorani eaghwahitta damanda Yohaana;
40011014	nea iyoogasayi amwasa niny ea Eliyayda jea ghwaani.
40011015	Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiing'shi!
40011016	Asi gaydagala naaha seaygeani? Gawuurji diibiga mida naada, guurriisa suurja nea gwayeenniisa,
40011017	‘Geang'waschi, ak ea mwoang'wasi; geeyyeawdi, ak ea mooyyeawdani.’
40011018	Aba gideaba ghwahidu Yohaana ak ea meagiischi nea mwali gil, ak gwayi, ‘Gwandeawa meangeenda;’
40011019	ghwahidu Balleanda Siida ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, ak gwayi, ‘Ng'ulla, niih aadeaw nea boogideati, nea gwaduupchi fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga riing'eega!’ Amaduw weaghumeeda ea nidaajiit aba sinaweagaaschi.”
40011020	Iimuchchu goojuursa mujiinajeegiga ghayi sissa niny ng'asheega deamdeameadi ak ea madukkuunana riing'eega nyawaan.
40011021	“Eamuy deang'wa Gurasiini! Eamuy deang'wa Betsayda! Aba gideaba ng'asheakka ghayi deamdeameadi sisissa jeadeang'wean, inyeada ghayi geasissa mujiineada Diro ea Sidooni, gajeenigeawiit gwadukkuuna ng'asheaga munyas ak ghwayeashta deareada nea gookkwa guniyajeaga.
40011022	Asi geayeeshshineagwa, gajeawussus gideaba gayghamilikghta ghoorjooda nyaawa Diro ea Sidooni ea ghwalaabwaneegwa hoowa.
40011023	Eara angiing'i Gapernaumu, gajeettiing'neey ea gula humng'eeda? Gajeahing'neayi ea una jeeda maloonghajeega. Aba gideaba inyeeda ghayi ng'asheaga deamdeameadi sisin aba ng'eang'deang'wa geesissa mujiineeda Sodooma, gwachchi mujiineetta gajeagudugwanda ea gagul ghamneawa.
40011024	Ak gaydayeeshshineegwa, eaweetta girgweaksinda gaynyasa ang'iing'i ghoorjooda haw adaraam dea Sodooma.”
40011025	Aba damandida gwayi Yeesu, “Geabadiischoweey ea Bwaabwa was Ng'uttamiida humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba gufunyi ng'asheesu fuga weaghoodi ea fuga mideawa fughareenga akkihiimsi diibiga manang'i;
40011026	ea Bwaabwa niih gweagu gideaba gidubwariiydi, ang'iing'i gil.
40011027	Nugoonan Bwaabwa haleanjeessean. Manda siida nal Balleanda geaghus Ghweanda, ghana siida nal Bwaabwa geaghus Balleanda ghana siida wassean gasa Balleanda goohiimsa.
40011028	Apkaani heedeanyu oagasean agoogeeda deawiit nea ghabwanyeagwa sareenda, ak gaydeafuufeegwa.
40011029	Aghasana geat jookkeedeanyu, ak ghoanalanaan ng'asheega; aba gideaba aniini geewoschi ng'eeni nea geayeadayi geaw ng'eanyi aba guroroodeanyu, ak abeeda gajanyasa hoseaneega aba jeesingeagwa.”
40011030	“Aba gideaba jookkeedeanyu ea bumbun nea sareendeanyu aassas!”
40012001	Damandida gwasik Yeesu jeeda madameega eaweetta sabatto. Iiduw ghwayeachchi giinealangaaschi, ak gwahirjeaweada muschoonga ak ghwaak.
40012002	Daah Farisayajeega gissin giinealanga gwarukusa Yeesu gideaba, “Ang'wearda, giinealangaagu gwasin ng'asheanda mammisiina sinooda eaweetta Sabatto.”
40012003	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi sea fuga mideawa damanda yeada jih:
40012004	gidabeada jeeda gheeda Aseetta ak ghwaak mukkatteeyda gihiimnooda, nea mammiisiina gideaba gayghwaak niny ghana fuga mideawa geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga?
40012005	Ghana miyoassoamwana aba jeeda deaweeda gideaba gili was askwearjeanda sabatto issa ghwadattas ashoohoodiga diineeda Yahuudi deaweeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ea moawa gidinnyeanda?
40012006	Asi geayeeshshineegwa hiji gwanda siida haweawa eara gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
40012007	Ama inyeeda gajanala iitteaba ng'asheesu, ‘Geagasayi baydeayda miih haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda,’ gwachchi majoopparanna fuga manda gidamuy nisin.
40012008	Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida niny Ng'uttamiida Sabattohi.”
40012009	Ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa jeeda ghoriida nyaawa sinealshachcheewa.
40012010	Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa siida aptu geattinda. Geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Ghwahidi gideaba gajeahhaap siida eaweetta Sabatto?” Geannyaash ng'asheanji nea geegasa gichchea eahaaktayda.
40012011	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba jeedeang'wa gajea ng'eaha jea gang'adeesa gisillandannyi jeeda shoomanda eaweetta Sabatto jea ea maygwalealu?
40012012	Siida ghang'al gisilleanda niba hada! Ada abeeda ghwahit siinooda ng'asheega miyaas eaweeda Sabatto.”
40012013	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siidida, “Adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Ghoadoobiiw, ak ghahaap ea gawuurji geattinda niirja.
40012014	Iiduw gwaritta Farisayajeega jarooda ak ghwadawdaaw gichchea gwanuusta.
40012015	Geeyi bwak ama jeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheanji ghabeawa hoowa. Ghwaat geashta fuga saang'a ak ghoahaap fuga miyeani sean,
40012016	ghaheawa nea gwayeeshsha adoorukusi siih iitteanyu.
40012017	Abeeda gwasa gida ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi:
40012018	“Ng'ulla siideanyu bea gadiyeeda aloachchi, abwariinyi nea iissa ghwanung' gahoosan jeedeanyu. Gaydayiin guroroodeanyu badaydaannyi, nea gaygwarukkwiida girgweageedeanyu aba jeeda emoojiga.
40012019	Maygwasheang'a ng'asheega ghana goojuuri, nea eara ghuuttannyi ghanyea majeeyiing'sa naweadinga;
40012020	ghanyea maygwahirja muudayeanda ng'arng'ar, nea eara weasta aroasan ea maygwanuus, bwak ea eaghus eanisin girgweageeda jea goombaliischi.
40012021	Nea gheawungaaschi gayghwarar emoojiga.”
40012022	Hean Geeyeassa siisi ng'oaw bissea manda ghuutta bearji meangeenda; ghoahaap ak ghoang'wearda nea gabalool.
40012023	Ghahamng'eanyi Buuneessean nea gwayi, “Siisi miih balleanda Dawdihi?”
40012024	Iiy Farisayajeega ng'asheesu gwayi, “Siisi ghahoan meangeenda aba gideaba gwandeawa uurda Belsebuuli, meang'nyeandida bea eenda hawiin.”
40012025	Gwajeeng'u gidabaloola saawa aba jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda wassean iibearshi ea maygamajeegiit, ghana eara mujiini ghana gheeda wassean iidardaawaat, gheawi ea mayghamiinaada.
40012026	Shattaani iihoan Shattaani, abeeda gang'uchi geaw. Abeeda sugoochcheandumeadannyi gayghaminadaydaan?
40012027	Aniini iyearuutteawi meangeenda uurda Belsebuuli, heappi! Abeeda balloojiigeagwa saawa gooruuttideawa naaha? Aba gideaba saawa fuga jea goorgweakseegwa agooga.
40012028	Ama ghamneawa earutteawi meangeenda uurda Gurorooda Aseetta, abeeda ghoanalli gideaba nihidu heedeang'wa Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
40012029	Gayghoammustaan siida gideaba gayghabwasay gheeda siida mideawa uurda ak ghoawreat halanjeadannyi, nea mighannyi gwarada siitta mideawa uurdean? Ak abeeda gayghoammu ghoareat halanjeadannyi.
40012030	Siida manda meatkwedeanyu niifuurnean muwuutta, nea siida wassean mabwadana geat sea aniini ghoadaarda.
40012031	Aba sareani geayeeshshineegwa, buuneeda gajeesamsa ring'eega nyaawa sean ea ging'weakka nyaawa sean, dukku fuga ang'eawi Gurorooda Ghaydit rukuna badayda ng'asheega munyas mayghwanyas samsiinda.
40012032	Amaduw gichcha siida jea gwarukuna ng'asheanda muy badayda Balleanda Siida gajeesamsa, dukku siitta jea gwargu ng'asheanda muy badayda Gurorooda Ghaydidiin, ea majeesamsa aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiini, ghana earaba ng'eanyiitta jea ghwahiiduunu.
40012033	“Asna geetta ghammiidu ak ghamiyasiit eara haghweagaaschi, ghana anung' gamunyiit geetta ak gamunyasiidi eara haghweagaaschi aba gideaba geetta geenalla haghweagaaschi.
40012034	Ea dayeega udang'usheega! Gajoammuustaan rukunooda ng'asheega miyaas nea goowoschi munyas? Aba gideaba siida iissa gwargu ng'asheekka nyiit guroroadaannyiin.
40012035	Siida miy aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi miy iissa gwargu ng'asheega miyaas, nea siida muy aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi muy iissa gwargu ng'asheega munyas.
40012036	Asi geayeeshshineegwa, eawetta girgweaksiinda gaygaba siisi rugu ng'asheanda marachchi gil ghayi nyooh ea nurgu;
40012037	aba gideaba aba ng'asheagaagu gajeegoonnyi doabiwnatta, ak aba ng'asheegaagu gajeergweakseay.”
40012038	Ak gwayeeshsha Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, “Giinealshoochcheanda geegasayi eadaaha gwadeagooda aba headaang'u.”
40012039	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Seaygeeda munyas biissa gamealuuli ak ea mwajeattaw gwadeagooda; geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea sibaneeda suguura Yoona.
40012040	Gawuurji gida abiideatta Yoona jeeda ghweayeanda haw eawooji samwagu eawa ea askweari niih gichchea gawuurji Balleanda Siida gaygoobiida jeessigeeda eawooji samwagu eawa ea askweari.
40012041	Gayghamiinaada fuga Ninaawi eaweeda girgweaksiinda ak gaygoorgweaksa seaygeani aba gideaba gwandeawa gidinyeanda. Aba gideaba fuga Ninaawi ghayi saawa gwadukkuuna ring'eeda aba ng'asheega rukkwiida Yoona, nea aba hiji gwanda siida haweawa Yoona.
40012042	Gayghwahidu gatmooda ahaaghwa Wiilooda Ng'eanyiida Biyeara eaweetta jea eergweaksiina seaygeani, ak gaygoorgweaksa aba gideaba gwandeawa fiisu gidinyeanda. Aba gideaba niny gwasimna deasheagi ak ghwaan gooleeysiit weaghumeeda Sulemaani, nea ging'ulayi gwanda hiji siida haweawa Sulemaani.”
40012043	“Meang'nyeandeenda muy iritteawa siida iissa gwaneayeewa ng'eannyiida manda beega, nea gagasa heechchea gafuufa ak amwanyasa.
40012044	Amaduw gwayeeshsha geaw, Gaydabiikta gheenyu heetta earinni, biigu ghwahitta nea sippuus ak ea sisissin nea manda jeeda siih.
40012045	Ghang'eat gawa ak gweadu meangeenda suuk ispwa, munyas ea ghwalabwa hoowa niny, ak ghapka sean ghamway jeedeaba siisi; amaduw gamunyiit seareedeaba siitta ea ghwalaabwa hoowa dea ghayi bea mwadi. Niih gichchea gawuurji gil aba seaygeeni ghamneawa munyasiin.”
40012046	Damanda duu gabaloola sea buuneeda, hean ghwahidu ghaamwat sea oorjooga ghaamwat ak ghaminaada aba gidaghuut nea gagasa goobalool.
40012047	Ghwalamda Siyagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla gwanda geamadu ea oorjooga geamadu jarooda ghaminaada nea gagasa goobaloolnyi.”
40012048	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha siitta adaw iittean, “Iyya ng'eaha, ama oorjooga giyeanya geabeang'a?”
40012049	Ng'atta ghamiin giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla iyya ea oorjooga giyyeanya!
40012050	Aba gideaba siida wassean nyooh gwasin gitta bwariiy Bwaabeeda mida humng'eedean, siisi abeeda oorjeeda giyyeanya gil, ea huda giyyeanya, ea iyya.”
40013001	Eaweettida gwaritteawa Yeesu ghoah ak gawa goobideada aba ghuutta basooda.
40013002	Gabassa geat emeettuw, ak geey bwak ea gwading'da maleambooda; ak goobideada nea ghaminaada emeeda aba ghuutta basooda.
40013003	Gwarukusa buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gagalla geat nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi gawa siih histeada.
40013004	Damani histeawean gwanda gea abitpissa jeennaweeda, ghwahidu dariidakka ak ghwaak.
40013005	Suurja goobitpissa badahuukka harearatka, heeda manda sigeeda saang'a, deagheatta gwardu iiduw ea manda sigeeda ang'ng'waay hawunga,
40013006	iiduw nea gwadagu daknooda ghoaseal beasta daknooda; ak ghwasis aba gideaba manda hawunga.
40013007	Suuk goobitpissa jeeda halaghweenga, rudu halaghweenga ghaminghis.
40013008	Suuk goobitpissa heeda mida sigeeda miyaas, gwardu ak gwaji akkalealla bughala, gwaji niirja laadam, gwaji niirja diktam ea damanamughuush.
40013009	Siida mideawa iidiga, ea dayiing'shi.”
40013010	Ghapka headaannyi Giinealanga ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan andagibalooli saawa nea gigalli geat ng'asheega?”
40013011	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga sugooneegwa nalooda makcheameeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, nea saawa ea miyeattaw.
40013012	Aba gideaba siida wassean mideawa gil gajeeheassa ea ghwanaawda, nea siitta mandeawana giliin, eara giitta mideawean gajearreat.
40013013	Niih gideabaysiini gibaloolda nyaawa nea geagalli geat ng'asheegeani, aba gideaba saawa iyang'wearda ea mwadaaha, ghoaleaydiit ak amwayiinya nea mwanala.
40013014	Aba heannyaawa gwasa ng'asheanda rugu sibaneeda siyi Isaaya nea gwayi: ‘Iing'da gajayiinya, ak ea mwajanala, ging'weerdeayda gajoang'ng'wearda, ak ea mwajadaaha.
40013015	Aba gideaba guroruunatkeaba fiisu nidurmaniidi, nea iidiga nyaawa ea mayiingshi muuchchi, ak ea niiluulan gheanyanga nyaawa, adaghwadaah aba gheanyanga nyaawa, ak ghwayiiy aba iidiga nyaawa, ak gwajeeng'u aba guroruunatka nyaawa, ak gwayamsean geat ak ghaahaapchi.’
40013016	Ghoang'wani agooga aba gideaba gheanyangeagwa ghoang'wearda nea iidigeagwa gwayiing'shi.
40013017	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa sibanga saang'a ea fuga doobiiweadi ghayi gagaseadayi deakteaba ng'asheesu ghamneawa oadayiin, ak ea mwadaaha, nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu ghamneawa oayinyiin ak ea mwayiinya.
40013018	“Asi agooga oalleaydiit gideagali siida wea histeayda.
40013019	Siida wassean iiy ng'asheanda sugoochcheandumeeda ak ea mwanala, ghwahidu giitta muyiin ak ghoasealda gidida sihisa guroroadaannyiin.
40013020	Nea dea sihisa jeeda harearatkean ea siitta iiy ng'asheandideaniin gil ama deagheatta ghoang'ng'waay nea gang'weela.
40013021	Amaduw ea mandeawana hawunga aba jeadaannyi iissa ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheandida gilinuwaas, ama hidu sawanadeeda ghana gapnu ghabasta appadaydeaba ng'asheenji gabay ghoabeada.
40013022	Nea dea abissa jeeda geediga halaghweenga, ea siitta iiy ng'asheanda amaduw aba geawunda gheang'da barureega badayda ng'eanyiida, ghaminighis ak ea mudugwaji haghweega.
40013023	Nea dea sihisa heeda sigeeda miyasiin ea siitta iiy ng'asheandideaniin ak gwajeeng'uuni; niih dea jiih haghweega, gwaji akkalealla bughala, akwaji niih laadam, akwaji niih diktam ea damanamughuush.”
40013024	Gwarukuta gichcha galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji siida weah gwahista histeanga miyaas aba jeeda madamnyeandannyi.
40013025	Iiduw nea nilil buuneeda, ghwahidu weajoochcheanda ak gwahisa morookka dang'adiga ngano ak ghang'eat gawa.
40013026	Rudu nngano nea ghamwanmwan nea gwaji geadaah gaguuyi sea moorookka.
40013027	Gaweay soomjooga ak gwayeeshsha siitta bea madamnyeandean, ‘Ea Siida mureeda, mwaghannyi ghayi gihisti mmbeeyooda miyaas aba jeeda madamnyandang'u? Amaduw gwarinna yeenu moorookka?’
40013028	Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Niih gwasin weajoochcheanda.’ Ghoanyaash soomjooga nea gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Gigasayi eweaya eammughuusha?’
40013029	Gwayeeshsha, ‘Manda; iyoammughuushchi morookka gajiiduw ghoaloachchi eara nngano.
40013030	Anung'waada gwaheettu sean ea ghwahitta damanda lajiitta; damandida gaydayeeshsha fukka jea ghwalajiin, oshsheeda oammughuusha morookka ak ghoarachchi gharmuchcheekka ak geaghwarda, nea nngano goowweamsi gijigoodeanyu.'"
40013031	Gwarukta gichcha galeega nea gwayeesha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea ghajiileanda geetta suguura haradaali ghayi geanu siida akwahisa jeeda madamnyandaannyi;
40013032	gabiissa amwanang'eawa ghajilga sean amaduw nea gwardu gwaheedu ak geadaah nea niiw geetta haw, ghwahidu dariidakka ak gwadeeksa ghoorajeega nyaawa damealgaaschi.”
40013033	Gwarukusa saawa gichcha galeega, “Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda geegala sea hamiiraayda geanu gatmooda, ak googuuyi sea dearang'spa gweeraji samwagu ak geeyi bwak ea ghaghuut geaw sean.”
40013034	Suuh seaniin goobaloola Yeesu emeettuw aba galeega nea moang'ng'wa gwarukuta ng'ashaan nea manda gidagala.
40013035	Abeeda ghoaw huumwa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda nea gwayi: “Gaydajaat ghuutteanyu aba galeega, gaydargu gea funyaat ghang'eada deasubwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida.”
40013036	Iiduw gwaheelli emeettuw ak gawa ghoah. Gamaseaw Giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha “Goona ganeega ng'asheanda gwachchi igali geat sea morookka madamnyeandean.”
40013037	Gwayeeshsha, “Siida hista histeanga miyaas Balleanda Siida;
40013038	madamnyeandida ea ng'eanyiida gil, histeanga miyas balloojiga sugoochcheandumeeda; nea morookkiga ea balloojigeaba diitta muyiini.
40013039	Nea weajoochcheandida histean ea meang'nyeandeenda, nea lajitta ea mudeanooda ng'eanyiida, nea fuga lach ea malaykajeega.
40013040	Asi gitta simmugurriida morookka ak geang'uda beastean, ea gichchea gawuurji mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.
40013041	Balleanda Siida gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi, ak ghoawaam aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi haleanjeessean eadu ringeeda ea fuga sean sina ng'asheega munyas.
40013042	Ak geehisa jeeda duwayda beasta; ak gooyyeawda fuga nyaawa aba hoowa nea goowiiri geeshatka aba sawanadeeda.
40013043	Abeeda geadoobiiweadi gayghoameang'daayda Aseetta aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Bwaabeeda nyaawa. Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiinya.
40013044	“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji gheaseeda funyaat aba jeeda madamnyeanda, ama daah siida ghafuy; aba ng'weeloadaannyi gawa ak ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean mideawa ak ghwasha madamnyeandida.
40013045	“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea siida sheahhiida haleanjeeda gasa boshcheanda miy,
40013046	geeyi bwak ama daah boshchanjagi mideawa sheayeeda haw, gawa ak ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean ak ghwasha.
40013047	“Gichcha sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea gheareedanga siippuutta jeeda basooda, ak ghoang'ng'waay heeluutka sean bea ghweayeega;
40013048	geeyi bwak ama nyiit, goongiiru buuneeda ea ghwahidu ghuutta basooda ak ghaghwal ghweayeega miyaas ak ghwayiin jeesinga dabiitta nyaawa nea gea munyas gwahista.
40013049	Niih gichchea gawuurji gil eaweetta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida aba gideaba eaweettida gayghwahidu malaykajeega ak gooheelli fuga munyas ea gea doobiiweadi,
40013050	ak gwahisa fuga munyas jeeda duwayda beasta; abeeda gaygwanda buuneeda nea giwiirda geeshatka.”
40013051	“Heappi nojeeng'u ng'asheesu seaniin?” Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Eah.”
40013052	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asi gilinyooh ea ng'oorshoochcheanda gil was giinealaneeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, gawuurji sea siida mideawa gheeda geanu aba jeeda gheaseadaannyi haleanjeeda eashish ea gea woosi.”
40013053	Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu galeegiga ghang'eat gawa,
40013054	gawa ng'eang'da nyaawa hitta hoowa goonealshi aba jeeda ghooriida nyaawa siinnealshachcheewa, ak goonealshi ea ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda nea gwayi, “Siisi ghwanyasa yeenu weaghumeeni ea ng'asheesu deamdeameadiin?
40013055	Neada siisi ea miih balleandeaba siitta sina behajeegeani? Neada ghaamwat ea megureewana Mariyahi? Nea oorjooga ghaamwat ea miih Yakkobo gil ea Yoseefu ea Simon ea Yuudahi?
40013056	Ama eara haweega ghaamwat sean ea meendeawanani aba hiji? Abeeda ghwanyasa yeenu siisi ng'asheesu seaniin?”
40013057	Deagheatta geenyareesi aba ng'asheagaaschi. Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Sibaneeda majaghanyi ea meattawa mureeda, geaghus ea meattawa aba ng'eanyiidaannyi ea gheannyaawa.”
40013058	Ea mudugwasissa hoowa deamdeamang'su saang'a aba gideaba mandeawana masaweega.
40014001	Aba damandida ghwayiiy sugoochcheanda suguura Heroode geawunda iitta Yeesu;
40014002	Hean gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, “Siisi gajea Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi gil, nuduunna miyeeda; ak ghoaw ghamneawa uuri sina ng'asheesuun.”
40014003	Aba gideaba Heroode ghayi ghoang'ng'waay Yohaana ak gwajaksa ghealooniga, appadayda Herodiyaayda ghayi was gatmooda oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Filippo;
40014004	nea gweagu ng'asheanda ghayi rukusa Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwadoabiiwa gideaba gaymideawana gatmooda oorjeeda giyeang'wa.”
40014005	Gagasa gwanuus Yohaana amaduw ghoawal buuneeda aba gideaba ghwanal buuneessean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.
40014006	Muchchu gagul damanda ghwelmeeda eaweetta ghayi sijiila Heroode, ghang'was hudeaba Heroodiya aba madeeda rabasta, ak geeyi bwak ea gahoosan Heroode,
40014007	ak gwaheelleesa nea gweaksa habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha gaydagoonnyi gidawassean ing'allaan.
40014008	Aba damandida gagwarsa ghamwat ak gwayeeshsha, “Goonean uhuuda Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi iina jeeda harakta.”
40014009	Gagiisan Sugoochcheanda; amaduw nea ghoapkaat habeawooda ghwanyawa akk ea gheanyanga rabasta ghwanung' eattaw;
40014010	goojeakta siida gawa ghealooni ak ghwalach gheatta Yohaana.
40014011	Geeyeanna uhuudannyi jeeda harakta ak geattaw hudida, ak ghwaat niny heeda ghamwat.
40014012	Ghwahidu giinealangaaschi ak gageanda musta ak gabuy; ama ng'atta gaweay ghoadaw Yeesu iitta.
40014013	Ng'atta iing'da iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu, ghabeawa hoowa nea ghwaat maleambooda ak gawa heeda manda siih. Nyas iitta emeetuw ghabeawa geeshanga gamaseaw niny nea ghabeawa mujiinajeega nyaawa.
40014014	Hitta Yeesu ghuutta basooda ghwadaah emeetuw ak gwasamsa amaduw ghoahaap geeyoonung'ng'weakka nyaawa.
40014015	Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada, gaweay heeda Giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Hiji sindiin heeda manda sihi, adawa eemeeda beatta gaweay gharang'weakka gwasheaysa geat gichchaghwaak.”
40014016	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu “Manda gichchea ghwaat, oattawa agooga gichchaghwaak.”
40014017	Geeyeeshsha niny, “Geendeawi aba hiji mukkattaji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya.”
40014018	Gwayeeshsha, “Ayeanni heedeanyu.”
40014019	Gwayeeshsha anung' goobiitpiit emeeda aba heeda mida nyeega; ng'atta gageanu mukkattajeekka ammudiin ea ghweayeekka assiyyeenyean ak gang'ula humng'eeda, ak gang'ushsha, ng'atta ghabwanajaada mukkattajeegiga ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi, amahit ghoadaw giinealanga emeeda.
40014020	Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u. Ghoawaam gheaptanga ak ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.
40014021	Moonneeda fuga siing'ng'aatta ea sagalamnyooji muut headiga, nea meeyiitta gadeemga ea diibiga.
40014022	Iiduw ghwanung' goosheeda giinealangaaschi gaweay gigheawda basooda nea ghoaghaawa maleambooda, nea gahuydean niny aba gideaba migwaheelli sea emeeda.
40014023	Hean heelli emeeda gwading'da giijeeda heeda funyaat ghamwaash Aseetta. Iiduw ghoaw shing'ada nea gaba geaw aba hoowa,
40014024	nea aba damani maleambooda gwachchi ea nihitta bugusta basooda, nea goodeawiit laweajajeega aba gideaba gwaroonnyi jeammeeda.
40014025	Huuw gheatta beashatta gawa nea ghabeawa badayda beega nea gaweesa.
40014026	Daah giinealanga nea ghabeawa badayda beega, ghabeal nea gwayi, “Niih maloonghajeanda!” Googuul aba muuwda.
40014027	Deagheatta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Oappida ng'eanyi adoabealli siida aniini.”
40014028	Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida iyang'ing'i gil ginung' doan headaang'u nea ghabeawi badayda beega.”
40014029	Gwayeeshsha, “Beenni.” Ng'atta ghwararang'aada Betro aba jeeda maleambooda ak gawa appadayda beega nea gagal heeda Yeesu;
40014030	hean daah jeammeeda, ghabeal ak gwalik beega, ak googuul nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida lealnean.”
40014031	Deagheatta ghoahaakta Yeesu geattindaannyi ak ghoang'ng'waay nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea siida mwanang' masawi, ghwasaan anda gibeali?”
40014032	Ding'da duwaawi maleambooda ghahawda jeammeeda.
40014033	Hean ghaghadoawan fukka sean mida jeeda maleamboodean nea gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta.”
40014034	Ghoaghaawa basooda ak ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Genasaretti.
40014035	Jeeng'u fugeaba hoowa, ghoadayda iitta aba daroorakkiga neekkeewean. Geeyeassa fuga sean miyeani,
40014036	geemearmearani niny eawaas earea wileeda hang'daannyi gil akghwahit; nea fukka sean waas weeleadaannyiin geahhaap.
40015001	Hean gaweesa Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwaleabu Yerusaleemu ak ghapka heeda Yeesu ak ghoannyash,
40015002	“Ghwasaan anda giinealangaagu maduuppa ng'asheega siing'ng'wanyaana fugeaba garayi bea ghaheanya? Iissa gweagiischi nea meahuuna geattinga.”
40015003	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda eara agooga iissa goofoolli diigheanda Aseetta aba ng'asheegeagwa oang'ng'waannyi?
40015004	Gwayi Aseetta; ‘Sissiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu,’ nea ‘Siida ang'eawi ghwaan ghana ghaamwat ea deenuusa.’
40015005	Ak gooyeennyi agooga, ‘Siida iiyyeeshsha ghwaan ghana ghaamwat, gitta gwachchi jea dagoonnyi, naadawji Aseetta.’
40015006	Asi aba seareeda ghaheang'wa, noanung' ghoaw ng'asheanda Aseetta gidamwadaagha.
40015007	Ea fuga ammittu geat! Nidoabiiw ng'asheanda ghayi ramoaran sibaneeda suguura Isaaya appadahuukkeagwa nea gwayi,
40015008	‘Fiisu iissa gwasinnean mureeda aba ghuusiga, nea guroruunatka nyaawa ea sheageewean;
40015009	saawa gagadoowannean mwadaagha, nea ghoanaal giinealshooda was ng'asheega buuneeda.'"
40015010	Gaguursa emeeda bwat geat ak gwayeeshsha, “Oalleaydiit ak ghoanalli:
40015011	manda gichchea gwasik ghuut ak ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda, geaghus gidarinna ghuutta, niih dea jea ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.”
40015012	Ng'atta gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ginali gideaba gwachchi Farisayajeega iyiiy ng'asheandida gwanyareesi?”
40015013	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Gilinyooh ea histeannyeanda gil iimahista Bwaabwa bea humng'eeda gajealoatta.
40015014	Anung'waada saawa, suuh fuga adoobiiwshi ng'oawwi. Nea siida ng'oaw iyadoabiiw siida ng'oaw, gayghoabitta duwaawi jeeda shoomanda.”
40015015	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Ng'achcha iidigaasa aba galeesu.”
40015016	Gwayeeshsha, “Eara agooga mandaneegwa fughareenga?
40015017	Miianala eara ghamneawa gideaba gidanyooh gwasik ghuutta siida iissa ghang'atta gawa jeeda, amaduw gwaritta jarooda?
40015018	Amaduukku ng'asheega rittuuna ghuutta gwaleappu gurorooda, amaduw ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.
40015019	Aba gideaba jeeda gurorooda gwarittuuna gittemshajeega munyas, nuusta siida, mealuleega, hiseadayeandumeeda, mareanghumeeda, muuwunooda ng'uyeega, ea beeshta siida.
40015020	Ng'asheesu seaniin geang'utta siida ririnnyeanda; duukku gideaba geeyeagiischi nea mehhuuna geattinga mwoammu ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda.”
40015021	Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa meatkwajeega Diro ea Sidooni.
40015022	Hean ghwahidu headannyi gatmoomba fuga Ganaani bea ng'eanyiitta goojuur muuchchi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Bwaydanaan, Ng'uttamiida, Balleanda Dawdi, gabearji hudeanyu meangeenda.”
40015023	Ea marukusiina eara ng'ashaan. Ng'atta ghwahidu heeda giinealangaaschi ak gamus niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung'waada gawa, aba gideaba goojuurra geeshteanya.”
40015024	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Meechcheaksean buuneessean geechcheaksean gisilga roodeadi bea gheeh Israeeli.”
40015025	Ghwahidu gatmoota ak gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ee Ng'uttamiida weadaan.”
40015026	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Miimiy gideaba geegeanu hamitta diibiga ak geejaksa gudajeega.”
40015027	Gwayeeshsha, “Huumwa gil, Ng'uttamiida, eara gudajeega iissa ghwaak lajanga abitpinna heeda agiischeewa ghweanda nyaawa.”
40015028	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea Gatmooda, ang'iing'i masaweagaagu aahaw! Gagasa nyasa gitta igasayiin.” Ghahaap hudannyi aba geeshangiga.
40015029	Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ghuutta basooda Galilaaya, ak gwading'da giijeeda ak goopteada.
40015030	Gaweay heeda emeettuw nea geeyeassa fuga badoojiga, ea fuga manda geeshanga, ea fuga ng'oawwi, ea fuga manda ghuusiga, ea suuk gasaang'a ak geayiin madeadaannyi ak ghoahaap.
40015031	Ghaham ng'eanyi emeeda idaah nea gabalool fuga manda ghuusiga nea gamajeegiidi fuga badoojiga, nea gawelwel fuga manda geeshanga, nea ghoang'wearda fuga ng'oawwi, ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta Israeeli.
40015032	Gaguursa Yeesu giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Geasamsi emeani aba gideaba neandeawi eawooji samwagu nea mandeawana gilak; mwabwariinyi gideaba gaydasiksa gaweay nea mwaaga gil, gajiiduw goohiil aba naweeda.”
40015033	Gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Aba hiji geendi dareapcheeda gajeanyasana yeenu hamitta jea goolang'u emeeda saang'a deenu?”
40015034	Ghoanyash Yeesu gideaba, “Goondeawi mukkattaji hada?” Gwayeeshsha, “Ispwa ea ghweayeesu ng'ayi manang'i.”
40015035	Ng'atta ghwanung' goobiitpiit emeeda aba ng'eanyi,
40015036	gageanu mukkattajeekka as ispwaan ea ghweayeekka, ak ghamwaash ghawooda ak ghabwanajaada ak ghoadaw giinealanga, ak ghoadaw giinealanga emeeda.
40015037	Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u, ng'atta ghoawaam gheaptanga ak ghwannyiit soscheew ispwa.
40015038	Nea fuga gwachchi agiischi ea sagalamnyooji ang'wan headiga akghwahit nea meeyiitta gadeemga ea diibiiga.
40015039	Iiduw gwaheelli emeeda ak gwading'da maleambooda ak gawa meatkweeda Magadaani.
40016001	Gaweay heeda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega ak gwasimsim nea gamus gideaba, eadaaha gwadeagooda leabu humng'eeda.
40016002	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iissa ihitta shing'ada gooyeennyi, ‘Jeammeeda numuji gajaamiy aba gideaba humng'eeda ea areara.’
40016003	Iighar gayeew iissa gooyeennyi, ‘Askwareani gaygwaduksa, aba gideaba humng'eeda ea areara nea ghwang' eabeal.’ Ghoammuschi anala damannyoojiga iyoong'ulayi humng'eeda, nea mwoammuusi anala gwadeagwajeega damannyoonyiga.
40016004	Seaygeeda munyas mealuuleadi ak gagasa gwadeagooda, ak ea mwajeattaw geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea Yoona.” Ng'atta ghwanung'wa heeda ak ghang'eat gawa.
40016005	Gaweay giinealanga ea ghwahitta gigheawda, nea nuroossa eaditta mukkattajeega.
40016006	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ang'ulla nea gooshageachchi geat aba hamiiraayda Farisayajeega ea dea Sadukkayajeega.”
40016007	Gwasheang'nyi saawa nea gabwa geat, nea gwayi, “Miyeeyeanna mukkattajeega.”
40016008	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda agooga goosheang'nyi sea fuga manang'i masawi, aba gideaba moondeawani mukkattajeega?
40016009	Miiyanala eara ghamneewa? Mwoapkaadi eara mukkattajeekka ammut aba fukka as sagalamnyooji muudiin, ak goowweamsi gheaptanga sooscheew hada?
40016010	Ghana mukkattajeekka assispwa silakkiisa fukka assagalamaji ang'ng'waaniin, heappi ghoawwaamnyi soscheew hada nyiit gheaptanga?
40016011	Gayghoawattaan amwoapkaadi gideaba meabaloolani ng'asheega mukkattajeega? Asi ashageada geat aba hamiiraayda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega.”
40016012	Gwajeeng'u gideaba gwachchi mabaloolana gideaba mayeeshshiinu ashageada geat aba hamiira, gabaloola ginealshooda Farisayajeega ea Sadukkayajeega.
40016013	Muchchu nea gawa Yeesu ng'eanyiida Gaysariyeeda Filippi, ghoanyaash giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Buuneeda gwayeena Balleanda Siida ng'eaha?”
40016014	Geyeeshsha, “Buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayeena Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi, suurja gwayeena Eliya, suurja gwayeena Yeremiya ghaneah siyagi gil aba jeeda sibanga.”
40016015	Gwayeeshsha, “Ama agooga gooyeenayi aniini geewoschi ng'eaha?”
40016016	Ghwasha Simoneeda was Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristo, Balleanda Aseetta majeek.”
40016017	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Ging'wani ang'iing'i, Simoneeda Bar-Yoona! Aba gideaba ng'asheanji moadaajiida saseeda ea foojeanda niih ghoahiimneey Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
40016018	Ak geayeeshshineey, ang'iing'i guwosi Betro, ak badaydeaba laghaneani gaydadeeksa ganisedeanyu, ak eara uurda miyeeda ea mayghoammu ghwajoar.
40016019	Ak aniini gaydagoonnyi gichchea attinana sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, ak gidiradi aba hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeasirat aba hoowa bea humng'eedean, ak gidawassean iittini aba hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeettin aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.”
40016020	Iing'atta ghaweada muuchchi giinealangaaschi eamarukusiina siida wassean gideaba niny Gristoohi.
40016021	Ghang'eada damandida gwaruksa Yeesu giinealangaaschi gideaba gammiissa beatta jea gawa Yerusaleemu, ak aba hoowa gayghwanyas sawanadeeda haw aba heeda gweargwa ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak geenuus, ama eaweetteaba samwagu gwaduudu.
40016022	Ghwaat Betro ea gameaji gwadilda ak goojuursa nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwayiinya Aseetta, Ng'uttamiida! Ng'asheesu mayghwanyasnyi.”
40016023	Gwayamsa geaw ak gwayeeshsha, Betro, “Una badaydeanyu shattaani! Adirussean; aba gideaba mindani meatkweeda Aseetta, gindi dea buuneeda.”
40016024	Damandida gwayeeshsha Yeesu giinealangaaschi, “Siida wassean iigasa gweadu geeshteanyu ea dafoola geaw ak ghwasar behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
40016025	Aba gideaba siida gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygahutteawi, nea siida hutteawi aweagaaschi appadaydeanyu, gayghwadaah.
40016026	Ama siida gaygwaloosa naaha iinyas halanjeassean bea muunda ng'eanyiida, amaduw gahutteawi aweagaaschi? Ghana siida gayghoadayda naaha ak ghoaghiisa aweagaaschi?
40016027	Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghoana gigheambiitta Ghwaan nea goodeana malaykajeega ak abeeda gayghoadaw gilinyooh asihi gidageattindaannyi aba sinaweagaaschi.
40016028	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gwanda hiji bea jeedeang'wean fuga maygameewa, ea eaghus anidaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaana jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi.”
40017001	Iing'atta eawooji lah ghwaat Yeesu Betro ea Yakkobo ea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Yohaana, ak goodeayi uhuuda giijeeda heeda geaw.
40017002	Ghwayamwa ormeadaannyi aba madeannyaawa, ghameang'meang' gheamamdaannyi ea gawuurji aseetta, nea gaweriidi hang'weakkaschi ea ghawaar weeshinda.
40017003	Hean gwardu Muusa ea Eliya, ak gabalool sea niny.
40017004	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, “Ng'uttamiida aamiy gideaba aseasa gajeeppiidana hiji; iigasayi gaydasin aba hiji udahabeaschooji samwagu, akkalealla daang'u gil annirja gaba Muusa, aniirja gaba Eliya.”
40017005	Damani duu gabalolean deagheatta ghwahidu shamoghooda eesh ak gwadukta, ak ghwanyaasha ghuutta jeeda shamoghooda nea gwayi, “Niih Balleandeanyu abwariinyi ahoosanani, olleeysiina iit niny.”
40017006	Iiy giinealanga ng'asheesu goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi, nea ghabeal muuchchi.
40017007	Gawa Yeesu ak ghawaas aba geattindaannyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'eatng'eada, nea adoabealli.”
40017008	Gatgat gheanyanga nyaawa, ea mwadaaha siih geaghus Yeesu nea gaba geaw.
40017009	Iiduw nea ghwararang'aana giijeeda, gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Adiiduw goorukusi eara siih iitteaba ng'asheesu oadayiin ea eaghus ea niduunna Balleanda Siida jeeda miyeeda.”
40017010	Ak ghoanyash Giinealanga, “Anda gwayi ng'oorshoodiga geaghus ghannyi goosheeda ghwaan Eliya?”
40017011	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Eliya gaygoosheeda ghwaan, ak gwasissin halanjeassean;
40017012	ak geayeeshshineegwa, Eliya nigeawiit ghwaan ak ea meanala, ak geesma halanjeassean gasa saawa. Gwasnu eara Balleanda Siida gaygawa ak gajeesawan aba geattinga nyaawa.”
40017013	Ghwanal giinealanga gideaba gabaloola ng'asheega Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi.
40017014	Iiduw nea ghwahitta heeda emeeda, gawa Siyagi headaannyi, ak gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha,
40017015	“Ng'uttamiida, eaniyean bwayda balleandeanyu, aba gideaba goohiili, nea iissa gwasawana muuchchi; niny imisean gang'adeesa jeeda beasta, ghana galannya jeeda beega.
40017016	Muchchu geayeadu heeda gineelangaagu ak ghwaraay ghoahaap.”
40017017	Ghwalamda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea seaygeeda mandeawana masaweega biissa ea roodeadi, gajeendeaydooscheena ea ghoaw eeju? Agooga gaydamilikkiidaneegwa ea ghoaw eeju? Ayeanni heedeanyu”
40017018	Ng'atta goojuursa Yeesu niny, ak gwaritteaysa meangeenda, ak ghahaap balleanda aba geeshangiga.
40017019	Iiduw ghoahudaada Giinealanga ea gaweay heeda Yeesu, ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda aseasa gearaannyi erruutta?”
40017020	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwasin gheashooyda masaweegeagwa. Geayeeshshineegwa aba huumwa, inyeeda goondeawi masaweega deenna ghajilleanda haradaali, gajoammusa ayeeshshiina giijeeni, ‘Loadadawana hiji ak guwi hoowa,’ ak gaygawa, ak ghannyi ea manda ng'asheanda hang'waay mwajoammuusa sinooda.
40017021	‘Loadadawana hiji ak guwi hoowa,’ ak gaygawa, ak ghannyi ea manda ng'asheanda hang'waay mwajoammuusa sinooda.”
40017022	Damanda mideayeewa sean aba Galilaaya gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Balleanda Siida gaygawa ak geayiin geattinga buuneeda,
40017023	ak gaygwanuus, ama eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.” Hean gagiisan giinealanga muuchchi.
40017024	Hitta Gapernaumu, gaweay heeda Betro fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadeeda mwahitta shekkeeli ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi! Giinealshoochcheandeang'wa goodayyiida gwaadi?”
