40017025	Gwayeeshsha, “Eah goodayyiida.” Iiduw nea nihitta ghoah, goosheeda Yeesu ghoanyaash niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Simon, iing'ulayi ang'iing'i gawuurjiin? Sugoodiga muunda ng'eanyiida goong'ng'oonyi gujaweeda ghana gwaadi aba hichpa ana fiih? Aba heeda balloojiga nyaawa ghana hichpa fiih suuk?”
40017026	Eeshsha, “Hichpa fiih suuk.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Asi iisunu abeeda gaygoobal geat balloojiga.
40017027	Ama abeeda iimajeannyareasa, guwi jeeda basooda ak giibuutti sidageeda ghwaraja ghaang' siing'ng'oonnya ghweayeega ak gigeanu ghweayeanda madeeda jea eang'ng'waay ak giijaadi ghuutta, ak gaynyasana shekkeli; gigeanu ak giidawi heedeanyu ea headaang'u.”
40018001	Damandida gaweay Giinealanga heeda Yeesu ak ghoanyaash gideaba “Siida haweewa sean ng'eaha aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda?”
40018002	Gaguursa niny jeepta ak ghwanung'u ghaminaada aba dageascheeda nyaawa,
40018003	ak gwayi, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, imwoayami geat ea awuurjeewana diibiga, ea majaghannyi aweayeena jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
40018004	Siida wassean aatgeaw ngeanyi ea gawuurji jeebi, siisi siida haw gil aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
40018005	Nea siida wassean jea ghamwas jeabwagi uurji niih aba gheawungeasu, abeeda ghamwasan aniini.”
40018006	“Siida wassean jea ghwanung' gwasin ring'eeda jeabwagi aba jeedeaba diibisu manang'i mwasaniin, ghang'wana gwachchi geerassa gheatta lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak geejaksa bugusta basooda.
40018007	Eamuy daang'u ng'eanyiida aba simsimda eattu ring'eeda! Aba gideaba simsimda gammiisa hinnooda, abeeda eamuy dea siida jea ghwanung' ghwahidu simsimda!
40018008	Iinung' geattindaang'u adiinya ghanea geashtaang'u, laja ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega nea gibea badeeda, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geattin iyyeenya ea geeshan iyyeenya ak geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda.
40018009	Ama nung' gheang'daang'u sina ring'eeda giloatti, ak gijakti asheagiidana geaw; ghang'wana gideaba ginyasi eaweega nea gibea ghaang'agi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi gheanyan iyyeenya, ak geejakseey jeeda beasta maloonghajeega.”
40018010	Ang'ulla! Adiiduw goofoolli earagi aba jeedeaba suuh manang'iin, asi geayeeshshineegwa aba humng'eeda malaykajeega nyaawa iissa gang'ula galeegasean gheamamda Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda. [
40018011	Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida ghwoan gwalealu gidaghayi roat.]
40018012	Heappi gawurjiin? Siida imideawa gisil bughala, ak ghwaroat agi, maygwanung'usa heeda giikka asseedam ea damwashshageashiin uhuuda gijeeda ak gawa gagasa diitta gwachchi roadiini?
40018013	Amaduw nea ghwanyas, aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gaygang'weeliisa niih muuchchi ea ghwalaabwa hoowa giikka asseedam ea damwashshageash maroottean.
40018014	Aso niih miih gidagassida Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gideaba gayghwaroat jeabwagi aba jeedeaba suuh manang'iin.
40018015	“Iyadiiyseey oorjeeda giyeang'wa, guweesi ak gireekusi nea goobeayi geat. Iimwas gooleeyseey iitta abeeda ea ninyasi oorjeeda giyeang'wa.
40018016	Ama heawa gooleeyseey iit gideayeawi siyagi ghanea fiih iyyeenya sea ang'iing'i, aba gideaba ng'asheanda wassean iirugu ammadeeda mushoodi assiyyeenya ghanea samwagu abeeda ng'asheega gaygamajeekcheewiidi.
40018017	Ama mealeysiniit saawa, abeeda girukusi ganiisa; ama mealeysiiniit ganiisa, abeeda ginung' ghoaw aba headaang'u siida emoojiga ea dea ang'ng'waannyi gwaadi.”
40018018	“Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gida wassean oarachchi aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean abeeda gajeasirat aba hoowa bea humng'eedean, nea gidoottinnyi aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean gajeasiittin aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.
40018019	Geayeeshshineegwa gichcha, aba jeedeang'wa ineajeesa fiih iyyeenya ng'ashaan aba hiji bea badayda ng'eanyiidean ak ghamwaash Aseetta, gayghoadaw Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda.
40018020	Aba gideaba heeda wassean roonnyeesa fiih iyyeenya ghana samwagu aba gheawungeasu, abeeda earaniini gaydanda jeannyaawa.”
40018021	Iiduw gawa Betro heeda ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, heappi oorjeeda giyeanya iyadiiysean gaydasamsa niba hada? Niba ispwa?”
40018022	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Meayeeshshineey niba ispwa, eara laadam ea damanamughuush niba ispwa.
40018023	Aba dascheani sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea sugoochchanjagi gasa gwayiida haleanjeeda sea soomjoogaaschi.”
40018024	“Hean ang'eat ittooda haleanjeeda, deagheatta geeyeadu headannyi siisi mideewa sileemba lappiyeeda suguura dalantaji sagalamnyooji damanamughuush;
40018025	siisi abeeda mandeawana eara gichchea ghoadaydawa sileetta; iiduw gwayeeshsha siitta haw was sugoochcheandean, ashaayda niny ea gatmoadaannyi ea diibigaaschi ea halanjeadannyi sean mideawa, ak geattaydaawa sileetta.
40018026	Ghwalamda Soomjeandida ak gwatkuy aba madeadannyi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, aaniyean nyooh ghannyi riyeeng'da ak gaydawalu sileadaang'u sean.’
40018027	Iiduw ghabwayda sugoochcheanda soomjeandida ak gwasamsa sileetta.
40018028	Gawa soomjeandida ak gwaroonnyi sea siyagi was soomjeanda eajisu mideaydooscheesa gadiyeeda biissa gwandeawa sileadaannyi lappiyaji bughala suguura dinaari. Gang'eessa ak ghoong'ng'waay ak ghoagheat nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Goona sileedeanyu.’
40018029	Gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi siitta eawoschu mideaydooschi aba gadiyeedean ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Eaniyean nyooh ghannyi riyeeng'da ak gaydawalu sileadaang'u.’
40018030	Ghaheawa ak gwajaksa ghealooniga ea eaghus ea nuwalu sileetta.
40018031	Iiduw nea ghwadaah soomjooga mideaydooschi ng'asheanji gwanyareesi muuchchi, ak gaweay gwarukusa siida bea gadiyeeda iitteaba ng'asheesu sean siin siididean.
40018032	Ng'atta gaguursa siidida bea gadiyeedean ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ea soomjeanda muy! Gwachchi ang'iing'i gimuschean gideaba aaniyean nyooh ghannyi bassean ak geasamseey siileetta sean ittaang'uun;
40018033	ama ang'iing'i mammisseey gideaba gaybwayda soomjeanda indeaydooscheesi gadiyeeda gawuurji gidagwachchi easamsiindaneeyi?’
40018034	Ghwanyareas Siitta haw bea gadiyeedean muuchchi ak ghwanung' eayaat eesawan ea eaghus eaniwalu sileetta seaniin.
40018035	Asi gwasunu eara Bwaabwa mida humng'eeda gaygwahinduneegwa eara agooga iimaba siisi samsa oorjeeda geannyaawa aba jeadaannyi sean.”
40019001	Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu ng'asheesu ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ak gawa ng'eanyiida Yahuudi, gigheawda eenda Yordaani;
40019002	ghwaat geeshta emeeda saang'a ak ghoahaap aba hoowa.
40019003	Ghapka headaannyi Farisayajeega ak gwasimsim nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba siida gayghwanung' gatmoadannyi aba gilinyooh ea ramwasaani?”
40019004	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Miyoassoamwana gideaba siida ghayi sineegwa ammwadi gwasin siida was ng'eedeeda ea siida was gatmooda,
40019005	ak gwayi, ‘Aba sareani gayghwanung'wa ng'eedeeda heeda ghwaan ea ghaamwat, ak gaygwaroochchi sea gatmoadaannyi, ama ng'atta ghoaw fiisu assiyeenyean saseanagi?’
40019006	Fiisu abeeda ea mudea iyyeenya, niiw saseanagi. Asi fukka aguuyi Aseettean, adiiduw gooheelli siida.”
40019007	Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Abeeda iiduw goodaydeaysa naaha Muusa gheatta barawajeanda nung'ooda?”
40019008	Gwayeeshsha, “Muusa ghayi ghoadayda gheatta jea eanung'wa gatmooda aba hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatkeagwa, nea abeeda ghayi mwadi ea masunu.
40019009	Asi geayeeshshineegwa: siida wassean jea ghwanung' gatmoadaannyi imwanung'wa aba ng'asheega hiseadayeandumeeda, akghaghi nuut, gamealuuli.”
40019010	Gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Ng'asheega siida ea gatmoadaannyi iisunu, ghang'wana ea meegeeshshi.”
40019011	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, mwoammu buuneessean ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, geaghus fukka adaw Aseettean.
40019012	Aba gideaba gwanda gulanga siji nea gwasnu ghang'eada jeesinga gheamadiga nyaawa, ak gwanda gulanga nung' buuneeda ghoaw gulanga, ak gwanda gulanga sin geat gulanga aba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda. Dea ammu ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, ea dang'ng'waanya.
40019013	Muchchu geeyeassa diibiga manang'i ghwayiin geattingaaschi iheenga diibiga ak ghamwaash ghawooda appadahuukka nyaawa. Iiduw goojuursa giinealanga;
40019014	gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anung'waada diibiga manang'i ghapka heedeanyu, adoakghuumnyi; aba gideaba fuga uurji suuh sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda daanyaawa.”
40019015	Ghwayiin gattingaschi iheenga nyaawa, ak ghabeawa ng'eanyiitta.
40019016	Hean gabeessa Siyagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, gaydasin ana ng'ashaan miy ijadanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda?”
40019017	Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ghwasaan anda ginyaashchaan iitta miyinda? Siida miy aa agi, ama iigasayi una jeeda eaweega, ging'ng'waannyi digheannyeekka.”
40019018	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Akkeega?” Gwayeeshshsha Yeesu, “Adinuusi siida, adimealuuli, adijagwadischi, adinapiisi siida ng'uyeega.
40019019	Sissiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu, ak gibwariiydi gischeewoochchaandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.”
40019020	Gwayeeshsha gheareemaneedida, ng'asheesu seaniin nigeawiit dang'ng'waay; abeeda gudu ghwashoadeawan naaha gichcha?
40019021	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iigasayi huuwa siida hidaat, guwi ak gishaaydi haleanjeadaang'u indeawi, ak giidawi fuga barbari, ak abeeda gaymideawana gheaseeda aba humng'eeda, ama ng'atta guwuni eanni geeshteanyu.”
40019022	Iiy Ghearemaneedida ng'asheanji ghang'eat gawa nea gagiisan, aba gideaba gwandeawa haleanjeessang'a.
40019023	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu giinealangaaschi, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshinegwa gajahang'waay beatta jea gawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda.
40019024	Nuut gichcha geayeeshshineegwa, gajawussis muuchchi gideaba gaygwasik diyeayda suguura nngamiya seawadeeda sidageeda ea eamawuurji gideaba gaygawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
40019025	Iiy Giinealanga ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi nea gwayi, “Abeeda iisun gayghoammu ghwalaalaan ng'eaha?”
40019026	Goong'weersa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheanji aba buuneeda ahang'waay, ak aba heeda Aseetta aawusis.”
40019027	Deagheatta ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'wearda, aseasa sinung'wi heeda haleanjeessean ak geeyeadu geashtaang'u. Abeeda gajeanyasa naha?”
40019028	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, agoogeeda oyeadu geeshteanyu aba ng'eanyiideesh, jea ghwahidu eaweeda jea goopteadawa Balleanda Siida hoorgeadaannyi ghambiidaat, abeeda earagooga gajooppiidana hoorgajeekka attamaniyyeenyean ak goorgweaksi eemoojikka attamaniyyeenya bea Israeeliin.
40019029	Nea giliwas siih nung'usa heeda gheeda ghana oorjeeda ghaamwat ghana haweega ghaamwat ghana ghwaan ghana ghamwaat ghana diibiga ghana madameega, appadayda gheawungeasu, gayghwanyas niba bughala ak gwahearan eaweega manda mudeanooda.
40019030	Ak gea saang'a mida mwadi gayghoaw gea huuydean, nea gea huuydean gayghoow gea madeeda.”
40020001	“Aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji siida bea gheeda ritteawa sakteayda duw ak gagasa fuga jea ghabwar ng'eanyi aba jeeda madamnyeandaannyi bea misabiibu.
40020002	Iing'atta nea nineajeesa buuneeda gideaba gayghoadaw lappiyeeda suguura dinaari aba gadiyeeda jeedaskwearda, ghwaat jeeda madamnyandannyi bea misabiibu.”
40020003	“Gwaritta sakteayda nea gaba aseetta samwagu ak ghwadaah buuneeda suuk nea ghaminaada aba jeeda naada nea mandeawana gadiyeeda;
40020004	gwayeeshsha fukka, ‘Aweayeena eara agooga ak goosinnyi gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu, ak abeeda gaydagooneegwa gittoobiiwseegwa.’ Ak gaweay.
40020005	Gabiikta gwaritta gichcha siitta bea madamnyeandean nea gaba aseetta lah ea aseetteaba shageash, ak gwasinda gidada.
40020006	Hitta aseetteaba damwanagi gabiikta gwaritta gichcha ak gabiikta ghwanyas fiih suuk nea ghaminaada; hean ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghwasaan anda agooga goomineadayyi aba hiji askwearda sean nea moosni gil?’
40020007	Geeyeeshsha saawa, ‘Gweagu gideaba manda siida goaneasa gadiyeeda.’ Gwayeeshsha Siidida saawa, ‘Aweayeena eara agooga ak goosinynyi gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu.’
40020008	Iiduw nea gamikta aseetta, gaguursa siida bea madamnyeanda siidaannyi ahaaghwa fuga gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Guursiina fuga gadiyeeda ak giidawi gidageattinda nyaawa, nea ging'eadi siida huuydean, ea gagul siida madeeda.’
40020009	Ghwahidu fukwachchi siittaw gadiyeeda nea gaba aseetta damwanagi, ak gaba siisi siittaw dinaarajaanjagi.
40020010	Hidu fukwachchi bea madeeda ghaghay gili jea eattaw lappiyeeda meaji ghwanaawda, amaduw eara saawa gaba siisi siittaw dinaarajaanjagi.
40020011	Ng'atta ging'ng'ooyda, gooniiksa siitta bea gheedean,
40020012	nea gwayi, ‘Fiisu huydeaniin gagadiyi aba jeemba aseadeanagi akghwahit, ak ginung' gwadeennyi lappiyedeanya sea gaanyaawa nea gwachchi aseasa geamilikghti gadiyeeda hang'waay subwadi beasta askwearda sean.’
40020013	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siyagi aba jeannyaawa, ‘Siideadupcheewi, aniini mwaagi ghanyangaagu; gwachchi meeheelleesiini gideaba gaydagoonnyi dinaari?
40020014	Geanda gea was gaaagu akkuwi; ghaabwariinyi gideaba gaydaadaw siisi huydeaniin oyyang'deayyeena.
40020015	Neada ea mwadoabiwa haleanjeedeanyu iyeagasayi dahinda gidaabwariiydi? Ghana gishti ghaang' aba gideaba geewoschi innya jihi?’
40020016	Asi, gwasunu eara fuga huydean gayghoaw fugeammwadi, nea fugeammwadi gayghoaw fuga huydean.”
40020017	Muchchu gheeda nea ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu, ghwaat giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean heeda funyaat ak gwayeeshsha aba naweeda,
40020018	“Ang'ulla, ghamneawa geascheang'di geeweayi Yerusaleemu; ak Balleanda Siida gajeang'ng'waay ak geayiin geattinga ashoohoodiga hees ea gea ng'oorshoodiga ak gajeergweaksiina miyeeda,
40020019	ng'atta gajeayaat ak geayiin geattinga emoojiga eeshka, nea geabwar aba mughoowooda, ak geengoor, ama eawetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
40020020	Ng'atta gawa Gheamatta jiilu balloojiga Sebedaayo ak gawa heeda nea goodeayi oorjooga aschi ama hitta gwatkuy ak gamus ng'ashaan.
40020021	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Gigasayi naaha?” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Rukta gideaba orjoosu ikkeasu assiyyeenyean nung' goopteada akkalealla aba gattindaang'u bea dugwa ak ginung' goopteada niirja aba gattindaang'u ghadaam aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeedaang'u.”
40020022	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwoanali eara gidoomuschi. Heappi! Ghoammuuschi aleayda bayookcheanda jea daleeyda aniini?” Gwayeeshsha, “Geammuuschi.”
40020023	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Sawanadeedeanyu gajoomilikghteaysiina, ama duukku giipteadayda geattindeanyu bea dugwa ea geattindeanyu ghadaam, meandeawani uurda jea dagoona, geaghus eattaw fukghayi nibay gwararsa Bwaabwa.”
40020024	Iiy Giinealangiga attamwanamughuushiin ng'asheesu, gwanyareeksa oorjookka assiyyeenyean.
40020025	Ng'atta gaguursa Yeesu saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Moanali gideaba fuga hees bea emoojiga goombaleegwa aba uurda nea fuga hees ikkanyaawa iissa ghaminghiseagwa.
40020026	Ea maygwasunu aba heedeang'wa nea siida gasa gwaheedu aba jeedeang'wa, ea doawa soomjeandeang'wa,
40020027	nea siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa igasa ghoaw siida madeeda ea doawa soomjeandeang'wa;
40020028	aba sareani eara Balleanda Siida mwoani egadiyeesa niny ghwaan gagadiyi, ak ghoadayda aweagaaschi ghoaw leadeeda fuga saang'a.”
40020029	Muchchu nea ghabeawa mujiineeda Yerikko ghwaat geeshta emeetuw.
40020030	Hean, gwanda ghuutta naweeda fiih iyyeenya ng'oowwi nea goobitpiit, hean iiduw nea ghwayiiy gideaba ghang'atta Yeesu ghwaat naweetta, goojuur nea gwayi, “Bwaydaneasa, Balleanda Dawdi!”
40020031	Goowwoowsa emeeda nea geeyeeshsha asiinda; saawa gabiikta goojuur muuchchi nea gwayi, “Bwaydaneasa, Ng'uttamiida Balleanda Dawdi!”
40020032	Ghaminaada Yeesu ak gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dasinneegwa naaha?”
40020033	Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamida, geegasayi ghwajaada ghanyangaasa.”
40020034	Ghabwayda Yeesu ak ghoong'ng'waay gheanyanga nyaawa ama deagheatta ghwajaada, ak ghwaat geeshta.
40021001	Iiduw nea gwaneekkiissa Yerusaleemu ghwahitta Betfaagi, mida giijeeda masaytunajeega, hean goojeakta Yeesu giinealan iyyeenya,
40021002	nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta gharang'da mida madeadeang'wa, deagheatta gajadaaha digeeda sirat ea gureandaannyi; goottinnyi ak gooyeannean.
40021003	Ama rukuneegwa siida ng'asheanda, gooyeeshshi, ‘Gagasa Ng'uttamiida,’ ak gaygwasikseegwa.”
40021004	Suuh seaniin geesindunu gwadeaschi sea ng'asheanda ghayi rugu sibaneeda nea gwayi,
40021005	“Ayeeshshiina hudeaba Sayuuni, Ang'wearda, sugoochcheandaang'u ghwaan headaang'u, ea ng'eeni nea gwading'da digeeda, gureenda digeeda, dayeenda digeeda.”
40021006	Gaweay Giinealanga ak gwasinda ng'asheega gida rukusiinda Yeesu;
40021007	goorjeanu digeeda ea gureandannyi ak gookkwealsa hang'weakka nyaawa badahuukka ak goopteada aba badayda.
40021008	Ghoabwarghaan emeeda hang'weakka nyaawa aba jeeda naweeda, nea buuneeda suurja gaptu seenga geediga ak ghoabwarghaan aba jeeda naweeda.
40021009	Goojuur emeetuw asheeda ea gea huydean nea gwayi, “Hoosaana Balleanda Dawdi! Sing'ushsha dea jea ghwaana gheawunga Ng'uttamiida! Hoosaana aba humng'eeda.”
40021010	Damanda hittaawa Yerusaleemu, ghwadakghuyan mujiineasean. Hean gwayi buuneeda, “Siisi ng'eaha?”
40021011	Gwayi emeetuw, “Niih sibaneeda was, Yeesuuyda leabu Nasareetteeda Galilaaya gil.”
40021012	Gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, hitta ghahoan fuga shaayda haleanjeeda ea gea shaah aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak goobimbiineada measajeega fuga nyarja lappiya, ea hoorgajeega fuga shaayda gharibajeega.
40021013	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Gheenyu gajeeguura gheeda sumoorra ghawooda;’ amaduw ghoanung' agooga ghoaw gwaleeda funnya geat mareanghooga.”
40021014	Gaweay headannyi fuga badoojiga ea gea ng'oawwi ak ghwanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghoahaap.
40021015	Iiduw nea ghwadaah ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin, ea ghuusiga diibiga ajuur aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwayi, “Hoosaana Balleanda Dawdi!” Gwanyareesi;
40021016	geeyeeshsha niny, “Heappi niyiinyi gida nyaah fiisu?” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ea huumwa ghayi, miyoassoamwana gideaba, ‘Aba ghuusiga diibiga ea gea ghameekka manang'i gaygwaduumshooweey muuchchi?'"
40021017	Hit ghang'eat ghwanung'wa heeda, ak gwaritteawa mujiini ak gawa Bettaniya ak gwalla hoowa.
40021018	Sakteayda nea gagal mujiini, ghwayeachchi.
40021019	Ghwadaah shaboogheechcheanda mida ghuutta naweeda, ak gaweesa, ama hitta heeda ghwadaah mandeawana haghweega geaghus seenga akghwahit. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha geetta, “Adagudijiili haghweega ea ghoaw gweannyeekka manda mudeanooda!” Ghaghajamiit geettida aba geeshangiga.
40021020	Daah giinealanga, ghahamng'eanyi nea gwayi, “Ghwasaan anda geedi gabay ghaghajamiit?”
40021021	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, iyondeawi masaweega nea manda jeesingeagwa machmajeega, ghoammuuschi nea majeaghus niih bea shaboogheechcheandean akghwahit, gajoammusa eara gideaba gajayeeshshiina giijeeni, loadaada ak geejakseey jeeda basooda, ak gaygwasa.
40021022	Amaduw iyondeawi masaweega, ak goomuschi nea ghoamwaashchi ghawooda gajanyasa haleanjeessean oogasayi.”
40021023	Iiduw nea gawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta goonealshi, damani anealsheewean gaweay heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak geannyaash, “Ng'asheesu deenuun gisni aba gheambalmeedeabeang'a, gagoonnyi ng'eaha gheambalmeani?”
40021024	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi; ama oashaayi abeeda eara aniini gaydarukuneegwa gheambalmeani easnni ng'asheesuun headaanyasi.
40021025	Gibaattiisanda Yohaana gwaleabu yeenu? Gwaleabu humng'eeda ghana leabu heeda buuneeda? Hean goonyeari geat saawa gideaba, iisiyeeshshi, ‘Gwaleabu humng'eeda,’ abeeda gaygwayeeshshineasa, ‘Abeeda ghwasaan andamoamwasi?’
40021026	Ama siyeeshshi. ‘Gwaleabu heeda buuneeda,’ earada geawwalli emeeda; aba gideaba ghwanal buuneassean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.”
40021027	Hean ghwasha ghuutta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Meanali.” Ghwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara aniini abeeda ea maydarukneegwa heeda aanyasi gheambalmeani easni ng'asheesu seaniin.”
40021028	“Heappi ghoadaaktiin? Gwandeawa siyagi oorju iyyeenya; gaweesa dea madeeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Balleanda, askwareani una ak gisni gadiyeeda aba jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu.’
40021029	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Maydawa.’ Iiduw gwaduukkuunna ak gawa.
40021030	Gaweesa siitta bea iyyeenyean ak gwarukuteayda gidagwachchi; ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Gaydawa, Siida mureeda,’ ak ea mawa.
40021031	Heappi! Aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyyeenyean gwasin anneeda gidagasa ghwaan?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Diitta bea madeedeani.” Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga hiseada gaygoosheedeaweegwa beatta jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
40021032	Aba gideaba Yohaana ghayi ghwaan heedeang'wa aba naweeda doabiiwaat ak ea moamwasi agooga, amaduw ghamwas fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga hiseada. Earappeadi noadaayi haleanjeeni seaniin ghanyea miyaduukkuunana ghana amwasa niny.
40021033	“Olleysiniit gideagali nuut. Ghayi gwanda siisi bea gheeda ak gwandeawa madamnyeanda misabiibu ak gooneaweesa hilgweanda ak gwasin heeda jea eesissa difaayi aba jeeda ak ghwadeas eara madalooda, ak ghoadaw fuga jea gooragan, ak ghang'eat gawa bareannyeekka aba ng'eanyi nuut.
40021034	Neekiit damanda haghweega goojeakta soomjoogaaschi heedeaba fukka aragan madamnyeandean gaweay gweadu haghweegaaschi.
40021035	Gageanu fuga ghayi ragan madamnyeandean ak ghoang'ngwaay soomjookka siichcheaktean ak geabwar akkalealla, nea niirja geenuus, nea niirja geefutta lagheanga.
40021036	Gabiikta goojeakta soomjooga suuk saang'a naawa gea madeeda; gabiikta gichcha gwasma fiisu gidada.
40021037	Aba huydeanda goojeakta balleandaannyi nea gwayi, ‘Gayghoawal gheang'da balleandeanyu.’
40021038	Iiduw nea ghwadaah fugiga ghayi aragan madamnyeandean balleandida gabaloola saawa nea gaba geat gideaba, ‘Niih siichchea gwahearaniischi gil, eabwara ghami ak geegeandi hearaniischoadaannyi.’
40021039	Hean geang'ng'waay ak geerrutteawa madamnyeandida bea misabiibuun ak geenuus.
40021040	Abeeda iihidu siidida bea madamnyeanda misabibuun gaygwahindaan fukka ghayi aragan madamnyeandean?”
40021041	Geeyeeshsha niny, “Gayghwalas uhuudeaba fukka munyasiin, ak ghoadaw madamnyeandida fiih suuk jea gooragan ak geattaw haghweega aba damandaannyi.”
40021042	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Heappi miyoassoamwana iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeeda Ng'ooruutka? ‘Lagheaneeda ghayi anaawaghaang' deekshoodiga niiw lagheaneeda haw bea sindeetta; ng'asheanji gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida, ak ea daamdaamwaat aba gheanyangaasa?’
40021043	Aba niih geayeeshshineegwa, sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gajearreadeagwa ak geattaw eemwa nuut ammu gagu haghweagaschi.”
40021044	Ne siida jea ghoabeada aba uhuudeaba lagheaneeni gaygagiishachchi; nea siida wassean jea gobeedeaysa, gayghang'aal ea goosha.
40021045	Hean iiy Ashohoodiga hees ea Farisayajeega ng'asheagaschi galageadiini, gwajeeng'u gideaba gabaloola saawa.
40021046	Hean geebiissa eegasa gichchea eang'ng'waayda, amaduw geawal buuneeda aba gideaba ghwadaah gideaba sibaneeda gil.
40022001	Gabiikta Yeesu gichcha goobalool buuneeda aba galeega nea gwayeeshsha,
40022002	“Sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gawuurji sea sugoochcheanda gasa gageesheesa balleandaannyi,
40022003	hean goojeakta soomjoogaaschi gaguursa fukka sirariin ghapka nyeangiida, amaduw fukka sirariin ghaheawa ghapka.
40022004	Gabiikta gichcha goojeakta soomjoogaaschi suuk ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ayeeshshiina fuga heetta sirar apkaani aba gideaba, Ang'ulla neanuuschi heewgeasu ea muhooga risheadi nigeawiit ghwahit sean, apkaani nyeangiida.’
40022005	Ghanyea maduuppa, ghang'eang'eat gaweay, gawa akkaleala madamnyeandaannyi niirja gawa giigeakshoadaannyi,
40022006	nea gea abit ghoang'ng'waay soomjookka ak geesissa ghwarjeeda, ama ng'atta geabwar gameewa.
40022007	Hean ghwanyareas sugoochcheanda ak goojeakta shirikkareadaannyi ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka bara buneedean nea geang'uda mujiineeda nyaawa beasta.
40022008	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, ‘Nyeangiida nigeawiit ghwahit ama duw fuga heetta sirar ea mudu gwadeaschi.
40022009	Asi ang'eatng'eada aweayeena guyeeda naweadinga ak googuursi fuga oadaayi sean aguursiina ghapka nyeangiida.’
40022010	Gwaritta soomjookka ak gaweay bearsheeda naweadinga ak gooweamu gilinyooh ghwadaah gea, munyas ea gea miyaas, ea ghwannyiit gheeda rabasta.
40022011	Iiduw gawa sugoochcheanda gah ghwadaah rabastaannyi, ghwadaah siyagi miigookwa hang'weakka nyeangiida;
40022012	ghoanyaash sugoochcheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Siideaduupcheewi, guwundiin jeedeaba gheawi nea mindeawani hang'weakka nyeangiida?’ Geerukusa ak ghwaroat ghuutta.
40022013	Gwayeeshsha Sugoochcheanda fuga gadiyeeda, ‘Arada geattinga ea geeshanga, ak ghoayaachchi ak goojaksi jeeda misaneeda jarooda, aba hoowa gaygooyyeawda nea goowiiri geeshatka aba sawanadeeda.’
40022014	Aba gideaba gea suguursa aasaang'a, nea gea siloat ea ng'ay.”
40022015	Ng'atta gaweay Farisayajeega ak gabaloola gichchea ghaghasta Yeesu aba ng'asheagaaschi.
40022016	Iiduw goojeakta giinealanga nyaawa headaannyi ea gea Heroode geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, Aseasa geanalli gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi siida huumwa, ak gibwadi niih giinnaali buuneeda naweeda Aseetta aba huumeanda, nea ghanyea miduuppi hawunda siida aba gideaba ming'ulli ratooda buuneeda.
40022017	Heappi, rukuneasa aba ang'iing'i gidaaktiini. Ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geattawji Gaysaari gwaadi ghana mwadoabiiwa?”
40022018	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda googasayi asimsimean ea fuga ammitu geat?
40022019	Oahimni heappi lappiyeeda ottayiideawi gwaadi.” Gageanu buuneeda ak geattaw shiliingajeanda.
40022020	Ng'atta ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gili gawuurji ng'eaha, ak gheawung'su gabeang'a?”
40022021	Geeyeeshsha, “Gaba Gaysaari.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Haleanjeeda Gaysaari oattawa Gaysaari, ak gea Aseetta ghoattawji Aseetta.”
40022022	Geeyi bwak ama iiy ng'asheesu ghahamng'eanyi ak gaweay.
40022023	Eaweettida gaweay heeda Yeesu Fiisu suguura Sadukkayajeega eena manda duunnooda ak ghoanyaash,
40022024	nea gwayeeshsha, “Giinealshoochcheanda, ghayi gwayi Muusa, ‘Siida iimeah, nea mwoabuuda diibiga, gayghaghi masiing'eandida ittannyiin oorjeeda ghaamwat, ak gwanyaksa oorjeeda ghaamwat diibiga.
40022025	Asi aba hiji bea ghaheanyean gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghaamwadagi; gageeshshi dea madeeda ak ghami nea miighwanyas diibiga ak gwanung'usa gatmoadannyi oorjeeda ghaamwat.’
40022026	Gwasnu earaba oorjeedeaba iyyeenya, ea oorjeedeaba samwagu, ea ghwahitta ispeennyaawa.
40022027	Aba huydeandeaba sea eara gatmootta ghami.
40022028	Aba jeeda duunnooda gay ghoaw gatmoodeabeang'a aba fiisu as ispwaan? Aba gideaba nindeayi sean.”
40022029	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga ghoaramwaschi aba gideaba mwoanali Ng'ooruutka ghana uurda Aseetta.
40022030	Aba gideaba eaweetta siduttuuna majeegeeshshi nea mwajeaghi aba gideaba gaygawuurji malaykajeega humng'eeda.
40022031	Ama duukku iitta dunnooda miyeeda, ea miyoassoamwana gidaghayi rukuneegwa Aseetta, ghayi gwayeeshshineegwa,
40022032	‘Aniini geewoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu, ea Aseetta Isakka, ea Aseetta Yakkobo?’ Asi niny miih Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil, niny Aseetta fuga majeekcheewi.”
40022033	Iiduw nea gwayiing'shi emeeda ghahamng'eanyi aba ginealshoadaannyi.
40022034	Iimuchchu gheeda nea ghwayiiy Farisayajeega gideaba nirat ghuusiga Sadukkayajeega, ghabwat geat ak gabalool.
40022035	Ghoanyaash diinagiida nea gwasim.
40022036	“Ginealshoochcheanda, digheanda haw aba jeeda deaweeda anneeda?”
40022037	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Bwariinya Ng'uttamiida was Aseattaang'u aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba jeadaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean.
40022038	Niih digheanda hawi ak gabiissa ea dea madeeda gil.
40022039	Deaba iyyeenya gawuurji sea niih, bwariiyda siida ischeayeewi gidubwariiydi geaw.
40022040	Aba digheannyeeksu assiyyeenyean gwadiyeewa deaweedajeega sean ea sibanga.”
40022041	Iiduw nea ghabwatgeat Farisayajeega ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
40022042	“Iing'ullayi Gristo ea ng'eaha? Heappi ghoanung' ghoaw balleandeabeang'a?” Ak gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Balleanda Dawdihi.”
40022043	Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Abeada ghwasaan iiduw inyas gwayeeshsha Dawdi aba Gurorooda, Ng'uttamiida, nea gwayi,
40022044	‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiideanyu, apteada aba meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa, bwak ea dayiin weajoadigaagu jeeda baneaguukka geashangaagu?’
40022045	Abeeda Dawdi iiguura Ng'uttamiida, abeeda ghoammu ghoawdaan ballaandaannyi?”
40022046	Aba hiji ghwaroat siida jea gwarukusa ng'asheanda. Ghang'eada eaweettida ghwaroat sichchea ghoanyaash gichcha ng'asheanda.
40023001	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu emeettuw ea giinealangaschi,
40023002	“Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega goobiitpiida hoorgeeda Muusa;
40023003	asi ng'asheega jea gwarukuneegwa sean oang'ng'waanya nea goosinnyi ak ea adoogali sinaweega nyaawa ea adoosinnyi aba gideaba saawa gwarukkwiida nea masinna.
40023004	Saawa iissa ghwarat sareennyeekka durmani ak ghoasari buuneeda ghwaada hamarjoojiga, nea magassa eara gideaba gayghwasat eara aba monneeda.
40023005	Gichcha sinaweega nyaawa sean inyeessa gwasin ghwadaah buuneeda aba gideaba iissa gooheettu barawajeegeagwa bea mooshta ghawooda, nea googeawiidi seapseapta nyaawa.
40023006	Fuga bwariiy goobitpiida hoorgajeegeaba mwadi eaweetta ghwelmeeda, nea ghabwaariiy goobiida mwadi aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa.
40023007	Iissa ghabwariiy gideaba gajeeyeenniisa seayu aba naadajeega nea gaguura buuneeda Rabi.
40023008	Ak agooga ea adagaguureeweegwa siih Rabi, aba gideaba Ginealshoochcheandeang'wa aa akkalealla amaduw agooga goobeayi ghaamwadagi.
40023009	Nea adooguuri siida, Bwaabwa aba ng'eanyiida aba gideaba, Ghweandeang'wa aa akkalealla nea gwanda humng'eeda.
40023010	Biissa gichcha ea adeeguureeweegwa fuga hees, aba gideaba, siida haw aakkalealla, nea Gristo gil.
40023011	Siida haw aba jeedeang'wa gayghoaw soomjeandeang'wa.
40023012	Siida adiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u, nea deahiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”
40023013	“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba ghoakghuumi buuneeda gidaghuutta sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda, nea mooweayeeni jeeda, nea fuga jea gaweay ea moosiksiini gaweay jeeda. [
40023014	Ashageada agoogeeda was ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba goyeagiisachcheewi gealga masinung'weega, amaduw aba gimminnoadeaba geat iissa ghoamwaashchi ghawooda nea gokkeawiichchi; asi gajanyasa ghorjooda haw muuchchi.]
40023015	Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba gooneayeewi jeesinga baskweega ea ng'eanyiida bwadaw nea googasayi siyagi jea ghwalalaan, amaduw nea niiw, ghoanung' ghwoaw jeepta maloonghajeega niba iyyeenya ea ghwanawaneagwa agooga.
40023016	Eamuy deang'wa ashoohoodiga ng'oawwi! ‘Agooga iissa gooyeennyi siida iyaksa habeawooda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea miigili; ama aksa habeawooda lagheanga meang'meang'i mida jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta abeeda ea nirat geaw aba habeawooni.’
40023017	Ea fuga ng'oawwi bissea leekghteega! Aghaloamwaat anneeda lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ghana gheetta sibatta Aseettean nung' ghoaw lagheanga meeng'meeng'i haleanjeeda ghaydidiin?
40023018	Nea gooyeenyi, ‘Siida jea gweaksa habeawooda heeda wagiida ea miigili; ama aksa habeawooda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda mida heeda wagiida, ea nirat geaw aba habeawoani.’
40023019	Ea fuga ng'oowwi! Aghaloamwaat muuchchi anneeda, haleanjeetta sisabwa geadi bea ghadooweedean ghana heeda wagiida, nung' ghoaw haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi bea ghadoweeda haleanjeeda ghaydit?
40023020	Siida aksa habeawooda heeda wagiida, gweaksa habeawooda eara haleanjeetta sean mida uhudean;
40023021	nea siida aksa habeawooda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gweaksa habeawooda niih ea siida abiitta jeeda;
40023022	nea siida aksa humng'eeda habeawooda, gweaksa horgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta habeawooda, ak ghabwada eara siida apteadayyeewa uhuudaannyi.
40023023	“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega, ammiittu geat! Iissa ghoanung' ghoadayda buuneeda gilagi aba jeeda damanamughuush aba mwayoah ea ruruukta ea hamuumayga ea seenga ng'andit, nea ghoappuuchchi ng'asheega durmani bea deaweeda was humeanda ea innyeanda jeeda ea baydeayda ea masaweega. Suuh ng'asheega ghwanyawa haguuw gideaba gajasna gil, nea mwoanung'waadani ng'asheega suurja.
40023024	Ea ashoohoodiga ng'oowwi, ammu ghamuush doonyooda ak ghwanukghutta ngamiya!
40023025	“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba iissa goohuunnyi badayda bayookta ea dea gweeriida, nea jeeda ghwannyiit haleanjeeda orreedayi buuneeda ea shidoodeaba ghaang'.
40023026	Ea Farisayajeanda ng'oaw! Nyoo ghannyi asheeda ahuuna jeeda bayookta ak abeeda gayghammiidu eara badayda.
40023027	“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Goowurjeewi bung'eadinga siyeasha badahuukka roonghooda, amaduw nea geeng'ulluna bwadaw ea miyaas, nea aba jiih ghwannyiit geakka fuga nimeewa ea ririnnyeanda sean.
40023028	Gwasunu eara agooga ing'ulluunaneegwa buuneeda bwadaw goowoschi fuga doobiiweadi, nea aba jiih ghwannyiit munyinnda ea ging'uuchcheeda.”
40023029	“Eamuy deang'wa ng'oorshoodiga, ea Farisayajeega ammiittu geat! Aba gideaba iissa ghoadeaschi bung'eadinga sibanga, ak iissa ghoattamdaamnyi bung'eadinga fuga miyaas,
40023030	nea gooyeennyi, ‘Inyeeda ghwanyawa geendi damandida bea gheamba ghwaanigaasa bea garayiin, gwachchi ea majeahhiida foojeanda sibaneeda.’
40023031	Aba sareani goomuuwu gideaba goowoschi balloojiga fuga ghayi nuus sibanga.
40023032	Asi oannyiida gitta ghayi adeenniida ghweanigeagwean.
40023033	Ea ichchipkeega ea dayeega udang'usheega, gajoammustaan amulsiina girgweageeda jea ghwadeagwa heeda maloonghajeega?
40023034	Ak gaydeajeagu sibanga ea weaghoodiga ea ng'oorshoodiga, mwaatkwa gajanuuseada nea goongoorsi iheenga beehajeega, nea suurja gajabwara aba jeesinga ghoorajeegeagwa siinnealshachcheewa nea ghoahoannyi aba gilinyooh ea mujiini,
40023035	ak abeeda gayghwahidu badahuukkeagwa foojeanda sean bea fuga doobiiweadi weayeesa badayda ng'eanyiida, ghang'eada fojeanda ghayi sihida bea Habeeli ghayi doabiiwaat, ea gagul fojeanda Sakkariya was balleanda Barakkiya ghayi onuukusi jeeda gheeda sibattiisa Aseetta dageascheeda heeda Ghaydit ea dea heeda wagiida.
40023036	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa ng'asheesu seaniin gayghwahidu badaydeaba seaygeani.”
40023037	“Ea Yerusaleemu, Yerusaleemooda, inuusay sibanga nea gifutti lagheanga fuga sichcheakseey! Neagasayi dabwada geat diibigaagu niba hada, gawuurji gidahinniida nghaghooda dayeagaaschi aba jeeda meang'eegaaschi ak ghoaheawi!
40023038	Asi ang'ulla ghaheang'wa sinung'usa heeda ghoaw eemeeda.
40023039	Asi geayeeshshineegwa, majagudoobiikta adahaan gichcha ea eaghus eeyi bwak ea ayeena, ‘Sittaw ghawooda siida wunna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida.'"
40024001	Gwaritteawa Yeesu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ghang'eat gawa, ak gaweay heeda giinealangaaschi ak geehiimsa gissideasta gheetta sibatta Aseettean.
40024002	Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Moong'ulli haleanjeeni seaniin? Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda eara lagheaneanagi jea ghoabit aba uhuudeaba niirja jea ea majeeng'ng'adeadu.”
40024003	Iiduw nea goopteada Yeesu aba uhuuda gijeeda Maseytuunajeega, gaweesa giinealangaaschi aba heeda funyaat ak geanyasa hichpa geaw ak geannyaash gideaba, “Rukuni ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju? Amaduw hinnoadaang'u gwanda gwadeagooda jea eadaaha ghana dea mudeanooda damanda?”
40024004	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla adiiduw gwareenganneegwa siih.
40024005	Aba gideaba gayghwahidu fuga saang'a nea gaygaba niih ayi, ‘Aniini geewoschi Gristo,’ ak gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
40024006	Gajayiinya iitta ng'uchcheeda ea dea ng'uchcheadinga, ang'ulla adaghoabealeagwa, aba gideaba ng'asheesu mayghwashiy hinnooda, amaduukku mudeanooda ea mighoaw.
40024007	Aba gideaba gaygang'uchchi daroar ea daroar nuut, ak gang'uchchi sugoochcheandumeeda ea sugoocheendumeeda nuut, ak gaygwanda geejeeda ea sawooda ng'eanyiida aba hiji ea hiji:
40024008	suuh seaniin ghang'eat ghuutta lajooda.
40024009	Iimuchchu gheeda gajealabeagwa bwadaw eesawaneegwa amaduw geenuuseegwa; gayghwasteagwa emoojiga sean appadaydeanyu aba gheawungeasu.
40024010	Ak abeeda fuga saang'a gajeeruusa nea goohheakkiida geat nea gwasta geat.
40024011	Amaduw gayghwahidu sibanga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega ak gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
40024012	Iiduw nea ghoahaada deambiilaneandumeeda buuneeda, hean gaygabiissa ghamwaning'idaada bariinyeega aba jeesinga nyaawa.
40024013	Abeeda siida jea ghamilikghta ea gammudean ada ea siida jea ghwalalaani.
40024014	Gichcha gajeerukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda aba ng'eanyissean ghoaw muwwunooda aba emoojiga sean, ama ng'atta abeeda ghwahidu mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
40024015	“Asi iyoadaayi gidamuy jea gweadu nyariida, ghayi rugu sibaneeda suguura Daniyeeli nea niminaada aba heeda ghaydit (dea assoamwa adanala),
40024016	abeeda fuga mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya dasalsiina giijeega;
40024017	nea siida mida badayda bulaliida ea adaghwararang'aan gageanu haleanjeeda mida jeedeaba gheannyi;
40024018	nea deamida madamnyeanda ea adagabiigu bwadaw ghamwagha hang'daannyi.
40024019	Eamuy dea gheamadiga mideawa diibiga ea gea areer diibiga aba damani!
40024020	Amwaasha Aseetta eamoosaldani eaweetta gooroogeeda ghanea eaweetta Sabattoohi
40024021	Aba gideaba damani gaygwanda sawanadeeda haw manda deadeenna aba deaghayi sisna ng'eanyiida ea ghoaw ghamneawa, ak ea maygudu abiikta adaah sawanadeeda uurji niih earahay.
40024022	Nea ghwanyawa askwearjoojusu dagheeda ea meannuwaasa ghwanyawa ea maygwanda sichchea ghwalalaan; iiduw geelagu askwearjoojusu appadahuukka fukghayi sibay ealoat.
40024023	Asi eaweechcheanji iyeeshshineegwa siih, ‘Gristo gwanda hiji!’ ghana ‘Gwanda hoowa!’ Adoamwaschi.
40024024	Aba gideaba gayghwahidu Gristohajeega ng'uyyeega ea sibanga ng'uyyeega. Ak gayghoahiimu gwadeagwajeega hees deamdeameadi jea ghoammu gahutteawi fuga ghayi bay ealoat.
40024025	Ang'ulla nigeawiit dareekuseegwa ammwadi.
40024026	Asi iyeeshshineegwa, ‘Adaaha diida gwanda dareapcheada, ea adiiduw gooritti;’ ghana iisiyi, ‘Gwanda jeeda gheeda,’ ea adoamwaschi.
40024027	Aba gideaba gawuurji dadamandeetta abwaay heeda ghayeawa ea gagul heeda biyearean niih abeeda gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida.
40024028	Heeda wassean mida gumeeda heeda jea gabattiisa geat madoonyakka.”
40024029	“Iimuchchu nea ning'atta sawanadeedida bea askwearjoojigigeaniin, gajeenung' gamisaniit gheang'da aseetta, nea sheeda ea maygooboong'u, nea miinga mida humng'eeda gaygoobittu, nea uurda humng'eeda gajeettumduum;
40024030	ng'atta gajeadaah gwadeagooda Balleanda Siida aba humng'eeda, abeeda emoojiga sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida gayguuttu heareega idaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaan aba badayda shamooghuutka humng'eeda nea gwandeawa uurda ea gigheambiitta haw;
40024031	ak gaygoojeakta malaykajeegaaschi ghaghuut muuchchi durumbeatti ak gaygaweay gooweamu fugaaschi loat aba murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, ghang'eada murdeeda humng'eeda meatkweeni ea gagul meatkweetta.
40024032	“Ajeeng'ni ng'asheesu eagali shaboogheechcheandean: ifirfiir damealgaschi ak gwardu seenga, goojeeng'u gideaba damanda domeelda ninekkiit.
40024033	Gwasnu eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu seaniin nean ghwahidu ghoanalli gideaba ninekkiissa gidaghuut.
40024034	Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba mayghwanawda seaygeani nea miighwahidu suuh seaniin.
40024035	Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gayghang'atta, amaduukku ng'asheegeasu ea mayghang'atta eara hay.”
40024036	“Dukku iitta askwearjeandida ghana damandida manda siida nal eaweetta jea gawaseewa eara malaykajeega humng'eeda ghana Balleanda geaghus Bwaabwa nea gaba geaw.
40024037	Aba gideaba gaygawuurji gidaghayi bea damanda Nuuhu, niih gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida gil.
40024038	Aba gideaba damandida ghayi miighwahinna roopta hawiin abeeda buuneeda iissa gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, gageeshi nea geaghi, ea eayi bwak ea gawa Nuuhu jeeda maleambooda,
40024039	nea majeeng'na ea ghwahidu roopta duw ak gwaduulu buuneessean, niih abeeda gichchea gawuurji hinnooda Balleanda Siida gil.
40024040	Damandida gaygwanda fiih iyyeenya madamnyeanda gajeegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.
40024041	Gadeem iyyeenya gajeahitta nea gang'ealshi, ak gajeegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.
40024042	Asi oang'ng'wearni aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamideang'wa.
40024043	Asi anala ng'asheanji gideaba inyeeda ghwanyawa ghwanal siida bea gheeda damanda eaweeda jea ghwahinna mareanghweanda, gayghoang'wearu nea ghanyea mayghwanung'waada enyarja gheannyi.
40024044	Gwasnu eara agooga asissina geat, aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghwahidu damanda morarsiini.”
40024045	Niih gajea anasihi was soomjeanda doabiiwaat mideawa weaghumeeda, iin siidaannyi haw uhuudeaba gheannyi ak ghoadaw buuneeda daghwarda aba damandaannyi?
40024046	Ghang'wana soomjeandida ama hidu Siidaannyi hawiin ghwahitta nea gwasinda ng'asheega gidaghayi surukusiindean.
40024047	Aba huumwa, gaydayeeshshineegwa, gaygageanu ak ghwayiin haghweeda halanjeadannyi sean.
40024048	Amadukku soomjeandida muyiin iyeeshsha geaw aba jeadaannyi nishing'da Siideanyu hawiin,
40024049	amahit gabiissa ghabwar soomjooga ama ng'atta gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi sea leeydean,
40024050	gayghwahidu Siidaannyi haw bea soomjeandideani eaweetta mararsiina ea damanda mwanala.
40024051	Ak gayghwaaga ghorjooda, ak ghwanung' gwandeayi sea fuga ammittu geat; abeeda gaygwanda shookka ea giwiirrooda geeshatka.
40025001	“Abeeda sugoochcheandumeeda humng'eeda gaygawuurji sea haw damanamughuush geanu gheaboonyaanga nyaawa akkaweay ghwadeapta siida geeshi.
40025002	Aba jeannyaawa ea dasheahi haw muut nea suurja gea ammuut ea weaghoodi.
40025003	Haweekka ammuut dasheahiin ghwaat gheaboonyanga nyaawa nea mwayiina jeesinga nagheeda;
40025004	duukku haweekka mideawa weaghumeedean gageanu nagheeda ak ghwayiin jeeda haleanjeeda sea gheaboonyanga nyaawa.
40025005	Iiduw nea ghwashing'da siida geeshshi geeyi bwak ea ghang'utta ghaat ak gwalil.
40025006	Bugusta eaweeda agweena ghwanya sideechcheekka nea gwayi, ‘Asaghayneawa, nihidu siida geeshi! Aweayeena deepteayda.’
40025007	Ghang'eat ng'eat haweegiga seaniin aba geeshangiga ak gwasissin gheaboonyanga nyaawa.
40025008	Gwayeeshsha haweegiga dasheahiin gea weaghoodi; ‘Agoaneasa nagheedeang'wa suung'ay aba gideaba gheaboonyangaasa iissa gamis.’
40025009	Gwayeeshsha giikka mideawa weaghumeedean, ‘Manda mayghoahideasa aseasa ea agooga! Ghang'wana ghoang'ng'waanyi naweeda ak gooweesi fuga sheahida nagheeda ak ghoashaayi.’
40025010	Ng'eat ng'eat haweekka dasheahiin gaweay ghwasha nagheeda, goobeeru siida geeshshi ak goodeayi jeeda gheeda haweekka hidaat bay ea niding'ding'dean ak gaweay jeeda gheeda nyeangiida amang'atta gearat gidaghuut.
40025011	Iiduw ghwahidu eara haweaga suurja ak gaguurriida aba gidaghuut nea gwayeenniissa, ‘Ea Ng'uttamiida, ea Ng'uttamiida, eaniyean jassseasa.’
40025012	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha; ‘Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, agooga mwanaleagwa.’
40025013	Hean gwayeeshsha, asi oang'ng'wearni, aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea gawaseewa ghana damanda.”
40025014	Damandida gaygawuurji sea siida gasa gawa bareannyeekka, gaguursa soomjoogaaschi ak goodeaga haleanjeedaannyi;
40025015	gageanu ak gaba siisi adaw haleanjeeda heeda ammu ghoadaw siyagi lappiyeeda suguura dalanta muut, ak ghoadaw niirja iyyeenya, ak ghoadaw niirja agi, amahit ghang'eat gawa bareannyeekka.
40025016	Gageanu siitta heetta siittaw dalantaji muudiin amang'atta googeakshi ak gabiikta gwayi dalantaji muut gichcha.
40025017	Eara siida heetta sittaw dalantaji iyyeenya googeaksheatta ak gabiikta ghwanyas dalantaji iyyeenya suuk.
40025018	Dukku siidida siittaw agiin gawa amahitta ghaghurghur shoomanda ak ghafuy lappiyeeda siida bea gadiyeeda.
40025019	“Muchchu nea nigeawiit rudeaydaannyi gabiigu siidida haw bea soomjoogigeani amahidu gwayiida haleanjeedaannyi.
40025020	Ghwaan siitta ghayi siittaw dalantaji muudiin nea gweadu dalantaji muut suuk amahidu gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, ang'wearda ghayi gugoonnyean dalantaji muut ak ghamneawa ea naahaachchi suuk dalaantaji muut.’
40025021	Gwayeeshsha siitta hawiin, Ghwadoabiiw soomjeanda miy doabiiwaat; nuwosi doabiwaat aba haleanjeeda ng'ayi, gajambala gasaang'a, benni apteada nea gihoosani sea siida haw.
40025022	Ghwahidu eara siitta ghayi siittaw dalantaji iyyeenyean nea gweadu dalantaji iyyeenya ahaada ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, ghayi gugoonnyean dalantaji iyyeenya; sukwa nanyaschi suuk iyyeenya gea niihaada.’
40025023	Gwayeeshsha siidaannyi haw; ‘Ghwahit soomjeandeanyu miy doabiwaat; nuwosi doabiwaat aba haleanjeeda ng'ayi, gajambala gaasaang'a beenni apteada nea gihoosani sea siidaang'u haw.'"
40025024	“Ghwahidu siitta ghayi siittaw dalanteenagiin ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida haw, aniini ghanalli gideaba guwosi siida hang'waay, iissa gilaji heeda mihisani, ak giimughuushi aba heeda mileelsiini;
40025025	ghabealli ak geawi dafuy dalanteadaang'u aba jeessigeeda. Asi ang'ng'waanya gea was gaagu.’
40025026	Ghwasha siidaannyi haw nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi soomjeanda muy bea ghaleehooda! Ginali gideaba iissa ghaalaji heeda ghayi meahisani ak ghamughuushchi aba heeda ghayi mealeelsiini?
40025027	Abeeda mammiiseeyi eaditta lappiyedeanyu heeda fuga jea goodiing'u nea abeeda ghwanyawa gaydanyas lappiyedeanyu ea gea jea ghoahaada.
40025028	Asi oarreada siisi dalanteani ak ghoattawji siitta mideawa dalantaji damanamughuushiin.
40025029	Aba gideaba siida nyooh googar gil gajeeheassa ea ghwanawda; amaduukku siitta meagara giliin, eara gitta mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.
40025030	Duukku soomjeanji marachchi giliin, ajaksiina jarooda jeeda misaneeda; hoowa gaygwanda shookka ea giiwiirrooda geeshatka.'"
40025031	“Damanda jea ghwahinna Balleanda Siida aba jeeda gigheambiittaannyi, nea goodeana malaykajeega, hean gaygoopteada aba uhuuda hoorgda giigheambiittaannyi.
40025032	Gaygabassa geat emoojiga sean mwadeadaannyi ak gaygooheeldooscheatta gideajusu aheeldooscheatta jeagiischoochcheanda gisilga ea nooga,
40025033	akkayghwayiin gisilga meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwa akghwayiin nooga meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda ghadaam.
40025034	“Ng'atta gaygwayeeshsha sugoochcheanda fukka mida meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwean, ‘Abeenni agoogeeda ghayi nugooneegwa Bwaabwa ghawooda ahearana sugoochcheandumeeda ghayi sibay erarseegwa ghang'eada dea ghayi subwada ng'eanyiida;
40025035	aba gideaba geabearjeewi jalooda ak googoonnyean gichchadaak, geabearjeewi muwooshta ak googoonnyean beega jea dali, geabissi dawos rabascheanda ak goollullean,
40025036	geabissi dawos dawiish ak gookkweallean, ghamnyaannyi ak ghoapkannyi ollong'sean, geandi ghealooniga ak ghoapkannyi allong'sean.’
40025037	Aba damani gaygwayeeshsha fukka doobiiweadiin, ‘Ng'uttamiida, niih gajea andamwani sidayeay nea gibearjeewi jalooda ak geegoonnyeey gichchaaga, ghana bearjeewana muwooshta ak geegoonnyeey beega jaaleaha?
40025038	Ak niih gajea aneaweechcha gil jea ea sidaayeay nea guwosi rabascheanda ak geadeaptaanyeey, ghana woosa dawiish ak geakwealleey?
40025039	Niih gajea anndamwan gil jea ea sidahaneay nea gimnyaani, ghana midana ghealooniga ak geapkaannyi ellong'seey?’
40025040	Ghwasha Sugoochcheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Aba huumwa gaydayeeshineegwa, gili wassean noosissi siyagi aba jeedeaba orjoosu bea giyeanya manang'iin goosinnean aniini.’
40025041	“Iiduw gaygwayeeshsha fukka mida meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda ghadaamiin, ‘Oang'amwana madeedeanyu, fukghayi sumwaashta, aweayeena jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda ghayi sibay eerarsa Meang'nyeandeenda ea malaykajeegaaschi;
40025042	aba gideaba geabearjeewi jalooda ak ea moogoonean gichchadaak, geabearjeewi muwooshta ak ea moogoonean beega jaadali,
40025043	geewoschi rabascheanda ak ea moollulean, geewoschi dawish ak ea mookweallean, ghaamnyaannyi nea geandi ghealooniga ak ea moapkaani oolloong'sean.’
40025044	Abeeda gayghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, niih gajea aneaweechcha gil sidaahaneey nea gibearjeewi jalooda, ghana muwooshta ghana wosa rabascheanda ghana wosa dawiish, ghana miyaana ghana midana ghealooniga, ak ameaweadeay?’
40025045	Ak gaygwayeeshsha niny, gaydayeeshshineegwa, ‘Aba huumwa, ghayi iissa iyoaheawi asissiina ng'asheesu siyagi aba jeedeaba orjoosu manang'iin, abeeda ghoaheawi asinnean aniini.’
40025046	Abeeda fiisu gaygaweay jeeda ghoorjooda manda mudeanooda, nea fukka doobiiweadiin gaygaweay jeeda eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
40026001	Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu ng'asheesu seaniin gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi,
40026002	“Mwoanali gideaba ing'atta eawooji iyyeenya abeeda gajea ghweelmeeda basakka gil, ak gajeattayda Balleanda Siida engoor.”
40026003	Aba damandida gabassa geat Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa seammooda gheeh Gayaafa nea ashoohoochcheanda haw gil.
40026004	Gabaloola gichchea ghoang'ng'wayda Yeesu aba seachta ak geenuus.
40026005	Iiduw gwaneaji gideaba “Adeesinnyi ng'asheanji eaweetta ghweelmeeda aba gideaba gajiiduw ghwadaakghuyan emeeda.”
40026006	Damanda mideewa Yeesu gheeh Simoneeda suguura siida bearji udamusuura,
40026007	ghwahidu headaannyi gatmooni eattu gideeshteayda nyiit nagheeda ng'andit guuyi sakghwiloah bissa gaba sheaydeeda haw, ghwahidu nea goobiitpiit gheatta agiischooda, ak goodalealsa uhuuda nagheetta ng'andidiin.
40026008	Daah Giinealanga ng'asheanji gwanyareesi, nea gwayi, “Darariini gaba naaha?
40026009	Nagheani gwachchi isishayda gayghwanyas lappiyeeda saang'a jea eattaw fuga barbari.”
40026010	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan andagootteawiichchi gatmooda? Niny gwasinnean ng'asheanda miy.
40026011	Aba gideaba fuga barbari goondeaydooscheewi galeegasean, amaduukku aniini ea majeendeayeena galeegasean.
40026012	Gatmooni goodalealsean nagheeda ng'andit aba gideaba gwasissinan aba bunyitteanyu.
40026013	Aba huumwa geayeeshshiineegwa, heeda wassean aba muunda ng'eanyiida surukwiideaysa Giijasi Miyiin, gili sin gatmooniin, gajeebaloolla aba giipkeattannyi.”
40026014	Muchchu gawa nisiih Yudaayda Iskariyotte nea gaba jeedeaba giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean heeda ashoohoodiga hees.
40026015	Hitta gwayeeshsha, “Gajagoonean naaha iyalaapchi bwadaw niny ak geagoonnyeegwa?” Geeyittisa geattinga shilingaji diktam ea damanamughuush.
40026016	Ghang'eada damandida gagaseadayyi gheatta gichchea ghwalaapta bwadaw.
40026017	Eaweetta madeada nea miighwahidu ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega miigamattawiidi, gaweay Giinealanga heeda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi esinney hamitta basakka aba yeenu?”
40026018	Gwayeeshsha Niny, “Aweayeena mujiini gheappa siih ak gooyeeshshi, ‘Gwayi Ginealshoochcheanda, nigul damandeanyu ak geagasayi daak hamitta basakka sea giinealangeasu aba jeedeaba gheang'u.'"
40026019	Gwasinda Giinealanga ng'asheega gidarukusiinda Yeesu ak ghoang'eat sinooda Basakka.
40026020	Huuw shing'ada goopteada Yeesu sea giinealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya nea gweagiischi.
40026021	Damani agiischeewean, gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siyagi aba jeedeang'wa gayghwalaabwan bwadaw.”
40026022	Gagiisan giinealanga muuchchi, ak gaba siisi anyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida aniini Ng'uttamiida?”
40026023	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida jea dang'utta buurda sea niny niih siida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw gil.
40026024	Balleanda siida gaygawa, gawuurji gidaghayi sing'oorsiinda, amaduw eadashageada siidida jea ghwala bwadaw Balleanda Siidean! Siisi ghang'wana gwachchi ea meeji.”
40026025	Gwayeeshsha Yuudayda jea ghwala bwadaw, “Rabi, aniini ghanea?” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
40026026	Damanda agiischooda gageanu Yeesu mukkatte ak gang'ushsha, ak ghabwanach, ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha “Oang'ng'waanya ak ghooyaaji, niih sasedeanyu gil.”
40026027	Ng'atta gageanu bayookta, ak gabadiischeesa, ak ghoadaw nea gwayeeshsha, “Aleayda bayoogi oagasean.
40026028	Aba gideaba suuh foojeandeanyu bea neajeeda gil, ak geahiida appadahuukka fuga saang'a aba geandeayda ring'eeda.
40026029	Gaydayeeshshineegwa maygudu dabiikta dali gichcha difaayeeda sabiibu ea eaghus dabiikta dali gichcha gea eashish sea agooga aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Bwaabwa.”
40026030	Iing'atta sarmeeda duumda, ghang'eatng'eat gaweay uhuuda gijeeda masaytunajeega.
40026031	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aweani bea ghamneawean gajastaan oagasean aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Gaydabwar jeagiischoochcheanda, ak gayghwadarda hawanda gisilga.’
40026032	Iimuchchu nea ghang'atta dunnoodeanyu gaydeasheedeawaneegwa dawa Galilaaya.”
40026033	Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Eara ghamwachmwachnyi buuneeda ak gwanung'useey heeda, aniini maydanung'useey heeda eara hay.”
40026034	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey aweani bea ghamneawean heeda miih googuuleewa nnghaghooda, gajeenishaang'nyaan niba samwagu.”
40026035	Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Eara ghoaw miyeeda emewdeayeena maydashaang'nyi eara hay.” Ghwanyaashtunu giinealanga sean.
40026036	Iiduw goodeayi Yeesu ea saawa jeeda madamnyeanda mwanang' suguura Getsemaani, ama ng'atta gwayeeshsha giinealangaaschi, “Oppitpiida aba hiji dawa hoowa damwaash Aseetta.”
40026037	Ghwaat Betro sea oorju iyyeenya bea Sebedaayo, ak ghang'ut giseaneega ea gwadeawiit.
40026038	Miighoaw gil gwayeeshsha, “Guroroodeanyu eagisaneat muuchchi ea ghwariikghta dami, ooppitpiida aba hiji nea ghoang'ng'wearu sea aniini.
40026039	Hean gawa mwadi gilimwanang' ak gwatkuy ak gakkula gheamamdaannyi ng'eanyi ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea, gwayi Ea Bwaabwa, iimmuusi ginung' ghwasajaadawanaan bayoogi, ea adaghoaw gideagassiidi aniini, nung' ghoaw gidigassiidi ang'iing'i.”
40026040	Ghang'eat gawa heeda giinealanga ak ghwahitta nea nilil. Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Heappi mimmuusi gideaba gajang'wearni eara jeemba aseedeanagi eesa aniini?
40026041	Oang'ng'wearni nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta ea mwoappittani jeeda simsimda; gurorooda ghwanyawa gagasa, amaduw ang'arng'ar saseeda.
40026042	Gabiikta deabiyyeenya ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayi, ea Bwaabwa, iimay ghwasajaadawanaan bayoogi ea eeghus daleayda nung'waanda gwasa gidigassiidi ang'iing'i.”
40026043	Gabiikta gichcha heeda giinealanga ak ghwahitta nea nilil aba gideaba nudurmaniidi gheanyanga nyaawa aba ruweanga.
40026044	Gabiikta gwanung'usa heeda ak gawa ghamwaash Aseetta deaba samwagu nea gwargu ng'asheega gwachchi.
40026045	Ng'atta gabiigu heeda giinealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Abissiina alla nea goofuufchi? Adaaha nihidu damanda ak Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga riing'eega.
40026046	Ang'eatng'eada, eweaya; oang'ng'wearda siida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw nukkwa nineekkiit.”
40026047	Damanda duugwandeawa hoowa nea gabalool ghwahidu Yuuda nea gaba jeedeaba giinealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, nea goodeannyi sea emeeda mideawa bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka nea goojeagu ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa.
40026048	Iiduw siitta jea ghwala bwadaw Yeesuun abeeda ea nigeawiit ghoadaw gwadeagooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Siitta jea dasamiin ajeeng'ni gideaba niny gil, abeeda ghoang'ng'waanyi.”
40026049	Hean gwanekkiissa Yuuda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayu Siida haw!” Amwahit ghwasam.
40026050	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ea siideaduupcheewi, ghwasaan anda gindi hiji?” Ng'atta ghwahidu Fugiga ak ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu.
40026051	Gageanu Oorjeanagi aba jeedeaba oorjookka gwachchi mideawa Yeesuun, ak ghoahakta geadi ak gafagu bwaangeadaannyi, ak ghwalas soomjeandida bea ashoohoochcheanda hawiin, ak ghwalach iitta.
40026052	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Adealda bwaangeadang'u jeeda labaldaannyi, aba gideaba siida bwarda bwaanga, eara niny gajeabwara bwaanga.
40026053	Moanali gideaba gwachchi ghammuuschi damus Bwaabwa ammii ghoaw gil gaygoojeagu lugooda saang'a bea malaykajeega?
40026054	Abeeda gaygwasamwattaan Ng'ooruutka ayi niih gidamiisa ghoawda baloolda gil?”
40026055	Damandida gwayeeshsha Yeesu emeeda, “Assagooga ghoapkaannyi oang'ng'wanyaan nea gooyeadu bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka ghoanung' dawuurji mareanghweanda? Eawoojusu geabiitti gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea geanealshi ak ea moong'ng'oonnyean!
40026056	Ghamneawa eanisa ng'asheesu seaniin gwasa Ng'ooruutka ghayi bea sibaneeda.” Iiduw gwanung'usa heeda giinealanga ak gwasalda.
40026057	Hean gageanu Fukwachchi ang'ng'waay Yeesu ak ghwaat gheeh Gayafeeda was ashoohoochcheanda haw, nea nibattiisa geat ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa.
40026058	Ghwaat geeshta Betro nea gameaji ea sheagi ea ghwahitta seammooda gheeda ashoohoochcheanda haw, gaweay jeeda gheeda nea goodeayi furiischoodiga nea gagasa ghwadaah gichchea eesin.
40026059	Hean gagasa Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa sean bea gheeda girgweageeda ng'asheanda ng'uyyeega jea emuuwwu appadayda Yeesu jea iiduw eenuuksa,
40026060	iiduw ea mudughwanyas ng'asheanda jea ennoas earappeadi buwa mushoodiga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega. Hean iiduw aba huydeanda ghwahidu fiih iyyeenya
40026061	ak gwayeeshsha, “Siisi ghayi gwayi, ghammuuschi danyarja gheawi Sibatta Aseettean ak geabiikti dadeas gichcha aba askwearjooji samwagu.”
40026062	Ghang'eat Ashoohoochcheanda haw ak ghoanyaash, “Heappi mwayshaaha eara ng'ashaani? Fiisu gamuuwu naaha appadaydaang'u?”
40026063	Ghwasiinda Yeesu. Gwayeeshsha Ashoohoochcheanda haw, “Eaniyean aksiina Aseetta majeek habeawooda rukuneasa ang'iing'i ea guwosi Gristo, Balleanda Aseetta.”
40026064	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Girgu ang'iing'i. Asi gaydayeeshshineegwa, ghang'eada ghamneawa gajadaaha Balleanda Siida nea goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa hoauur, nea ghwaana badayda shamooghuutka humng'eeda.”
40026065	Aba damani ghabwashaada ashoohoochcheanda haw hang'weakkaschi ak gwayi, “Ning'eawi Aseetta. Gudeegassa mushooduspwa naaha gichcha? Asi ghamneawa nukkwa siyiinyi ging'wakkaaschi.
40026066	Gooyeennyiin agooga aba girgweageedeang'wa?” Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gammiisa gideaba gajeenuus.”
40026067	Hean geeng'ng'uriisa ng'usheega gheamamdaannyi, nea geabwar digeanga; nea suurja gagul,
40026068	nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Gristo! heappi daaha aajaanala siida lasnyi?”
40026069	Aba damandida Betro goopteada aba seammooda. Hean gaweesa hudagi bea gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gindeaydooscheewi Yeesuyda Galilaaya.”
40026070	Ghwashaang' Betro aba madeeda buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini mwanali eara gidurgu”
40026071	Iiduw nea gwaritteawa gidaghuut gabiikta ghwadaah hut nuut bea gadiyeeda ak gwayeeshsha, fuga ghwanyawa mida hoowa, “Siisi gwachchi gwandeayi sea Yeesuuyda Nasareti.”
40026072	Gabiikta ghwashaang' Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi mwanali”
40026073	Ng'atta gheadi nuwaas gaweay Fukwachchi mida hoowa heeda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa earang'iing'i guwosi siyagi aba jeedeaba fukka aba gideaba ghoahiimu baloaldaang'u.”
40026074	Damani ghamwaashta geaw Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi mwaanali.” Deagheatta googuul nnghaghooda.
40026075	Hean ghoapkaat Betro ng'asheega heetta rukusa Yeesu, bea gideaba, “Damanda migooguula nghaghooda gajeenishaang'nyaan niba samwagu.” Gwaritta jarooda ak gooyyeawda.
40027001	Imuchchu nea ghaghar gayeew gagasa Ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa gichchea gwanuusta Yeesu.
40027002	Geerada aba biingu ak geayaat heeda Bilatto nea siida ambal ng'eanyiitta gil.
40027003	Iiduw nea ghwadaah Yudaayda heetta laah bwadaw Yeesu gideaba sirgweaksa, ghang'ut giseaneega ak googuumsa ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa shilingajeekka attiktam ea damanamughuushiin.
40027004	Gwayeeshsha, “Neadiinyi aba gideaba ghadaydi siida manda gidinyeanda ennus.” Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Neada ghwadaseasaani aseasa? Ng'asheanji gabeachcheeweey ang'iing'i.”
40027005	Hean gwahisa niny shilingajeekka jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghang'eat gawa amwahitta ghwaratta geaw.
40027006	Gageanda ashoohoodiga hees shilingajeekka nea gwayi, “Mammisiina gideaba gajeayiina jeeda gheaseeda aba gideaba suuh lappiyeeda foojeanda gil.”
40027007	Gwaneaji ak ghwashaaha lappiyeetta madamnyeamba siisi sineadayyi dahuundiga ak ghoaw heeda jea ebunnyiisa rabasta.
40027008	Ghoaw gida duueguureewa madamnyeandida madamnyeanda foojeanda ea ghwoaw ghamneawa.
40027009	Ak gwasa ng'asheega ghayi rukuta sibaneeda suguura Yeremiya gideaba, “Gageanda lappiyaji diktaam ea damanamughuush moonneeda ghayi bea siida mwas fuga Israeeli gideaba gayghoadayda,
40027010	ak ghwashaaha madamnyeanda siida sina dahuundiga gawuurji gidaghayi eshshindanean Ng'uttamiida sinnda.”
40027011	Geanung' ghaminaada Yeesu aba madeeda siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta. Hean ghoanyaash Siitta haw bea ng'eanyiidean nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda fuga Yahuudi?” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
40027012	Nea aba damandida argweaksiina ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwean ghanyea mwasha eara ng'ashaan.
40027013	Hean gwayeeshsha Bilatto, “Miyiinyi ng'asheesu sean sumuwwunaneeyiini?”
40027014	Ghanyea mwasha Yeesu eara ng'ashaanjagi ea ghahamng'eanyi siitta haw bea ng'eanyiittean muuchchi.
40027015	Iissa eaweeda ghweelmeeda gageanu siida haw bea ng'eanyiida ak goottin siyagi wassean mida ghealooniga gasa emeeda.
40027016	Aba damandida gwanda siisi nalaat muuchchi was siida ghealooniga suguura ghawungaaschi Baraaba.
40027017	Hean iiduw nea ghabwat geat buuneeda ghoanyaash Bilatto gideaba, “Googasayi deattin ng'eaha, Baraabahi ghana Yeesuuyda suguura Gristo?”
40027018	Ghoanyashtaydunu nea ghwanal gideaba geayaat headaannyi aba lachng'eanyiida.
40027019	Damanda mideawa Bilatto uhuuda hoorgeeda argweachcha goojeakta gatmoadannyi siida weah gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw gighasi geaw siisi doabiiwaadiin, aba gideaba geesawanan muuchchi aba jeeda girgweatka appadaydaannyi.”
40027020	Gageanu ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak ghaghoash buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, amsa ettinneegwa Baraaba ak geenuus Yeesu.
40027021	Ghoanyaash siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta nea gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi deattin ng'eaha aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyyeenyean?” Gwasha saawa, “Baraaba.”
40027022	Gabiikta Bilatto ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa googasayi dahindaan Yeesuyda suguura Gristo?” Gwayeeshsha sean, “Anngoora.”
40027023	Ghoanyaashta Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, abwanaaha? Neada ea nidiinya naaha? Gabiikta saawa ghoaraanya gijuureanda nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoora”
40027024	Daah Bilatto gideaba mwanyasa gil ghoahaada nyarasta, gageanu beega ak goohuun geattingaaschi aba madeeda emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini manda gichchea ghwaagan aba foojeadeaba siisi asawsiina agooga nea goobwageat.”
40027025	Ghwasha Buuneessean nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung'waada foojeandeaba siisi ghapka badahuukkaasa ea gea diibigaasa!”
40027026	Hean gageanu ak goottissa Baraaba, hit bayiiga Yeesu aba mughoowooda ghoadayda Yeesu enngoorsa uhuuda beehiida.
40027027	Gageanu shirikkarajeanda siida haw bea ng'eanyiitta ak ghwaat Yeesu jeeda gheeda sugoochcheanda, ak gabassa geat shirikkareeda sean.
40027028	Geafwakta hang'weakkaschi ak geekkwealsa hang'da oomu.
40027029	Geanap shiipka halaghweenga, ak geayiin uhuuda Yeesu, nea geegeanu muudeanda ak geayiin gattindannyi bea dugwa. Iissa geetkuy ammwadeadaannyi nea geejuuga nea geeyeeshsha, “Seayu, Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi!”
40027030	Geeng'ng'urriisa ng'usheega nea geegeanu muudeanda ak geabwara uhuuda.
40027031	Iing'atta jukkooda geegeanda hang'dida ak geeshuup hang'weakkaaschi hii geayaat engoor.
40027032	Iiduw nea gaweay geadaah siyagi suguura Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene, ak geediing'sa ghwasar behiidaannyi.
40027033	Sihitta hiji suguura Golgootta (nea gideaba dea Geapkeeda Uhuuda gil,)
40027034	geattaw difwayeeda sikkuuyi sea gidang'weanda, hean samu niny ghaheawa ghwali.
40027035	Iiduw nea ning'atta gingoorda geelaja hang'weakkaschi nea geeng'alealleesa;
40027036	gobiitpiit nea gafur.
40027037	Geayiin deascheeda uhuudaannyi ng'asheega siihaaktaaw sung'waardunu, “Niih Yeesu gil sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.”
40027038	Abeeda gwanda fiih iyyeenya was mareanghooga siingoruudayi sea niny, dea manda meatkweadaannyi bea geattinda dugwa, niirja gwanda meatkweeda geattinda ghaadaam.
40027039	Iissa fuga ng'atta aba naweeda goong'eawi nea goodiindiil iheenga nyaawa nea gwayeeshsha,
40027040	“Ang'iing'eeda jea gwanyarja gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak ghwadeas aba eawooji samwagu, asi lealni geaw! Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, girarang'aanani uhuuda beehiida.”
40027041	Gwasunu eara ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa, gabarra budeay nea gwayeeshsha,
40027042	“Gwalealu suurja ak amwoammu gwalealu geaw. Niny sugoochcheanda Israeeli gil; asi dararang'aanana uhuuda behiida ghamneawa ak abeeda earaseasa gajeamwasa.
40027043	Niny ghaghus Aseetta ea dalealna ghamneawa iigasa, aba gideaba gwayi, ‘Aniini Balleanda Aseetta.'"
40027044	Eara Fukka was mareanghooga singooruuday sea ninyiin gong'eawi.
40027045	Ghang'eada aseetteaba lah ea ghwahitta aseetteaba shageash gwadukta ng'eanyissean misaneeda.
40027046	Iiduw nea nihitta aseetteaba shageash gooyyeawuda Yeesu nea gooheedu daghatta nea gwayi, “ Eloyi, Eloyi lama sabaktani?” Nea gideaba, “Aseetteanyu, Aseetteanyu, anda nunung'usean heeda?”
40027047	Iing'shi fukka gwachchi miinaada aba hoowean ng'asheesu gwayeena gaguursa Eliya.
40027048	Ghafwach Siyagi ak gageanu ghabuscheanda ak ghoannyit beega ng'weani ak ghwayiin uhuuda muudeanda ak ghoadaw ghwali.
40027049	Gwayeeshsha buuneeda mwaatkwa, “Oommeasa eadaaha ea jea ghwaan gwalealu.”
40027050	Gabiikta Yeesu gooyyeawda nea gooheedu daghatta amang'atta ghoabitta gurorooda.
40027051	Ghabwaasha, hang'da subwaasha gheeda sibatta Aseetta nibiyyeenya, ghang'eada humng'eeda ea gagul ng'eanyi, gwasim geaw ng'eanyiida ak gabearshachchi lagheanga hees;
40027052	ghwajaada ghuusiga bung'eadinga ak ghang'eatng'eat sasanuukka saang'a bea fuga ghayi lil.
40027053	Rinna jeesinga bung'eadinga nyaawa ing'atta dunnoadaannyi, gaweay jeeda mujiineeda ghaydit ak goohiimsa geat fuga saang'a.
40027054	Hean daah shirikkarajeanda haw ea fukwachchi fur Yeesu gidasimda geaw ng'eanyiida ea ng'asheekka ghwanyawa bunuun, ghabeal muuchchi nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa siisi Balleanda Aseetta gil!”
40027055	Abeeda aba hoowa gwanda gadeemga saang'a ng'ula nea sheagi. Suu gadeemga ghayi eadu geeshta Yeesu nea gwaleabu Galilaaya nea gagadiyeesa.
40027056	Aba jeannyaawa gwanda Mariyaayda suguura Magdaleena ea Mariya gheamatta Yakkobo ea Yoseefu, ea gheamatta oorjooga Sebedaayo.
40027057	Iiduw nea ghoaw shing'ada ghwahidu siyagi was meanang'oochcheanda bea ng'eanyiida Arimattaya suguura Yoseefu. Nea abeeda eara niny ea giinealaneeda Yeesu gil.
40027058	Gawa heeda Bilatto ak gamus saseeda Yeesu, hean ghwanung Bilatto eattawa.
40027059	Gageanda Yoseefu saseeda Yeesu ak gookwealsa hang'deesh miy.
40027060	Ak ghwayiin jeeda bung'eadaannyi eesh ghayi gurgursa jeeda harearacheanda amwahit gooreakreaksa lagheaneeda haw ghuutta bung'eeda ak gawa.
40027061	Damandida goobitpiit Mariyaayda Magdaleena ea Mariya niirja nea goofuursa jeesinga nyaawa bung'eeda.
40027062	Hitta eaweetteaba iyyeenya was eaweeda giding'ding'deayda, gabassa geat ashoohoodiga hees sea Farisayajeega heeda Bilatto,
40027063	gwayeeshsha, “Ea Siida mureeda, sipkaachchi gidaghayi rugu siitta milmiliin damanda miih ghameawa gideaba, ‘Ing'atta eawooji samwagu gaydaduudu.’
40027064	Asi nung' eefur bung'eeda muuchchi ea ghang'atta eawooji samwagu, aba gideaba gajiiduw ghapka giinealangaaschi ak gwajagwat amaduw gwayeennisa buuneeda, ‘Niduunna miyeeda,’ Rengaweega huydean gayghwalaabwa hoowa dea madeeda.”
40027065	Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Goondeawi furiischoodiga aweayeena afra muuchchi aba gidoammuusti.”
40027066	Hean gaweay ak gafur muuchchi heeda sibunnyiisa buuneeda nea geerroor lagheaneetta ak geayiin furiischoochcheanda.
40028001	Iimuchchu nea ning'atta sabatto, nea ghaghar gayeew eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, gawa Mariyayda suguura Magdaleena ea Mariyaydida bea iyyeenyean ghwadaah heeda sibunnyiisa buuneeda.
40028002	Hean gwasimgeaw ng'eanyiida muuchchi, ak gwashubean malaykajeanda humng'eeda bea Ng'uttamiida leabu humng'eeda amwahit ghoaraakghraakghta lagheaneedida sidukuteawa ghuutta bung'eedean ak goopteadawa.
40028003	Nea gheamamdaannyi ghawaar dadamandeeda nea hang'weakkaschi ea eashish ghawaar gapkeanda.
40028004	Daah furiischoodigiga ghabeal muuchchi nea ghabwaadan ea gawuurji fuga nimeewa.
40028005	Ghwalamda malaykajeanda humng'eeda ak gwayeeshsha gadeemgiga, “Agooga adoabealli; ghanalli gideaba googasayi Yeesuuyda heetta singoor.
40028006	Manda hiji aba gideaba nuduutteayda gidaghayi rukuteayda. Apkaani adaaha heeda heetta siyiin.
40028007	Asi ahalageat ak gooweayi arukusiina giinealangaaschi gideaba niduunna miyeeda, ak ghamneawa ea nisheedeawaneegwa gawa Galilaaya, iyoahitti hoowa gajadaaha. Asi abean nearukuneegwa.”
40028008	Ghwalamwajaada ghabeawa heeda bung'eeda aba muuwda nea gang'weela muuchchi, gwasalda ak ghoadaw giinealangaaschi iitta.
40028009	Hean gwaroonnyi Yeesu sea saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayu!” Gwaneekkiissa ak ghoang'ng'waay geeshanga ak ghaghadoawan.
40028010	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Adoabealli! Aweayeena ak goorukusi oorjoogiyya gaweay Galilaaya amahitta hoowa gayaghwadaahan.”
40028011	Damanda beawa, ng'ulla gwanda furiischoojusu weay mujiini heeda ashoohoodiga hees ak ghoadayda iitta ng'asheega sean bunu.
40028012	Hean gwaroonnyi sea gweargwa ak gabalool, hit geattaw furiischoodiga lappiyeeda saang'a,
40028013	nea gwayeeshsha, “Ayeeshshiina buuneeda, ‘Ghwahidu giinealangaaschi eawa nea sililli ak gwajagwat.’
40028014	Amadeeppa ghwanyas iitta sugoochcheanda bea ng'eanyiida, gajeeppaloola niny ak gajeegeandeawaneegwa shatta.”
40028015	Gageanda lappiyeetta amwang'atta gwasinda baloolda gissurukusiinda. Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheanji aba jeeda fuga Yahuudi ea ghwoaw ghamneawa.
40028016	Gaweay Giinealangiga attamwanagiin Galilaaya nea ghoaburbuur heayeeda ghayi rukusa Yeesu saawa.
40028017	Hean daah ghaghadoawan, nea mwaatkwa ghamwachmwach jeesinga nyaawa.
40028018	Ghwaan Yeesu heannyaawa ak goobalool ak gwayeeshsha, “Sugoonan gheambalmeeda sean aba humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida.
40028019	Asi aweayeena ak ghoanung' ghoaw emoojiga sean giinealanga, nea gobattiisannyi saawa aba gheawunga Aseetta was Bwaabwa, ea gea Balleanda, ea gea Gurorooda Ghaydit.
40028020	Oannaala ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheega sean eagoonnyeegwa. Ang'ulla aniini geendeayi sea agooga galeega sean ea gagul mudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
41001001	Niih gidangeatta Giijasta Miy bea Yeesu Gristohi was Balleanda Aseetta.
41001002	Gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda gittabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gideaba, Gwayi Aseetta, “Ng'ulla gaydeajeagu giijasoochcheanji itteanyu jea gosheedeawaneey ak gayghoaw Siichchea gwasinney naweadaang'u.
41001003	Gwanda Siisi nyearra ghuutta jeeda dareapcheeda Asissiina Ng'uttamiida naweeda olleappa naweadingaaschi.”
41001004	Yohaaneeda Abattisachchi gedeaksa jeettareapcheeda nea gwarukkwiisa buuneeda gideaba adukkuunana ng'asheega munyas ak geppattiisan ak gwasamsa Aseetta ring'eega nyaawa.
41001005	Goreemsa Yohaana emeettuw leabu ng'eanyiissean bea Yudeeya eaghoaw fuga Yerusaleemossean, ak gwadukkuuna ring'eega nyawa ak geppattiisan aba jeedeenda Yordaani.
41001006	Abeeda Yohaana gokkwealli hang'da sisna budeega ngamiya nea gwarattiisa manandannyi ghealooda. Ghoaw daghwardaannyi deashamga ea maleeda dareabeetta.
41001007	Gwarukkwiida Yohaana ng'asheega nea gwayeenniisa, “Gwanda sichchea ghwahidu jea ghwaduupnanaan geash. Siisi gaburdeawean uurda eara aniini mammisean dahiiy geaw ak geameewji deandoadaannyi.
41001008	Aniini geabattisananeegwa beega, Niny gaygobattisaneegwa aba Jeammeeda Ghaydit.”
41001009	Damandida ghwahidu Yeesu nea gwaleabu mujiineeda siyi Nasareetti mida Galilaaya, ak gobattiisan Yohaana aba jeedeenda Yordaani.
41001010	Siyeeng'na jeedeenda deagheetta ghwadaah nea ghwajaada bugusta humng'eeda ak gwashubeesa Jeammeeda Ghaydit nea gawuurji ghariibajeanda.
41001011	Ghwanya Ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Jeepteanyu abwariinyi gwadan jeedeanyu.”
41001012	Miighoaw gil ghwaat Jeammeeda Ghaydit ea gawa dareapcheanda.
41001013	Gobiida hoowa askwearjooji haradam nea gwasimsim Shattaani. Abeeda aba hoowa gwandeaydooschi diyeanga jarooda, nea ghaweadaada giijasoodiga humng'eeda.
41001014	Iiduw nea sijaksa Yohaana ghealooniga gawa Yeesu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea Aseetta
41001015	nea gwayeenniisa, “Nugul damanda, nea gheambalmeeda Aseetta ea nineekkiit, Adukkuunana ring'oojiga ak ghoamwaschi Giijasta Miy.”
41001016	Iiduw nea Gwasik ghuutta basooda Galilaaya ghwadaa fiih iyyeenya leallu ghweayeega nea Simon gil ea oorjeeda ghaamwat siyi Andereya nea gwalealluuna ngheearga nyaawa ghweayeega.
41001017	Gwayeeshsha, Yeesu, “Ayeanni geeshteanyu. Gaydanung' ahuuwa fuga jea gwaleallu buuneeda.”
41001018	Gwanungu'sa heeda gheareedanga nyaawa aba geeshangiga ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
41001019	Gawa Yeesu mwadi gili mwanang' ak ghwadaah Yakkobo ea Yohaana, oorjooga Sebedaayo nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda nea ghwanapnap gheareedanga nyaawa.
41001020	Deagheatta gaguursa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, oyeanni geeshteanyu, Ghwanung'wa heeda ghweanda nyaawa was Sebedaayo sea fuga gadiyeeda jeeda maleambooda ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
41001021	Ghwahitta Yeesu ea ginealangaaschi mujiineeni suguura Gapernaumu. Hean hitta eaweetta sabatto gawa Yeesu jeeda ghooriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa ak ghoang'eat ginealshooda.
41001022	Iiy buuneessean aleeysiit ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi aba ginealshoadaannyi, aba gideaba niny monealsheatta ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi niny gonealsheatta siida mideawa gheambalmeeda
41001023	Deagheatta gwarinna jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa Siisi bearji meang'nyeandeenda
41001024	Gojuur nea gwayi, “Gendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i Yeesuyda Nasareetti? Guwuni lasa uhuudeanya? Ghanalli siiduwosi guwosi siida Ghaydit bea Aseetta!”
41001025	Gojuursa, Yeesu meang'nyeandeenda nea gwayeeshsha “Siinda! Ritteawana Siisi.”
41001026	Godumduum Meang'nyeandeenda siidida ak goguul aba nyeashta haw ak gwaritteaysa.
41001027	Ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean, nea gonyeari geat, “Suuh ana ng'asha? Heappi, niih ginealshooni bunuu? Siisi gwandeawa gheambalmeeda ea joriischooda hoana meangeenda nea ghoawal gheang'da!”
41001028	Gabay gageawiit iitta Yeesu aba jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Galilaaya.
41001029	Deagheatta gwaritteawa Yeesu jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gawa nea godeayi Yakkobo ea Yohaana ea gaweay jeeda gheeda geaba Simon bea Andereya
41001030	Abeeda gwanda Gheamadoanagia agweaji Simon nea gwanda muunda gabearji sheagheeda ng'waan. Duughwahidu Yeesu geebay eattaw iitta.
41001031	Gaweesa ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda ak gagatgat, ak gwaritteaysa sheagheeda, ak ghang'eat gagadiyeesa buuneeda.
41001032	Mikta aseetta ghapka buuneeda heeda Yeesu nea geyeassa fuga sean miyeani ea fuga bearji meangeeniga.
41001033	Gabassa geat fuga sean bea mujiineetta madeeda gheeda.
41001034	Ghoahaap Yeesu fuga saang'a bearji geyoonuung'weakka sean nea ghahoan meangeeniga saang'a, ak ea meanung' ghwanya ghuusiga meangeenda aba gideaba ghwanal niny siida was.
41001035	Muchchu nea gudea beashatta gil gawa Yeesu hichpa geaw ak ghamwaash Aseetta
41001036	Gawa Simon nea godeayi oorjooga suurja gagasa Yeesu
41001037	Sidaah geyeeshsha, “Gagaseadayyeey Gilinyooh ea siida.”
41001038	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Essiipta eweaya darooraw suuk darukuta ng'asheanda Aseetta eara aba hoowa aba gideaba gidaghayi ang'waarji gil.”
41001039	Iiduw gawa gwaneayeewa jeeda ng'eanyida Galilaaya sean nea gwarukkwiida ng'asheega aba ghoorajeega nyaawa sinnealshachcheewa sean nea ghahoan meangeenda.
41001040	Iiduw ghwahidu heeda Yeesu Siisi beardooschi udamusuura hidu gwatkuy ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, “Iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan!”
41001041	Ghabwayda Yeesu siidideani, ak ghoahaakta geattindaannyi ak ghoang'ng'waay ak gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi miinni!”
41001042	Gwaritteaysa siida udamusuura aba geeshangiga ak ghammiidu.
41001043	Hit ghamiin gheeng'da ak ghwanung' gabay ghabeawa howa nea gwayeeshsha,
41001044	“Asi Una nea adirukusi siih ng'asheanji. Una ahimsiina geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak gidaydi haleanjeeda siyeada ghadooweeda was gidaghayi rukutteayda Muusa, eanal gideaba ang'iing'i nihaabi.”
41001045	Beawa hoowa Siidida gwarukusa siisi roonnyi sean, ea ghwayiiy gilinyooh ea siida gil. Iiduw Yeesu ea mudu ghwanung' ng'asheesu gabadaksa beatta jeeda mujiini. Gwajireada gawa hichpa geaw ak eara gwasa goremsiina buuneeda meadajeega sean aba hoowa midean.
41002001	Iing'atta eawoojusu ng'ay gabiikta Yeesu ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu ak gabay ghwanyas buuneeda iitta gideaba gwanda ghoah.
41002002	Goweameesa fuga saang'a ghoah ea gwadukuta eara seawadeeda gidaghuut. Gwarukkwiida Yeesu Giijastaannyi.
41002003	Iiduw ghwahidu fiih ang'wan nea gwasareennu siisi miyaan bearji gibittunooda damealga
41002004	Sihhiidu siida miyaan nea geegasa eayaat gah heeda mida Yeesu ghwaroat naweeda aba seang'ayda buuneeda. Gaweay ak ghwasaaw uhuuda gheeda deascheeda mida Yeesu, ak gessiik siitta miyaniin nea gwanda badayda muundaannyi, ea eaghatghat ammadeeda Yeesu.
41002005	Daah Yeesu masaweega nyaawa gwayeeshsha siida miyaan, “Jeepteanyu, ring'eagaagu sisamsa.”
41002006	Abeeda gwanda hoowa Ginealshoodiga mwaatkwa bea diineeda Yahuudi gwachchi abitppiit nea gwayeena aba jeesinga nyaawa
41002007	“Assiisi gwarukutaydaan ng'asheesu? Niih gong'eawi Aseetta! Ghanyeamanda siisi ammu gwasamsa ring'eemba nuut, geaghus Aseetta akghwahit.”
41002008	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheega baloola jeesinga nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamwach-mwach naaha jeesing'eagwa?
41002009	Awussus anneeda aba hedeang'wa gideaba gearukusi siisi abittu damealgean gideaba, ‘Sisamsa ring'eedaang'u ghana gideaba geyeeshsha ng'eada, Geanda mundaang'u ak guwi?’
41002010	Asi geagasayi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gwandeawa Gheambalmeeda jea gwasamsiina buuneeda ring'eega aba ng'eanyiida.” Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida bearji gibittunooda damealgean.
41002011	Geayi ng'eada, “Geanda mundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
41002012	Ghang'eat ak ghamughut muunda ak gawa nea geadahaada sean. Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'asheanji miyeadaaha eara heeda ghayi.”
41002013	Iiduw gabiikta Yeesu hoowa bea ghuutta basoodean. Gaweay emeettuw hoowa mida ninyiin, ak ghoang'eat ginealshooda.
41002014	Gawa Yeesu ghwaat naweeda ea ghwadaah nisiih Lawiiyda Alfaayo nea goopteada aba hoowa sing'ng'oonnya gwadiin. Gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Benni eanni geeshteanyu.” Ghang'eat Laawi ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
41002015	Iiduw nea gweagiischi Yeesu aba gheeh Laawi, goreemsa fuga saang'a ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega, nea abeeda niny gweagiischi sea ginealangaaschi ea fuga mwaatkwa ghwanyawa eattu geashtaannyi.
41002016	Daah fuga mwaatkwa was ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi was Farisaayajeega gideaba Yeesu gombuuchchi fuga ring'eega geannyaash ginealanga gideaba, “Anda Yeesu ghwasaan inyas gombuuchchi sea fuga ring'eega ea gea ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi?”
41002017	Iiy Yeesu ng'ashesu gwayeeshsha saawa, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi meang'nyeanda. Meang'nyeanda geaghus gagasa fuga miyeani. Asi eara Aniini mwawuni dagasa fuga doobiweadi. Ghawunnyi dagasa fuga ring'eega.”
41002018	Eaweechcha ghwarat jalooda ginealanga Yohaana ea gea Farisayajeega. Ghapka buuneeda ak ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda ginealanga Yohaana ea gea Farisaayajeega gwarada jalooda nea gaagu amwarada?”
41002019	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga suguursa nyeangiida imidahiji siidageeshshi ghoang'ng'wa ghwaat jalooda? Inyooh gwanda hiji siida geeshshi fuga suguursa mayghwaat jalooda.
41002020	Amaduw gwanda eaweetta jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi eaweechcheanji fuga suguursa gayghwaat jalooda.
41002021	“Manda siida ammu gwalagu weasta hang'deesh ak ghawaasa hang'da waas. Iisisin ng'asheanji abeeda gayghwaloadadawa weastida eshiin hang'da waas ak abeeda ghami hang'da muuchchi.
41002022	Ghanyeamanda siida jea ghwayiin difaayeeda eashish jeesinga sheargweega woosi. Iisisin ng'asheanji gayghabwashaada difaayi sheargweega, ak abeeda gaygwanyara sheargweega ak gaweay difaayi. Difaayeeda eashish geyiina jeeda sheargweega eashish!”
41002023	Eaweachchanjagi mideewa ng'eanyiida sabatto, gawa Yeesu nea gwasik jeesinga madameega ngano damani beawaan gwahirjeaweada ginealangaaschi muschoonga ngano.
41002024	Gwayeeshsha Farisaayajeega Yeesu, “Ng'ulla ghwasaan anda ginealangaagu gwasin ng'asheanda meseamma eaweetta sabatto?”
41002025	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi ea fugaaschi iyeachchih.
41002026	Gawa jeeda gheeda Aseetta ak ghwaak mukkattajeega siyiin madeda Aseetta. Ng'asheanji geesin damanda waseewa Habiyattaari ashoohoochcheanda haw. Mukkatteani geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga nea gaba geat. Amaduw ghwaak Dawdi ak ghoadaw eara fuga mideawa.”
