41002027	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Sabatto geesissa buuneeda miigideaba buuneeda geesissa sabatto gil!
41002028	Asi Balleanda Siida Ng'uttaniida gil eara aba sabatto.”
41003001	Iiduw gabiikta Yeesu hoowa bea jeeda ghoriida sinnealshachcheewa nea abeeda gwanda hoowa siida aptu geattinda.
41003002	Abeeda gwanda fiisu gasa ghoahaakta Yeesu, hean ghoamuughu ghwadaah ea jea ghoahaap siidida eaweeda sabatto. Aba sareani geegasa gichchea eanyasta ramaseanda jea eahhaaktoawa
41003003	Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida aptu geattindean, “Beenni hiji bea mwadiin.”
41003004	Ng'atta ghoanyaash Yeesu fukka nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geesin ng'asheanda miy eaweeda sabatto ghana gideaba geesin ng'asheanda muy; ghang'wana gideaba geakghu eaweega ghana gideaba gelakku? Ameasha ghuttannyi geasiinda.”
41003005	Hean ghoaduup ghaang' Yeesu buuneeda aba nyarasta ak ghang'ut giseaneega idaah hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatkeaba fugiga. Gwayeeshsha siitta aptu geattindean, “Asi adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Ghoadobiiw siidida geattindaannyi ak gabiikta geattinda gamajegiit.
41003006	Deagheatta gwaritta jarooda fuga was Farisaayajeega ak gaweay gang'weaschi sea fuga Heroode, ghwadaawdaaw gichchea ghwanyasta gheatta nuusta Yeesu.
41003007	Gawa Yeesu nea goodeayi ginealangaaschi ea gaweay hoowa bea ghuutta basoodean. Ghwaat geeshta Yeesu emeettuw. Fiisu gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ea ghoaw ng'eanyiida Yudeeya.
41003008	ea gea Yerusaleemu ea ghoaw Idumeaya, ea ghoaw eenda suguura Yordaani, ea ghoaw murdajeega mujiinajeega geaba Diro ea Sidooni. Iiy emeeda ng'asheega sina Yeesu goreemu ghapka headaannyi.
41003009	Daah Yeesu gida jea ghwariista buuneeda aba ghuutta basooda gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Anung' gosiibu maleambooda amwariisan buuneeda.”
41003010	Abeada nihaap fuga saang'a, ghapka fuga geyoonung'weakka nea gagasa ghanyi ghawaas Yeesu.
41003011	Nea fuga bearji meang'nyeandeenda inyooh gwaroonnyi Yeesu, gobedeaysa madeadaannyi nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta!”
41003012	Iiduw gwareekusa Yeesu meangeenda nea ghoang'waniit gideaba, adoorukusi buuneeda siideawoschi!
41003013	Iiduw gawa Yeesu amawea uhuuda heayeeda gaguurriisa fuga gasa niny, Gaweay heeda fugiga.
41003014	Gagwalu fiih damaniyyeenya jea godeaydooschi jea ghoow Giijasoodigaaschi jea gaweay gwarukkwiida Giijasta.
41003015	nea fiisu geattaw gheambalmeeda jea goruutteawa meangeenda.
41003016	Abeeda fiisu attamaniyyeenya sigwaluun geaba Simoneeda (amaduw gang'assa gheawunga siyi Betrohi,)
41003017	ea geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana was oorjooga Sebedaayo (ghayi ng'assa Yeesu gheawunga siyi Bwaneegi, ghwanyawa isiyam ghuut gajeeyi Oorjooga Mbagiida.)
41003018	Ea Andereya ea Filippo, ea Bartolomayo, Mattayo ea Domaso, Yakkoboyda Alfaayo ea Dadeo, ea Simoneeda leabu Ganaani,
41003019	ea Yuudayda Iskariyotti was siida amaduw ghwala bwadaw.
41003020	Iiduw nea nuwa Yeesu ghoh gagaweesa heeda emeettuw ea eamudu ghwanyas niny gheatta agiischooda.
41003021	Nyas iittaannyi fuga gheannyaawa gaweay ghoang'ngwaay nea geaghay gili ning'ul geeska.
41003022	Nea Ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi leabu Yerusaleemu, saawa gwayi Yeesu, “Gwandeawa Belsebuuli! Ak ghahoan meangeenda aba uurda meang'nyeandeenda haw.”
41003023	Iiduw gaguursa saawa headaannyi, ak ghoanyaash nea gwasin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa Shattaani ghoang'ng'wa ghahoan Shattaani?
41003024	Sugoochcheandumeeda imaweechchi sugoochcheandumeeni ea maygahuweada.
41003025	Nuut gichcha eara fuga jeeda gheadassagi idardawaat gheawi ea maygahuweada.
41003026	Eara shattaani ing'uchchi geaw, ea maygudu gageanu askwearjoojiga gaygabiissa gammudean.
41003027	“Gheeda siida mwaay biissa ahoauur manda siida jea gabadaksa gawa gah ghoareat haleanjeadaannyi. Geaghus abeeda ea sirada siisi bea gheedean abeeda gheawi ghoammu siih gawa jeeda gheeda ak ghwaat haleanjeeda.
41003028	Aba huumwa Gearukuneegwa, ring'oojiga sean sina buuneeda manda dea majeesamsa, eara ng'asheega munyas rittuuna ghuusiga buuneeda gaygwasamsa Aseetta.
41003029	Sinung' siida rukkuuna ng'asheega munyas badayda Gurorooda Ghaydit, siisi majeesamsa, gwandeawa ring'eeda eeweaga manda mudeanooda.” (
41003030	Yeesu abeeda gwarukuna ng'asheesu fuga baloolla gideaba, “Niny gwandeawa meang'nyeandeenda.”)
41003031	Iiduw ghwahidu Gheamatta Yeesu nea godeana oorjooga gennyea Yeesu ak ghaminaada aba jarooda ak gojeakta siida gawa gaguursa aba gah.
41003032	Abeeda goobiitpiit emeettuw nea gwaneaweesa ak geyeeshsha, “Gagasseey Geamadu ea oorjooga giyeang'wa aba jarooda.”
41003033	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha fugiga, “Iyya ea oorjooga giyeanya geabeang'a?”
41003034	Gwasachsa ghaat fugiga ghwanyawa abiitpidiin ak gwayi, “Ang'ulla Iyya ea oorjooga iyya fiisu gil!
41003035	Siida nyooh gwasna haleanjeeda bwariiy Aseetta, siisi gayghoaw oorjeediyya, nea gayghoow eara hudiyya, nea gayghoaw iyya.”
41004001	Gabiikta Yeesu gonealshi gichcha aba ghuutta basooda. Ghwasaabwan emeettuw ea eanung' gawa jeeda maleambooda ak goopteada. Abeeda buuneeda gobiitpiit aba ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
41004002	Hean goneali buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gagalla geat ng'asheega. Gwayeeshsha abajeeda ginealshoodaannyi,
41004003	“Oalleaydiit! Ghayi ghang'eat siih gawa gwahista booga.
41004004	Hitta nea gwahista boagaaschi gwanda booga abitpissa heeda was naweeda buuneeda, iiduw ghwahidu dariidakka ak ghwaak.
41004005	Gwanda eara booga abitpissa heeda was badayda harearachcheanda heeda manda sigeemba huumwa. Boosu gabay gwardu aba gideaba eara sigeedeaba hoowa eang'ay.
41004006	Boosu iiduw ghwalas daknooda nea gudugwanda ghuusiga sigeeda, ak gabay ghaghajamiit aba gideaba manda sigeemba huumwa ang'ng'waay hawunga.
41004007	Gwanda eara booga abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweanga, iiduw nea gwardu boogiga ea maji gil aba gideaba ghwariis geediga halaghweenga.
41004008	Gwanda eara booga abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaas, iiduw nea gwardu gwaji muuchchi. Ghealooniga meatteena booga diktam ea damanamughuush, suurja gweatta laadam nea suurja gweatta bughala.”
41004009	Iiduw nea gayghoabuut Yeesu ghuutta baloaldaannyi gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Siida agar iitta adayiinya ng'asheesu ikkeasuun.”
41004010	Iiduw nea gwandeawa Yeesu geaw, gaweesa fukwachchi aleeysiit sea ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya ak geannyaash gidagwachchi baysiina gallodeaba geat bea ng'asheega.
41004011	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agogeeni ghamneawa simeayneegwa makcheameeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta. Amasunung' fugiga manda jedeaba gheambalmeeniin, saawa ng'asheega ijea erukkwiisa geaghus egalla geat.
41004012	Ghoaw ramoraneeda ghayi sirukutta bea gideaba, ‘Fiisu gayghoang'wearda muuchchi, ak ea mayghwadaah gil. iidiga nyaawa gaygwayiing'shi muuchchi, ak ea manda gili jea gwajeeng'u. Ghang'wana gwachchi gwayamsa geat Aseetta ak gwasamsa ring'eega nyaawa.'"
41004013	Hean ghoanyaashta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Assagooga miyajeeng'ni eara ng'asheesu eagalli geadiini? Gajoammustaan ajeeng'ni ng'asheesu jea dagalla geadiin?
41004014	Siida weah gwahista booga gwahista ng'asheega Aseetta.
41004015	Boogiga abitpissa ghuutta naweedean fugiga iiy ng'asheanda deagheatta ghwahidu Shattaani ak gageandeawa jeesinga nyaawa.
41004016	Booga abitpissa badayda harearachcheandean. Fugiga ama iiy ng'asheanda ghwadeapta nea gahoosan.
41004017	Ghanyea mandeawana hawunga issa ghanyi gageanu gheadi nuwaas iihidu sawanaduutka ea munyinda gabay ghwalagaan.
41004018	Boogiga abitpissa jeeda halaghweengean, fugiga iiy ng'asheanda Aseetta,
41004019	iiduw ghwahidu mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida bea geaba gassooda baruureega, ea sechmeeda seach saawa gilinyooh ghwariis ng'asheandida, ghwanung' ea mudugwaji haghweega.
41004020	Boogiga sihisa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin, fugiga iiy ng'asheanda ak ghoang'ng'waay ak gwaji haghweegeani. Ghealooniga meatteena booga diktam ea damanamughuush, suurja gweatta laadam nea suurja gweatta bughala.”
41004021	Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gheaboong'nyeanda ijea eapwaang'da gajeedukuteawa dahuuda ghana jea eayiin uutta bulaliida? Manda ameakghusa ak geayiin uhuumba gili?
41004022	Asi gilinyooh afunyaat gajeenung' ghwadajiit. Nuut gichcha gissudukuta gajeenung' ghabwar daknooda.
41004023	Asi Ayiinya iyondeawi iidiga!”
41004024	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Olleysiina iit muuchchi ng'asheesu oayinyiin! Gidottenniidi agooga gajettenneegwa nea geanung' ghwanaawda.
41004025	Aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheassa nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gidida mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.”
41004026	Hean gabalool Yeesu nea gwayi, “Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gajeegala siisi ghayi wea gwahista booga.
41004027	Niny iissa ihidu eaweeda gawa gwalil, nea askweari ghoang'wearu, nea mwanala eara bookcheandida girritteayda.
41004028	Funnooda bookcheanda goobal Sigeeda akghwahit. Iissa ghwanung' ghanyi gwasin mbearga, hean gabiissa ghwasar muhooga, iiduw muhoogiga ea nisin gheanyanga booga.
41004029	Iiduw nea booga ea niheas, gaygawa seabwa ghwalach aba gideaba ghwadaah nihitta damanda lajitta.”
41004030	Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghamneawa Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gajeegala naaha? Iijea erukuna gajeegalana naaha?
41004031	Gaydagala ghajilleanda haradaali. Ghajilleandeaba geedi amwanang' ea ghwalaabwa hoowa ghajilleamba geat nuut.
41004032	Amaduw nea geayiin jeessigeeda gwardu ak gwaheedu ea ghoaw geetta gidahaw naawa geediga sean bea madamnyeanda. Iissa gwasin damealga duguuga hees ea ghamway jirooneadaannyi dariidakka.”
41004033	Abeeda Yeesu inyooh gagasa gwarukuta giijastaannyi, inyeessa ng'asheega asaang'a gea galla suurja.
41004034	Miighanyi gwarukuta ng'asheanji magalana nuut. Iiduw nea gwandeawa ginealangaaschi akghwahit, gwarukusa ganeega ng'asheega sean nea mwafnyana eara gil.
41004035	Shing'adedeaba eawettida gwayeeshshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Eaniyean eakghaawana basooda eebu meatkweetta.”
41004036	Goheelli geat emeetta sang'aan. Gaweay ginealanga jeeda maleambooda ghwanyawa mida Yeesu ak gaweay nea ghwaat Yeesu. Abeeda gwanda hoowa maleambajeega suuk.
41004037	Iiduw ghang'eat siilakghta aba jeeda basooda. Ghwalas maleambooda laweajajeega ak ghwanung' gwaneawwiida beega ea ghwannyiit jeeda maleambooda.
41004038	Abeeda Yeesu gwalil aba hoowa bea uutta maleamboodean nea gwadiiwa uhuudaannyi hang'da was ghabuscheanda. Ghwaheat ginealanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda. Assang'iing'i eara nyariideanya miduuppi?”
41004039	Ghang'eat Yeesu ak gwareekusa siilakghtida nea gwayeeshsha basooda, “Siinda! Eena saw!” Gwaregweesa jeammeeda. Gwayi basooda sean saw!
41004040	Hean gwayeeshsha, Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Ghoabealeagwaani? Mondeawani masaweega?”
41004041	Ghabeel muuchchi ak gonyeari geat, “Niih siisi urjiini? Siida nukkwa ghoawal gheang'da eara jeammeeda ea basooda?”
41005001	Muchchu ghwahitta gigheawda basooda ng'eanyiida siyi Geraasi.
41005002	Deagheatta nea gwarinna Yeesu jeeda maleambooda geadaah siisi mideawa meangeenda nea gwaleabu heeda sibunnyiisa buuneeda ak gwaroonnyi.
41005003	Siisi eajusu gobiitta hoowa sibunnyiisa buneedean nea ghanyeamanda siisi ammu ghwarat aba munyaloalajeega.
41005004	Nea eara isiratta munyaloalajeega ghana biingu inyeessa gang'achcheaweada sean nea ghanyea mwoammu siih ghwajoar.
41005005	Inyeessa Gojureadayyi eawa ea askweari nea gahoonna geaw hoowa sibunnyiisa buneedean ea jeesinga beareega nea inyessa ghabwashadawa geaw lagheanga.
41005006	Iiduw nea ghwadaah Yeesu nea gudeasheagi Ghafwach ama hitta heeda ghwahiiy geaw aba mureeda aba madeeda Yeesu
41005007	ak gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, Gendeeyeesi naaha Yeesu sea ang'iing'i, “Balleanda Aseetta haw? Geamuscheey aba gheawunga Aseetta adisawannyean!” (
41005008	Ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba niyeeshsha niny, “Ritteaysiina siisi.”)
41005009	Ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghawungaagu ng'eaha?” Gwayeeshsha siidida, “Gheawungeasu geguura ‘Lugooda,’ aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi saang'a.”
41005010	Gamearmearani Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, aniyean adiguttidaneasa aba ng'eang'i.
41005011	Abeeda gwanda hoowa hawanda ukkurumajeega sihhaghwa aba geeshta heayeeda.
41005012	Gamearmearani, Meangeenda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Nung' eweaya jeedeaba ukkurumajeegiga.”
41005013	Gwasiksa Yeesu lugoodida bea meangeendean, ak gwaritteaysa siidida ak ghoabitta jeeda ukkurumajeega. Abeeda ukkurumajeega gwariiksa sagalamnyooji iyyeenya. Gamng'aw ukkurumajeega ak ghoabuttaawa geat marechcheanda ak ghwaak basooda sean.
41005014	Gwasalda fukkwachchi ahaaghwa ukkurumajeega ak gaweay ea ghwahitta mujiini ea heeda mawasa mujiini. Ghapka buuneeda ghwadaah ng'asheega bunu.
41005015	Gaweay ama hitta hoowa mida Yeesuun ghwadaah siidida eawoojusu ng'uttooschi lugooda meangeenigean nea goopteada nea gookwa hang'daannyi nea nibiiksa fughareadaannyi, ak geabeal.
41005016	Iiduw gwarukusa fukkwachchi daah ng'asheesu buneessuurja iitta gidabussa siitta bearji meangeendean ea iitta ukkurumajeega.
41005017	Hean gebiissa emus Yeesu gideaba ng'amwana ng'eang'deanya.
41005018	Daah Siidida nea gawa Yeesu jeeda maleambooda gamus godeayi.
41005019	Ghaheawa Yeesu godeayi siidida. Ghoadeal nea gwayeeshsha, “Una ghoah ak girukusi ng'asheega sean fuga ghaheang'wa ea gida nuweattaneey Ng'uttamiida ea gida nubwaydaaydaneey.”
41005020	Gawa Siidida ak gwarukkwiida aloheeda ng'asheega miyaas sissa Yeesu aba jeeda mujiinajeekka attamanamughushiin. Nyas buuneeda iidi bea ng'asheesuun ghahamng'eanyi sean.
41005021	Gwading'da Yeesu maleambooda ghoaghaawa basooda ak gawa ama wea gigheawda goreemsa emeettuw gaweay ghwanyasa hoowa.
41005022	Iiduw ghwahidu heeda siisi suguura Yayro siisi abeeda gaba fuga hees ahaaghwa ghoriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa. Hitta Siisi gobedeaysa madeeda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
41005023	“Jeebi itteanyu mwanang' bea haweega ghabwar miyeeda. Eeniyean beenni waasana geattingaagu ak abeeda gayghahaap.”
41005024	Ghang'eat Yeesu godeayi siidida. Ghabwang'aada emeettuw gamaseaw nea geasaabwan.
41005025	Abeeda gwanda hoowa gatmooni aream foojeanda galeagasean gweannyeew damaniyyeenya.
41005026	Gatmooni abeeda niduulu haleanjeedaannyi aba beatta gealga meanga nea ghanyeamalossiina eara gil gwareanyiisachchi muuchchi.
41005027	Abeeda ninyas iitta Yeesu Ghwaat geeshta ak ghawaas weleeda hang'da Yeesu.
41005028	Gwasin ng'asheanji nea gwayeeshsha Geaw, “Iyawaaschi weleedeaba siisi ghanalli gaydahaap.”
41005029	Hitta nea ghawaasa geaw weleeda hang'da Yeesu deagheatta gageanda gireemdida bea foojeandean. Nea eara iisawsa saseadannyi ghwadaah nimajegiit.
41005030	Jeeng'u Yeesu gidabeada nisuunya urdaannyi gwasachsa ghaat emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghawaas ng'eaha weleeda hang'deanyu?”
41005031	Gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Girukutaydiin nea gidaahi gidariistaneey buuneeda?”
41005032	Gong'weerng'weersa Yeesu meadajeega sean ghwadaah ea jea ghwanyas siida ghwanyawa waas.
41005033	Iiduw nea ghwadaah, gatmoodida gideaba nihaap gaweesa Yeesu nea ghabwadanaada aba muuwda ama hitta gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak ghoadayda iitta sean.
41005034	Gwayeeshsha, Yeesu gatmooda, “Balleanda gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu, una nea gibeahi seayu nea gagasa ea mabikseey geyoani.”
41005035	Duuw gobalool Yeesu gatmoodida deagheatta ea sichcheagu fiisu leabu gheeh Yayro ak gwayeeshsha, “Jeeptaang'u nimi. Ghwasaan andagideawiidi ginealshoochcheanda?”
41005036	Nyas Yeesu iidi ghoanaawa geaw ak gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali. Heappi ang'iing'i mwasa.”
41005037	Hean ea modeayi fiih suuk geaghus Betro, Yakkobo ea Yohaanayda gennyea Yakkobo.
41005038	Ghwahitta gheeh Yayro ak ghwadaah Yeesu emeeda mwahawda heeda mwasakta dabeakka suurja gaguttu heareega nea ghoahaawda.
41005039	Hitta Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga goyyeawdi nea mandaneegwa eara hawdaaw? Balleanda eara miyeeda miighami. Gabeachchi ruweanga akghwahit.”
41005040	Gabarra rear buuneeda. Hean goruutta buuneessean jarooda ama hit gaguursa ghweanda jeepta ea gheamatta jeepta ea ginealangaaschi ghwanyawa adeana ak gaweay hoowa bea gah mida jeeptean.
41005041	Hitta Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay geattinda jeepta nea gwayeeshsha, “Dalittakum,” nea gideaba, “Huda mwanang' ng'eada!”
41005042	Deagheatta gafakna geaw ng'eanyi hudida ak ghang'eat gawa. (Jeeptida abeeda gaba gweenynyeew damaniyyeenya.) Ghwanung' ng'asheanji ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda muuchchi.
41005043	Iiduw gwayeeshsha Yeesu buuneeda, Adiiduw goorukusi gili gwachchi easinnyiin. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha oattawa huda gichchaghwaak.
41006001	Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ea gawa ng'eang'da nyaawa nea godeayi ginealangaaschi.
41006002	Muchchu nea eaweeda mideewa sabatto gil, gawa jeeda ghoriida fuga Yahuudi sinnealshachcheewa gonealshi. Ghahamng'eanyi fuga saang'a aleeysiit nea gwayeena, “Assiisi ghwanyasa yeenu ng'asheesu? Ea bareaynadi bea uhuudean. Ak gwasindaan deamdeamanga sina
41006003	Neada niih ea miih siidida sina behajeega was oorjeeda Mariya bea gennyea Yakkobo bea geaba Yose bea Yuuda ea Simon? Neada eara haweega ghaamwat ea manda ng'eang'i?” Geamwachmwach ng'asheagaaschi.
41006004	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara sibaneeda geaghus ghoadaw mureeda fuga sheagi. Sughus fuga ng'eang'da nyaawa ea gea was genoojigaaschi ea fugeaba gheannyi, aba saawa siisi mawuurji gil.”
41006005	Iiduw Yeesu ea mudugwasin deamdeamanga aba hoowa. Ghoang'ng'waay iheeng'spa fiisu ng'ay miyeani ak gaheaba.
41006006	Ghahamng'eanyi Yeesu idaah gidamwamwasta buuneeda ng'asheagaaschi. Iiduw gwaskeada Yeesu gealga aba hoowa nea gonealshi.
41006007	Gaguursa ginealanga attamaniyyeenyean ak gojeakta nea ghwanung' gabadiinna iyyeenya iyyeenya. Ghabiiw uurda jea ghwajoara meangeenda
41006008	Gwayeeshsha, “Asi aweayeena nea adiiduw ghoasapchi geadi. Daba siisi aada geadi bileangida akghwahit. Eara gichcha ayaaga adoayaadi geadi, ghana shageeda, ghana lappiya.
41006009	Gwayeeshsha, oallaabwa geekka ak ea adoalassi hang'weakka iyyeenya.”
41006010	Gabiikta gwayeeshsha, “Gheeda wassean jea ahitta ak ghwadeaptaneegwa oppiidana ea eaghus ea noang'ami hoowa.
41006011	Nea iyoahitti ng'eanyiida deeppa ea meadeaptaneegwa nea ghanyea mealeyseegwa eara iit, iyoabeawi ng'eang'da nyaawa alalakta birjeanda geeshangeagwa. Abeeda gajea gibuhanda nyaawa gil.”
41006012	Hean ghang'eatng'eat giijasoodiga gaweay. Gwarukkwiisa buuneeda gideaba, Adukkuunana ng'asheega munyas bea ring'eeda.
41006013	Ng'atta goruutta meangeenda saang'a, ak ghwayeasha fuga miyeani nagheeda ak gaheaba.
41006014	Hean imuchchu eara sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode aninyas iitta ng'asheega sina. Abeeda Yeesu nigeawiit iitta muuchchi. Gwanda fugeena, “Niih gwaduudu Yohaaneeda ghayi abattisachchi, ak ghoaw uuri ghamneawa sinna ng'asheesuun.”
41006015	buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayi, “Niih gwadeppea Eliya gil. Nea mwaatkwa gwayi, Niih gwadeppea sibaneeda. Anda gawuurji siyagi bea sibanga ghayi bea garayi.”
41006016	Nyas iitta Heroode gwayeena, “Niih ghamneawa niduudu Yohaaneeda ghayi alaji gheatta.”
41006017	Ghayi abeeda eaweechcha gojeakta Heroode shirikkareadaannyi ghoang'ng'waay Yohaana ak gwajaksa ghealooniga, aba ng'asheespa gatmooni suguura Herodiya ghayi geena oorjeeda gennyea Heroode suguura Filippo. Ghayi abeeda Heroode ghaghi gatmooni bea oorjeeda ghamwadiin.
41006018	Nea ghayi abeeda ea niyeeshsha Yohaana Heroode, “Mammiseey gheana gatmooda oorjeeda geamadu.”
41006019	Hean ghwasit Herodiya muuchchi Yohaana ea gidabal gwanuus. Geaghus gideaba mwoammu.
41006020	Heroode niny ghoawal gheang'da Yohaana. Aba gideaba ghwanal beadi Yohaana siida doabiwaat biissa ea ghaydit gil. Inyeessa Heroode gafur Yohaana nea ghabwariiy goleeysiit girgweageadaannyi ak iissa ghwanung' gwasawana jeadaannyi.
41006021	Eaweechcha ghwanyas gheatta Herodiya, eaweetta sineewa Heroode ghwelmeeda damanda ghayi sijiila. Gaguursa fuga hees ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida, ea fuga hees bea shirikkara ea fuga hees mida mwadi bea ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
41006022	Iiduw ghwahidu Hudeaba Herodiya ak ghang'atta gawa madeeda Heroode ea rabastannyi ak ghang'was muuchchi ea gahoosa jeesinga buuneeda. Iiduw gwayeeshsha Heroode hudida bea Herodiyahiin, “Ng'alaan gidigasayi was sean gaydagoonnyi.”
41006023	Ghwaak Sugoochcheanda habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'alaan gidigasayi wassean eara ng'eanyiini ahaghwiin ghammuuschi dalach bugusta deadeennyi ak geagoonnyeey.”
41006024	Iiduw gwaritta Hudida ak gaweesa ghaamwat ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Iyya gaydang'al naaha sugoochcheanda?” Ghwalamda ghaamwat ak gwayeeshsha, hudaannyi, “Eshshiina geagasayi uhuuda Yohaaneeda abattisachchi.”
41006025	Ghafwach Hudida ea ghwahitta heeda sugoochcheanda ak gwayeeshsha, “Geagasayi gonean uhuuda Yohaaneetta abattisachchiin nea ginung' eayiin jeeda harakta.”
41006026	Iiy Sugoochcheanda ng'asheanji gagiisan muuchchi. Apkaat habeawajeega ghwanyawa ak aba madeeda rabasta ghwaraay gichchea ghaheawaatta ng'asheenji.
41006027	Gojeakta shirikkarajeandaannyi furiisachchi nea gwayeeshsha. Ng'eada lamwaja uneanni uhuuda Yohaaneeda abattisachchi. Gawa shirikkarajeanda ea ghwanyasa Yohaana ghealooniga ama hitta ghwalach gheatta.
41006028	Gweanna shirikkarajeanda uhuuda Yohaana jeeda harakta ak ghoadaw hudeaba Herodiya ak ghoadaw ghaamwat.
41006029	Nyas iitteaba ng'asheesu Ginealanga Yohaana ghapka ama hidu gageanda musta Yohaana ak gaweay gabuy.
41006030	Muchchu ea nibiigu fuga ghayi ajeakta Yeesu was Ginealangaaschi, hidu ghoadaw Yeesu iitta ginnisin ea gidanaal buuneeda.
41006031	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena hichpa geat ak ghonyooh afuufa gili mwanang'.” Yeesu gwarukuta ng'asheanji idaah emeeda heeda maweayi suurja ghapka ea amwanung' ghwanyasa saawa eara gheatta agiischooda.
41006032	Iiduw Gaweay saawa nea gaba geat jeeda maleambooda nyaawa ak gosiipta gaweay hichpa geat.
41006033	Ghwadahaada fuga saang'a gidabeada ak geanal gideaba saawa gil. Gwasalda buuneeda gosheeda aba geeshanga ghwalach mujiinajeega sean ea ghwanyoaha ng'eanyi saawa.
41006034	Duughwahitta ghuutta basooda ghoang'wearda Yeesu ak ghwadaah emeettuw ak ghabwayda aba gideaba inyeessa buuneeda ea nuwuurji gisilga nyaah haghweadochchean. Hean gabiissa Yeesu ghoanaal ng'asheega saang'a.
41006035	Geeyi bwak ama niriikghta gamikta geyeeshsha Yeesu aba girrukusa ginealangaaschi, “Nukkwa ghamneawa nimikta nea geenda dareabeetta manda siih.
41006036	Siksiina buuneeda gaweay madameega ea gharang'weakka gwasheaysa geat gichchaghwaak.”
41006037	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Oattawa agooga buuneeda gichchaghwaak.” Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gajeweaya eashaaha mukkattajeega aba dinaarajia bughalaji iyyeenya akkeattawji ghwaagi?”
41006038	Gabiikta Yeesu ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi gondeawi mukkattaji hada? Aweayeana ong'ng'wersiina.” Weay gong'weersa gabiigu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba hiji gendeawi mukkattaji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya.”
41006039	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealanga anung' gobiitpiit buuneeda aba heeda mida nyeega nyawiiri nea ghoanung' gwasna gharmuchcheekka eatta fiih bughala ea gea eatta fiih haradam ea damanamughuush.
41006040	Hean Geanung' gobiitpiit buuneeda nea geanung' gwsna gharmuchcheekka eatta fiih bughala ea gea eatta fiih haradam ea damanamughuush.
41006041	Ngatta gageanu Yeesu mukkattajeekka ghwanyawa ammuudiin ea ghweayeekka ghwanyawa assiyyenyean ak gong'weersa humng'eeda ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta. Gageanu mukkattajeega ghwanyawa ak ghabwanajaada aba geattingaaschi ak ghoadaw ginealangaaschi gwalakkiisa buuneeda. Eara ghweayeega ghwanyawa assiyyeenya ghwanung' goguulli buuneessean.
41006042	Gweagiischi fugiga seaniin ea gwalang'u.
41006043	Hit agiischooda buuneeda gewweamu mukkattajeega abit ea ghweayeega abit ak ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.
41006044	Nea fuga sing'ng'attaawa mukkattajeega ghwanyawa ea sagalamnyooji muut, headiga akghwahit.
41006045	Deagheatta ghwanung' Yeesu gaweay ginealangaaschi jeeda maleambooda nea gwayeeshsha, oshsheeda oakghaawana basooda aweayeena hoowa bea ng'eanyiida Betsaydaan. Aniini gaghanyi dahuuydean daheelli emeeda.
41006046	Iiduw nea niheelli buuneeda gawa uhuumba heaya gamus Aseetta.
41006047	Ghoaw shing'ada nea maleambooda gwanda bugusta basooda nea Yeesu gaba geaw aba ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
41006048	Ang'wearda ghwadaah nea gwadeawiit ginealangaaschi aba manmanda maleambooda nea ghwaak milaada aba gideaba goyuuk maleambooda jeammeeda. Ghargayeew ghabeawa Yeesu badayda beega nea gaweesa ginealangaaschi mida jeeda maleambooda. Gawa nea gwahinda gili jea ghwasuut.
41006049	Hean sidaah nea ghabeawa badayda beega Goguul nea ghaghay gili daah malonghajeanda.
41006050	Sidaah ghang'ut sean muuwuda. Iiduw ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi abissiina ahawda! Siida aniini gil adoabealli!”
41006051	Gwading'da niny maleambooda ak ghahawuda jeammeeda. Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi saawa muuchchi.
41006052	Ghabeal muuchchi aba gideaba mwanala ng'asheega ghayi bea mukkatte. Nea gwasin hang'ooynachcheekka guroruunatka nyaawa.
41006053	Ng'atta nea gogeawusa ng'eanyiida Genasareetti, ghwanung' goduuw maleambooda nyaawa aba ghuutta basooda.
41006054	Hitta nea ghwararang'aana jeeda maleambooda gabay ghwadaah buuneeda ak geanal.
41006055	Gwasalda buuneeda gaweay gealga ak gwasareenu fuga miyeani siyeattuuna muuchka nyaawa eayaat heeda wassean siyiing'sa Yeesu.
41006056	Heeda laah Yeesu sean mida gharang'weakka ghanea mujiinajeega gil, ghanea madameega, inyeessa Geayiin fuga miyeani gheatta naweeda gawa ghwanyasa nea geeyeeshsha geat eara ghanyi ghawaap weleeda hang'daannyi gaygaheaba buuneeda. Ak ghoaw huumwa fuga waasa geat weleeda Yeesu gaheaba.
41007001	Ghapka fuga mwaatkwa was Farisaayajeega nea godeana ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi nea gwaleabu Yerusaleemu ama hidu goweameesa heeda mida Yeesu.
41007002	Hidu nea ghoang'wearda ghwadaah ginealanga mwaatkwa bea Yeesu gweagiischi nea meahuuna geattinga.
41007003	Aba gideaba fuga was Farisaayajeega ea fuga sean was emeeda Yahuudi inyeessa gwasinda ng'asheega gidaghayi ang'ng'wanyaanda fugeaba garayi; iissa ea mayghwaak gil nea meahuuna geattinga muuchchi.
41007004	Saawa mayghwaak gida leabu jarooda nea menyooghanyi ehhuun. Gwanda seareeda ghayi sing'ng'wanyaan inyeessa gehhuun gweerajeega, ea dahuunatka, ea bwakkurajeega gharinga.
41007005	Ghoanyaash Yeesu, fuga was Farisaayajeega sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi, “Ghwasaan anda ginealangaagu moang'ng'waanya ng'sheega ghayi bea fugeaba garayi? Eara iyagiischi ghwaakta geattinga mehhuuna?”
41007006	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga ammiittu geat! Niiw huumwa ramoraneeda ghayi rukutteawa. Isaya badahukkeagwa, ghayi gwayi Aseetta, ‘Fiisu gwasinnunean mureeda aba ghuusiga akghwahit, nea guroruunatka nyaawa easheagewean.
41007007	Earra gabattean ghanyea maygwaloossa gil. Aba gideaba goneali buuneeda humeannyeekka mawasa geasu was gea buuneeda.’
41007008	Agooga ghoanung'waadi digheanda Aseetta ak ghoang'ng'waanyi fughareenga buuneeda.”
41007009	Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga gowoschchi milmili. Ghoanalli amulsiina deaweedeeda Aseetta aba ng'asheegeangwa oang'ng'wanyaannyi.
41007010	Ghayi gwayeeshsheegwa Muusa, ‘Sissiina gweanu ea geamadu mureeda.’ Nea, ‘Siida imwaashta ghwaan ghana ghaamwat gagasa ghami.’
41007011	Ghoayamnyi Agooga ak goyeeshshi, ‘Siida imideawa gili ghwanyawa jea ghoadaw ghwaan ghana ghaamwat, amaduw gwayi gili Gorbani.b
41007012	Abeeda siisi gajeaninyas gidajeagamulsiinda weetta ghwaan ghana weetta ghaamwat.’
41007013	Niih ghamneawa Gidofooldi ng'asheanda Aseetta gil, aba ginealshoodeang'wa oang'ng'wanyaadi. Nea goosnayi eara ng'asheega saang'a uurji suuh.”
41007014	Ghabwadageat Yeesu emeeda ama hit gwayeeshsha, “Oalleaydiit oagasean ak gojeeng'u.
41007015	Manda gichchea gawa jeessiida leabu jarooda, jea ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda. Amadukku ng'asheanda leabu jeessiida ea gea ng'utta siida ririnnyeanda gil.” [
41007016	Siida agar iitta adayiinya ng'asheesu.]
41007017	Iiduw nea gwaheelli emeeda nea gawa jeeda ghoriida ghoanyaash Ginealangaaschi ng'asheega gwachchi galla geadiin.
41007018	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Asseara agooga moanali? Moanali gideaba gidawea jeessiida leabu jarooda, mwoammu ghang'uda siida ririnnyeanda,
41007019	Aba gideaba mawa jeeda gurorooda, gawa jeeda siyeakkiisa hamitta. Amaduw gwaritta jarooda.” (Aba sareani Yeesu gohiimsa buuneeda gideaba hamichchoojiga sean ghwadoabiiw.)
41007020	Gabiikta Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Siida geaghus ghang'uda ririnnyeanda ng'asheega munyas leabu jeadaannyi.
41007021	Aba gideaba ng'asheega leappu jessiida gwaleabu jeeda guroroadaannyi nea giikka munyasiini gil, nea hiseadayeandumeeda,
41007022	Ea gwadishta, ea nuusta buuneeda, mealuleega, shidoodeaba ghaang', munyinda, lachng'eanyiida, ririnynyeanda, geawunda gheang'da, ging'weakka, ghwarjeeda ea lendeeda.
41007023	Ng'asheesu munyas seaniin gwaleappu jiih ak gang'utta fiih ririnnyeanda.”
41007024	Ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa, ak gawa ng'eanyiida Diro. Aba hoowa iiduw gawa jeemba ghoah nea magassa ghwanal siih amaduw ghwaraay ghafuy geaw.
41007025	Abeeda gwanda gatmooni mida jeebi ittaannyi bea haweega beardooschi meang'nyeandeenda, nea aninyas iitta Yeesu, ghwaan ama hidu gobedeaysa madeadaannyi.
41007026	Gatmooni abeeda gaba emoojiga. Gaba ng'eanyiida Foynikkeeda mida jeeda Sirya. Hidu gatmooni gwayeeshsha Yeesu, Eaniyean nung' gwaritteaysa hudeanyu meang'nyeandeenda.
41007027	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ameasa ghanyi gwalang'u diibiga, mwadoabiiwa gideaba gegeanu hamitta diibiga ak geejaksa gudajeega.”
41007028	Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida, “Ea Siida mureeda, eara gudajeega inyeessa goliim murmurga abuutpuut diibiga iyagiischi.”
41007029	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aba ng'asheanji ghamneawa irguun, una ghoah hudaang'u niritteaysa meang'nyeandeenda!”
41007030	Gawa Gatmoodida ghoah ama hitta ghwadaah hudaannyi gawiilgeaw aba bulaliida nea niritteaysa meang'nyeandeenda.
41007031	Ghang'eat Yeesu gawa ghang'amwa ng'eanyiida Diro. Gawa ak gwasik ng'eanyiida Sidooni, ak ghwahitta Basooda siyi Galilaaya, nea gwasik mujiinajeega attamanamughuush suguura Dekapooli.
41007032	Ghwahidu heeda Yeesu fiisu eattu siisi miiy bissa ea manda ghuutta. Sihhiidu geyeeshsha Yeesu, aniyean mwasa ang'ng'waanya uhuudeaba siisi.
41007033	Gageanu Yeesu siidida ak gorutteawa jeeda emeeda. Hit gageanu ak ghoabuutta mooringaaschi jeesinga iidiga, gang'ushsha nea gageanu ak ghwasat ng'ushapta.
41007034	Hean gong'weersa Yeesu humng'eeda, amahit gosiima, ak gwayeeshsha siida ghwanyawa miyaan, “Efwatta!” Nea gideaba, “Jaadana.”
41007035	Hean gabiissa ghwajaada idigeaba siidida ak goottina ng'ushapta, ak eara ghuttaannyi gabiissa ghoammu gabalool.
41007036	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu buuneeda, ng'asheesu easinnyiin adiiduw ghoanung' ghwayiiy eara siida. Nea iissa gidaheawaatta gideaba adoorukuti ada ghoaraanya buuneeda rukutteayda.
41007037	Ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda muuchchi nea gwayi, “Gwasin ng'asheega sean nea ghoadoabiiw, ghwanung' gwayiing'shi fuga miinyi nea eara gea manda ghuusiga gabalool!”
41008001	Iiduw ghabwat geat emeettuw gichcha, ea ghwasang'ayiit. Abeeda fiisu mandeawana gichchaghwaak. Hean gaguursa Yeesu ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha,
41008002	“Aniini ghabwaydi fiisu aba gideaba neandeayeesi hiji nea ghamneawa ea eawetteaba samwagu gil, nea mighwanyas gilak.
41008003	Iyeasiksi gaweay ghoah nea ghwaat jalooda gwanda gea jea gohiili aba naweeda, aba gideaba jeani gwanda fuga leabu heshsheagi.”
41008004	Geyeeshsha Yeesu aba girrukusa Ginealangaaschi, “Ghamneawa mukkattajeega jea goolang'u fiisu denuun gajegeannana yeenu aba dareabeedi.”
41008005	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Gondeawi mukkattaji hada aba hiji?” Gwayeeshsha Ginealanga, “Aba hiji gendeawi mukkattaji ispwa.”
41008006	Hean ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, anung' gobiitpiit buuneeda aba ng'eanyi. Hit gageanu Yeesu mukkattajeegiga ghwanyawa assispwaan ak ghanyi ghamwaash Aseetta. Gageanu ak gwalakkiisa ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, oattawaada buuneeda. Ghoadaw Ginealanga buuneeda mukkattajeegiga.
41008007	Abeeda gwanda eara ghweayeesu ng'ay. Gageanu Yeesu ak ghamwaash Aseetta earaba ghweayeesu ama hit ghoadaw ginealanga nea gwayeeshsha, oattawa buuneeda.
41008008	Gweagiischi fugiga seaniin ea gwalang'u. Hit agiischooda buuneeda nea gewweamu lajanga abit ghwannyiit soscheew ispwa.
41008009	Nea monneeda fuga ghwanyawa sing'ng'aatta ea sagalamnyooji ang'wan. Hit agiischooda gwasiksa Yeesu buuneeda gaweay.
41008010	Deagheatta gawa Yeesu jeeda maleambooda nea godeayi ginealangaaschi ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Dalmanuutta.
41008011	Ghapka fuga was Farisaayajeega heeda Yeesu ak gwasheang'nyi sea Yeesu. Nea abeeda geegasa eaghas aba jeeda baloaldaannyi, geegasa gwasin gwadeagooda jea ghoahiimu gideaba niny huumwa gil gojeagu Aseetta.
41008012	Gagiisan Yeesu aba guroroadaannyi aba ng'asheanji ak gwayi, “Anda fiisu bea seaygeaniin gagassiidunu gwadeagooda? Adiiduw. Aba huumwa fiisu bea seaygeaniin mwajeattaw gwadeagooda.”
41008013	Ghang'eat Yeesu ghang'amwa ng'eang'da nyaawa. Gwading'da maleambooda ak gawa ea ghoaghaawa basooda.
41008014	Abeeda Ginealanga Yeesu niroossa eaditta mukkattajeega deayeat, abeeda aba jeeda maleambooda gwandeawa mukkattajanjagi akghwahit.
41008015	Iiduw gwareekusa Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ashageada mattawanda Farisaayajeega ea dea Heroode.”
41008016	Iiy Ginealanga ng'asheesu gabiissa gwasheang'nyi sean nea gwayi, “Niih ghamneawa ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba mekkari mukkatte aba hiji.”
41008017	Gabaygwajeeng'u Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga gosheang'nyeesi ng'asheega nyootta mukkatte? Asseara giloanalli ghana gili ojeeng'u mandana? Eara ihengeagwa mwariishta?
41008018	Assagooga gondeawi gheanyanga ak ea mwoang'ng'weardani? Gondeawi iidiga ak ea mwoayiinyani gili? Ammwoapkaadi eara gidaghayi
41008019	eaweeda ghayi ealakkisiini mukkattaji muut fuga ghayi as sagalamnyooji muudi? Heappi isiwweamu lajanga ghwannyiit soscheew hada?” Geyeeshsha, “Ghwannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.”
41008020	“Ama mukkattajeega ghayi abwanajaadi assispwa ak ghwaak fiih sagalamnyooji ang'wan, iiduw nea gowweamu lajanga abit ghwannyiit soscheew hada?” Geyeeshsha, “Ispwa.”
41008021	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ak ea miyajeeng'ni?”
41008022	Ghwahitta Yeesu ng'eanyiida Betsayda nea godeayi ginealangaaschi. Hean gweadu buuneeda siisi ng'oaw ak geemus Yeesu gideaba waasana geattingaagu.
41008023	Ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu geattingeaba siitta ng'oawiin, gorutteawa jeeda ghooriida, ak gang'ushsha gheanyanga aba ng'usheega, ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi gimmuusi daaha gili?”
41008024	Ng'atta ghoang'wearda Siidida ng'oawiin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghadaayi buuneeda ak gawuurji geediga nea gawelweel.”
41008025	Gabiikta Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay gheanyangeaba siidida. Hean ghoang'wearda siidida muuchchi. Gabiikta ghanyangaaschi ghoang'wearda. Ghwadaah halanjeassean mahophopsiina eara gil.
41008026	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu siidida, “Asi una ghoah nea adiski hoowa bea gharang'dean.”
41008027	Gawa Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi nea gaweay hoowa bea gharang'weakka Gaysariyayda Filippiin. Duuw gwanda naweeda, ghoanyaash Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi buuneeda ibalool gwayeena geawoschi ng'eaha?”
41008028	Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “ buuneeda mwaatkwa gwayeena guwosi Yohaaneedida abattisachchiin, nea mwaatkwa gwayeena guwosi Eliya nea mwaatkwa gwayi gwadeeppa wosa siyagi aba jeeda sibanga ghayi bea garayi.”
41008029	Hean ghwalamda Yeesu ak ghoanyaash saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Ama agooga goyeennyi geawoschi ng'eaha?” Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristo.”
41008030	Gwareekusa Yeesu saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw goorukusi siih iitteanyu.”
41008031	Gabiissa hean goneali Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gayghwanyas sawanadeeda haw muuchchi nea gayghaheawa gweargwa, ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diini. Gaygwanuus ama ng'atta eawooji samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
41008032	Ng'asheesu gwarukuta Yeesu muuchchi nea mwafnya eara gil. Hean ghwaat Betro Yeesu hichpa geaw ak gowoowsa.
41008033	Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu gong'weersa ginealangaaschi ama hit gowoowsa Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'amwana madedeanyu ang'iing'i guwosi Shattaani! Ng'asheesu bea jeeda uhuudang'uun ghanyea maleapna heeda Aseetta. Suuh ng'asheega uhuuda siida gil.”
41008034	Gaguursa Yeesu emeettuw sang'aan ea ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Siida wassean igasa gweadu geeshteanyu, ea adaghwarar geaw, geaghus gageanu behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
41008035	Aba gideaba siida gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygabeagu, amaduw siida beagu aweagaaschi appadaydeanyu ea badayda Giijasta miy gayghoaghu.
41008036	Heappi ghamneawa siida eara ghwanyas halanjeassean bea muunda ng'eanyiida gaygwaloossa naaha, ihutteawi aweagaaschi?
41008037	Ama siida gayghoadayda naaha jea ghoalaaja aweagaaschi?
41008038	Siida wassean aba seaygeani bea ring'eeda biissa ea meawalla Aseettean, siida isinnean gheanyanga ea ng'asheegeasu, abeeda Balleanda Siida gaygwasissa gheanyanga siidida, damanda jea ghwaana nea nighambiit ghwaan sea giijasoodiga ghaydidi bea humng'eeda.”
41009001	Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba aba jeani hiji gwanda fuga maygameewa ea eaghus anidaah gheambalmeeda Aseetta gidahittaayda nea gweadu uurda.”
41009002	Ing'atta eawooji lah, ghwaat Yeesu Betro ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana uhuumba gijeeni geaw nea gaba geat. Iiduw aba hoowa ghwayamwa deaktaannyi ammadeannyaawa,
41009003	ak eara hang'waakkaaschi gaweriidi muuchchi. Eara aba jeeda ng'eanyiissean ghanyeamanda siida ammu gohuun hang'weakka ea gawerittiidunu.
41009004	Deagheatta geadaah Eliya ea Muusa nea gabalool sea Yeesu.
41009005	Gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, ea, “Ginealshoochcheanda, amiy muuchchi gideaba geendi hiji. Anda meesni ghooraji samwagu aba hiji. Ghoriida mabeanyi ang'iing'i niirja gaba Muusa, nea niirja gaba Eliya.”
41009006	Abeeda Betro ea oorjooga ghwanyawa anung'ut muuwda ea ghwaroot eara gichchea gwargu.
41009007	Miighoaw gil ea nuhoonu shamoghooda ak gwadukuta. Ghwanya ghuutta Siida nyaasha jeeda shamoghooda nea gwayi, “Niih Jeepteanyu abwariinyi olleysiiniit.”
41009008	Miighoaw gil ghoang'wearda Ginealanga gichcha, ak amwadaaha siinuut geaghus Yeesu akghwahit ea saawa.
41009009	Iiduw nea ghwararang'aadawa gijeeda gwayeeshsha Yeesu, asi adiiduw goorukusi siih ng'asheega ghwanyawa oadayiin ea eaghus ea nuduunna miyeeda Balleanda Siida.
41009010	Ng'atta Ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheanji, amaduw gwasheang'nyi Saawa nea gwayi gwadeaschi naaha ng'asheanji bea dunnooda miyeedean.
41009011	Iiduw Geannyaash Yeesu nea geyeeshsha, “Anda gwayeena ginealshoodiga diini gayghanyi goshoohu Eliya?”
41009012	Gwayeeshsha, ada huumwa, “Eliya gayghanyi goshoohu ghwaan gwasissin halanjeassean. Eara gwasa, ghwasaan anda geang'waar aba jeeda Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit gideaba, Balleanda Siida gayghwanyas hang'weanidooda muuchchi nea gefool?
41009013	Geayeeshshineegwa, Eliya ada nihidu, ak gwasma buuneeda gidagassiida saawa, gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda appadaydaannyi.”
41009014	Gaweay ama hitta heeda ginealanga suurja ghwadaah emeetuw nibattiisa geat hoowa, nea gwasheang'dooschi sea ginealshoodiga mwaatkwa bea diineeda Yahuudi.
41009015	Daah buuneeda Yeesu ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi. Gwasalda gaweay roonnyeeda Yeesu ak gogeachchi.
41009016	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Ghwanyawa gosheang'nyeesi naaha ooga fiisu?”
41009017	Deagheatta gwarinna Sih jeeda emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, heetta geyeadu headaang'u balleanji itteanyu beardooschi meang'nyeandeenda nea iissa ghwanung' ghwaroat eara ghuutta.
41009018	Inyeessa ibalaksa meang'nyeandeenda gwajaksa ng'eanyi nea gabaru ghuutta furghwajeega nea gowiiri geeshatka nea ghabwarghanda. Iyeayeeshshi ginealangaagu orruutta meang'nyeandeenda ghwaraay.”
41009019	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Anda agooga gowoschi seaygeeda mandeawana masaweega! Assagooga gaydeabiita heedeang'wa ea ghoaw eeju? Gaydabattiseegwa ea ghoaw eeju? Heappi ayeanni hedeanyu.”
41009020	Geyeadu balleandida heeda Yeesu. Daah Meang'nyeandeenda Yeesu ghwanung' ghoahiil balleanda ak gobedeaysa ng'eanyi ak goberbeershi nea gabaru ghuutta furghwajeega. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghweanda balleanda,
41009021	“Miyeanji gaba eeju?” Gwayeeshsha Siidida, “Ghang'eada jeepcheandumeadaannyi.
41009022	Nea iissa gwajaksa Meang'nyeandeenda jeeda beasta ea jeeda beega, nea gagasa nuusta. Asi immuusi, Gibwaydaneasa ak guweachcheasa!”
41009023	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwayi immuusi gili! Aba siida mideawa masaweega manda gichchea gwadilna.”
41009024	Gojuur Siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Asi geandeawi masaweesu miih aw nea giheannean.”
41009025	Daah Yeesu gidawamwaanda emeettuw madeadaannyi gabiissa gojuursa meang'nyeandeenda nea gwayeeshsha, “Meang'nyeandeenda inung' ghwaroat ghuutteaba jeebi nea ghaminyiit, geayi ritteawana saseedeaba jeebi nea adiiduw gudubiiksiina gichcha!”
41009026	Gojuur Meang'nyeandeenda nea gwajaksa balleanda ng'eanyi ak gwaritteaysa. Iisung'ula balleanda aba ng'eanyi ea nuwuurji musta ea gwayeena buuneessean, “Nimi!”
41009027	Gageanu Yeesu ak ghoang'ng'waay geattinda balleanda ak gagatgat. Hean ghang'eat ghaminaada.
41009028	Iiduw nea nuwa Yeesu gah, gaweay headaannyi ginealanga nea gaba geat ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda ghwanyawa aseasa gearaanyi errutta?”
41009029	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Meang'nyeanji bea endean gaba giikka ama jea gwaritta geaghus eamwaash Aseettean gil.”
41009030	Gawa Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi, Gaweay nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida Galilaaya. Abeeda Yeesu niny magassa ghwanal buuneeda heeda mida.
41009031	Nea niih abeeda gwasin gideaba niny iyanaal ginealangaaschi gwayeenniisa, “Balleanda Siida gajeenung' goobissa geattinga buuneeda jea ghabwar ghami. Nea ing'atta eawooji samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
41009032	Abeeda Ginealanga mwanala ng'asheanji ak ghoawal ghoanyaash.
41009033	Ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu. Iiduw nea nuweay jeeda gheeda ghoanyaash Yeesu ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwanyawa aba naweeda gosheang'nyeesi naaha?”
41009034	Ghwasiinda Saawa, aba gideaba gwachchi nea gwanda naweeda gwasheang'nyeesa gideaba ahaw ng'eaha aba jeannyaawa.
41009035	Hean iiduw gawa Yeesu goopteada ak gaguursa ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya. Gwayeeshsha, “Siida gasa ghang'atta madeedeaba suurja dayiina geaw ng'eanyi ea gahuuydeana buuneessean ea ghoaw siida gadiyeesa buuneessean.”
41009036	Gaguursa jeebi mwanang' ak ghwanung' ghaminaada aba madeannyaawa. Gageanu ak gabeashsa geattingaaschi gheatta jeepta ak gwayeeshsha,
41009037	“Siida deapta jeepta uurji niih aba gheawungeasu, ghwadeaptanaan aniini. Nuut siida deaptanaan aniini mwadeaptanaan aniini akghwahit, ghwadeapta eara siida ajeaknean.”
41009038	Gwayeeshsha Yohaana Yeesu, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, sidaayi siida aruttiida meangeeniga aba gheawungaagu. Geyeeshshi nung'waada aba gideaba siidida mabwaheasa.”
41009039	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Adagudochchuursi, manda siida jea gwasin deamdeamanga sunu nea gwasna gheawungeasu amaduw gwasheamu gwarukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas.
41009040	Aba gideaba siida mwahasheasa siisi gaba meatkwedeanya.
41009041	Ama siida wassean jea gagoonaneegwa beega jea aleaha gideaba gowoschi fuga Gristo siisi aba huumwa eara niny majaghanyi amwanyasa gimeardaannyi.”
41009042	“Siida wassean jea ghwanung' ghwaramwasta siyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu manang'i mwasaniin ak ghwanung' gwasin ring'eeda, siisi abeeda ghang'wana gegeanu lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak geerassa gheattannyi ama hit geejaksa jeeda basooda.
41009043	Iinung' geattindaang'u, adiinya gilaji! Ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega nea gibeahi gattinagi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geattinga sean ak guwi jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda. [
41009044	Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa, ea beasta mammissa.]
41009045	Eara geashtaang'u iyaschoardaneey ghang'wana gilaji. Ghang'wana ginyasi eaweega eara beaha geashagi, mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi geashangaagu duwaaw amaduw geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda. [
41009046	Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa, ea beasta mamissa.]
41009047	Eara gheang'daang'u iyaschoardaneey, ghang'wana giloodu! Ghang'wana guwi jeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta nea gibeahi ghaang'agi. Mwasamwa gideaba gindeawi gheanyangaagu duwaaw amaduw geejakseey jeeda beasta manda mudeanooda.
41009048	Aba hoowa gwanda ghughuutka mameewwa ea beasta mamissa.
41009049	Gaygaba siisi simmiinna beasta.
41009050	Balang'da gida miy gil. Amaduw balang'da inuhutta samneadaannyi gaygudu esma naaha? Gagasa ahuuwa balang'da aba jeedeang'wa nea gobeayi hoyyooh nea gororoochchi.”
41010001	Hean ghabeawa Yeesu hoowa ak gawa ea gawa ng'eanyiida Yudeeya, ea ghwahitta gigheawda eenda suguura Yordaani. Goreemsa emeettuw headaannyi gichcha. Hean gabiissa goneali buuneeda ng'asheega gichcha gawuurji gideasuju sina.
41010002	Ng'atta gaweay fuga Farisaayo heeda Yeesu ak gwasim nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gayghwanung' siida gatmoadaannyi?”
41010003	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Deawedeeda ghayi goneegwa Muusa anneeda gil?”
41010004	Gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Muusa ada ghayi gagoaneasa gheatta nea gwayi siida dang'waara barawajeanda jea ghwanung'wa gatmoadaannyi.”
41010005	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Muusa niny ghayi gagooneegwa gheadi nea gweagu hang'ooynachcheekka jeesingeagwa.
41010006	Nea aba gidaghayi subwatta ng'eanyiida, gwasin Aseetta ng'edeeda ea gatmooda.
41010007	Asi aba dascheani Siida gaygwaheelli ghwaan ea ghaamwat ak gaygodeayi sea gatmoadaannyi,
41010008	Fiisu assiyyenyean gayghoaw siyagi. Asi fiisu mudea fiih iyyeenya gil niiw siyagi.
41010009	Asi fuga niroochchi Aseetta adagoheelli siih.”
41010010	Iiduw nea gabiikta gichcha gah ghoanyaash Ginealanga itteaba ng'asheanji.
41010011	Ghwalamda Niny ak gwayeeshsha, “ Siida nung'usa heeda gatmoadaannyi ak ghaghi nuut godiiysa gatmoadaannyi aba mealuleega.
41010012	Gwasnu eara Gatmooda nung'wa heeda siyeadaannyi ak gawa gheemba siinuut gatmoani gamealuul.”
41010013	Muchchu gweadu buuneeda diibiga manang'i heeda Yeesu ghoang'ng'waay iheenga, ak gowoowusa Ginealanga buuneeda.
41010014	Daah Yeesu gissin ginealangaaschi gwanyareeksa ak gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada diibiga ghapka hedeanyu adoakghuumnyi, aba gideaba Gheambalmeeda Aseetta gammiisa fuga uurji suuh.
41010015	Aba huumwa Gearukuneegwa gideaba siida mwamwastta ng'asheega Aseetta jeepta mwanang' siisi maygawa jeedeaba Gheambalmeani.”
41010016	Iiduw Ghwadeapta diibiga ak gabeashsa geattingaaschi ak ghoang'ng'wanyaada iheenga, ak ghoadawaada ghawooda.
41010017	Ng'eat Yeesu nea gaygawa bareannyeakkaaschi, gafaju siih ama hidu gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda waam, akkaydasin naaha ijadanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda?”
41010018	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghwasaan inyas gigurewean siida Waam? Siida waam geaghus Aseetta.
41010019	Digheannyeekka ginali, ‘Adimealuuli, adinuusi siida, adijagwadiischi, adinabayi ng'uyyeega, adireenganayi siida, sisiina mureeda gweanu ea geamadu.'"
41010020	Gwayeeshsha Siidida, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, digheannyeeksu miighanyi danaawa eara ghayi aba jeepcheandumedeanyu”
41010021	Hean gong'weersa Yeesu siidida nea nubwariiy ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwashoadeaweey gilagi, una akkishaaydi halanjeadaang'u indeawi sean amahit gigeanu lappiyeedida ak gidawaadi fuga barbari. Abeeda gaynyasa baruureega aba humng'eeda. Hit ginyuunyi eanni geeshtteanyu.”
41010022	Iiy Siidida ng'asheanji gafu duwunda ak ghang'eat gawa nea nigiisan, nea gwasin gideaba abeeda siidida meanang'ochcheanda gil.
41010023	Ghwasach ghaat Yeesu gang'ula ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa ghoanalli gidahang'waayda beatta jea gaweay meanang'oodiga jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta!”
41010024	Iiy Ginealanga ng'asheanji ghahamng'eanyi. Nea Yeesu niny gabiikta ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea diibigeasu ghamneawa ghoanalli gidahang'waayda beatta jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
41010025	Beatta jea gawa meanang'ochcheanda jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta ahang'waay ea ghang'wana eara beatta jea gwasik nngamiya gheang'da sidageeda.”
41010026	Aba dascheani ghahamng'eanyi ginealanga muuchchi. Gonyeari geat nea gwayi! “Abeeda iisunu gwanda siichchea ghaghu?”
41010027	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa nea gang'ula gheanyanga nyaawa, “Huumwa gil aba siida mwadaagha ng'asheanji maygwaroochchi. Nea aba Aseetta niih ea miigili. Aseetta manda gichchea gwadilna.”
41010028	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ama aseasa? Ang'wearda sinung'wi heeda haleanjeedeanya sean ak geyeadu geashtaang'u!”
41010029	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeshshineegwa, Siida wassean nung'usa heeda gheeda, ghana oorjooga ghaamwat ghana haweega ghaamwat, ghana ghaamwat, ghana ghwaan, ghana diibiga, ghana madameega appadaydeanyu ea Giijasta miy,
41010030	aba damani bea ghamneawean, gajeattaw niba bughala, ea ghwanaawa damani bea ghamneawean gheeda, ea oorjooga ghaamwat, haweega ghaamwat, ghaamwat, diibiga, ea madameega ea sawanadeeda ama damanda jea ghwahidu gayghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
41010031	Amaduw fuga saang'a mida madedeaba suurja, gaygahuydeana sean. Nea fuga saang'a huydeanayyi, imuchchu gayghoaw fugeaba mwadi.”
41010032	Abeeda nea gwanda naweeda Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi nea gagal Yerusaleemu, nea abeeda gosheedeawa Yeesu saawa. Ghang'ut ginealangaaschi muuwda nea eara fuga aat geeshta anung'ut muuwda. Ghwasach Yeesu gichcha fukka attamaniyyeenya was ginealangaaschiin, ak gabiissa gwarukusa ng'asheega jea ghwanyas.
41010033	Gwayeeshsha, “Heappi oalleaydiit! Ghamneawa Geweayi Yerusaleemu. Nea aba hoowa Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi. Fiisu gayghoahaakta enuus ak geayiin geattinga fuga emoojiga.
41010034	Ak gaygwajuuga, nea gong'urriisa ng'usheega nea geabwar aba mughoowooda ak gwanuus. Amaduw eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
41010035	Hean gaweay geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana was oorjooga Sebedaayo ama hitta heeda Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, gwanda gili sigasayi emuseey.”
41010036	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dasinneegwa naaha?”
41010037	Ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyean nung' goobiida siyagi meatkweadaang'u bea geattinda dugwa, nea goobiida niirja meatkweadaang'u bea geattinda ghadaam eaweetta sikghambidaneey.”
41010038	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga eara gidaghamneawa oomuschi moanali! Heappi ghoammuuschi aleayda bayokteanyu bea sawanadeeda? Ama gibattiisandida jea eppattisanan aniini agooga gajeeppattisaneegwa?”
41010039	Gwayeeshsha Saawa Yeesu, “Ea geammuuschi.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Huumwa gil bayookta jea daleayda eara agooga ghoammuschi gideaba gajaleayda eara gibattisandida jea eppattisananiin gajeeppattisananeegwa eara agooga.
41010040	Ak gajea ng'eaha siida jea goobiida meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa, ghana meatkwedeanyu bea geattinda ghadaam. Niih mii gadiyeedeanyu jea dasin gil, geaghus eattaw fuga ghayi bay gwararsa Aseetta.”
41010041	Iiy Ginealanga suurja attamanamughuush gwanyareesi idaah gissin Yakkobo ea Yohaana.
41010042	Gaguursa Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghoanalli gideaba fukka sighay gili sugoodiga emoojigeani iissa ghoahaghwiida fuga nyaawa uurda, nea fiisu hesiin iissa goombala fuga nyaawa gharbeeda.
41010043	Duukku agooga ea miih gichchea awurjeewana. Aba siida gasa hawunda aba jeedeang'wa doawa siideang'wa bea gadiyeeda.
41010044	Siida gasa ghang'atta mwadi gayghoaw soomjeanda buuneessean.
41010045	Aba gideaba Balleanda Siida ghayi mwoani egadiyeesa. Ghayi ghwaan Niny gagadiyeesa buuneeda nea ghwaan gabeagu eaweegaaschi aba gittinnooda fuga saang'a.”
41010046	Geahitta mujiineeda suguura Yerikko, iiduw ghang'eet Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi ghabeawa hoowa nea godeayi emeettuw. Geanyasa gheatta naweeda siisi ng'oaw musiisachchi suguura Bartimayo was oorjeeda Dimaayo.
41010047	Hean iiy gideaba ghang'atta Yeesuuydida leabu Nasareettiin gabiissa Gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Yeesu Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan!”
41010048	Gojuursa fukka sang'aan nea geyeeshsha, siinda, sirukusa ghoaraanya gijureanda muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan.”
41010049	Hean gawus Yeesu ghaminaada ak gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Agursiina.” Hean geguursa siidida ng'oawiin nea geyeeshsha, “Ammiinni uhuudaang'u ng'eada ak guwi gaguuru.”
41010050	Gwajaksa ng'eanyi hang'daannyi. Gotkweal ak gawa ea gawa heeda Yeesu.
41010051	Ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi dasinneey naaha?” Gwayeeshsha Siitta ng'oawiin, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, aniini geagasayi dabiikta dang'wearda.”
41010052	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Una, ang'iing'i nihaapnyi masaweagaagu.” Miighoaw gil gabiikta gichcha Siidida ng'oawiin ghoang'wearda ghang'eat ak ghoang'ng'waay naweeda ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
41011001	Iiduw nea gwanekkiissa Yerusaleemu, ghwahitta mujiinajeega Betfaage ea Beettaniya nekkeewa gijeeda mida geediga suguura Masaytunajeega. Gageanu Yeesu ginealan iyyeenya aba jeeda ginealangaaschi ak gojeakta gosheeda.
41011002	Nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta gharang'dida mida mwadiin. Iyoahitti gajanyasana hoowa digeeda migwaheedu ghayi eara ginealda miyeannaal. Gajadaaha nea radaat ak goottinnyi, ak gorjeanu.
41011003	Ideeppa ghoanyasheagwa buuneeda gideaba ghwasaan andagottinnyi goyeeshshi gagasa, ‘Ng'uttamiida nea gaygabay godeelu.'"
41011004	Gaweay fugiga ak ghwanyasa ghuutta naweeda digeeni sirassa geetta dooshta. Hitta nea goottinu
41011005	ghwadaah fiisu ghwanyawa mida ghuutta naweeda ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Digeeni goottissi naaha?”
41011006	Gwarukuta ginealanga ng'asheega sean ghwanyawa rukusa Yeesu. Geesiksa ghoarjaanda.
41011007	Gearjaanda digeeda ea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu. Gegeanu hang'weakka ak geayiin badayda digeeda amahit gwading'da Yeesu badayda ak goopteadawa.
41011008	Gageanu fukka saang'aan ak ghoabwarghaan hang'weakka nyaawa aba naweeda, nea buuneeda suurja gaweay jeesinga madameega gwalagu seenga geediga ak ghoabwarghaan aba jeeda naweadaannyi.
41011009	Gwasim buuneeda gaweay nea heeda measheedeawana Yeesu suurja gahuuydeana nea gwayi sean, “Oakghambiida Aseetta! Sibadischeesa siisi wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamidean!
41011010	Sibadischooweey ea gheambalmeeda sugoochcheanda ghayi was ghweandeanya siyi Dawdi. Oakghambiida Aseetta mida humng'eeda.”
41011011	Ghwahitta Yeesu mujiineeda Yerusaleemu ak gawa jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta. Hitta ghoang'wearda gwasikteawa haleanjeessean. Iiduw ghwadaah niiw shing'ada. Ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiida Beettaniya nea godeayi ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya.
41011012	Muchchu nea gwanda naweeda gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Beettaniya ghwayeachchi Yeesu.
41011013	Ang'wearda ghwadaah shabogheechcheanda nea gudeasheagi nea gwandeawa seenga saang'a. Gaweesa ghwadaah eajeaghwanyasa haghweega. Hitta heeda nea gwasikteawa ghwadaah geaghus seenga nea gwasin gideaba miighwahitta damanda jea gwalakna haghweega.
41011014	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu mtineedida, “Maygudughwaganeey siih haghweega ea ghoaw gweanynyeekka manda mudeanooda.” Gwarukuta ng'asheandida nea abeeda ghwayiiy ginealangaaschi.
41011015	Ghwahitta Yeesu Yerusaleemu ak gawa jeeda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta, ak goruutta jarooda fuga gwachchi shaayda ea gea shah haleanjeeda. Ghoadandaarda haleanjeeda fuga ghwanyawa nyarja lappiya ea hoorgajeega fuga ghwanyawa shaayda ghariibajeega.
41011016	Ea mwanung' ghang'atta siih gwasik jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta nea ghwaada geadi gil.
41011017	Hit gabiissa Ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi Aseetta gwayi aba jeeda Ng'ooruutkaaschi, ‘Gheawi itteanyuun gayghoaw heechchea gabattewean emoojiga sean.’ Ak ghoanung' ghoaw gwaleeda jea gafunnya geat mareanghooga!”
41011018	Iiy Ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gabiissa ghamwaal gichchea gwanuusta. Iiduw Geawwal gheang'da idaah gidaduupta emeeda ginealshoadaannyi.
41011019	Iiduw nea niiw shing'ada ghang'eat Yeesu nea godeayi ginealangaaschi ak gaweay ghang'amwa jeeda mujiini.
41011020	Iimuchchu nea gaweshiit damanda ng'attaawa ghwadaah shabogheechcheanda nea nighajamiit sean ea gagul hawunga.
41011021	Apkaat Betro gidaheetta surukusa shabogheechcheanda gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ang'wearda! shabogheechcheanda heetta imwaashtiin nighajamiit!”
41011022	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga amwasa Aseetta.
41011023	Aba huumwa Gaydarukuneegwa gideaba, ‘Ghamneawa siida eashsha,’ gijeeni loadaadawana hiji ak guwi jaksiina geaw jeeda basooda nea siisi gwarukuta ng'asheanji nea mwanyeaha jeadaannyi, ak ghamwas gideaba ng'asheega sean rugu gaygwasa, ng'asheanji gajeesissa.
41011024	Asi Gaydayeeshshineegwa, iyoamwaashchi nea goomuschi gil, amwasa gideaba noanyaschi, ak gajegooneegwa.
41011025	Ghabwada iyoaminaadi nea gajamwaasha gil, daba siisi samsa gidinyeanda wassean deeppa ea nismaneey siih. Abeeda eara ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda gaygwasamsa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa. [
41011026	Ama mosammisiini gidinyeannyeekka simmeweega buuneeda eara Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda ea maygwasamsa gidinyeannyeekkeagwa.]”
41011027	Gaweay ea ghwahitta gichcha Yerusaleemu. Iiduw nea gwaneayeewa Yeesu jeedeaba Gheetta Sibatta Aseettean, gaweay headaannyi ashoohoodiga hees ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa.
41011028	Geannyaash nea geyeeshsha, “Ak gheambalmeeni ittang'u isinni ng'asheesuun anneeda? Gagoonnyi ng'eaha gheambalmeeni isinni ng'asheesuun?”
41011029	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ommeasa eara agooga gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi, iyoashaayi ng'asheanji eara aniini gaydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gheambalmeeni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.
41011030	Heappi arukunean gibattiisanda ghayi eadu Yohaana gwarinna yeenu? Gwaleabu heeda Aseetta ghana leabu heeda siida?”
41011031	Hean Gabiissa gwasheang'nyi nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa isiyeeshshi, ‘Ghayi gwaleabu humng'eeda, gaygwayi, Anda ak amoamwasi ng'asheega Yohaana?’
41011032	Ama Siyeeshshi, ‘Ghayi gwaleabu heeda buuneeda.'"(Ada geawwalli buuneeda aba gideaba ghamwas sean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda gil.)
41011033	Hean iiduw ghwalamda Saawa ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aseasa meanali.” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini ea maydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gheambalmeeni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.”
41012001	Ng'atta gobalool Yeesu saawa nea gagalla geat ng'asheega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi siih ghabwar madamnyeanji ittaannyi ak gang'eapsa misabiibu. Hit goneaweesa madamnyandannyi hilooga, gageanu ak gwasin healadeeda jea emurriisa difaayeeda was mideega haghweega misabiibu, ak gwasin eara madalooda jea efurra madamnyeanda. Hean ghwanung' gooragan buuneeda madamnyeandannyi. Ng'atta iiduw gawa Siidida ea gawa daroorakka sheagi.
41012002	Damandida bea lajittean Gojeakta soomjeanji ittaannyi heeda fuga aragan madamnyeanda, gweadu booga sinyas bea madamnyeanda was heeda dobiiwsa niny.
41012003	Ghoang'ng'waay fugiga soomjeandida ak ghabwar amang'atta geanung' gabiikta nea mwaada gil.
41012004	Gojeakta gichcha soomjaan nuut, earada geesawan nea geesma ng'asheega munyas.
41012005	Gabiikta gichcha Siidida bea madamnyeandeen gojeakta soomjaan nuut, amaduw gwanuus fukka aragan madamnyeandeen. Eara fuga suuk sichcheakta earaga mwaatkwa geabwar nea mwaatkwa genuseada.
41012006	Abeeda ea sippuussa heeda siyagi, nea jeaptaannyi bwariiy gil. Iiduw Gojeakta ada nea gwayeeshsha geaw, ‘Gajeawwal gheang'da.’
41012007	Hean gwayeeshsha geat fukka, ‘Niih siida jea numuji gwahearaniischi gil asi enuusa, ak abeeda gaygabwaheasa hearaniischooda!’
41012008	Hean geang'ng'waay ak genuus amahit geejakta musta eannaawa hilooga madamnyeanda.
41012009	“Asi gaygwasin naaha siida bea madamnyeanda? Gayghwahidu ak ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka ghayi aragan madamnyeandean amang'atta gayghwanung' gooragan fiih suuk madamnyeanda misabiibu.
41012010	Assagooga miyoassoamwana gissung'waar bea gideaba, ‘Lagheaneani aneawwa ghaang' deekshoodiga, ghamneawa aniiw lagheaneeda haw akkar gheeda.
41012011	Niih gidaghayi sin Ng'uttamiida, Ak adamdamwaat aba hedeanya.'"
41012012	Iiduw Ashoohoodiga ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa gagasa ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu aba gideaba saawa nijeeng'u ng'asheega ghwanyawa rukku beadi sigala saawa. Hean geegasa eang'ng'waay, amaduw ghoawal emeeda. Ghang'eat ng'eat ak gwanung'usa heeda.
41012013	Gechcheakta buuneeda mwaatkwa was Farisaayajeega, ea fuga duuba Heroode gaweay gobalool Yeesu nea gagasa gichchea eaghasta aba ng'asheagaaschi.
41012014	Geapka headaannyi ak geyeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, aseasa geanalli gideaba guwosi siida doabiwaat rukkwiida humeannyeekka nea ghanyea miiwali gheang'ba siih. Nea eara hawunda siida ghanyeamiduuppi, ak ginealayi ng'asheega naweeda Aseetta bea huumwa. Heappi Rukuneasa ea ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gerruutta gwaadi eattaw Gaysaari ghana manda? Gajeattawa ghana mwajeattawa?”
41012015	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidammittaayda geat ak gwayeeshsha, “Anda agooga googasayi gichchea aghastanaan? Heappi ayeanni lappiyeeni suguura dinaariin dadaah.”
41012016	Gehhiimsa ak ghoanyaash saawa, “Uhuuni ea gheawung'su gabeang'a?” Geyeeshsha, “Gaba Gaysaari.”
41012017	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Oattawa Gaysaari gida was dea Gaysaari ak ghoattawji Aseetta gida was dea Aseetta.” Ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi buuneeda.
41012018	Ghapka heeda Yeesu Sadukkayajeega mwamwasa gideaba gaygwaduuttu buuneeda, ak gwayeeshsha,
41012019	“Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ghayi Muusa gwayeashshineasa, ‘Siida iimeah nea gwanung'usa heeda gatmooda miigwaji, gatmooni was masiinng'weandean gaygwajiila diibiga oorjeeda ghamasiyeadaannyi. Nea diibiga iisiji gajegushteawa ghweanda nyaawa ghayi meah.’
41012020	Ghayi gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghamwadagi. Gageeshshi oorjeeda haw amaduw ghami nea ghwanung'wa hiji gatmooda miigwaji.
41012021	Iiduw masiinng'weandida gwahearan oorjeeda bassa. Iiduw ghami earada nea gatmooda ea miigwaji. Gabiikta gwahearan gatmooda oorjeedeaba samwagu.
41012022	Iiduw gatmoodida gwahearan Oorjookka seaniin nea gameewwa agi ea goosha sean ispeannyaawa nea gatmoodida ea miigwaji. Muchchu aba huydeanda eara gatmootta ghami.
41012023	Asi heappi eaweeda dunnooda gatmooni iiduw gaygaba ng'eaha? Gatmooda nighi buuneeda ea ghwahitta ispwa.”
41012024	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Agooga noaramwaschi muuchchi aba gideaba moanali ginnyaah ng'ooruutka Ghaydit ghana uurda Aseetta.
41012025	Aba gideaba eaweettida iduuttu buuneeda ea maygageeshshi nea majeegeena, gaygawuurji giijasoodiga humng'eeda.
41012026	Asaha aba ng'asheesu bea dunnoaniin ghayi needa ea miyoassoamwana aba jeeda gittabooda Muusa heeda sung'waar ng'asheega geetta mughuush yeada beasta jeeda? Ghayi aba hoowa Aseetta gwayeeshsha Muusa, ‘Aniini geawoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Aseetta Isakka ea Aseetta Yakkobo.’
41012027	Niny miih Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil. Niny Aseetta fuga duugwanda. Agooga noaramwaschi muuchchi.”
41012028	Deagheatta ghwahidu Ginealshoochcheanda diineeda Yahuudi ak goleysiit sheang'nyeeda nyaawa. Daah gideaba Yeesu ghwasha ng'asheega nyaawa nea ghoadoabiiw, ghwaan ak ghoanyaash, “Aba jeeda digheannyyeekka sean ahaw anneeda?”
41012029	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Dea madeeda niih gil, ‘Eaniyean aleaydiit Israeeli! Ng'uttamiida Aseetteanya gil. Ng'uttamiida niny gil nea gaba geaw.
41012030	Bwariinya Ng'uttamiida was Aseettaang'u aba jeadaang'u sean ea aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean, ea aba urdaang'u sean.’
41012031	Ng'asheanda haw bea iyyeenya gwayi, ‘Bwariiyda gischeewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.’ Manda digheannyeekka hees naawa suuh assiyyenyean.”
41012032	Gwayeeshsha Ginealshoochcheandida bea diineeda Yahuudiin, “Asi huumwa gil ginealshochcheanda! Aba hiji girgu huumwa gideaba Aseetta aagi, ak ea manda nuut geaghus niny nea gaba geaw.
41012033	Ea huumwa gil siida geaghus ghabwariinya Aseetta jeadaannyi sean ea aba fughareadaannyi sean ea aba urdaannyi sean. Ea huumwa gil siida geaghus ghabwariiyda gischeewoochcheandannyi gidabwariiyda geaw. Ng'asheesu assiyyeenyean ea majeekcheewi ea ghwanaawa eara gisilleanda ghadooweeda ea haleanjeeda suurja sisappa geadi sigadoowanniida.”
41012034	Daah Yeesu girrukutteayda ng'asheega nea gomajeek gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ghanyeamuwosi sheageewa Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.” Ng'atta balooli ea mudugwanda siisi badaksa Yeesu ghoanyaash ng'asha suuk.
41012035	Damanda anealsheewa Yeesu aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseettean, ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gwayeena Gristo Balleanda Dawdi gil?
41012036	Damandida gwayi Dawdi aba uurda Guroroada Ghaydit ghwanung' gwayi, ‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiideanyu, Beenni abiidana meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa, ea danung' allaapta ng'eanyi fuga was weajoodigaagu.’
41012037	“Dawdi niny gaguura Gristo Ng'uttamiida. Asi abeeda Gristo gayghoawattaan jeaptaannyi?” Abeeda emeeda goleeysiit ng'asheega Yeesu nea gahoosan.
41012038	Gwayi Yeesu aba jeeda ginealshoadaannyi, “Ashageada ginealshoodusu bea diineeda Yahuudiin. Fuga bwariiy gwaleammideawa hang'weakka geawwi, nea geyeenniisa seayu aba mureeda aba naada. Fuga ama hitta ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa gwajiir hoorgajeega madeeda.
41012039	Nea eara Iweay gealga ghwelmeeda ghwanyoahaada hoorgajeega madeeda.
41012040	Fuga iissa ghwaak haleanjeeda masiinng'weega nea iissa ghamwaash ghawooda nea gogeawiit! Eaweeda girgweaksiinda gayghwanyas ghoorjooda haw.”
41012041	Muchchu goopteada Yeesu aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta nea nekkeewa sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweeda. Gang'ula gidiinda buuneeda lappiya jeeda sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweeda. Ghwadaah meanang'oodiga inyeessa ghabwaang'da lappiyeassaang'a.
41012042	Deagheatta ghwahidu Gatmoanagi bwarbwar was masiinung'weanda, ak ghoadayda heelaji iyyeenya akghwahit.
41012043	Hean gaguursa Yeesu ginealangaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gatmoani was masiinung'weanda bwarbwariin, niih ghamneawa ghoadayda gidahaw ea ghwalaabwa hoowa buuneessean iin lappiya jeeda sandakwajeanda siyiina haleanjeeda ghadooweedean.
41012044	Aba gideaba buuneeda suurja ghoadayda gidabinna jeeda baruureega nyaawa. Sunung' Masiinung'weanji earappeadi bwarbwariin niidayda gidamideawa sean. Niidayda daghwardaannyi sean.”
41013001	Damanda ritteawa Yeesu jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta gwayeeshsha siyagi was Ginealaneadaannyi, “Ea Ginealshoochcheanda, ang'wearda gealsu hesiin gissam, ea lagheanga ghayi sideasa!”
41013002	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gidaahi gealsu heesiin? Lagheang'su ghayi sideasaan manda dea jea enung'usa heeda aaragi. Gajeeng'ng'adeadu sean.”
41013003	Eaweechcha Yeesu goopteada aba uhuuda Gijeeda Masaytunajeega deaschi Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta gaweay geaba Betro ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana sea Andereya ak ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gaba geat gideaba,
41013004	“Eaniyean rukuneasa ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju? Ak gajerroorda naaha aba hinnoodeaba ng'asheesu.”
41013005	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ashageada adagwareenganneegwa siih.
41013006	Aba gideaba gayghapka fuga saang'a jea ghapkaana gheawungeasu nea gwayi, siida aniini gil! Ak aba sareani gaygwareengani fuga saang'a.
41013007	Iyoayiinyi ng'asheega ng'uchcheadinga ea gijuureanda ng'uchcheeda ea adoohirbabannyi. Ng'asheesu mayghwashiy hinnooda, duukku mudeanooda ea miighoaw.
41013008	Gaygaba ng'eanyiini ng'uchchi nuut, gaygaba Sugoochcheanji ng'uchchi nuut, gaygwasaw ng'eanyiida gichcha ak gaygang'eeda gejeadinga. Ng'asheesu seaniin gaygawuurji lajooda gatmooda jea gwaji.
41013009	“Asi agooga ashageada, aba gideaba gayghwadeagwa buuneeda gheeda sirgweachcha, nea geabwareagwa aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa. Gajeayadeagwa madeeda fuga hees ea madeeda sugoodiga appadaydeanyu, ak abeeda gajahuuwa mushoodigeasu aba madeannyaawa.
41013010	Nea hinnooda jea ghwahidu mudeanooda ng'eanyiida, abeeda gajeasurukusa buuneessean Giijasta miy.
41013011	Nea eara isiyadeagwa gheeda sirgweachcha, ea adoohirbabannyi, appadayda ng'asheega jea arukuta, ihidu damandida, arukuta ng'asheanda wassean sinyunneegwa, aba gidea ba miih agooga gil fuga jea gabalool, gaygabalool Gurorooda Ghaydit.
41013012	Nea Siida gayghwala bwadaw oorjeeda ghaamwat ak genuus, nea Bwaabwa gayghwala bwadaw orjeadaannyi, eara diibiga gayghabwar ghweaniga nyaawa ak gwanuuseada.
41013013	Ak agooga gayghwasteagwa buuneeda aba gheawungeasu. Nea siida jea ghamilikghta ea gagul damandida bea mudeanoodean, siisi gayghaghu.”
41013014	“Asi iyoadaayi gidamuy jea gweadu nyariida nea niminaada aba heeda mahaguuwsiina, (Siida assoamwa ea dajeeng'na gidawas) asi abeeda fuga mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ea dasalsiina iheenga heayeeniga.
41013015	Abeeda siida deeppa eanyasa uhuuda gheeda adaghwararang'aan, aduwi geanni eara gidamida gah jea aadana geadi.
41013016	Siida deeppa eanyasa jeeda madamnyeanda eara hang'da badayda ghwanyawa nung'wa ghoah adaghamwaghaada.
41013017	Eshshiina gadeemga was bungaroodiga ashageada, ea gadeemga reer diibiga aba damandida!
41013018	Gomoorayi ea mwahinna ng'asheesu munyasiin damandida bea gorogedean.
41013019	Aba gideaba damandida gaygwanda sawanadeeda manda dea jea eegala ghang'eada deaghayi nubwada Aseetta ng'eanyiida ea gagul ghamneawa. Ak ea maygudu gabiigu gichcha dea jea gawuurji nih.
41013020	Inyeeda gwachchi ea moong'ayiida Ng'uttamiida askwearjoojikka ghanyeamanda siisi jea ghwalalaan. Amaduw appadahuukka fuga loossa geaw anisuuy Ng'uttamiida askwearjoojikka.
41013021	“Asi iyeeshshineegwa Siida, ‘Ang'wearda Gristo gwanda hiji,’ ghana gwayi, ‘Gwanda hoowa,’ adoamwaschi.
41013022	Aba gideaba gayghwahidu fuga was Gristohajeega ng'uyyeega ea sibanga ng'uyyeega, gayghoahiimu gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi, aba hutteawda fuga loat Aseetta.
41013023	Asi agooga ashageada. Aniini nearukuneegwa ng'asheega sean heeda miih ghwahinna.”
41013024	“Asi askwearjoojigiga nea ning'atta ng'asheandida ng'waaniin, gaygwattuudu gheang'da Aseetta nea eara sheeda ea maygudu goboong'u.
41013025	Nea miinga humng'eeda gaygoobittu nea gaygwaduumduum uurda humng'eeda.
41013026	Ak gajeadaah Balleanda Siida nea gwashubeana jeeda shamoghuutka nea gaygwandeawa uurda haw ea gigheambiitta.
41013027	Ak Gaygoojeakta giijasoodigaaschi bea humng'eeda godearsa meadajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida gaweay goweamu fuga loossa geaw, ghang'eada mudeanooda ng'eanyiida ea ghoaw mudeanooda humng'eeda.”
41013028	“Agooga ang'ulla shabogheechcheanda. Gwanda gichchea ghoanaleagwa. Iyabit seenga nea ghafiirfiir gea nyawiiri gajanala gideaba domeelda nineekkiit.
41013029	Gwasnu eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu nea ghwahindu, anala gideaba Balleanda Siida nineekkiit muuchchi.
41013030	Gearukuneegwa aba huumwa, Seaygeani bea ghamneawean mayghwanaawda nea miyadaaha ng'asheesu.
41013031	Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gaygammudean. Duukku ng'asheegeasu ea maygammudean.
41013032	“Dukku askwearjeandida, ghana damandida manda siida nal. Eara giijasoodiga humng'eeda, ghana Balleanda Aseetta. Siinnal geaghus Bwaabwa akghwahit.
41013033	Ashageada nea ghoang'ng'wearu, aba gideaba mwoanali damanda jea gawaseewa.
41013034	Gawuurji Siisi ghayi wea bareannyeekka ak gwaruuda nea ghwanung'wa gheeda fuga gadiyeeda. Nea nigeanu ak gaba siisi adaw gichchea gwasin ak gageanu ghwayiin furiischochcheanda jea gafur dooshta nea gwayeeshsha milmiliida.
41013035	Asi oang'ng'wearni adoolilli aba gideaba mwoanali eaweetta jea ghwahinna siida bea gheeda, gwadeeppa ghwahidu shing'ada, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu eaweedagweena, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu beashatta, ghana gwadeeppa ghwahidu nea gorearu aseetta.
41013036	Asi oang'ng'wearni gajiiduw gwashameegwa ak ghabwardaneegwa ng'eenyi nea goondi jeerruweanga.
41013037	Gichchea darukuneegwa oagasean, gaydayi, Oang'ng'wearni, adoolilli!”
41014001	Iimuchchu nea ghwashoada eawooji iyyeenya ak gayghwahidu ghwelmeeda basakka ea dea mukkattajeega memmattawiitta. Abeeda gagasa ashoohoodiga hees sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gichchea ghoahaktaayda Yeesu akghoang'ng'waay ak gwanuus.
41014002	Iiduw gwayi, “Adiiduw geang'ng'waanyi eaweechcheanji bea ghwelmeeda mideewa fuga sang'aan, gaygang'eessa fiih buuneeda.”
41014003	Yeesu abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiida Beettaniya. Gwanda gheeh Simoneeda ghayi beardooschi udamusuura. Iiduw nea goopteada gweagiischi ghwahidu headaannyi Gatmooni eattuuna geadi dabichcheanda nyiit nagheeda haw sheayeat suguura nardo biissa ea ng'andit. Hidu goodalealsa uhuuda Yeesu nagheedida ng'andidiin.
41014004	Gwanda fuga mwaatkwa nyareesi nea gwayi, “Nagheani geahhaak ng'eanyiida ghwasaan?
41014005	Nagheani ghwanyawa isishaayda ghoammu ghwanyas dinaaraji bughalaji samwagu. Nea lappiyeani ghwanyawa iisinyas gajeattawaada fuga barbari.” Gewwoowusa gatmoodida muuchchi.
41014006	Nea Yeesu niny gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada gatmooni oagasean. Gotteawiissi naaha? Niih gwasinnean gittoabiiw.
41014007	Fuga barbari gondeaydoscheewi galeega sean. Abeeda iyoogasayi aweada gajaweada. Duukku Aniini ea maydeabiitta heedeang'wa galeegasean.
41014008	Niny gwasin gidida ammuun. Niny ghwayeashanaan nagheada nea gwadawwiisa saseedeanyu bunyitta.
41014009	Ak ghamneawa aba huumwa ghoanung' darukuneegwa, heeda wassean aba muunda ng'eanyiida jea eweay ak gerukkwiida Giijasta Miy, ng'asheanji sin gatmooniin gajeerukku ghoaw gichchea epkkeatta niny.”
41014010	Hean gawa Yuudaayda Iskariyotti bea jeedeaba ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, ea gawa heeda ashoohoodiga hees nea gagasa ghwala bwadaw Yeesu.
41014011	Nyas iidi ashoohoodiga gahoosan muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha Yuuda, “Eara lappiya gajegoona.” Hean gabiissa ghamwaal Yuuda gichchea ghwalaapta bwadaw Yeesu.
41014012	Eaweetta madeeda bea ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega memmattawiitta, nea eaweetta sinuusa dayeenda gisilleanda bea ghwelmeeda basakkac gil, ghoanyaash ginealanga Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi esinneey hamitta ghwelmeeda basakka aba yeenu?”
41014013	Gojeakta Yeesu ginealangaaschi assiyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ea ahitta jeeda mujiini. Gajaroonnyeewana siida sar sirbiida beega. Ghoayaachchi geeshta.
41014014	ea ghwahitta gheeda jea gawa jeeda, iyoahitti goyeeshshi siida bea gheeda, ‘Gwayi ginealshochcheanda abwaara aba jeedeaba gheang'u ghooriini siyeaksi hamitta ghwelmeeda basakka aniini ea ginealangeasu?’
41014015	Ak gayghoahimneegwa ghooriini haw ghayi sideeksa uhuumba nuut, nea sisin muuchchi ak goosissi jeani.”
41014016	Gaweay ginealanga ea gaweay jeeda mujiini. Hitta ghwadaakta ng'asheega sean gidagwachchi rukutteayda Yeesu. Hean gwasin hamitta ghwelmeeda basakka.
41014017	Huuw shing'ada ghwahidu Yeesu nea godeana ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya.
41014018	Iiduw nea geyeagiischi gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aba huumwa ghamneawa geayeeshshineegwa jeedeang'wa gwanda siida eambuchcheewi jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw.”
41014019	Ghang'ut giseaneega ginealanga ak gaba niih anyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida aniini?”
41014020	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Siida gwanda jeedeang'wa agoogeani attamaniyyeenyean. Nukkwa ghamneawa ghang'utta mukkatte sea aniini aba jeeda buurda.
41014021	Asi Balleanda siida gaygawa hechchea gawa gawuurji ginnyaashta Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit. Nea ea dashageada siitta jea ghwala bwadaw Balleanda Siidean. Siisi ghayi ghang'wana ea meeji.”
41014022	Iiduw nea geyeagiischi ghwasng'u Yeesu mukkatte ak ghamwaash ghawooda. Hit gageanu gwalakkiisa ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Oang'ng'waanya ayaaga niih saseedeanyu gil.”
41014023	Ng'atta Gageanu bayookta ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta, ak goheaksa saawa ak ghwaleayda sean.
41014024	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Suuh foojeandeanyu neajeeda ghayi sihhiida appadahuukka fuga saang'a gil.
41014025	Aba huumwa, Mayguttali difaayeani was mideega haghweega musabiibuun, ea eaghus galannya dawa dali gea eashish aba jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.”
41014026	Hean Gwasarman amahit gwaritta, ak gwascheeng'sa Gijeeda Masaytunajeega.
41014027	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ginealangaaschi, “Agooga gajamwachmwajaan ak ghoanung'wanaan heeda aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit, ‘Gaydabwar jeagiischochcheanda ak gayghwadarda gisilga.’
41014028	Nea iiduw iyeaduudu gaydeasheedeawaneegwa dawa Galilaaya.”
41014029	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ghamwachmwachnyi fiisu seaniin, ak gwanung'useey heeda aniini mayghanyi danung'waneey heeda.”
41014030	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey, aweani bea ghamneawean heeda miih goguula nghaghooda niba iyyeenya, gajeaniheawanaan niba samwagu.”
41014031	Gabiikta Betro gwayeeshsha nea goomajeek, “Adiiduw aniini maydaheawaneey, goobal emeewuudayeena, maydanung'useey heeda.” Ghwanyaashtunu eara ginealanga suurja.
41014032	Geweay ea eahitta hiji suguura Getsemaani.d Gwayeeshsha Yeesu aba girrukusa ginealangaaschi, “Oppitpiida aba hiji ghanyi damwaash Aseetta.”
41014033	Gaguursa Betro ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana ak godeayi. Ghang'ut giseaneega nea ghawishaan uhuuda.
41014034	Hean Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwariikghta gwanuus guroroodeanyu giseaneega. Oppiidana hiji nea adoolilli, oang'ng'wearni.”
41014035	Ghwaloat geash gili miigeaw ak gwajaksa geaw ng'eanyi, ak ghamwaash gideaba, nung' danaawa gheadi bea sawanadeedean.
41014036	Ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Bwaabwa, Bwaabwa, ang'iing'i manda gida miimmuusi. Aniyean gischoarjaan bayookcheanji bea sawanadedean. Nea adaghoaw humeandeanyu, nung' ghoaw daang'u.”
41014037	Iiduw nea Gabiikta hoowa ghwahitta nea ginealangiga assamwaguun ea nilil. Ghoanyaash Betro, “Ea Simon, Annilli? Mimmuussi ang'wearni eara gheadi nuwaasi?”
41014038	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Oang'ng'wearni nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta ea mesmeegwa. Gurorooda gagasa amaduw saseeda ea manduurda.”
41014039	Gabiikta gichcha ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwarukuta ng'asheega ghwanyawa rukkwiida.
41014040	Iiduw Gabiikta gichcha hoowa bea ginealangaaschiin ak ghwahitta nea nilil. Eara gheanyanga nyaawa mudughoammu ghwajaat aba ruweanga ak amwanala eara gichchea gwarukutta.
41014041	Iiduw Gabiigu heannyaawa deaba samwagu ak gwayeeshsha, “Akkudandana jeeda ruweanga nea gofuufchi? Anung'waada gwadeenu! Nugul damanda! Nukkwa Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga ring'eega.
41014042	Asi ang'eatng'eada eebu. Oang'ng'wearda siitta jea ghwalabwan bwadawiin nineekkiit.”
41014043	Damanda duu gabaloola Yeesu, ghwahidu Yuuda nea gaba jeedeaba ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, ghwahidu nea goodeana emeettuw mideawa bwangajeega ea gulupkeakka. Fiisu abeeda gojeagu ashoohoodiga hees, ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea gweargwa.
41014044	Abeeda Yuudayda jea ghwala bwadaw Yeesu nirukusa emeeda gichchea goroorda. “Siida jea dasam gheatta abeeda niny gil ak ghoang'ng'waanyi nea goofurji.”
41014045	Hidu Yuuda ghang'atta ama hitta heeda Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ginealshochcheanda!” Nea ghwasam gheatta.
41014046	Hean daah emeeda ghang'eatng'eat ak ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu.
41014047	Aba jeeda fuga ghwanyawa minaada sea Yeesu gafagu Sih bwaanga ak ghwalas soomjeanda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwalaksa ng'eanyi iitta.
41014048	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu fugiga, “Ghamneawa goyeadu bwangajeega ea gulupkeakka aba ging'ng'ooydeanyu neada ghoanung' dawuurji mareanghweanda?
41014049	Easuju nea geanealayi buuneeda aba jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseetta, anda mong'ng'onnyean. Ak gwasa ng'asheesu ghoaw gidanyaashta Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit.”
41014050	Gamng'aw Ginealangaaschi sean ak gwasalda gwanung'usa heeda.
41014051	Abeeda gweattu geeshta balleanji mwanang' nea gookwa hang'da. Hean geegasa eang'ng'waay.
41014052	Iiduw ghamwanmwanda balleanda ak gwanung'usa heeda hang'daannyi ak ghafwach nea dawiish.
41014053	Geayaat Yeesu ea eayaat gheeda Ashoohoochcheanda Haw. Ghwahitta nea nibattiisa geat hoowa ashoohoodi suuk hees sea gweargwa sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi.
41014054	Abeeda Betro gamaseaw Yeesu nea sheagi, gawa jeedeaba gheedida bea ashoohoochcheandida hawiin, gopteada ak ghoabwaal beasta sea furiischoodiga.
41014055	Iiduw gagasa ashoohoodiga hees sea gweargwa girgweageeda siida jea gamuuwwu gidinyeanda Yeesu, ak abeeda gwanuus ak aamwanyasa.
41014056	Abeeda gwanda fuga saang'a muuwwu ng'asheega ng'uyyeega appadayda Yeesu. Amaduw ng'asheega nyaawa ea mudu gaweechchi.
41014057	Gwanda fuga suuk minaada ak gamuuwwu ng'uyyeega aba badayda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha,
41014058	“Ghayi Siyiinyi siisi nea gwayeena, ‘Gaydanyarja Gheawi Sibatta Aseetta ghayi sideasa geattingean, ak aba jeemba eawooji samwagu gaydadeas nuut dea meesnana geattinga buuneeda.'"
41014059	Iiduw eara ng'asheega nyaawa muuwwu ea meatteayyi.
41014060	Ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw aba madeeda buuneeda ak ghoanyaash Yeesu, “Mwayshaaha ng'ashaani? Fiisu gwarukuna naaha bwadaydaang'u?”
41014061	Ghwasiinda Yeesu marukuta eara ng'ashaanjagi. Gabiikta ashoohoochcheandida ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ang'iing'i guwosi Gristoyda was Balleanda Aseetta Ghambidaadi?”
41014062	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ea ada geawoschi. Ghabwada niih gajadaaha Balleanji bea Siidean nea gobideada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta hoauur, nea godeana shamoghuutka humng'eeda.”
41014063	Ng'atta ghabwashaada ashoohoochcheanda haw hang'waakkaaschi ak gwayi, “Gudeegassa mushoodispa naaha?
