41014064	Noayiinyi gidang'eawwiida Aseetta! Goyeennyiin agooga?” Gwayi sean siisi gagasa enuus.
41014065	Gwanda fuga mwaatkwa ang'urriisa ng'usheega, geedukutta gheanyanga ak geabwar madeang'akka nea geyeeshsha, “Heappi rukuni siida lasnyi!” Eara fuga gadiyeeda ghabwar madeang'akka.
41014066	Damani duu gwandeawa Betro seammodean, ghwahidu huda gadiydooschchi aba gheeda ashoohoochcheanda haw.
41014067	Iiduw nea ghwadaah Betro nea gwaju beasta, gong'weersa ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gindeaydooscheewi Yeesuyda Nasareetti.”
41014068	Ghwashaang' Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwaanali, anda eara gidurgu mwaanali!” Ng'atta ghang'eat Betro ak gawa ea gawa hoowa bea dooshtean. Miighoaw gil ea niguul nghaghooda.
41014069	Ghwadaah hudideani Betro gichcha ak gwayeeshsha fiisu ghwanyawa minaada, “Eara siisi gaba jeeda fuga easuju adeaydooschi Yeesu.”
41014070	Iiy Betro gabiikta ghwashaang' gichcha. Miighoaw gil geyeeshsha Betro aba girrukusa fiisu ghwanyawa minaada, “ Aba huumwa eara ang'iing'i gibeahi jeedeaba fugiga aba gideaba guwosi siida Galilaaya.”
41014071	Ghamwaashta geaw Betro nea ghwaak habeawooda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini siisi orukku iittannyiin mwaanali.”
41014072	Miighoaw gil gabiikta goguul nghaghooda deaba iyyeenya. Hean gabiissa ghoapkaat Betro gidaheetta rukusa Yeesu bea gideaba, “Heeda miigabiikta nghaghooda giguleandeaba iyyeenya gajaniheawanaan niba samwagu.” Hean gabiissa Betro goorareang'u dabeakka goyyeawda.
41015001	Iimuchchu nea gudughaghar gayeew gabalool ashoohoodiga hees sea gweargwa, ea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi ea girgweageeda sean, ak ghwarat Yeesu aba biingu, ak ghwaat ea ghwayiin geattinga Bilatto.
41015002	Ghoanyaash Bilatto Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha Bilatto, “Girgu ang'iing'i.”
41015003	Ghoahaktaawa ashoohoodiga hees Yeesu ng'asheega duguuga saang'a.
41015004	Gabiikta Bilatto ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anda ang'iing'i mirukuni gil? Iinya ng'asheega surukuna badaydaang'u gitteenna.”
41015005	Amwaasha Yeesu ng'ashaan ea ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi Bilatto.
41015006	Abeeda iissa iinyooh ghwahitta damanda ghwelmeeda basakka inyeessa Bilatto gwasiksa siyagi aba fuga mida ghealooniga gasa buuneeda.
41015007	Abeeda damandida gwanda ghealooniga siisi suguura Baraba nea geeraduudayi fiih suuk ghayi nuseada buuneeda nea ghwanung' ghaghoakghoayda emeeda.
41015008	Ghaghoayda emeeda gaweay heeda Bilatto ama sihitta geyeeshsha, Eaniyean sinneasa gidagweannyekka sean.
41015009	Ghoanyaashta Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi googasayi deattinneegwa sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?”
41015010	Abeeda niny ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba ashoohoodiga hees ghoahaktaawa Yeesu sichcheeda.
41015011	Nea ashoohoodiga hees saawa ghoang'waalng'waal buuneeda nea gagasa gideaba gaygamus buuneeda gwasiksa Baraba.
41015012	Hean ghoanyaash Bilatto buuneeda gichcha nea gwayeeshsha, “Googasayi dahinndaan siisi oguuri sugoochcheanda Yahuudiin?”
41015013	Gabiikta buuneessean gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoorsiina uhuuda behiida.”
41015014	Gwayeeshsha Bilatto aba girrukusa buuneeda, “Nea gidinyeandeaba siisi ea naaha gil?” Gabiikta buuneeda gojuur muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoorsiina uhuuda behiida!”
41015015	Hean Bilatto aba gassooda gasa ghoammiidu gheanyanga emeeda, gageanu ak gwasiksa Baraba. Hit ghwanung' egeanu mughowooda ak geabwar Yeesu amahit geayaat enngoorsa uhuuda behiida.
41015016	Ghwaat Shirikkareedida Yeesu ea eahhiitta heeda suguura Braytoriyo was seammooda gheeda sugoochcheanda. Hean ghapka eara Shirikkara suurja ak gabassa geat hoowa.
41015017	Gegeanu ak gekkwealsa Yeesu hang'da oomu. Gegeanu ng'oroorga eanaaw ak geayiin uhuuda eanung' ghoaw shiipka uhuudaannyi.
41015018	Hean Geguursa nea geyeeshsha, “Seayuu sugoochcheanda Yahuudi!”
41015019	Gealas uhuuda Yeesu aba digheechcheanda nea gong'urriisa ng'usheaga. Geetkuy aba madeadaannyi ehinda gili siittaw mureeda.
41015020	Ng'atta jukkooda gegeanda hang'da ghwanyawa oomu sikkwealsa ak gekkuumsa hang'weakkiga ikkaschiin. Ng'atta Geayaat engoorsa uhuuda behiida.
41015021	Geweay aba naweeda ea eroonnyi siisi suguura Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene. Niny ghweanda geaba Aleksanda bea geaba Rafo gil, nea aba damani gwaleabu madamnyeanda. Gediing'sa aba uurda ghwasar behiida Yeesu.
41015022	Geayaat Yeesu ea eahhiitta hiji suguura Golgootta nea ghwanyawa isiyam ghuut gajeguura, “Deageapkeeda uhuuda.”
41015023	Gegeanu difaayi ak geng'ng'olng'olsiinnyi sea manemane. Geattaw nea geyeeshsha leaha. ak ghaheawa ghwali.
41015024	Ng'atta hean Gengoorsa uhuuda behiida, ama hit gegeanu hang'waakkaaschi ak geelaja, nea geng'alealleesa hang'daannyi eadaa siida jea gageanda.
41015025	Gengoorsa uhuuda behiida nea gaba aseetta samwagu.
41015026	Nea gissihaktaawa geang'waar gideaba, “Niih sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.”
41015027	Gengoorsa iheenga beehajeega eara fiih iyyeenya abeeda was mareannghooga. Dea meanung' ghwalaabwa Yeesu meatkweeda geattinda dugwa niirja ghwalaabwa meatkweeda geattinda ghadaam. [
41015028	“Ak gwasa gidaghayi nyaah Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit nea gwayi, ‘Sinung' gwandeayi sea fuga munyas.’ ”]
41015029	Nea abeeda fuga ng'atta aba naweeda gong'eawi nea godiindiil iheenga nea geyeeshsha, “Asi! Siida jea gwanyarja gheeda Sibatta Aseetta ak ghwadeas aba jeeda eawoojiga assamwagu!
41015030	Asi ayyaawa geaw! Hing'aanana uhuuda behiida.”
41015031	Eara ashohoodiga hees sea ginealshoodiga diineeda Yahuudi gwajuuga nea gwayi, “Ghoaghu buuneeda, ak ghwaraay ghoaghu geaw!
41015032	Asi geeyi niih Gristoyda was sugoochcheanda Israeeli! Asi dahing'aana aba uhuuda behiida eadaaha ak geamwaschi.” Eara fukwachchi singoruudayi ninyiin earaga gong'eawi.
41015033	Hean iiduw nea ghabwarbwara aseetta gwaduk ng'anyiissean misaneeda ea gaba aseetta shageash.
41015034	Gul aseetteaba shageash ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gojuur nea gwayi, “Elooyi, Elooyi, laama sabatkaani?” Nea gideaba, “Ea Aseetteanyu, Ea Aseetteanyu, andang'iing'i ninung'usean heeda?”
41015035	Fiisu ghwanyawa neekki iyiiy ghuutta Yeesu gwayi, “Ayiinya! Gaguursa Eliya.”
41015036	Ghafwach Sih ak gageanu gili was ghabuschcheanda ak ghang'uda jeeda beega ng'weani bea haghweega geetta. Ghoahaaktaawa digheechcheanda ak ghoadaw Yeesu ghamit nea gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Ommeasa eadaaha Eliya eajea ghwahidu ghoang'aamwa uhuuda behiida.”
41015037	Ghwanya ghuutta Yeesu nea gagis daghatta muuchchi ak ghoabitta.
41015038	Hean ghabwaasha bugusta hang'dida subwaasha jeeda Gheeda Sibatta Aseettean, ak ghoaw iyyeenya ghang'eada uhuuda ea gagul ng'eanyi.
41015039	Abeeda Shirikkarajeanda haw ghwanyawa ghaminaada aba hiji gang'uleadayyi Yeesu. Daah gidabittaayda siida gwayi, “Siisi aba huumwa ghayi Balleanda Aseetta gil!”
41015040	Gwanda eara Gadeemsu abeeda ang'weerru nea sheagi. Jeedeaba gadeemsu gaba geaba Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena, ea Saloome, ea Mariyaayda was gheamatta geaba Yakkoboyda mwanang' ea Yoose.
41015041	Gadeemsu ghayi gabay godeaydooschi Yeesu damanda mideewa Galilaaya nea gagadiyeesa. Abeeda gwanda eara gadeem suuk saang'a adeana Yeesu Yerusaleemu.
41015042	Damanda huweewa shing'ada bea eaweettida, niih abeeda eaweeda sitting'ding'deawa gil nea imuchchu ea eaweetta Sabattohi.e
41015043	Ghang'eat nisiih Yoseefu was siida ng'eanyiida Arimattayu. Niny abeeda gaba gweargwa girgweageeda nea geawwal gheang'da muuchchi. Easuju eara niny goolla gafurriida Gheambalmeeda Aseetta. Siisi ghang'eat ak ghabwadakta ak gawa heeda Bilatto ghang'al musta Yeesu.
41015044	Ghahamng'eanyi Bilatto iyiiy gideaba Yeesu nigeawiit ghami. Gaguursa shirikkarajeanda haw ak ghoanyaash Yeesu ea nigeawiit ghami.
41015045	Iiduw nea ghwanyas Bilatto iitta aba heeda shirikkerajeanda gideaba Yeesu nigeawiit ghami, gwayeeshsha Yoseefu aada musta Yeesu.
41015046	Gawa Yoseefu ak ghwasha hang'deesh, hit gawa ama hitta goorareang'u musta. Gokkwealsa hang'dida eeshiin akghwaat ea ghwayiin jeemba bung'eeni ghayi sighurghur nihit mida jeemba laghaana. Hean gooreakreaksa lagheaneeda haw ghuutta shoomanda.
41015047	Abeeda Mariyaaydida suguura Magadaleena sea Mariyaaydida was gheamatta Yosehiin abeeda saawa ghwadahaada heeda siyiin musta Yeesu.
41016001	Ng'atta ghwelmeeda Sabatto ghang'eat geaba Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena ea Saloome ea Mariyaayda was gheamatta Yakkobo gaweay ghwasha nagheeda ng'andit jea ghwayeasha musta Yeesu.
41016002	Hean imuchchu nea gudugorearu aseetta eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda gaweay Gadeemsu ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda.
41016003	Gaweay nea gabaloleada aba naweeda nea gwayeeshsha geat, “Ghamneawa gayghoarakghrakghtaang'a lagheaneetta haw bea ghuutta shoomanda bung'eedean?”
41016004	Ghoang'wearda ak ghwadaah lagheaneedida nea sigeanda, (Nea miih laghaana gil gidahaw muuchchi.)
41016005	Duugwasik ghuutta shoomanda bung'eeda ghwadaah Ghearemaneeni akkwa hang'deesh nea goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa, Ghahamng'eanyi muuchchi.
41016006	Hean gwayeeshsha Ghearemaneeni gadeemgiga, “Ada ghahameegwa ng'eanyi. Ghanalli beadi ogaseadayyi Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, singoorsa uhuuda behiida. Siisi nuduudu eara hiji mudugwanda. Ang'ulla heeda siyiin.
41016007	Asi agooga aweayeena oattawa iidi ginealangiga ikkaschiin ea Betro gideaba nisheedeawaneegwa gawa Galilaaya. Iyoahitti hoowa gajadaakta gidaghayi rukutteayda.”
41016008	Ng'atta Ghabeawa hoowa bea bung'edean nea gwasalda, aba gideaba nubwaadan ak ea nung'ut muuwda nea ghahamng'eanyi. Eamudu gwarukusa siih ng'ashaan aba gideaba nibeal muuchchi. [
41016009	Ng'atta dunnooda Yeesu nea beashatta eaweetta madeeda bea wikkajeanda gil gohiimsa geaw Mariyaayda suguura Magadaleena, was gatmooda ghayi arutteawa Yeesu saseeda meangeeniga assispwa.
41016010	Gawa Mariyaayda Magadaleena, ak gawa gwarukusa fuga easuju mideaydooschi Yeesu, nea abeeda aba damandida fukka goyyeawda nea gaguttu heareega.
41016011	Iiduw nea Ghwayiiy gideaba Yeesu ea majeek ea gideaba nidaah Mariyaayda Magadaleena ea meamwasa.
41016012	Hean imuchchu gohiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealan iyyeenya nea niyamwa deakta. Abeeda Ginealang'su gaweay madamnyeanda.
41016013	Eara Saawa gaweay ak gwarukusa suurja. Earappeadi surukusean ghanyea mwamwasa.
41016014	Iiduw aba huydeanda gohiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealan damwanagi hitta Yeesu nea gweagiischi. Gowoowsa Yeesu saawa muuchchi aba hang'ooynachcheekka iheenga nyaawa, ea gideaba mwamwasa ng'asheegiga bea fugeadu iitta dunnoadannyyin.
41016015	Hean gabiissa Gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ng'eanyiissean ak gorukkwiidi Giijasta Miy aba heeda buneassean.
41016016	Nea siida mwas ak geppattiisan gayghaghu, nea siida mwamwasa gajergweaksa.
41016017	Ak abeeda eara gwadeagooda gaygodeaydooschi fukka mideawa masawegean, aba gheawungeasu gaygoruutta meangeeniga ak gaygabaloola iit nuut.
41016018	Nea eara ghoang'ng'waany ichchipkeega ghana eara eabiiw siida gichchea ghabwar, ea manda gili jea gwahissa. Nea inyeessa Gayghoang'ng'waay iheenga fuga miyeani ak gaheaba.”
41016019	Iiduw Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gobalool saawa amahit, geanung' gawa humng'eeda gobiida meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.
41016020	Hean gaweay ginealanga ng'eanyiissean nea gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy. Gwasin Ng'uttamiida gadiyeeda sea saawa ak gomajeek Giijasi aba gwadeagooda adeaydooschi saawa.]
42001001	Aba gideaba ng'asheesu ning'waar fuga saang'a nea gooroottooschi, aba iitta ng'asheega ghayi sisin aba dageascheedeanya,
42001002	gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa mushoodiga daah ea aba heeda fuga rukkwiida ng'asheenda,
42001003	Ak ea nadaayi eara Aniini gideaba ghwahit, ak ea neasikteawi muuchchi gidaghayi ng'eatta ng'asheesu seaniin aba beanatta, ak geang'orneey ng'asheesu nea ghadoabiiwji Diofilooyda mureeda,
42001004	abeeda gay nala humeanda appadayda ng'asheega ghayi sibean surukneeyi.
42001005	Damanda waseewa Heroode sugoochcheada Yudeeya, abeeda gwanda ashoohoochcheanji suguura Sakkariya, bea gharmuchcheanda Abiya, nea gwandeawa gatmoadaannyi bea haweega Aron, nea gheawungaaschi geguura Elisabeetti.
42001006	Nea abeeda saawa ea doobiweadi aba madeeda Aseetta, nea ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi digheanynyeekka sean ea humeannyeekka Ng'uttamiida nea meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas.
42001007	Abeeda ea mandeawana jeepta aba gideaba Elisabeetti sonnooda nea nuwoosiidi sean.
42001008	Nea aba damanda sineewa gadiyeeda ashoohoochcheandumeeda aba madeeda Aseetta nea abeeda ea galannyeanda sineewa gadiyeeda lugoodaannyi,
42001009	aba seareetta bea gissiniida ashoohoodiga gadiyeedean, inyessa ghwaloat Aseetta siida gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Ng'uttamiida ghaghwarda geetta sing'ng'andiitta.
42001010	Nea aba damani sing'ng'andiida gheedean abeeda gwanda Emeessean daghatta gheeda ghamwaash Aseetta.
42001011	Hean goobeersa Malaykajeanda Ng'utamiida ak ghaminada aba murdeeda geattinda dugwa bea heeda wagiida siyiina geetta sing'ng'andiitta.
42001012	Daah Sakkariya gwahirbaban nea ghabeal.
42001013	Ak gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adibeal, Sakkariya, aba gideaba siyiiy gidumwaashi, nea eara Elisabeetteeda was gatmoadaang'u gaygwajiilneey balleanda, ak gaygureewana ghawungaaschi Yohaana.
42001014	Ak gay hoosana nea ging'weelayi muuchchi, nea eara fuga saang'a gaygahoosassa jeattaannyi;
42001015	aba gideaba gaygwaheedu aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida, Mayghwali difaayi ghana gichchea gooboogit, ak gajeannyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit, ghang'eada jeeda ghaamwat.
42001016	Ak gaygooguumsa balloojiga saang'a bea Israeeli Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta nyaawa,
42001017	ak Gaygosheedeawa aba jeeda gurorooda ea uurda Eliya, ak ghwayam guroruunatka ghweaniga gagal diibiga, nea fuga mandeawana mureeda ghoadaw weaghumeeda doobiiwnatta, ak gwasissa Ng'uttamiida fuga hideadi.”
42001018	Ak gwayeeshsha Sakkariya malaykajeanda, “Gaydajeeng'daydaan ng'asheanji? Aba gideaba aniini nawaasiichchi nea eara gatmoodeanyu ea nuwaasiit.”
42001019	Ghwasha Malaykajeanda nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi Gabrieleeda minaada aba madeeda Aseetta, ak gechcheakneani headaang'u deanneay Giijasi miyiin.
42001020	Asi ng'ulla, gayghwaroat ghuuttaang'u ea eamudammuussa baloola ea ghwahita eaweeda jea ghang'attaawa ng'asheesu, aba gideaba mumwasi ng'asheegeasu jea gwasa aba damanda nyaawa.”
42001021	Nea gafurriida buuneeda Sakkaria, ghahamng'eanyi sean aba gideaba nishiing'da aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
42001022	Hean nea gwardu jarooda, ghwaraay goobalool buuneeda, ak gwajeeng'u buuneeda gideaba sihhiimsa gil aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; goobaloola geattinga nea niroat ghuutta.
42001023	Duulean galandaannyi bea gadiyeada, gawa gheannyi.
42001024	Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwadurmaniit gatmoadaannyi suguura Elisabeetti, ak ghafuy geaw sheamuut nea gwayi,
42001025	“Niih gissinnean Ng'uttamiida aba eaweeda ng'ulleewanean ak gageandeawean rearga aba jeeda buuneeda.”
42001026	Sheedeaba lah goojeakta Aseetta malaykajeanda suguura Gabrieli gawa mujiineeda Nasareetti mida ng'eanyiida Galilaaya,
42001027	hichpa hudi miyeasat suguura Mariya, anyeari siisi suguura Yoseefu bea dooshagi sea sugoochcheanda sugura Dawdi.
42001028	Ghwahidu headaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Seayuu ang'iing'eeda siittaw dagheerjeandumeeda ang'iing'i gindeayi sea Ng'uttamiida!”
42001029	Hean gwadeawiit muuchchi aba ng'asheanji ak goottemsheesa seayoani giduurji.
42001030	Gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adibeali Mariya, aba gideaba nugoonnyi Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda.
42001031	Asi ngulla, gaygweayiida ak Gayjiila balleanda, ak gayguureewana gheawungaaschi Yeesu.
42001032	Nea gajeahaw, ak gajeeguura Balleanda Aseetta haw mida humng'eeda; nea gayghoadaw Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta hoorgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Dawdi was ghwaan,
42001033	nea gayghoahaaghwa gheeh Yakkobo ea ghoaw gweanyeekka manda muudeanooda; nea sugoochcheandumeedaannyi ea maygwanda muudeanooda.”
42001034	Gwayeeshsha Mariya malaykajeanda, “Gayghoawattaan ng'asheanji nea aniini ea meandeawani siyeeda?”
42001035	Gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Gaygwashubeseey Gurorooda Ghaydit, nea uurda Aseetta haw gaygookwealseey jirooneeda; aba sareani jeepta jea eeji gajeeguura siida ghaydit, Balleanda Aseetta.
42001036	Asi ng'ulla, buweachcheandaang'u was Elisabetti eara niny nigweayiit aba jeeda woosindaannyi ak gaygwaji balleanda; nea niih ea sheedeaba lahi; nea niny abeeda geeguura sonooda.
42001037	Aba gideaba manda ng'asheanda jea ghwaraay Aseetta.”
42001038	Gwayeeshsha Mariya, “Ng'ulla, anini geawoschi soomjeanda Ng'uttamiida, nung' gwasa aba heeeanyu ng'asheanji inyashiin.” Ak ghabeawa headaannyi Malaykajeanda.
42001039	Askwearjoojikka ghang'eat Mariya ak ghwalamwajaada gawa ng'eanyiida heayeeniiga jeeda mujiineeda Yuuda.
42001040	Ak Gawa jeeda gheeh Sakkariya ak googeachchi Elisabeetti;
42001041	Iiy Elisabeetti giigeachcheeda Mariya, ghwadanghan jeepta miida jeadaannyi ak geannyiit Elisabeetti Gurorooda Ghaydiit
42001042	goojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, “Sugoonnyi ghawooda aba jeeda gadeemga, ak ea sittaw ghawooda dea jea jiila!
42001043	Gayghoawdaani aba heedeanyu, gideaba ghwahidu heedeanyu gheamatta Ng'uttamiideanyu?
42001044	Aba gideaba ng'ulla, iyayiinyi ghuutta seayoadaang'u ghwadanghan jeepta mida jeedeanyu aba ng'weellooda.
42001045	Ghang'wana siida jea ghamwas gideaba gay gwasa ng'asheega rukusa Ng'uttamiida.”
42001046	Gwayi Mariya, “Jeedeanyu ghoaghambiit Ng'uttamiida,
42001047	Nea guroroodeanyu gahoosasa Aseetta was lealnochcheandeanyu
42001048	Aba gideaba nidaah nyootta uurda soomjeandaannyi. Asi ng'ulla, ghang'eada ghamneawa gaygaguureewean jeachcheenga sean dea sing'ushsha;
42001049	Ak ea nisinneani siida sittaw ghawooda hoauur ng'asheega hees muuchchi, ak gheawungaschi ea ghaydiit.
42001050	Nea baydeaydaannyi gwanda heeda buuneessean awal gheang'daannyi ghang'eada jeachcheenga ea gagul jeachcheenga.
42001051	Ak ea nihiimu uurda aba geattindaanyi, nea ghoadabwarda fuga ghwarjajeega aba jeesinga nyaawa,
42001052	Ak ea nirareang'na fuga mideawa uurjeenga hoorgajeega nyaawa bea sugoochcheandumeeda, ak goodiing'u fukka mandeawana uurjeengean;
42001053	Ninnyiit fuga bearji jalooda aba haleanjeeda miyaas, nea meanang'oodiga gaweay nea ghwadalaada.
42001054	Ak anuweat soomjeandaannyi was Israeeli, aba giipkeatta baydeaydaannyi,
42001055	gawuurji gidaghayi rukusiinda ghwaanigaasa, ea Abrahaamu ea jaattaannyi aba gweannyeekka manda muudeanooda.”
42001056	Gwandeayi niny sea Mariya ea goosha sheah samwagu, imuchchu gabiiktta gheannyaawa.
42001057	Iiduw nea ghwahitta damandaannyi bea jeatta gwaji Elisabeetti jeepta was balleanda.
42001058	Iiy gischeawdaannyi ea buweadeagaaschi gideaba nubwayda Ng'uttamiida Elisabeetti gang'weela sean.
42001059	Eaweetteaba siis geayaat jeepta ghasmeahooda; ak ghwanyawa gajeeng'assa gheawunga ghwaan siyi Sakkariya,
42001060	ak gwayeeshsha ghamwat, “Manda; gajeeguura Yohaana.”
42001061	Ak geeyeeshsha, “Aba buweadeagaagu manda siida sing'assa gheawung'su.”
42001062	Iiduw geeng'wachsa geadi ghwaan gwargu gheawunga gasa gang'assa.
42001063	Gamus eeyeasa beehiida jea ghang'waar, ak ghang'waar gideaba, “Gheawungaaschi Yohaana.” Ghahamng'eanyi sean.
42001064	Deagheatta ghwajaat ghuutta nea goottina ng'ushapta ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta.
42001065	Hean ghang'ut muuwda gischeewda nyaawa sean. Ak gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheesu aba heayeeniga sean mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya;
42001066	Fuga sean iiy iitteaba ng'asheesu gaba niih ang'ng'ooysa jeadaannyi nea gwayi, “Jeebi gayghoaw siida uurjiin?” Aba gideaba geattinda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badaydaannyi.
42001067	Nea Sakkariyaayda was ghweanda jeepta geannyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit ak ghwaramoaran nea gwayeena,
42001068	“Dumsheesiinda gaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Israeeli, aba gideaba nibareassa ak gwalealu buneadaannyi,
42001069	nimiinda gujaweeda lealnooda aba jeeda gheeda soomjeandaannyi was Dawdi,
42001070	Gawuurji gidaghayi rukuteayda aba ghuutta sibangaaschi ghaydidi ghang'eada garayi,
42001071	ak gajeelealnaneasa heeda weajoodigaasa, ea geattinga fuga sean sideasa;
42001072	ak gayghabwayda ghwanigaasa aba gidaheelleesa, nea ghoapkaat neajeadaannyi ghaydit,
42001073	ak gweaksa habeawooda Abrahamooda was ghweandeanya,
42001074	ak gagooneasa gideaba gajeelealnaneasa geattinga weajoodigaasa, ak geaghadoawannyi nea meawwali gil,
42001075	aba ghaydidanda ea doobiiwnatta galeagasean amwadeadaannyi aba jeeda eaweegaasa sean.
42001076	Nea ang'iing'i jeepta, gajegureweey sibaneeda Aseetta haw; aba gideaba gajasheedeawana Ng'uttamiida sissiina naweadingaaschi,
42001077	Nea gwarukusa fugaaschi ghwanal fughareeda lealnooda aba samsiinda aba geandeayda riing'eega nyaawa,
42001078	Aba baydeayda Aseetteanya, nirearseasa weeshinda leabu humng'eeda,
42001079	ak gayghoabwaay fuga sean mida jeeda misaneeda haw bea jirooneeda miyeeda, ak ghoadoabiiw geashangaasa eayaada naweeda miy bea hoyyooh.”
42001080	Ak gwahissa heeda jeepta nea ghwanyas uurda aba gurorooda, nea goobiitta dareapcheenda ea ghwahitta eaweedaannyi jea goohimsina geaw fuga Israeeli.
42002001	Askwearjoojikka ghoadayda Gaysaari Aguusto digheanda nea gwayeeshsha, ang'waara monneeda buneassean mida jeeda ng'eanyiida.
42002002	Ng'oordi dea madeeda, nea gwanda sugoochcheandumeeda Sirya Gireeniyo.
42002003	Gaba siisi weah eang'waar aba mujiineeda ng'eang'da nyaawa.
42002004	Hean ghwascheang'da Yoseefu ghabeawa Galilaaya, nea ghabeawa mujiineeda Nasaretti, ak gawa Yudeeya, ea ghwahitta mujiineeda Dawdi, suguura Betleheemu, aba gideaba gaba dooshta Dawdi,
42002005	Gawa eang'waar sea Mariyaayda was huuda anyeari, nea abeeda ea gweayiideat.
42002006	Damanda mideewa hooweani ghwahitta damanda jea gwajiila.
42002007	Gwaji duweachcheadaannyi was balleanda ak gookkwealsa hang'weakka jeepcheandumeeda ak goluul aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega, aba gideaba mwanyasa heeda jea gwalla aba ghoorida rabasta.
42002008	Nea aba damandida abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiitta Jeagiischoodiga fur gisilga nyaawa eawa.
42002009	Gabussa saawa Malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoabwaay murdajeega nyaawa sean gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida, ak ghang'ut muuwda.
42002010	Ak gwayeeshsha Malaykajeanda, “Adoobealli; ang'ulla geayeanneegwa giijasta miy bea hooseaneega jea gwahiissa buuneessean.
42002011	Aba gideaba eannean aba mujiineeda Dawdi siji appadahuukkeagwa, lealnoochcheanda, niny Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiida gil.
42002012	Nea gwadeagooda jea adaaha ea nihi; gajadaaha jeepta sikkwealsa hang'weakka jeepcheandumeeda nea geelluul aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega.”
42002013	Deagheatta gwandeayi sea malaykajeanji lugooda saang'a bea humng'eeda ak gwaduumsheesa Aseetta nea gwayi,
42002014	“Gigheambiita gaba Aseetta mida humng'eeda, ak aba ng'eanyiida ghoaw hoyyooh aba heeda fuga ahoosan!”
42002015	Iiduw nea nibiikta Malaykajeega humng'eeda, gwayeenniissa geat Jeagiischoodiga, “Asi eweaya Betleheemu eadaaha gidabunu, rukuneasa Ng'uttamiida.”
42002016	Gaweay nea ghwalamwajaada ak geanyasa Mariya ea Yoseefu heeda mida jeepta nea gwalil aba jeeda daghwalda leehha dugwa beega.
42002017	Daah gwarukuta gidagwachcheaya surgu aba badaydeaba jeebi;
42002018	ghahamng'eanyi fukka sean iyiiy gidaruksa jeagiischoodigean.
42002019	Nea Mariya gong'ng'ooysa jeadaannyi ng'asheesu seaniin, nea gottemsheesa geaw.
42002020	Iiduw gabiikta jeagiischoodiga nea ghoaghambiit nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta aba ng'asheega siyiiy ea gea sidaah, gawuurji gissurukusiinda.
42002021	Ng'atta eawooji sis nea siyaat ghasmeahooda geeguura Yeesu, gheawunga ghayi ng'assa malaykajeanda nea miih ghwanyas ghaamwat gweayumeeda.
42002022	Iimuchchu nea ghwahitta damanda nyaawa bea gimmiinnooda gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweedeeda Muusa, hean geayaat niny Yerusaleemu ak geattaw Ng'uttamiida
42002023	(gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, “Gilinyooh ea balleanda was duweachcheeda gil gajeeguura siida ghaydiit bea Ng'uttamiida,)”
42002024	ak ghoadayda haleanjeeda sisapa geadi gawuurji gidanyaashta deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, “Was bakpakchooji iyyeenya ghana dayi iyyeenya bea ghariibajeanda.”
42002025	Nea abeeda gwanda Yerusaleemu, siisi suguura gheawungaaschi Simon, nea siisi abeeda ea doabiiwaat, nea gabada Aseetta, nea goomuukku hawdeayda fuga Israeeli, nea gwanda badaydaannyi Gurorooda Ghaydit.
42002026	Nea ea nigeawiit goohiimsa Gurorooda Ghaydit gideaba mayghami nea mighwadaah Gristoyda Ng'uttamiida.
42002027	Ak ghwaat Gurorooda Ghaydit gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; nea ghwaat ghwaan ea ghaamwat Yeesu jeeda gheeda nea geehinda giduurji ng'asheega deaweeda,
42002028	ghoang'ng'waay aba geattingaaschi ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta nea gwayi,
42002029	“Ng'uttamiida, biissiina siksiina soomjandaang'u gabiissa gawa nea ghwaat hoyyooh, gawuurji ginnyah ng'asheandaang'u;
42002030	aba gideaba gheanyangeasu nidaa lealeanoodaang'u
42002031	ghayi isni nea ghwadaah buuneessean,
42002032	Weeshinda jea ghoabwaay emoojiga, ak ghoaw gigheambiitta aba heeda fugaagu was Israeeli.”
42002033	Hean eara Ghwaan ea ghaamwat ghahamng'eanyi aba gissirgu appadaydaannyi;
42002034	Gang'ushsha Simon saawa nea gwayeeshsha Mariyaayda was ghaamwat, “Ng'ulla, jeebi gajeenung ghoaw gibeedeayda ea ng'eedooda fuga saang'a bea Israeeli, ak gayghoadaw gwadeagooda jea ghaheawa buuneeda
42002035	(nea jeadaang'u gayghwalach barda) nea ng'asheega jeesinga fuga saang'a gajeattaajiit.”
42002036	Ghayi gwanda gatmooni was sibaneeda, suguura Ana, was hudeaba Fanuweeli, bea emeeni siyi Asheeri; ak ea nuwasiit muuchchi, ghayi geaghi nea miyeasat ak gwandeawa siyeeda gwaannyeaw ispwa,
42002037	goobida masinung'weandumeeda gweannyew seedam ea ang'waan. Nea miih gwaheelli gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea gagadoowani nea gwarada jalooda nea gamoora Aseetta eawa ea askweari.
42002038	Gwardu aba damandida ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta, ak goobaloola niny ng'asheega sean bea fuga amuukku lealnooda Yerusaleemu.
42002039	Iiduw nea nihiit sinooda ng'asheega sean gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweedeeda Ng'uttamiida, gabiikta Galilaaya, mujiineeda gheannyawa was Nasareetti.
42002040	Gwahiissa heeda jeepta nea ghwanyas uurda, ak geannyiit weaghumeeda; nea gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
42002041	Nea Ghwaan ea ghaamwat gabadiini gilakkweay Yerusaleemu aba damanda ghwelmeeda Basakka.
42002042	Iiduw nea nihiitta gweannyeew damana iyyeenya, ghwascheang'da gawuurji gideajusu bea geallaan;
42002043	duulean ghwelmeeda, damanda biikteawa, geeppuussa bwadaw balleanda was Yeesu aba Yerusaleemu nea ghwaan ea ghaamwat ea majeeng'na.
42002044	Gearar gideaba gwanda jeeda bareanda ak gaweay ea gamikta, geang'ng'eat ghuutta gassooda aba jeeda buweadeega ea fuga sinal;
42002045	ama duuw nea mudeanyas, Geebiikta Yerusaleemu nea geegaseadayyi.
42002046	Muchchu nea ning'atta eawooji samwagu geanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea goopteada aba bugusta ginealshoodiga, nea gooleeysiit nea Gonyearriida ng'asheega;
42002047	nea fuga sean iiy ghahamng'eanyi isiidaah gidabwaraayda uhuuda ea gisheahiida ng'asheega sinnyaash.
42002048	Sidaah niny geahamng'eanyi; ak gwayeeshsha Ghaamwat, “Balleanda, ghwasaan anda gihinduneasa? Ng'ulla, aniini ea gweanu sinyarji aba gassodaang'u.”
42002049	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwasaan anda googaseadayean? Neada ea mwoonali gideaba gammisean giibinda jeeda ghooriida Bwaabwa?”
42002050	Nea saawa ea majeeng'na ng'asheanda rukusa.
42002051	Ghwararang'aada godeayi ea ghwahitta Nasareetti, nea gwasissa mureada; nea ghaamwat ghwayiin jeedaanyi ng'asheesu seaniin.
42002052	Gwahissa heeda Yeesu aba weaghumeeda ak gohoosan Aseetta ea buuneeda.
42003001	Aba gweaydeaba damana muut bea Diberio Gaysaari, nea abeeda Bondio Bilatto ea sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Yudeeya gil, nea Heroode abeeda ea sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, nea oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Filippo ea sugoochcheanda Idureeya ea Dirakonit, nea Lasaniya, abeeda ea sugoochcheanda Abileeni,
42003002	Nea abeeda aba damanda waseewa Anaasi ea Gayafa ashoohoodiga heesi, ghwahidu ng'asheanda Aseetta heeda Yohaana balleanda Sakkariya aba dareapchcheeda;
42003003	Hean ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiissean neaweesa Yordaani, nea gwarukkwiida gibattiisanda samsiinda ring'eega.
42003004	Gawuurji gidasung'waarda aba jeeda gittabooda ng'asheega sibaneeda suguura Isaaya gideaba, “Ghwanya ghuutta siida nyearra dareapcheenda; nea gwayeena asissina naweeda Ng'uttamiida, olleappa naweadingaaschi.
42003005	Nea geeng'alsa ghalalayeekka sean, ak geahiing'u giijeega ea heayeeniga, nea heeda ghwana gajeattoabiiw nea naweadinga gudung'nyoojiga gajeesin gamiyeasiidi;
42003006	Ak gilinyooh ea sihi gayghwadaah lealnooda Aseetta.”
42003007	Gwarukusa fuga saang'a buwa heedaannyi eppattiisan, ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea dayeega udang'usheega! Gwareekuseegwa ng'eaha ea amng'awa ea mwanyaseagwa nyarasta jea ghwahidu?
42003008	Asi ajiila haghweega miisa dukkuunooda, ak ea adooyeenniisi geat, ‘Geendeawi ghweandeanya nea Abrahaamu,’ Asi geayeeshshineegwa ghoammu Aseetta ghwayam lagheang'su ghoaw diibiga Abrahaamu.
42003009	Ak ghamneawa joommooda asiyiin gumsheakka geediga, ak geediga maji haghweega miyaas gajealach ak geejaksa jeeda beasta.”
42003010	Ghoanyaash emeeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Abeeda gajeesna naha?”
42003011	Ghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mideawa hang'weak iyyeenya, dadawa hang'agi siida mandeawana, nea siida mideawa hamitta ea dasindunu.”
42003012	Ghapka eara fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi eppattiisan, ak eara saawa gwayeeshsha, “Gajeesna naaha aseasa Ginealshoochcheanda?.”
42003013	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adoong'ng'oonyayi gwadeeda haweawa dea sirukuneegwa.”
42003014	Eara shirikkara ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ama aseasa gajeesna naaha?” Gwayeeshsha, “Adoareachchi siida gidaannyi aba urda ghana oahhaakta aba ng'uyyeega, akghusa mushahareedeang'wa.”
42003015	Damanda duu gwandeewa buuneeda jeeda furdeaydean, gonyeari geat buneassean aba jeesinga nyaawa aba iitta Yohaana, gideaba gwadeeppa ea Gristohi,
42003016	ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha buuneessean “Aniini geabattiisananeegwa beega; nea siida jea ghwahidu gaburdeawean uurda, mammiisean geattineadi deanga geakkaaschi; nea niny gaygobattisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea beasta.
42003017	Gida aleella booga gwanda geattindaannyi, ak gobuus heeda jea goleelsa, ak iiduw ghwayiin booga silleal jeeda gijigooda, nea looyda ghaghwarda aba jeeda beasta maygamis.”
42003018	Gwareekusa nea goobaloola buuneeda ng'asheega saang'a nea gwarukkwiida Giijaasta Miy.
42003019	Iiduw gowoowsa Heroodeeyda was sugoochcheanda, nea gowoowsiina gheenda Heroodiya, was gatmooda oorjeeda ghaamwat, ea badayda ng'asheega munyas saang'a sina Heroode,
42003020	ea mwaara gil gwasin dea muy nuut gwajaksa Yohaana ghealooniga.
42003021	Hit gibattiisanda buuneeda sean, ea dea Yeesu nea ghamwaash Aseetta ghwajaada bugusta humng'eeda,
42003022	ak gwashubeesa uhuudaannyi Gurorooda Ghaydit wunnda ghariibajeanda ak ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi balleandeanyu abwariinyi gwadan jeedeanyu.”
42003023	Yeesu ghoang'eat ginealshoadannyi nea gaba gweannyeew diktam ea damanamughuush, nea abeeda (geaghay) gideaba niny balleanda Joseefeeda Eeli,
42003024	Eeli gaba Mattari, Mattari gaba Laawi, Laawi gaba Meelgi, Meelgi gaba Yanayi, Yanayi gaba Yoseefu,
42003025	Yoseefu gaba Matattiiya, Matattiya gaba Amos, Amos gaba Nahum, Nahum gaba Esli, Esli gaba Nagayi,
42003026	Nagayi gaba Maatti, Matti gaba Madattiya, Madattiya gaba Shemeyi, Shemeyi gaba Yoseefu, Yoseefu gaba Yuuda,
42003027	Yuuda gaba Yoana, Yoana gaba Reesa, Reesa gaba Serubabeeli, Serubabeeli gaba Shaltieli, Shaltieli gaba Neeri,
42003028	Neeri gaba Meelgi, Meelgi gaba Adi, Adi gaba Goosam, Goosam gaba Elimadaamu, Elimadaamu gaba Eeri,
42003029	Eeri gaba Yoshuwa, Yoshuwa gaba Elieseri, Elieseri gaba Yoorim, Yoorim gaba Matatte, Matatte gaba Laawi,
42003030	Laawi gaba Simon, Simon gaba Yuuda, Yuuda gaba Yoseefu, Yoseefu gaba Yonaamu, Yonaamu gaba Eliyakkiimu,
42003031	Eliyakkiimu gaba Meleeya, Meleeya gaba Meena, Meen gaba Matatta, Matatta gaba Nattani, Nattani gaba Dawdi,
42003032	Dawdi gaba Yeese, Yeese gaba Obedi, Obeedi gaba Boasi, Boasi gaba Saala, Saala gaba Nashooni,
42003033	Nashooni gaba Aminadabu, Aminadabu gaba Admiini, Admiini gaba Araamu, Araamu gaba Hesroon, Hersoon gaba Bereesi, Bereesi gaba Yuuda,
42003034	Yuuda gaba Yakkobo, Yakkobo gaba Isakka, Isakka gaba Abrahaamu, Abrahaamu gaba Deera, Deera gaba Nahoori,
42003035	Nahoori gaba Seruugi, Seruugi gaba Reewu, Reewu gaba Beleegi, Beleegi gaba Ebeeri, Ebeeri gaba Sheela,
42003036	Sheela gaba Genaani, Genaani gaba Arfosaadi, Arfosaadi gaba Sheemu, Sheemu gaba Nuuhu, Nuuhu gaba Lameek,
42003037	Lameek gaba Metusela, Metusela gaba Henookko, Henookko gaba Yareedi, Yareedi gaba Mahaleeli, Mahaleeli, gaba Genaani.
42003038	Genaani gaba Enooshi, Enooshi gaba Seetti, Seetti gaba Adaamu, Adaamu gaba Aseetta.
42004001	Iimuchchu nea ninyas Yeesu Gurorooda Ghaydit, gabiikna Yordaan ak ghoadoabiiw Gurorooda
42004002	gobiida dareapchcheeda askwearjooji haradam nea gwasimsim Meang'nyeandeenda. Amwaaga gil eawoojusu seaniin; ng'atta askwearjoojusu, ghwayeachchi.
42004003	Gwayeeshsha meang'nyeandeenda, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta ginung' ghoaw lagheaneeni mukkatte.”
42004004	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Siida moammu goobideewa ng'eanyiida mukkatte akghwahit.'"
42004005	Ghwaat Meang'nyeandeenda ak goodiing'da heeda miy ghaang' ak goohiimsa daroorakka sean bea ng'eanyiida gili nuwaas.
42004006	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaydagoonnyi gheambalmeani seaniin ea gigheambiitta nyaawa; aba gideaba sigoonan, ak gaydaadaw siida wassean eagasayi.
42004007	Iighadoawannyaan, gayghoaw haleanjeeni seaniin gaagu.”
42004008	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Ghadoawana Ng'uttamiida was Aseetttaang'u, nea gigadiyeesi niny akghwahit.'"
42004009	Hean ghwaat Yerusaleemu, ak godiing'da uhuuda gheeda sibatta Aseetta heeda geaw, ak gwayeeshsha, “Iiwosi Balleanda Aseetta, ging'adaattaawi geaw hiji;
42004010	aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Gaygoojeagu malaykajeagaaschi ak gafurnyi,’
42004011	Ea gideaba, ‘Gayghwadeabwaneey geattinga nyawa, ea mwalasa geeshtang'u lagheaneeda.'"
42004012	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi geeyi, ‘Adisimsimi Ng'uttamiida was Aseetttaang'u.'"
42004013	Hean ahiit meang'nyeandeenda giliwas simsimda, ghanyi gawa ea ghwanyas gheatta damannuut.
42004014	Iiduw gabiigu Yeesu aba uurda Gurorooda ak gawa Galilaaya, ak gageawiit iitaannyi aba daroorakka sean neekki.
42004015	Goonealshachi aba jeeda ghoorajega nyaawa sinealshachcheewa, nea ghooghambiit buuneessean.
42004016	Iiduw ghwahidu Nasareetti, heeda ghayi hissiina heeda, ak gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, gawuurji gideajusu bea geallaan, aba eaweeda sabatto. Ghamiinaada ak ghoassoamwa;
42004017	geattaw gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya. Ghoayyaaw gittaabu ak ghwanyas heeda sing'oorsa gideaba,
42004018	“Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badaydeanyu, aba gideaba nimwaaran dawa darukkwiisa fuga barbari Giijasta Miiy. Gojeaknean darukusa fuga mida ghealooniga siksiinda nyaawa nea fuga ng'oowwi gayghoang'wearda, ak gojeaknean dalealu fuga sighabwas,
42004019	nea gearukuti gweayda sumwas bea Ng'uttamiida.”
42004020	Hean ghwarat gittaabu, ak ghoadaw siida gadiyeeda, ak goopteada; ak gohang'ooysa ghaang' buuneessean mida jeeda ghooriida sinnealshchcheewa.
42004021	Ghoang'eat baloaldaannyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Eannean ng'ooruussu nisa aba jeeda iidigeagwa.”
42004022	Gabaloola sean ng'asheega miyaas appadaydaannyi nea geahamng'eanyi isiyiiy ng'asheega dagheerjeandumeeda baloola. Ak geeyi, “Neada siisi ea miih balleanda Yoseefu?”
42004023	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geasikteawi gideaba gajoorukuneani ghwasildeanga gideaba, ‘Meanginyeanda, ahaabwa geaw'; ng'asheega siyiinyi ghayi isni aba Gapernaumu, sina earaba ng'eanyiidaang'u.'"
42004024	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa manda sibaneeda jea eamwas aba jeeda ng'eanyiidaannyi.
42004025	Asi aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, ghayi gwanda masiinung'weega saang'a ng'eanyiida Israeeli aba damanda Eliya, damanda roada roopta gweannyeew samwagu ea shealaah, ak ghwahidu gejeeda haw jeeda ng'eanyiisean;
42004026	eara Eliya ea mechcheakta gawa hichpa nuut, geenung' gawa heeda masiinung'weanda assagi mida Serepta, mida ng'eanyiida Sidoni.
42004027	Abeeda gwanda fuga saang'a bearji udamusuura aba ng'eanyiida Israeeli gweayda waseewa Eliisha sibaneeda; ak ea meammiinna eara siyagi, geaghus Naamaneeda ng'eanyiida Sirya.”
42004028	Iyiiy ng'asheanji fuga mida jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa gwanyareesi sean.
42004029	Ak ghang'eatng'eat erruteawa mujiini, ak geayaat mareetta heayeeda sideeksa mujiineeda nyaawa, nea geegasa eang'ng'adattaawa uhuuda heayeeda.
42004030	Ghang'eat ak ghwalach bugusta nyawa ak gawa.
42004031	Ak ghwararang'aada gawa Gapernaumu, was mujiineeda Galilaaya. Ak ghoanaal saawa eaweeda Sabatto;
42004032	ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba ginealshoadaannyi, aba gideaba ng'asheandaannyi gwandeawa gheambalmeeda.
42004033	Nea aba jeedeaba ghooriitta sinnealshachchewean gwanda Siisi mideawa gurorooda meangeenda muy hean; gojuur muuchchi aba ghuutta haw,
42004034	“Seh! Akayhindaneasan ang'iing'i Yeesuuyda Nasareetti? Ghwasaan anda gineayaneasa? Ghanalli siiduwosi guwosi dea Ghaydit bea Aseetta.”
42004035	Goojuursa Yeesu niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Siinda, ak giritteawi siisi!” Ghwanung' Meangeenda ghoabeada siida aba bugusta buuneeda, ak gwaritteaysa siidida nea miih gwasawan.
42004036	Hean ghahamng'eanyi sean ak gaba niih eshsha nuut, “Niih ana ng'ashaani? Iissa Gwarukutteawa uurda ea gheambalmeeda nea gwayeeshsha meangeenda aritta ak gwaritta.”
42004037	Gageawiit iittaannyi aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiitta seaniin eageng'oojiga.
42004038	Iiduw ghang'eat ak gwaritteawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ak gawa gheeh Simon. Nea abeeda gheamatta agweaji Simon ghamnyaan, gabearji sheagheeda ng'waan ak geemus ghoahap.
42004039	Gawa heeda mida gheamattida ak ghamiinaada aba murdeadaannyi, ak goojursa sheagheeda, ak ghahabwa gheamatta sheagheadaannyi; deagheatta ghang'eat ghoang'aatta saawa.
42004040	Damanda mikteawa aseetta, ghapka buuneeda sean headaannyi nea gweadu fuga miyean bea siisi bearji geeyoadaannyi, ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi iheenga fuga miyeani ak gaheaba sean.
42004041	Gwaritteaysa fuga saang'a meangeenda nea gojuuri nea gwayi, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta!” Gowoowusa saawa, ak ghwarat ghuusiga ea mabaloola aba gideaba eara saawa ghwanal niny Gristo gil.
42004042	Muchchu sakteayda ghang'eat gawa heeda manda sii, ak gagaseada buuneeda ama sihiitta heeda geegasa eatteal ea manung'usiina heeda;
42004043	gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaydawa darukkwiida Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta aba mujiinajeega suurja, aba gideaba suuh gea sichcheaknaneani.”
42004044	Abeeda gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa aba ng'eanyiida Yudeeya.
42005001	Eaweechcha nea gwanda murdeeda basooda Genasareetti gwaneaweesa buuneeda nea goleeysiit ng'asheega Aseetta.
42005002	Ghwadaah maleambaji iyyeenya aba murdeeda basooda, nea abeeda ea nuweay fiibwa gohuun gheareedanga nyaawa sing'ng'oonnya ghweayeega.
42005003	Gawa jeemba maleamboonagi was dea Simon, gwayeeshsha seabwa nung' gosiipta maleambooda gil mwanang' gawa jeeda basooda ak goopteada ak ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwanda jeeda maleambooda.
42005004	Rat ghuutta baloolda, gwayeeshsha Simon, “Asiipsiina heeda saang'a beega, ak ghoapputti ghearedangeagwa alealni ghweayeega.”
42005005	Ghwasha Simon nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida haw, geegadiyi aweasean ak ea meang'ng'waanyi gil! Ama ninyaashtunu gaydabuutta gheareedanga.”
42005006	Iing'atta sinoodeaba niih, ghoang'ng'waay ghweayeega saang'a; ea ghwariikghta gang'ada gheareedanga nyaawa,
42005007	Gang'wachsa geadi fiisu mida jeemba maleambooni neekki ghapka ghaweat. Geegawusa maleambajeega duwaaw ea gwaramagu gwalik beega.
42005008	Daah Simon Betro ng'asheanji, gobeedeaysa madeeda Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Ng'uttamiida, asiipteawana heedeanyu, aba gideaba geabea riing'a.”
42005009	Ghahamng'eanyi sea fukka sean mideayiin, aba ghweayeega siing'ng'waay;
42005010	nea abeeda gwanda Yakkobo ea Yohaana was balloojiga Sebedaayo sinuudayi gadiyeeda sea Simon. Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu Simon, “Adibeali; ghang'eada ghamneawa gaylealluuni buuneeda.”
42005011	Aruunna maleambajeega nyaawa jeeda basooda ghang'eatng'eat gwanung'sa heeda haleanjeessean ak geayaat geeshta.
42005012	Eaweechcha nea gwanda jeemba mujiinajean, ghwahidu headaannyi Siisi bearji udamusuura, daah Yeesu, gobeedeasa madeadaannyi ak gamus nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, iigasayi gimmuusi amminnaan.”
42005013	Ghoahaakta geadi Yeesu ak ghawaas nea gwayi, “Geagasayi; miinni.” Deagheatta gwaritteaysa udamusuura.
42005014	Ghamiin gheang'da ea marukusiina siih; nea gwayeeshsha, “Una ahimsiina geaw ashoohoochcheanda, ak gisabi geadi haleanjeeda siyeada ghadooweeda was gidaghayi rukuteayda Muusa, asi abeeda gajeadaah gideaba simminneey.”
42005015	Ak gageawiit iitta aba daroorakka sean, ak ghapka Emeeda headaannyi goleeysiit nea ghoahaap fuga bearji geyoonung'weakka.
42005016	Iiduw gwajireada ak gawa dareapcheeda ghamwaash Aseetta.
42005017	Eaweechchanjagi aba jeedeaba eawoojikka gonealshi, abeeda goobiitpiit Farisayajeega ea ginealshoodiga deaweeda leabu gilinyooh ea gharang'da Galilaaya, ea Yudeeya ea gealeabu Yerusaleemu; nea gwandeawa uurda Ng'uttamiida ak ghoahaap buuneeda.
42005018	Asi ng'ulla, ghapka buuneeda nea gwasareenna muunda siisi abittu damealga, ak geegasa gichchea eayaatta gah, ak geeyiin madeeda Yeesu;
42005019	iiduw nea mwanyasa gheatta gichchea gweetteayda gah aba seang'ayda emeeda, gwading'da uhuuda gheeda ak geerrareang'u sea muundaannyi gwasku seawadeeda ea eayiin madeeda Yeesu.
42005020	Daah masaweega nyaawa gwayi, “Siida, sisamsa ring'eegaagu.”
42005021	Gonyeari geat Farisayaajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwayeena, “Siisi ng'eaha ang'eawi Aseetttean ghanyeamanda siisi ammu gwasamsa ring'eeda geaghus Aseetta akghwahiit.”
42005022	Jeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheega anyeari geat gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda gonnyearayi geat ng'asheesu aba guroruunatkeagwa?
42005023	Awussis anneeda, gideaba dayi, ‘Ring'eegaagu sisasmsa,’ ghana dayi, ‘Ng'eada ak guwi?’
42005024	Asi geagasayi anala gideaba Balleanda Siida gwandeawa gheambalmeeda aba jeeda ng'eanyiida jea gwasamsiina ring'eega iiduw gwayeeshsha siitta abittu damealgeani, geayi, ng'eada, sareana muundaang'u ak guwi ghoah.”
42005025	Deagheatta ghang'eat siidida aba madeennyaawa, ak ghwasar muundaannyi ak gawa ghoah nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta.
42005026	Ghahamng'eanyi sean, nea geakghambiit Aseetta nea ghang'uut muuwda nea geeyi, “Eannean sidaayi ng'asheega deamdeameadi.”
42005027	Iiduw gwaritta jarooda ak ghwadaah siisi ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi suguura Laawi, nea goopteada aba gheeda sing'ng'waanya gwadiin; ak gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”
42005028	Ghang'eat ak gwanung'usa heeda halanjeasean, ak ghwaat geeshta.
42005029	Gwasissa Laawi ghwelmeeda haw aba gheannyi; ak gweagiischi nea gambuuchchi fuga saanga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea buuneeda suurja.
42005030	Hean goniiksa Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nyaawa ginealangaaschi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goyeagiischi nea goleeshi sea fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega?”
42005031	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga majeekcheewi magaseadayyi meang'nyeanda geaghus gagasa gea miyeani.
42005032	Aniini mwaawuni daguursa fuga doobiiweadi, ghawunnyi daguursa fuga ring'eega gwadukkuuna ring'eega nyaawa.”
42005033	Hean geeyeeshsha, “Anda ginealanga Yohaana goluulliida geat nea ghamwaash Aseetta, ak eara ginealanga Farisayajeega gwasiniidunu, nea gaagu gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi.”
42005034	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ghoammu gwaliilda rabasta nyeangiida nea gwandeayi sea siida geeshshi?
42005035	Amaduw gwanda eaweetta jea egeandeawa siida geeshshi aba jeennyaawa, eaweechcheanji gaygwaliilda.”
42005036	Hean gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Manda siida jea ghabwaash weasta hang'deesh ak ghawaasa hang'da waas, iisindunu gayghabwaash dea eesh, ak abeeda weastida bea hang'deeshiin maygweatteayyi sea dea waas.
42005037	Ak ea manda siida jea ghwayiin difaayeeda miih ghwaheas jeesinga ghadeatka woosi; iisindunu, gaygwanyarjeaweada difaayeeda miih ghwaheas ghadeatka ak gaygaweay difaayeeda, ak gwanyara ghadeatka.
42005038	Difaayeeda miih ghwaheas geaghus eyamsa jeesinga ghadeatka eashiish.
42005039	Ea manda siida jea iing'atta leeyda difaayeeda heeseadi jea gagasa gea miih heeseadi; aba gideaba gaygwayi, ‘Gea heeseadi amiyaas.'"
42006001	Eaweeda Sabatto damanda beawa gwasik jeesinga madameega, hean ghwalajaada ginealangaaschi muschoonga, ak gang'ealng'ealsa jeesinga baneaguukka nyaawa ak ghwaak.
42006002	Gwayeeshsha Farisayajeega mwaatkwa, “Ghwasaan anda goosinnyi ng'asheanda mwadoabiiwa eaweeda sabatto?”
42006003	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Miyoassoamwana gidaghayi sin Dawdi iyeachchih.
42006004	Gidabeada jeeda gheeda Aseetta, ak gageanu ak ghwaak mukkattajeega siyiin madeeda Aseetta, nea mwadoabiiwa aba hichpa siinuut geaghus ghwaak ashoohoodiga, ak ghoadaw eara fuga mideayi sea niny?”
42006005	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Siida Ng'uttamiida sabattoohi.”
42006006	Eaweechcha nuut bea sabatto, damanda beawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak goonealshi, gwanda jeeni siisi apttu geattinda dugwa.
42006007	Gang'ula Ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega eadaa ea jea ghoahaap siidida eaweeda sabatto, aba sareani geegasa gichchea eanyasta ramaseanda jea eahhaktaawa.
42006008	Hean ghwanal gidamida jeesinga nyaawa, ak gwayeeshsha siidida aptu geattindean, “Beenni miinaada aba hiji.” Ak ghang'eat ak ghamiinaada aba hoowa.
42006009	Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gaydanyasheagwa, aba eaweetta sabatto, ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geesin ng'asheanda miyi ghana ng'asheanda muy. Ghang'wana gighuuyda eaweega ghana ng'wana lakkunooda?”
42006010	Ng'atta ghoaduup ghaang' buuneeda aba murdajeega sean ak gwayeeshsha siidida, “Asi adoabiiwa gattindaang'u.” Hean ghoadoabiiw ak gabiikta geattinda gamajeegiit.
42006011	Ghwanyareas muuchchi fugiga ak geebalool eegasa gichchea eehinda Yeesu.
42006012	Askwearjoojikka gawa iheenga heayeeniga ghamwaash Aseetta; ghamwaash Aseetta eaweesean.
42006013	Iimuchchu, Gaguursa ginealangaaschi, ak ghwaloat damaniyyeenya aba jeennyaawa, ak gaguura malaykajeega;
42006014	Nea Simoneeda suguura gheawungaaschi Betrohi, ea oorjeeda ghaamwat siyi Andreya, ea Yakkobo ea Yohaana, ea Filippo, ea Bartolomayo,
42006015	ea Mattayo, ea Domaso, ea Yakkobo balleanda Alfayo, ea Simoneeda suguura Selotte,
42006016	ea Yuuda balleanda Yakkobo, ea Yuudayda Iskariyoti, was siida amaduw ghwala bwadaw.
42006017	Iiduw nea ghwararang'aan sea saawa ak ghamiinaada aba heeda miy ng'eanyi, abeeda gwandeawa fuga saang'a was ginealangaaschi ea emeettuw leabu meatkwajeega sean bea Yudeeya, ea Yerusaleemu ea ghuutta basooda Diro, ea Sidooni, nea ghapka gooleeysiit niny nea geahaap geyoonung'eakka nyaawa;
42006018	Ak ghoahaap eara fugiga bearji meangeenda munyasiin.
42006019	Gagasa emeessean ghawaas niny, aba gideaba uurda gwaleabu headaannyi ak ghoahaap sean.
42006020	Iiduw gagatgat gheanyangaaschi goong'weersa ginealangaaschi, ak gwayeeshsha: “Ghoang'wani agogeeda barbari, aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta deang'wa.
42006021	Ghoang'wani agoogeeda yeadeagwa jiih ghamneawa, aba gideaba gajoolang'uuda. Ghoang'wani agoogeeda oyyeawdi ghamneawa, aba gideaba gajoayaaga rear.
42006022	Ghoang'wani agoogeeda sideagwa buuneeda, nea gwahistaneegwa nea gong'eawweegwa ak geemmunyasiidi gheawungeagwa, appadayda Balleanda Siida!
42006023	Ahoosana aba eaweettida, nea ghoang'waschi aba hooseaneega, aba gideaba gimeardeang'wa aahaw aba humng'eeda, aba gideaba niih gidaghayi hinda ghweaniga nyaawa sibanga.
42006024	“Asi ashageada agoogeeni owoschi baruurjeewiin, aba gideaba noanyaaschi hawdeayda.
42006025	Ashageada agoogeeni owoschi lang'uudeat ghamneawean, aba gideaba gajadaaha jalooda. Ashageada agoogeeni oayaaji rear ghamneawean, aba gideaba gajaguttuuni heareega nea gooyeawdi.
42006026	Ashageada agoogeeni, jea gagwarseegwa buuneessean iin aba gideaba eara ghweaniga nyaawa ghayi gwahindunu sibanga ng'uyeega.”
42006027	“Asi Geayeeshshineegwa agoogeeni oyiing'shiin, abwariinya weajoodigeagwa, asissiina geamiyaas fuga sideagwa,
42006028	Abadiischeesiina fuga morridaneegwa, amwaasha Aseetta appadahuukka fuga ghabwaseegwa.
42006029	Siida iilas madang'daang'u, giidawi eara meatkweeda niirja; iiyareannyi siih hang'daangu ginung'usi eara shaatteadaang'u.
42006030	Siida musnyi gil adawa, nea siida arreannyi halanjeadaang'u ea adimaseawi.
42006031	Asi gidoogasayi gwasinneegwa buuneeda agooga, asissina eara saawa.
42006032	“Iyoabwariinyi fuga bwarinyeagwa, abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga ring'eega ghabwariiy fuga bwariiy saawa.
42006033	Iyoosissi geamiyaas fuga sinnuneegwa gea miyaas, abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga riing'eega gwasna gea urjunu.
42006034	Iyoanung' goleakshi fuga oanalli gideaba gay ghoaghuumneagwa abeeda ghoahhiimu naaha miy? Aba gideaba eara fuga riing'eega gooleaksheewa heeda fuga ring'eega, aba gideaba ghwanal gideaba gay ghoaghuumu.
42006035	Asi abwariinya weajoodigeagwa, nea goosinnyi gea miyaas, nea ghoanung' goleakshi, nea adoofurdi godelneegwa gil; abeeda gimeardeang'wa gajaahaw, ak gajahuuwa balloojiga Aseetta haw mida humng'eeda; aba gideaba niny aamiy aba fuga mabadiischeesiina ea gea geawwi gheanyan.
42006036	Andeawana baydeayda, ak gawuurji gidamideayeatta Ghweandeang'wa baydeayda.
42006037	“Adoorgweakkiisi buuneeda, ak ea majeergweakseegwa; adooyeatti ghuussi, buuneeda ak ea majeeyeatteeweegwa ghuussi; asammisiina buuneeda, ak gajeesamseagwa;
42006038	oattawa buuneeda haleanjeeda ak gajeegoneegwa; daanyiit, sidaksa, siittuumduum, ea ghwanawda, ea gichchea gagoneegwa. Aba gideaba giideennooda ootteennidi gichchea eetteenneegwa.”
42006039	Gabalool nea gagalla geat ng'asheega: nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi siida ng'oaw gayghoammu ghoadoabiiw siinuut ng'oawi? May ghoabitta duwaawi jeeshshoomanda?
42006040	Ginealaneeda mwang'ala ginealshoochcheandaannyi, geaghus ea niduulu ginealshooda abeeda gaygwadeennyi sea ginealshochcheandaannyi.
42006041	Ghwasaan anda gung'ulayi hararooyeanda mida jeeda gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu nea mung'ulli geetta mida jeeda gheang'daang'u?
42006042	Ak gajammuustaan eshshiina oorjeeda geamadu, ‘Oorjeeda iyya, nung' dageanu hararooyeanda mida gheang'daang'u,’ nea midaahi geetta mida gheang'daang'u ang'iing'i. Siida ammiittu geaw, nyooh ghanyi geanda geetta mida ghang'daang'u, abeeda gaydaaha muuchchi gichchea geandeayda hararooyeanda mida gheang'da oorjeeda geamadu.”
42006043	“Geetta miiy majiilla hagheega munyas, eara geetta muy ea majiilla haghweega miyaas;
42006044	aba gideaba gilinyooh ea geadi geenalla haghweagaaschi. Aba gideaba mwaang'wa eebinna gulageetka geetta halaghweenga, ghana mwoang'wa ebiinna misabiibu heeda yudeeda.
42006045	Siida miy aba jeeda gheaseedaannyi miy bea guroroadaannyi goruuttu gea miyaas, nea siida muy aba jeeda gheaseedaannyi muy iissa goruuttu gea munyas; aba gideaba ghuutta gabaloolla gea nyiit jeeda jeeda guroroadaannyi.
42006046	“Ghwasan anda googurewean ‘Ng'uttamiida, Ng'uttamiida,’ nea moosinni gidearukneegwa?
42006047	Siida wassean wuuh heedeanyu ak ghwayiiy ng'asheegeasu ak gwasin, gaydahiimu giduurji:
42006048	gawuurji sea siida deekshi, ghurghurda daranajeega muuchchi ak ghwayiin sindeetta heeda mida lagheanga; hidu guldeayda eenda, gagulsa gheeda, ak ea mwabwaanya, aba gideaba sideas muuchchi.
42006049	Nea siida iiy ng'asheegeasu ak ea masna gawuurji siida deeksa gheeda badayda ng'eanyiida nea manda sindeetta; hidu guldeayda, deagheatta ghabwaay, ak habitkweedeaba gheetta ahaw muuchchi.”
42007001	Iiduw ahiit Yeesu baloaldaannyi sean gasa ghwayiiy buuneeda gawa Gapernaumu.
42007002	Damandida gwanda ngeanyiitta shirikkarajeanda haw mideawa siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda bwariiy muuchchi, nea abeeda ghabwar miyeeda.
42007003	Iiyiiy iitta Yeesu, goojeakta gweargwa Yahuudi headaannyi eemus ghwahidu ghoahaap siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
42007004	Hitta heeda Yeesu gemeermeerani nea geyeeshsha, “Siisi gammiisa weattaang'u.
42007005	Aba gideaba siisi ghabwariiy emeedeanya ak gwadeekneasa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa.”
42007006	Goodeayi Yeesu saawa. Geeyi bwak ama neekkiisa gheeda, goojeakta shirkkarajeanda hawfuga duupchi eyeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida adideawiidi geaw aba gideaba mammisean gideaba gay hinni jeedeaba gheenyu.
42007007	Aba gideaba mammiisean dahidu heedaang'u, ang'iing'i rukuni ng'asheanjagi ak gay ghahaap siideanyu bea gadiyeeda.
42007008	Aniini geawoschi siida mideawa gheambalmeeda ak geaballi shirikkara, inyeessa iyeayeeshshi akkalealla, ‘Una,’ gawa; nea nuut iyeayeeshshi, ‘Beenni,’ ghwaan; ak eara siideanyu bea gadiyeeda iyeayeeshshi, ‘Sina gili,’ gwasin.”
42007009	Ghahamng'eanyi Yeesu iiyiiy ng'asheesu hean gwayamsa geaw emeeda gwachchi eattu geashtannyiin, ak gwayeeshsha “Earaba jeeda ng'eanyiida Israeeli miih dadaah siida mideawa masaweega huumwa uurjunu.”
42007010	Iiduw nea gabiikta fukka gwachchi sichcheaktean ghoah, ghwahitta nea ea nihaap siitta bea gadiyeedean.
42007011	Iiduw ghang'eat Yeesu gawa mujiineeda suguura Naini, nea goodeayi ginealangaschi ea emeetuw.
42007012	Iiduw nea geneekkiissa ghuutta mujiini, hean geroonnyi sea sareenda eadu muspa balleanji was ghaamwat masiinung'weanda, ak ea balleanda ghus ghaamwat gil nea goodeana emeettuw bea mujiineetta.
42007013	Daah Ng'uttamiida gatmoodida ghabwayda ak gwayeeshsha, “Adiiyyeawudi.”
42007014	Gawa ama neekkiissa ghwoang'ng'waay ghabearanga ak ghamiinaada buuneeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Geeyi ng'eada baleanda.”
42007015	Gwaduudu Siida nimi ak goopteada ak gabalool ak ghwoadaw Yeesu ghaamwat.
42007016	Ghabeal buuneassean; ak geakghambiit Aseetta, nea geeyi, “Nirinna ng'eang'deanya sibaneeda haw! Ak eara Aseetta ea nihidu gabareessa fugaaschi.”
42007017	Gageawiit iittaannyi aba ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ea geng'oojigaaschi.
42007018	Gweassa Ginealanga Yohaana iitteaba ng'asheesu seaniin.
42007019	Hean gaguursa Yohaana ginealangaaschi iyyeenya ak gojeakta heeda Ng'uttamiida ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ang'iing'i guwosi siida ghayi jea ghwaani ghana jea eammuukghuna nuut?”
42007020	Gaweay ama hiitta heeda geeyeeshsha, “Goajakneasa Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi nea gwayi, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi siitta ghayi jea ghwahiduuni ghana jea eammuukghuna nuut?'"
42007021	Ak aba damandida ghoahaap fuga saang'a miyeani ea gea bearji meangeenda, ak eara fuga ng'oowwi aniimmu ghoang'wearda.
42007022	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak goorukusi Yohaana ng'asheesu oayinyiin ea gea oadaayi, fuga ng'oowwi niimmu ghoang'wearda, fuga badoojiga gaweelweel, fuga udamusuura siimmiidu, fuga miinyi niyiing'shi, muschcheekka siittuuttu, gea barbari geerukusa Giijasta Miy.
42007023	Ghang'wana siitta mwamwachmwajaniin.”
42007024	Iiduw nea gabiikta fuga gwachchi ajeagu Yohaana ghang'eat goobalool emeeda aba badayda Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwachchi goweayi ong'ng'wearsiina naaha aba dareapcheeda, mudayeanda ayuuk jeammeeda?
42007025	Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Siida akkwa hang'weakka bumbuni miyaasi? Ang'ulla, gideaba buuneeda mideawa hang'weaka miyaas ak ghwaak miyeenooda gwanda gealga sugoodiga.
42007026	Abeeda gooweayi adaaha naaha? Sibaneeda? Huumwa gil, geayeeshshineegwa, ahaweawa eara sibaneeda.
42007027	Niih siida ghayi sibean eergu aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gil gideaba, ‘Ng'ulla, geajeagu giijasoochcheandeanyu ghwaan madeadaang'u, jea gwasin naweadaang'u aba madeadaang'u.’ Aba
42007028	Asi geayeeshshineegwa aba jeeda diibiga jiih gadeemga manda dea haweewa Yohaana; ak eara gwasa siida mwanang' muuchchi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ahaweewa niny.”
42007029	(Iiduw nea ghwayiiy fukka ng'asheesu sea fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin geamwas dobiiwnatta Aseetta aba gideaba fiisu fuga ghayi sippattiisan aba gibattiisanda Yohaana;
42007030	nea Farisayajeega ea diinagoojiga ghaheawa ng'asheega gasa Aseetta bea badahuukka nyawa, aba gideaba ghaheawa goobattiisan niny.)
42007031	“Gaydagala naaha fiisu bea jeachcheeng'suun, suuh fuga urjiini?
42007032	Gawurji diibiiga abiitbiit aba jeanaadi ak gaguurriisa geat nea gwayi, ‘Gealaschi igeambooda ak amoang'wasi; geennyahushshi ak ea mooyyeawdani.’
42007033	Aba gideaba Yohaaneeda Abattiischchi ghwahidu ak ea mwaaga mukkatte nea mwali difaayeeda ak gooyeennyi, ‘Gwandeawa meangeenda.’
42007034	Ghwahidu Balleanda Siida ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi; ak gooyeennyi, ‘Ang'ulla, gitteaw ea leyeanda, fugaaschi gea ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi gil ea fuga ring'eega!’
42007035	Nea weaghuumeeda ea nidaajiit gideaba ea doabiiwnatta aba heeda diibigaaschi sean.”
42007036	Gaguursa siyagi bea Farisaayu goombuuchchi niny, gawa gheawi bea Farisaayuun ak goopteada gweagiischi.
42007037	Hean iiy gatmoomba riing'a mida mujiineedida, gideaba gwanda gheeda Farisayajeanda gweagiischi, gweadu gideeshteayda nyiit nagheeda ng'andit,
42007038	hean ghamiinaada appwadaw aba murdeeda geeshangaaschi ak gooyeawda, ea goobitpissa dabeakkaaschi geeshanga ak gobuus aba buudeagaaschi uhuudaannyi ak ghwasam geeshanga nea ghwayeasha nagheedida.
42007039	Daah siitta was Farisayajeandida guursean gissin goottemshi nea gwayi, “Inyeeda siisi gwachchi ea sibaneeda gil, gwachchi gayghwanal gatmoani waasiin giduurji aba gideaba gaba riing'a.”
42007040	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Simon, gwanda ng'asheanji jea darukuneey.” Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Naaha gil, Ginealshoochcheanda?”
42007041	“Siyagi ghayi gwandeawa fiih iyyeenya mideawa sileadaannyi; akkalealla gwandeawa sileemba dinaaraji bughalaji muut, nea niirja gwandeawa haradam ea damanamuughuush.
42007042	Iiduw nea niraay gidaydeayda, gwasamsa fiisu seaniin. Asi ghamneawa aba jeedeaba fiisu dea jea ghabwariiy muuchchi anneeda?”
42007043	Ghwasha Simon nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaaghanyi gajea siitteani sisamsiina gasaang'aani.” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Asi nirgu huumwa.”
42007044	Gwayamsa geaw Yeesu gatmoodida ak gwayeeshsha Simon, “Gung'ulayi gatmooni? Ghawunnyi gheang'u, ak ea miigoona beega jea deahuuna geeshangeasu, nea niny ghwanung' gobitpissa dabeakkaaschi geeshangeasu ak gobuus buudeegaaschi.
42007045	Ang'iing'i miih samwaan nea niny dea naahinni hiji ea miih ghwanung'waada samitta geeshangeasu.
42007046	Miyeashana uhuudeanyu nagheeda nea niny ea niyeasha geeshangeasu nagheeda.
42007047	Asi gaydayeeshshineey, ring'eegaaschi saang'a sisamsa, aba gideaba ghabwariiy muuchchi, nea dea sisamsa gilimwanang' gayghabwariiy gilimwanang'.”
42007048	Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Sisamsa ring'eegaagu.”
42007049	Iyiiy fukkeanji agiischiin mideayi sea ninyiin gaba niih eeshsha geaw, “Siisi ng'eaha jea gwasamsa riing'eemba nuudiin?”
42007050	Ak gwayeeshsha gatmoodida, “Nighuunyi masaweagaagu; una nea gibeahi hoyyooh.”
42008001	Iiduw ghang'eat gwasik jeeda mujiinajeega ea gharang'weakka, gwarukkwiida nea gweadu Giijasta Miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta. Nea abeeda gwandeayi sea ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya,
42008002	nea abeeda goodeay gadeemsu mida jeeda gea siihaabwa meangeenda ea geeyoonng'weakka: Nea Mariyaayda suguura Magdaleena ghayi sirruutteawa meangeenda assispwa,
42008003	ea Yoana gatmooda Guusa, ea haghweadoochcheanda haleanjeeda Heroodehi, ea Susaana, ea suuk gea saang'a, gadiydooscheesa saawa aba haleanjeeda mideawa.
42008004	Iiduw bwat geat Eemeetuw leabu mujiinajeega sean gaweesa buuneeda niny, ak gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha:
42008005	“Ghayi ghang'eat siih gawa histeayda; hitta nea gwahista gwanda gea abitpissa heeda was naweeda, ak geallaaplaap aba geeshanga, nea ghwahitta dariidakka humng'eeda ak ghwaak.
42008006	Gwanda eara gea abitpissa heeda was harearachcheanda; ridu ghwasis aba gideaba miih nyeewaneat sigeeda.
42008007	Gwanda eara gea abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweenga; iiduw nea gwardu sea halaghweenga ghwariis geediga.
42008008	Gwanda eara giikka abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin ak gwardu, gaba ghealooni jiih bughala.” Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mideawa iidiga jea ghwayiinya, ea dayiing'shi.”
42008009	Iiduw ghoanyaash ginealangaaschi gidabaysiina gallodeaba geat bea ng'asheega,
42008010	gwayeeshsha, “Agoogeeni simeayneegwa makcheameeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta; nea aba fiih suuk geaghus eegalla geat, aba gideaba eara iyang'wearda amayghwadaah, ama eara iyiiy amayghwanal gidawas.”
42008011	Balooli gissigala nihi: Histeanga geegala ng'asheanda Aseetta.
42008012	Giikka abitpissa naweedean fugiga ama iiyiin gil; hean ghwahidu meangeenda gageandeawa ng'asheandida guroruunatka nyaawa, aba gideaba adaghamwas ak gealealu.
42008013	Nea giikka abitpissa badayda harearachcheandean, giikka ama iiy ng'asheanda ghoang'ng'waay nea gahoosaniini; ak ea mandeawana hawungeani, iissa ghamwas gilinuwaas ama duw nea geesimsim gabay gabiikta bwadaw.
42008014	Nea giikka abitpissa jeeda geediga halaghweengean, ea giikka ama iiy, iiduw nea gaweay ghwariis mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida bea gassooda barureega, ea haleanjeeda bwariiy sasanuukka nyaawa ak iiduw haghweagaaschi ea mwaheasa.
42008015	Nea giikka abitpissa jeeda sigeeda miyaasiin, giikka ama iiy ng'asheanda, gabay ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi aba gurorooda miyiini, ak gwaji haghweega aba milikghteayda.
42008016	“Manda siida jea ghoayeat gheaboong'nyeanda ak gwadukuteawa dahuuda, ghana ghwayiin uutta bulaliida, geaghus ghwayiin uhuuda ghamarda, abeeda ghwadaah fuga buwa gah weeshinda.
42008017	Ea manda gidafunyaat ak ea majeenung' ghwadajiit, ak ea manda gidawassean was makcheameeda jea ea majeattahaach ak geeyeadu heedeesh.
42008018	Asi ashageada aba gidoayiing'di; aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheassa, nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gitta mideawean gajeegeanda.”
42008019	Iiduw ghwahidu ghaamwat sea oorjooga geennyea Yeesu ghapka headaannyi, ak ea meanyasa gheatta jea eahhittaawa headaannyi aba seang'ayda emeeda.
42008020	Geerukusa nea geeyeeshsha, “Geamadu ea oorjooga geamadu ghamiinaada aba jarooda, nea gagasseey.”
42008021	Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Iiyya ea oorjooga iyya gea iiy ng'asheanda Aseetta ak gwasiniini.”
42008022	Eaweechcha gawa jeeda maleambooda sea ginealangaaschi, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eakghaawana basooda eebu meatkweeda niirja.” Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay,
42008023	damani beawaan abeeda ghoang'ng'waay ruweanga. Gabalagu siilakghta aba jeeda basooda ak ghwanung' gwaneawwiida beega ea gwaramagu ghwannyiit beega jeeda maleambooda nea gwanda jeeda washta.
42008024	Geeweay ak ghwaheat nea geeyeeshsha, “Siida haw, siida haw, Sishsheali!” Ghang'eat ak gwareekusa silakghtida ea laweajajeegiga bea basoodean; ak ghwaasiinda gwayi saw.
42008025	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gwandeenu masaweegeagwa?.” Hean ghabeal nea ghahamng'eanyi ak gaba siisi eeshsha nuut, “Siisi niih siida urjiini, ammu gwareekusa jeammeeda ea beegean, ak ghoawal gheang'dean?”
42008026	Iiduw ghwahiitta ng'eanyiida Geraasi, deaschi sea Galilaaya.
42008027	Rarang'aan ak ghoalla ng'eanyiida ghajaam gwaroonnyi siisi bearji meangeenda; leabu mujiini nea nigeawiit ea meakwealla hang'weakka, ak ea mobiitteena eara ghoah gobiitta heeda bung'eadinga.
42008028	Daah siitteani Yeesu gobeedeaysa madeadaannyi ak gojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Geendeayeesi naaha sea ang'iing'i Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta miida humng'eeda? Aniyean adisawannyean.”
42008029	Ghwanyaashtunu aba gideaba abeeda niyeeshsha Yeesu meangeenda ritteaysiina siisi. (Ak ea nibiikssa siisi nyamoanna; inyeessa geefur nea geerada aba munyaloalajeega ea biingu, ak gang'achcheaweada sean ak ghwaat uurda meangeenda ea gawa eeshtearajeanda aba uurda meangeenda.)
42008030	Ghoanyaash Yeesu niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaawungaagu ng'eaha?” Ghwayeeshsha siidida, “Aniini geguurewean Lugooda;” aba gideaba gabearji meangeenda saang'a.
42008031	Gamearmearani Meangeenda nea gwayeeshsha, Geemuschcheey, adiiduu ginung' eeweaya jeeshshoomanda sheagi.
42008032	Aba damani gwanda hawanda ukkurmajeega daghatpa heaya ghwajeada, ak gamearmearani Meangeeda gideaba nung' eweaya eappitta jeedeaba ukkurmajeesu. Ak ghwanung' gaweay.
42008033	Gwaritteawa meangeenda siidida ak ghoabiitta jeeda hawanda ukkurmajeega, gwasalda hawanda ukkurmajeega ghwararang'aadawa beareega heayeeda, ea ghoabiitta jeeda basooda ak goosha sean.
42008034	Daah jeagiischoodiga gaweay gwarukuta gidabunu, gaweay mujiini ea jeeda ng'eanyiida.
42008035	Iiduw gaweay buuneeda ghwadaah gidabun, gaweay heeda Yeesu, ak ghwadaah siidida sihhaabwa meangeendean, nea goopteada aba murdeeda geeshanga Yeesu, nea gookwa hang'daannyi, nea nibiiksa fughareadaannyi; ak geabeal.
42008036	Nea fukka dahiin gwarukwiida gideaba siitta bearji meangeendean sihaap.
42008037	Hean gamus buuneessean mida geeng'oojiga Geraasi gideaba ng'amwana ng'eang'deanya; aba gideaba ning'ut muuwda; nga'atta gwading'da maleambooda ak gabiikta.
42008038	Gamus Siidida sihhaabwa meangeendean iidaah nea gawa hean gwaneawsageaw nea gagasa godeayi, ghwanung' gawa nea gwayeeshsha,
42008039	“Una gheang'u, ak girukkwiidi gitteenna ng'asheega sean bea ginnuweattaneey Aseetta.” Ghang'eat gawa gwarukkwiida aba mujiineesean gitteenna ng'asheega sean sissa Yeesu.
42008040	Iiduw nea gabiigu Yeesu ghwadeapta emeeda aba gideaba nigeawiit gomuukku sean.
42008041	Iiduw ghwahidu heeda siisi suguura Yayro, nea abeeda ghoahaaghwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa; hidu gobedeaysa geeshanga Yeesu ak gamearmearani goodeayi gheannyi,
42008042	nea abeeda hudaannyi was haghasheeda, bea gweannyeew damaniyyeenya, ghabwar miyeeda. Damani weewean ghwariis buuneeda Yeesu aba murdajeega sean.
42008043	Abeeda gwanda gatmooni areemi foojeanda gweannyeew damaniyyeenya ak ea manda siida ammu ghoahaap.
42008044	Ghwaat geeshta ak ghawaasa geaw weleeda hang'daannyi; deagheatta goosha gireemdida bea foojeandean aba geeshangiga.
42008045	Ak ghoanyaashta Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghawaas ng'eaha?” Ghwashaang' buuneessean, gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida haw, emeeda gwaneaweeseey nea ghwariisnyi!”
42008046	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gwanda siida nuwaasan; aba gideaba ghadaayi niritteawanean uurda.”
42008047	Iiduw nea ghwadaah Gatmoodida gideaba mudughoammu ghafuy geaw, gaweesa nea ghabwaadanaada aba muuwda, ama hitta ghoabeada aba madeadaannyi ak ghoadayda iitta aba madeeda buuneessean gidawaasta, ea gidasihhaapta aba geeshangiga.
42008048	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Huda gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu, una nea gibeahi hoyyooh.”
42008049	Damani duuw gabaloolean, ghwahidu siida leabu gheeda siida haw ahaaghwa gheeda sinnealshachcheewa ak geeyeeshsha, “Hudaang'u niibitta; adagudideawiidi Ginealshochcheanda.”
42008050	Iiy Yeesu iidi ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali, ang'ing'i mwasa abeeda gayghahaap.”
42008051	Hitta ghoah eamwanung' gaweay buuneeda gah sea niny, geaghus niny ea Betro ea Yohaana ea Yakkobo, ea ghwaan ea gheamatta jeepta.
42008052	Nea abeeda goyyeawda sean nea gaguuttu heareegaaschi; hean gwayeeshsha, “Adooyyeawdi; aba gideaba miih gami gwalil.”
42008053	Geebarra rear, aba gideaba geanal goolla ghami.
42008054	Hitta ghoang'ng'waay geattinda ak gaguursa nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda, ng'eada.”
42008055	Gabiiksa guroroodaannyi, ak ghaminaada aba geeshangiga; ak gwayeeshsha, oattawa gichchea ghwaak.
42008056	Ghahamng'eanyi ghaamwat ea ghwaan; ak gwayeeshsha, “Adiiduw goorukusi siih ng'asheanji gwachchi easinnyiin.”
42009001	Hean gaguursa ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya ak ghoadaw uurda ea gheambalmeeda jea goobala meangeenda sean ea giheapta geyoonung'weakka,
42009002	Goojeakta gaweay gwarukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea ghoahaap fuga miyeani.
42009003	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adoayaadi geadi gil iyoweayi bareannyeekka, eara haleanjeeda, ghana shageeda, ghana mukkatte, ghana lappiya ak ea adolassi hang'weakka iyyeenya.
42009004	Gheeda jea ahitta wassean, oppiidana, ea eaghus ea noang'ami ng'eang'da nyaawa.
42009005	Nea iyoahitti heeda meegasseegwa, iyooritteawi mujiineedida ghoalalakti birjeanda mida geeshangeagwa ak gayghoaw muwwunooda appadahuukka nyaawa.”
42009006	Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay gharang'weakka gwarukkwiida Giijasta Miy nea ghoahaap fuga miyean aba hiji nyooh ghwahitta.
42009007	Hean iiyiy sugoochcheanda was Heroode iitta ng'asheega sean sisin, hean gwahirbaban, aba gideaba gwayi fuga mwaatkwa sittuuna Yohaana jeeda miyeeda,
42009008	nea mwatkwa gwayeena niihiimu geaw Eliya, nea suuk gwayeena niduudu sibaneeda bea gea ghayi bea garayi.
42009009	Nea Heroode niny gwayeena, “Yohaana ghayi nalaji gheatta; niih ghamneawa gajea ng'eaha eaying'si badayda ng'asheesu seaniin?” Hean gagasa ghwadaah.
42009010	Muchchu ea nibiigu Giijasoodigaaschi gwarukusa iitta ginnisin. Ghwaat saawa ea ghwahitta mujiineeda suguura Betsayda.
42009011	Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u emeetuw, geayaat geeshta; ama sihitta ghwadeapta saawa ak goobaloola iitta sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ak ghoahaap fuga gasa giiheapta.
42009012	Iiduw nea niriikghta gamikta; ghapka ginealanga ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Siksiina buuneeda gaweay gharang'weakka ea jeeda ng'eanyiida gagasa gichchea ghwaak; aba gideaba hiji geendi heeda manda siih.”
42009013	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Oattawa agooga buuneeda gichchaghwaak.” Geeyeeshsha, “Mendeawani gil geaghus mukkataji muut ea ghweayi iyyeenya. Geaghus eweaya eashaaha hamitteaba fiisu seaniin.”
42009014	Abeeda fiisu headiga akghwahit ea sagalamnyooji muut. Hean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Anung' gobiitpiit nea gwasna gharmuchcheekka eatta fiih haradam adamanamughuush.”
42009015	Ak gwasinda gidarukteayda, ghwanung' goobiitpiit sean.
42009016	Ng'atta gageanu mukkattajeekka ghwanyawa ammuudiin ea ghweayeekka ghwanyawa assiyyeenyean ak gagatgat gheanyangaaschi gogeal humng'eeda, ak gabadiischeesa ak ghabanajaada, ak ghoadaw ginealangaaschi ghoang'attaawa emeeda.
42009017	Gweagiischi sean ea gwalang'u. Gewweamu gheaptanga banajanga ak ghwannyiit sooscheew damaniyyeenya.
42009018	Eaweechcha nea ghamwaash Aseetta nea gabwageaw, nea abeeda gwandeayi sea ginealangaaschi; hean ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi buuneeda ibalool gwayeena geawoschi ng'eaha?”
42009019	Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwayeena guwosi Yohaaneeda Abattiisachchi; gwayeena suurja Eliya; nea suuk gwayeena guwosi siyagi aba jeeda sibanga ghayi bea garayi nuduudu.”
42009020	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ama agooga goyeennyi geawoschi ng'eaha?” Ghwasha Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Gristoyda Aseetta.”
42009021	Gwareekusa nea gwayeeshsha, adiidu goorukusi siih ng'asheanji,
42009022	Gwayeeshsha, “Balleannda Siida gayghwanyas sawanadeeda ng'waan muuchchi, nea gayghaheawa gweargwa ea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak gajeenuus, ak gaygwaduudu eaweetteaba samwagu.”
42009023	Ak gwayeeshsha buuneessean, “Siida wassean iigasa gweadu geeshteanyu, ea ada gwasamsa geaw, ak gageanu behiidaannyi ghwasar galagasean ak gweadu geeshteanyu.
42009024	Aba gideaba siida wassean iigasa gwalealu eaweagaaschi gaygabeagu, nea siida hutteawi aweagaaschi aba badaydeanyu gaygwalealu.
42009025	Siida gaygwaloossa naaha iinyas haleanjeessean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ak gahutteawi eaweegaaschi?
42009026	Siida isinnean gheanyanga ea ng'asheegeasu, eara ninyi gaygwasissa gheanyanga Balleanda Siida, damanda jea ghwahinna aba giighaambiittaanyi ea dea Bwaabwa ea dea malaykajeega ghaydidi.
42009027	Aba huumwa gaydarukuneegwa gideaba aba jeeni itteang'wean gwanda fuga miinaada aba hiji maygwasamu miyeeda ea eaghus anidaah sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42009028	Ng'atta eawooji sis nea ghoahiit baloolda gaguursa Betro ea Yohaana ea Yakkobo, hean gaweay uhuumba gijeeda ghamwaash Aseetta.
42009029	Damani Mwasheewa Aseettean, ghwayamwa ormeeda nea eara hang'wakkaaschi gaweeriidi muuchchi ea gameeng'meeng'i.
42009030	Hean gabalool sea fiih iyyeenya, Muusa ea Eliya,
42009031	fiisu ghwahidu nea godeana gigheambiitta ak gabaloola badayda miyeadaannyi, jea gwasa aba Yerusaleemu.
42009032	Aba damani Betro ea oorjooga suurja ea ning'ng'waay ruweanga muuchchi, ama ng'eatng'eat ghwadaah gigheambiittaannyi ea fuga assiyyeenya miinaada sea ninyi.
42009033	Iiduw nea gwasimsa fiisu beatta gwayeeshsha Betro Yeesu, “Siida haw ghwanyawa gahaguuw ameang'amwani hiji; anda meesni udahabeascheew samwagu aba hiji, dea mabeanyi ang'iing'i nirja gaba Muusa nea niirja gaba Eliya;” nea niny abeeda mwanala eara gidarukta.
42009034	Damani baloolean, ghwahidu shamoghooda ak gwadukuta; ghabeal iidaa nea gwadukuta shamooghooda.
42009035	Ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha jeeda shamoghooda, nea gwayi, “Niih Balleandeanyu aloachchi, olleeysiiniit niny.”
42009036	Ng'atta nyeashi, geadaah Yeesu akghwahit. Hean ghwasiinda ak ea meruksina siih aba eawoojikka ng'asheega daah.
42009037	Muchchu nea ghwararang'aana uhuuda gijeeda, gwaroonnyi emeeda saang'a.
42009038	Ng'ulla, gwarinna Siih jeeda emeeda ak goojuur nea gwayi, “Ginealshoochcheanda, geamuscheey ang'weersiina balleannji itteanyu was haghasheedean;
42009039	ng'ulla inyeessa ibalaksa meangeenda ghwanung' goojuur, ak ghoahiil nea gwarinna ghuutta furghooda, ak gwasawan muuchchi, nea magassa gwaritteawa.
42009040	Iyeayeeshshi ginealangaagu orruutta, ghwaraay.”
42009041	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga mandeawana masaweega was jeachcheenga rodeadi, ak gaydeabiitta heedeang'wa ea ghoaw eeju? Eanni balleanji hiji.”
42009042	Damani wunaan, ghwanung' meang'nyeandeenda ghoabeada ak ghoahiil. Ak gojuursa Yeesu meangeenda muy, ak ghahaabwa balleandida ak ghoadaw ghwaan.
42009043	Ghahamng'eanyi sean isiidaa uurda haw bea Aseetta. Damani duuh ghahamwang'eanyi aba haleanjeeni siniin, gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi,
42009044	“Anung' gaweay ng'asheesu jeesinga iidigeagwa; aba gideaba Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga buuneeda.”
42009045	Ea mwanala ng'asheanji surukusean, aba gideaba sufnya saawa, ak abeeda ea majeeng'na; ak ghoawal ghoanyaash niny iitteaba ng'asheanji.
42009046	Iiduw ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda eegasa eanal siida jea gwaheedu aba jeannyaawa.
42009047	Hean gwajeeng'u Yeesu gidabaloola guroruunatka nyaawa, gaguursa jeebi mwanang' ak ghwayiin murdeadaanyi,
42009048	ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Siida deaptaawa gheawunngeasu jeepta uurji niih ghwadeaptanaan aniini, nea siida deaptanaan aniini ghwadeapta siida ghayi ajeaknean; aba gideaba siida mwanang'eewaneegwa oagasean ahaweewaneegwa oagasean.”
42009049	Ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida haw, sidaayi siida arutta meangeenda aba ghawungaagu, ak geeyeeshshi nung'waada aba gideaba siidida mabwaheasa.”
42009050	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Adagudoaheawi; aba gideaba siida mwahasheasa siisi gaba meatkweedeanya.”
42009051	Iiduw nea nineekkiit eawoojiga jea ghabeawa humng'eeda hean gamanya beatta Yerusaleemu.
42009052	Goojeakta buuneeda goosheedeawa niny, ak gaweay gharang'da Samariya, gwasissin heechchea gobiida;
42009053	ak ghaheawa Fugeaba hoowa ghwadeapta niny, aba gideaba ghoang'ng'waay naweeda gawa Yerusaleemu.
42009054	Daah ginealangaaschi was geaba Yakkobo ea Yohaana gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, gigaasay eguursiina beasta jea gwaleabu humng'eeda ak gwadulu fiisu?”
42009055	Gwayamsa geaw saawa ak gwareekusa.
42009056	Ghang'eatng'eat gaweay gharang'da nuut.
42009057	Iiduw nea gudugwanda naweeda gwayeeshsha Siih niny, “Gaydeadu geeshtaang'u aba hiji uwi sean.”
42009058	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Fureayoonga gwandeawa shoomeanga, nea dariidakka gwandeawa ghoorajeega nyaawa, nea Balleanda Siida ea mandeawaana eara heeda jea ghwayiin uhuudaannyi.”
42009059	Gwayeeshsha siinuut, “Eanni geeshtteanyu.” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, nyooh siksean ghanyi dawa dabuy ghweandeanyu.”
42009060	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Nung'waada muscheekka gabuy muscheekka nyaawa; ak ang'iing'i, guwi rukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42009061	Gwayeeshsha siih nuut, “Aniini gaydeadu geeshtaang'u, Ng'uttamiida; nea gidamadeeda gilinyooh goonean gheatta dawa dahealli fugeaba gheenyu.”
42009062	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Manda siida jea ghoang'ng'waay mageemng'eanda ak goong'weersa bwadaw jea ghwahit aba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42010001	Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghwaloat Ng'uttamiida fiih suuk laadam ea damanamughuush, ak goojeakta gabadiinna iyyeenya, goosheedeawa niny, gaweay gil nyooh ea mujiini gil ea heeda wassean gasa niny gawa.
42010002	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Booga asaang'a ak ea ng'ay fuga gadiyeeda, amwaasha Ng'uttamiida bea booga goojeakta buuneeda jea ghwalach boagaaschi.
42010003	Asi aweayeena; nea gong'ulayi aba gideaba geajeakteaydaneegwa dayeega gisilga jeeda suyeekka.
42010004	Adiiduw ghoayaadi geadi shageeda, ghana sandakwajeanda, ghana geekka; nea adoakkeachcheewi siida aba naweeda.
42010005	Nea gheeda wassean oweayi jeeda gidameeda ayeena, ‘Daba gheawi hoyyooh!’
42010006	Abeeda iimida balleanda hoyyooh hoowa, gayghwanyas hoyyooydeang'wa; ama mandana, abeeda gaygabikseegwa.
42010007	Ak goopiidi gheawi, ak gooyeagiischi nea ghoaleayi gissugooneegwa, aba gideaba siida gadiiyi gahaguuw gidageattindaannyi; adooritteawi gheawi ak gooweay ghaaw nuut.
42010008	Iyoahitti mujiineeda wassean sideaptaneegwa, ayaaga gissugooneegwa;
42010009	oahhaabwa fuga miyean mida jeedida nea goorukusi fugiga gideaba, ‘Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekkiiseegwa.’
42010010	Nea aba mujiineeda oweayi sean ak ea mwadeaptaneegwa, goosikchi naweadingaschi nea gooyeennyi,
42010011	‘eara birjeanda mujiineedeang'wa noas geashangaasa geelalaksi iheengeagwa; ak gobiissi anala gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekiit.’
42010012	Gaydayeeshshineegwa, gayghoammu ghamilikghta muuchchi Sodooma eaweettida ea ghang'al mujiineetta.”
42010013	“Shageada, Gorasiini! Shageada, Betsayda! Aba gideaba deamdeamanga ghayi sisin aba heedeang'wa inyeeda ghayi geesin aba Diro ea Sidon, gajea goolla gwaduukkuuna nea gookkwa guniyajeega ak goobiitpiida deareeda.
42010014	Nea abeeda ghayghoammu ghamilikghta girgweaksiinda Diro ea Sidooni ea ghang'aleagwa.
42010015	Nea ang'iing'i Gapernaumu, gigaasayi adiing'da geaw ea hiitta humng'eeda? Gajeahiing'daneay ea hitta uutta ng'eanyiida.”
42010016	“Siida aleeyseegwa iit, gooleeysean iit aniini, nea dea heawaneegwa, ghaheawanaan aniini, nea dea heawanaan ghaheawa dea ghayi ajeakneani.”
42010017	Gabiigu fuga alladam ea damanamughuush nea gahoosan, nea gwayeena, “Ng'uttamiida, eara meangeenda ghoawal ghaanyangaasa aba ghaawungaagu!”
42010018	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghadahaannyi Shattaani nea ghang'adaana humng'eeda gawuurji dadamandeeda.
42010019	Asi ang'ulla, neagonnyeegwa gheambalmeeda jea oolleapsiinana ng'eanyi ichchipkeega ea udagilbajeega, ea uurda jea oopalana weajoochcheanda; nea manda gichchea gwahisseegwa.
42010020	Asi adiidu gohoosannyi aba gidawalda gheang'deagwa meangeenda, ahoosana aba gideaba sung'waar gheawungeagwa aba humng'eeda.”
42010021	Aba damandida gohoosan Gurorooda Ghaydiit ak gwayi, “Geabadischooweey Bwaabwa, Ng'uttamiida bea humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba gifunyi ng'asheesu fuga mideawa weaghumeeda ea gea mideawa fughareenga ak giihiimsi diibiga manang'i; Asaha Bwaabwa, ada gida igassiidi gil.
42010022	Haleanjeassean nugoonan Bwaabwa; ak ea manda siinnal Balleanda geaghus Bwaabwa, ak ea manda siinnal Bwaabwa geaghus Balleanda ea siida wassean gasa Balleanda goohiimsa.”
42010023	Gwayamsageaw ginealangaaschi ak goobalool aba makchcheameeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana gheanyanga daah ng'asheega oadaayi agooga!
42010024	Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, sibanga ea sugoodiga ghayi gagasa ghwadaah ng'asheesu oadaayiin ak ea mwadaaha, nea gagasa ghwayiiy gea oayiinyi ak amwayiinya.”
42010025	Hean ghamiinaada diinagiida ak gwasimsim nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, gay dasin naaha iijaadanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda?”
42010026	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Geang'waar naaha aba jeeda deaweeda? heappi gissoamwandiin?”
42010027	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Bwariinya Aseetta was Ng'uttamiidaang'u aba guroroadaang'u sean, ea aba jeadaang'u sean, ea aba uurdaang'u sean, ea aba fughareadaang'u sean; ea giischeewoochchandaang'u gawuurji gida ibwariiydi geaw.”
42010028	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Asi girgu huumwa; una sina ng'asheesu, abeeda gaynyasa giibinda.”
42010029	Hean gagasa ghoahiimda doobiiwnattaannyi ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Neada giischeewoochcheandeanyu ea ng'eaha?.”
42010030	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi ghwararang'aana siih Yerusaleemu nea gawa Yerikko, ak goobissa geattinga mareanghooga, ak geareat hang'weakka nea geabwar, ak gaweay nea gwanung'usa heeda nea niriikghta ghami.
42010031	Aba gheamamda ghwararang'aana naweedida ashoohoochcheanda dineeda Yahuudi; daah siidida ghwasajaadawa,
42010032	eara siispa Laawi was bareannyeanda gweadu naweeda, ama hiitta howeani ghwadaah ak ghwasajaada.
42010033	Ghwahidu siispa Samariya was bareannyeanda, gweadu naweeda ama hiitta hoowa mida siididean; ghwadaah ak ghabwayda,
42010034	gaweesa ak ghwayeasha deanneaduutka nagheeda nea ghwayiin difaay ak ghwarat ama hiit gooding'da badayda digeeda ak ghwaat ea ghoahiitta gheeda roochcha rabasta ak ghoarear.
