42010035	Iimuchchu gageanu lappiyeeda suguura dinari iyyeenya ak ghoadaw siida bea gheeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Areara siisi, ama shoada gil aba gireerda, abeeda gaydannyiit iyeabiigu.’
42010036	Iing'ulayi heappi aba jeedeaba fiisu assamwaguun, giischeewoochcheandeaba siisi abissa geattinga mareanghoogean anneeda?.”
42010037	Gwayeeshsha, “Dea ghwanyawa bwayda gil.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Eara ang'iing'i una ak gisindunu.”
42010038	Iiduw nea gudeenda naweeda, gaweay ak ghwahitta jeemba gharang'i, mida gatmooni suguura Marta, ghwadeapta ak ghwaat Yeesu gheanyi.
42010039	Abeeda gwanda hutpa ghaamwat suguura Mariya, apteada aba madeeda Yeesu nea gooleeysiit ginealshoadaanyi.
42010040	Nea abeeda gwadeawiit Marta muuchchi aba gadiyoojiga saang'a; gaweesa niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida miduuppi gideaba ghwanung'wanaan hudiyya gadiyeeda nea gabwageawi? Rukusiina ghwaan ghaweadan.
42010041	Ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayeeshsha, Marta, Marta gihashi nea gideawiidi aba ng'asheega saang'a;
42010042	gidasigasa aagi akghwahit. Mariya aniloat gidamiy mwajeammu eegeandeawa.”
42011001	Eaweechcha ghamwaash Yeesu Aseetta, ama ahiit goobearsa ginealaneanagi bea jeeda ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, anaaleasa mooshta Aseetta gawuurji gidanaalda Yohaana ginealangaaschi.”
42011002	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iyoamwaashchchi Aseetta goyeennyi, ‘Ghweandeanya gheawungaagu nung' eakghaambiida. Nung' ghwahidu sugoochcheandumeadaang'u.
42011003	Goaneasa daghwardeanya galeagasean;
42011004	samseasa riing'eagaasa, gawuurji gidasisammiisiindi siida mideawa sileedeanya; ak ea adiigalleassa jeeda simsimda.'"
42011005	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gajeang'eaha aba jeedeang'wa mideawa siittuupchi, jea gaweesa bugusteaweeda ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Siideaduupcheewi, nung' dalaajaneey mukkaattaji samwagu;
42011006	aba gideaba nihissean siidi eaduupcheewi ak ea meandeawani gichchea dayiin mwadeadaannyi;’
42011007	ak gaygwaayeeshsha siitta mida gahiin, ‘Adiideawiichchean, sijapchi gidaghuut ak ea sililli sea diibigeasu, mwammuusi dang'eat dagoonnyi gil?’
42011008	Geayeeshshineegwa, mayghang'eat ghoadaw gil earappeadooda duupchiin ak gayghang'eat ghoadayda halanjeasean gasa siisi aba gideaba mabuurnana giidiktiksiinda musooda.
42011009	Ak geayeeshshineegwa, amusischcheena ak Gajeegooneegwa; agassa, ak gajadaaha; agulgula gidaghuut, ak gajejeasseegwa.
42011010	Aba gideaba siida wassean musiischi gajeattaw, nea siida gaseadayyi gayghwadaah, nea siida gulgul gidaghuut gajeejeassa.
42011011	Gajea ana ghwaani, aba jeedeang'wa ama mus balleandaannyi ghweayeanda, ghoadaw ichchibooda;
42011012	ghana iimus burung'nyeanda jea ghoadaw udagilba?
42011013	Agooga fuga munyas, iyoanaldunu gichchea oattawda diibigeagwa haleanjeeda miyaas, abeeda Ghweandeang'wa mida humng'eeda mwanala muuchchi ghoadawda Gurorooda Ghaydiit fukka musa ninyiin!”
42011014	Hean goruutta meangeenda manda ghuutta; damanda ritteawa meangeenda, deagheatta gabalool siitta manda ghuuttean, ak ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda.
42011015	Hean gwayi buuneeda mwaatkwa, “Gooruutta meangeenda aba uurda Belsebuuli, meangeenda diitta hawiin;”
42011016	nea Mwaatkwa, gwasimsim, nea geegasa ghoahiimda gwadeagooda leabu humng'eeda.
42011017	Nal gidabaloola jeesinga nyaawa, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Iing'uchchi sugoochcheanduumeemba ng'anyiinagi abeeda sugoochcheandumeeni ea maygahuuweada, nea gheeda dardaawaat gayghoabeada.
42011018	Ak eara Shattaani ibalaksa ak gang'uchchi geaw, abeeda sugoochcheandumeedaannyi gaygamajeegiittaan? Ak goorukuttaydiin gideaba aniini gearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Belseebuuli?
42011019	Ama iyearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Belsebuuli, diibigeagwa goruuttiideawa ng'eaha? Aba sareani gaygoorgweakseegwa fugeagwa.
42011020	Ama iyearuutti meangeenda aba uurda Aseetta abeeda ghoanalli gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nihissegwa.
42011021	Gheeda ng'edeeda hoauur, biissa gwandeawa dabitta, iifur gheannyi, halanjeadaannyi sean gaygaba hoyyooh;
42011022	ak geaghus iiweesa siida burdeawa uurda ak ghabwar ea ghwajoar, abeeda gayghoareat dabittaannyi sean bea ng'uchcheeda, ak gwalakkiisa fugaaschi.
42011023	Siida meandeayeewani washteanyu gil, nea dea meaweamuudayeewani goodearriida.
42011024	“Meang'nyeandeenda iiritteawa siida gwaneaydooschi aba ng'eanyiida manda beega gagaseada heechchea gafuufa; raay gwayi, ‘Gaydabiiksa gheenyu ealeabu.’
42011025	Iihitta ghwadaah nea siippuus ak ea sittamdaam.
42011026	Iidaaktunu gayghamwaghaada meangeenda ispwa munyasseewa niny muuchchi, ak gaweay goobiida jeedida; ak giibindeaba siitta gajeamuy ea ghwanaawa diitta ghayi bea mwadiin.”
42011027	Damandida duuw gabaloolean, ghwajaat ghuut gatmu aba jeedeaba emeetta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana jeeda jiilneey ea gidinga ireeri!”
42011028	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana fukka iiy ng'asheega Aseetta nea ghoang'waayiin!”
42011029	Iiduw nea nibassa geat emeettuw, gwayeeshsha, “Jeachcheeng'su jeachcheenga munyas gil; gaseadayi gwadeagooda ak ea manda gwadeagooda, jea ehhiimsa geaghus gwadeagooda ghayi bea Yoona.
42011030	Gida ghayi waseatta Yoona gwadeagooda aba heeda fuga Ninawi, ea gichchea ghoawaatta Balleanda Siida gil aba jeachcheeng'su.
42011031	Gatmooda was sugoochcheanda leabu Wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara gayghwahidu eaweeda jea ergweaksiina fugeaba jeachcheeng'su ak gaygoorgweaksa; niny gwaleabu heeshsheagi ak ghwaan goleeysiit weaghumeeda Sulemaani, nea hiji ging'ulayi, gwanda dea haweewa Sulemaani.
42011032	Gay ghapka fuga Ninawi eaweeda girgweaksiindeaba jeachcheeng'su ak gaygoorgweaksa; nea gwaduukkuuna ng'asheega iiyiiy ng'asheega rukkwiisa Yoona, nea ging'ulayi, aba hiji gwanda dea haweewa Yoona.
42011033	“Manda siida jea ghoayeat gheaboong'nyeanda ak ghwayiin heeda funyaat ghana gwadukteawa dahuuda, iissa geayiin uhuuda ghamarda ak abeeda fuga buwa gah gayghwadaah weeshinda.
42011034	Gheaboong'nyeanda saseeda gheang'da; gheang'daang'u iimiy abeeda eara saseadaang'u gaygwanda heedeesh; ama abeeda amasnu, abeeda saseadaang'u gwanda jeeda misaneeda.
42011035	Asi amilmiliitta adiiduw ghoaw weeshinda mida jeadaang'u misaneeda.
42011036	Asi saseadaang'u sean iimida weeshinda nea manda hiji misana, gaygaweeshiit saseadaang'u sean, gawuurji gilabwaanyi gheaboong'nyeanda aba weeshindaannyi.”
42011037	Damani duugabaloolean, gaguursa siyagi was Farisaayu ghwahidu gheannyi gweagiischi, gawa ak gweagiischi.
42011038	Ghahamng'eanyi Farisayajeandida iidaah gweagiischi nea miigoohuun geadi.
42011039	Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Agooga Farisayajeega iissa gohhuunnyi badayda bayookta ea dea gweeriida, nea jeesinngeagwa ghwannyiit mareanghumeeda ea munyinnda.
42011040	Fuga dasheahi! Dea sin gea jarooda miidea sin eara geaba jihii?
42011041	Asi oattawa haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda bea jiih; abeeda gayghammiidu haleanjeessean aba heedeang'wa.
42011042	Asi Farisayajeega ashageada! Agooga aba gideaba ghoattaydi aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea haleanjeedeang'wa iissa ghoattaydi akkaleala, aba seenga hamuumayga ea sooktayda ea seenga suuk bea nyeanyiida, nea ghoanung'waadi ng'asheega doobiiweadi ea bariinyeega Aseetta; ng'asheesu gammiiseegwa sinooda, nea maroosseegwa ng'asheega suurja.
42011043	Farisayajeega ashageada! aba gideaba ghoabwariinyi oppitpiidana horgajeega madeeda aba jeeda gealga sinnealshachcheewa nea geekkeattooscheeweegwa aba naada.
42011044	Ashageada! Aba gideaba nowuurjeewi bung'eadinga mwadaajiida, sik badahuukka buuneeda nea mwanala.”
42011045	Ghwasha siyagi aba diinagoodiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, iininyaashtunu ea ning'eawweasa eara aseasa.”
42011046	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Eara agooga diinagoodiga ashageada! Aba gideaba goossareenayi buuneeda sareenda meammu easaar, nea agooga ea mwoasadi sareeni eara aba monneenagi.
42011047	Ashageada! Aba gideaba goosnayi bung'eedinga sibanga nea ghweanigeagwa ea fuga ghayi nuus gil.
42011048	Nea agooga gowoschi muushoodiga gideaba ghoamwaschi gadiyeeda ghweanigeagwa, aba gideaba saawa gwanuus, ak goosinnyi agooga bung'eadinga nyaawa.
42011049	Ak gwayi weaghuumeeda Aseetta, ‘Gaydeajeakta sibanga ea giijasoodiga ak gaygwanuuseada mwatkwa nea geesawan,’
42011050	nea foojeanda sibanga sean, geahhiida ghang'eada dea sisna sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak gajeegasa aba heedeaba jeachcheeng'su,
42011051	ghang'eada gihiideayda foojeanda Habiili ea gagul foojeanda Sakkariya, ghayi sinuuksa dageascheeda heeda wagiida ea heeda Ghaydiit. Asi humwa gil geayeeshshineegwa, gajeegasa aba heedeaba jeachcheeng'su.
42011052	Diinagoodiga ashageada! Aba gideaba nogeandi gissittinna gidaghuutta fughareeda, nea agooga ea miyooweayeena gah, nea fuga weay gah eanoakghuumnyi.”
42011053	Iiduw nea ghabeawa hoowa, gwaneaweesa muuchchi ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega ak geasassat nea geennyeari ng'asheega saang'a,
42011054	geebassa nea geegasa ng'asheanda ramwasaat jea gwaleabu ghuuttaanyi.
42012001	Damandida bwadeewa geat emeeda nyiit sagalamnyoojiga ea goolleabi geadiin hean gwayeeshsha niny ginealangaaschi, “Afura geat aba hamirayda fuga Farisaayajeega was gimmiitunodeaba geadiin.
42012002	Gilinyooh eedukutta gajeanung' ghwadaajiit, ghana dea funyaat jea ea mwajeanal.
42012003	Eara ng'asheega obalooli aba jeeda misaneeda, gajeayiiy aba heedeesh, nea gea omeang'shi aba ghoorajeega gajearukkwiida aba iheenga ghoorajeega.”
42012004	“Fuga eaduupcheewi, geayeennyi adoawwalli fiisu ammu gwanuus saseedean, ama ng'atta ea manda gil nuut ammu gwasiniin.
42012005	Gaydamiin gheang'deang'wa aba dea jea oawwala, diitta ama nuusiin, ghoammu gwajaksa jeeda duwayda mamissean; asaha geayeennyi oawala niny!
42012006	Neada udabwaraadaji muut meesheahhideawana heelaji iyeenya? Ak ea manda dea jea gwaroosa Aseetta eara akkalealla.
42012007	Eara buudeesu bea iheengeagwean siyiida sean. Asi adoawwalli ng'eang'i, ghoang'waaneewi agooga udabwaradajeega saang'a.”
42012008	“Ak geayeeshshiineegwa gilinyooh ea siida gil nyooh ghamwasan aba madeeda buuneeda, eara niny gayghamwas Balleanda Siida aba madeeda malaykajeega Aseetta;
42012009	nea siida heawanaan aba madeeda buuneeda gajeaheawa niny aba madeeda malaykajeega Aseetta.
42012010	Siida wassean rugu ng'asheega munyas appadayda Balleanda Siida gajeesamsa; nea siida ang'eawi Gurorooda Ghaydiit ea majeesamsa.
42012011	Ama deeppa eayadeagwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea madeeda gea mideawa gheambalmeeda, ea adoohirbabannyi aba gichchea ashaayda ea ng'asheega jea arukutta;
42012012	aba gideaba gayghoanaleagwa Gurorooda Ghaydiit gichchea arukutta aba damandideani.”
42012013	Ak gwayeeshsha Siyagi aba jeedeaba eemeetta, “Ginealshoochcheanda, rukusiina oorjeeda iyya gagwalnean haleanjeeda jea dahearan.”
42012014	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Siida, ghwayiinan ng'eaha doaw siichchea goheeldoscheegwa ghana siida jea gwalakkuneegwa haleanjeeda?”
42012015	Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Afra geat aba geawunda gheang'da; aba gideaba eaweega siida manda jeeda haleanjeeda saang'a mideawa.”
42012016	Gwarukuteawa gwarukusa saawa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi madamnyeamba siisi was meanang'oochcheanda ghwaheas muuchchi;
42012017	hean gootteemshi nea gwayi, ‘Gaydasin naaha aba gideaba muttandeawa heechchaadayiin boogeasu?’
42012018	Iiduw gwayi, ‘Gaydasindunu: gaydanyarjeaweada gijigoonngeasu ak geasinnyi suuk geahees; ak gaydayiin boogeasu ea haleanjeedeanyu sean.’
42012019	Ak gay dayeeshsha geaw, ‘Ea jeedeanyu, ginndeawi haleanjeesaang'a miyaas idiing'deaysi geaw aba gweannyeekka saang'a, fuufa, agiischeena, lesheena, ak gihoosani.’
42012020	Ak gwayeeshsha Aseetta niny, ‘Rageananeeda! Aweani geegasa eaweegaang'u; abeeda haleanjeeda idiiwusi geaw gay gaba ng'eaha?'"
42012021	Asi niih giduurji siida adiiwwiisa geaw gheaseeda, “Nea meabarursiina gea Aseetta.”
42012022	Hean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Asi geayeeshshineegwa, adoodeawiissi eaweegeagwa gajayaaga naaha, ea gichchea okkwealana sasanuukkeagwa.
42012023	Aba gideaba eaweega ghwalaabwa hoowa hamiitta ak eara saseeda ghwalaabwa hoowa hang'weakka.
42012024	Ng'ulla udaghuu: mahissiida nea malachcha, ea mandeawana gijigoonga, ghana gudihoojiga ak ghoarear Aseetta saawa. Ghoang'waneawi agooga muuchchi dariidakka!
42012025	Ng'eaha aba agooga ammu goodeawiit geaw ak ghoahat geawunda aweagaaschi earea geattinagi?
42012026	Asi imoammuusi eara ng'asheanda mwanang'; ghwasaan anda gonneayi geat aba ng'asheega suurja.
42012027	Ang'ulla deakghweeda gidabuwaanda; ea magadiydooschi nea mamanmanna; ak geayeeshshineegwa, eara Sulemaani aba jeeda baruureagaaschi sean miigookkwealsheatta deakghweeni.
42012028	Asi iyakkwealsheesiindunu Aseetta deakghweeda madameega mida askweareeni ama numuji ea sihisa jeeda duwayda, heappi maygwasinneegwa muuchchi agooga, ea fuga manang'i masawi!
42012029	Asi adootteawiichchi iheengeagwa aba gassooda gichchea ayaaga ghana gichchea oaleaha.
42012030	Aba gideaba emoojiga muunda ng'eanyiida gagaaseadayyi haleanjeeni; ak ghwanal Ghweandeang'wa gideaba googasayi.
42012031	Anyooh ghanyi agassa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ak suuh abeeda gajeehheaneegwa.
42012032	“Adoabealli agoogeeda ng'ay, aba gideaba gagasa Ghweandeang'wa gideaba gahaguuw gagoneegwa sugoochcheandumeeda.
42012033	Ashaayda haleanjeeda ondeawi ak ghoattaydi haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda; asissina geat shageeniga mawoosiitta, gheaseeda mayghoashoay aba humng'eeda heeda may gwaneekkiissa mareanghweanda, heeda mayghwaak eara muguyga.
42012034	Aba gideaba heeda mida gheaseadaang'u heechchea goobiida guroroadaang'u.
42012035	“Arada mananuunatkeagwa nea ghoanung' ghwayeat gheaboonyangeagwa,
42012036	awuurjeewana fuga furda siida haw jea gabiikna nyeangiida, aba gideaba ibiigu ak gagulgul gidaghuut geebay ejeassa.
42012037	Ghang'wana soomjookka hiitta ghweanda nyaawa nea ghoang'wearuun; aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, gaygwaradiischi ak gagoneegwa hamitta, nea gagadiyeeseegwa.
42012038	Iihidu buguusta eaweeda ghana beashatta, ak ghwahidu nea gwasindunu, abeeda ghang'wana soomjoosu.
42012039	Asi anala ng'asheanji, gideaba siida bea gheeda inyeeda gayghwanal damanda jea ghwahinna mareanghweanda gayghoang'wearu, mayghamwas gideaba gajeenyarja gheannyi.
42012040	Asi agooga awosa hidaat aba gideaba damanda moorarsiini gayghwahidu Balleanda Siida.”
42012041	Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Ng'uttamiida, ng'asheesu igalli geadiin girukuneasa aseasa akghwahidi ghana irukusi eara buuneasean?”
42012042	Hean gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Gajea ng'eaha gil was haghweadoochcheanda doabiiwaat biissa ea bwaraawu, jea ghoahaaghwa gheannyi nea ghoadaw siida haw goombal, ak ghoadaw buuneeda gichcheaghwaak aba damandaanyiin?
42012043	Ghang'wana soomjeanda jea gabiigu siida haw ak ghwahiitta nea gwasindunuun.
42012044	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa gayghwanung' goombal haleanjeedaannyi sean.
42012045	Ama eeshsha geaw soomjeandida aba jeadaannyi, nishing'da siida haw aba hinnooda, ak ghoang'eat bayiiga soomjeandidean was headiga ea gadeemga, ak gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi ak gaboogit,
42012046	gaygabiigu siitta haw bea soomjeandida eaweeda mararsiina ea damanda mwanala. Gayghwaaga ghoorjooda ak ghwayiin hijagi sea fuga miidobiiweadi.
42012047	Nea soomjeanda nal gidabwariiy siida hawiin ak ea mwang'aabwa geaw nea masna gidasubwariiyiin, gajeabwar muuchchi.
42012048	Nea siitta mwanalaan ak gwasin gida miisa bayiigean, gajeabwar gil mwanang'. Gilinyooh eattaw gasaang'a aba headaannyi gajeegasa gasaang'a nea dea siittaw ghoahaghwa gasaang'a muuchchi, aba headaannyi gajeegasa gasaang'a ea ghwanawda.
42012049	“Aniini ghaawunnyi dajaksa beasta jeeda ng'eanyiida; ak gidabal ea ning'atta giiyeetta!
42012050	Ak gwanda giibattiisanda miisa gideaba gajeeppattiisanan ea eaghus anihiit!
42012051	Agooga ghoaghanyi gili awunnyi deadu hoyyooh jeeda ng'eanyiida? Manda, Geayeadu dardeayda;
42012052	ghang'eada ghamneawa aba jeeda gheedassagi gaygwanda fiih muut dardaawaat samwagu fuurji iyyeenya nea gafuurji iyyeenya gea assamwagu;
42012053	gayghwadarda ghweanda ea ballanda ea balleanda ea ghwaan, ak ghwadarda gheamatta ea huda ea huda ea ghamwaat, nea ghwadarda ghamasiyeeda ea gatmooda ballanda ea gatmooda balleanda ea ghamasiyeeda.”
42012054	Ak gwayeeshsha emeeda, “Iyoadaayi shamooghooda aba heeda biyeara, deagheatta gooyeennyi ‘Ghwaan roopta;’ ak ea huumwa gil ghwahidu.
42012055	Inyeessa iighuudu jeammeeda leabu wiilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa goyeennyi, ‘Gayghwaraanya daknooda;’ ak gwasa.
42012056	Fuga ammiittu geat! Ghoanalli arukuni giduurji ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda ak ea moanaldaniin arukuni damani bea ghamneawean?”
42012057	“Ghwasaan anda agooga moammusi alaja girgweageedeang'wa nea gobeayi geadi?
42012058	Aba gideaba ideayeewi siida ahaaktaneey madeeda siida laja girgweaguutka, hiji duu andeewana naweedean ghang'wana goduupchi ada ghwaannyi ea ghoahiittaneey madeeda siida laja girgweaguutka, ak ghwayiinnyi siida laja girgweaguutka geattinga shirikkarajeanda ak gwajakseey shirikkarajeanda ghealooniga.
42012059	Aba humwa geayeeshshineey mayritteawana ghealooniga ea eaghus ea niidaydi helajeanda huydean.”
42013001	Abeeda damandida gwanda Fiisu rukusa iitta fuga Galilaaya aguuyi Bilatto foojeanda nyaawa sea haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
42013002	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Agooga ghoaghanyi gili fiisu bea Galilaayaan gaba riing'a muuchchi ea ghang'al fuga Galilaaya suurja, aba gideaba gwasawaneattunu?
42013003	Geayeeshshineegwa, Manda; imoduukkuunani ring'eegeagwa eara agooga gajooshshealda saawa.
42013004	Ghana fukka attamassis bea Siloamu meewa ing'adeesa gheeda geawiin, ghoaghanyi gideaba fiisu niramwas muuchchi ea ghang'al buuneasean abiitta Yerusaleemu?
42013005	Manda; geayeeshshineegwa, imoduukkuunaani eara agooga gajooshshealda gidashealda saawa.”
42013006	Goobaloola galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Siih ghayi gwandeawa shabogheechcheanda aba jeeda madamnyandaannyi bea msabiibu, iiduw gawa gagasa haghweega ak ea mwanyasa eara akkalealla.
42013007	Gwayeeshsha siida fur madamnyeanda, ‘Niih gweaydeaba samwagu gil nea geahittu dagasa haghweegeaba geedi ak ea mwanyasi eara akkalealla. Laksiina ng'eanyi, aba gideaba gaygweaksa naaha uurda sigeeda?’
42013008	Ghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Siida mureeda, eanung'waada jeemba gwaanyagi, ghanyi dabarsa nea ghayiinnyi sururuuda.
42013009	Iideeppa gweanyiin gwaji haghweega abeeda ghwahiit; iideeppa ea maji, abeeda gilaksi ng'eanyi.'"
42013010	Hean eaweechcha nea gonealshi aba jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa eaweeda sabatto.
42013011	Abeeda gwanda gatmooni sinyuut ng'uttooschi meangeenda nea niiluul gweannyeew damassis, nea nighuumwa ea eamudu ghoammu gwadiiw geaw.
42013012	Daah Yeesu gatmoodida gaguursa ak gwayeeshsha, “Iyya siihaapnyi aba geeyooni ibearjewiin.”
42013013	Ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuudeaba gatmoodida, deagheatta gwadiiw geaw ak gwaduumsheesha Aseetta.
42013014	Ghwanyareas siida haw ahaaghwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa aba gideaba Yeesu ghoahaap siida eaweeda Sabatto, hean gwayeeshsha buuneeda, “Gondeawi eawooji laah jea asnana gadiyeeda, asi apkaani eahhabeagwa askwearjoojusu, ak ea adoapkaannyi eaweeda Sabatto.”
42013015	Hean ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga ammiittugeat! Aba agooga gwanda siida maygwajeassa heaydaannyi ghana digeadaannyi aba seammooda, eaweeda Sabatto ak gawa ghoalleayda?
42013016	Ama ghamneawa gatmooni, was hudeaba Abrahaamu nirada Shattaani gweannyeew damassisiin, mammisiina eettin aba ghealoonigaaschi eaweechcheanji bea Sabattohiini?”
42013017	Rugu ng'asheesu ghabwaspwas sean; gea gwachchi sheang'nyi niny nea gahoosan buuneeda sean aba ng'asheega gheambiideadi sin niny.
42013018	Ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gawuurji sea naaha? Ak gaydagalla naaha?
42013019	Gawuurji ghajilleanda geetta suguura haradaali geanu siih ak gwahista aba jeeda madamnyanndaanyi mwanang, ak gwardu ak gwaheedu ea ghoaw geetta, inyeessa gwasin damealga ea gwasissa dariidakka ghoorajeega nyaawa.”
42013020	Iiduw gabiikta gichcha gwayeeshsha, “Gaydagala naaha sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta?
42013021	Gawuurji sea hamiireeda geanu gatmooda ak ghwayiin jeemba sooscheew samwagu bea dearanga, ak ghwanung' ghaghuut geat sean”
42013022	Hean ghang'eat gawa nea gwasik mujiinajeega ea gharang'weakka, gonealshi nea gagal Yerusaleem.
42013023	Ghoanyaash siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida fuga jea ghwalalaan gajeang'ayi?” Hean gwayeeshsha saawa,
42013024	“Amilmiliitta ak goosikchi gidaghuutta mwanang'; aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, gaygagasa fuga saang'a gwasik ak ea mayghoammu.
42013025	Gayghwahidu damanda jea ghang'eat siida bea gheeda ak ghwajap gidaghuutta, hean goobissi amiinaada ak googulgulli gidaghuutta, nea gooyeennyi, ‘Ng'uttamiida, jasseasa.’ Ak gayghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Mwaanali heedooleabu.’
42013026	Ak gajayeeshshina, ‘Aseasa ghayi geembuttoschchi nea geleeshachchi sea ang'iing'i nea ginealshachchi aba mujiineedeanya.’
42013027	Ak gaygwayeeshsha, ‘Geayeeshshineegwa, mwaanali heedooleabu, ang'amwana heedeanyu, agoogeeni sina ng'asheega munyasiin!’
42013028	Abeeda gayghwahidu shookka ea giwiirrooda geeshatka, iyoadaayi Abrahaamu ea Isakka ea Yakkobo ea sibanga sean aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nea agooga ea sihisaneegwa jarooda.
42013029	Ak gay ghapka fuga jea gwaleabu heeda ghayeawa ea heeda biyeara, ea wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa ea wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, ak gaygweagiischi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
42013030	Asi ang'ulla fuga huydean gayghoaw fuga madeeda, nea fuga madeeda gayghoaw fuga huydean.”
42013031	Aba damandida ghapka headaanyi Farisayajeesu ng'ay ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'amwana hiji, aba gideaba Heroode gagasa gwanuusnyi.”
42013032	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aweayeena ak gooyeeshshi fureayootta, ‘Ng'ulla askwareani ea numuji gaydearuutta meangeenda nea ghaahaapchi fuga miyeani, eaweedeaba samwagu gaydaahiit gadiyeedeanyu.
42013033	Eara gwasa gammiisean dang'ng'waay naweedeanyu askwareani ghanea numuji ghanea niseerida; aba gideaba mammiisiina gideaba gajeenuuksa sibaneeda heeda mawosa Yerusaleemu.’
42013034	Ea Yerusaleemu, Yerusaleemu, gibarayi sibanga nea guftayi aba lagheanga fuga siichcheagu headaang'u! Neagasayi niba hada damuughuushta diibigaagu gidamguurriida nghaghooda dayeagaaschi aba jeesinga meang'eagaaschi, ak ghoaheawi!”
42013035	Ang'ulla, ghaheang'wa sinung'usa heeda. Ak geayeeshshineegwa, maygudu abiikta adaahaan ea eaghuus ayeena, “Sibadiischeesa siida wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida!”
42014001	Eaweechcha nea gwanda sabatto gawa gweagiischi aba gheappa siyagi ambaliischi bea Farisayajeega, hean geeng'ulla niny.
42014002	Asi ng'ulla, gwanda madeeda siisi lolloohani saseeda.
42014003	Gobalool Yeesu diinagoodiga ea Farisayajeega, nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba gajeahhaap siida eaweeda Sabatto, ghana manda?”
42014004	Hean geasiinda. Ghoang'ng'waay siidida ak ghoahaap, ak gwasiksa gawa.
42014005	Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gajea ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa, jea ghoabitta, balleandaannyi ghana heaydaannyi jeeda healadeeda, eaweeda Sabatto jea ea maygabay gwalealu?”
42014006	Ea measha ng'asheanji.
42014007	Iiduw gwaruksa Yeesu buuneeda gidagala fuga siguush, iidaa gidiissa ghwaloatta buuneeda hoorgajeegeaba mwadi, ak gwayeeshsha,
42014008	“Tiguurneey siida wassean nyeangiida, adiipteadawi hoorgeda madeeda, aba gideaba gwadeeppa ea siguush siida siwwal gheang'da mawuurjeeweey;
42014009	ak ghwahidu siida guusheegwa ak gwayi, ‘Assiipta goopteada siisi aba hiji,’ abeeda gajuna apteadawana horgeedeaba bwadaw nea gibwaspwasaadi.
42014010	Asi isiguushnyi, guwi ak giipteadi aba hoorgajeegeaba bwadaw, iihidu siida guurneey gaygwayi, Siida eaduupchcheewi beenni hiji bea mwadiin, abeeda gaynyasa mureeda aba madeeda buuneessean imbuuchcheewi.
42014011	Aba gideaba siisi nyooh goodiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u nea dea hiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”
42014012	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siitta guush ninyiin, “Iidaydi hamitteaba askweari ghana ghweelmeeda, adiguushi fuga iduupcheewi ghana oorjooga geamadu ghana buweadeegaagu ghana giischeawdaang'u was meanang'oodiga, gajiiduw gaguushnyi saawa gawalu guurshtida ghayi ittaang'uun.
42014013	Eaweeda isini ghwelmeeda aba gheang'u abeeda giguursi fuga barbari, ea gea ghanyeatta ea gea badoojiga, ea gea ng'oowi,
42014014	abeeda gaynyasa ng'wanooda, aba gideaba fiisu mandeawana gichchea gawalneey. Ak gaygawalneey Aseetta eaweetta dunnooda fuga doobiiweadi.”
42014015	Iiy Siagi bea jeeda fuga ammbuuchchi gwayeeshsha, “Ghang'wana siida jea ghwaak mukkatte aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta!”
42014016	Ghwasha ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Siyagi ghayi gwasin ghweelmeeda haw, ak gaguush fuga saang'a;
42014017	hitta damanda ghweelmeeda goojeakta soomjeanda gaguush rabastannyi nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Abeenni aba gideaba haleanjeessean nihit.’
42014018	Hean ghabwar badooji sean. Ak gwayeeshsha dea madeeda siitta, ‘Nashaayi madamnyeanda ak gaydawa dadaa, geamuscheey samsean.’
42014019	Gwayi niirja, ‘Nashaayi heew damanamughuush bea barooda, ghamneawa geawi danaal, geamuscheey samsean.’
42014020	Gwayi nirja, ‘Nagheannyi gatmooda ak ea maydaammu dahidu.’
42014021	Iiduw gawa soomjeanda ghoadaw siidaannyi haw itteaba ng'asheesu seanin. Ak ghwanyareas siida bea gheeda ak gwayeeshsha soomjeandaannyi, ‘Lamwaja una jeeda naweadinga hees ea gea manang'i bea mujinin, ak giyeadu fuga barbari ea gea ghanyeatta ea gea badoojiga ea gea ng'oowwi.’
42014022	Ak gwayeeshsha soomjeanda, ‘Siida mureeda, gida ijeakteawanean nahiichchi ak gheeda ea miighwannyiit.’
42014023	Hean gwayeeshsha Siitta hawiin soomjeanda, ‘Ritta jarooda una guyeeda naweadinga ea moonghajeega ak gidiing'si buuneeda ghapka gah ghwannyiit gheanyu.
42014024	Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, manda eara siyagi aba jeedeaba fukka sigushiin dea jea gwasamu ghwelmedeanyu.'"
42014025	Hean gaweay emeeda nea goodeay niny; ak Ghwayam geaw ak gwayeeshsha,
42014026	“Siida iihidu heedeanyu nea mwasta ghwaan ea ghaamwaat ea gatmoadaannyi ea diibigaaschi ea oorjooga ghamwaat ea haweega ghaamwat, nea amwasta eaweagaaschi mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
42014027	Siida mwaada behiidaannyi ak gweadu geeshteanyu, mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
42014028	Heappi gajea ng'eaha aba agooga gasa ghwadeas gheeda haw sikkeawiit, ak ea meapteada gwayiida nea goodeen haleanjeeda jea ghwadeakta ghwadaah ea jea gwadeay?
42014029	Aba gideaba gajiiduw gwasin sindeetta, ak ghwaraay ghoahiit, ak abeeda gwajuuga fukka sean dahiin,
42014030	nea geeyi, ‘Siisi ghoang'eat ghuutta deekshooda ak ghwaraay ghoahiit.’
42014031	Ghana gajea ana sugoochchean gil jea iigasa gawa gang'uchchi sea niirja, jea ea mayghanyi goopteada, ak gootteemshi ghwadaah ea ghoammu niny sea fiih sagalamnyooji damanamughuush, ea jea ghoammu gang'uchchi sea niirja mideawa fiih sagalamnyooji diktam?
42014032	Ak idaah gideaba mwoammu gabay gojeakta buuneeda gabay gagasa hoyyooh nea gudeasheagi.
42014033	Asi gwasnu eara aba agooga, siida manung'usiina heeda haleanjeedaannyi sean mideawa mwoammu ghoaw ginealaneedeanyu.
42014034	“Balang'da aamiy, ak balang'da iinuhutta samneeda, ea manda gichchea ekkuuyi gabiiksa mattawanda?
42014035	Biissa ea mudugwarachchi gil earaba ng'eanyiida ghana raghwatta, inyeessa gageanu buuneeda ak gohiisa jarooda. Siida mideawa iidiga ea dayiing'shi.”
42015001	Eaweechcha gaweesa fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ea fuga ring'eega gooleeysiit niny.
42015002	Hean ghoaniikghi Farisayajeega ea ng'oorshoodiga nea gwayi, “Siisi gaguursa fuga ring'eega ak gombuuttooschi.”
42015003	Hean gwarukusa galeega nea gwayeeshsha,
42015004	“Niih gajea anasihi aba jeedeang'wa mideawa gisil bughala, ama roat agi ea maygwanung'usa heeda giikka was seedaam adamwashshageashiin, ak gawa dareabeetta gagasa diitta roadiin ea ghwanyas?”
42015005	“Amaduuw nea ghwanyas, ghwayiin ghattaannyi nea gahoosan.
42015006	Amaduw nea ghwahitta gheannyi gaguursa fuga duupchi ea fuga ascheayi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ahoosaana sea aniini aba gideaba naanyaaschi gisilleandeanyu roat.’
42015007	Asi gwasnu, ak geayeeshshineegwa, gaygwanda hooseaneega muuchchi aba humng'eada appadayda siyagi mideawa ring'eeda ak gwaduukkuna, maygawuurji fukka was seedam ea damwashshageesh doobiiweadi magassa duukkuunoodean.”
42015008	“Niih gajea ana gatmu, mideawa shiliingaji damanamughuush, amaroat akkalealla ea maygorabeat gheaboonyaneeda, ak goobuus gheeda ak gagasiischi muuchchi ea ghwaanyasi?
42015009	Amaduw nea ghwanyas gaguursa fuga duupchi ea giischeawdaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Eehoosana easasean aba gideaba nanyaschi shilingajeandida gwachchi roadiin.’
42015010	Asi gwasnu, ak geayeeshshineegwa, gaygahoosan malaykajeega Aseetta appadayda siida assagi mideawa ring'eada iduukkuuna.”
42015011	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ghayi gwanda siisi mideawa ballooji iyyeenya;
42015012	gwayeeshsha damwanang' ghwaan, ‘Bwaabwa, gwalnean haleanjeeda miisean.’ Ng'atta gagwalsa duwaaw halleanjeeda nyaawa.
42015013	Ama miighang'atta eawoojusu saang'a ghang'eat balleanda mwanang' ghwashaayda haleanjeedaannyi sean ak gawa bareannyeekka ea gawa ng'eanyiida sheagi, hitta ghwasaksakta haleanjeedaannyi.
42015014	Geeyi bwak ama niduulu haleanjeedaannyi sean ghang'eat geejeeda haw aba ng'eanyiitta, ak eara niny gaba fuga gasa gichcheaghwaak.
42015015	Iiduw gawa gadiyeeda aba hichpa siyagi bea ng'eanyiitta, ak ghwanung' siitta gawa madamnyeandaannyi ghoarear ukkurmajeega.
42015016	Iiduw Gagasa ghwaak hamitta ak ukkurmajeega ak ea manda siisi adaw gil.
42015017	Jeeng'u aba Jeadaannyi gwayi, ‘Gwadeannaan soomjooga agiischi aba ghaheanya, ea ghwalach hamichchoojiga nea aniini gayghabwaran jalooda aba hiji!’
42015018	Gaydang'eat dawa heeda ghweandeanyu ak geayeeshshi niny, ‘Bwaabwa neadiiysi humng'eeda ea madeadaang'u;
42015019	ak ea mammisean gideaba gajeegureewean jeeptaang'u, nung' dawurji fiisu was soomjoogeaba gheang'uun.’
42015020	Ghang'eat ak gabiikta heeda ghwaan. Hean nea gudu ea dildeaweat ghoang'wearda ghwaan ama daah ghabwayda ak ghafwach ghwadeapta nea ghwasam gheatta.”
42015021	“Hean gwayeeshsha Balleandida niny, ‘Bwaabwa aniini neadiiysi humng'eeda ea madeadaang'u, mammiisean gideaba gajeegureewean ballandang'u.’
42015022	Ghwalamda Ghwaan ak gwayeeshsha soomjoogaaschi, ‘Alamwaja ayeanni hang'dida miyyiin ak gookkwealsi, nea gooshshuupchi moonneeda ghuniida nea goolleapsi eara geekka;
42015023	ak gooyeadu meaydida riishaadiin ak goonuuschi, eayaaga nea geehoosannyi;
42015024	aba gideaba balleanji iitteanyuun ghayi nimi, ak ghamneawa ea niduudu; ghayi niroat ak ghamneawa ea sinyas.’ Ak geebiissa eang'ng'eat hooseaneega.”
42015025	“Abeeda Oorjeadaannyi haw gwanda madamnyeanda, damani duugwandeawa naweeda nea niriiksa gheedean ghwayiiy ghuutta sarmeeda ea deangheeda.
42015026	Gaguursa soomjeanda ak ghoanyaashta nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Gwandaani hiji?’
42015027	Geeyeeshsha niny, ‘Nibiigu oorjeeda geamadu ak ea ninuus gweanu meayda riishaat aba gideaba nibiigu nea gudeamajeek.’
42015028	Ghwanyareas balleandida hawiin, ak ghaheawa gawa ghoah. Iiduw gwaritta ghwaan jarooda ak gamearmearani niny ghwaan ghoah,
42015029	ak ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha ghwaan, ‘Daah, aniini naaweachcheay gweannyeekka saang'a, nea mwoang'ng'wa danung'waada huumeandaang'u; nea migoonean eara dayeenda ak geahoosannyi sea fuga eaduupcheewi.
42015030	Ghamneawa nea ghwahidu balleanji iittaang'uun duulu haleanjeedaang'u sea gadeemga hiseadean ginuuksi meayda riishaat!’
42015031	Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Balleandeanyu, ang'iing'i geendeaydooschi galagasean ak haleanjeeda eandeawi sean ea gaagu.
42015032	Ak gichcha iisihoosan ghwahit geeng'weala aba gideaba orjeeni bea geamaduun ghayi nimi, ak ghamneawa ea niduudu, ghayi niiroat, ak ea sinyas.'"
42016001	Gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Ghayi gwanda siyagi was meanang'ochcheanda nea gwandeawa haghweadoochcheanda ak iiduw geattaw meanang'oochcheandida iitta gidasaksaktaayda haghweadoochcheanda haleanjeedaannyi.
42016002	Gaguursa niny siidida ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'asheesu eayiinyayi aba badaydaang'uun naaha? Goona iitta moonneeda haleanjeedeanyu bea haghweadoochcheandumeadaang'u, aba gideaba maygudu huuwa haghweadoochcheanda.’
42016003	Gwayeeshsha geaw haghweedoochcheanda, ‘Gaydasin naaha, aba gideaba siideanyu haw gagasa gageandeawaneani haghweadoochcheandumeeda? Meandeawani uurda jea dabwara ng'eanyi, ak ghaawalli musischchooda.
42016004	Ak ea nanyaschi gichchea dasin, ak abeeda ghwadeaptanaan buuneeda aba gealga nyawa isigeandeawanean haghweadoochcheanda.’
42016005	Iiduw Gaguursa fuga mideawa siileeniga siida haw ak gaguurriisiinagi ak gwayeeshsha siida madeeda, ‘Gindeawi siileeni deanaan bea siida haw?’
42016006	Gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghadeat bughala bea nagheeda.’ Hean gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Nukkwa siileadaang'u lamwaja apteada ak ging'waari haradam ea damanamughuush.’
42016007	Ng'atta gwayeesha nuut, ‘Ang'iing'i gindeawi siileeni deannaan?’ Gwayeeshsha, ‘Guniyaji bughala bea ngano.’ Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Nukkwa siileadaang'u ng'waara seedaam.’
42016008	Gagwarsa Siida haw haghweadoochcheandida sina ng'asheega munyasiin, aba gideaba balloojigeaba ng'eanyiin eabareahi iheen aba jeedeaba rooproobang'su ea ghang'al fuga abiitta heedeesh.
42016009	Asi geayeeshshineegwa, asissiina geat roroochcheeda aba meanang'oochcheandumeeda mwadoabiiwa, ama ashealaneegwa gil, ghwadeaptaneegwa aba jeeda giibiinda manda muudeanooda.
42016010	Siida doabiiwaat aba halleanjeeda manang'i muuchchi gajeadoabiiwaat eara aba halleanjeeda heesi muuchchi; nea dea miidoabiiwaat aba haleanjeeda manang'i eara aba gea heesi gajea miidoabiiwaat.
42016011	Asi imoowosi dobiiweadi aba meanang'oochcheandumeeda mwadoabiiwa, gaygagooneegwa ng'eaha meanang'oochcheandumeeda huumwa?
42016012	Nea imoowosi doobiiweadi aba haleanjeemba siih nuut, gaygagooneegwa ng'eaha haleanjeetta was geagwa?
42016013	Manda soomjeanda jea ghoammu gagadiyeesa fiisu hees iyyeenya, aba gideaba gayghwasiit niih ak ghabwariiy niih, ghana ghoang'ng'waay geat sea niih ak gafool niih. Mwoammusi agadiiyeesiina Aseetta ea meanang'ochcheandumeeda.”
42016014	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy Farisayajeega ng'asheesu seaniin gwashka niny aba gideaba sawa ghabwariiy lappiya.
42016015	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga goohindi geat gili oowoschi miyaas aba madeeda buuneeda, nea Aseetta ghwanal guroruunatkeagwa; nea gilinyooh goodiing'u geaw aba madeeda buuneeda, gayghoanyarees Aseetta.
42016016	Deaweedajeega ea sibanga ea gagul Yohaana; hean geerukkwiida Giijaasta miy bea sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea gaba siisi abwasaay geaw.
42016017	Gajeawussus ng'atteayda jea ghang'atta huumng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, mayghwasam gideaba gayghwasuunya ng'ashaanjagi mwanang'a was deaweeda.
42016018	Siida wassean nung' gatmoadaannyi ak ghayi nuut siisi gamealuul, ak siida jea ghaghi gatmooda sunung' earada siisi gamealuul.”
42016019	“Ghayi gwaanda Meanang'oochchaanjagi akkweali hang'weakka oomng'i bea sheayeeda haw ak gwasna ghwelmeeda galagasean.
42016020	Nea abeeda gwanda ghuutteaba gheanyi siisi bwarbwar suguura Lasaaro, nea gwandeawa deanneaduutka saang'a,
42016021	inyeessa gagasa ghwaak lajanga abiittuuna heeda agiischeewa meanang'ochcheanda, nea inyeessa ghapka gudajeega gameera deanneaduutkaaschi.
42016022	Ghami siitta bwarbwariin, ak ghwaat malykajeega ea ghoahiitta madeeda Abrahaamu. Muchchu ghami eara meanang'oochcheandida ak geebuy;
42016023	gatgat ghaanyangaaschi meanang'ochcheanda nea gwanda heeda abiitta fuga nimewa nea gwanda jeeda hang'weeniidooda, ghwadaah Abrahaamu nea sheagi nea Lasaaro gwanda madeadaannyi.
42016024	Gaguurda nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Bwaabwa Abrahaamu, samsean ajeakni Lasaaro ghang'uda moanneadannyi jeeda beega, googarbiit ng'ushapteanyu aba gideaba geasawani aba jeedeappeasi.’
42016025	Gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Balleandeanyu, apkaada gideaba ang'iing'i ninyasi haleanjeeda miyaas aba jeeda aweagaagu, nea Lasaaro ghwanyas gea munyas, ak ghamneawa niny geenung' ghahawda, nea ang'iing'i gindi jeeda hang'weanidooda.
42016026	Nuut gichcha, dageaschedeanya ea agooga ea siyiin ghalalayda haw, aba gideaba fuga gasa ghapka hooweani ondiin ea mayghoammu, nea eara fuga meatkwedeang'wa ea maygoogeaw heeda sindi.’
42016027	Hean gwayeeshsha, ‘Adabeeda ghweandeanyu, geamuscheey, ajeaksiina fuga ghaheanya,
42016028	aba gideaba geandeawi orjoogiyya muut, ereekusa amwapka eara saawa hiji bea hang'weanidoodean.’
42016029	Gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Gwandeawa Muusa ea sibanga, nung'waada goolleeysiit saawa.’
42016030	Hean gwayeeshsha, ‘Manda ghweandeanyu Abrahaamu; inyeeda gabiiksa saawa siida leabu miyeeda, gaygwadukkuuna.’
42016031	Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Iimealeeysiiniit Muusa ea sibanga, ea mayghamwas eara gabiiksa siida duunna miyeeda.'"
42017001	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi “Simsimda jea gweadu ring'eeda mayghwashiy hinnooda ak ea dashaageada siidida jea ghwanung' ghwahidu!
42017002	Gwachchi gayghang'wana siisi geerassa gheatta lagheaneeda sing'ealliida ak geejaksa jeeda basooda, mayghwasam gideaba gayghwanung' goodiiy siyagi aba jeedeaba suuh manang'iin.
42017003	Afra geat; iyadiiy oorjeeda geamadu, gireekusi, idukkuuna gisamsi;
42017004	ama adiiyseey niba ispwa aba jeemba askwarjaanjagi, ak gabiikseey niba ispwa nea gwayi, ‘Neadukkuuni,’ Abeeda gisamsi.”
42017005	Gwayeeshsha Giijasoodiga Ng'uttamiida, “Aheaneasa masaweega.”
42017006	Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Inyeeda goondeawi masaweega deenna gheang'nyeanda geetta suguura haradaali, abeeda gajoammuusa ayeeshshiina meagheayeanda, ‘Loadaana ak geng'eapseey jeeda basooda,’ ak gayghoawal gheang'deang'wa.”
42017007	“Heappi gajea ng'eaha gil aba jeedeang'wa mideawa soomjeanda bwar ng'eanyi ghana ghoahaghwa gisilga, jea gwayeeshsha niny ibiikna madamnyeanda, ‘Lamwajaana beenni apteada agiischeena?’
42017008	Heappi maygwayeeshsha, ‘Sinnean gichcheadaak, radiischeena ak gigadiyeesean ea daahiit, agiischooda ea leeshooda, ak abeeda giyeagiischi nea gileeshi?’
42017009	Gaygabadiischeesa soomjeandida aba gideaba nisin gissiruksa?
42017010	Eara agooga gidowuurjeewi gil, iyoasinnyi gidasiyeeshshineegwa asna, gooyeeshshi geat, ‘Aseasa geewoschi soomjooga marachchi gil, geesinnyi gidamiseasa sinooda.'"
42017011	Iiduw nea gwanda naweeda gawa Yerusaleemu gwasik dageascheeda ng'eanyiida Samariya ea Galilaaya.
42017012	Geeyi bwak ama hitta jeemba gharang'agi gwaroonnyi sea fiih damanamughuush beardooschi udamusuura, ak ghaminaada nea sheagi
42017013	Goojuur nea gwayi, “Yeesu, Siida haw, eaniyean bwaydaneasa.”
42017014	Daah saawa gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ohhiimsiina geat ashoohoodiga diineeda Yahuudi.” Damandida beawaan geammiidu.
42017015	Daah siiyagi aba jeannyaawa gideaba nihaap, gabiigu nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta aba ghuutta haw;
42017016	gobeedeaysa Siidida geeshanga Yeesu ak gabadischeesa. Nea siidida gaba emeeda Samariya.
42017017	Hean gwayi Yeesu, “Fuga gwachchi sihhaap adamanamughuush? Gea ashshageash gwandayeenu?.
42017018	Manda dea nibiigu ghoaghambiit Aseetta geaghuus rabascheanji?”
42017019	Ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ng'eada una; gidahaapnyi masaweagaagu.”
42017020	Ng'atta ghoanyaash Farisayajeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gayghwahidu eeju?” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta mayghwahidu nea geadahaan.
42017021	Ea manda siichchea gwayi, ‘Gwanda hiji!’ ghana ‘Hoowa!’ Aba gideaba ng'ulla sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gwanda jeesingeagwa.”
42017022	Hean gwayeeshsha ginealanga, “Gayghwahidu eawoojiga jea agasseena adaahana eaweechcheanjagi aba eawoojiga Balleanda Siida, ak ea mwajadaaha.
42017023	Ak gajeeyeeshshineegwa, ‘Ang'ulla gwanda hoowa!’ ghana ‘Ang'ulla gwanda hiji!’ Adooweayi, nea adooyaachchi geeshta nyaawa.
42017024	Aba gideaba gaygawuurji dadamandeeda aboong'na meatkweanagi bea humng'eeda ea ghwahitta meatkweeda niirja bea humng'eeda, ea gichchea gawuurji Balleanda Siida gil aba aweadaannyi.
42017025	Ak gayghanyi ghwanyas hang'weanidooda ammadeeda aba haleanjeessaang'a, nea gayghaheawa fiisu bea jeachcheeng'suun.
42017026	Ak gidaghayi uurji aba eawoojiga Nuuhu, ea gichchea gawuurji gil aba eawoojiga Balleanda Siida.
42017027	Geeyeagiischi, nea geeleeshi, geegeeshshi, nea geegeena, ea ghwahiitta eaweeda weewa Nuuhu jeeda maleambooda, ghwahiing'aan roopta haw ak ghwalas uhudeaba sean.
42017028	Gaygawuurji gidaghayi uurji aba eawoojiga Luuttu, abeeda geyeagiischi nea geeleeshi, geasha nea geashayda, geehista, nea geedeekshi,
42017029	muchchu eaweeda ritteawa Luuttu Sodomean ghoaptu beasta wunda roopta leabu humng'eeda ak ghwalas uhuudeaba sean.
42017030	Niih gichchea gawuurji gil aba eaweeda jea eattaajiida Balleanda Siida.
42017031	“Eaweedida siida mida uhuuda gheeda nea gwanda haleanjeedaannyi jeeda gheeda, adaghwararang'aan gageanda; ak eara dea mida madamnyeanda ea adagabiikta bwadaw.
42017032	Oapkaada gatmooda Luuttu.
42017033	Siida wassean gasa ghoaghu aweagaaschi gaygahutta, nea dea hutteawi aweagaaschi gayghoaghu.
42017034	Geayeeshshineegwa eaweedida, gaygwandeayi fiih iyyeenya aba bulaliida, ak gajeegeanda siyagi ak geenung'usa heeda nirja.
42017035	Gaygang'ealshi gadeem iyyeenya aba hijagi, gegeanda agi ak geenung'usa heeda niirja.” [
42017036	Gaygwanda fiih iyyeenya madamnyeanda, ak gajegenda akkalealla, ak genung'usa heeda akkalealla.]
42017037	Ak geeyeeshsha niny “Eenu gil Ng'uttamiida?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heeda mida guumeeda heeda jea gooweameesa madoonyaakka.”
42018001	Hean gwarukusa ng'asheega nea gagalla geat nea gagasa gideaba gaygammiisa sawa mooshta Aseetta galeagasean nea mapura.
42018002	Gwayeeshsha, “Aba jeemba mujiinajean gwanda Siisi laja girgweaguutka meawalla Aseetta nea maduuppa eara siih;
42018003	ak aba jeedeaba mujiineeni gwanda Gatmooni was masiinung'weanda, wuna headaannyi galeaga sean nea gwayeenniisa, ‘Weadaan nuung' danyas gidamiisean aba heeda weajoochcheandeanyu.’
42018004	Ea golla gaheewachchi, ammuchchu gwayeeshsha geaw, ‘Earea meawalli Aseetta ghana gheang'ba sihiin,
42018005	aba gideaba godeawiidan masiinng'weanji gaydaadaw gidagasa ea meabuuraan aba hittunooda heedeanyu.'"
42018006	Hean gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida, “Oalleaydiit ginnyaashta Siitta miih doabiiwaat laja girgweaguutkean.
42018007	Gajeyeena Aseetta mayghoadaw dobiiwnatta fugaaschi loossageaw ayyeawussa askweari ea eawa? Gayghwashing'da aba weetta nyaawa?
42018008	Geayeeshshineegwa, Gayghwalamwachi ghoadaw gidamiisa, nea Balleanda Siida ihiidu gayghwadaah masaweega aba jeeda ng'eanyiida?”
42018009	Iiduw gwaruksa galeega fuga hinda geat gilidobiiweadi nea gafool suurja.
42018010	“Ghayi gwanda headi iyyeenya siyeang'da gaweay ghamwaash Aseetta aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, akkalealla Farisayajeanda gil nea niirja ea siida ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi.
42018011	Ghang'eat Farisayajeanda ak ghamwaashtunu Aseetta aba jeadaannyi, ‘Ea Aseetta, geabadischoweey aba gideaba aniini meawurjeewani buuneeda suurja, fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ea fuga miidoobiiweadi, ghana fuga mealuuli, nea meawuurjeewani eara siisi ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin.
42018012	Aniini inyeessa gealuuldi geaw nibiyyeenya aba jeemba eawooji ispwa, ak aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea haleanjeedeanyu, iissa ghaadaydi akkalealla.’
42018013	Hean ghaminaada Siitta ang'ng'oonyi gwadiin nea dildeaweat nea eara gheanyangaaschi ea meageala humng'eeda, gagiisan nea gwayi, ‘Aseetta, bwaydanaan aniini geabea riing'a!’
42018014	Geayeeshshineegwa, ghwararang'ada siitta ang'ng'oonyi gwaadiin gawa gheannyi nea sittaw doobiiwnatta ea ghang'al niirja; aba gideaba siida nyooh godiing'u geaw gajeahiing'u, nea dea hiing'u geaw gajeettiing'u.”
42018015	Hean geeyeassa diibiga niny ghoadaw ghawooda; daah ginealanga gowoowsa buuneeda.
42018016	Ng'atta gaguursa Yeesu saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada diibiga ghapka heedeanyu adoakghuumnyi, aba gideaba gea uurji suuh gammiissa sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
42018017	Aba huumwa gearukuneegwa gideaba, siida mwadeaptaayda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta jeepta maygawa jeeda.”
42018018	Ghoanyaash siyagi ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda miy, gaydasin naaha iijeadanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda?”
42018019	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ghwasaan anda gigurewean siida miy? Manda siida miy geaghus Aseetta akghwahit.
42018020	Ginali digheannyeekka: ‘Adimealuuli, adinuusi siida, adijagwadiischi, adimuuwwu ng'uyyeega, gisissi mureeda gweanu ea geamadu.'"
42018021	Gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheesu seaniin nang'ng'waannyi ghang'eada jeepcheandumeedeanyu.”
42018022	Iiy Yeesu ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha niny, “Ghwashoadeweey ng'ashaanjagi. Shaayda halanjeadaang'u indeawi sean ak gilakkiisi fuga barbari, ak gaynyasa gheaseeda aba humng'eeda, ak guwuni eanni geeshteanyu.”
42018023	Iiy niny ng'asheanji gagiisan, aba gideaba eabaruur muuchchi.
42018024	Gang'ulla Yeesu niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Ahang'waaydaan beatta jea gaweay meanang'oodiga jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta!
42018025	Asi gajawussis muuchchi gideaba gaygwasik nngamiya seawadeeda sidageeda, maygawuurji beatta jea gawa meanang'oochcheanda jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42018026	Gwayi fukka iiy nea gwargu ng'asheanjiini, abeeda iisunu gwanda siida jea ghaghu?
42018027	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheega hang'oonyi aba heeda siida aba heeda Aseetta miih ang'waay.”
42018028	Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Ng'ulla aseasa sinung'wi heeda galgaasa ak geeyeattu geashtaang'u.”
42018029	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa, manda siida nung'wa heeda gheannyi, ghana gatmoadaannyi, ghana oorjooga ghaamwat, ea fuga jiilu ghana diibiga aba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta,
42018030	siisi mwanyasa gasaang'a aba damani bea ghamneawean nea iiduw aba damandida jea ghwahiduun, gayghwanyas eaweega manda muudeanooda.”
42018031	Ng'atta goobalool ginealangaaschi attamaniyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla ghamneawa geascheang'di eweaya Yerusaleemu, ak ng'asheega sean ghayi ng'waar sibanga appadayda Balleanda Siida, gaygabiissa ghwahidu.
42018032	Aba gideaba gajeayiin geattinga emoojiga ak gajeebarra rear nea geng'ng'eawi nea geng'ng'urriisa ng'usheega;
42018033	nea gajeabwara mughowooda, ama ng'atta genuus, amaduw eaweetteaba samwagu gaygwaduudu.”
42018034	Ea manda siichcheeng'u ng'asheesu eara gidawas nea ng'asheanji ea sifnya saawa nea majeeng'na gissibaloola.
42018035	Geeyi bwaak ama riiksa Yeesu Yerikko, gwanda siisi ng'oow apteada aba gheatta naweeda nea gamusiisachchi;
42018036	iiduw nea ghwayiiy gidang'attayda emeeda ghoanyaashta gideaba “Gwanda naaha hiji?”
42018037	Geyeeshsha, “Ghang'atta Yeesuuydida bea Nasarettiin.”
42018038	Gabiissa Gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea Yeesu, Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan!”
42018039	Gojuursa Fukka asheedeawean nea geeyeeshsha, Siinda; sirukusa Ghoaraanya gijureanda muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Balleanda Dawdi, eaniyean bwaydanaan!”
42018040	Hean gawus Yeesu ak ghwanung' eyeadu headaannyi. Neekkiissa siitta ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha;
42018041	“Gigasayi dasinneey naaha?” Gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamida aniini geagasayi dang'wearda.”
42018042	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Nyasa ging'weerdeada; nihaapnyi masaweagaagu.”
42018043	Mighoaw gil ghoang'wearda ak ghwaat geeshta nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta; daah emeeda ng'asheesu ghoaghambiit Aseetta.
42019001	Ghwahitta mujiineeda Yerikko, ghang'atta nea ghwalach bugusta.
42019002	Abeeda gwanda jeedeaba mujiineeni siisi suguura Sakkayo, siisi ea haweewa fuga ang'ng'oonyi gwaadi ak ea meanang'ochcheanda.
42019003	Siisi abeeda goolla gagaseaday deakta Yeesu gideaba siida urjiini, ak ghwaraay ghwadaah aba seang'ayda emeeda, aba gideaba ninyi anuwaas.
42019004	Ak iiduw Ghafwach gawa mwadi, ak gwading'da uhuuda meagheayeanda ghwadaah, aba gideaba gaygwasku naweetta.
42019005	Hitta Yeesu deascheeda mida gong'weersa uhuuda geetta ak gwayeeshsha, “Sakkayo lamwaja rarang'aana, aba gideaba gammiisean deabiida gheang'u askweareani.”
42019006	Ghwalamwach ghwararang'aan ak ghwadeapta nea gahoosan.
42019007	Iiduw nea ghwadaah ng'asheanji ghoaniikg sean nea gwayi, “Nuwa ghoaw rabascheanda aba gheeda siida ring'eeda.”
42019008	Ghang'eat Sakkayo ghamiinaada ak gwayeesha, “Ng'ulla, Ng'uttamiida, gaydalach bugusta haleanjeedeanyu ak ghaadawji fuga barbari, ak iimida siida nareachchi gida aba fughareeda, gaydeadeelsa niba ang'waan.”
42019009	Ghwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Askweareani lealeanooda nihidu gheawi aba gideaba eara niny balleanda Abrahaamu.
42019010	Aba gideaba Balleanda siida ghwahidu gagasa nea gwalealu diitta roadiin.”
42019011	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu, hean gwarukuta aba galleega, aba gideaba nineekkiissa Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba saawa ghaghay gil sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta gaygabean ghwadaajiit.
42019012	Gwayeesha, “Ghayi gwanda siisi haw siiwal gheang'da, wea bareannyeekka ng'eanyiida sheagi eattaw uurda sugoochcheandumeeda, ak gabiigu.
42019013	Hean gaguursa fiih damanamughuush aba jeeda soomjoogaaschi, gaba niih adaw lappiyaji bughala ak gwayeesha, ‘Agadiyeatta ea dabiigu.’
42019014	Ak siisi ghwasit fuga ng'eang'da nyaawa ak gechcheaksa buuneeda eyeeshsha, ‘Aseasa meegassi siisi ghoahaaghwaneassa.’
42019015	Iiduw nea gabiigu siidida nea ninyas uurda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ghwanung' eguursa soomjookka ghayi adaw lappiyean ghwanaal niba siisi nyas gea deannaan aba gadiyeedaannyi.
42019016	Ghwahidu dea madeeda headaannyi ak gwayeesha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, lappiyeadaang'u appughala niji suuk bughala.’
42019017	Ghwayeesha niny, ‘Ghwahiit guwosi soomjeanda miy! Aba gideaba guwosi doabiiwaat aba ng'asheanda mwanang' gajambala mujiinaji damanamughuush.’
42019018	Ghwahidu Soomjeandeaba iyyeenya ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, lappiyeadaang'u aharadam ea damanamughuush niji suuk haradam ea damanamughuush.’
42019019	Gwayeeshsha niih, ‘Ang'iing'i ambala mujiinaji muut.’
42019020	Ng'atta ghwahidu nuut ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ng'uttamiida, sukkwaanji lappiyeadaang'u attamanamughuush ghayi igooni, geadiiwsi jeeda weasta;
42019021	ghaawalleay, aba gideaba guwosi siida ng'waan iissa gigeandi gida miidaang'u ak gilaji gea mihistani.’
42019022	Gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Gaydeargweaksinaneey ng'asheanda ghuuttaang'u, soomjeanda muy! Ginali gideaba geawoschi hang'waay geageandi gidamiideanyu, ak ghaalaji gea meahistani?
42019023	Ak ghwasaan anda migadiyeatta lappiyeedeanyu gwaji suuk, ama ahidu geageandi sean ea gea ahaada?’
42019024	Hean gwayeeshsha fukkeanji minaada aba hooweanjiin, ‘Oarreada lappiyeeni mideawean ak ghoattawji siitta mideawa bughalaan.’
42019025	Geeyeeshsha niny, ‘Ng'uttamiida, gwandeawa lappiyaji bughala!’
42019026	‘Geayeeshshineegwa, Aba gideaba siisi agar gil gajeehheasa, nea siitta meagara giliin, eara gidida mwanang' mideawean gajearreat.
42019027	Ak fukka was weajoodigeasu magassa gideaba gaydaahaaghwa saawaan, ayeani hiji ak gonuuseadi aba madeedeanyu.'"
42019028	Iiduw nea ghoahiit ng'asheesu, goosheedeawa saawa, ak ghwascheang'da gawa Yerusaleemu.
42019029	Hean neekkiisa Betfagi ea Bettaniya, nea neekki gijeeda suguura Masaytuuni, goojeakta fiih iyyeenya aba jeeda ginealangaaschi,
42019030	nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena gharang'dida mida mwadiin iyoahitti gajanyasana hoowa gureenda digeeda nea radaat nea eara ginealda ea miyeannaal, goottinnyi ak goyeadu hiji.
42019031	Iideeppa ghoanyasheegwa siih gideaba, ‘Ghwasaan anda gottinnyi?’ Goyeeshshi, ‘Gagasa Ng'uttamida.'"
42019032	Gaweay Fugiga siichcheaktean, amahitta hoowa ghwadaakta gidagwachchi rukusiinda saawa.
42019033	Damandida siittina gureendean, gwayeeshsha fiibwa, “Ghwasaan anda gootiinnyi gureenda?”
42019034	Geeyeeshsha, “Gagasa Ng'uttamiida.”
42019035	Gearjaanda ea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu, gegeanu hang'wekka eayiin badayda gureenda amahit geanung' gwading'da Yeesu badayda ak goopteadawa.
42019036	Damandida beawaan, gageanu buuneeda ak ghwoabwarghaan hang'weakka nyaawa aba naweeda.
42019037	Iiduw nea gwaneekkiissa rarang'eadayda giijeeda Masaytuuni, gang'weela fuga saang'a was ginealangaaschi nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta aba ghuutta haw aba gadiyoojiga hees sean sidaa,
42019038	nea geeyi, “Ning'ushsha Aseetta sugoochcheanda wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamida! Niiw hoyyooh aba humng'eeda ea gigheambiitta aba hoowa bea humng'eedean.”
42019039	Gwayeeshsha Farisayajeesu ng'ay mida jeedeaba emeetta, “Ginealshoochcheanda, rekusiina ginealangaagu.”
42019040	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineegwa, inyas ghwasiinda saawa, gaygoojuur lagheanga.”
42019041	Iiduw nea gwaneekkiit mujiini ak ghwadaah goyyeawussa,
42019042	nea gwayi, “Gideaballi gwachchi eara ang'iing'i ginali eaweechcheanji miisa hoyyoohiin! Ak ghamneawa ea siwwiimwa gheanyangaagu.
42019043	Aba gideaba gayghwahidu eaweeda jea goneaweeseey weajoodigaagu, gajeeneaweeseey ak geebeasheesinaneey meatkwajeega sean,
42019044	ak gaygwajakseeyi ang'iing'i ea diibigaagu ng'eanyi nea ea mwajeanung'usa laghaana uhuumba nuut aba jeedeang'wa aba gideaba miih jeeng'ni damanda jea eebareassiinaneegwa.”
42019045	Hean gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak goruutta fukka shaayda haleanjeedean,
42019046	ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Geang'waar gideaba, ‘Gheawi itteanyuun gayghoaw heechchea gamoora buuneeda Aseetta ghawooda,’ ak ghoanung' ghoaw gwaleeda jea gafunnya geat mareanghooga.”
42019047	Inyeessa goonealshi galagasean aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta. Nea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea fuga hees was ashoohoodiga buuneeda ghamwaal gichchea gwanuusta niny;
42019048	ak ea meanyaasa gichchea eesin aba gideaba gelleeysiit buuneessean.
42020001	Eaweechcha nea ghoonaal buuneeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean, nea gwarukwiida giijaasta miy, gaweay headaannyi ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ea gweargwa
42020002	ak geeyeeshsha niny, “Rukuneasa gisni ng'asheesu aba gheambalmeedeabeang'a, ea ng'eaha gil siida goonnyi gheambalmeani.”
42020003	Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Earaniini gaydanyasheagwa ng'ashaanjagi, asi arukunean,
42020004	Ghayi gibattiisanda Yohaana gwaleabu humng'eeda ghana leabu heeda buuneeda?”
42020005	Hean gabiissa gwasheang'nyi nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa isiyeeshshi ‘Gwaleabu humng'eeda,’ gaygwayi, ‘Ghwasaan anda ghayi ak ea mwoomwasi niny?’
42020006	Ama siyeeshshi, ‘Gwaleabu heeda buuneeda,’ ada gaygafutteasa buuneessean aba lagheanga aba gideaba ghamwas sean gideaba Yohaana sibaneeda.”
42020007	Hean ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha aseesa meanali heelleabu.
42020008	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Eara aniini ea maydarukuneegwa heeda leabu gimbalischooni itteanyu easinni ng'asheesuun.”
42020009	Hean ghoang'eat giibaloolda buuneeda nea gwarukusa galeesu, “Ghayi siih gang'eapsa sabiibu jeeda madamnyeandaannyi, hean gwanung'usa madamnyeandaannyi fuga jea gooragan, ak gawa daroorakka sheagi, goobiida hoowa ea gageawiit.
42020010	Godendeen ama gul damandida, gojeakta soomjeanda heeda fuga aragan madamnyeandean eattaw haghweega mwatkwa bea sabiibu; ng'atta ghabwar fukka aragan madamnyeandean ak geanung' gawa nea mwaada gil.
42020011	Iiduw gojeakta siidida soomjeanda nuut; hitta earada geabwar ea eesawan ak geenung' gawa nea ghabwaspwasaada nea mwada gil.
42020012	Iiduw gojeakta siideaba samwagu; ada geabwar ea gwasawana ak geahoan gawa jarooda.
42020013	Gwayi siidida bea madamnyeanda misabiibuun, ‘Gay dasin naaha? Gaydeajeakta balleandeanyu abwariinyi; gwadeeppa eesissa mureeda.’
42020014	Daah fukka aragan madamnyeandean, gwayeeshsha geat saawa, ‘Siisi dea jea gwahearaniischi, anung' eabwara ghami ak gabwaheasa hearaniischooda.’
42020015	Hean geang'ng'waay balleandida bea siidean ak gerruutteawa jeeda madamnyeanda misabiibu ak geenuus. Asi heappi sisi bea madamnyeandean iihidu gaygwahindaan fiisu?
42020016	Adaaha gayghwaan ama hidu gaygwanuuseada fugiga aragan madamnyeandannyiin ama hit gaygagasa fiih suuk jea gwanung'usa madamnyeandaannyi.” Siyiiy ng'asheesu geeyi, “Gagasa ghoashiiy Aseetta!”
42020017	Hean ghoaduup ghaang' saawa, ak gwayeesha, “Abeeda ng'asheesu sing'wardunun naaha bea gideaba: ‘Lagheaneeni aneawa ghaang' fuga deekshi nea meanung' ghoaw giliin niiw lagheaneeda haw washiin?’
42020018	Nea siida jea gobedeaysa lagheaneeni gaygagiishachchi, nea siida was sean ng'adeesa lagheaneeni gay ghang'aal.”
42020019	Muchchu gagasa ng'oorshoodiga ea ashoohodiga hees gichchea ghoang'ng'waayda aba damandida, ak ghoawal buuneeda; aba gideaba saawa nijeeng'u gideaba ng'asheesu sigalla geadiin geerukuna badahuukka nyawa.
42020020	Inyessa geasaach niny nea geegasa gheatta miy ak gechcheakta fuga hinda geat fuga doobiiweadi, eanyas gheatta gichchea eaghasta aba nga'sheesu ikkaaschiin, ak geayin geattinga sugoochcheanda haw ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida.
42020021	Geannyaash niny nea geeyeesha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, geanalli gideaba girukku ng'asheega nea gidoabiiwi, nea miduuppi siisi haw, ang'iing'i ginaali buuneeda naweeda Aseetta doabiiwaat.
42020022	Heappi, ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geattaw Gaysaari gwaadi, ghana manda?”
42020023	Gwajeeng'u milmilanda nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha,
42020024	“Oahiimnaan shiliingajeanda. Uhuuni ea gheawung'su gabeang'a? Geeyeeshsha, Gaba Gaysaari.”
42020025	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asaha ghoattawji Gaysaari gea Gaysaari, ak ghoattawji Aseetta gea was gea Aseetta.”
42020026	Hean gearaay gichchea eang'ng'waayda aba ng'asheagaaschi aba madeeda buuneeda; ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba gida shaayda ng'asheega ak ghwasiinda sean.
42020027	Iiduw ghapka headaannyi fiisu ng'ay was Sadukkayajeega eena manda dunnooda,
42020028	Hean geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, Muusa ghayi gang'oorneasa gideaba siida iimea oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwandeawa gatmooda mandeawana diibiga, gaygageanda oorjeeda ghaamwat gatmootta ak gwanyaksa diibiga oorjeeda ghaamwat.
42020029	Ghayi gwanda oorju ispwa bea ghaamwadagi, gageeshshi oorjeeda haw, amaduw ghami nea ghwanung'wa hiji gatmooda mandeawana diibiga;
42020030	ea deaba iyyeenya
42020031	gea deaba samwagu, iiduw gwahearan oorjookka seaniin assipwaan nea gameewwa agi ea goosha sean nea gatmoodida ea mandeawana diibiga.
42020032	Iiduw eara gatmoodida ghami.
42020033	Heappi eaweetta siittuunna buuneeda gatmooni gaygaba ng'eaha? Aba gideaba nighi buuneeda ea ghwahitta ispwa.”
42020034	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Balloojigeaba ng'eanyiini gageeshshachchi, nea gegeena;
42020035	nea fukka sinung' ghoaw gili miisa ng'eanyiidida bea hooweaniin nea duunnoodida bea miyeedeani mageeshshachchi nea megeenna,
42020036	ea maygabiikta gameewa aba gideaba gaygawuurji malaykajeega, ak saawa ea balloojiga Aseetta gil ea gideaba saawa balloojiga sittuuttu.
42020037	Aba iitta gideaba gwaduuttu buuneeda, eara Muusa ghoahiimu aba jeeda ng'ooruutka iitta geetta mughuush damanda guursiina Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Aseetta Isakka ea Aseetta Yakkobo.
42020038	Asi ghamneawa niny miih Aseetta fuga nimeewa gil, aba gideaba ghwanyas sean eaweega aba niny.”
42020039	Ghwasha ng'oorshoodiga mwaatkwa nea geeyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, aba hiji girgu huumwa.”
42020040	Ea mudu gwanda siida ammu gabadaksa ghoanyaash ng'asheanda.
42020041	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaygwayeendaan saawa gideaba Gristo balleanda Dawdihi?.
42020042	Aba gideaba gwayi Dawdi aba jeeda gittabooda nyiigheaga, ‘Ng'uttamida gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamideanyu, Apteada aba geattindeanyu bea dugwa,
42020043	ea danung' ghoaw weajoodigaagu horgeeda jea iinna geashangaagu.’
42020044	Abeeda Dawdi iguura niny Ng'uttamiida ghoawdaan balleandaannyi?”
42020045	Hean nea gwayiing'shi buuneessean gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi,
42020046	“Ashageada ng'oorshoodiga, fuga bwariiy gwaleammideawa hang'weakka geawwi bwariiy eyenniisa seayu aba naadajeega, ea hoorgajeega miyaas aba gealga sinnealshachcheewa, nea eara iweay gealga ghwelmeeda ghwanyoahaada hoorgajeega madeeda,
42020047	fuga inyeessa gweagiisachchi aba gealga masiinung'weega nea aba gimminnoodeaba geat inyeessa ghamwaash Aseetta nea gogeawiit. Asi gayghwanyas girgweaksiinda haw.”
42021001	Ng'atta gang'ula ak ghwadaah gidiinda meanang'oodiga haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda jeeda gheaseeda.
42021002	Ghwadaah eara masinung'weanji bwarbwar nea ghwayiin jeeda gida heelaji iyyeenya akghwahit.
42021003	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineegwa aba huumwa masiinung'weanji bwarbwariin ghoadayda gidahaw ea ghwalaabwa hoowa buuneessean;
42021004	Aba gideaba suurja ghoadayda gidabinna jeeda barureega nyaawa, sinung' niny aba jeeda barbarandaannyi niidayda gidamideawa sean.”
42021005	Iiduw nea gabaloola mwaatkwa gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gida siittamdaamda aba lagheanga miyaas ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda gwayeeshsha,
42021006	“Aba haleanjeeni ong'ulayiin, gayghwahidu damanda jea ea mayghoabit lagheana aba uhuumba nuut jea ea majeeng'ng'adeasa ng'eanyi.”
42021007	Hean geannyaash niny nea geyeeshsha, “Ginealshoochcheanda, ng'asheesu gayghoaw eeju, ak gwadeagoodeaba ng'asheesu ea naaha jea ghoahiimu gideaba hinnoodeaba ng'asheesu nineekkiit?”
42021008	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ashageada adagahuttaneegwa siida; gwanda fuga saang'a jea ghapkaana gheawungeasu, nea gwayeena, ‘Siida aniini gil!’ Nea ‘Damanda nineekkiit!’ Adoayachchi geeshta.
42021009	Inyeessa gajayiinya iitta ng'uchcheeda ea jaleadinga, ea adoabealli; aba gideaba ng'asheesu gaygoosheeda ghwahidu, nea muudeanooda ea maygabay ghwahidu.”
42021010	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gaygaba daroori ng'uchchi daroar nuut, ea sugoochcheandumeeni ng'uchchi sugoochcheandumeeda nuut;
42021011	gaygwanda sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida, ak gaygang'eeda gejeadinga aba daroorakka sean ea geyoonung'wea kka; ng'asheega jea ghwanung' eahamng'eanyi, ea gwadeagwajeega hees leabu humng'eeda.
42021012	Ak damanda migapnu ng'asheesu seaniin gajeang'ng'waanyeagwa ak geesawaneegwa, nea geayadeagwa gealga sinnealshachcheewa ak gajeejakseegwa ghealooniga ak gajeayadeagwa madeeda sugoodiga hees ea madeeda fuga hees ambaliischi aba gheawungeasu.
42021013	Ak abeeda gili gayghoaw muwwunooda aba heedeang'wa.
42021014	Asi ong'ng'ooysiina jeesingeagwa ak ea adootteemshi aba gichchea ashaayda ng'asheega;
42021015	aba gideaba gaydagoneegwa ng'asheega ea weaghumeeda jea inyeessa eara weajoodigeagwa ghwaraay ng'alealleeda ghana gichchea ghwashang'da.
42021016	Ak gayghaghaseagwa ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa ea oorjooga geamadu, ea buweadeegeagwa ea fuga oduupcheewi nea mwaatkwa gaygwanuusseegwa;
42021017	ak agooga gajeasteagwa aba gheawungeasu.
42021018	Ea mayghwaroat eara budeanjagi bea iheenngeagwa.
42021019	Ak agooga aba milikghteaydeang'wa gajookghuuha eaweegeagwa.
42021020	“Asi iyoadaayi mujiineeda Yerusaleemu nea nineaweesa lugooda, abeeda anala gideaba nineekkiit nyaroadaannyi.
42021021	Nea fuga mida Yudeeya ea dasalsiina iheenga gijeega, nea gea mida mujiin ea daritteaysiina nea gea mida gharang'da ea adiidu ghapka jeani;
42021022	aba gideaba eawoojigiga gajea gea sawanadeeda ak ghoaw gida nyaashta ng'ooruutka.
42021023	Dashageada gadeemga mideawa diibiga ea gea areerji diibiga aba askwearjoojikka! Aba gideaba gayghwadaa ng'asheanda ng'waan, aba gideaba gaygwanda sawanadeeda haw jeeda ng'eanyiida ea nyarasta aba badaydeaba fiisu;
42021024	Ak gajeenuseadawa bwaanga nea suuk geattabwaardawa jeeda emoojiga sean nea Yerusaleemu gayghoalla emoojiga ea ghwahidu damanda fuga emoojiga.
42021025	“Gajadaaha gwadeagwajeega aba gheang'da aseetta ea sheeda ea miinga, gayghwanyas emoojiga jeeda ng'eanyiida sawanadeeda nea ghahamng'eanyi aba nyeashta laweajajeega basooda,
42021026	buuneeda gaygoohiili aba muuwda aba gimuukghnooda gichchea gwahissa ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba uurda mida humng'eeda gajeettuumduum.
42021027	Ak gajeadaah Balleanda Siida nea ghwaana jeeda shamoghooda nea gwandeawa uurda ea gigheambiitta haw.
42021028	Asi ghamneawa ng'asheesu iihidu ghoahalli geat, amiinada ak goong'ullay humng'eeda, aba gideaba nineekiit lealnoodeang'wa.”
42021029	Hean iiduw gwarukusa saawa galeega nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'ulla shabogheechcheanda ea geediga suurja sean;
42021030	Iyoadaayi nea ghafirfiir seenga nyawiiri, abeeda goojeeng'u gideaba doomeelda nineekkiit.
42021031	Asi eara agooga iyoadaayi ng'asheesu nea gapnu, anala gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nineekkiit.
42021032	Aba huumwa geayeeshshineegwa jeachcheengsu bea ghamneawean mayghwanaawuda nea miyadaaha ng'asheesu.
42021033	Humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida gaygammudean. Duukku ng'asheesu ea maygammudean eara hay.
42021034	“Asi afra geat adagoobal guroruunatkeagwa beeshkweeda ea booktuumeeda ea eaweesu bea ghamneawean, ea gwashameegwa eaweettida; gawuurji gidang'ng'oonnyiida ghudumbwaada haleanjeeda;
42021035	aba gideaba niih gichchea gwahissinda fuga sean abiitta badayda ng'eanyiisseani.
42021036	Asi agooga afra geaet galaagasean, nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta gagoonegwa uurda jea oattaraamwa ng'asheesu sean jea gapnun, ea aminaada aba madeeda Balleanda Siida.”
42021037	Inyeessa gonealshi askweari aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea eawa gwaritteawa jeeda mujiini ak gawa gobiida uhuuda gijeeda suguura Masaytuni.
42021038	Hean inyeessa sakteayda duw gaweay buuneessean headaannyi eelleeysiit aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
42022001	Hean abeeda ea nineekkiit ghwelmeeda mukkattajeega miyeayiin hamiira suguura Basakka.
42022002	Nea ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga abeeda gwanda jeeda gassooda gichchea ghoang'ng'waayda ak gwanuus; ak iiduw ghoawal buuneeda.
42022003	Hean ghoabiitta Shattaani jeeda Yuudayda suguura Iskariyotte, nea gaba jeedeaba fugiga attamaniyyeenyean;
42022004	Ng'atta gawa goobalool ashoohoodiga hees ea shirikkareeda hees gidajea ghwalaapta bwadaw niny aba saawa.
42022005	Gahoosan saawa muuchchi ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gajeattaw lappiya.
42022006	Hean ghamwas ak gagasa gheatta jea ghwalapta bwadaw nea manda hiji emeeda.
42022007	Ghwahidu eaweeda ghweelmeeda mukkattajeega meayiina hamiira, nea eaweetta sinuusa dayeenda gisilleanda ghweelmeeda basakka gil.
42022008	Iiduw gojeakta Yeesu Betro ea Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena asissina heechchea eyeaksiina Basakka.”
42022009	Ak geeyeeshsha, “Gigasayi eang'aabwa aba yeenu?.”
42022010	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ang'ulla, iyoahitti mujiini gajaroonnyeewana ng'edeeda sar sirbiida beega; ghoayaachchi geashtaannyi ea ahitta gheeda jea gawa jeeda,
42022011	goyeeshshi siida bea gheeda, ‘Gwayi Ginealshochcheanda, abwaara ghoriini siyeaksi basakka aniini ea ginealangeasu?’
42022012	Ak gayghoahimneegwa ghoorini haw sideeksa uhuumba nuut, ak ea sittamdaam; ak goosissi jeani.”
42022013	Hean Gaweay amwahitta ghwadaakta ng'asheega sean gidagwachchi rukutteayda; hean gwasissin Basakka.
42022014	Hitta damanda agiischooda goopteada niny ea giijasoodigaaschi gweagiischi.
42022015	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Neagasayi muuchchi daak basakkeani aniini ea agooga heeda miidanyasa hang'weanidooda;
42022016	aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, mayguttaak ea eahhiit aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42022017	Hean gageanu bayookta, ak gabadischeesa ak gwayeeshsha, “Oang'ng'waanya gili, ak goolakkisiina geat;
42022018	aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa, majaguttali mideega haghweega misabiibu, ea ghwahidu sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
42022019	Ak gageanu mukkatte, ak gabadischeesa ak ghabwanachchi ak ghoadawaada saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Niih saseedeanyu gil siittayda aba badahuukkeagwa. Ahinniidunu aba gipkeatteanyu.”
42022020	Ak gwahindunu eara bayookta ing'atta agiischooda gwayi, “Bayoogi geahhiida appadahuukkeagwa neajeeda eesh aba foojeandeanyu.
42022021	Ak gong'ulayi geattinda siichchea ghwalaabwan bwadaw geambuchcheewi aba hiji.
42022022	Asi Balleanda Siida gayghabeada gidaghayi sibean eerarsiinda ak ea dashageada siidida jea ghwalaabwan bwadaw!”
42022023	Gabissa gonyeari geat saawa, nea gwayi, Ng'eaha niih aba jeedeanya jea gwasin ng'asheanjiin.
42022024	Iiduw gwardu sheang'nyeeda aba jeanyaawa gideaba ahaw ng'eaha aba jeedeanya.
42022025	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Sugoodiga emoojiga inyessa gombaliischi aba heannyaawa; giikka mideawa ghealmbalmeedean aba heannyaawa geguura fuga weeda buuneeda.
42022026	Agooga ea miih gichchea awurjeewana; aba agooga siida gasa hawunda dawuurjeewana siida mwanang'eawa sean, nea siida gasa ghang'atta mwadi dawuurjeewana siida gadiyeeda.
42022027	Aba gideaba ahaw ng'eaha, siida apteada ak gweagiischi, ghana siitta gadiyeesa buneedeani? Ak ghaghanyi gajea siitteani agiischiini. Ak aniini aba jeedeang'wa geawurjeewi siida gadiyeeda.
42022028	“Agooga gowoschi fuga ghayi milikkiida galagasean sea aniini aba jeeda simsindeanyu;
42022029	gawuurji gidaghayi gondaneani Bwaabwa sugoochcheandumeeda, earaniini gaydagooneegwa,
42022030	Ak gajayeagiischeena nea goleeshi aba jeeda sugoochcheandumeedeanyu, nea goppitpiidi horgajeega sugoodiga ak gorgweaksi doshin damaniyyeenya bea Israeeli.”
42022031	“Simon, Simon, ng'ulla, Shattaani gagasseegwa ghoalealdaneegwa nngano,
42022032	ak aniini ea namwaaschi Aseetta amwasuunya masaweagaagu, ama ibiikeani gimajeegi oorjooga geamadu.”
42022033	Hean gwayeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamiida, geawoschi hidaat eara etteayeena ghealooniga ghana dami.”
42022034	Gwayeeshsha, “Geayeeshshineey, Betro, eannean maygoguul nnghaghooda eaweani nea miishaang'aan niba samwagu gideaba ginallaan.”
42022035	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Damanda eajeakteawaneegwa, nea mondeawani shageeda ghana sandakwajeanda ghana geekka, abeeda gwanda gida nishoadeweegwa?” Geyeeshsha, “Mandana.”
42022036	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghamneawa siida mideawa shageeda daada, ak gwasnu eara dea mideawa sandakwajeanda. Nea siida mandeawana bwaanga ea dashaayda hang'daannyi ak ghwasha.
42022037	“Aba gideaba geayeeshshineegwa ng'ooruussu majaghanyi ea meahhiida aba badaydeanyu, ‘Aba gideaba geegalageat sea fuga munyas,’ aba gideaba gissung'waar appadaydeanyu gwanda mudeanoadaannyi.”
42022038	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, ang'wearda, hiji gwanda bwaangaji iyyeenya.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gwadeay.”
42022039	Iiduw gwariitta ak gawa gawuurji gideaba eawoojusu, ea ghwahitta giijeeda Masaytuuni, nea ghwaat geeshta ginealanga.
42022040	Hitta hooweani gwayeeshsha saawa, “Amwaasha Aseetta adiiduw gesmeegwa ak ghoappitti jeeda samsiinda.”
42022041	Ghwanung'wa saawa heeda, ak ghwaloat geash gili ayang'da jakteayda lagheaneeda, ak ghang'uda gutng'weakkaaschi ng'eanyi ak ghamwaash Aseetta, ak gwayi,
42022042	“Bwaabwa, igidiibwariiydi gil gischoarjaan bayokcheanji; nea adaghoaw gideagassiidi, nung' ghoaw daang'u.” [
42022043	Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanda leabu humng'eeda ak ghoadaw uurda.
42022044	Iiduu nea gwanda jeeda sawanadeeda, hean ghamwaash seetta muuchchi; ak gawuurji gheawwochcheandaannyi foojeanda nea goobitpissa ng'eanyi.]
42022045	Ng'eada mooshta Aseetta, nea gabiikta heeda ginealanga, ghwahitta nea nilil aba gideaba ning'ut giseaneega,
42022046	ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwasaan anda goolilli? Ang'eatng'eada amwaasha Aseetta adiiduw ghooppitti jeeda simsimda.”
42022047	Miighoabiit ghuutta aba baloolda ghwahidu emeeda nea godeana siisi suguura Yuuda, bea jeeda ginealanga attamaniyyeenya, nea gooshooyna saawa. Gwaneekkiissa Yeesu ak ghwasam gheatta;
42022048	gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Yuuda ghamneawa gilaabi bwadaw Balleanda siida aba samitta gheatta?”
42022049	Deagu fukka mideawean gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida gajeabwarana bwaangajeega?”
42022050	Gafagu siyagi bwaangeadaannyi ak ghwalas soomjeanda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwalaksa ng'eanyi iitta geattinda dugwa.
42022051	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anung'waada nideay!” Ghoang'ng'waay iitta ak ghoahaap.
42022052	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu ashoohoodiga hees, ea shirikkareeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea gweargwa, buwa ghoang'ng'waay niny, “Ghoapkaandi gili oapkaanji oang'ng'oonya mareangheanda, nea gooyeadu bwaangajeega ea gulupkeakka?
42022053	Eajusu nea gendeaydooschi galeagasean aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ghanea miyoang'ng'wanyaan ak ghamneawa niih ea damandeang'wa gil ea uurda misaneeda.”
42022054	Hean geang'ng'waay ak geayaat ea eayaat gheeda Ashoohoochcheanda haw. Gamaseaw Betro nea sheagi;
42022055	iiduw geayyeat beasta aba bugharjeanda daghatta gheeda nea gendeayi sean, ak eara Betro gwanda hiji.
42022056	Ng'atta ghwadaah hutpa gadiyeeda nea gwanda heedeesh ak gohang'ooysa ghaang' ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara siisi gwandeaydooschi sea niny.”
42022057	Ghwashaang' nea gwayeeshsha, “Gatmooda, siisi aniini mwaanali.”
42022058	Miigageawiit ghwadaah siinuut ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara ang'iing'i gibeahi jeedeaba fukka.” Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida meabeahi.”
42022059	Iiduw nea ning'atta aseedeanagi gwayeeshsha siinuut, “Aba huumwa siisi earada goodeaydooschi niny; aba gideaba niny siida Galilaaya.”
42022060	Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Siida, mwaanali eara gidinyaashi.” Deagheatta damani duu gabaloolean, goguul nnghaghooda.
42022061	Ghwayam geaw Ng'uttamiida ak gang'ula Betro. Ghoapkaat Betro ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, gidaghayi rukusiinda gideaba, “Eannean heeda miigoguula nnghaghooda gajea niheawanaan niba samwagu.”
42022062	Hean gwariitta jarooda ak goyyeawda muuchchi.
42022063	Ghwahitta Fukkeanji gwachchi ang'ng'waay Yeesuun ak gwashka nea ghabwar;
42022064	Gegeanu ak geeduukta gheanyanga ak geppearsa nea geeyeeshsha, “Heappi rukuneasa siida lasnyi?.”
42022065	Ak gerukusa ng'asheega saang'a bea ging'weakkwa.
42022066	Sakteayda nea gorearu aseetta, gabadageat gweargwa sea ashoohoodiga hees, ea ng'oorshoodiga, ak geyeadu madeeda girgweageeda, ak geeyeeshsha,
42022067	“Iiwosi Gristo, girukuneasa.” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Eara darukuneegwa, majaghanyi amwasa;
42022068	ak eara daanyaashcheagwa ng'asheanda ea mwajashaaha.
42022069	Nea gidang'eada ghamneawa Balleanda Siida gaygoopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta hoauur.”
42022070	Gwayeeshsha sean, “Aba sarean guwasi Balleanda Aseetta?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Goorgu agooga gideaba geawoschi.”
42022071	Hean geeyi, asi gudeegassa mushooduspwa naaha? Aba gideaba siyiing'si geat ng'asheega ghuuttaannyi.
42023001	Ghang'eatng'eat Fukka sean bea girgweageedean ak ghwaat madeeda Bilatto.
42023002	Geang'ng'eat giheakteayda nea geeyi, “Geadaayi siisi nea ghoaschoarda emeedeanya, aba gideaba ghoaghuumwaneesa ea meattai Gaysaari gwaadi nea gwayeena niny Gristoyda was sugoochcheanda gil.”
42023003	Ghoanyaash Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, “Assang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?” Ghwasha niny ak gwayeeshsha, “Gidirukuteaydi ang'iing'i gil.”
42023004	Gwayeeshsha Bilatto Ashohoodiga hees, ea emeeda, “Mwadaahi ng'asheanji muy aba badaydeaba siisi.”
42023005	Godiiktiiksa muuchchi nea gwayeenniisa, “Siisi ghoang'waal buuneeda aba ginealshoadaannyi aba ng'eanyiida Yahuudi sean, ghang'eada Galilaaya ea ghwahidu hiji.”
42023006	Iiy Bilatto ng'asheesu ghoanyaashta siisi ea gaba ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
42023007	Nyas iitta gideaba gwanda ng'eanyiida sugoochcheanda siyi Heroode, ghwaat heeda Heroode aba gideaba damandida gwanda Yerusaleemu.
42023008	Gahoosan Heroode muuchchi idaa Yeesu, aba gideaba ghayi nigeawiit gagaseadayyi deaktaannyi, aba gideaba ghayi ninyas iittaannyi nea gagasa ghwadaah gwadeagooda jea gwasin.
42023009	Ghoanyaash ng'asheega saang'a; ak ea mwasha.
42023010	Ghang'eatng'eat ashoohoodiga hees ea ng'oorshoodiga ak ghoahaakta muuchchi aba urda.
42023011	Gafool Heroode sea shirikkareadaannyi ak gwajuuga, ak gekkwealsa hang'i mideawa ormeeni miy ak geatealda heeda Bilatto.
42023012	Ghang'eada damandida gwaduupchi Heroode ea Bilatto, aba gideaba ghayi ammwadi gwanda fuurjeeda dageascheeda nyawa.
42023013	Iiduw gaguursa Bilatto ashoohoodiga hees sea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea buuneeda,
42023014	ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Siisi goyeadu heedeanyu nea goyeennyi nischoarda buuneeda. Iiduw nea geasikteawi ng'asheanji aba madeedeang'wa, ea mwaadaahi aba headaannyi gidinyeanda was sean oahaaktaawi;
42023015	nea eara Heroode godelneasa siisi aba gideaba mandeawana gidinyeanda miisa miyeeda;
42023016	aba sareani gaydanung' eabwar ak geasiksi gawa.” [
42023017	Aba gideaba iissa gammiisa gideaba gaygoottissa siyagi mida ghelooniga aba damanda ghwelmeeda.]
42023018	Hean gojuur sean nea gwayi, “Geanda siisi ak gisiksi Baraaba,”
42023019	nea niny ea siida sijaksa ghealooniga aba gideaba ghwanung' ghaghoakghoayda emeeda mujiini ea gideaba gwanuus siida.
42023020	Gabiikta Bilatto gobalool saawa nea gagasa gwasiksa Yeesu;
42023021	gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Angoora, Angoora niny!”
42023022	Gwayeeshsha gichcha deaba samwagu, “Nea gidinyeandeaba siisi ea naaha gil? Mwadaahi ng'asheanji jea enuusa, asi gaydabwar ak geasiksi gawa.”
42023023	Gojuur muuchchi aba uurda nea gagasa engoor. Ea gwajoriischi gijureanda nyawa.
42023024	Gorgweaksiinda Bilatto gidagassiida buuneeda.
42023025	Gwasiksa siitta ghayi sijaksa ghealooniga nung' ghaghoakghoayda buneedean, ea gideaba ninuus siidean, was dea gasa saawa; ak ghoadayda Yeesu aba gidagassiida saawa.
42023026	Iiduw nea geayaat, geroonnyi Simoneeda ng'eanyiida Girene, nea abeeda gwaleabu neayeeda, ak geang'ng'waay ak geanung' ghwasar behiidida nea ghwaat Yeesu geeshta.
42023027	Ak ghwaat geeshta emeetuw, ea gadeemga aat geeshta nea gaguuttu heareega nea gooyyeawda.
42023028	Gwayamsa geaw Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Haweega Yerusaleemu, adooyyeawdaneani, oyyeawda geat ea diibigeagwa.
42023029	Asi ang'ulla, gayghwahidu eawoojiga jea gwayeena, ‘Ghang'wana gea was sonung'weega, ea jeesinga moang'ng'wa gwaji, ea gidinga miiyereer!’
42023030	Hean gaygwayeeshsha giijeega, ‘Oppedeayseasa;’ ea heayeeniga, ‘Afunyeesa.’
42023031	Aba gideaba isisissa ng'asheesu geetta shabwaat, gaygawuurjiin aba geetta ghajaam?”
42023032	Hean geayaat eara fiih iyyeenya adiiy enuusuudayyi niny.
42023033	Iiduw nea sihitta hiji suguura Geapkeeda Uhuuda, gengoorsa uhuuda behiida, sea fukka adiiyiin, dea manda geattinda dugwa niirja gwanda geattinda ghadaam.
42023034	Ak gwayi Yeesu, “Bwaabwa, eaniiyean samsiina fiisu; aba gideaba mwanala gissin.” Hean geelaja hang'wakkaaschi ak geng'alealleesa.
42023035	Ghaminaada buuneeda nea geeng'ula, nea fukka ahaaghwa ng'eanyiidean gang'ula nea gwashka nea gwayeena, “Gwalealu suurja, asi dalealna geaw, iiwas Gristoyda Aseetta loat niny!”
42023036	Eara fuga shirikkara gwashka ak gaweesa ak ghoadaw beesu ng'weani,
42023037	nea geeyeenniisa, “Iiwosi sugoochcheanda fuga Yahuudi, gilealu geaw!”
42023038	Gwanda ng'ooruutka uhuuda behiidaannyi sung'waar, “Niih sugoochcheanda Yahuudi gil.”
42023039	Gwayeeshsha siyagi adiiy gwachchi singooruudayyi sea niny, “Ang'iing'i muwosi Gristohi? Asi lealni geaw ak gilealneasa eara aseasa!”
42023040	Hean gowoowsa niirja nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i miiwali eara Aseetta, nea eara ang'iing'i gindi jeedeaba girgweaksiini?
42023041	Niih gammiiseasa aseasa, aba gideaba geanyaschi gimeardeanya aba gissisinnyi, nea siisi ea miigwasin gidamuy wassean.”
42023042	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha, “Yeesu apkaadaan ihitti jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaang'u.”
42023043	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa geayeeshshineey askweareeni, gajendeayesiina nyeamus.”
42023044	Geeyi bwak ama gul aseetteaba lah gwaduk ng'eanyiissean misaneeda ea gaba aseetta shageash,
42023045	iiduw nea gagarbiit aseetta; hean ghang'at bugusta hang'dida subwaasha jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean nibiyyeenya.
42023046	Ng'atta goyyeawda Yeesu nea gojuur muuchchi nea gwayi, “Bwaabwa, nayiinnyi guroroodeanyu geattingaagu!” Ahiit balooli ghoabitta.
42023047	Daah shirikkarajeanda haw gwaduumsheesa Aseetta nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa siisi ea doabiiwaat!”
42023048	Daah emeeda gwachchi bwatgeat aba hoowa nea ghwadaah ng'asheanjiin, gabikta gealga nyaawa nea gagiisan.
42023049	Nea fuga sean duupchi ea gadeemga ghayi adeana aba ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, ghaminaada nea sheagi nea ghwadaah ng'asheeu.
42023050	Aba damandida gwanda siisi suguura Yoseefu was siida mujiineeda Yahuudi siguura Arimattaayu. Niny abeeda gaba gweargwa girgweageeda nea ng'eeni, ak gabiissa ea doabiiwaat,
42023051	nea niny ea mwamwasa gidagasa saawa ea gissin, nea abeeda gomuukku sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
42023052	Ghang'eat siisi ak gawa ea gawa heeda Bilatto ama hitta gamus musta Yeesu.
42023053	Ng'atta gorareang'u ak gokkwealsa hang'da miy ak ghwayiin jeemba bung'eeni mida jeemba laghaana ghayi miyeebung'sa siih.
42023054	Nea eaweechcheanji ea eaweetta sing'aap gil jea ghwahinna sabattoohi.
42023055	Nea Gadeemga ghayi adeana niny leabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya ghwaat geeshta ghwadaah bung'eeda ea gissibuyda;
42023056	hean iiduw gabiikta ghoah ak gwasin nagheeda ea geediga ng'andidi. Ak gafuuf eaweeda Sabatto gwahinda gidanyashta digheanda.
42024001	Iimuchchu eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, nea ghaghar gayeew, gaweay heeda bung'eeda, nea ghwaat geediga ng'andidi nisin.
42024002	Hean sihitta geadaah lagheaneedida nea sishsheagiida ghuutta shoomanda bung'eeda,
42024003	iiduw nea gaweay jeeshshomanda bung'eeda ea mwadaaha muusta.
42024004	Damani duuw ghahamwang'eanyi aba ng'asheanjiin, hean ghamiinaada fiih iyyeenya aba murdeannyaawa nea gookwa hang'weakka meang'meang'i;
42024005	damanda duughang'uda muuwda nea ghwahiiy geat gogeal iheenga nyaawa ng'eanyi, gwayeeshsha siih saawa, “Ghwasaan andagoogaseadayyi siida majeeck aba jeeda fuga nimeewa?
42024006	Oapkaada gidaghayi rukuneegwa, damanda duuw gwandeewa Galilaaya,
42024007	gideaba, Balleanda Siida gajeayiin geattinga fuga ring'eega, ak gengoor, ak gwaduudu eaweetteaba samwagu.”
42024008	Hean geapkaat ng'asheagaaschi,
