42024009	bikna hooweanji bea bung'eedean gaweay ghoadaw iitta ginealangiga attamwanagiin ea buneessuurja.
42024010	Nea Mariya Magdaleena gil, ea Yoana ea Mariya gheamatta Yakkobo, ea gadeemga suurja gwachchi mideawean suuh fuga rukusa giijasoodiga iitteaba ng'asheesun gil;
42024011	gawuurji ng'asheesu aba heannyaawa duguuga mwadagha, ak ghanyea meamwasa.
42024012	Aka gawuurji ng'asheega nyaawa aba heannyaawa duguuga mwadaagha, nea ghanyea mwamwasa. Ng'atta ghang'eat Betro ak ghafwach ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda, ak ghwahiiy geaw gong'weersa jeeda, ghwadaah wegeakkiga sibung'dean akghwahit; hean ghang'eat gawa nea ghaham ng'eanyi aba ng'asheega bunu.
42024013	Eaweettida gaweay fiih iyyeenya aba jeannyaawa gharang'i suguura Emawu, nea sheageewa Yerusaleemu jea ghoahiitta aseetta iyyeenya hitteayda,
42024014	gabalooleadawa iitteaba ng'asheekka nndeareetta bunuun.
42024015	Aba damani balloleadawa nea gonyeari geadiin, gawa Yeesu ea gwaneekkiissa ak godeayi.
42024016	Geadukuta gheanyanga nyaawa ea mwanala siida was.
42024017	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ng'asheespa naaha obalooleadawi nea goweayiin?.” Ghaminaada nea niikkaroomnyi gheamamuunatka nyaawa.
42024018	Ghwasha Siyagi aba jeannyaawa, suguura Gleoppa ak gwayeeshsha, “Neada ang'iing'i guwosi rabascheanda nea gubwaageawi aba Yerusaleemu mwanala ng'asheega sisiin aba hiji askwearjoojusu?”
42024019	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ng'asheespa naaha?” Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'asheega Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, ghayi was sibaneeda mideawa uurda sinooda ea baloolda aba madeeda Aseetta ea dea buuneessean,
42024020	ea gidahaaktaayda ashoohoodigasa hees ea fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ak ghoadayda ergweaksiina miyeeda, ak gengoor.
42024021	Nea abeeda aseasa geararji gideaba niny siichchea ghoaghu Israeeli gil. Gilnuut gichcha askwareani ea deaba samwagu aba ng'eetta ng'eada ng'asheesu.
42024022	Gabiissa gwanda gadeem bea ng'eang'deanya gwachchi nung' eabeala. Weay bung'eeda sakteayda duuw
42024023	ea mwadaaha mustaannyi; ak ghwahidu ak gwargu gideaba niroonnyi sea malaykajeanda eeshsha ea majeek.
42024024	Eara fiih suuk gichcha gwachchi sindeawi gaweay hoowa bea bung'eedean ak ghwadaakta gidagwachchi rugu gadeemgiga; nea niny ea meadaaha.”
42024025	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ea fuga dasheahi, mideawa guroruunatka hang'oonyi ak amwamwasa eara ng'asheega ghayi rugu sibanga!
42024026	Mammisiina gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas sawanadeeda ama ng'atta gawa jeeda gigheambiittaannyi?”
42024027	Hean ghoang'eada Muusa ea sibanga sean, ak gwarukusa saawa ng'ooruutka sean bea ng'asheega bwadaydaannyi.
42024028	Gaweay ea gwaneekkiissa gharang'dida gwachchi weayiin. Ak gwahinda geaw giligasa ghang'atta,
42024029	hean gemearmearani nea geeyeeshsha, “Shinya endeayeena, aba gideaba niisha Aseetta ak ea nihiidu eaweeda.” Hean gawa jeeda gheeda ak gwandeayi.
42024030	Damandida mideayeewa aba agiischoodean gageanu mukkatte ak gang'ushsha ak ghabwanach ak ghoadaw saawa.
42024031	Ghwajaada gheanyanga nyaawa, deagu ghwanal gideaba ninyi, ama ng'atta ghwaroada gheanyanga nyawa.
42024032	Gonyeari geat nea gwayeena, “Neada jeesingaasa ea mwayeadana beasta damandida gwachchi abaloolaneasa aba naweedean, nea gang'achcha iitteanya aba gidaghayi nyaah ng'ooruutka?”
42024033	Ghang'eatng'eat damandida ak gabiikta Yerusaleemu, ak ghwanyasa hoowa giikka attamwanagiin nea gwandeawa giikka eawooschu mideaydooschiin,
42024034	nea gwayi, “Humwa gil niduudu Ng'uttamiida, geabwada nihiimsa geaw Simon!”
42024035	Hean ghoadayda iitteaba ng'asheekka bussa aba naweedean, ea gida siyi bwak ea ghwanalda saawa gideaba ninyi damanda bwanaja mukkatte.
42024036	Damani duuw gwandeawa jeedeaba baloliin, ghaminaada Yeesu appugusta nyaawa.
42024037	Ghahamng'eanyi ak ghabeal muuchchi, nea ghaghay gili daah malonghajeanda.
42024038	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwasaan anda nung'deagwa muuwda, ak ghwasaan anda goonyearayi geat ng'asheesu aba jeesingeagwa?
42024039	Ong'ng'wersiina geattingeasu ea geeshangeasu, gideaba aniini gil; ong'ng'waanya eara saseedeanyu ak ghoadaayi; aba gideaba malonghajeanda mandeawana saseeda ea geekka gawuurji gidoadaaktanaan ghamneawa.”
42024040	Iiduu ne ning'atta rukunoodeaba ng'sheesu gohiimsa geattingaaschi ea geeshangaaschi.
42024041	Damani miih ghamwasa aba hooseaneegean, nea ghahamng'eanyi nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Goondeawi gichchea ayaaga aba hiji?”
42024042	Geattaw banajaneeda ghweayeanda sibeash.
42024043	Gageanu ak ghwaak aba madeannyaawa.
42024044	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Suuh ng'asheegeasu ghayi earukuneegwa, damanda sindeaydooscheewi, ak abeeda ng'asheega appadaydeanyu aba jeeda deaweedeeda Muusa ea sibanga ea gittaabooda Nyiigheega gajeahhiit.”
42024045	Ng'atta ghwajaat fughareenga nyaawa ghwanal ng'ooruutka.
42024046	Ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Niih gidaghayi sung'waarda gil gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas hang'weanidooda ak gwaduuna miyeeda eaweetteaba samwagu,
42024047	ea gideaba duukkuunooda ea samsiinda ring'eega gajeerukkwiida aba gheawungaaschi, aba jeeda emoojiiga sean, ghang'eada Yerusaleemu.
42024048	Nea agooga gowoschi mushoodigeaba ng'asheesu.
42024049	Ang'ulla, geayeaneegwa heelleeda Bwaabwa; asi oppiidana mujiineeni ea egoneegwa uurda leabu humng'eeda.”
42024050	Ghoadoabiiw ea ghoahiitta ng'eanyiida Bettaniya, ak gagatgat geattingaaschi ak gang'ushsha.
42024051	Damani ng'ushshiinean goheelli geaw ak geettiing'da eayaat humng'eeda.
42024052	Ama ng'atta gabiigu Yerusaleemu nea gahoosan muuchchi,
42024053	goobiitta jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
43001001	Ghayi aba garayi gwanda Ng'asheanda, nea Ng'asheanda gwandeayi sea Aseetta, nea Ng'asheanda ea Aseetta.
43001002	Aba garayi niny gwandeayi sea Aseetta;
43001003	haleanjeessean geesin aba niny, nea iimanda niny ghanyea maygwanda gil aba haleanjeeda sisin.
43001004	Jeadaannyi gwanda eaweega, nea eaweesu ea weeshinda buuneeda.
43001005	Nea weeshini ghoabwaay jeeda misaneeda, nea misaneeda ea miighoammu ghwajoar.
43001006	Abeeda gwanda siisi sichcheagu leabu heeda Aseetta; suguura gheawungaaschi Yohaana.
43001007	Niny ghwaan ak gamuuwwu iitta weeshinda, ak abeeda ghamwas buuneessean aba niny.
43001008	Nea niny ea miih weeshinda gil, niny ghwaan gamuuwwuu iitta weeshinda.
43001009	Niih weeshinda huumwa gil hidu jeeda ng'eanyiida ak ghoabwaay giliwas siih.
43001010	Niny ghayi abeeda gwanda jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea ng'eanyiida geesin appadaydaannyi ak amwanala ng'eanyiida.
43001011	Niny ghwahidu gheannyi, ak ea mwadeapta fugaaschi.
43001012	Nea fukka sean deapta ninyiin, ak ghamwas aba gheawungaaschiin, ghoadaw uurda jea ghoaweawa diibiga Aseetta;
43001013	Fuga meejiilana naweeda geallaan, ghana gidabwariiyda saseeda, ghana gidabwariiyda siida, geaghus Aseetta.
43001014	Ak iiduw ghoaw Ng'asheandida saseeda ak goobiida jeedeanya, niny ghwannyiit dagheerjeandumeeda ea humeanda ak ea sidaayi, gigheambiittaannyi, gigheambiitta uurji dea Balleanda was haghasheeda leabu heeda Bwaabwa.
43001015	(Yohaana gamuuwwu iittaannyi, ak goojur, “Niih dea ghayi earukku nea geayi, ‘Niih dea ghayi eayeennyi gay gweadu geeshteanyu ak ahaweawaneani aba gideaba gwanda madeedeanyu.’ ”)
43001016	Aba hidoadaannyi aseasa sinyaschi dagheerjeanduumeeda nea gettaguurji.
43001017	Aba gideaba deaweeda geegu aba naweeda Muusa; nea dagheerjeandumeeda ea huumeanda ghapkaana naweeda Yeesu Gristo.
43001018	Manda siida nidaah Aseetta; Balleanda was haghasheeda, mideayi sea Bwaabwa, niny siida adaajiidi.
43001019	Niih gidamuwwu Yohaana, gojeakta fuga Yahuudi mida Yerusaleemu ashoohoodiga ea fuga Laawi ghoanyaash gideaba, “Guwosi ngeaha?”
43001020	Ghamwas ak ea mwashaanga ghamwas, nea gwayi. “Aniini meawosi Gristo.”
43001021	Gennyaash niny, “Ak guwosi ngeaha? Guwosi Eliyahi?” Gwayeeshsha, “Meawosi,” Geyeeshsha, “Abeeda guwosi sibaneeda?” Gwayeeshsha, “Manda.”
43001022	Geyeeshsha niny, “Asi ang'iing'i guwosi ngeaha? Rukuneasa ak geyeassi iitta fuga ajeakneeasa. Giyeaniin appadaydaang'u?”
43001023	Gwayeeshsha, “Geawoschi ghuutta siida nyearra jeeda dareapcheenda. ‘Olleappa naweeda Ng'uttamiida,’ gawuurji gidaghayi rukuteayda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya.”
43001024	Fiisu abeeda gojeagu Farisayajeega.
43001025	Ng'atta geannyaash nea geyeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i imuwosi Gristo ghana Eliya, ghana sibaneeda anda gibattisanayi buuneeda?”
43001026	Ghwasha Yohaana nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geabattiisananeegwa beega, ak gwanda jeedeangwa siida minaada nea moanali,
43001027	Siisi gaygamaseawnean ak aniini ea mammisean gideaba gaydeameew deanga geakkaaschi.”
43001028	Ng'asheesu seaniin geesin aba hoowa bea Bettaniyaan gigheawda Yordaan was heeda abattiisanniisa Yohaana buuneeda.
43001029	Muchchu ghwadaah Yeesu nea ghwaan headaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ngulla Dayeenda Gisilleanda bea Aseetta jea gageanda ring'eeda jeeda ng'eanyiida!
43001030	Niih dea ghayi earukku eayeennyi, ‘Gwanda siisi jea gamaseawneani, aba gideaba niny ghayi gabay gwanda madeedeanyu, aba gideaba gwanda madeedeanyu.’
43001031	Aniini siisi ghayi mwaanali, amaduw ghaawunnyi deabattisana beega ak abeeda getteajiissa Israeeli.”
43001032	Ng'atta gamuuwwu Yohaana ng'asheega nea gwayi, “Nadaayi Gurorooda gwashubeanda ghariibajeanda nea ghoabinna humng'eeda ak goobissa uhuudaannyi.
43001033	Earaniini abeeda mwaanali; amaduw ghwanung' siitta ghayi ajeaknean deabattiisan aba beegean gwarukunean gideaba, ‘Siitta jea daaha nea gwashubeesa Gurorooda ak goobissa uhuudaannyiin siida niih diitta jea gobattiisan aba Gurorooda Ghaydidiin.’
43001034	Ak aniini ea nadaayi ak ea neamuuwwu gideaba siisi Balleanda Aseetta gil.”
43001035	Muchchu gabiikta Yohaana ghaminaada sea ginealangaaschi assiyyeenya.
43001036	Hean gang'ulla Yeesu nea ghang'atta ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'ulla, Dayeenda gisilleanda bea Aseetta!”
43001037	Ghwayiiy Ginealangiga assiyyeenyean niny nea gwargu ng'asheesu ak ghwaat geeshta Yeesu.
43001038	Ghwayam geaw Yeesu ak ghwadaah nea ghwaat geeshta ak ghoanyaash saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Gogaseadayyi naaha?” Hean geyeeshsha niny, “Raabi” (nea gideaba Ginealshochcheanda gil), “ang'iing'i gibiitti yeenu?”
43001039	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Abeenni ak gajadaaha.” Ng'atta ghwaat geeshta, ak ghwadaah heeda eajusu abiitta, gobitpiit gwandeawa niny eaweettida abeeda gaba aseetta damanamughuush.
43001040	Iiy oorjeanagi aba jeedeaba giikka assiyyeenyean nea gabalool Yohaana ak ghwaat geeshta Andereya gil, was oorjeeda gennyea Simoneeda suguura Betro.
43001041	Gosheeda ghwadaah Simoneeda was oorjeeda ghaamwat, ak gwayeeshsha, “Sidaayi Masiya” (nea gideaba Gristohi).
43001042	Hean ghwaat heeda Yeesu. Daah Yeesu gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gegureweey Simon Balleanda Yohaana? Asi gajegureweey Geefa.” (Nea gideabeadaannyi ea Betro gil).
43001043	Iimuchchu eanigasa Yeesu beatta Galilaaya. Ghwadaah Filippo ak gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”
43001044	Filippo niny siida leabu Betsayda gil, mujiineeda geaba Andreya ea Betro.
43001045	Filippo ghwadaah Nattanaeeli ak gwayeeshsha, “Sidaayi siida ghayi ng'waar Muusa ng'asheagaaschi aba jeeda deaweeda. Siisi ghayi ng'asheagaaschi ghang'waar sibanga. Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, was balleada Yoseefu.”
43001046	Gwayeeshsha Nattanaeeli niny, “Asseara Nasareetti ghoammu gwarinna gilimiyi?” Gwayeeshsha Filippo niny, “Benni daaha.”
43001047	Ghwadaah Yeesu Nattanaeeli nea ghwaan headaannyi, ak gwayi, “Ng'ulla, Israeelajeanda huumwa, manda jeadaannyi ng'uyyeega eara gil!”
43001048	Gwayeeshsha Nattanaeeli niny, “Assang'iing'i ginaldananniin?” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Ghwanyawa ghadayeay nea gudumidana guumda shabogheechcheanda nea eara Filippo eamighwaan gaguurneey.”
43001049	Ghwasha Nattanaeeli nea gwayeeshsha, “Rabi, ang'iing'i guwosi Balleanda Aseetta! Guwosi Sugoochcheanda Israeeli!”
43001050	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghamneawa gumwasi aba gideaba geayeeshshineey ghwanyawa ghadayeay nea gudumidana guumda shabogheechcheanda? Asi gaydaaha ng'asheega hees naawa suuh.”
43001051	Hean gwayeeshsha niny, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gajadaaha nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak gajadaaha malaykajeega Aseetta heeda mwascheeng'da suurja ghwararang'aan ghapka heeda Balleanda Siida.”
43002001	Iimuchchu eaweetteaba samwagu gwanda nyeangiida Gaaneeda mida Galilaaya, eara gheamatta Yeesu abeeda gwanda hoowa;
43002002	nea eara Yeesu ea ginealangaaschi ea suguursa ghapka nyeangiini.
43002003	Iiduw nea ning'at difaayi gwayeeshsha gheamatta Yeesu niny, “Mudugwandeawa difaayi.”
43002004	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghaamwat, “Ea iiyya, ang'iing'i gendeayeasi naaha? Damandeanyu miighwahidu.”
43002005	Ghwalamda Gheamatta ak gwayeeshsha soomjooga, “Agooga asna gilinyooh gwargu niny.”
43002006	Abeetta gwanda hoowa sirbaji lah ghayi sisna lagheanga, ak geyiina beega ahunniida fuga Yahuudi aba gimminnoodeaba geat, aba heesinnyeekka jeesinga nyaawa gwalassa galanajeega diktam ghana diktam ea damanamughush.
43002007	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Oannyiida sirbajeesu beega.” Hean geannyiit ea ghwanaawnaawda.
43002008	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asi aramni ak goyeassi siida haw ang'aatta buuneeda.” Hean geyeasa.
43002009	Iiduw nea gwasamu Siidida ang'aatta buuneedean beegiga, aniyamwa ghoaw difaayi, nea abeeda niny amwanala heeda leabu, (nea soomjookka ghwanyawa ramu beegean ghwanal), gaguursa Siitta ang'aatta buuneedean siida geeshshi
43002010	ak gwayeeshsha, “Eajusu buuneeda inyeessa ghanyi goshoohu difaayi miyaas; amadaa beadi nileeshi buuneeda muuchchi, hean gabiissa goruudu gea munyas; ang'iing'i nukkwa gudumideawana difaayi miyaas eara ghamneawa.”
43002011	Gwadeagooni diitta ghayi sin Yeesu bea madeedean gil aba Gaaneeda Galilaaya nea abeeda ghwanung' eadaah gigheambittaannyi; eara ginealangaaschi hean gabiissa ghamwas niny.
43002012	Iing'atta ghangeat ghwararang'aada gawa Gapernaamu nea godeayi ghaamwat ea oorjooga ghaamwat ea ginealangaaschi; gobiida hoowa askwearjoojusu ng'ay.
43002013	Abeetta gwanekiidean ghwelmeeda basakka bea fuga Yahuudi, hean ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu.
43002014	Ghwanyasa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta buuneeda; heeda mwashaayda heewga suurja ghwashaayda gisilga nea suurja ghwashaayda ghariibajeega, ea gea nyarja lappiyyeeda gadiyeatta.
43002015	Hean gwasin ghealooda, amahit ghahoan buuneesean mideawa gisilga ea heewga aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; ak ghoahiida lappiyeeda fuga nyarja lappiya nea gobimbineada measajeega nyaawa.
43002016	Gwayeeshsha fugiga ghwanyawa sheahhiida ghariibajeanda, “Oang'aamwana dugusu hiji; adoonung ghoaw ghooriida Bwaabwa ghoariida sikkeakshachcheewa.”
43002017	Ghoapkaat ginealangaaschi gideaba geang'waar. “Bariinyeegeasu aba gheang'u gayghwaagan.”
43002018	Ghoanyaash fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha, “Gaysina ana gwadeagu jea eadaaha gideaba gisni ng'asheesu?”
43002019	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Anyarja gheawi sibatta Aseettean ak gaydadeas aba jeemba askwearjooji assamwagu.”
43002020	Hean gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi, “Gheawi sibatta Aseettean ghayi destaannyi gageanu gweannyeew haradam ea lah, ak gaydeasa aba jeemba askwearjooji samwagu?”
43002021	Nea abeeda Gheeda sibatta Asseetta rugu ea saseadaannyi gil.
43002022	Iiduw nea niduunna miyeeda, ghoapkaat ginealangaaschi gideaba ghayi nurgu ng'asheesu, ak ghamwas ng'oruutka ea ng'asheega ghayi rugu Yeesu.
43002023	Damanda mideewa Yerusaleemu aba jeeda ghwelmeeda basakka, ghamwas fuga saang'a gheawungaaschi idaah gwadeagooda sin;
43002024	nea Yeesu amwamwasa fugiga aba gideaba nisikkideawa sean,
43002025	aba gideaba niny ghwanal buuneessean ak ea magassa gideaba gaygamuuwwu siih; aba gideaba niny ghwanal gidamida jeessiida.
43003001	Asi gwanda siispa Farisaayajeega suguura Nikkodeemu, nea ghoahaaghwa fuga Yahuudi.
43003002	Siisi Gaweesa Yeesu eawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Raabi, aseasa geanalli gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi ginealshochcheanda ak gileabu heeda Aseetta; aba gideaba manda siida ammu gwasin gwadeagwajeesu isinayiin, geaghus siida mideayi sea Aseetta.”
43003003	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa geayeeshshineey siida imebiikta eeji deaba iyyeennya ea mayghwadaah sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.”
43003004	Gwayeeshsha Nikkodeemu niny, “Iijea ebiikta eeji siida niheedu? Gayghoammu gideaba gaygabiikta jeeda ghaamwat deaba iyyeenya ak geeji?”
43003005	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineey, siida imiyeejiilna beega ea Gurorooda ea mayghoammu gawa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
43003006	Gissijiila saseeda gaba saseeda, nea gissijiila gurorooda gaba Gurorooda.
43003007	Adihami ng'eanyi aba gideaba geayeeshshineey, ‘Siida geaghus eebiikta eeji.’
43003008	Jeammeeda iissa gagal heeda gasa, ak giyiinyi ghuutta ak ea minali helleabu ghana heedagal, ea giduurji siiidida sijiila Guroroodean.”
43003009	Gwayeeshsha Nikkodeemu niny, “Ng'asheesu ijeagwasa?”
43003010	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Eara ang'iing'i giwosi ginealshochcheanda Israeeli ak aminali ng'asheesu?
43003011	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshsineey, aseasa geerukku gida sinalli ak geemuwwu gidaghayi sidaayi; amadukku agooga ghanyea mwoamwasi ng'asheega simuuwwu.
43003012	Asi iyearukuneegwa ng'asheega badayda ng'eanyiida ak amoamwasi, abeeda iyearukneegwa ng'asheega mida humng'eeda gajamwastaan?
43003013	Manda siida ghayi nidiyeada ea gawa humng'eada geaghus Balleanda Siida ghayi rarang'aana humng'eeda
43003014	Gawurji gida ghayi attoasta Muusa ichchibooda aba dareapcheeda, gwasnu eara Balleanda Siida gajeattoastunu.
43003015	Abeetta siida jea ghamwas niny gayghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
43003016	Aba gideaba Aseetta ghabwariiy ng'eanyiida ea eeyibwak ea ghoadayda Balleandaannyi assakkalealla, ak abeeda siida wassean mwas niny amwaroada ak abeeda ghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
43003017	Aba gideaba Aseetta ghayi mojeakna Balleanda ghwaan ng'eanyiida, ak gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida, geegasa ghwalalan ng'eanyiida appadaydaannyi.
43003018	Siida mwas niny majeergweaksa; nea siitta mwamwasaan ea ning'aatta girgweaksinda, aba gideaba mwamwasa gheawunga Balleanda assakkalealla bea Aseetta.
43003019	Ak girgweaksinda ea nihi, ghwahidu weeshinda jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak ghabwariiy buuneeda misaneeda ea ghoadaraam weeshinda, aba gideaba sinaweega nyaawa eamunyas.
43003020	Siida sina ng'asheega munyas iissa ghwasit weeshinda, nea ghanyea mayghwaan heedeesh aba gideaba gajiiduw geattaajiit sinaweagaaschi munyas.
43003021	Nea siitta sina humeandean gayghwaan heedeesh, ak geesikteawa sinagweegaaschi gideaba ghoawal gheang'da Aseetta.
43003022	Iing'atta ng'asheesu gawa Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Yudeeya, gobiida hoowa sea ginealangaaschi nea gobattiisan.
43003023	Abeeda eara Yohaana gobattiisan aba Aynooni, nekkeewa Saleemu, aba gideaba hoowa gwanda beega saang'a; iissa gaweay buuneeda heeda ak gobattiisan.
43003024	Aba damandida Yohaana miyeayaat ghealooniga.
43003025	Iiduw ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda aba jeeda Ginealanga Yohaana ea siispa Yahuudi aba ng'asheega gimminooda.
43003026	Hean iiduw gaweay heeda Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha, “Raabi, siida heetta indeawi aba gigheawda Yordaan ghayi imuuwwu ng'asheagaaschi eara niny ghamneawa gobattisan, nea gaweay headaannyi buuneessean.”
43003027	Gwayeeshsha Yohaana, “Siida mwoammu ghwanyas gidawassean geaghus dea siittaw leabu humng'eeda.
43003028	Nea eara agooga ghoammuuschi amuuwwuni gideaba geayeennyi, aniini meawosi Gristo, aniini gechcheaknean deashoayna niny.
43003029	Siida mideawa gatmooda bea nyeangiida niny siida geeshshi, amadukku sittuupchi siida geeshshi, iissa ghaminaada nea goleeysiit nea gahoosan muuchchi iyiiy ghutteaba siitta geeshshiin; asi aba sareani hooseanegeasu niheedu.
43003030	Gammiisa niny gideaba gajea ghaloamwat ak ea meawosi aniini ghaloamwaat.”
43003031	Siida leabu humng'eeda ahaweewa sean, nea siida mida badayda ng'eanyiida gaba ng'eanyiida, ak gabaloolla ng'asheega ng'eanyiida; nea siitta leabu humng'eedean ahaweewa sean.
43003032	Niny iissa gamuuwwu ng'asheega daah ea gea iiy, ak ghanyeamanda siida mwas muwwunoadaannyi;
43003033	amaduw siitta mwas muwwunoadaannyiin, abeeda eara niny ea niroor gideaba Aseetta huumwa.
43003034	Aba gideaba siida ghayi ajeagu Aseetta iissa gabaloola ng'asheega Aseetta ak ghoadaw gurorooda nea modeena;
43003035	Bwaabwa ghabwariiy Balleanda, ak aniyiin haleanjeesean geattindaannyi.
43003036	Siida mwas Balleanda gwandeawa eaweega manda mudeanooda; nea siitta moawaala gheang'da Balleandean ea mayghwanyas eaweega, abeeda gaygwanda badaydannyi nyarasta Aseetta.
43004001	Iimuchchu nea ninal Ng'uttamiida gideaba niyiiy Farisayajeega gideaba Yeesu ninyas ginealanga saang'a burdeawa Yohaana nea gobattiisan
43004002	(nea Yeesu niny ea migobattiisan buuneeda, gobattiisan ginealangaaschi),
43004003	ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ak gabiikta gichcha Galilaaya.
43004004	Aba beadi gaygwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida Samariya.
43004005	Ghwahitta mujiineeda Samariya suguura Sikkaari, nekkeewa madamnyeanda ghayi adaw Yakkobo balleandannyi suguura Yoseefu.
43004006	Abeeda gwanda hoowa healadeeda Yakkobo, hean ea nibur Yeesu aba beatta, ak gopteada aba murdeeda healadeeda. Nea abeeda gaba aseetta lah.
43004007	Iiduw ghwahidu gatmoomba Samariya ghwaram beega. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gonean beesu aleayi.”
43004008	Abeeda aba damandida nuweay ginealangaaschi mujiini ghwasha hamitta.
43004009	Gwayeshsha Gatmootta bea Samariyahiin niny, “Ang'iing'i guwosi siida Yahuudi, nea aniini geawoschi gatmooda Samariya gimmustiin gideaba gaymusean beega?” Aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi maguuyi haleanja sea fuga Samariya.
43004010	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Inyeeda ghwanyawa ginali haleanjeeda goona Aseetta ak ea ng'eaha gil siida eshshiineey, ‘Gonean beega jaadali,’ ghwanyawa gaymusa niny ak gaygagoonnyi beega mideawa eaweega.”
43004011	Gwayeeshsha Gatmootta niny, “Ea siida mureeda ang'iing'i mindeawani geammooda jea ramnana beega, ak ghabwada niih healadeeda easheagi jiih; abeeda gaygeannana yeenu beesu mideawa eaweegean?
43004012	Neada ang'iing'i guwosi haweewa ghweandeanya was Yakkobo goaneasa healadeani nea ghwali niny beega sea diibigaaschi ea dugwaaschi?”
43004013	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Siida wassean nyooh ghwali beesu gaygabiikta ghwaak muwoash,
43004014	amadukku sichchea ghwali beega jadaadaw aniini mayghwaak muwoash earahay; aba gideaba beekka jea dadawiin gayghoaw aba jeadaannyi gheang'deenda nea goobeakbeaksa eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
43004015	Gwayeeshsha Gatmootta niny, “Siida mureeda, aniyean gonean beesu, ea mabiikta ghwaagan muwoash gichcha nea meabiikni hiji daram beega.”
43004016	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Una, gursiina siyeadaang'u ak gideani hiji.”
43004017	Gwayeeshsha gatmoodida niny, “Meandeawani siyeeda.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Asi girgu huumwa gideaba, ‘Mindeawani siyeeda;’
43004018	aba gideaba nindeawi siyeenat muut, ak ghamneawa niih indeawiin ea miih siyeadaang'u gil. Asi aba hiji girgu huumwa.”
43004019	Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida niny, “Siida mureeda, aniini iyeang'ulayi guwosi sibaneeda.
43004020	Ghwanigaasa ghayi iissa ghaghadoawan Aseetta aba uhuudeaba gijeeni, amaduw goyeennyi agooga heeda miisa ghadoawanda Aseetta Yerusaleemu gil.”
43004021	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Iyya, mwasaan ghwaan damanda jea ea majaghadoawana Bwaabwa aba uhudeaba gijeeni, ghana hoowa bea Yerusaleemuun.
43004022	Agooga iissa ghoaghadoawannyi gida mwoanali, duukku aseasa geanalli gida sighadoawannyi, aba gideaba lealeanooda gwaleabu heeda fuga Yahuudi.
43004023	Ak ghamneawa ghwaan damanda, nea damanda gwanda, nea fuga ghadoawan bea huumwa gayghadoawan Bwaabwa aba gurorooda ea huumwa, aba gideaba Bwaabwa gagaseadayyi ghaghadoawan fuga sunu.
43004024	Aseetta gurorooda gil nea fuga ghadoawan niny gammiisa ghaghadoawan aba gurorooda ea huumwa.”
43004025	Gwayeeshsha Gatmoodida niny, “Ghaanalli gideaba gayghwahidu Masiyeeda (suguura Gristo), eaweetta hinna gayghoahiimneasa ng'asheega sean.”
43004026	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu gatmootta, “Aniineani ghamneawa abaloolnyiin niny gil.”
43004027	Deagheatta ghapka Ginealangaaschi ak ghahamng'eanyi idaah nea gobalool gatmooda, ghanyi ea manda siideeshsha, “Gigasayi naaha?” ghana “Ghwasaan anda gibalooli sea gatmooda?”.
43004028	Gwanung'usa Gatmoodida sirbiidaannyi heeda ak gawa mujiini amahitta gwarukusa buuneeda gideaba,
43004029	“Apkaani adaaha siida rukunean ng'asheegeasu sean ghayi easinnyi! Siisi gajea miih Gristohi?”
43004030	Ghabeawa buuneeda mujiini ak gaweay headaannyi.
43004031	Aba damandida gamearmearani Ginealangaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Raabi, agischeena.”
43004032	Hean gwayeeshsha niny saawa, “Aniini geandeawi hamitta jea daak moanali agooga.”
43004033	Hean gonyeari geat Ginealanga gideaba, “Gwadeappa gwanda siida niyeassa hamitta?”
43004034	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Hamitteanyu sinooda gidabwariiy siida ghayi ajeaknean gil, ak ghahiichchi gadiyeadaannyi.
43004035	Neada ea moyeeni agooga, ‘Ghwashoada sheeh ang'wan ak ghwahit, ak gay ghwahidu damanda lajitta booga?’ Ak geayeeshshineegwa aniini, oang'ng'weerda ak ghoadaayi beadooda madameega nigeawiitt gaweeriidi aba lajitta.
43004036	Siida lach booga ninyas mushahareadaannyi, nea iissa ghoawaam haghweega aba eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak abeeda gaygahoosan duwaawi siida heetta hista ea daalach.
43004037	Ak ghoaw huumwa ng'asheanda ghayi surgu bea gideaba; ‘Gwahista siyagi ak gwalach siinuut.’
43004038	Aniini geajeaktaneegwa alaja booga miih agadiyeesiina, ghayi gagadiyi fiih suuk ak ghamneawa agooga ea noweayi jeeda gadiyeeda nyaawa.”
43004039	Ghamwas fuga saanga bea Samariya niny aba jeedeaba mujiineetta appadayda muuwwunoodeaba gatmoodida, bea gideaba, “Gwarukunean ng'asheega sean ghayi easinnyiin.”
43004040	Gaweay fuga Samariya heeda ak gamus gwandeayi saawa, ak goobiida hoowa eawooji iyyeenya.
43004041	Ghamwas fuga saang'a muuchchi appadayda ng'asheandaannyi.
43004042	Gwayeeshsha saawa gatmoodida, “Aseasa meamwasi aba ng'asheagaagu irgu, aseasa siyiinyi, ak geanalli gideaba aba huumwa siisi lealnochcheanda ng'eanyiida.”
43004043	Iing'atta eawooji iyyeenya ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa ng'eanyiida Galilaaya.
43004044	Aba gideaba Yeesu gamuuwwu gideaba sibaneeda mwoammu ghwanyas mureeda aba ng'eanyiidaannyi.
43004045	Hean hitta Galilaaya, ghwadeapta fuga Galilaaya, aba gideaba eara saawa abeeda gwanda jeeda ghwelmeeda, ak ea nidaah ng'asheega sean sin aba Yerusaleemu damandida bea ghwelmeedean.
43004046	Gabiikta gichcha mujiineeda Gaaneeda Galilaaya heeda ghayi yamwa beega ak ghoaw difaayeeda. Abeeda gwanda Gapernaumu siisi haw mideawa baleanda miyaan.
43004047	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy siidida gideaba Yeesu nuwuna ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ak anihidu Galilaaya gawa heeda ak gamus gideaba beenni ahaabwa balleandeanyu ghabwar miyeeda.
43004048	Ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Iimwoadaahi gwadeagooda ea haleanjeeda deamdeameadi ea mwajamwasa.”
43004049	Gwayeeshsha Siitta hawiin niny, “Siida mureeda, aniyean nung' eweaya heeda miighameawa jeepteanyu.”
43004050	Gwayeshsha Yeesu niny, “Una; balleandaang'u eamajeek.” Hean ghamwas Siidida ng'asheega Yeesu ak ghang'eat gawa.
43004051	Damandida duuw ghwararang'aadawaan, gwaroonnyi sea soomjoogaaschi ak geerukusa gideaba balleandaannyi eamajeek.
43004052	Ghoanyaashta niny damanda haabwa balleanda, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghabeawa sheagheeda heetta askweari nea gaba aseetta ispwa.”
43004053	Iiduw ghoapkaat ghwaan gideaba damandida rukusina Yeesu gideaba, “Balleandaang'u eamajeegiini;” hean ghamwas niny, sea fugeaba gheannyi sean.
43004054	Niih gwadeagoodeaba iyyeenya sin Yeesu gil damanda leapna ng'eanyiida Yudeeya nea gawa Galilaaya.
43005001	Ng'atta damandida ghwahidu ghwelmeeda fuga Yahuudi, nea abeeda ghwascheang'da Yeesu gawa Yerusaleemu.
43005002	Aba hoowa bea Yerusaleemu neekkeewa gidaghuutta gisilgean gwanda dabascheanda suguura aba iitta Ebraniya Betsada, nea gwandeawa dodonung'weak muut.
43005003	Gwanda jeani fuga saang'a miyeani nea gwalil, fuga ng'oowwi, ea fuga badoojiga, ea fuga abittu damealga.
43005005	Abeeda gwanda hoowa siyagi ghayi miyaan gweannyeew diktam ea damassis.
43005006	Hean daah Yeesu siitta nea gwalil aba hoowa ak ghwanal gideaba niibiida hoowa gili geaw, ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi haabwa?”
43005007	Ghwasha siitta miyaaniin nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida mureeda, aniini meandeawani siichchea ghoobuuttanaan jeeda dabaschcheanda iing'atta ging'oolda beega, iissa iyeagasayi daabitta jeeda goosheeda siinuut ghoabitta.”
43005008	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ng'eada, geanda muundaang'u ak guwi.”
43005009	Miighoaw gil ghahaap siidida ak gageanda muundaannyi ak ghang'eat gawa. Nea abeeda eaweettida ea Sabattohi.
43005010	Iiduw gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi siitta sihhabiin, “Askweareani eaweetta Sabatto gil, ak ea mammiiseey gideaba gaysareana muundaang'u.”
43005011	Ghwasha niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida ghwanyawa ahaabwan dea eshshinean, ‘Sareana muundaang'u ak guwi.'"
43005012	Geannyaash niny, “Siida eshshineey, ‘Sareana muundang'u ak guwi ng'eaha?'"
43005013	Amwanala niny siida ghwanyawa ahaap, aba gideaba Yeesu aba damandida ning'amwa hoowa aba gideaba nibassa geat hoowa emeeda.
43005014	Iiduw ghwanyasa Yeesu niny jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gwayeeshsha, “Asi daaha nihaabi! Adagudubiikta sina ring'eeda, adiiduw gabiikta ghwanyasnyi ng'asheanda muy naawa nii.”
43005015	Gawa Siidida ak gwarukusa fuga Yahuudi gideaba siida ahaabwan Yeesu gil.
43005016	Hean ghoaw gidasawassa fuga Yahuudi Yeesu, aba gideaba gwasin ng'asheanji eaweetta Sabatto.
43005017	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “ Bwaabwa gudugagadiyi eara ghamneawa, ak earaniini geagadiyi.”
43005018	Iiduw appadaydeaba ng'asheesu gagasa fuga Yahuudi naweeda jea gwanuusa; nea meakna gideaba gwanuus deaweedeeda Sabatto akghwahit, ghabwada gideaba gwayi Aseetta ghwaan gil, aba sareani hean ea niideennyi geaw sea Aseetta.
43005019	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, Balleanda mwoammu gwasin gida nea gaba geaw ghoammu gwasin gitta daah nea gwasin Ghwaaniin; aba gideaba gitta sin Ghweandean, eara Balleanda abeeda gaygwasin.
43005020	Aba gideaba Bwaabwa ghabwariiy Balleanda, ak iissa gohiimsa haleanjeessean sin niny, ak abeeda gaygohiimsa ng'asheega hees madeenachcheewana suuh, ak abeeda gajahamwa ng'eanyi.
43005021	Gawuurji gitta aduuttideayda Bwaabwa fuga meewa ak gabiikta ghoadaw eaweegean, eara Balleanda iissa ghoadaw eaweega fukka gassean.
43005022	Bwaabwa maygorgweaksa eara siida, ng'asheega sean bea girgweaksinda buuneeda niyiin geattinga Balleanda,
43005023	abeeda gwasissa buuneessean mureeda Balleanda gawuurji gidasinnisiinda mureeda Bwaabwa. Siida masissiina Balleanda mureeda masissiina mureeda Bwaabwa ghayi ajeagu niny.
43005024	“Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siida iiy ng'asheanji itteanyuun, ak ghamwas siida ghayi ajeaknean, gwandeawa eaweega manda muudeanooda; nea majergweaksa eara hay aba gideaba ninaawa miyeeda ak gawa jeeda eaweega.
43005025	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, ghwaan damanda ak ghamneawa gwanda, ak gaygabiissa ghwayiiy fuga nimeewa ghuutta Balleanda Aseetta, amaduw fukka jeagwayiing'shiin gayghwanyas eaweega.
43005026	Gawuurji gitta mideeyeatta Bwaabwa eaweega aba jeadaannyiin, gwasnu niidaw Balleanda eaweega aba jeadaannyi,
43005027	ak gabiissa ghoadaw gheambalmeeda jea gorgweaksiina buuneeda, aba gideaba niny Balleanda Siida gil.
43005028	Adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi appadaydeaba ng'asheesu; aba gideaba ghwaan damanda jea ghwayiinya buuneessean mida jeesinga bung'eadinga ghuuttaannyi
43005029	abeeda gaygwaduuttu fukghayi sina ng'asheega miyaas ak ghwanyas eaweega, ak gaygwaduuttu fukghayi sina ng'asheega munyas ak gergweaksa.”
43005030	“Aniini mwammuusi dasin gil aba gheambalmeedeanyu nea geabwageaw; aniini geargweakkiisi buuneeda aba gidayiinyi, nea girgweageedeanyu adoabiiwaat, aba gideaba meagassi dasin gideagasayi aniini geaghus dasin gidagasa siitta ghayi ajeakneaniin.
43005031	Iyeamuuwwu ng'asheegeasu, aniini abeeda muuwwunoodeanyu ea maba huumwa;
43005032	ak gwanda siinut muuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu, ak ghaanalli gideaba ng'asheega sean muuwwu appadaydeanyu gaba huumwa.
43005033	Agooga ghayi gochcheakti Yohaana, ak gamuuwwu ng'asheega huumwa.
43005034	Aniini mwaakghusi muuwwuunooda buuneeda; geargu ng'asheesu aba gideaba geagasayi anyasa lealeanooda.
43005035	Niny ghayi gheabong'nyeanda yeat ak ghoabwaay gil, amaduw ghoabwariinyi agooga weeshindaannyi gil nuwaas.
43005036	Amaduw muuwwunooda eandeawi ahaweewa dea Yohaana; aba gideaba gadiyoojiga easinnyi gea ghayi goonan Bwaabwa dasini, ak ea gadiyoojiga ghamneawa easinnyiin gil, ak gamuuwwu gideaba ghayi gojeaknean Bwaabwa.
43005037	Ak eara Bwaabwa ghayi ajeaknean gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu. Ak ea moang'ngwa ayiinya ghuuttanyi nea niny ea moang'ngwa adaaha;
43005038	nea eara ng'asheadaannyi ghanyeamanda jeesingeagwa, aba gideaba moamwasi siida ghayi ajeagu.
43005039	Agooga gosikkideawi ng'oruutka nea ghoaghayi gili aba jeannyaawa gondeawi eaweega manda mudeanooda; ak ea dea muuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu.”
43005040	“Eara agooga ghanyeamogassi apkaani hedeanyu ak ghoanyaschi eaweega.
43005041	Aniini mwaanyasi gigheambiitta aba heeda buuneeda.
43005042	Ak ghaanalli gideaba agooga manda jeesingeagwa bariinyeega Aseetta.
43005043	Aniini ghaawuni gheawunga Bwaabwa, ak ea moadeaptanaan; amawuh siinuut aba gheawungaaschi niny gajadeapta.
43005044	Abeeda gajamwastaan, siida nyasa gigheambiitta hichpa siinuut ak ea magassa gigheambiitta leabu heeda Aseetta?
43005045	Adiiduw goyeeshshi geat aniini gaydahaktaneagwa aba heeda Bwaabwa; Muusa siida jea ghoahaaktaneegwa gil, nea siida ghayi oararji.
43005046	Inyeeda ghayi ghoamwachchi Muusa ghwanyawa gajamwasaan earaniini, aba gideaba ghang'waar ng'asheega badaydeanyu.
43005047	Amaduw imoamwasi ng'asheega ghayi ng'waar, abeeda gajamwastaan ng'asheegeasu?”
43006001	Iing'atta ng'asheesu ghoaghaawa Yeesu basooda Galilaaya, was basooda Diberiya.
43006002	Ghwaat geeshta emeeda aba gideaba saawa nidaah gwadeagwajeega sissa fuga miyeani.
43006003	Hean gwading'da Yeesu gijeeda, ak gopteada sea ginealangaaschi.
43006004	Abeeda ea ninekkiit ghwelmeeda Basakka, bea fuga Yahuudi.
43006005	Ang'wearda ghwadaah emeeda nea ghapka headaannyi ak gwayeeshsha Yeesu Filippo, “Gajeashaahana yeenu mukkattajeega jea ghwaak fiisu?”
43006006	Gwarukuta ng'asheanji nea gwasim, nea ghwanal niny gichcheagwasin.
43006007	Ghwasha Filippo nea gwayeeshsha, “Dinaaraji bughalaji iyyeenya moammu ghwasha mukkattajeega deayeat eara elakkiisa fiisu gil mwanang.”
43006008	Gwayeeshsha oorjeanagi was ginealaneedaannyi suguuura Andereya bea gennyea Simon Betro,
43006009	“Gwanda hiji jeabwagi mideawa mukkattaji muut bea shayiiri ea ghweayi iyyeenya; ak gaygwarachchi naaha suuh aba fuga saang'a deenu?”
43006010	Ghwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Anung' gobitpiit buuneeda.” Abeeda gwanda hoowa nyeega saang'a; hean gobitpiit headiga nyiit sagalamnyooji muut.
43006011	Gageanu Yeesu mukkattajeekka ama ng'atta gabadiischeesa Aseetta ak gwalakkiisa fuga abitpiit; gwahindunu eara ghweayeekka, akkaba siisi siittaw gidagassiida.
43006012	Iiduw nea ning'atta agiischooda nea nilang'u buuneeda, gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Owweamni gheaptanga silach adaghwaroat eara gil.”
43006013	Hean ghoawaam banajanga mukkattajeekka bea shairiin ghwanyawa lach fuga sing'ng'attaan, ak ghoannyiit soscheew damaniyyeenya.
43006014	Daah buuneeda gwadeagooda sin gwayi, “Aba huumwa siisi sibaneeda jea ghwahidu jeeda ng'eanyiida!”
43006015	Jeeng'u gideaba geegasa eang'ng'waay eayaat aba uurda ghoaw sugoochcheanda, goheelli geaw Yeesu buuneeda ak gabiikta gichcha uhuuda gijeeda nea godeayi geaw.
43006016	Iiduw nea ghoaw shing'ada ghwararang'aada Ginealangaaschi ea gaweay ghuutta basooda,
43006017	gwading'da maleambooda ghoaghaawa basooda gaweay ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu. Gamisaniit nea Yeesu ea mighwahitta heannyaawa.
43006018	Gabalaksa basooda ak goyuuk jeammeeda ng'waan.
43006019	Hean ghamwanmwan maleambooda beatta geanu aseedeanagi, ak ghwadaah Yeesu nea ghwaan appadayda beega ak gwariiksa maleambooda ak ghabeal,
43006020	gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adoabealli, siida aniini.”
43006021	Hean gang'weela ak gagasa godiing'sa jeeda maleambooda, ama deagheatta ea nihitta maleambooda ng'eanyiida ghajaam gwachchi weay.
43006022	Iimuchchu ghwadaah fuga heetta sunung'wa gigheawda basooda meatkweeda niirjean, gideaba sunung'wa hoowa maleamboonagi, nea Yeesu gwachchi ea mading'da maleambooda sea ginealangaaschi, abeeda ginealanga gaweay nea gabwageat.
43006023	Nea abeeda ea nihidu maleambajeega leabu ng'eanyiida Diberiya ea ghwahitta heeda neekkeewa heeda aksa buuneeda mukkatte, heeda ghayi moasha Ng'uttamiida ghawooda.
43006024	Hean iiduw nea ghwadaah buuneeda gideaba Yeesu ea ginealangaaschi manda hiji, gwading'da maleambajeega gaweay ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu nea gagaseadayyi Yeesu.
43006025	Iiduw nea geanyasa gigheawda basooda meatkweeda niirja geannyaash nea geyeeshsha, “Raabi, gihidu eeju hiji?”
43006026	Ghwashsha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, mogaseadayyean, aba gideaba ghayi noadaayi gwadeagooda, gogassean aba gideaba ghayi ghoayaaji mukkatte ak golang'uuchchi.
43006027	Adiiduw godeawiichchi aba hamitta jea gabay gammudean, adeawissiina hamitta jea gwanyagu eaweega manda mudeanooda, jea gagooneegwa Balleanda Siida; aba gideaba nigeawiit goroor Aseetta was Ghwaan.”
43006028	Hean geyeeshsha, “Gajeesna naaha ijea eammuusa eesna gadiyeeda Aseetta?”
43006029	Ghwashsha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gadiyeeda Aseetta nihi, gideaba amwasa siida ajeagu niny.”
43006030	Hean gwayeeshsha Saawa, “Gisni ana gwadeagu jea eadaaha ak geamwascheay, Gaysina ana gadiya?
43006031	Ghwaanigaasa ghayi ghwaak hamitta suguura mana aba dareapcheeda aba gissung'waarda, ‘Ghoadaw mukkatteyda leabu humng'eeda ghwaak.'"
43006032	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, miih Muusa gil dea goneegwa mukkatteyda leabu humng'eeda; Bwaabwa dea gooneegwa mukkatteyda huumwa leabu humng'eeda.
43006033	Aba gideaba mukkatteyda Aseetta diitta rarang'aana humng'eedean gil ak ghoadaw ng'eanyiida eaweega.”
43006034	Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamiida, goaneasa mukkatteehean galeagasean.”
43006035	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aniini geawoschi mukkatteyda eaweega; siida wuu heedeanyu mayghwayeachchih, nea siida mwasan ea mayghwaak muwoash eara hay.
43006036	Ak geayeeshshineegwa earappeadi noadayaan moamwasaan.
43006037	Fukka sean goonan Ghweandean gayghapka hedeanyu; nea dea wuh heeeanyu ea mayghanyi dajaksa jarooda.
43006038	Aba gideaba mwararang'aanani humng'eeda doan dasin gideagasay aniini, ghaawunnyi dasin gidagasa dea ghayi ajeaknean;
43006039	nea gidagasa dea ajeaknean ea niih gil, gideaba ea meahuttani earagi aba jeeda geagoonan, geaghus deaduudu eaweeda huydean.
43006040	Aba gideaba gidagasa Bwaabwa niih gil, gideaba siida nyooh ghwadaah Balleanda ak ghamwas abeeda ghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak gaydeaduudu eaweeda huydean.”
43006041	Hean gabiissa ghoaniikgh fuga Yahuudi aba gideaba gwayi, “Aniini geawoschi mukkatteyda leabu humng'eeda.”
43006042	Gwayi Saawa, “Neada siisi ea miih Yeesuuyda was balleanda Yoseefu, anda geanalli ghwaan ea ghaamwat? Abeeda ghoammustaan gideaba gaygwayi, ‘Ghararang'aani humng'eeda?'"
43006043	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adonnikkiisi geat.
43006044	Manda siida ammu ghwaan hedeanyu iimagisna Bwaabwa ghayi ajeaknean ak abeeda geaduudu aba eaweeda huydean.
43006045	Geang'waar aba jeeda sibanga gideaba, ‘Gayghoanaal Aseetta sean. Siida wassean aleeysiit nea ghoanaal Bwaabwa, gayghwaan heedeanyu.’
43006046	Aba seareani miih gideaba gwanda siida nidaah Bwaabwa gil geaghus diitta leabu heeda Aseettean; niih siida nidaah Bwaabwa.
43006047	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siida mwas gwandeawa eaweega manda mudeanooda.
43006048	Aniini geawoschi mukkatteyda eaweega.
43006049	Ghweanigeagwa ghwaak hamitta suguura mana aba dareapcheeda ak gameewa.
43006050	Niih ea mukkatteyda rarang'aana humng'eeda, nea siida wassean iiyak ea mayghami.
43006051	Aniini geawoschi mukkatteyda eaweega rarang'aana humng'eeda; siida wassean iiyak mukkatteheani, gayghwashng'u eaweega manda mudeanooda; nea mukkatteyda jea daadaw appadayda eaweega ng'eanyiida ea sasedeanyu.”
43006052	Hean gabiissa gwasheang'nyi fuga Yahuudi nea gaba geat, nea gwayi, “Gayghoammustaan siisi gideaba gaygagoaneasa saseadaannyi ak geayaaji?”
43006053	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, imoayaagi saseeda Balleanda Siida, ak ghoaleayi foojandaannyi, ea maygwanda jeesingeagwa eaweega;
43006054	siida akk saseedeanyu nea ghwali foojeandeanyu gaygwandeawa eaweega manda mudeanooda, nea abeeda gaydeaduudu niny eaweetta huydean.
43006055	Aba gideaba saseedeanyu gichchea eayaak bea huumwa, ak eara foojeandeanyu ea gichchaeali bea huumwa.
43006056	Siida iiyak saseedeanyu ak ghwali foojeandeanyu gaygobiida jeedeanyu, nea eara aniini gaydeabiida jeadaannyi.
43006057	Gidajeakteaydanean Bwaabwa mideawa eaweega, eara aniini geandeawi eaweega appadayda Bwaabwa, gwasnu eara siida akk saseedeanyu gayghwanyas eaweega appadaydeanyu.
43006058	Asi niih mukkatteyda rarang'aana humng'eeda, mawurji sea dea akk ghweaniga ak gameewa; siida iiyak mukkatteheani gayghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.”
43006059	Gwargu ng'asheesu nea gonealshi aba jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa aba ng'eanyiida Gapernaumu.
43006060	Iing'shi gea saang'a aba jeeda ginealangaaschi gwayi, “Ng'asheesu suuh eahang'oonyi; gayghoammu ng'eaha goleeysiit?”
43006061	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu aba jeadaannyi gideaba ghoaniikgh ginealangaaschi appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheanji gwaruusseegwa?
43006062	Abeeda gaygawurjiin iyoadaayi Balleanda Siida nea ghwascheang'da gawa heeda ghayi mida bea amwadi?
43006063	Gurorooda dea eattu eaweega gil, aba gideaba saseeda manda gidammu; ng'asheesu earukuneegwean gurorooda gil ea eaweega.
43006064	Eara ghamneawa gwanda jeedeang'wa fuga mamwasa.” Ghang'eada mwadi Yeesu ghayi gwargu ng'asheesu nea gabean ghwanal gideaba geabeang'a gil fukka mwamwasaan, ak ea ng'eaha siida jea ghwala bwadaw niny.
43006065	Hean ng'atta gwayi, “Niih gidearukunegwa gideaba manda siida jea ghoammu ghwaan heedeanyu iimwanung' Bwaabwa ghwaan.”
43006066	Ng'atta gabiikta bwadaw gea saang'a aba jeedeaba ginealangaaschi ak ea mudughwaat geeshta.
43006067	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu fukka attamaniyyeenyean, “Eara agooga googasayi aweayeena?”
43006068	Ghwasha Simon Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, akajeeweaya heedeabeang'a? Ang'iing'i gindeawi ng'asheega eaweega manda mudeanooda;
43006069	aseasa sumwaschi, ak geanalli gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi dea Ghaydit bea Aseetta.”
43006070	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini miidagwalneegwa nea gowoschi damaniyyeenya, nea siyagi aba jeedeang'wa ea miih meang'nyeandeendea?”
43006071	Nea abeeda gabaloola badayda Yuuda, balleanda Simon Iskariyotte, aba gideaba niny gaba jeedeaba ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean, ak ea dea jea ghwala bwadawi.
43007001	Ng'atta ng'asheesu gwaneayeewa Yeesu jeeda ng'eanyiida Galilaaya, aba gideaba magassa gwaneayi aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Yudeeya aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi gagasa gwanuus niny.
43007002	Abeeda aba damandida ea nineekkiit ghwelmeeda fuga Yahuudi sisinna Udahabeaschajeega.
43007003	Hean ghwalamda oorjooga ghaamwat ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'amwana hiji ak guwi ng'eanyiida Yudeeya ghwadaah ginealangaagu gadiyoojiga isnayi.
43007004	Siida moammu gwasna gadiyeeda makcheameeda aba iigasa ghwadambiir gheawungaaschi aba heeda buuneeda. Asi iisni gadiyoojusu abeeda gihiimsi geaw ng'eanyiida.”
43007005	Aba gideaba eara oorjooga ghaamwat mwamwasa niny.
43007006	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Damandeanyu mighwahidu, amadukku damandeang'wa gwanda galeagassean.
43007007	Ng'eanyiida moammu ghwasteagwa, duukku aniini ghwastan aba gideaba geamuuwwu gideaba gadiyoojigaaschi eamunyas.
43007008	Aweayeena agooga jeedeaba ghwelmeetta nea goobeayi geat; aniini maydawa jeedeaba ghwelmeani, aba gideaba mighwahidu damanda doabiiw aba heedeanyu.”
43007009	Gwarukta ng'asheesu amang'atta goobiida hoowa bea Galilaayaan.
43007010	Ng'atta nea nuweay Oorjooga ghaamwat ghwelmeetta, iiduw eara niny gawa nea mwabwadakta.
43007011	Hean gagaseadayyi fuga Yahuudi aba jeedeaba ghwelmeetta nea geyeena, “Gwanda yeenu?”
43007012	Iiduw gwaheedu giniikghta aba jeeda buuneeda. Mwaatkwa iissa gwayi, “Siisi aamiy”, nea mwaatkwa gwayi, “Mannda, niny gahutteawi buuneeda.”
43007013	Eara gwasa ghanyeamanda siida badaksa ak gwarukuta ng'asheega badaydannyi aba eeshpwara aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi.
43007014	Iiduw suweay bugusta ghwelmeeda gawa Yeesu gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gonealshi.
43007015	Hean ghahamng'eanyi fuga Yahuudi nea gwayi, “Siisi ghwanyasa yeenu fughareani nea miih ghoassoamwa?”
43007016	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ng'asheega anaalli buuneeda miih geasu, gaba dea ajeaknean;
43007017	siida bwariiy gwasin gida bwariiy niny, gayghwanal ginealshooni ea gwaleabu heeda Aseetta ghana gideaba gearukku aba gheambalmeedeanyu.
43007018	Siida baloola gheambalmeadaannyi abeeda gagaseadayyi gigheambitteaba geaw, amadukku siida gasa gigheambiitta siida ghayi ajeagu gaba huumwa nea jeadaannyi ea mannda munyinda.
43007019	Ghayi Muusa magoneegwa deaweeda? Eara gwasa manda jeedeang'wa eara siyagi ang'ng'waay deaweeda. Ghwasaan inyasgoogasayyi anuusean?”
43007020	Hean ghwasha buuneeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Gindeawi meangeenda! Gagaseadayyi ng'eaha gwanuusnyi?”
43007021	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Geasinnyi gadiyeenagi, ak ghwanung' ghahameagwa ng'eanyi iyoadaayi.
43007022	Muusa ghayi gagooneegwa ghasmeahooda (Maleapna heeda Muusa, gwaleabu heeda ghweaniga), ak ghoayaachchi agooga siida ghasmeahooda eaweeda Sabatto.
43007023	Iissa isiyaat siida ghasmeahooda eaweetta Sabatto, ak abeeda ea meenuusa deaweeda Muusa, abeeda goonyareeksean aba gideaba ghaahaapchi siida eaweetta Sabattohi?
43007024	Adorgweakkiisi buuneeda aba gidoodaakti, iissa gorgweaksi aba girgweageeda doabiiw.”
43007025	Hean gwayi fuga mwaatkwa bea Yerusaleemu, “Heappi! Siitta sigasa gideaba gajenusiin miih nihi?
43007026	Ak ghamneawa gabalool aba eeshpwaara nea meerukusiina ng'ashaan! Gwadeeppa eara fuga ambaliischi eanijeeng'u gideaba siisi Gristohi?
43007027	Eaweetta jea ghwahinna Gristo manda siichchea ghwanal helleabu, dukku aseasa geanalli helleabu siisi.”
43007028	Gwargu Yeesu aba ghuutta haw aba damanda anealsheewa aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, “Ghoanallaan ak ghoanalli eara heeda ealeabu? Mwaawuni aba uhuudeanyu aniini; dea ajeaknean niny huumwa ak ea moanali niny.
43007029	Ghaanalli niny aba gideaba gealeabu headaannyi, ak gojeaknean.”
43007030	Geegaseadayyi gichchea eang'ng'wayda ak ea manda siida aheaksa geattinda ghoang'ng'waay aba gideaba miih ghwahitta damandaannyi.
43007031	Iiduw ghwamwas fuga saang'a niny; nea gwayi, “Gristo iihidu, gaygwasin gwadeagwajeega burdeawa geasin siisi?”
43007032	Ghwayiiy Farisayajeega gidameang'sheatta emeeda appadaydaannyi, hean gojeakta ashoohoodiga hees ea Farisayajeega furiischoodiga gaweay ghoang'ng'way niny.
43007033	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Gajendeayeena gheadi nuwaas, amang'atta gaydaweesa dea ajeaknean;
43007034	gajagassean ak ea mwajanyasaan, nea heechchea deabiida ea mwajoammuusa ahinni.”
43007035	Gabalool fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeenniissa geat, “Siisi gaygawa yeenu jea ea mwajeammuusa eanyasaan? Gaygawa heeda emeeda dardaawaat mida Yunaani ak ghoanaal eameani bea Yunaani ini?
43007036	Gwarukuna naaha ng'asheanji bea gideaba ‘Gajagassean ak ea mwajanyasaaniin, nea heechchea deabiida ea mwajoammuusa ahinniin?'"
43007037	Eaweetta huydean asheala ghwelmeeda eaweechcheanda haw gil, ghaminaada Yeesu ak gwargu aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, “Siida bearji muwooshta, doani heedeanyu ghwaleayda.
43007038	Siida mwasan aniini aba ginnyaashta Ng'oruutka, ‘Gayghwadalalaana jeadaannyi eeniga beega eattu eaweega manda mudeanooda aba jeeda guroroodaannyi.'"
43007039	Gwargu ng'asheesu appadayda Gurorooda, jea ghwanyas fukka jea ghamwas ninyiin; damandida Gurorooda miih ghwaan aba gideaba damandida Yeesu miyeakghambiit.
43007040	Iiduw aba jeeda buuneeda gwanda fuga ama iiy nea gwargu ng'asheesu gwayi, “Aba huumwa siida sibaneeda.”
43007041	Gwayi fuga mwaatkwa, “Siisi Gristo gil.” Nea mwaatkwa gwayi, “Gristo ghoammu gwaleabu Galilaaya?
43007042	Neada ng'oruutka ea mayi, Gristo gaygwaleabu dooshta Dawdi, ak gwaleabu Betleheemu gharang'da abiitta Dawdi?”
43007043	Hean ghwadarda buuneeda appadaydaannyi.
43007044	Gagasa fuga mwaatkwa ghoang'ng'waay niny amaduw ea manda siida aheaksa geattinda ghoang'ng'waay.
43007045	Gabikta furiischoodiga heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea Farisayajeega, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwasaan andamiyoyeanni?”
43007046	Ghwasha Furiischoodiga, “Eara heeda ghayi manda siida ammu gabaloolda gidabaloolda siisi!”
43007047	Ghwasha Farisayajeega nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Asseara agooga sirenganneegwa?
43007048	Ghoang'ng'wa adaaha earea siyagi gil aba jeeda fuga ambaliischi dea mwas ghana Farisaayu dea mwas niny?
43007049	Eameani mwanala deaweedean, sumwaashta.”
43007050	Ghwalamda siyagi aba jeannyaawa was Nikodemooda, ghayi weah headaaannyi ammwadi ak gwayeeshsha saawa,
43007051	“Neada deaweededeanya iissa gorgweaksa siida nea miih ghanyi ghwayiiy ak ghwanal gissini?”
43007052	Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Asseara ang'iing'i gileabu ng'eanyiida Galilaaya? Asi sikteawana ak gay daaha gideaba Galilaaya miih gwaleabu sibaneeda.” [
43007053	Hean gaba siisi ng'eat ak gw gheannyi.
43008001	Ng'atta gawa Yeesu uhuuda gijeeda masaytunajeega.
43008002	Iimuchchu nea ghaghar gayeew sakteayda gabiikta jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta; gaweay headaannyi buuneessean ak gopteada ak gonealshi.
43008003	Hean gweadu ng'oorshoodiga ea Farisayajeega gatmooni subwardang'eanyi nea gamealuul, geanung' ghamiinaada aba bugusta buuneeda.
43008004	Ng'atta geyeeshsha niny, “Ginealshoochcheanda, gatmoani ghwanyawa geabwardang'eanyi nea gamealuul.
43008005	Aba jeeda deaweeda gagooneasa Muusa uurda jea eefta lagheanga dea uurji niih. Giyeaniin ang'iing'i appadaydeaba gatmoani?”
43008006	Gwarukuta ng'asheanji nea simooda gil ak abeeda ghwanyas gheatta gichchea eahaaktaawa. Gageanu Yeesu ak gabuy uhuudaanyi, ak ghang'waar ng'eanyi aba monneeda.
43008007	Sinnyaash muuchchi, ghamiinaada ak gwayeeshsha, “Siida nyaah riing'a aba jeedeang'wa doawa siida madeeda jea gafta lagheaneeda.”
43008008	Ng'atta gabiikta gabuy uhuuda, ak ghang'waar ng'eanyi aba monneadaannyi.
43008009	Iiy ng'asheanji hean gabadiinnagi nea gosheeda gweargwa. Geanung'wa heeda Yeesu nea gaba geaw sea gatmootta minaada aba madeadaannyiin.
43008010	Diiw geaw Yeesu gwayeeshsha gatmootta, “Iyya, gwanda yeenu saawa? Manda eara siyagi argweakseeyi?”
43008011	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Mandana eara akkalealla, Ng'uttamiida.” Gwayeshsha Yeesu, “Abeeda eara aniini ea maydeargweakseey; una, ak ea adagudisni ring'eeda.”]
43008012	Gabiikta Yeesu gichcha gobalool saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi weeshinda ng'eanyiida; siida eadu geeshteanyu maygwaneayeewa jeeda misaneeda, niny abeeda gaygwandeawa weeshinda eaweega.”
43008013	Gwayeeshsha Farisayajeega niny, “Ang'iing'i gimuuwu ng'asheega badaydaang'u nea gubwageaw ak ghamneawa muwwunoodaang'u ea miih huumwa gil.”
43008014	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Eara damuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu nea gabwageaw, ghanalli gideaba muwwunoodeanyu huumwa, aba gideaba aniini ghaanalli heedealeabu ak ghaanalli heedeagalli. Dukku agooga ghanyea mwoanali heedealeabu ghana heedeagalli.
43008015	Agooga iissa gorgweaksiini buuneeda ng'asheega saseeda, amadukku aniini ea maydeargweaksa siida.
43008016	Ama eara deargweaksa girgweaksiindeanyu gaba huumwa aba gideaba aniini mwabwageaw geandeawi dea ajeaknean.
43008017	Aba jeeda deaweededeang'wa geang'waar gideaba muwwunoomba fiih iyyeenya huumwa;
43008018	aniini geamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu ak eara Bwaabwa ajeaknean earada gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu.”
43008019	Ak geeyeeshsha niny, “Ghwandaang'u gwanda yeenu?” Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga mwoanalaan aniini ghana Bwaabwa; aminyeetta ghwanyawa ghoanallaan aniini, ghwanyawa gajanala eara Bwaabwa.”
43008020	Ng'asheesu gwargu aba gah heeda siyiina gheaseeda aba damanda anealsheewa aba jeeda Gheeda sibatta Aseetta. Nea abeeda ghanyea manda siida aheaksa geattinda ghoang'ng'waay aba gideaba miih ghwahitta damandaannyi.
43008021	Gwayeeshsha gichcha saawa, “Aniini neawi heechcheadawa, amaduw gajagaseadayyean, ak gajameewwiisiina jeeda ring'egeagwa; nea heeda eawi aniini amwajoammuusa ahinni.”
43008022	Hean gwayi fuga Yahuudi, “Ak gaygwanuus geawi, anda gwayi heedeawi mwajoammuusa agooga apkaani?”
43008023	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga goleabu heeda hing'aada nea aniini gealeabu heettiyeada, gobeayi ng'eanyiini, aniini meabeahi ng'eanyiini.
43008024	Geayeeshshnineegwa gideaba gajameewwiisiina jeeda ring'eegeagwa, aba gideaba gajameewwiisiina jeeda ring'eegeagwa ea eeghus amwasa gideaba siida aniini.”
43008025	Geyeeshsha niny, “Ang'iing'i guwosi ng'eaha?” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ammwadi ghwanyawa nearukuneegwa.
43008026	Geandeawi ng'asheega saang'a jea dargu ea gea jea deargweaksiinaneegwa, amaduw siida ajeaknean ea huumwa, nea gearukusi ng'eanyiida ng'asheega eayiing'si headaannyi.”
43008027	Eamajeeng'na saawa gideaba Yeesu gobaloola saawa badayda Bwaabwa.
43008028	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Iyoogatkachchi Balleanda Siida, abeeda gajanala gideaba siida aniini, ea gideaba mwammuusi dasin gida wassean aba gheambalmeedeanyu geaghus dargu ng'asheega anaalan Bwaabwa.
43008029	Siida ghayi ajeaknean geandeawi niny; moang'ng'wa gwanung'usean heeda nea gabwageaw, aba gideaba iissa geasinnyi galeagasean ng'asheekka bwariiyiin.”
43008030	Damanda baloola, hean ghamwas fuga saang'a.
43008031	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu fuga Yahuudi mwas niny, “Asi iyoang'ng'waannyi ng'asheegeasu anaalleagwa, gajahuuwa ginealangeasu bea huumwa,
43008032	gajanala humeanda ak abeeda humeanda gaygagooneegwa gibaldeaba geat.”
43008033	Ghwasha Saawa niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa geewoschi jeatta Abrahaamu nea eara heeda ghayi ghanyea miyeahuuwa soomjooga sii. Abeeda ginyaashi naaha ng'asheanji bea gideaba, ‘Gajeanyasa gibaldeaba geadiin?'"
43008034	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aba huumwa aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gilinyooh ea sihih nyooh gwasna ring'eeda soomjeanda ring'eeda.
43008035	Soomjeada meabiitteena ghoah galeagasean; balleanda gobiitta ghoah galeagasean.
43008036	Balleanda igoneegwa gibaldeaba geat gajooppala geat huumwa.
43008037	Ghaanalli gideaba agooga gowoschi jeatta Abrahaamu; ak eara ghamneawa googaseadayyi gideaba gajanuusean aba gideaba manda ng'asheandeanyu jeesingeagwa.
43008038	Aniini geargu ng'asheega eadeaksi heeda Bwaabwa, nea agooga goosnayi ng'asheega rukuneegwa ghweanigeagwa.”
43008039	Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghweandeanya Abrahaamu.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Inyeeda ghwanyawa gowoschi diibiga Abrahaamu, gajasna gida ghayi sin Abrahaamu,
43008040	ak ghameawa googaseadayyi anuusean, siida rukuneegwa humeanda eayiing'si heeda Aseetta; niih miih gidasin Abrahaamu.
43008041	Agooga goosinnyi ng'asheega sin ghweanigeagwa.” Gwayeeshsha Saawa niny, “Aseasa meewosi diibiga sishuwaanda; geendeawi Bwaabwa assakkalealla, nea Aseetta.”
43008042	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Inyeetta ghwanyawa Aseetta ea Ghweandeang'wa gil, gajabwariinyaan, aba gideaba aniini gealeabu heeda Aseetta; aniini mwawuuni aba uhuudeanyu gweannean siida ajeaknean.
43008043	Ghwasaan agooga anda moanali gideargu? Niih gweagu gideaba moammuusi olleeysiina iit ng'asheandeanyu.
43008044	Agooga gobeayi ghweandeang'wa was Meang'nyeandeenda ak iissa googasayi asna gitta bwariiy ghweandeang'wean. Niny gabay gwanuusa buuneeda ghang'eada mwadi, niny iissa ea madobiiwsiina humeanda aba gideaba manda jeadaannyi humeanda. Iissa irugu ng'uyyeega gwargu aba gitta biit siratta ninyiin, aba gideaba niny gaba ng'uyya, ak ea ghweanda ng'uyyeega.
43008045	Aniini geargu huumwa ak ghoaw gidamoamwaseawanaan.
43008046	Aba jeedeang'wa gajeang'eaha gil jea gwargu gideaba geabea riing'a? Asi abeeda iyearukku huumwa abeeda ghwasaan andak ea moamwasaan?
43008047	Siida Aseetta iissa goleeysiit ng'asheega Aseetta; ak ghamneawa agooga ea molleysiini iit aba gideaba mowosi fuga Aseetta.”
43008048	Ghwasha fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha, “Neada ea meattoabiiwi rukunooda gideaba guwosi siida Samariya, ak gubwadi gideaba gindeawi meangeenda?”
43008049	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini meandeawani meangeenda; aniini iissa ghawalli gheang'da Bwaabwa, amaduukku agooga ghanyea moawwali gheang'deanyu.
43008050	Aniini meagassi daghambiit geaw; gwanda siyagi gasa nea siida laja girgweageeda.
43008051	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siida jea ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheandeanyu ea mayghwadaa miyeeda eara hay.”
43008052	Hean gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi niny, “Asi ghamneawa sinalli gideaba ang'iing'i gindeawi meangeenda. Abrahaamu ghami ak eara sibanga, ak ghamneawa giyeeni, ‘Siida ang'ng'waay ng'asheandeanyu maygwasamu miyeeda eara hay.’
43008053	Ang'iing'i guwosi haweewa Abrahaamooda was ghweandeanya meahi? Eara sibanga gameewa! Ang'iing'i gihindigeaw ng'eaha?”
43008054	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Iyaghambiichchi geaw gigheambiitteanyu ea miih gili; Bwaabwa dea aghambiidani nea dea oyeennyi Aseetteang'wa.
43008055	Agooga miih ghanyi anala niny; amaduukku aniini ghaanalli niny. Ameayeennyi mwaanali niny, abeeda gaydoaw siida ng'uyyeega urjeweegwa; aniini ghaanalli niny ak ghang'ng'waanyi ng'asheandaannyi.
43008056	Ghweandeang'wa was Abrahaamu ghayi gahoosan aba gassooda jea ghwadaah eaweetteanyu ak ghwadaah ak gang'weela.”
43008057	Hean ghwalamda fuga Yahuudi ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ang'iing'i miyannyiida gweanyew haradam ea damanamughuush ak gajanidaahi Abrahaamu?”
43008058	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, dea miih gwandeewa Abrahaamu, abeeda aniini geandi.”
43008059	Ng'atta gooliimu lagheanga nea geegasa eefta iiduw ghafuygeaw Yeesu amahit gwaritteawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
43009001	Eaweechcha ghang'atta ak ghwadaah siisi ghayi siji nea ng'oaw.
43009002	Iiduw ghoanyaash ginealangaaschi niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Raabi, gwasin ng'eaha ring'eeda, gwasin siisi ghana sin ghwaan ea ghaamwat inyas geeji nea ng'oawiini?”
43009003	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Miih gideaba nisin siisi ring'eeda gil, ghana ghwaan ea ghaamwat, geebaysiina ghwadaajiit gadiyoojiga Aseetta aba niny.
43009004	Gammiissa eesna gadiyoojiga siida ajeaknean, iiduw ea askweari; ghwahidu eaweeda, ak ea mayghoammu siida gagadiiy.
43009005	Hiji duu dandeewa jeeda ng'eanyiidean, aniini geawoschi weeshinda ng'eanyiida.”
43009006	Ahiit baloaldaannyi gwasin sheang'ng'weeda aba ng'usheega ak ghwayeashsha gheanyangeaba siitta ng'oawiin,
43009007	ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Una ak gihuuni gheanyangaagu aba jeeda dabascheanda Siloamu” (nea gideaba dea sichcheakta). Ng'atta gawa Siitta gihuushshi ama ng'atta gabiigu nea ning'wearda.
43009008	Gwayi fuga ascheayi sea fuga eajusu nidaaha siitta ammwadi nea gamusisachchiin, gwayi, “Neada siisi ea miih siitta apteadayyi nea gamusiisachchinii?”
43009009	Gwayi mwaatkwa, “Ninyi;” nea mwaatkwaa gwayi, “Manda, geaghus gideaba gawurji sea niny.” Gwayeeshsha, “Siida aniini gil.”
43009010	Geyeeshsha, “Ghwajaadattaan gheanyangaagu?”
43009011	Ghwasha Niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwasin siitta suguura Yeesuhiin sheang'ng'weada ak ghwayeashsha gheanyangeasu amahit gwayeeshshinean, ‘Una akkihuushshi aba Siloamu;’ ng'atta geawi ak geahuunnyi gheanyangeasu amahit ghangweardi.”
43009012	Geyeeshsha, “Niny ghamneawa gwanda yeenu?” Hean gwayeeshsha siidida, “Aniini mwaanali.”
43009013	Ng'atta geayaat siitta ghayi ng'oawiin heeda Farisayajeega.
43009014	Nea abeeda eaweechcheandida sina Yeesu sheang'ng'weada ak ghwayeasha gheanyanga siida ak ghwajadaan ea eaweeda Sabattohi.
43009015	Hean ghoanyaash Farisayajeega gichcha siitta ginnyasta ging'weerdeayda? Ghwalamda niny ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghwayeasha gheanyangeasu sheang'ng'weada amanga'atta geahuunnyi ak ghang'weardi.”
43009016	Gwayi Farisayajeega mwaatkwa, “Siisi maleapna heeda Aseetta aba gideaba moang'ng'waanya Sabatto.” Nea mwaatkwa gwayi, “Gayghoammuustaan siida ring'eeda gwasin gwadeagooda sunu? Hean ghwadarda buuneeda.”
43009017	Gebiikta gichcha eennyaash siitta ng'oawiin, “Asi ghamneawa siisi inijaat gheanyangaagu giyeaniin ang'iing'i appadaydeaba siisi?” Gwayeeshsha, “Siisi sibaneeda gil.”
43009018	Amwamwasa fuga Yahuudi gideaba siitta ghayi ang'oaw ak ghamneawa aning'wearda, ea eeyibwak ea gaguursa ghwaan ea ghaamwat.
43009019	Hean geannyaash ghwaan nea geyeeshsha, “Niih balleandeang'wa oyeennyi ghayi geeji nea ng'oawi? Ak ghamneawa ghwanyastaan ging'weerdeayda?”
43009020	Ghwasha Ghwaan ea ghaamwat ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa geanalli gideaba niih balleandeanya gil, ea gideaba geeji nea ng'oaw;
43009021	ak ginnyasta ging'weerdeayda aseasa ameanali, ak geabwadi niih eara siitta jaat gheanyangaaschiin ameanali. Oannyaasha niny aba gideaba siinniheedu gil ghoammu gwargu niny.”
43009022	Gwarukuteaydunu ghwaan ea ghaamwat aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi nihelleesa gideaba siida wassean jea gwargu aba ghuuttaannyi gideaba Yeesu niny Gristohi gajerrutteawa jeeda ghoriida sinnealshachcheewa.
43009023	Ak ghoaw gidarukuteawa ghwaan ea ghaamwat gideaba, “Niny siinniheedu gil oannyaasha.”
43009024	Gabiikta deaba iyyeenya gaguursa siitta ghayi ng'oawiin ak gwayeeshsha, “Duumshesiina Aseetta; aseasa geanalli gideaba siisi gaba riing'a.”
43009025	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Siisi ibea riing'a aniini amwaanali, ak ghanalli aniini ng'ashaanjagi nea gideaba ghayi geawoschi ng'oaw ak ghamneawa anang'weardi.”
43009026	Geyeeshsha niny, “Gwahindaneayiin? Ghwajaattaan gheanyangaagu?”
43009027	Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Nigeawiit darukuneegwa ak ea molleysiini iit, ghwasaan anda googasayi ayiinya gichcha? Eara agooga googasayi ahuuwa ginealangaaschi?”
43009028	Geng'ng'eawi nea geyeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i guwosi ginealaneadaannyi ak aseasa gewoschi ginealanga Muusa.
43009029	Aseasa geanalli gideaba Aseetta ghayi gobalool Muusa amaduukku siisi ghanyea meanali eara helleabu.”
43009030	Ghwasha Siidida, “Ng'asheanji ghwanung' ghaham fiih ng'eanyi! Agooga mwoanali helleabu ak anijaat gheanyangeasu.
43009031	Geanalli gideaba Aseetta mooleysiina iit fuga ring'eega, nea siida iidea gadoowani Aseetta nea gwasin gitta bwariiy ninyiin, gagoleeysiit Aseetta.
43009032	Ghang'eada dea subwada ng'eanyiida miyeanyiinya siida jaat gheanyanga siida ghayi siji nea ng'oaw.
43009033	Siisi imaleapna heeda Aseetta ea mayghoammu gwasin eara gil.”
43009034	Ghwasha Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i gejiilseey jeerring'eeda haw ak gajanaleasa?” Hean gerrutta jarooda.
43009035	Ghwayiiy Yeesu gideaba sirruutta jarooda niny, hean iiduw nea ghwadaah gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i gumwasi Balleanda Siida?”
43009036	Ghwasha ak gwayeeshsha, “Siida Mureeda, ng'eaha gil, ak abeeda gaydamwas niny?”
43009037	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Nidaahi niny, ak ea siisi abaloolnyiini.”
43009038	Hean gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, Namwaschi;” ak ghaghadoawan niny.
43009039	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Aniini ghaawunnyi badayda ng'eanyiida aba girgweaksiinda ak abeeda fuga mwoang'wearda gayghoang'wearda nea gang'oowiidi fuga ghamneawa ang'wearda.”
43009040	Gwayiing'shi fuga mwaatkwa bea Farisayajeega ghwanyawa neekki ng'asheekka ak ghoanyaash gideaba, “Earaseasa gewoschi ng'oowwi?”
43009041	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ghwanyawa iyowoschi ng'oowwi ea majandeawana gidinyeanda, ak ghamneawa goyeennyi agooga, ‘Aseasa geang'ng'weardi,’ abeeda gidinyeannyeekkeagwa gudugwanda heeda.”
43010001	“Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siida wassean maska gidaghuut ak gawa jeeda gheeda gisilga amaduw ghamwaasta ak ghwala nawa nuut, siisi mareanghweanda gil nea goreedi fiih haleanjeeda;
43010002	duukku siida weah jeeda gheeda nea gwasik gidaghuut, siisi haghweadoochcheanda gisilga.
43010003	Iissa gwajeassa furiischochcheanda gidaghuut; ak iissa ghwayiiy gisilga ghuuttaannyi, ak iissa gaguursa gisilgaaschi nea gaba niigursiina ghawungaaschi ak goruutta jarooda.
43010004	Ing'atta girutteayda hean goshedeawa ak ghwaat geeshta gisilga aba gideaba ghwanal ghuuttaannyi;
43010005	Mayghwaat geeshta rabascheanda gaygamng'aw aba gideaba mwanala ghuusiga rabasta.”
43010006	Yeesu gwarukuta ng'asheesu awaaghaniin, amaduw eamajeeng'na saawa gitta rukusean.
43010007	Gabiikta Yeesu gichcha ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, aniini geawoschi gidaghuutta gisilga.
43010008	Fuga suurja sean ghayi ashooynanean mareanghooga gil ea fuga areedi fiih haleanjeeda; ak ea mealeeysiniit gisilga.
43010009	Aniini geawoschi gidaghuut, siida iiweah gah nea gwasku heedeanyu gajeelealu, gaygawa gah nea gwardu ak abeeda gayghwanyas haghweeda.
43010010	Mareanghweanda iissa ghwaan gwajawadiischi nea gwanuus nea ghwadattas; aniini ghaawunnyi ghwanyasa eaweega ea ghwanaawda.
43010011	Aniini geawoschi haghweadoochcheanda miy. Haghweadoochcheanda miy iissa ghoaghaashta aweagaaschi appadayda gisilga.”
43010012	“Siida sittaw gidageattinda mawosa haghweadoochcheanda bissa gisilga ea miih gaaschi, idaah suyeanda nea ghwaan, gwanung'usa heeda gisilga ak gamng'aw; ak ghoang'ng'waay suyeanda ak ghoadarda.
43010013	Niny gamng'aw aba gideaba maduuppa ng'asheega gisilga aba gideaba niny siida mushaahara gil.
43010014	Aniini geawoschi haghweadoochcheanda miy; aniini ghaanalli geasu ak eara geasu ghwanalan,
43010015	gidanaldanaan Bwaabwa, ghaanalli Bwaabwa; aniini ghaghaashti eaweegeasu appadahuukka gisilga.
43010016	Geabiissi dandeawa gisil suuk manda seammoodeaba gheawi; asi eara suuh gammiisa gideaba gaydaghuumu, ak gayghwayiiy ghuutteanyu. Ak abeeda ghoaw hawannyeanda agi, ak haghweadoochcheanda gajaagi.
43010017	Aba sareani Bwaabwa ghabwariinyan, aba gideaba ghaghaashti eaweegeasu, ak geabiikti dageanu gichcha.
43010018	Manda siida geandeawanean, ghaghaashti aniini aba uhuudeanyu nea gabwageaw. Geandeawi uurda jea daghashtaawa ak geandeawi uurda jea dabiikta dageanna; niih gidaghayi adeaganean Bwaabwa sinooda.”
43010019	Hean gabiikta gichcha ghwadarda fuga Yahuudi appadaydeaba ng'asheesu.
43010020	Gwayi fuga saang'a aba jeanyaawa, “Siisi gabearji meangeenda, ak ghabwada niih gaba geas; ghwasaan anda golleysiit?”
43010021	Gwayi mwaatkwa, “Ng'asheega sunu maba siida bearji meangeeda. Neada meangeeda ghoammu ghwajaat gheanyanga siida ng'oowi?”
43010022	Abeeda aba hoowa bea Yerusaleemuun gwanda ghweelmeeda sumwanya gheeda sibatta Aseetta;
43010023	nea abeeda damandida ea damanda gorogeeda, nea eara Yeesu abeeda gwaneayeewa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta heeda was dodooda Sulemaani.
43010024	Hean gwaneaweesa fuga Yahuudi ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaynung'waada eppiidana jeeda hirbabandeeda ea ghoaw eeju? Iwosi Gristo nea huumwa gil girukuneasa nea gidajiidi.”
43010025	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Nigeawiit darukuneegwa ak ea mwoamwasi. Gadiyoojiga easinnyi aba gheawunga Bwaabwa gamuuwwunean aniini;
43010026	iiduw ea moamwasi agooga aba gideaba mowosi gisilgeasu.
43010027	Gisilgeasu ghwayiiy ghuutteanyu ak ghaanalli saawa ak gweadu geeshteanyu;
43010028	aniini iissa ghaadawji eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak eara saawa ghanyea maygwarooda eara hay eaghoaw eaweega manda mudeanooda, nea ghanyea manda siida ammu gageandeawa geattindeanyu.
43010029	Bwaabeedeanyu, goonan ahaweawa sean, ak ghanyea manda siida ammu gageanda saawa aba geattinga Bwaabwa.
43010030	Aniini sea Bwaabwa gewoschi gilagi.”
43010031	Hean gageanu fuga Yahuudi lagheanga nea gajeefta.
43010032	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini naahimneegwa gadiyoojiga saang'a miyaas leabu heeda Bwaabwa; abeeda ea anneeda gil aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu jea ghwanung' aftean aba lagheangean?”
43010033	Ghwasha fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Majeefteey aba gadiyoojiga miyaas isnayi, gaygweagu ng'asheagagu munyas irukusi Aseetta; aba gideaba gisni geaw Aseetta nea guwosi siida.”
43010034	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Miyeang'waari aba jeeda deaweededeang'wa gideaba, ‘Geayeennyi gowoschi aseechcheekka?’
43010035	Abeeda iiguura aseechcheekka fukka ghayi hinna ng'asheanda Aseettean (nea ng'oruutka ea mayghwayamwa),
43010036	goobalooli siitta ghayi ammiidu Bwaabwa ak gojeagu ghwaan badayda ng'eanyiidean ak goyeeshshi, ‘Girukuni badayda Aseetta ng'asheega munyas,’ aba gideaba geayeennyi, ‘Aniini geawoschi Balleanda Aseetta?’
43010037	Abeeda imeasni gadiyoojiga Bwaabwa, ea adoamwaschaan;
43010038	ama easinnyi earappeadi moamwasaan ghang'wana ghoamwaschi gadiyoojiga ak abeeda gojeeng'u nea ghoanalli gideaba Bwaabwa gwanda jeedeanyu nea geandi aniini jeada Bwaabwa.”
43010039	Gabiikta Saawa gagasa ghoang'ng'waay amaduw gamul aba geattinga nyaawa.
43010040	Gabiikta Yeesu gawa gigheawda Yordaan heeda ghayi abattisanniisa Yohaana buuneeda ammwadi ak gobiida hoowa.
43010041	Gaweayi fuga saang'a headaannyi ak geyeeshsha, “Yohaana miigwasin gwadeagooda, duukku ng'asheega sean ghayi rugu appadaydeaba siisi ahuumwa gil.”
43010042	Iiduw ghamwas fuga saang'a mida hoowa.
43011001	Ghayi gwanda siisi miyaan suguura Lasaaro bea ng'eanyiida Bettaniya, nea gharang'da geaba Mariya gil ea huda ghaamwat suguura Marta.
43011002	Mariyaheani diitta ghayi easha Ng'uttamiida nagheeda ng'andit ama ng'atta gobuus geeshanga aba budeagaaschiin gil, nea abeeda ghamnyaan oorjeeda ghaamwat suguura Lasaaro.
43011003	Hean gojeaksa haweega ghaamwat nea geyeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, siida ibwariinyi ghamnyaan.”
43011004	Iiy Yeesu ng'asheanji gwayeeshsha, “Geeyoani maygweadu miyeeda, gaba gigheambiitta Aseetta, miyeanji geebaysiina gideaba abeeda gajeakghambiit Balleanda Aseetta.”
43011005	Yeesu abeeda ghabwariiy Marta ea huda ghaamwat ea Lasaaro.
43011006	Iiduw nea ghwanyas Yessu iitta gideaba ghamnyaan, gopteada aba hoowa ea ghang'atta eawoji iyyeenya.
43011007	Iimuchchu nea ghang'atta ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha ginealangaaschi, “Aniyean ebiikta eeweaya Yudeeya.”
43011008	Hean ghoanyaash Ginealanga nea geyeeshsha, “Raabi, migageawiit damanda gasseewa fuga Yahuudi gaftaneey lagheanga ak ghamneawa gigasayi biikta gichcha hoowa?”
43011009	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi robuutka aseetta aba jeedaskwearda miih damaniyyeenya? Asi siida iweelweel askweari ea mwoammu ghwalas geeshta gil aba gideaba ghwadaah weeshinnda ng'eanyiida.
43011010	Duukku siida iweelweel eawa ghoammu ghwalas geeshshta gil aba gideaba manda jeadaannyi weeshinda.”
43011011	Iiduw nea ghoahiit Yeesu rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha saawa, “Siida siduupcheewi was Lasaaro nilil, ak gaydawa daheat.”
43011012	Ghwalamda Ginealanga ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida ibeachchi ruweanga, gayghahaap.”
43011013	Nea Yeesu gabaloola iitta miyeadaannyi, ak ghaghay saawa gili baloola iitta ruweanga.
43011014	Hean gwarukusa Yeesu nea ghoadajiit, “Lasaaro nimi;
43011015	ak ghamneawa geahosannyi appadahukkeagwa ak anighaas heetta ea meandani hoowa ak abeeda ghoamwaschi. Asi eweaya headannyi.”
43011016	Gwayeeshsha Domasooyda suguura Saleaygweanda ginealanga suurja, “Apkaani eweaya ak geemeewuudayeewi niny.”
43011017	Eaweeda hittaawa Yeesu hoowa abeeda Lasaaro nibiida jeessigeeda eawooji ang'wan.
43011018	Abeeda Bettaniya eaneekkeewa Yerusaleemu maygwaduulu aseadeanagi hitteayda.
43011019	Nea abeeda anupka fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi heeda Marta ea Mariya egeandeawa salgheang'da aba miyeeda oorjeeda ghaamwat.
43011020	Hean iiy Marta gideaba ghwaan Yeesu gawa roonnyeeda nea Mariya geanung'wa ghoah.
43011021	Gwayeeshsha Marta Yeesu, “Ng'uttamiida inyeeda heetta gindi hiji ghwanyawa oorjeeda giyeanya gajea miighami.
43011022	Eara ghamneawa ghaanalli gideaba iimusi Aseetta gidawassean gaygagoonnyi.”
43011023	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Oorjeeda geamadu gaygwaduudu gichcha.”
43011024	Gwayeeshsha Marta niny, “Ghaanalli gideaba gaygwaduudu gichcha eaweetta jea gwaduttuuna buuneeda eaweeda huydean.”
43011025	Ghwalamda Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Aniini geawoschi dunnooda ea eaweega; siida iimwasan eara ghami gajeamajeek,
43011026	nea siida majeek ak ghamwasan ea mayghami earahay. Ghamneawa gumwasi ng'asheanji?”
43011027	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Huumwa gil Ng'uttamiida; aniini ghamwaaschi gideaba ang'iing'i guwosi Gristo, Balleanda Aseetta, jea ghwahidu jeeda ng'eanyiida.”
43011028	Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheanji, gawa ak gaguursa huda ghaamwat suguura Mariya, ak gameang'sheesha nea gwayeeshsha, “Nukkwa Ginealshoochcheanda gwanda hiji nea gaguuru.”
43011029	Iiy ng'asheanji gotkweal ak gawa headaannyi.
43011030	Abeeda Yeesu miih ghwahidu gharang'dida, gudugwanda heeda ghwanyawa depteaysa Marta.
43011031	Hean daah fuga Yahuudi ghwanyawa mideayi aba jeeda gheeda nea gageanda salgheang'da, gidang'eatta ak gidalamwaajaadayda Mariya nea gwaritta jarooda, ghwaat geeshta, nea ghaghay gili wea heeda bung'eeda goyyeawda.
43011032	Hitta Mariya heeda mida Yeesu ghwadaah ak gwatkuy aba madeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, heetta inyeeda gindi hiji orjeediyya gajea miih ghami.”
43011033	Daah Yeesu gidayyeawudeayda nea eara fuga Yahuudi ghwanyawa adeana earaga goyyeawda ghang'ut giseaneega nea gwasawana guroroodaannyi;
43011034	ng'atta gwayeeshsha, “Ghoayiinnyi yeenu siida?” Geyeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamiida benni daaha.”
43011035	Goyyeawda Yeesu.
43011036	Hean gwayi fuga Yahuudi, “Adaaha gidabwariiyda!”
43011037	Amaduw gwayi mwaatkwa aba jeannyaawa, “Assiisi ghayi jaat gheanyanga siida ng'oawiin ghwaraay ghwanung' amwami siisi?”
43011038	Iiduw nea nigiisan Yeesu aba jeadannyi ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda; abeeda bung'eeni gwaleeda nea gedukutteawa lagheaneeda.
43011039	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ageanda lagheaneeda.” Ghwasha Martaayda was huda gheamatta siida heetta meahiin ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Ng'uttamiida, gajeanimealu aba gideaba niih eaweedeaba ang'wani aba miyeeda.”
43011040	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Heappi midarukuneeyi gideaba iimwasi gaydaaha gigheambiitta Aseetta?”
43011041	Hean gegeanda lagheaneetta. Ng'atta gong'weersa Yeesu humng'eeda ak gwayi, “Geabadischoweey Bwaabwa aba gideaba iissa giyiinyi gideargu.
43011042	Ghaanalli gideaba iissa gileysean iit galeagasean. Ak ghamneawa gearukuni ng'asheanji badahukkeaba fiisu minaada aba hijiin, ak abeeda gayghamwas gideaba gijeaknean.”
43011043	Ng'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gaguurda aba ghuutta haw, “Lasaaro! Rinni jarooda.”
43011044	Gwardu jarooda siitta heetta meahiin, nea radaat geeshanga ea geattinga aba weageakka nea gheamamdaannyi ea sudukutta aba hang'da. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ottina, ak ghoanung'waadi gawa.”
43011045	Hean iiduw fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi heetta hidu heeda Mariya idaah gitta siniin, ghamwas niny;
43011046	gaweay fuga mwaatkwa heeda Farisayajeega ak ghoadayda iitta ng'asheanda sin Yeesu.
43011047	Gwasin Ashoohoodiga hees sea Farisayajeega girgweageeda nea gwayi, “Gajeesna naaha? Anda siisi iissa gwasin gwadeagwajeega saang'a muuchchi.”
43011048	“Gajiiduw isunung'waadi gwasnu gayghamwas buuneessean, ak gayghapka fuga Ruumi gwanyarja horgeedeanya ghaydit ea emedeanya.”
43011049	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha siyagi suguura Gayafa was ashoohoochcheanda haw gweaydida, “Agooga moanali gil;
43011050	agooga moanaali gideaba ghang'wana ghami siyagi aba jeedeang'wa appadahuukka buuneeda, mwasamwa gideaba gajealas uhuuda eameassean.”
43011051	Siisi marukunana uhuudannyi ng'asheesu, gwarukuna gideaba niny ashoohochcheanda haw gil aba gweaydida, niny gwaramoorssa gideaba Yeesu gayghami appadayda eameeda,
43011052	ak ea miih badaydeaba eameani gil akghwahit, ghabwada gideaba gagasa gonyeaschi diibiga Aseetta nigeawiit ghwadarda ak ghoaw gilagi.
43011053	Ghang'eada eaweedida gagasa gheatta gichchea gwanuusta.
43011054	Hean eamudu gwaneayeewa Yeesu bugusta fuga Yahuudi nea ghabwadakta, ghabeawa hoowa ak gawa ng'eanyiida neekkeewa dareapchcheenda jeeda mujiineeda suguura Efraimu; ak gobiida hoowa sea ginealangaaschi.
43011055	Abeeda ea ninekkiit basakkeeda fuga Yahuudi, gaweay fuga saang'a beawa daroorakka ak gaweay Yerusaleemu ghoammiidu geat nea miih ghwahidu basakka.
43011056	Hean iissa geegasa Yeesu. Ak ghabwat geat aba gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gonyeari geat gideaba, “Gawurjiin? Mayghwaan jeedeaba ghwelmeeni?”
43011057	Abeeda ea niidayda Ashoohoodiga hees ea Farisayajeega iitta gideaba siida deeppa ghwanal heeda mida Yeesu ea darukusiina ak abeeda geang'ng'waay.
43012001	Iimuchchu nea ghwashoada eawooji lah aba hitteayda ghwelmeeda basakka, ghwahitta Yeesu Bettaniya heeda ghayi abiitta Lasaarooyda aduuna Yeesu miyeedean.
43012002	Hean gesissa hamitteaba shing'ada; hean gagadiyeesa Marta nea Lasaaro abeeda gaba jeeda fuga ambuuchchi sea niny.
43012003	Ng'atta gageanu Mariya nagheeda ng'andit suguura nardo mida gideeshteayda sikkuuyi bureetta bissa gaba sheayeeda haw, ak ghwayeasha geeshanga Yeesu ak gobuusa budeegaaschi; gang'andiit gheassean aba shearooda nagheeda.
43012004	Gwayeeshsha Yuudayda Iskariyotte bea jeeda ginealangaaschi (was dea jaghwalabwadaw niny),
43012005	“Ghwasaan anda ghwanyawa nagheani meashaydawana dinaaraji bughalaji samwagu ak gelakkisa fuga barbari?”
43012006	Mwanyashtunu appeadi samsa fuga barbari, gweagu gideaba niny mareanghweanda, eawoojusu iissa godiiwi sandakkooda lappiya nea iissa eawoojusu gwajagwadi lappiyeeda mida jeeda.
43012007	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Anung'waada gwandeawa, ghoamuughu eaweeda jea epnyanean.
43012008	Aba gideaba fuga barbari gajandeawana galeagasean, dukku aniini ea majeendeayeena galeagasean.”
43012009	Nal emeetuw bea Yahuudi gideaba gwanda hoowa, ghapka nea mwaada gideaba gagasa ghwadaah Yeesu, gagasa ghwadaah eara Lasaaroyda heetta sittuunna miyeeda.
43012010	Hean ghamwaal Ashohoodiga hees gichchea enuusta eara Lasaaro.
43012011	Nea gweagu gideaba appadaydaannyi goheelli geat fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi ak ghamwas Yeesu.
43012012	Muchchu ghwayiiy emeetuw buwa ghwelmeeda gideaba Yeesu gwanda naweeda ghwaan Yerusaleemu.
43012013	Hean gwahirjeawu damealga miilayga ak gaweay ronnyeeda nea gojuur muuchchi nea gwayi, “Hoosaana! Sing'usha siisi wuna gheawunga Ng'uttamiidean, eara sugoochcheanda Israeeli!”
43012014	Ghwanyas Yeesu gureenda ak gwading'da badayda gawurji gissung'waarda.
43012015	“Adibeali hudeaba Sayuuni; ang'wearda sugoochchandaang'u ghwaan, nea gwading'da gureenda digeeda!”
43012016	Abeeda ginealangaaschi ea miigwajeeng'u ng'asheesu ammwadi; iiduw nea sikghambiit Yeesu, hean ghoapkaat gideaba ng'asheesu geang'waar appadaydaannyi ea gideaba sisissa buuneeda ng'asheesu.
43012017	Hean gamuuwwu emeeda heetta mideay sea niny eaweetta gursiina Lasaaro gwarinna jeeda bung'eeda ak goduudu.
43012018	Iiduw ghoaw gitteaptaawa emeeda aba gideaba nisin gwadeagoani.
43012019	Ng'atta gaba Farisayajeanji eeshsha niirja, moadaahi gideaba moammuusi asna gil; oang'ng'wearda, ghwaat geeshta ng'eanyiida.
43012020	Nea aba jeeda fuga weay ghadooweeda eaweeda ghweelmeeda gwanda fuga mwaatkwa bea Yunaani.
43012021	Gaweay fiisu heeda Filippoyda leabu Betsaydeeda Galilaaya ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Siida mureeda, geegasayi eadaaha Yeesu.”
43012022	Gawa Filippo ak gwarukusa Andereya; ak godeayi Andereya sea Filippo ak gwarukusa Yeesu.
43012023	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Niiitta damanda jea ekghambiida Balleanda Siida.
43012024	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gheang'nyeanda ngano iissa gobiida damwanagi ea eaghus gobissa jeessigeeda ak ghami. Iing'atta miyeeda gwaji haghweega saang'a.
43012025	Siida bwariiy eaweagaaschi gaygwalakku, nea siida sit eaweagaaschi appadaydeaba ng'eanyiin gayghoaghu ea gagul eaweega manda mudeanooda.
43012026	Siida jea gwasinnean gadiyeeda geaghus gweadu geeshtteanyu; ak abeeda heeda eandi aniini eara soomjeadeanyu gaygwanda eara niny; siida jea gwasinnean gadiyeeda abeeda gaygwasissa Bwaabwa mureeda.
43012027	“Ghamneawa guroroodeanyu nung'ut muuwda. Ak gaydayiin? ‘Bwaabwa, lealnean aba damani?’ Manda, appadaydeaba ng'asheanji naahidu damani.
43012028	Bwaabwa aghambiida ghawungaagu.” Deagheatta ghwanya ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Naghambiichchi, ak gaydabiikta daghambiit.”
43012029	Ghwayiiy emeeda ghwanyawa minaada aba hoowa ghuuttida ak gwayi mwaatkwa, ghoaghweandan humng'eeda. Nea gwayi mwaatkwa, “Gobalool malaykajeanda.”
43012030	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghuudi oayinyiin mwanya appadaydeanyu aniini, ghwanya appadahukkeagwa.
43012031	Damani nihitta heeda jea ergweaksiina ng'eanyiini, nihitta damanda jea ejakteawa siida ahaaghwa ng'eanyiini.
43012032	Nea aniini isitting'danean humng'eeda daheelli ng'eanyiida, gaydaksu buneessean ghapka heedeanyu.”
43012033	Aba rukunoodeaba ng'asheanji ghoahiimu miyeechchaghami gidurji.
43012034	Hean ghwash Emeeda ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa gwarukuneasa deaweeda gideaba Gristo gayghwashng'u eaweega manda mudeanooda. Abeeda ghoammustiin gideaba gajayeena Balleanda siida gajeettiing'da humng'eeda? Balleanji bea siidean ng'eaha?”
