43012035	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Gudandeawana weeshinda gheadi nuwaas. Aneayeena hijiduandeawana weeshindean amwajooreagwa misaneeda; siida neayeewa jeeda misaneeda mwanala eara heeda gal.
43012036	Asi hijiduandeawana weeshindean amwasa weeshinda, ak ghoahuuyi diibiga weeshinda.” Ing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu ghang'eat Yeesu goheelli geaw ak gawa ghafnya geaw saawa.
43012037	Earappeadi nisin gwadeagwajeega saang'a aba madeanyaawan, saawa ghanyea meamwasa niny;
43012038	ak gwasa ng'asheega rugu sibaneeda suguura Isaaya nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida siida mwas ng'asheagaasa ng'eaha? Ak ea sihhiimsa ng'eaha geattinda Ng'uttamiida?”
43012039	Aba sareani ea mudughoammu ghamwas. Aba gideaba Isaaya gabiikta gichcha gwayi;
43012040	“Ninung' gang'owiidi gheanyanga nyaawa, nea gahang'onyiidi jeesinga nyaawa, ada ghwadaah aba gheanyanga nyaawa, nea gwajeeng'u aba jeesinga nyaawa, ak gwayamu geat ak ghahaapchi.”
43012041	Isaaya gwargu ng'asheesu aba gideaba nidaah gigheambiittaannyi, ak ghoaw girrukuna iittaannyi.
43012042	Gwanda fuga saang'a earaba jeeda gea ambaliischi mwas niny, iiduw aba gheawalmeeda Farisayajeega ea marukunana ghuusiga nyaawa aba gideaba gajiiduw geerrutteawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa.
43012043	Aba gideaba ghabwariiy dumshesiinda buuneeda moasaamwa gideaba gaygwadumsheesa Aseetta.
43012044	Ng'atta gabalool Yeesu aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, “Siida mwasan aniini mwamwasan nea gabwageaw, ghamwas dea ajeaknean.
43012045	Siida nidaahan aniini abeeda nidaah dea ajeaknean.
43012046	Aniini ghaawunnyi nea geawoschi weeshinda ng'eanyiida, ak abeeda siida mwasan ea meabiidana jeeda misaneeda.
43012047	Siida iiy ng'asheegeasu ak ea mwoang'ng'waanya, aniini maydeargweaksa; aba gideaba mwaawuni deargweaksa ng'eanyiida ghawunnyi dalealu ng'eanyiida.
43012048	Siida jaktanean nea mwoang'ng'waanya ng'asheegeasu gwandeawa dea jea gorgweaksa; ng'asheandida earuguun deajea gorgweaksa gil eaweeda huydean.
43012049	Aniini meabalooli aba gheambalmeedeanyu; aniini geaghus gearugu Bwaabwa ajeaknean dea goonan digheanda gil ea gichchea dabaloola.
43012050	Ak ghaanalli gideaba digheandannyi eaweega manda mudeanooda. Asi aniini geargu ng'asheega eshshean Bwaabwa rukuta.”
43013001	Hean nea miih ghwahidu ghwelmeeda basakka nea ninal Yeesu gideaba damandaannyi jea ghabeawa ng'eanyiida gawa heeda Bwaabwa nihidu, niny nea ghabwariiy fugaaschi mida jeeda ng'eanyiida, ahuumwa gil ghabwariiy ea ghwanaawda.
43013002	Damanda agiischooda bea shing'ada, nea abeeda ea niyiin meang'nyeandeenda jeeda Yuudaayda Iskariyotte, was balleanda Simon gichchea ghwalaapta bwadaw niny,
43013003	abeeda Yeesu ghwanal gideaba niyiin Bwaabwa geattingaaschi halaneassean, ea gideaba niny gwaleabu heeda Aseetta ak gaygabiikta heeda Aseetta,
43013004	hean ghang'eat aba heeda agiischeewa, ak ghaghatghat hang'wakkaaschi ak gageanu hang'da mwanang' ak gwaradiischeewa.
43013005	Ng'atta gageanu harakta ak ghwayiin beega, ak gohuun geeshanga ginealanga, ak gobuus aba hang'dida mwanang' radischewean.
43013006	Iiduw ghwahitta heeda Simon Betro; amahit gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Ng'uttamiida gajahuuna geeshangeasu?”
43013007	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i minali gideasinnyi ghamneawa ak gaynala iiduw.”
43013008	Gwayeeshsha Betro, “Ang'iing'i majahuuna geeshangeasu earahay.” Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha niny, “Iimeahuuni geeshangaagu ea meguyeeni.”
43013009	Hean gwayeeshsha Simon Betro, “Ng'uttamiida, adabeeda ea miih geeshangeasu gil akghwahit, eara geattingeasu ea uhuudeanyu!”
43013010	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Siida inihuushshi ea manda gichchea gohuun geaghus geeshangaaschi, aba gideaba nimmiidu saseessean; agooga gowoschi miyaas, ak ea miih oagaseani.”
43013011	Abeeda niny ghwanal siida jea ghwala bwadaw; ak ghoaw girrukuna gideaba, “Agooga mowosi miyaas oagasean.”
43013012	Ng'atta nea Niihiit gihuunda geeshanga, nea nibiikta gookwa hang'weakkaaschi, gabiikta gobideada aba heeda gwachchi, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Noanalli ng'asheanji easinneegwean?
43013013	Agooga gogurewanean Ginealshochcheanda ea Ng'uttamiida; ak ghwadoabiiw, aba gideaba geawoschi.
43013014	Asi aniini iyeawoschi Ginealshochcheanda ea Ng'uttamiida ak gajoohhuuna geeshangeagwa, asi gammiiseegwa earagooga gideaba ohhuunna geeshangeaba geat.
43013015	Asi neagonnyeegwa gichchea agalana iissa abeeda eara agooga gosindi gidaghamneawa easindi aba hedeang'wa.
43013016	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, soomjeanda miih haweawa siidaannyi haw, ghana siida sichcheakta miih haweawa siida ajeakta.
43013017	Asi iyoonalli ng'asheesu abeeda ghang'wana iyoosinnyi.
43013018	Meabaloolani badahuukkeagwa oagasean; aniini ghanalli gea aloachchi; ak abeeda gwasa ng'oruutka, ‘Siida akk mukkatteaydeanyu niyamgeaw ak ghwalaabwan bwadaw.’
43013019	Nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu ghamneawa nea miih gwasa, ama eaweeda seameewa abeeda ghoanalli gideaba aniini niny.
43013020	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, Siida deapta dea eajeagu abeeda ghwadeaptanaan aniini, nea siida deaptanaan aniini abeeda ghwadeapta dea ajeaknean.”
43013021	Ahiit Yeesu rukunodeaba ng'asheesu gwasawana guroroodaannyi, ak gamuwwu nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siyagi aba jeedeang'wa gayghwalaabwan bwadaw.”
43013022	Hean gong'wearsa geat ginealanga ak amwanala siida baloola.
43013023	Nea ginealaneanagi bwariiy Yeesu abeeda eaneekkeewa daghatta Yeesu;
43013024	gageanu Simon Betro ak ghaghoash ginealaneetta nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi anyaasha gabaloola badaydeabeang'a.”
43013025	Hiji duu gwadiiwa geaw ginealaneedida aba daghatta Yeesuun, ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida siida ng'eaha?”
43013026	Ghwasha Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha, “Niny siitta jea dang'utta murmurjeanda ak ghadawjiini.” Ghang'utta murmurjeanda, ak ghoadaw Yuuda balleanda Simon Iskariyotte.
43013027	Ing'atta ging'ng'ooyda murmurjeanda ghoabitta Shattaani jeedaannyi. Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gitta igasayi sinodean lamwaja sina.”
43013028	Abeeda ghanyea manda eara siyagi aba jeedeaba fukka agiischiin dea jeeng'u gidarukusiina niny ng'asheandida.
43013029	Aba gideaba Yuuda abeeda siida adiinng'iida sandakkwajeanda lappiya gil, hean ghaghay ginealanga mwaatkwa gili eeshsha Yeesu shaaha haleanjeeda sigasa eaweetta ghwelmeeda, ghana gideaba gwayeeshsha adawa fuga barbari haleanjeeda.
43013030	Ing'atta geandeayda murmurjeanda gwaritta jarooda aba geeshangiga, nea damandida ea eawa gil.
43013031	Iiduw nea ghang'eat gawa, gwayi Yeesu, “Asi ghamneawa Balleanda Siida sikghambiit ak eara Aseetta ea sikghambiit aba jeadaannyi.
43013032	Abeeda isikghambiit Aseetta aba jeadaannyi, abeeda gayghoaghambiit niny aba jeadaannyi, ak gaybay ghoaghambiit.
43013033	Diibiga manang'i, aniini gajeendeayeena gil nuwaas. Gajagassean; ak gaydarukuneegwa gidaghayi earukusi fuga Yahuudi, ‘Heedeawi aniini mwajoammusa apkaani.’
43013034	Geagonnyeegwa digheanda eesh, abwariinnya geat, ak ghoabwariiydi geat gida abwariiydaneegwa.
43013035	Ak abeeda gayghwanal buuneessean gideaba gowoschi ginealangeasu iyoobariinyayi geat agooga.”
43013036	Hean gwayeeshsha Simon Betro niny, “Ng'uttamiida, gigali yeenu?” Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Heedeawi mwajammuusa eanni geeshteanyu ghamneawa; geaghus eanni geeshteanyu iiduw.”
43013037	Gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Ng'uttamiida, neada ghwasaan inyas mwaydaammu deadu geashtaang'u ghamneawa? Aniini gaydaghaashta eaweegeasu appadaydaang'u.”
43013038	Hean ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gajaghaashta eaweegaagu appadaydeanyu? Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineey, damanda migoguula nghaghooda gajanishaang'nyaan niba samwagu.
43014001	“Adiiduw gwahirbaban jeesingeagwa, amwasa Aseetta, ak ghoamwaschaan earaniini.
43014002	Gheeda Bwaabeedeanyu gwanda giibinda haw, gwachchi inyeeda ea masnu gajeaneabay darukuneegwa asi ghamneawa geawi dasinneegwa hoorgeedeang'wa jea oppiidana.
43014003	Nea iyeawi ak geasinneegwa hoorgeedeang'wa, gaydabiigu gichcha ak ghayachcheagwa heedeandi, abeeda heedeandi aniini eara agooga gajandana.
43014004	Ak ghoanalii naweeda gal heeda eagalli.”
43014005	Ghoanyaash Domaso niny, “Ng'uttamiida, aseasa meanali heeda igali; abeeda gajeanaldaan naweeda?”
43014006	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Aniini geawoschi naweeda, ea humeanda, ea eaweega; siida moammu gawa heeda Bwaabwa, geaghus gwasku heedeanyu.
43014007	Inyeeda ghwanyawa ghoanallaan, gajanala eara Bwaabwa, ghang'eada ghamneawa ghoanalli ak ea noadaayi niny.”
43014008	Gwayeeshsha Filippo niny, “Ng'uttamiida, ahiimneasa Bwaabwa ghoahideasa.”
43014009	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gendeaydoschi sea agooga ea goyang'u ak ea minalaani Filippo? Siida nidaahan aniini nidaah Bwaabwa; abeeda gimmustiin gideaba giyeeni, ‘Ahiimneasa Bwaabwa?’
43014010	Ammumwasi gideaba aniini geandi jeeda Bwaabwa nea Bwaabwa gwanda jeedeanyu? Ng'asheega earukuneegwean mearukunani gheambalmeedeanyu aniini, gwasin Bwaabwa mida jeedeanyu gadiyoojigaaschi.
43014011	Amwasa gideaba aniini geandi jeeda Bwaabwa, nea gwanda Bwaabwa jeedeanyu; ghoamwaschaan aba gadiyoojiga easinnyi.
43014012	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, siida mwasan gaygwasin gadiyoojusu easinnyi aniiniin; asi gaygwasin eara gadiyoojiga hees muuchchi, aba gideaba aniini geawi heeda Bwaabwa.
43014013	Nea gidawassean oamuschi aba gheawungeasu gaydasin, ak abeeda geakghambiit Bwaabwa appadayda Balleanda;
43014014	iyoomuschi gidawassean aba gheawungeasu gaydasinneegwa.”
43014015	Iyoabwarinyaan gajoang'ng'waanya digheannyekkeasu.
43014016	Ak gaydamwash Bwaabwa ak gaygagoneegwa Weedaneeda nuut, jea andeayeewana damanda manda mudeanooda,
43014017	niny Gurorootta bea huumwaani nea fuga ng'eanyiida ea mwoammu ghwadeapta aba gideaba moammu ghwadaah ghana ghwanal; agooga ghoanalli niny aba gideaba gajandeawana nea gwanda jeedeang'wa.
43014018	“Maydanung'useegwa heeda bananga; gaydahidu heedeang'wa.
43014019	Sunung' gilimwanang' ak ea maygudu ghwadaahan ng'eanyiida, duukku agooga gajadaahaan; aba gideaba aniini geawoschi majeek, abeeda earagooga gajawosa majeekcheewi.
43014020	Eaweettida gajanala gideaba aniini geandi jeeda Bwaabwa, nea goondi agooga jeedeanyu, nea geandi aniini jeedeagwa.
43014021	Siida mideawa digheannyekkeasu nea ghoang'ng'waay, niih dea bwariinyan gil, nea dea bwariinyan gayghabwariiy Bwaabwa, gaydabwariiy ak gaydeahiimsa geaw niny.”
43014022	Hean gwayeeshsha Yuudayda (mawosa dea Iskariyotte,) “Ng'uttamiida, gayghoawattaan gideaba gajahiimneasa geaw nea mihimsiini geaw ng'eanyiida?”
43014023	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Siida ibwariinyan gayghoang'ng'waay ng'asheandeanyu, nea abeeda Bwaabwa gayghabwariiy siisi, ak gajeapkaana aseasa headaannyi ak geppiidi headaannyi.
43014024	Siida mwabwariinyan mayghoang'ng'waay ng'asheegeasu; nea ng'asheanda oayiinyi ea miih deanyu gil gaba Bwaabwa ajeaknean.
43014025	Ng'asheesu gearukuneegwa, nea abeeda ea gudendeayeena.
43014026	Nea Weedaneeni, was Gurorooda Ghaydit jea gojeagu Bwaabwa aba gheawungeasuun, gayghoanaleagwa haleanjeassean, nea gopkeanneegwa ng'asheega sean earukuneegwa.
43014027	Gaydanung'uneegwa hoyyooh, geagoonnyeegwa hoyyooydeanyu; maydagoondaneegwa gidagoonniida ng'eanyiida. Asi adagwasawana guroruunatkeagwa, nea adaghang'udeagwa muuwda.
43014028	Ghayi noayiinyi nea geayeeshshineegwa, ‘Neawi heechchea dawa, ammuchchu gaydabiigu gichcha heedeang'wa.’ Inyeeda ghoabwariinyaan, gwachchi gajahoosana aba gideaba geawi heeda Bwaabwa; aba gideaba niny ahaweawanaan.
43014029	Ng'asheesu geabay darukuneegwa ghamneawa heeda miih ghwahinna, ama eaweetta hinna abeeda ghoamwaschi.
43014030	Maygutteabaloolaneegwa gichcha ng'asheega saang'a aba gideaba siida ahaaghwa ng'eanyiin gayghwaan. Aba heedeanyu niny moammu gil;
43014031	ak geasindi gidagoondanean Bwaabwa, ak abeeda ghwanal ng'eanyiida gideaba ghaabwariinyi Bwaabwa. Ang'eada eweaya heechchea eweaya.”
43015001	“Aniini geawoschi sabibuuyda huumwa, nea Bwaabwa ea siida bea madamnyeanda.
43015002	Gilinyooh ea damealleanda gil mida jeedeanyu iimaji haghweega, iissa ghwalach, nea gilinyooh ea damealleanda jihi iissa gwasissin, ak abeeda gwaji muuchchi.
43015003	Agooga simminneagwa aba ng'asheanda earukuneegwa.
43015004	Oppiidana jeedeanyu, nea geabiidi jeesingeagwa. Gawuurji gidamoammuusta damealleanda gwaji haghweega nea gaba geaw, nea mwanoasa sabiibu, gwasnu earagooga, moammuusi ajiila haghweega imoppiidani jeedeanyu.
43015005	Aniini geawoschi sabiibu, gowoschi agooga damealga. Siida abiida jeedeanyu, nea geabiidi aniini jeadaannyi, siisi gaygwaji haghweega saang'a, aba gideaba imeandani aniini ea moammuusi asna eara gil.
43015006	Siida wassean meabiidana jeedeanyu, gajeelach ak ghaghajamiit; iissa gageanu damealga ak ghoamughuush, ak gwajaksa jeeda beasta ak goosha.
43015007	Iyoppiidi jeedeanyu, nea gobiida ng'asheegeasu jeesingeagwa, abeeda amsa gidawassean oogasayi ak gajeesinneagwa.
43015008	Aba niih geakghambiit Bwaabwa, iissa iyojiilli haghweega saang'a, nea ghoahuuyi ginealangeasu.
43015009	Aba gidabwariiydanaan Bwaabwa, earaniini ghabwariiyduneegwa; asi oppiidana jeeda bariinyegeasu.
43015010	Iyoang'ng'waanyi digheannyekkeasu, gajoppiidana jeeda bariinyegeasu, ak gawuurji gidang'ng'waaydi digheannyeekka Bwaabwa nea geabiidi jeeda bariinyeegaaschi.
43015011	Asi nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu ak abeeda gobiida hooseaneegeasu jeesingeagwa, ak abeeda ghwahit hooseaneegeagwa.
43015012	“Niih digheandeanyu gil, ak gobariinnyiidi geat gidabwariiydaneagwa aniini.
43015013	Manda siida mideawa bariinyeega huumwa ea ghalaabwa hoowa niih, bea gideaba ghoaghaashta siida eaweagaaschi appadahuukka fuga duupchiin gil.
43015014	Agooga gowoschi fuga eaduupcheewi iyoosinnyi ng'asheega earukuneegwa.
43015015	Mayguttabiikta dagurewaneegwa soomjooga aba gideaba soomjeanda iissa amwanala gissin siidaannyi haw, ak ghamneawa aniini ea neagureewaneegwa fuga eaduupcheewi aba gideaba nearukuneegwa ng'asheega sean eayiing'si heeda Bwaabwa.
43015016	Aniini moaloadaan agooga, ghaloachcheagwa aniini ak ghaanung' aweayeena ak gojiilli haghweega jea ghwashng'u; ak abeeda gagoneegwa Bwaabwa gidawassean iyoomuschi aba gheawungeasu.
43015017	Asi geagonnyeegwa digheanji, abariinnya geat.
43015018	“Agooga isideagwa ng'eanyiida, ghoapkaachchi gideaba ghayi nibay ghwastan heeda miih ghwastaneagwa agooga.
43015019	Inyeetta ghwanyawa gobeayi ng'eanyiida, gwachchi gayghabwariiy ng'eanyiida fugaaschi; asi aba gideaba moabeahi ng'eanyiida, geaghus gideaba ghaloachcheagwa aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, aba sareani ghwasteagwa ng'eanyiida.
43015020	Oapkaada ng'asheanda ghayi earukuneegwa, bea gideaba, ‘Soomjeanda mihaweawa siida haw.’ Iinukwa nisawanan aniini, earagooga gaygwasawaneegwa; inyeeda gwachchi ghoang'ng'waay ng'asheandeanyu, gayghoang'ng'waay eara ng'asheegeagwa.
43015021	Amaduw gaygwasinneegwa ng'asheesu seaniin appadaydeanyu, aba gideaba saawa mwanala dea ajeaknean.
43015022	Inyeetta amwaawuni ak gearukusi saawa ghwanyawa ea maygwandeawa ring'eanda; ak ghamneawa ea manda gichchea ghwashaang'da aba ring'eeda nyaawa.
43015023	Siida sidan aniini abeeda ghwasit eara Bwaabwa.
43015024	Inyeetta ea measissiini gadiyeeda dageascheeda nyaawa gadiyoojiga manda siida nisin, gwachchi ea maygwandeawa ring'eeda; ak ghamneawa anidaah ak ghwastan aniini ea Bwaabwa.
43015025	Ak gwasa gidasung'waar aba jeeda deaweeda gideaba, ‘Ghwastan mwadaagha.’
43015026	Eaweeda hinna Weedaneeda jea deajeagu ghwaan heedeang'wa nea gwaleabu heeda Bwaabwa, nea Gurorooda huumeanda, jea gwaleabu heeda Ghweanda, gaygamuuwwunean;
43015027	eara Agooga gowoschi muushoodiga, aba gideaba gendeayi ghang'eada mwadi.”
43016001	“Ng'asheesu nearukuneegwa sean ak ea adoappeadi.
43016002	Gaygohelleweegwa buuneeda ghorajeega sinnealshachcheewa; aba huumwa, aba gideaba ghwaan damanda ama siida nuseegwa jeaghaghay gili bwat Aseetta.
43016003	Gaygwasmaneegwa ng'asheesu aba gideaba mwanala Bwaabwa ak amwanalan eara aniini.
43016004	Asi nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu aba gideaba ihidu damandida abeeda ghoapkaachchi gideaba nearukuneegwa. “Ng'asheesu ghayi meabay darukuneegwa ammwadi aba gideaba gendeayi.
43016005	Ak ghamneawa geawi heeda dea ajeaknean; ak ghanyea manda eara siyagi aba jeedeang'wa anyaashan nea gwayi, ‘Gigali yeenu?’
43016006	Ghamneawa ea nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu ak aning'ut jeesingeagwa giseaneega.
43016007	Ak ghamneawa gearukuneegwa huumeanda, ak gajanyagaada iyeawi, aba gideaba iimeawani ea mayghwahidu Weedaneeda heedeang'wa; ama eawi, gaydanung' ghwaan heedeang'wa.
43016008	Nea abeeda iihidu gaygoodeajiisa ng'eanyiida ng'asheega ring'eeda, ea doobiiwnatta ea girgweaksiinda;
43016009	aba ng'asheega ring'eeda, aba gideaba mwamwasaan;
43016010	aba ng'asheega doobiiwnatta, aba gideaba geawi heeda Ghweanda, abeeda ea maygudabiikta adaahan;
43016011	aba ng'asheega girgweaksiinda, aba gideaba siida ambaliischi bea ng'eanyiida sirgweaksa.
43016012	“Ea guttandeawa ng'asheega saang'a jea darukuneegwa, ak ghamneawa amwajoammuusa ghamneawa oang'ng'waanya.
43016013	Amahidu Gurorooda huumeanda gayghoadoabiiweagwa ea ghoahittaneagwa jeeda humeanda sean, aba gideaba maygabaloola gheambalmeadaannyi, niny gaygwarukuneegwa ng'asheega iiy ak gay gwarukuneegwa ng'asheega jea ghwahidu.
43016014	Niny gayghoaghambiidan, aba gideaba gaygageanna heedeanyu ak gwarukuneegwa.
43016015	Haleanjeessean mideawa Bwaabwa geasu gil; ak ghoaw gidearukuni gideaba gaygageanna heedeanyu ak gwarukuneegwa.
43016016	“Gudughwashoada ghaadi nuwaas ak ea maygudadaahaan, gichcha gudughwashoada gheadi nuwaas, ak gajabiikta adahaan.”
43016017	Ak gonyeari geat Ginealangaaschi mwaatkwa nea gwayi, “Ak gwarukunaneasa naaha gideaba, ‘Gudughwashoada ghaadi nuwaas ak ea maygudadaahaan, ak gabiikta gwayi gichcha, gudughwashoada gheadi nuwaas ak gajadaahaan; aba gideaba geawi heeda Ghweanda?'"
43016018	Gaba niih eeshsha niirja, “Ak gideabedeaba ng'asheanji aayi, ‘Gudughwashoada ghaadi nuwaasiin gidaabwa?’ Aseasa meanali eara girrugu.”
43016019	Gwajeeng'u Yeesu gideaba geegasa eanyaash niny; ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Gonnyearayi geat ng'asheega gwachchi eargu bea gideaba, ‘Gudughwashoada ghaadi nuwaas ak ea maygudadaahaani, ak ghwashoada gheadi nuwaas ak gajadaahaani?’
43016020	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, agooga gajooyyeawda nea goguttu heareega ak gaygang'weela ng'eanyiida, gajoogiisana amaduw gayghwayamwa giseaneegeagwa ak ghoaw hooseaneega.
43016021	Gatmooda iissa iihidu damanda jeatta gagiisan aba gideaba nihidu damandaannyi, amaduw nea niji jeepta, ea maygudughoapkaat sawanadeeda gwachchi aba hooseaneega gideaba siji jeepta aba jeeda ng'eanyiida.
43016022	Ghamneawa gondeawi giseaneega ak gaydabiikta dadaheagwa ak abeeda gaygahoosan guroruunatkeagwa, nea hoosaneegeagwa ea manda siida jea gageandeawa heedeang'wa.
43016023	Eaweettida manda ng'asheanda jea oannyaashaan. Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineegwa, gidawassean oomushchi Bwaabwa gaygagoneegwa aba gheawungeasu.
43016024	Eara ghamneawa miyoomusa ng'ashaan aba gheawungeasu; amusa, ak gajanyasa ak abeeda ghwahit hooseaneegeagwa.
43016025	“Ng'asheesu gearukuneegwa nea ghawaaghannyi; ak ghwaan damanda jea eamayguttargu ng'asheega nea ghawaaghannyi, gaydargu iitta Bwaabwa nea ghaabwadakti.
43016026	Eaweettida gajamusa aba gheawungeasu; ak ea maydayeeshshineegwa gaydamwaash Bwaabwa appadahukkeagwa;
43016027	aba gideaba Bwaabwa niny ghabwariinyeagwa agooga aba gideaba agooga noabwariinyaan aniini nea noamwaschaan gideaba gealeabu heeda Bwaabwa.
43016028	Aniini gealeabu heeda Bwaabwa, ak ghaawuunnyi jeeda ng'eanyiida; gichcha, ak ghamneawa ghabeawi ng'eanyiida ak geawi heeda Bwaabwa.”
43016029	Gwayi Ginealangaaschi, “Asi ghamneawa nurgu ng'asheega nea gibwadakti!
43016030	Asi ghamneawa aseasa sinalli gideaba ang'iing'i ginali haleanjeessean, ak ghanyea mudugwanda siida jea ghoanyaashnyi gil, asi ghamneawa sumwaschi gideaba ang'iing'i gileabu heeda Aseetta.”
43016031	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghoamwaschi ghamneawa?
43016032	Ghwaan damanda, aba huumwa ea nihidu, dea jea adarda oagasean ak gaba siisi weah gheannyi, ak gajanung'usean heeda nea gabwageaw; nea ghana aniini amwabwageaw, aba gideaba gendeayi sea Bwaabwa.
43016033	Ng'asheesu gearukuneegwa nea geagasayi abeaha hoyyooh aba jeedeanyu. Aba jeeda ng'eanyiida gajanyasa sawanadeeda; asi oahhang'waanya jeesingeagwa, aba gideaba aniini najoarji ng'eanyiida.”
43017001	Iiduw nea niihiit Yeesu rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gong'weersa humng'eeda ak gwayi, “Bwaabwa, nugul damanda; aghambiida Balleandaang'u, ak abeeda eara Balleanda ghoaghambiinnyi ang'iing'i,
43017002	aba gideaba ghayi giidawi niny uurda appadahuukka buuneessean ak abeeda ghoadaw eaweega manda mudeanooda fukka sean ghayi idawiin.
43017003	Nea eaweega manda mudeanooda ea niih gil, gideaba ghwanalnyi ang'iing'eeda was Aseetta huumwa ea Yeesu Gristoyda ghayi ijeagu.
43017004	Aniini naghambichcheey appadayda ng'eanyiida, ak anahiichchi gadiyeeda ghayi igonnyean dasin;
43017005	asi ghamneawa, aghambiidaan Bwaabwa, aba madeadaang'u aba gheambalmeeda ghayi eandeawi sea ang'iing'i nea miyeesin ng'eanyiida.
43017006	“Naanung' ghwanalnyi fukghayi igonnyean aba jeeda ngeanyiida; ghayi fugaagu gil amaduw gugonnyean aniini ghoaw fugeasu, ak ghamneawa saawa ea ning'ng'waay ng'ashandaang'u.
43017007	Ak ghamneawa saawa aninal gideaba haleanjeessean igonnyean gwaleabu headaang'u;
43017008	aniini naadawji ng'asheega ghayi igonnyean, ak saawa aning'ng'waay ak ghwanal humeanda gideaba aniini gealeabu headaang'u; ak anumwas gideaba ang'iing'i gijeaknean.
43017009	Ghamwaashchi Aseetta aba saawa; mwamwaashi Aseetta aba ng'eanyiida ghamwaashchi appadahuukka fuga igonnyean, aba gideaba gaagu;
43017010	geasu sean gaagu gil, nea gaagu ea geasu, ak geakghambiidan aba jeannyaawa.
43017011	Ak ghamneawa aniini ea muttanda jeeda ng'eanyiida, amaduukku saawa gwanda jeeda ng'eanyiida nea ghaawunnyi headaang'u. Bwaabeeda Ghaydit, ahaaghwana saawa aba gheawungaagu ghayi igonnyean, ahaaghwana ea ghoaw agi nea gawuurji gissuwosti aseasa gilagi.
43017012	Ghayi nea guttandeawa saawa iissa ghahaaghwi aba gheawungaagu ghayi igooni; aniini nahaaghwi saawa ak ghanyeamanda niih nuroat eara akkalealla geaghus balleanda ghayi was roodaneeda, gwasa ng'asheega rugu ng'oruutka.
43017013	Asi ghamneawa ghawunnyi headaang'u; ak ea nearuutti ng'asheesu aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak abeeda ghwanyas hooseaneegeasu muuchchi aba jeesinga nyaawa.
43017014	Aniini naadawuji ng'ashandaang'u; amahit ghwasit ng'eanyiida aba gideaba saawa maba ng'eanyiida, gawuurji gidameabeaheattani aniini ng'eanyiida.
43017015	Aniini mwamwaashi gideaba geandeawana jeeda ng'eanyiida, geagasayi gideaba gayfura aba gitta muyiin.
43017016	Saawa maba ng'eanyiida gawuurji gidameabeaheattani aniini ng'eanyiida.
43017017	Ammiinni, saawa aba huumeanda aba gideaba ng'asheandaang'u huumwa gil.
43017018	Gawuurji gidaghayi ijeakteaydanean jeeda ng'eanyiida, gwasnu earaniini neajeakti saawa gaweay jeeda ng'eanyiida.
43017019	Amaduw anammiidu geaw aniini appadahuukka nyaawa, ak abeeda eara saawa geammiidu aba humeanda.
43017020	“Mwamwaashi Aseetta aba suuh akghwahit, ghamwaashi earaba giikka jea ghamwasan aba ng'asheanda nyaawaan;
43017021	ak abeeda ghwoaw fiisu gilagi; gawuurji gidindeatti jeedeanyu ang'iing'i Bwaabwa, nea geandi aniini jeadaang'u, eara saawa gobiida jeedeanya, ak abeeda ghamwas ng'eanyiida gideaba guwosi siida ghayi ajeaknean.
43017022	Aniini naadawji saawa gigheambiitta ghayi igoonnyeaniin ak abeeda ghoaw gilagi gawuurji gissuwosti aseasa gilagi,
43017023	aniini gaydeabiida jeannyaawa nea gibiidi ang'iing'i jeedeanyu; gideaballi gemmajeek ak ghoaw gilagi ak abeeda ghwanal ng'eanyiida gideaba ghayi giijeaknean ea gideaba gibwariinyi saawa gawuurji gidubwariiydanaan aniini.
43017024	Bwaabwa, suuh ghayi igonnyeaniin geagasayi dandeawa galeagasean aba hiji eandi sean, ak abeeda ghwadaah gigheambiitteanyu ghayi igonnyean, aba bwariinyeegaagu nea miyeabwat sindeetta ng'eanyiida.
43017025	Ea Bwaabeeda doabiiwaat, ng'eanyiida mwanalnyi, duukku aniini ghanalleay; eara suuh ghwanal gideaba ghayi gijeaknean ang'iing'i.
43017026	Ak ea naanung' ghwanal ghawungaagu, ak gaydanung' ghwanal, abeeda bariinyeekka ghayi ibwariinyaan aniiniin goobiida jeesinga nyaawa, ak geabiidi aniini jeannyaawa.”
43018001	Hean iyahiit Yeesu rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gawa gigheawda moang'wachchiyda Gedaroni sea ginealangaaschi, abeeda hoowa gwanda madamnyeanji mwanang', hean gawa Yeesu jeeda sea ginealangaaschi.
43018002	Nea abeeda Yuudayda jea ghwalabwadaw ninyiin, abeeda ghwanal hoowa; aba gideaba eajusu iissa gabadiini hoowa Yeesu sea ginealangaaschi.
43018003	Ng'atta gageanu Yuuda gharmuchcheanda shirikkara ea furiischoodiga leabu heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea heeda Farisayajeega, ak godeana nea gwandeawa gheaboonyanga ea dabitta ng'uchcheeda.
43018004	Hean jeeng'u Yeesu ng'asheanda jea ghwahidu, ng'atta ghoahiimda geaw ak ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha, “Gogaseadayyi ng'eaha?”
43018005	Ghwasha Saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Yeesuuyda Nasareetti.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Ada aniini.” Nea abeeda Yuudayda jea ghwalabwadaw ghaminaada aba hoowa sea saawa.
43018006	Hean nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Aniini gil,” gabiikta bwadaw ak gobedeaysa ng'eanyi
43018007	Gabiikta ghoanyaash, “Gogaseadayyi ng'eaha?” Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Yeesuuyda Nasareetti.”
43018008	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Neada ea mearukuneegwa gideaba aniini gil; asi iyogassean aniini abeeda ghoanung'waadi fiisu gaweay.”
43018009	Gwarukutta ng'asheesu ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheega ghayi rugu bea gideaba, “Fukghayi ugonnyean miih dahutta eara akkalealla.”
43018010	Abeeda gwandeawa Simon Betro bwaanga, goseelu ak ghwalach iitta geattinda dugwa bea ging'ng'oonyaneeda ashoohoochcheanda haw. Nea ging'ng'oonyaneedida geguura ghawungaaschi Malko.
43018011	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu Betro, “Adealda bwangeadaang'u jeeda labaldaannyi; heappi, gajamwaleaydani bayookta ghayi goonan Bwaabwa?”
43018012	Ng'atta ghoang'ng'waay Yeesu gharmuchcheandida bea Shirikkaraan sea shirikkarajeanda haw sea furiischoodiga Yahuudi ak geerada.
43018013	Ak geshsheeda eayaat heeda Anaasi; abeeda gweargweeda agweaji Gayafa gil nea abeeda Gayafa ea ashoohoochcheanda haw gil gweaydida.
43018014	Nea Gayafeeni ea siida ghayi rukusa fukka bea Yahuudiin gideaba ghang'wana ghami siyagi appadahuukka buuneedeani.
43018015	Iiduw ghwaat Simon Betro geeshta Yeesu sea ginealana nuut. Nea abeeda ginealaneeni ghwanal muuchchi ashoohoochcheanda haw, hean gawa jeeda dodooda gheeda ashoohoochcheanda Haw nea godeayi Yeesu,
43018016	nea Betro niny abeeda ghaminaada aba jarooda nea neekkeewa gidaghuut. Iiduw gwardu jarooda ginealaneedida nal ashoohoochcheanda Hawiin ak gobalool huda fur gidaghuut, ak ghwaat Betro gah.
43018017	Hean ghoanyaash Hudida ghwanyawa fur gidaghudiin Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Muwosi siyagi aba jeeda ginealangeaba siisi?” Gwayeeshsha, “Meawosi.”
43018018	Aba damandida anughwar beasta ghuurga soomjooga sea furiischoodiga aba gideaba ghwaraanya gorogeeda, hean ghamiinaada nea gwaju beasta; aba damandida eara Betro ghaminaada aba hoowa nea gwajohudayi beasta saawa.
43018019	Ng'atta ghoanyaash ashoohoochcheanda Haw Yeesu iitta ginealangaaschi ea iitta ginealshoodaannyi.
43018020	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini eajusu iissa geabalolli ng'eanyiida aba eeshpwara; nea iissa geanealshi aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa ea jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta galeagassean, heeda roondooscheesa fuga Yahuudi sean; nea moang'ng'wa darukuta ng'asheanda wassean aba makcheameeda.
43018021	Ghwasaan anda ginyaashchchaan aniini? Anyaasha fukka ghayi iiy ng'asheega earukusiin; saawa ghwanal ng'asheega ghayi earukusi.”
43018022	Ing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu ghwalas madeang'da Yeesu furiischoochcheanji ghwanyawa minaada aba hoowa nea gwayeeshsha, “Niih gidurukusiindi ashoohoochcheanda hawi?”
43018023	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ineargu ng'asheanda muy abeeda gimuuwwu munyindaannyi ea ng'asheanda was, ama ghwanyawa earugu ng'asheanda nea ghwadoabiiw, abeeda gilaksean naaha?”
43018024	Hean ghwanung' Anasi eerada ak geayaat heeda ashoohoochcheanda haw was Gayaafa.
43018025	Aba damandida Simon Betro gudughamiinaada nea gwaju beasta. Hean geannyaash nea geeyeeshsha, “Heappi earang'iing'i muwosi siyagi bea jeeda ginealangaaschi?” Ghwashaang' niny nea gwayeeshsha, “Meawosi.”
43018026	Abeeda gwanda siisi was soomjeanda aba gheeda ashoohoochcheanda haw, nea siisi gaba ghaawagi sea siitta lach Betro iittean, ghoanyaash, “Heappi aniini miih dadeakseeyi jeeda madamnyeanda mwanang' sea niny?”
43018027	Gabiikta ghwashaang' Betro gichcha ammii ghoaw gil goguul nghaghooda.
43018028	Ng'atta gegeanda Yeesu aba gheeh Gayaafa ak geayaat gheeda abiitta sugoochcheanda nea gudea beashatta gil ak ea maweayi saawa jeedeaba gheetta aba gideaba amwang'udana geat ririnnyeanda ak abeeda ghwaak hamitta basakka.
43018029	Hean gawa Bilatto ghwanyasa saawa jarooda ak gwayeeshsha, “Gondeawi girgweageamba naaha appadaydeaba siisi?”
43018030	Ghwasha Saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Siisi inyeetta ghwanyawa ea masinna ng'asheega munyas ea majeeyeanna headaang'u.”
43018031	Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Asi adabeeda ghoayaachchi agooga ak gorgweaksi aba deaweedeedeang'wa.” Gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi niny, “Mammiiseasa aseasa gideaba gajeenuusa siida.”
43018032	Ak abeeda gwasa ng'asheanda ghayi rugu Yeesu nea ghoahiimu miyeeda jea ghami giduurji.
43018033	Gabiikta Bilatto jeeda gheeda sugoochcheandumeeda ak gaguursa Yeesu ak ghoanyaash, “Ang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?”
43018034	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'asheesu girgu ang'iing'i ghana rukuneey buuneeda iitteanyu?”
43018035	Ghwasha Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, “Neada aniini geawoschi siida Yahuudi? Ang'iing'i gweanneey heedeanyu fuga emeedeang'wa sea ashoohoodiga hees. Neada eanisni naaha?”
43018036	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Sugoochcheandumeedeanyu maba badaydeaba ng'eanyiini; ama inyeetta sugoochcheandumeedeanyu gaba badaydeaba ng'eanyiini, ghwanyawa gaygang'uchchi soomjoogeasu aba meatkweedeanyu ameayiinan geattinga fuga Yahuudi; amaduukku ghamneawa sugoochcheandumeedeanyu ea maba ng'eanyiini.”
43018037	Hean gwayeeshsha Bilatto niny, “Asi ghamneawa ang'iing'i guwosi sugoochcheanda?” Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Girgu ang'iing'i gideaba aniini geawoschi sugoochcheanda. Aniini geejiilan appadaydeaba niih, nea appadaydeaba niih ghawunnyi jeeda ng'eanyiida, gideaba gaydamuuwwu huumeanda. Siida wassean mida jeeda humeanda iissa goleeysiit ghutteanyu.”
43018038	Gwayeeshsha Bilatto niny, “Humeanda naaha gil?” Ing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gabiikta gichcha heeda fuga Yahuudi mida jarooda ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini mwadaahi gidinyeandeaba siisi.
43018039	Iiduw gondeawi agooga seareeda ghaheang'wa iissa googasayi deattinneegwa siyagi mida ghealooniga damanda ghwelmeeda Basakka; asi googasayi deattineegwa sugoochcheanda Yahuudi?”
43018040	Gabiikta gojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Miih siisi, geegasayi Baraaba!” Nea Baraaba abeeda goreedi buuneeda haleanjeeda.
43019001	Hit ghoadayda Bilato Yeesu eabwara mughowooda.
43019002	Gageanu Shirikkara ak gwasin shiipka halaghweenga, amahit ghwayiin uhuudaannyi, ak geshshuup hang'da oomu;
43019003	hean geweay madeadaannyi ak geyeeshsha, “Seayu, Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi!” Ng'atta geabwar aba baneaguukka.
43019004	Gabiikta Bilatto jarooda ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Adaaha gearuudu siisi jarooda aba gideaba aniini mwadaahi gidiinyeandaannyi.”
43019005	Gwaritta Yeesu jarooda nea gwanda uhuuda shiipka halaghweenga nea gookkwa hang'doom. Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Ang'ulla siida!”
43019006	Daah ashoohoodiga hees sea furiischoodiga gojuur nea gwayi, “Angoora niny, Angoora niny!” Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Ageanda agooga nea goabwageat amang'atta gongoorji, aba gideaba aniini mwadaahi gidinyeandeaba siisi.”
43019007	Ghwasha fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa gendeawi deaweeda amaduw aba deaweedeeni ea gideaba gammiisa miyeeda gil, aba gideaba niny gwahinda geaw Balleanda Aseetta.”
43019008	Iiy Bilatto ng'asheesu, hean ghabeal muuchchi;
43019009	gabiikta jeeda gheeda sugoochcheandumeeda ak ghoanyaash Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i gileabu yeenu?” Amwasha Yeesu ng'asheanji.
43019010	Hean gwayeeshsha Bilatto niny, “Mayrukunean eara gili? Minali gideaba geandeawi uurda jea deattinaneey ea dea jea deangooraneey?”
43019011	Ghwasha Yeesu nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwachchi miimmuusi mideawana uurda appadaydeanyu imegoonnyi aba humng'eeda; amaduw siitta iinan gattingaguun gwandeawa ring'eeda haw muuchchi.”
43019012	Ghang'eada damandida gagasa Bilatto gheatta gichchea gwasiksiinda niny, gojuur fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha, “Iisiksi siisi eamuwosi siida duupchi Gaysaari, aba gideaba siida wassean gasa ghoaw sugoochcheanda gwanda washta Gaysaari.”
43019013	Hean iiy Bilatto ng'asheesu goruutta Yeesu jarooda amahit goopteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda silachcha girgweaguutka mida heesuguura Lagheaneeda bwarak, nea aba iitta Ebraniya geguura Gabatta.
43019014	Abeeda damandida gaba aseetta lah nea eaweechcheanji getting'ding'da aba basakka; gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi, “Ang'ulla sugoochcheandeang'wa!”
43019015	Gojuur Saawa muuchchi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ang'aamwana hiji, Ang'aamwana hiji, Angoora!” Gwayeeshsha Bilatto saawa, “Gaydeangoor sugoochcheandeang'wa?” Ghwasha ashoohoodiga hees nea gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa mendeawani sugoochcheanda geaghus Gaysaari.”
43019016	Ng'atta gageanu Bilato ak ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa ak gengoor.
43019017	Gegeanu Yeesu eruutta jarooda nea ghwasar behiidaannyi ea gwahitta heessuguura geapkeeda huuda nea aba iitta Ebraniya geguura Golgotta.
43019018	Gengoorsa uhuuda behiida sea fiih suuk iyyeenya dea manda meakweeda geattinda dugwa niirja gwanda meatkweeda geattinda ghaadaam, nea Yeesu gwanda dageascheeda nyaawa.
43019019	Gang'oorsa Bilatto uhuuda behiida; ng'asheega siyi, “Yeesuuyda Nasareetti Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.”
43019020	Hean iissa ghoassoamwa fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi ng'asheekka sung'oorsa uhuuda behiidean, aba gideaba hoowa singoorsa Yeesuun ea neekkeewa mujiini; nea geang'waara iitta Ebraniya ea iitta Lattiini ea iitta Yunaani.
43019021	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha ashoohoodiga hees Bilatto, “Adung'waari ‘Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi,’ Ng'waara gideaba, ‘Siisi gwayi, Aniini geawoschi Sugoochcheanda Yahuudi.'"
43019022	Ghwasha Bilatto nea gwayeeshsha, “Ginnang'waarji ning'atta ng'oorda.”
43019023	Ing'atta gingoorda Yeesu gageanu Shirikkara hang'weakkaaschi ak geesin gharmuchcheew ang'wan, ak gaba siisi sittaw gharmuchchandaannyi; ghabwada gageanda eara hang'da geaw gul ng'eanyi. Nea abeeda hang'dida geanap nea agi ghang'eada uhuuda ea gagul ng'eanyi;
43019024	hean gabaloola saawa gideaba, “Adeabwaashchi ghang'wana geng'alealleesi ak geadaayi siichchea gageanda.” Ng'asheanji geesin ak gwasa gida ghayi nyah Ng'oruutka bea gideaba, “Ghoadabwaarda hang'weakkeasu aba jeannyaawa, Ak gang'alealleesa hang'deanyu.”
43019025	Hean gwasindunu shirikkara. Abeeda murdeeda behiida Yeesu ghamiinaada Ghaamwat ea huda ghamaghaamwat, ea Mariyaayda was gatmooda Gleoppa, ea Mariya Magdaleena.
43019026	Daah Yeesu nea ghamiinaada ghaamwat nea gwanda murdeeda ginealaneetta bwariiyiin, gwayeeshsha Yeesu ghaamwat, “Iyya, ng'ulla balleadaang'u!”
43019027	Hit gwayeeshsha ginealaneetta, “Ng'ulla geamadu!” Ghang'eada damandida ghwaat ginealaneetta gwandeawa aba gheannyi.
43019028	Iing'atta nea ninal Yeesu gideaba niisha ng'asheega sean, gwayi, (ijeagwasa ng'oruutka), “Ghwaagan muwoash.”
43019029	Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa gweriida nyiit beega ng'weani bea haghweega geetta. Hean gegeanu gidawas ghabuschcheanda ak geappuutta jeeda beega ng'weani ak geahaaktaawa digheechcheanda ak geayiin ghuuttaannyi.
43019030	Ng'atta nea ninukghuta Yeesu beekka ng'weaniin gwayi, “Niisha;” ak ghwahiing'u uhuuda ak ghoabitta gurorooda.
43019031	Abeeda eaweeda giding'ding'deayda, ea mammiissina gideaba gaygobiida muscheekka iheenga behajeega eaweeda Sabatto (aba gideaba eaweeda Sabatto eaweeda haw gil), gaweay gamus fuga Yahuudi Bilatto ehirjeaweada geeshanga ak gegeanda.
43019032	Gaweay Shirikkara ak gwahirja geeshanga siida madeeda, ea geaba siitta bea iyyeenya; ghwanyawa singooruudayi sea ninyiin;
43019033	iiduw nea ghwahitta heeda Yeesu ghwadaah gideaba nigeawiit ghami, ak ea mudugwahirjeaweada geeshangaaschi.
43019034	Hean gageanu Siyagi ak ghang'ut gisheajeega Yeesu aba ng'utta, deagheatta gwardu foojeanda ea beega.
43019035	Nea siitta daah nga'sheesuun gamuuwwu aba gideaba ng'asheega rugu gaba huumwa. Nea ghwanal gideaba gwarukku huumeanda ak abeeda ghoamwaschi.
43019036	Ng'asheesu geesin gwasa ng'ooruutka, “Manda eara geapkeadaannyi jea eehirja.”
43019037	Gabiikta gwayi ng'ooruutka suuk, “Gaygang'ula fukka heetta ng'udiin.”
43019038	Iig'atta ng'asheesu gawa Yoseefooda ng'eanyiida Arimattaya was ginealaneeda Yeesu aba makcheameeda, aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi, gamus Bilatto musta Yeesu ghwaat, ak ghoadaw Bilatto gheatta. Hean ghwaan ak gageanda mustaannyi.
43019039	Deagheatta ghwahidu Nikkodeemooda ghayi weah heedaannyi eawa, ghwaan nea gweadu gharmuchcheanda sikkuuyi weapkeanda ea hideeda ng'andit nea ghwannyiit debajeanda ea dea agween iyyeenya.
43019040	Gegeanda musta Yeesu ak gekkwealsa hang'weakka bumbuni sea haleanjeetta ng'andidiin aba seareetta bea fuga Yahuudi bea eaweetta bunyischoodean.
43019041	Hoowa singoorsean abeeda gwanda madamnyeanji mwanang' nea jeedeaba madamnyeanji gwanda bung'eeni ris eaghurghur miyeebung'sa siida jeeda.
43019042	Iiduw aba ng'asheega Yahuudi bea eaweetta giding'ding'deayda, ea gideaba eaneekki bung'eeda muuchchi geyiin Yeesu jeedida.
43020001	Hean eaweeda madeeda bea wikkajeanda, gawa Mariya Magdaleena heeda bung'eeda gheatta beashatta nea gudeamisana ak ghwadaah lagheaneeda nea sigeanda aba ghuutta bung'eeda.
43020002	Ng'atta ghafwach ea ghwahitta heeda Simon Betro ea ginealaneeda niirja ghayi bwariiy Yeesuun ak gwayeeshsha, “Sigeanda Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda bung'eeda ak ameanali heeda siyiin.”
43020003	Gaweay Betro sea ginealaneeda niirja ea ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda.
43020004	Gwasalda duwaawi, amaduw ghafwach Ginealaneeda niirja muuchchi ea ghoadaraam Betro, ak gosheeda ghwahitta heeda bung'eeda;
43020005	ghwahiiy geaw ak gong'wearsa jeeda shoomanda ak ghwadaah hang'weakka bumbuni mida hoowa, ak ea moabitta jeeda.
43020006	Ghwahidu Simon Betro, gweadu geeshta amahidu gawa jeeda bung'eeda; ak ghwadaah hang'weakka aba ng'eanyi,
43020007	nea weastida, heetta sirada uhuudaanyiin ea meanung' ng'wandeayi sea hang'dida, nea abeeda asimughut ak geayiin hichpa geaw.
43020008	Iiduw eara Ginealaneeda ghwanyawa asheeda ghwahitta heeda bung'eedean, earada ghoabitta jeeda bung'eeda, ak ghwadaah ak ghamwas;
43020009	abeeda miih ghwanal ng'oruutka ginnyaashta, bea gideaba gabean ea gaygwaduunna miyeeda.
43020010	Hean gabiikta Ginealangiga gaweay ghoah.
43020011	Abeeda Mariya ghaminaada aba murdeeda bung'eeda nea goyyeawda, damani duu goyyeawdewean ghwahiiy geaw gong'wearsa jeeda shoomanda bung'eeda;
43020012	ghwadaah malaykaji iyyeenya akkwa hang'weakka eashish nea gobiitpiit aba heeda heetta siyiin musta Yeesu, nea deamanda deascheeda uhuuda niirja gwanda deascheeda geeshanga.
43020013	Gwayeeshsha niny, “Iyya, ghwasaan anda giyyeawdi?” Gwayeeshsha gheamatta saawa, “Sigeanda Ng'uttamiideanyu ak amwaanali heessiyiin.”
43020014	Ing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu ghwasachsaghaat bwadaw ak ghwadaah Yeesu nea ghaminaada ak amwanala gideaba Yeesu gil.
43020015	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iyya ghwasaan anda giyyeawdi? Gigaseadayyi ng'eaha?” Duugwayeena Mariya gwadeeppea siida fur madamnyeanda gil gwayeeshsha, “Siida mureeda ideeppa eanigeandi ang'iing'i girukunean heeda iyiin, ak gaydawa aniini dageanda.”
43020016	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Mariya.” Ghwayam geaw ak gwayeeshsha aba iitta Ebraniya, “Rabooni!” (nea gideaba Ginealshoochcheanda gil).
43020017	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Ading'ng'wanyaan, aba gideaba miih dawa heeda Bwaabwa; asi ng'eada una heeda oorjooga iyya ak giyeeshshi saawa, aniini nascheang'di dawa heeda Bwaabwa nea Ghweandeang'wa gil, heeda Aseetteanyu nea Aseetteang'wa.”
43020018	Ghang'eat Mariya Magdaleena gawa ak gwayeeshsha ginealanga, “Naadaayi Ng'uttamiida;” ak gwayeeshsha saawa gideaba nirukusa ng'asheesu.
43020019	Iiduw nea niiw shing'adeeda eaweettida bea madeeda bea wikkajeandean abeeda ea nibassa geat Ginealanga jeemba ghaaw, nea abeeda asirat gidaghuut aba gheawalmeeda fuga Yahuudi, deagheatta ghwaan Yeesu ak ghamiinaada appugusta nyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Abeaha Hoyyooh.”
43020020	Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheanji gohiimsa geattingaaschi ea gisheajeagaaschi. Hean gahoosan Ginealangiga muuchchi iidaah Ng'uttamiida.
43020021	Gabiikta Yeesu ak gwayeeshsha gichcha, “Abeaha Hoyyooh. Gawuurji gidaghayi ajeakteaydanean Bwaabwa, asi earaniini geajeaktaneegwa agooga.”
43020022	Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu gaguussa jeameada nea gwayeeshsha, “Ong'ng'waanya Guroorooda Ghaydit.
43020023	Nea iyosammiisi ring'eega buuneeda, gajeesamsa, ammosamsiini, ea majeesamsa.”
43020024	Damani Domasodida bea jeedeaba oorjookka attamaniyyeenya suguura Saleaygweandean, abeeda ghwanyawa ea mandeawana oorjooga suurja damandida hinna Yeesuun.
43020025	Hean gwayeeshsha Ginealanga suurja niny, “Sidaayi Ng'uttamiida.” Gwayeshsha niny saawa, “Imeadeaksiini geattingaaschi ghuusiga musumwaarajeega ak ghang'ng'waanyi monneedeanyu heeda haabwa deanneaduutka musumwaarajeega nea ghayiinnyi monneedeanyu gisheajeegaaschi ea maydamwas.”
43020026	Muchchu nea ning'atta eawoji sis gabiikta gichcha gabassa geat ginealanga jeeda ghooriida nea abeeda eara Domaso gwanda hiji. Abeeda gidaghuudajeega sirat, deagheatta ghwahidu Yeesu ak ghaminaada aba jeannyaawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Abeaha hoyyooh.”
43020027	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Domaso, “Goona monneadaang'u iina hiji, ak gung'ulayi geattingeasu; ak gugooni gattindaang'u ak ging'ng'waanyi gisheajeegeasu; ak ea aduwosi siida mwamwasa, huwa siida mwas.”
43020028	Ghwasha Domaso nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiideanyu ea Aseetteanyu!”
43020029	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Gumwasi aba gideaba gidayaani? Ghang'wana fukka mwadahan amaduw ghamwasiin.”
43020030	Yeesu gwasin aba madeeda ginealangaaschi gwadeagwajeega suuk duguuga saang'a miyeang'waar aba jeedeaba gittaaboani;
43020031	suuh geang'waar aba gideaba abeeda ghoamwaschi gideaba Yeesu Gristo gil, Balleanda Aseetta, amabeeda oamwaschi ghoanyaschi eaweega aba gheawungaaschi.
43021001	Iing'atta hiji gabiikta Yeesu gohiimsa geaw ginealangaaschi aba ghuutta basooda Diberiya, ak gohiimsiindunu geaw.
43021002	Simon Betro, ea Domasoyda suguura Saleaygweanda ea Nattanaeliyda ng'eanyiida Ganeeda Galilaaya, balloojiga Sebedaayo, sea ginealangaaschi suuk iyyeenya, nea abeeda gwandeayi sean.
43021003	Gwayeeshsha Simon Betro saawa, “Gaydawa daleallu ghweayeega.” Gwayeeshsha saawa niny, “Earaseasa gajetteayeena sea ang'iing'i.” Ng'atta godeayi ak gwading'da maleambooda; ak eaweedida amwanyasa eara gil.
43021004	Muuchchu nea gorearu aseetta ghaminaada Yeesu aba ghuutta basooda; nea ginealanga amwanala gideaba Yeesu gil.
43021005	Hean gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Diibiga, gondeawi ghweayeega?” Ghwasha saawa nea gwayeeshsha, “Manda.”
43021006	Gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ajaksiina gheareedanga murdeeda maleambooda bea geattinda dugwa, ak gajanyasa. Ng'atta gwajakta gheareedanga ak ghwaraay gongiiru aba seang'ayda ghweayeega.”
43021007	Iiduw gwayeeshsha ginealaneedida bwariiy Yeesuun Betro, “Niih Ng'uttamiida!” Iiy Simon Betro gideaba niih Ng'uttamiida gil, gageanu hang'daannyi ak gwaradischeewa aba gideaba gwachchi adawiish, amang'atta gwadeambiirsa jeeda beega.
43021008	Hean ghapka Ginealanga suurja ea ghwahidu ghuutta basooda nea gongiiru gheareedanga nea ghwanyiit ghweayeega, nea abeeda eamisheageewa ng'eanyiida ghajaam aba iisidasaada geeshanga gayghwahitta geeshan bughala hitteayda ghuutta beega.
43021009	Hitta ng'eanyiida ghajaam ghwadaah beasta ghuurga nea sughwar nea gwanda beasta ghweayeega ea mukkatte.
43021010	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saaw, “Ayeanni hiji ghweayeega mwaatkwa olealu ghamneawa.”
43021011	Hean gwading'da Simon Betro jeeda maleambooda ak gaksu gheareedanga ea ghoahiidu ng'eanyiida ghajaam nea ghwanyiit ghweayeega hees nyiit bughala ea haradam ea damassanmwagu; earappeadi saang'a ea gwadeenuun, ea miih gang'achcheaweada gheareedanga.
43021012	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu saawa, “Apkaani ajaada ghuussi.” Nea abeeda ghanyea manda aba jeeda ginealanga dea badaksa ak ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ang'iing'i ng'eaha?” Aba gideaba ghwanal Ng'uttamiida gil.
43021013	Ghwaan Yeesu ak gageanda mukkatte ak ghoadaw saawa ak gwasindunu earaba ghweayeegiga.
43021014	Niih deaba samwagu gil aba gihiimsinda ahiimsa geaw Yeesu ginealangaaschi aba iing'atta dunnooda duunna miyeeda.
43021015	Iing'atta nea nijaat ghuusiga ghoanyaash Yeesu Simon Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaan ea laabwana hoowa orjoosu?” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Ea, Ng'uttamiida; ginali gideaba aniini ghaabwariinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.”
43021016	Gabiikta gwayeeshsha niny deabiyyeenya, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaani?” Gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Eah, Ng'uttamiida; ginali gideaba ghabwarinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.”
43021017	Gabiikta ghoanyaash deaba samwagu, “Simon, balleanda Yohaana, gibwarinyaani?” Gagiisan Betro aba gideaba geannyaash deaba samwagu gideaba “Gibwariinyaani” Gwayeeshsha niny, “Ea, Ng'uttamiida; ang'iing'i ginali haleanjeessean, ang'iing'i ginali gideaba aniini ghabwarinyeay.” Gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ahaaghwana gisilgeasu.
43021018	Aba huumwa, aba huumwa, geayeeshshineey, ghayi nea guduwosa gheareemaneeda iissa gimmuusi rada manandaang'u ak guwi heeda wassean igasayi; amaduw nea nihuwi gweargweeda, gajadoabiiwa geattingaagu, ak ghwarannyi siinuut ak ghwaannyi heeda ghwanyawa migassi una.”
43021019	(Aba inyas ghwanyaashtunuun gohiimsa Betro gichchea ghameawda ak ghoaghambiit Aseetta). Ng'atta ng'asheesu gwayeeshsha, “Eanni geeshteanyu.”
43021020	Iiduw ghwayamgeaw Betro ak ghwadaah ginealaneetta bwariiy Yeesuun, nea ghwaat geeshta, nea diitta ghayi diiw geaw aba daghattannyiin gil shing'ada damanda agiischooda nea ghoanyaash gideaba, “Ng'uttamiida siida jea ghwalaapnyi bwadaw ng'eaha?”
43021021	Daah Betro niny gwayeeshsha Yeesu, “Ng'uttamiida ama oorjeani?”
43021022	Gwayeeshsha Yeesu niny, “Iyeagasayi gobiida badayda ng'eanyiida ea dabiigu gwasawannyi naaha? Ang'iing'i eanni geeshteanyu!”
43021023	Hean ghaghayda iittida aba jeedeaba oorjookka gideaba ginealaneetta mayghami; nea Yeesu niny ea miih gwayeeshsha, ginealaneani mayghami geaghus gideaba gwayeeshsha, “Iyeagasayi gobiida badayda ng'eanyiida ea dabiigu, gwasawannyiini?”
43021024	Ginealaneani niih dea muuwwu ng'asheesuun gil, ak ghang'waar; ak geanalli gideaba muuwwunoadaannyi huumwa gil.
43021025	Gwanda ng'asheega saang'a sin Yeesu; nea inyeetta ghwanyawa geang'waar sean, ghaaghanyi eara ng'eanyida gwachchi mayghoammu godiiw gittaabwajeega jea eang'waar.
44001001	Aba gittabooda madeeda, Ea Diofilo, geasinnyi haleanjeessean ghayi sin Yeesu nea ghoanaal,
44001002	ea ghwahitta eaweetta siyaada humng'eeda, iing'atta nea niidaw digheanda giijasoodiga ghayi loat aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit.
44001003	Ak goohiimsa geaw saawa iing'atta miyeeda nea majeek ing'atta sawanadeeda nea ghoahiimda geaw aba gwadeagwajeega saang'a, ak gabussa saawa iing'atta askwearjooji haradam, nea gabaloola iitta sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
44001004	Damanda mideayeewa gwareekusa saawa amwabeawana Yerusaleemu, ak ghoommuughu helleesiinda Ghweanda, nea gwayi, “gooyiing'si headeanyu,
44001005	gideaba, Yohaana goobattiisan aba beega, nea heeda miighang'attaawa eawoojusu saang'a agooga gajeeppattiisaneegwa aba Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
44001006	Iiduw nea ghabwat geat, geannyaash niny, “Ng'uttamiida, abeeda aba damani gajadeelsiina sugoochcheandumeeda Israeeli?”
44001007	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha saawa, “Miih gadiyeedeang'wa gil nalooda damannyoojiga ghana gheatta sin Bwaabwa aba gheambalmeadaannyi.
44001008	Ak gajanyasa uurda iiwuh heedeang'wa Gurorooda Ghaydit; ak gajahuuwa muushoodigeasu aba Yerusaleemu ea Yuudeeyeessean ea Samariya ea ghoaw muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
44001009	Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, damanda duu gang'ulleewa, gettiing'da humng'eeda, ak gageandeawa shamooghooda madeeda gheanyanga nyaawa.
44001010	Hean nea gudugang'ula humng'eeda damanda beawa, ng'ulla ghamiinaada fiih iyyeenya ammurdeeda nyaawa nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish,
44001011	ak gwayi, “Fuga Galilaaya ghwasaan anda ghoamiinaadi nea gong'ulayi humng'eeda? Yeesuheeni beawa heedeang'wa ak gawa humng'eedean, gaygabiikteaydunu gawuurji gidaghamneawa oadaakti nea gawa humng'eedean.”
44001012	Iiduw gabiikta Yerusaleemu, nea abeeda gwaleabu gijeeni mida geediga sugura Masaytunajeega neekkeewa mujineeda Yerusaleemu, hitta gilomitteanagi;
44001013	iiduw nea gehitta, gaweay jeemba ghooriini sideeksa uhuumba nuut, ak goobiitpiit geaba Betro, Yohaana, Yakkobo, Andereya, Filippo, ea Domaso, Batlomayo, ea Mattayo, Yakkobo balleanda Alfayo, Simoneeda Selotte, ea Yuuda balleanda Yakkobo.
44001014	Fiisu abeeda ghabwat geat ghamwash Aseetta ghawooda, ak gwanda jeedeaba gadeemsu Mariyayda was gheamatta Yeesu, ea oorjooga ghaamwat.
44001015	Aba eawoojikka ghang'eat Betro ghamiinaada aba jeeda fuga siduupcheewi (nea abeeda monneeda buuneeda ghwahitta bughala ea diktam), ak gwayeeshsha,
44001016	“Fuga suduupcheewi, gaygwasa ng'ooruutka, ghayi rugu Gurorooda Ghaydit ammwadi aba ghuutta Dawdi, appadayda Yuudayda was siida asheedeawa fuga ang'ng'waay Yeesu.
44001017	Yuuda abeeda gaba meatkweendeanya aba gideaba gealoat eara niny gwasin gadiyeeni.”
44001018	(Ng'atta ghwasha siisi madamnyeanda aba gissiittaw aba munyindaannyi; ak ghoabeadaawa uhuuda ak ghwanyar jeeda ak gwardu hineagaaschi jarooda.
44001019	Ghwanal buuneessean bea ng'eanyida Yerusaleemu hean geng'assa madamnyeandida gheawunga ak geguura, “Akealdama” nea gideaba madamnyeanda foojeanda.)
44001020	“Aba gideaba geeng'orsa jeeda gittabooda Nyigheega gideaba, ‘Gagasa ghoaw gheannyi emeeda ak ea adagoobida siih jeada;’ nea ‘Hoorgeadaannyi bea gadiyeeda dageanda sinuut.’
44001021	Nea siyagi aba jeeda fuga siitteayeewi damannyoojiga sean wuna Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu nea gwaritteawa jeedeanya,
44001022	ghang'eada gibattiisanda Yohaana ea gagul eaweetta ghayi siyaada humng'eeda nea ghabeawa heedeanya nea siyagi aba jeedeaba fiisu geaghus eetteayeena ghoaw muushoochcheanda aba duunnoadaannyi.”
44001023	Hean iiduw geergu gheawung'spa fiih iyeenya, Yosefeeda suguura Barsaba nea ghaawun suuk geguura Yusto, ea Mathiya.
44001024	Ng'atta geamwash Aseetta nea geeyi, “Ng'uttamiida, ang'iing'i ginali guroruunatka buuneessean, asi ahiimneasa aba jeedeaba fiisu assiyeenyean siida iloadi,
44001025	ak gwasin gadiyeeni bea giijasoochcheandumeedean, gawa hoorgeeda ghayi bea Yuuda nung'usa heeda niny ak gawa hich nuut.”
44001026	Ng'atta geeng'alealleesa saawa, ak iiduw gealoat Mattiya; ak gheawungaaschi geeng'oorsiinnyi sea gea giijasoodikka attamwanagiin.
44002001	Iiduw nea nihitta eaweeda Bendegosti, abeeda gwanda fugasean hijagi.
44002002	Deagheatta ghwaanya ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nyashta jeammeeda sharareeda ng'waan, ea ghwanung' ghwannyiit ghooriidida sinda jeedean.
44002003	Gwardu duguuga uurji ng'ushapta beasta, ak goobitpissa uhuumba gilinyooh ea siihi.
44002004	Hean geannyiit sean uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gabalool aba iit nuut aba gidagassiida Gurorooda gwarukutteayda.
44002005	Nea abeada aba Yerusaleemu gwanda Yahuudi fuga bada Aseetta, leabu emoojiga sean bea jeeda ng'eanyiida.
44002006	Hean nea geeyiy ghuutteaba nyeashtida ghabwat geat fuga sang'a nea ghahamng'eanyi sean muuchchi aba gideaba gaba siih iiy nuut nea gabaloola itta gheannyaawa.
44002007	Ak geabeal nea geahamng'eanyi, ak geeyi, “Heappi fiisu seanin siyinnyi nea gabalooldunuun miih fuga ng'eeanyiida Galilaaya?
44002008	Ak ghoawattaan anda geayiinnyi gil was siih nea gabaloola iitta ghaheanya?
44002009	Fuga ng'eanyida Partiya, ea Meedi, ea Elaami, ea fuga abiitta Mesopottamiya, Yudeeya ea Gabadokkiya, Boonto ea Asia,
44002010	ea gealeabu Frugia ea Bamfiliya, ea Misri, ea gealeabu murdajeega Libya, ea gea leabu Kirene, ea rabasta leabu ng'eanyiida Ruumi, sea fuga Yahuudi ea gea niyamwa ghoaw fuga diineeda Yahuudi,
44002011	fuga Grette ea fuga Araabiya, geayiinnyi nea gabaloola sean iitta ghaheanya gadiyoojiga heas bea Aseetta.”
44002012	Hean ghahamng'enyi sean nea ghang'ut muuwda, nea gaba siisi anyaash nuut nea geeyi, “Seh ng'asheanji naaha?”
44002013	Hean gwanda fuga juuga suurja nea geeyi, “Fiisu niboogit aba difaayeeda heesseadi.”
44002014	Ghang'eat Betro ghaminaada sea giijasoodigiga attamanaagin, ak ghwajaat ghuttannyi gorgweaksa buuneeda nea gwayeashsha, “Ea fuga Yudeeya ea buuneessean abiitta Yerusaleemu, geagasayi anala ng'asheesu, ak golleysiiniit ng'asheegeasu ak ghoanalli nea ghoayiinnyi iidigeagwa ng'asheasu
44002015	Aba gideaba fiisu miigaboagit, aba gidoorarji, aba gideaba ghwasan ghamneawa nea aseetta gutgaba samwagu bea sakteayda;
44002016	niih deaghayi rugu sibaneeda sugura Yoeli,
44002017	‘Nea aba askwearjoojiga huydean gaygwasnu, gwayi Aseetta, gaydadaw buuneassean Guroroodeanyu, ak dibigeagwa was balloojiga ea haweega, gayghwaramoaran ak gheareemangeagwa gayghwadaah girgweatka, nea gweargweagwa gaygoorgweadi girgweatka;
44002018	eara soomjoogeasu was headiga ea gweallajeega askweajoojikka gaydeadabearsa Guroroodeanyu; ak gayghwaramoaran.
44002019	Ak gaydahiimu deamdeamanga, aba humng'eeda, ea gwadeagooda aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean, foojeanda, ea beasta, ea aroosta haw;
44002020	ak gayghwayamwa aseetta gamsaniit, ak ghwayamwa sheeda ea ghawaar foojeanda, damanda miighwahinna eaweedida bea Ng'uttamiidean, eaweetta biissa ahaw ak adaajiin
44002021	Ak abeeda siida wassean nyooh gaguursa gheawunga Ng'uttamiida gajeelealu.’
44002022	“Fuga Israeeli, olleeysiina iit ng'asheesu: Yeesuuyda Nasareetti, was siida muuwwuneegwa Aseetta aba gadiyoojiga hees ea deamdeamanga ea gwadeagwajeega ghayi sin Aseetta appadaydaannyi aba dageascheedeang'wa, gawuurji gidoanaldi agooga,
44002023	Yeesuheeni siyaat humng'eeda aba gidabay ghwanalda Aseetta, ak goongoorji ak goonuuschi aba geattinga fuga munyas.
44002024	Ak siisi iiduw gooduudu Aseetta, nea gageandeawa sawanadeeda miyeeda, aba gideaba niny moammu ghoang'ng'waay miyeeda.
44002025	Aba gideaba gwayi Dawdi appadaydaannyi, ‘Aniini iissa ghaadaayi Ng'uttamiida aba madeedeanyu, aba gideaba niny gwanda meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa ak abeeda ea meettuumduuman;
44002026	aba sarean gang'weela guroroodeanyu, nea gahoosan ng'ushapteanyu; nea ghwaraanya saseedeanyu gaygoobiida jeeda rarooda.
44002027	Aba gideaba maynung'siina guroroodeanyu heeda maloonghajeega, ghana nung' ghaghaarshan Siidaang'u Ghaydit.
44002028	Ak ea ninung' danal naweadinga eaweega; nea ginnyiichchaan ng'weellooda aba iisindeayi.'"
44002029	“Fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi darukuneegwa nea geang'achchi idigeagwa aba ng'asheega ararji ghayi nyas sugoochcheanda siyi Daudi, niny ghayi ghami ak geebuy, ak bung'eadannyi gwanda hiji bea ng'eang'deanyean ea ghoaw ghamneawa.
44002030	Amaduw nea ghoaw sibaneeda, ghwanal gideaba Aseetta niyaak habeawooda appadaydeaba niny gideaba gayghwayiin hoorgeadannyi siida jea gwaleabu jattannyi,
44002031	gabean ghwadaah ak gabaloola duunnooda Gristo, ea gideaba niny miyeenung'usa Gheeda Maloonghajeega, nea saseadaannyi ea miih goomealu.
44002032	Yeesuheeni gooduudu Aseetta, ak aba ng'asheanji geewoschi muushoodiga.
44002033	Nea geettiing'da ea ghwahitta meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, iiduw nea ninyas aba heeda Bwaabwa helleesiinda Gurorooda Ghaydit, ng'atta goodalealsa gitta oadaayi nea ghoayiinnyiin.
44002034	Aba gideaba Dawdi niny miigwadiyeada ea gawa humng'eeda; aba gideaba gwayi niy, ‘Ng'uttamiida gwayeeshsha: Ng'uttamiideanyu, Apteadawana meatkweedeanyu bea geattinda dugwa,
44002035	ea danung' ghoaw weajoodigaagu hoorgeeda geeshangaagu.’
44002036	Fuga sean bea gheennyea Israeeli, gammiissa ghwanal aba huumwa gideaba Aseetta ninung' ghoaw Yeesuheeni ghayi ongoorjiin Ng'uttamiida ea Gristo.”
44002037	Ak ghwayiy buuneeda ng'asheesu ak gwasawana guroruunatka nyaawa, hean geennyaash Betro ea giijasoodiga suurja nea geeyeeshsha, “Fuga siduupcheewi, gajeasina naaha?”
44002038	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aduukkuunana, giliwas siih geeppaattiisananeegwa gheawunga Yeesu Gristo aba samsiinda ring'eegeagwa; ak gegooneegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.
44002039	Aba gideaba helleesiinda deang'wa gil ea diibigeagwa ea buuneessean sheagachchi, gilinyooh ea siih gil jea gaguursa Ng'uttamiideanya was Aseetta.”
44002040	Ng'atta gamuuwwu aba ng'asheega suuk saang'a nea ghamiin gheanyanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Alealni geat aba seaygeeni munyasiin.”
44002041	Hean fukka mwas ng'asheandaannyiin geeppattiisan, ak ghoahaada eaweettida fiih sagalamnyooji samwagu.
44002042	Ak goodeaga geat ginealshooda giijasoodiga nea gabareannyi, aba banachta mukkatte ea mooshta Aseetta.
44002043	Iiduw ghwanyas giliwas siih muuwda; ng'atta geesin ng'asheega hees ea gwadeagwajeega aba geattinga giijasoodiga.
44002044	Ak fuga sean mideawa masaweegean goobiida hijagi ak eara haleanjeennyaawa gekkuuyi;
44002045	inyeessa gaba nishayda haleanjeedaannnyi mideawa ak gwalakkiisa geat ak gaba siisi siittaw gidaga.
44002046	Nea inyeessa galagasean geronnyeesa sean jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea geabwanach mukkatte aba gealga nyaawa, ghwaak hamitta nea gahoosan guroruunatka nyaawa,
44002047	iiduw geduumsheesa Aseetta nea ghabwariy buuneessean. Ak ghwanung' Ng'uttamiida ghoahaada monneeda fuga silealu galeagasean.
44003001	Ng'atta gaweay Betro ea Yohaana gheeda sibatta Aseetta damanda simwaasha Aseetta nea gaba Aseetta shageash.
44003002	Hean geesareenu siida badeeda ng'eada deaghayi sijiila, nea iissa gamuchchu ak geayiin gidaghuutta gheeda sibatta Aseetta suguura Gidaghuutta miy ak gamus haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda aba heeda fuga weay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
44003003	Iiduw nea ghwadaah siidida Betro ea Yohaana nea ghwariikghta gaweay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gamus eattaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
44003004	Ng'atta goohang'ooysa Betro ghaang' niny sea Yohaana, ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ng'ulleassa.”
44003005	Goofursa geaw sawa, nea ghaghayi gilijea ghwanyas gil aba heennyaawa.
44003006	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini meandeawani lappiya ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ak gaydagonnyi gideandeawi; aba ghawunga Yeesu Gristoyda Naasareet, ng'eada ak guwi.”
44003007	Ng'atta ghoang'ng'waay aba geattinda dugwa ak gagatkat ghamiinaada; deagheatta ghwanyas geeshangaaschi ea gheatkweakka geeshangaaschi uurda.
44003008	Gotgweala ng'enyi ak ghaminada ak gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea goodeayi saawa, nea gootkwealeada aba hooseaneega nea gwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
44003009	Nea abeetta ghwadaahaada buuneessean gidaweeda siida, ea gidaduumsheesiinda Aseetta,
44003010	gwajeeng'u buuneeda gideaba niih siidida eawoajusu muusisachchi abiitta ghuutta gheeda sibatta Aseetta sugura, “Gidaghuutta Miyiin; hean ghabeal nea ghahamng'eanyi aba ng'asheega bussa siitta.”
44003011	Damanda neawsiina geaw siidida Betro ea Yohaana, gwasalda buuneessean gaweay heannyaawa aba doodooni sugura doodooda Solomon nea ghahamng'eanyi.
44003012	Daah Betro fugiga goorgweaksa buuneeda, “Ea fuga Israeeli, andagooga ghahameagwa ng'eanyi aba ng'asheanji, ak ghwasaan anda gong'ulleasa, nea ghoaghanyi gideaba siisi ghoahaap uurdeanya ghana doobiiwnatteanya ak geenung' gawa?
44003013	Aseetta Abrahaamu ea Isakka ea Yakkobo, Aseetta ghweenigaasa, nighambiit soomjeandaannyi was Yeesu ak siisi eadeaghayi oyiinnyi geattinga fuga hees gil ak goodardeaysi aba madeeda Bilatto, eara aba damandiida gasa gwasikksina ninyiin.
44003014	Amaduw ghoashaang'nyi dea Ghaydit was dea Assagi Doabiiwaat, ak googasayi siida nuusa buuneeda egooneegwa,
44003015	ak goonuuschi Siitta goona eaweegean, ak gooduudu Aseetta aba jeeda miyeeda. Ak aseasa geawaschi muushoodigeaba ng'asheanji.
44003016	Nea gheawungaaschi, ak aba masaweega aba gheawungaaschi, ea niidaw siisi majeeknatta was siida noadaayi ak ghoanalli; nea masaweekka sinyassa naweeda Yeesuun ea niidaw siida majeeknatta hit aba madeedeang'wa oogasean.
44003017	“Asi ghamneawa, fuga eaduupcheewi, ghoanalli gideaba iissa goosinnyi ng'asheega aba lendeeda, gawuurji gissinda fuga ahaaghwaneegwa.
44003018	Nea ng'asheanda ghayi bay ghwaramoar Aseetta aba ghuusiga sibangaaschi, nea gideaba Gristoheani gaygwasawana gil ak ea nisa.
44003019	Asi aduukkuunana, ak goobiikti ayamni geat, ak abeeda gegeanda ring'eegeagwa, ak abeeda ghwahidu damanda hawdeayda jea gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida,
44003020	ama abeeda goojeagu Gristoyda ghayi siloat appadahuukkeagwa, was Yeesu,
44003021	was dea gasa goobiida humng'eeda ea ghwahitta damanda jea eang'ng'eada ng'asheega sean ghayi rugu Aseetta aba ghuusiga sibangaaschi ghaydidi ghang'eada dea waas.
44003022	Aba gideaba gwayi Muusa, ‘Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gaygageanu sibaneeda aba jeeda fuga oduupcheewi gawuurji gidaloattanaan. Ak gooleeysiit niny aba ng'asheega wassean jea gwarukuneegwa.
44003023	Ak abeeda giliwas siih meeleeysiina iit sibaneeda gajeenuus gwaheelli buuneeda.’
44003024	Nea sibanga sean balool, ng'eada Samweeli ea gea duubu geashtaannyi, earaga gwargu iitteaba askweajoojusu.
44003025	Agooga goowoschi balloojiga sibanga ea helleesiinda ghayi adaw Aseetta ghweanigeagwa, nea gwayeeshsha Abrahaamu, ‘Aba jeattaang'u gayghwanyas fuga sean bea muunda ng'eanyiida ghawooda.’
44003026	Iiduw nea niduudu Aseetta soomjeandaannyi, goojeakta niny gaweesa fuga madeeda, ak abeeda gabadiischeesa giliwas siih aba jeedeang'wa arinnana jeeda munyasnachcheekkeagwa.”
44004001	Damanda duu goorgweaksiina buuneeda, ghapka heannyaawa ashoohoodiga sea shirikkarajeanda haw ng'ula gheeda sibatta Aseetta sea fuga suguura Sadukkayajeega ghapka heannyaawa.
44004002	Gwanyareesi muuchchi aba gideaba ghoanaal buuneeda nea gwarukkwiida gideaba Yeesu niduuna miyeeda.
44004003	Geang'ng'waay saawa ak geehisa ghealooniga ea gamuchchu, aba gideaba niiw shing'ada.
44004004	Nea abeeda fukka saang'a iiy ng'asheesuun ghamwas; nea monneeda headiga ghwahitta sagalamnyooji muut.
44004005	Iimuuchchu ghabwat geat fuga ambaliischi sea gweargwa sea ng'oorshoodiga aba Yerusaleemu,
44004006	seat ashshoochcheanda haw sugura Annasi, ea Gayafa, ea Yohaana, ea Iskaanda, ea fuga sean bea dooshshta ashoohoochcheanda haw.
44004007	Iiduw nea niyiin bugusta nyaawa geannyaash gideaba, “Ngasheesu goosinnyi aba anuur ghana aba gheawungeabeang'a?”
44004008	Ng'atta ghwanyas Betro Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Fuga ambal buuneeda ea gweargwa,
44004009	asi ghamneawa iyoannyashcheasa iitta ng'asheanda miy sisissa siida badeeda, ea gidasihhaapta siida,
44004010	gagasa anala oogasean, sea fuga sean bea Israeeli, aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristoyda Nasareetti, ghayi ongoorji, ak gooduunna Aseetta miyeeda, appadaydeaba niny siisi ghamiinaada aba madeedeang'wa nea majeek.
44004011	Niih lagheaneeda ghayi heawa fuga deekshi, ak ghoaw lagheaneeda washiin sar gheeda.
44004012	Ak ea manda lealeanooda aba hichpa siinnuut, aba gideaba manda gheawun suuk hing'eadayda humng'eeda ghayi siittaw buuneeda jea gwalealneasa.”
44004013	Daah saawa meaynatta Betro sea Yohaana, ak gwajeeng'u gideaba miih ghoassoamwa, fuga geallaan gil, hean ghahamng'eanyi; ak gwajeeng'u gideaba gwandeaydooschi sea Yeesu.
44004014	Iiduw nea ghwadaah siitta siihaabiin nea ghamiinaada aba murdeeda nyaawa, ghwaraay gwarguu gil aba gichchea ghwashaang'da.
44004015	Iiduw nea gwarukusa saawa gideaba aritteawana jeeda girgweageeda, hean goobalool geat saawa nea gwayi,
44004016	“Asi gajeesmana naaha fiisu? Aba gideaba ng'asheanda damdaamwaat sisin aba saawa ak ea nidaajiit aba heeda buuneessean abiitta Yerusaleemu, ak ea meammuusi eashaang'a.
44004017	Iimayghaghayda ng'asheesu muuchchi aba jeeda buuneeda, ghang'wana gereekusi saawa eamabiikta gwarukusa siida wassean aba gheawung'su.”
44004018	Ng'atta gaguursa saawa ak gereekusa saawa ea mabaloolana ghana ghoanaal aba gheawunga Yeesu.
44004019	Ghwalamda Betro ea Yohaana ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi niih humeandea gideaba gajeelleayseagwa iit ak ea mealleysini iit Aseetta asi girgeageeni alaja agooga;
44004020	aba gideaba meammuusi easiinda gajeerukuna iitta gissidaayi ea gissiyiinyi.”
44004021	Hean nea nimuuw saawa, ghwanung'waada gaweay, aba gideaba mwanyasa gheatta gichchea ghwaakta aba ghoorjooda, aba gideaba gwanda hiji buuneeda; aba gideaba gwaduumsheesa buuneessean Aseetta aba ng'asheega bunu.
44004022	Nea abeeda siisi gwachchi sihabin abeatta gweanyeegaaschi ea ninaawa haradam.
44004023	Iiduw nea geettin gaweay heeda fuga duupchi ak gwarukusa saawa gitta gasa ashoohoodiga heesiin ea gweargwa.
44004024	Nea ghwayiiy, gagatkat sean daghanuunatka nyaawa nea googeal heeda Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida Haw, ghayi sin humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda ea haleanjeessean mida jeeda,
44004025	nea aba ghuutta ghweandeanya was Dawdi, was soomjeandaang'u, ak gwargu aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit, ‘Ghwasan anda emoojiga gwanyareesi, anda buuneeda gootteemsheesa haleanjeeda mwadaagha?
44004026	Sugoodiga ng'eanyiida nijip geat, nea fuga ambaliischi ea nubwatgeat, ak ghaheawa Ng'uttamiida ak ghaheawa eara dea simmwaar,’
44004027	nea aba huumwa jeedeaba mujiineeni gabattiisa geat fuga heawa soomjeandaang'u ghaydit was Yeesu, was dea ghayi imwaari, sean Heroode sea Bontiyo Bilatto, sea fuga emoojiga ea fuga Israeeli,
44004028	ak gwasin gidawassean ghayi bean gagasa geattindaang'u ea fughareadaang'u gideaba gaygwasa.
44004029	Asi ghamneawa, Ng'uttamiida, ng'ulla gimuuwda nyaawa, ak giidawi soomjoagaagu ak gwarukkwiida ng'asheandaang'u aba meaynatta sean,
44004030	ak giihaakti geattindaang'u ak ghoahaap siida, nea gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga iissa geesin aba gheawunga soomjeandaang'u ghaydit was Yeesu.”
44004031	Iiduw nea sihhit mooshta Aseetta, gwadumdum heeda gwachcha bassa geat; ak gaba niih sinnyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwarukwiida giijasta miy bea Aseetta aba meaynatta.
44004032	Nea ghamneawa bareannyeedeaba fukka ghayi mwasiin gaba guroroanagi ak ghanyea manda siida ayi haleanjeessean mideawa ghanyea maygwayi geasu, niih abeeda saawa goobareannyi haleanjeessean.
44004033	Iiduw gaweay giijasoodiga nea gwandeawa uurda haw muuchchi ak gamuuwwu iitta duunnooda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak ghwanyas sean dagheerjeandumeeda haw.
44004034	Ak ea manda eara siisi gasa gil aba jeannyaawa, aba gideaba fuga mideawa madammeega ghana gealga gayghwashaayda, ak gweadu lappiyeetta bea gidasishaaydaan,
44004035	ak lappiyeetta geayiin geattinga giijasoodiga; ak iiduw geallaja gaba niisiittaw gidagasa.
44004036	Nea Yoseefooda ng'assa giijasoochcheanda gheawunga siyigheawunga siyi Barnaba (nea gideaba, Balleanda jea goomajeek gil), nea niny ea siida Laawi, siida ng'eanyiida Gupro,
44004037	ng'atta ghwashaayda madamnyeanda was daannyi, ak gweadu lappiya ak ghwayiin geeshanga giijasoodiga.
44005001	Ghayi gwanda siisi suguura Ananiya ak gwandeawa gatmoodaannyi suguura Safira, ghwashaayda haleanjeeda nyaawa mwaatkwa,
44005002	iiduw nea ghwanal gatmoadaannyi ghafuy haleanjeeda mwaatkwa, ak gweadu mwaatkwa ak ghwayiin geattinga giijasoodiga.
44005003	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ananiya ghwasaan andaginung' goobal guroroadaang'u Shattaani ea ghwanung' reenganna Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gifunyi haleanjeeda mwaatkwa bea madamnyeandean?
44005004	Madamnyeanda damanda miih shaaydaawana, abeeda miih daang'u? Ama ning'atta sheaydeayda, abeeda haleanjeeda ea manda geattingaagu? Abeeda ginyastiin gideaba gaysina ng'asheanji aba jeeda guroroadaang'u? Ang'iing'i mireenganni buuneeda gireenganayi Aseetta.”
44005005	Iiy Ananiya ng'asheesu, ghoabeada ak ghami. Hean iiyi buneessean ghabeal muchchi.
44005006	Ng'atta ghapka ghearemmanga ak geakwealsa hang'da ak geerutta jarooda ak geayat eebuy.
44005007	Iiduw nea ning'atta roobuut samwagu bea aseetta ghwahidu gatmoadaannyi jeeda gheeda, nea mwanala gidanupnu.
44005008	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Betro gatmooda, “Rukunean monneeda oashaaydaawi madamnyeanda gwandeenu?” Gwayeeshsha gatmooda, “Ea gwadeenu.”
44005009	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha gatmooda, “Ghoanyastiin gideaba gajahelleesiina duwaawi ak goosimnyi Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida? Ng'ulla, geeshanga fuga buy siyeadaang'u gwanda gidaghuut, ak gaygooruuttaneey jarooda earang'iing'i.”
44005010	Deagheatta goobeedeaysa ng'eanyi madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghami. Yamu geat gheareemanga ghwahidu nea nimi, ak geeruutta jarooda ak geebung'sa murdeeda siyeadaannyi.
44005011	Iiduw ghang'ut muwda haw muuchchi ganiiseeda sean ea fuga sean iiy iitteaba ng'ashsheesu.
44005012	Gwadeagwajeega saang'a ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi geesissa bugusta buuneeda nea gwasin geattinga giijasoodiga. Nea abeeda abwadageat sean aba Dodooda Sulemaani.
44005013	Ak ea manda aba jeedeaba fukka siida badaksa guyeedeaba fukka, amaduw ghoang'ng'waay buuneeda muuchchi ak gwasissa mureeda.
44005014	Ghoahaada muuchchi fuga mwas ak gooheadeesa Ng'uttamiida, emeetuw headiga ea gadeemga,
44005015	ea iissa eeyibwak ea easar fuga miyeani eayiin gheatkweakka naweadinga, ak geanung' gwalil appadahuukka bulaleenga ea likkajeega, ama abeeda hidu Betro earaghanyi goojiroon jirooneadaannyi buuneeda mwaatkwa.
44005016	Ghabat geat fuga leabu mujiinajeega neaweesa Yerusaleemu, nea gweadu fuga miyeani ea fuga beardooschi meangeenda, ak geahaap sean.
44005017	Ng'atta ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw sea fuga sean mideawa, nea fuga mwaatkwa was Sadukkayajeega, hean gwashissa ghaang'
44005018	ghoang'ng'waay giijasoodiga ak geayiin ghealooniga.
44005019	Iiduw eawa ghwahidu malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida ak goottin gidaghuutta gheeda ghealooniga; ak goruutta jarooda ak gwayeeshsha,
44005020	“Aweayeena ak ghoominaadi aba jeeda gheeda Sibatta Aseetta ak gooruksi buuneeda ng'asheega sean bea eaweesuun.”
44005021	Iing'atta nea niyiiy ng'asheesu, muchchu gaweay jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta askweari ak goonealshi. Ng'atta ghwahidu ashoohoochcheanda haw sea fuga mideawa ak gaguursa gweargwa girgweada ea fuga sean argweaji bea Israeeli, ak goojeakta gaweay ghealooniga gweadu fukka.
44005022	Hitta fukka heesiin, ea mwanyasana saawa ghealooniga, gwayamu geat ak ghoadaw iitta, nea gwayeeshsha,
44005023	“Geehissi ghooriidida siratiisa buneedean nea radaat nea furiischoodiga ghamiinaada aba gidaghuudajeega, ama siittinnyi ea meanyasani eara siih.”
44005024	Iiy shirikkarajeanda haw ambal gheeda sibatta Aseetta sea ashoohoochcheanda haw ng'asheesu, ghahamng'eanyi appadahuukka nyaawa, nea gwayeena ng'asheesu gayghoaw naaha.
44005025	Deagheatta ghwahidu siih aba geshangiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Fugigeanji heetta oojaksi ghealoonigean, ghamneawa gwanda jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghwannaal buuneeda.”
44005026	Ghang'eat shirikkarajeanda haw nea goodeay shirikkareadaannyi ak gaweay ama hitta geeyeadu saawa nea meang'ng'wanyana uurda, aba gideaba ghoawal ea mafutteewana buuneeda lagheanga.
44005027	Iiduw nea siyeadu saawa, geanung' ghamiinaada aba madeeda girgweageeda. Ak ghoang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw ghoanyaash nea gwayeeshsha,
44005028	“Ghwasaan nea geaheawi gideaba gajoannaala buuneeda aba gheawung'su, ak ghamneawa ea noannyiichchi Yerusaleemu ginealshoodeang'wa aba gideaba googasay ayeanni foojeandeaba siisi badahuukkaasa.”
44005029	Ghwalamda Betro sea giijasoodiga ak gwayeeshsha, “Gamiiseasa gideaba gajeawwala gheang'da Aseetta mwasamwa siida.
44005030	Aseetta ghweanigaasa gooduudu Yeesuuyda ghayi onuuschi aba damanda ongoorsiini uhuuda geettean.
44005031	Niih deaghayi adiing'u Aseetta gil ak gawa geattindaannyi bea dugwa ak ghoaw siida haw ea lealnoochcheanda, ak ghwanung' gwaduukuuna fuga Israeeli ak geesamsa ring'eega.
44005032	Aseasa geewoschi muushoodigeaba ng'asheesu, ak gwasnu eara Gurorooda Ghaydit adaw Aseetta fukkeanji sissa niny mureedean.”
44005033	Iiy fukkeanji ng'asheesu gwanyareesi muuchchi, ea gagasa gwanuus saawa.
44005034	Hean gwanda Farasayajeanda girgweageeda suguura Gamaliyeeli, was ginealshoochcheanda deaweeda, adawi buuneessean mureeda, ng'atta ghamiinaada ak ghwanung' erruutta buuneeda jarooda gilinuwaas.
44005035	Ama ng'atta gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Ea fuga Israeeli, ang'ulla muuchchi gichchea ahinda fiisu.
44005036	Nea damanda miih ghwahinna askwearjoojiga ghang'eat Dewdas, nea ghoahiimu geaw gideaba niny gili, nea niny gaba jeedeaba fukka, ramagu ghwahitta bughalaji ang'waniin, hit godeayi sea niny; amaduw gealach gheatta sea fuga sean aat geeshta ak geattaarda ea ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha.
44005037	Iing'atta niny ghwahidu Yuudayda was siida Galilaayaan aba askwearjoojikka bea iittooda buneedean ak ghwaat buuneeda mwaatkwa; ak eara niny ghami, nea fuga sean aat geeshta ghwadarda.
44005038	Asi aba damani bea ghamneawean gaydayeeshshiineegwa, ohhelleewana geat fiisu ak ghoanung'waadi; aba gideaba badiini ghana fughareani ibea buuneeda, gayghoabeada;
44005039	ama iileabu heeda Aseetta, ea mwajoommuusa abwaanya fiisu aba gideaba gajiiduw geejeeng'u gideaba gosheang'nyeewi Aseetta!”
44005040	Ng'atta geesin gidagasa, iiduw nea geeguursa giijasoodiga, geabwar amahit geeruksa gideaba adagudoannalli buuneeda aba gheawunga Yeesu, iiduw geesiksa gaweay.
44005041	Gwaritta ak ghang'amwa madeeda girgweageeda, nea gahoosan aba gideaba gamiissa sawanadeeda aba gheawunga Yeesu.
44005042	Nea galeagasean iissa aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea aba ghoah ea miih ghwanung'waada ginealshooda ea rukkwiideayda Yeesu gideaba Gristohi.
44006001	Nea aba askweajoojisu ea niihaada monneeda ginealanga, ng'atta ghoaptu giniikghta dageascheeda fuga Yahuudi baloola iitta Yunaani sea fuga Ebraniya aba gideaba ninung'usa heeda masiinung'weega nyaawa aba lakkiisiinda haleanjeedeaba galeagasean.
44006002	Hit gaguursa fukka attamaniyyeenyean ginealanga sean nea gwayeeshsha, “Mwahida gideaba gajeanung'waada rukkwiideayda ng'asheanda Aseetta ak geeppiitpiichchi aba badahuukka measajeega.
44006003	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, aloada fiih ispwa aba jeedeaba fiisu miyaas searoojiin, mideawa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak ea weaghoodi, ak gajeettaw gadiyeani.
44006004	Ak aseasa gajeamwaasha Aseetta nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda ng'asheanda.”
44006005	Nea ng'asheanda rugu goohoosan emeettuw, ak ghwaloat Stefaano, siida mideawa masaweega muuchchi ak gwandeawa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ea Filippo, ea Burokkoro, ea Nikkano, ea Diino, ea Barmeenas, ea Nikkola, was siida doabiiwaat bea ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya.
44006006	Ng'atta geayaat fiisu madeeda giijasoodiga, ak ghamwaash Aseetta nea ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheenga nyaawa.
44006007	Ghaghayda ng'asheanda Aseetta; nea ghoahaada muuchchi monneeda ginealanga aba Yerusaleemu, nea ashoohoodiga saang'a gwasissa mureeda masaweega.
44006008	Nea Stefaano, abeeda gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda ea uurda, gwasna ng'asheega deamdeameadi ea gwadeagwajeega aba jeeda buuneeda.
44006009	Iiduw gwanda fuga mwaatkwa bea gheeda sinnealshachcheewa bea fuga abalgeat (aba gidasuguura), ea gea Greene, ea gea Aleksandariya, ea fukka leabu Gilikkiya ea Asiyan, hean ghoaptu sheang'nyeeda sea Stefaano.
44006010	Ak ea meammu eajoar aba weaghuumeeda adaw Gurorooda ak ghwanung' gabaloolliin.
44006011	Ng'atta geahaak buuneeda aba makcheameeda, nea gwayi, “Siyiinyi siisi nea gwargu ng'asheega ging'weakka appadayda Muusa ea Aseetta.”
44006012	Ak geng'ng'uuchchi buuneeda ea gweargwa ea ng'oorshoodiga, hean geeweesa niny ak geeng'ng'waay ak geeyaat madeeda gheeda sirgweachcha,
44006013	geesin muushoodiga ng'uyyeega ak gwayeeshsha, “Siisi moang'ng'wa ea marukuna ng'asheega munyas appadaydeaba hiji ghaydidiin ea deaweeda;
44006014	aba gideaba siyiinyi nea gwayi, Yeesuheani bea Nasareettiin gaygwanyarja gheawi sibatta Aseettean, ak gayghwayam searoojiga ghayi gooneasa Muusa.”
44006015	Asi gang'ula buuneessean niny, nea fuga sean mida jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ghwadaah gideaba gheamamdaannyi gawuurji sea gheamamda malaykajeanda.
44007001	Ghwalamda ashoohoochcheanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ng'asheesu huumwa?”
44007002	Ghwasha Stefano ak gwayeeshsha, “Fugeaduupcheewi ea ghweanigeasu, oleeysean iit. Aseetta ghaambiidaat ghayi gabussiinnyi sea ghweandeanya was Abrahaamu, damanda mideewa ng'eanyiida Mesopottamiya, nea miih gawa goobiida Haraani,
44007003	ak gwayeeshsha niny, ‘Ng'eada ng'amwana hiji bea ng'eanyiidaang'uun ak ginung'usi heeda eara fugaagu ak guwi ng'eanyiida jea daahiimneay.’
44007004	Ghang'eat ghang'amwa ng'eanyiida eemeeda siyi Galdayu, ak gawa goobiida Haraani. Iiduw nea ning'atta miyeeda ghwaan, goobaleaga Aseetta ng'eanyiidida ak ghwahidu ghamway ng'eanyiin ghamneawa ondiini;
44007005	ak ea moadawa hearaniischooda aba ng'eanyiitta, eara hiji ayang'da baneakta geeshta, ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gayghoadaw niny ak ghoaw daannyi sea diibigaaschi jea gweadu geeshteaba niny, earappeadi mandeawana jeepta.
44007006	Hit goobalool Aseetta damandida nea gwayeeshsha, diibigaagu rabasta aba ng'eanyiida ambal fiih suuk, ak aba hooweanji gajeenung' ghoaw ging'gn'oonyanga ak ghwanyas sawanadeeda gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan.
44007007	‘Ak aniini gaydeargweaksa emeeda gadiyeesa,’ aba girrugu Aseetta, ‘nea iing'atta hiji gaygwarinna jeannyaawa ak ghaghadoawan aba hiji.’
44007008	Ak ghoadaw niny neajeeda ghasmeahooda. Ak ghoaw Abrahaamu ghweanda Isakka, ak ghwaat niny ghasmeahooda eaweetteaba sis; ak ghoaw Isakka ghweanda Yakkobo, nea Yakkobo ghoaw ghweandeaba oorjookka attamaniyyeenyean.
44007009	“Nea balloojisu inyeesa gwashissa ghaang' Yoseefu, ak geeshaayda aba ng'eanyiida Misri; nea Aseetta gwandeayi sea niny,
44007010	ak gwalealna jeeda sawanaduutkaaschi sean, ak ghoadaw alooheeda ea weaghumeeda aba madeeda Faraoyda was sugoochcheanda ng'eanyiida Misri, ak ghwanung' ghoaw sugoochcheanda haw bea ng'eanyiidida Misri ea fugeaba gheannyi.
44007011	Iiduw ghang'eat geejeeda ng'waan aba ng'eanyiida Misri ea ng'eanyiida Ganaani, ea sawanadeeda haw, ak eara ghweanigaasa ea ning'assa hamitta.
44007012	Iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta Yakkobo gideaba ng'eanyiida Misri gwanda booga, goojeakta ghweanigaasa aba ng'eetta madeeda.
44007013	Iiduw nea gabiikta gabareessa deaba iyyenya gwarukuta geawi Yoseefu aba heeda oorjooga ghaamwat ak eara Farao ghwanal oorjookeenyea Yoseefu.
44007014	Goojeaksa Yoseefu Yakkoboyda was ghwaan ea fukgheenyaawa sean, fiih laadam ea damana muut;
44007015	ghang'eat Yakkobo gawa ng'eanyiida Misri. Ak gameewsa, niny sea ghweanigaasa,
44007016	iiduw geasar eakghuumda Shekkemu ak geebung'sa jeeda bung'eetta ghayi shaaha Abrahaamu lappiyeeda mida monneeda aba heeda balloojiga Hamori mida ng'eanyiida Shekkemun.
44007017	“Iiduw nea nineekkiit damanda heelleesiinda ghayi adaw Aseetta Abrahaamu, ghoahaada monneeda buuneeda ea ghwadarda aba ng'eanyiida Misri
44007018	ea eeyibwak ea goombal ng'eanyiida Misri sugoochcheanda nuut mwanala Yoseefu.
44007019	Ak gwasiissa fuga ng'eanyiideanya seareeda muy ak gwasissa eara ghweanigaasa ng'asheega munyas, aba gideaba gwading'sa ghweanigaasa gwahissa diibiga nyaawa manang'i jarooda, ea meabiidana ng'eanyiida.
44007020	Muusa abeeda geeji damani ak ea jeepta miy aba madeeda Aseetta. Geereersa gheanyaawa sheah samwagu;
44007021	iiduw nea geeruutta jarooda ghwanyas hudeaba Farao ak ghoarear ea gwaheedu nea ghoaw balleandaannyi.
44007022	Muusa iiduw geenaal weaghumeeda sea fuga ng'eanyiida Misri, ak ghwanyas uurda aba baloaldaannyi ea sinaweagaaschi.
44007023	“Geeyibwak ama ahiitta gweannyeew haradam, gagasa aba guroroadaannyi gawa ghwadaah fuga duupchi was balloojiga Israeeli.
44007024	Ghwadaah siyagi nea geabwar, hean gawa ghaweat siitta sisawaniin, ak iiduw ghawalda mureandooda ak gwanus siitta bea Misriin.
44007025	Niny abeeda ghaghayi gideaba fugaaschi duupchi gaygwajeeng'u gideaba Aseetta niyeadu siida jea gwalealu aba geattindaannyi ak ea majeeng'na.
44007026	Iimuchchu eaweeda bassa ghwadaa fiih iyyeenya bea Israeeli nea gabearji hean gawa gooheel ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Agooga gowaschi oorjoospwa gheawagi, iijea gwaybwak ea abearjeena.’
44007027	Ng'atta ghang'eat oorjeeda gwachi bwar giischeewoochcheandaannyi ak gwajakta nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghwayiinyi ng'eaha gadiyeani bea gimbaliischoodean ea gideaba guwasi siida jea gooheeldooscheesa.
44007028	Gigasayi nuustanean gida heetta inuusti siidida bea ng'eanyiida Misriini?’
44007029	Iyiy ng'asheesu Muusa gamng'aw, ak ghoaw mang'aweannyeanda aba ng'eanyiida Midiyaani, goobiida hoowa ea gwaji ballooji iyyeenya.
44007030	“Ng'atta gweanyeew haradam goobeersa Muusa malaykajeanda aba jeeda dareapcheeda neekeewa giijeeda Sinayi, aba ng'ushapta beasta yeada jeeda murunjooda.
44007031	Daah Muusa ghahamng'eanyi aba hoowa; iiduw nea gwaneekkiisa gang'ula ghwanya ghuutta Ng'uttamiida,
