44007032	‘Aniini geawaschi Aseetta ghweanigeagwa, ak geawoschi Aseetta Abrahaamu, ea dea Isakka dea ea Yakkobo.’ Hean ghabeal Muusa muuchchi ea ghabwaadan ea ea mutghoammu gang'ula.
44007033	Gwayeeshsha, Ng'uttamiida niny, ‘Fakta geakkaagu aba geeshangaagu aba gideaba hiji imiinaadawiiniin ng'eanyiida ghaydit gil.
44007034	Aba huumwa naadaay ng'asheega munyas sisma fugeasu aba ng'eanyiida Misri ak ea naayiinyi shookka nyaawa, ak ghaawunnyi dalealu. Asi ghamneawa beenni gaydeajeaktaneey Misri.’
44007035	Muusa niih deaghayi siheawa, nea geeyeeshsha, ‘Ghwanung' ng'eaha huwa siida ambaliischi nea giheeldooschi buuneeda?’ Aseetta iiduw goojeakta ghoaw siida ambaliischi ea lealnoochcheanda aba geattinda malaykajeanda bussiinnyi aba jeeda murunjooda.
44007036	Niih deaghayi aruuna buuneeda ng'eanyiida Misri gil, nea gwasin gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi aba ng'eanyiida Misri, ea aba jeeda Basoodareara, ea jeeda dareapcheeda gweanyeew haradam.
44007037	Niih Muusa dea ghayi eeshsha fuga Israeeli, ‘Aseetta gaygoojeakseegwa sibaneeda jea gawuurjeaweani ak siisi gaygwaleabu jeeda fuga oduupcheewi.’
44007038	Siisi niih dea ghayi mideawa buuneeda aba dareapcheeda gil sea malaykajeanda abalool niny aba uhuuda Giijeeda Sinayi, sea ghweanigaasa; ak geattaw ng'asheega mideawa eaweega jea gagoaneasa.
44007039	“Ak ghaheawa ghweanigaasa gwasissa niny mureeda, geasach ghoaw gidamwadaagha, ng'atta gagasa guroruunatka nyaawa gabiikta Misri,
44007040	Iiduw geeyeeshsha Aroon, ‘Sinneasa aseechcheekka jea goosheedeawaneasa; aba gideaba meanali gidanibussa Muuseeda ghayi aruuneasa ng'eanyiida Misri.’
44007041	Iiduw geesin meayda aba askwearjoojikka, amahit geattaw lukghamajeega gidamawosa Aseetta nea geesin ghweelmeeda hean gahoosassa gadiyoojiga geattinga nyaawa.
44007042	Iiduw ghwayam Aseetta ak ghwanung' ghabwat miinga humng'eeda, gawuurji gissung'waarda aba jeeda gittaabooda sibanga: ‘Neada haleanjeeda onnuuseadi ea lukghumajeega gogonnyeani, gweannyeew haradam aba dareapcheeda, Ea gheeh Israeeli?
44007043	Agooga ghayi ghoasareannyi maheemajeanda Molokki, ea ming'weanda aseetteang'wa suguura Refani, ea gidaghayi osinnyi ak ghoabwachchi; ak gaydeabaleageegwa ea dasuudeagwa ng'eanyiida Babiloni.’
44007044	Ghwanigaasa ghayi gwandeawa maheemajeanda muwwunooda aba dareapcheeda, ak gawuurji siitta ghayi abalool Muusa sgideaba sina, gawuurji gidaghayi daakta.
44007045	Iiduw ghoang'ng'waanyaan ghwanigaasa ea ghwahitta damanda Yoshuwa isihoan emoojiga aruutta Aseetta ammadeeda ghwanigaasa. Ak geang'ng'waanyaan ea ghwahitta damanda Dawdi,
44007046	ghayi nyas alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetta ak gamus beatta gawa gagasa heechchea goobiida Aseetta Yakkobo.
44007047	Ak siida iiduw deeksa gheeda ea Sulemaani.
44007048	“Nea Aseetta haw ghanyea meabiitteena jeeda gheeda sideasa geattinga; gawuurji ginnyaashta sibaneeda,
44007049	‘Humng'eeda hoorgeedeanyu bea gheambalmeeda, nea ng'eanyiida ea hoorgeeda geeshangeasu. Ana ghaaw gil dea jea adeeknean, aba ginnyah Ng'uttamiida, ghana gwanda yeenu hoorgeedeanyu jea dafuufa?
44007050	Ak ea masna geattindeanyu haleanjeeni seaniini?’
44007051	“Ea fuga hang'oonyi iheen, miyeeyaat ghasmeahooda guroruunatka nyaawa ea iidiga, iissa galeagasean ghoattealli Gurorooda Ghaydit. Gawuurji gidaghayi sinda ghweanigeagwa, earagooga goosindunu.
44007052	Aba jeeda sibanga gajea anneeda gil dea miih ghaghabwas ghweanigeagwa? Ak genuuseada fukka ghayi rugu ammwadiin hinnooda siida Doabiiwaat assagi, was dea ghayi osawannyi ak goonuuschi,
44007053	agoogeeda noang'ng'waannyi deaweeda gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneegwa malaykajeanda ak ghanyea miih ghoang'ng'waay.”
44007054	Ng'atta nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu gwanyareesi nea goowiiri geeshatka nyaawa appadaydaannyi.
44007055	Iiduw nea niny ea ninyiit Gurorooda Ghaydit, gang'ula humng'eeda ak ghwadaah gigheambiitta Aseetta, nea Yeesu ghamiinaada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta;
44007056	Ak gwayi, “Ang'ulla, ghaadaayi humng'eeda nea ghwajaada, nea Balleanda Siida ghamiinaada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.”
44007057	Goojur muuchchi ea gwadukuta iidiga nyaawa ak geedeambiirsa sean ak geang'ng'waay.
44007058	Geeruutteawa jeeda mujiini ak geefta lagheanga; ak gageanu muuwshoodiga ghwayiin hang'weakka nyaawa geattinga balleanji suguura Sauli.
44007059	Damani sifutteewa Stefaano lagheangean, ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, deabwa guroroodeanyu.”
44007060	Ng'atta gwatkuy ak ghoahawda nea gwayi, “Ng'uttamiida, adiiduw ginung' ghwanyas fiisu ring'eani.” Iiduw nea niihiit ng'asheesu, ghami.
44008001	Ak ghamwas Sauli miyeadaannyi. Nea aba eaweettida ghwanyas ganiiseeda mida Yerusaleemu ghabasta haw; ak ghwadarda sean aba jeeda ng'eanyiida Yuudeeya sea Samariya, ea eaghus giijasoodiga.
44008002	Iiduw gaweay fuga mwas Aseetta gabuy Stefaano, ak gaguuttu heareega muuchchi.
44008003	Aba damandideani Saulo gagasa gwanyarja ganiisa, aba gideaba iissa gawa jeemba giliwas ghoah ak gooruutta jarooda headiga ea gadeemga ak ghwayiin ghealooniga.
44008004	Iiduw fukkeanji dardaawaadiin gaweay gwarukwiida ng'asheanda.
44008005	Gawa Filippo mujiineeda Samariya ak gwarukwiisa saawa ng'asheega Gristo.
44008006	Ng'atta gooleeysiit emeetuw ginyaah Filippo, nea geadaah ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin.
44008007	Aba gideaba gwarinna meangeenda munyas jeeda fuga saang'a ghayi ninyas, ak goojuur aba ghuutta haw; ak eara fuga saang'a abiittu damealgean ghana fuga badoojiga geahhaap.
44008008	Hean gehoosan muuchchi aba mujiineedida.
44008009	Ghayi abeetta gwanda siisi suguura Simon ghayi ammwadi was beeneekweanda aba mujiineetta ea ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi fuga ng'eanyiida Samariya, nea gwayi aniini geawaschi siida haw.
44008010	Inyeessa niny gooleeysiit muuchchi buuneeda, ghang'eada siida mwanang' ea ghoaw gea hees, nea geeyeenna, “Siisi uurda Aseetta suguura uurda haw.”
44008011	Ng'atta gelleeysa iit muuchchi aba gideaba nigeawiit inyeessa ghwanung' ghahamng'eanyi buuneeda aba beneetkweandumeadaannyi.
44008012	Hean nea ghamwas buuneeda giijasta miy bea Filippo bea badayda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta ea gheawunga Yeesu Gristo, geeppattiisan sean, headiga ea gadeemga.
44008013	Simon eara niny iiduw ghamwas, ng'atta giibattiisandaannyi hean goodeayi Filippo. Ak ghwadaah ng'asheega deamdeameadi ea gwadeagwajeega hees sisin, ak ghahamng'eanyi.
44008014	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy giijasoodigiga mida Yerusaleemuun gideaba fuga Samariya nimwas ng'asheega Aseetta, geechcheakta saawa Betro ea Yohaana,
44008015	gaweay ama hitta ghwamwaash Aseetta appadahuukka nyaawa gideaba gagasa ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit;
44008016	aba gideaba aba damandida miigwashuubeesa siih aba jeannyaawa, gabeachchi gideaba geeppattiisan aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
44008017	Ng'atta ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheengeaba fukkeanji ak ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.
44008018	Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u Simon gideaba Gurorooda geenyasa iiyiin giijasoodiga geattinga nyaawa buuneeda, hean gageanu ghoadaw lappiya,
44008019	nea gwayeeshsha, “Agooneani eara aniini uuri ak abeeda siida nyooh dayiin geattindeanyu uhuudaannyi ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
44008020	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Roossiina hoowa ea lappiyeedaang'u, aba gideaba gighayi gilijea nyasa gidaguu Aseetta aba lappiya!
44008021	Ak ang'iing'i ea mibwaheasa nea meebareannyeeni aba ng'asheanji, aba gideaba guroroadaang'u mwadoabiiwa aba madeeda Aseetta.
44008022	Asi duukkuunana searoojusu ikkeagwa munyasiin, ak gumwaashi Ng'uttamiida, immuusi, ak gaygwasamseey aba gidigasayi mida jeeda guroroadaang'uuni.
44008023	Aba gideaba naadaayi gindi jeeda lachng'eanyiida ng'waan ea jeeda ghealooniga appadayda munyinda.”
44008024	Ghwalamda Simon ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyean amwasha Aseetta appadaydeanyu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, ak ea adaghwanyasan gidawassean aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu oorguun.”
44008025	Asi ghamneawa inumuuwwu ng'asheega nyaawa ea rukwiideayda ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, gabiikta Yerusaleemu, ak gwarukwiida gijasta miy aba gharang'weakka saang'a bea ng'eanyiida Samariya.
44008026	Ng'atta gwayeeshsha malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida Filippo, “Ng'eada ak guwi wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara was bwalbwaleeda leabu Yerusaleemu gal Gasa.” Nea naweani ea eeshtearajeanda.
44008027	Ghang'eat ak gawa. Deagheatta ghwadaah siida ng'eanyiida Ettiyoppiya was gulaneeda, ak ea siida haw ambal Gandakehi was sugoochcheanda was gatmooda bea ng'eanyiida Ettiyoppiya, ambal eara maghastaannyi, hean ghwaan Yerusaleemu ghaghadoawan Aseetta
44008028	iiduw nea gabiikta ghoah; gawa goopteada aba badayda muttukkoadaannyi, nea ghoassoamwa gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya.
44008029	Gwayeeshsha Gurorooda Ghaydit Filippo, “Siyeang'da ak guwi ding'da muttukkwajeandida ak gideayeewi.”
44008030	Ghafwach Filippo gawa murdeadaannyi, ak ghwayiiy nea ghoassoamwa siidida gittaabooda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya, ak ghoonyaash, “Heappi, ng'asheesu isoamwaniin ginali?”
44008031	Ghwasha Siidida ak gwayeeshsha, “Gaydanaldaan aniini, nea manda siisi anaalan?” Ak gaguursa siidida Filippo gwading'da ak goobiitpiit sea niny.
44008032	Nea Ng'ooruutka asaamwa geeng'wardunu: “Gawuurji gisilleanda siyaat ealach gheatta gawuurji dayeenda gisilleanda silach buudeega nea ghwasiinda, ak eara niny ea miighwanya ghuutta.
44008033	Geapwaaspwaas ak geaweada gidadoobiiwusa, ng'eaha gil siida jea ghoomu gwargu ng'asheega seaygeedaannyi? Aba gideaba eaweegaaschi sigeandeawa jeeda ng'eanyiida.”
44008034	Ak goobearsa siidida was gulaneedean Filippo, “Heappi sibaneani ghamwaash Aseetta appadaydeabeang'a inyas gwargu ng'asheesuun, gabaloola badaydaannyi ghana baloola badayba siih nuut?”
44008035	Ghang'eat Filippo ghwajaat ghuuttaannyi, nea ghoong'eada ng'ooruussu ak gwarukusa giijasta miy bea Yeesu.
44008036	Iiduw nea geeweay aba naweeda geeyibwak ea eehitta heeda mida beega, gwayeeshsha siidida was gulaneedean, “Hiji gwanda beega! Gwanda gichchea ghoadealan ea meeppattiisani?” [
44008037	Ng'ooruutka suuk bea garayi ghoahaat, Ng'atta gwayeeshsha Filippo, “Iimwasi aba guroroadaang'u sean, gay sina.” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaamwaschi gideaba Yeesu Gristo Balleanda Aseetta.”]
44008038	Ak ghwanung' ghamiinaada muttuk, ak ghwararang'aada duwaawi ng'eanyi ak gaweay jeeda beega, Filippo sea siitta was gulaneedean, ak goobattiisan niny.
44008039	Iiduw nea gwascheeng'na jeeda beega, ghwanung' Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida ghwaroat Filippo; ak ea mudugabiikta siidida was gulaneedean ghwadaah gichcha, ak ghang'eat gawa nea gahoosan.
44008040	Iiduw geadaah Filippo nea gwanda ng'eanyiida Asotto, ak gwasik jeeda mujiinajeega sean nea gwarukwiida giijasta miy ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya.
44009001	Aba damandida Sauli ghoabeal buuneeda muuchchi nea gwanuus ginealanga Ng'uttamiida, ak gawa heeda ashoohoochcheanda haw
44009002	ak gamus niny barawajeanda jea ghwaat ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa mida Dameski, ea gideaba inyasa hoowa headiga ghana gadeemga aat Naweetta, ghoang'ng'waay ak gweadu Yerusaleemu.
44009003	Iiduw nea gwanda naweeda nea gwaneekiissa Dameski, deagheatta ghoabwaay murdajeegaaschi sean weeshinda leabu humng'eeda.
44009004	Goobeedeaysa ng'eanyi ak ghwanya ghuutta siida nea gwayeeshsha, “Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan anda gighabwaschaan?”
44009005	Gwayeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil, Ng'uttamiida?” Ghwasha nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi Yeesu, dea ghamneawa ighabwasi;
44009006	asi ng'eada ak guwi mujiini, a miih itti gajeerukneey gichchea sina.”
44009007	Nea fukwachchi adeana Sauli ghamiinaada aba hoowa nea ghwasinda, hean ghwayiiy ghuutta siida ama sing'wearda ea meadaaha siih.
44009008	Ghang'eat Sauli aba ng'eanyi; ghwajaat gheanyeangaaschi ak ghwaraay ghoong'wearda; ama ng'atta geeng'ng'waanyaada geattinda ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Dameski.
44009009	Goopteada Sauli eawooji samwagu nea moang'wearda, ak ea mwaaga gil nea mwali gil.
44009010	Aba hooweanji bea Dameskiin gwanda ginealaneeda suguura Ananiya. Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida siisi aba jeeda giirgweatka gideaba “Anania.” Ak gwayeeshsha, “Geandi hiji, Ng'uttamiida.”
44009011	Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Ng'eada ak guwi ea hitta naweeda suguura naweeda doabiiwaat ama ihiitti ghea Yuuda giibwaardi siisi leabu ng'eanyiida Darso suguura Sauli; ng'ulla ghamneawa ghamwaash Aseetta.
44009012	Ghamneawa anidaah siisi suguura Anania nea ghwahidu gah ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuudaannyi ak abeeda ghwajaada gheanyangaaschi.”
44009013	Ghwasha Anania nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'uttamiida, naayiinyi ng'asheegeaba siisi aba heeda fuga saang'a, ak eara ng'asheega munyas nisma fugaagu ghaydidi aba Yerusaleemu;
44009014	ak ghamneawa gwandeawa gheambalmeeda adaw ashoohoodiga hees bea gideaba gayghwoong'ng'waay ak gwajaksa ghealooniga fuga rukku gheawungaagu.”
44009015	Gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida niny, “Una, aba gideaba siisi dabichcheanda siloat gil iitteanyu ghwaat gheawungeasu jeeda emoojiga ea sugoodiga ea fuga Israeeli;
44009016	ak gaydaahiimsa ng'asheega saang'a jea ghwanyasa sawanadeeda aba gheawungeasu.”
44009017	Iiduw gawa Anania ea gawa jeedeaba gheedida. Ak ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda nea gwayeeshsha, “Oorijeediyya Sauli, Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu heetta iroonyeewi aba naweeda nea abeeda gigalu hiji, goojeakneani ghwajaada gheanyangaagu nea ginyasi uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit.”
44009018	Ng'atta ghoobitbinna gheanyangaaschi duguuguurji badatka aba geeshangiga, ak gabiikta ghoang'wearda. Hean ghang'eat ak geeppattiisan,
44009019	ng'atta gweagiischi ak gabiiksa uurda. Iiduw gwandeayi eawojusu ng'ay sea ginealanga aba Dameski.
44009020	Ak deagheatta ghoong'eat ghuutta rukwiideayda iitta Yeesu, nea gwayi, aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa gideaba “Niny Balleanda Aseetta.”
44009021	Ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean alleeysiit, nea geeyi, “Siisi miidea ghayi las uhuuda buuneeda aba Yerusaleemu was fuga rukku gheawung'su? Ak ghwahidu hiji nea gagasa ghoong'waay buuneeda ak gwarada ak gweassa ashoohoodiga hees.”
44009022	Iiduw ghwanyas Sauli uurda, ak ghwanung' ghabeal fuga Yahuudi mida Dameski aba ng'asheanji gideaba Yeesu niny Gristohi.
44009023	Ng'atta eawoojiga saang'a, ghabwat geat fuga Yahuudi ak geemakcheamana nuustaannyi,
44009024	ghwanyas Sauli iitteaba makcheameani. Inyeessa geefur dooshinga askweari ea eawa, nea geegasa eenuus niny;
44009025	iiduw gageanda ginealangaaschi eawa ak geappuuttaawa uhuuda ghamarda, ak gearraraang'daawa sooscheanda.
44009026	Iiduw nea ghwahitta Yerusaleemu gagasa gwandeay sea fukka was ginealangean; hean geewal aba gideaba miyeamwas gideaba eara niny niiw ginealaneeda.
44009027	Ghwaat Barnaba niny, ea ghwaat heeda giijasoodiga, ak gwaruukusa gidanironnyeatta aba naweeda sea Ng'uttamiida, ak gobalool, ea gidarukwiideayda giijasta Aseetta aba Dameski aba meaynatta aba gheawunga Yeesu.
44009028	Ng'atta gawa jeeda nea gwaritteawa jeannyaawa aba Yerusaleemu,
44009029	gwarukwiida giijasta Aseetta aba meaynatta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida. Gabalool nea gwasheang'dooschi sea fuga Yahuudi baloola iitta Yunaani; ak gagasa gichchea gwanuusta niny.
44009030	Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u fuga siduupcheewi ng'asheesu, geeyat ng'eanyiida Gaysariya, ak geenung' gawa Darso.
44009031	Iiduw ganiisa aba jeeda Yudeeyayda sean ea Galilaaya ea Samariya ghwanyas hoyyooh nea gedeegu; hean ghabeawa muuwda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida nea gageanda salagheang'da Gurorooda Ghaydit ak ghoahaada.
44009032	Asi ghamneawa damanda neayeewa Betro aba hiji ea hoowa aba jeannyaawa sean, ghwararang'aan eara niny ea ghwahidu heeda fuga ghaydidi abiitta Liida.
44009033	Ghwanyasa hoowa siisi suguura gheawungaaschi Aeneya, nea nimnyaan ea ghwahitta gweannyeew sis nea gobittu damealga.
44009034	Hean gwayeeshsha Betro niny, “Enea niihaapnyi Yeesuyda was Gristo; ng'eada mughuda mundaang'u.” Deagheatta ghang'eat aba geeshangiga.
44009035	Daah buuneessean niny fuga ng'eanyida Liida ea Sharoon, hean gwayamsa geat Ng'uttamiida.
44009036	Abeeda gwanda ng'eanyiida Yoppa ginealaneeni suguura gheawungaaschi Dabitta, nea gideaba Dorkas gil. Abeeda gwasna gadiyoojiga ninyas nea gaweeda buuneeda.
44009037	Eawoojikka ghwalas sheagheeda ak iiduw ghami; iiduw nea ning'atta gihundaannyi ak geeweay eyiin jeemba ghooriini sideeksa uhuumba nuut.
44009038	Abeeda Liida eaneekkeewa Yoppa, ghwayiiy ginealanga gideaba Betro gwanda hoowa, geechcheakta fiih iyyeenya headaannyi eemus gideaba, “Asi geemuscheey beenni heedeanya nea adishing'di.”
44009039	Ghang'eat Betro ak goodeayi saawa. Iing'atta hinnooda, geayaat ettiing'da uhuuda ghooriida sideeksa uhuumba nuut. Ghamiinaada masinung'weega sean aba murdeadaannyi nea goyyeawuda, nea gehhiimsa meachkweega ahaat uurda saseeda ea hang'weakka sin Dorkas damanda duu gwandeayeewa saawa.
44009040	Hit goorutta Betro buuneessean jarooda ak ghang'da gutng'weakka ng'eanyi ak ghamwash Aseetta; ak gwayamsa geaw mustida ak gwayeeshsha, “Dabitta ng'eada.” Ng'atta ghwajaat gheanyangaaschi, amang'wearda ghwadaah Betro ak ghang'eat goopteada.
44009041	Ng'atta ghoadaw geattindaannyi ak gagatganna ng'eanyi. Ak gaguursa fuga ghaydidi ea masiinung'weega ak ghwayiin madeennyaawa nea majeek.
44009042	Iiduw gageawiit iiteaba ng'asheanji aba ng'eanyiisean bea Yoppa, ak ghamwas fuga saang'a Ng'uttamiida.
44009043	Ng'atta goobida Yoppa ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a, nea goobiida gheapa siisi naba muuchka suguura Simon.
44010001	Abeeda aba Gaysariya gwanda siisi suguura Gorneliyo, was shirikkarajeanda haw ambal lugooda shirikkareeda leabu ng'eanyiida Italiya,
44010002	siisi amiy ea fugeaba gheanyi sean, ak goowali Aseetta, iissa ghoadayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda ak ghaweat buuneeda, nea inyeessa ghamwash Aseetta galagasean.
44010003	Ghayi eaweechcha nea gaba aseetta shageash bea askweari ghwadaah muuchchi aba girgweatka malaykajeanda Aseetta nea ghwahidu gah ak gwayeeshsha, “Gorneliyo.”
44010004	Gang'ula nea nibeal ak gwayeeshsha, “Naaha gil Ng'uttamiida?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Mooshtaang'u bea Aseetta ea haleanjeeda isabi geadi nidiyeada ak ghoaw giipkeatta aba madeeda Aseetta.
44010005	Asi ajeakta ghamneawa buuneeda gaweay ng'eanyiida Yoppa, gaguursa siisi suguura Simon, nea geeguura Betro;
44010006	niny gwanda gheappa siisi suguura Simon, was siida naba muuchchka, mida gheannyi ghuutta basooda.”
44010007	Iiduw nea gabiikta malaykajeanda, gaguursa fiih iyyeenya was soomjoogaaschi ea shirikkarajeanda aba jeedeaba fukka amuukku ninyiin,
44010008	ng'atta nea nirukusa saawa ng'asheega sean goojeakta ng'eanyiida Yoppa.
44010009	Iimuchchu nea gwanda naweeda nea abeeda eaniriiksa mujiini, ng'atta gwading'da Betro uhuuda gheeda ghamwaash Aseetta nea gaba aseetta lah.
44010010	Iiduw, ghwayeachchi ak gagasa gichchea ghwaak; damandida siweay eegasa gichchea ghwaagiin ghwalas gheatta ruweanga ak goorgweadi
44010011	ak ghwadaah nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak geerareang'u giduurji hang'da haw, nea geeng'waanyaan meatkwajeega sean asang'wan ea ghwahidu ng'eanyi.
44010012	Jeedeaba hang'dida abeeda gwanda diyeanga sean ea gea badiina jeesinga ea dariidakka ng'eettiida.
44010013	Ak ghwayiiy nyeashta nea gwayeeshsha, “Betro, ng'eada; nuusa ak giyaagi.”
44010014	Ghwalamda Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Manda, Ng'uttamiida; aniini miidaak eara heedaghayi haleanjeeda geallaan ghana gilinyooh gwandeawa ririnnyeanda.”
44010015	Gabiikta ghwanya ghuutta gichcha deaba iyyeenya nea gwayeeshsha, “Haleanjeeda nimmiidu Aseetta, adiguuri duguuga geallaan.”
44010016	Ng'asheanji gabiikta nibwa samwagu, iiduw gitta geettealda humng'eeda aba geeshangiga.
44010017	Damani duu ghahama ng'eanyi Betro aba ng'asheesu daah aba girgweatkean gidawas, ging'ulayi, fuga gwachchi ajeakta Gorneliyo, ea nihita gidaghuutta gheeh Simon, hean ghamiinaada aba gidaghuut
44010018	ak gaguurda nea ghoanyaashta Simoneeda suguura Betro mida jeedeaba gheawi.
44010019	Damani gudugooteemsheewa Betro aba ng'asheesu gwachchi dahiin, gwayeeshsha Gurorooda niny, “Ng'ulla, gwanda fiih samwagu jarooda nea gagasseey.
44010020	Lamwaja rarang'aada ak giideayeewi nea adibeali; aba gideaba fiisu geajeagu aniini.”
44010021	Ghwararang'aada Betro ak gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Siida ogaseadayi aniini, ghwasaan anda googassean?”
44010022	Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Goojeakneasa shirikkarajeanda haw ambaliischi suguura Gorneliyo, was siida awali Aseetta, ak gwasissa emeeda sean bea Yahuudi mureeda, ak siisi gwayeeshsha malaykajeanda ghaydit gideaba una gheedeaba siisi, ak golleeyseey iit gidajea rukuni.”
44010023	Gaguursa ak ghwanung' ghoaw rabastaannyi. Iimuchchu ghang'eat gawa nea goodeayi fiisu, ea fiisu ng'ay siduucheewi leabu ng'eanyiida Yoppa ak goodeayi niny.
44010024	Eaweetteaba iyyeenya geehitta ng'eanyiida Gaysaariya. Nea abeeda Gorneliyo gafurda fiisu ak gaguursa fugeaba gheanyi ea fuga duupchi.
44010025	Iiduw nea ghwahita Betro ghoah gwaritta jarooda Gorneliyo ghwadeapta ak gwatkuy aba madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghaghadoawan.
44010026	Gagatgana Betro ng'eanyi nea gwayeeshsha, “Ng'eada, earaniini geawaschi siida.”
44010027	Damani duu gabaloola sea ninyiin, gawa gah ak ghwanyasa fuga saang'a bwatgeat;
44010028	gwayeeshsha fukkeanji, “Agooga goobay anala gideaba gilinyooh ea siida Yahuudi gil mwahida gideaba gay gaguuy sea fuga emoojiga suuk; nea aniini a niih iimnaani Aseetta gideaba adeaguuri siida wassean siida geallaan ghana gili bea ririnnyaan.
44010029	Ghoaw sareani heetta iyooguuru ghaahidu nea mwaashaang'iin, asi gaydaanyaasheagwa googuuru naaha?”
44010030	Ghwayeeshsha Gorneliyo, “Ning'atta eawooji ang'wan, ak damanda uurji niih, ak ghamwaashchi Aseetta aba jeedeaba gheenyu; nea gaba Aseetta shageash bea askweari; ak ging'ulayi, ghamiinaada siida aba madeedeanyu nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish,
44010031	nea gwayi, ‘Gorneliyo, mooshtaang'u bea Aseetta siyiiy ak eara haleanjeeda isabi geadi ea niipkaat Aseetta.
44010032	Ajeakta siida gawa ng'eanyiida Yoppa gaguursa siisi suguura Simon nea gheawunga suuk geeguura Betro; gwanda gheappa siisi suguura Simon, naba muuchka, mida ghuutta basooda.’
44010033	Ak geajeagu buuneeda aba geeshangiga ak eara ang'iing'i gidoabiiwi muuchchi aba gideaba guwuuni. Asi ghamneawa aseasa geendi hiji bea madeeda Aseettean, elleeysiiniit ng'asheega sean indeawi gonnyi Ng'uttamiida.”
44010034	Ng'atta ghoang'eat Betro baloaldaannyi nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa neajeeng'u gideaba Aseetta manda shiitmeeda;
44010035	aba jeeda giliwas eamwa siida wassean awali gheang'da Aseetta nea gwasna gea miyaas siisi gayghamwas niny.
44010036	Ak ghoanalli ng'asheanda ghayi ajeaksa fuga Israeeli, bea rukwiideayda giijasta miy bea hoyyooh aba naweetta bea Yeesu Gristoohiin, (nea niny ea Ng'uttamiida buuneessean,)
44010037	ng'asheanda ghayi sirukwiida aba ng'eanyiissean bea Yahuudi, ng'eada Galilaaya, iing'atta gibattiisanda rukkwiida Yohaana:
44010038	gidamwaarda Aseetta Yeesuyda Nasareetti aba Gurorooda Ghaydit ea uurda; ea gidaneayeatta nea gwasin ng'asheega miyaas nea ghoahaap buuneessean minighis meang'nyeandeendean, aba gideaba Aseetta gwandeayi sea niny.
44010039	Aseasa geawoschi muuwshoodigeaba ng'asheesu sin seaniin aba ng'eanyiida Yahuudi ea Yerusaleemu. Iiduw genngoorsa uhuuda geetta ak geenuus;
44010040	ak eaweetteaba samwagu gooduudu Aseetta ak ghwanung' eadaah;
44010041	ak ea miih heeda buuneessean gil, geaghus heedeanya ghayi loadeasa Aseetta eahuuwa muushoodiga, ghayi siyeagiischi nea geleeshi sea niny iing'atta dunnooda duunna miyeedean.
44010042	Ak goojeaktaneasa erukkwiida giijasta Aseetta aba heeda buuneeda, nea gorukwiidi gideaba niih dea ghayi iin Aseetta geattinga uhuudaannyi gil jea ghoaw dea jea goorgweaksa fuga majeekjeew ea gea nimeewa.
44010043	Ghayi niny gabean gamuuwwu sibanga gideaba siida wassean nyooh ghamwas siisi gayghwanyas samsiinda ring'eagaaschi sean aba gheawungeaba siisi.”
44010044	Damani duu gabaloola Betro ng'asheesuun, gwashuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit fukkeanji alleeysiit ng'asheesuun.
44010045	Nea fukka mideawa masaweega leabu jeeda fuga siyaat ghasmeahooda ghayi adeena Betrohiin ghahamng'eanyi, aba gideaba Gurorooda Ghaydit siittaw eara fuga emoojiga.
44010046	Aba gideaba geeyiiy nea gabaloola iitta emooji suuk nea geekghambiit Aseetta. Ak gwayi Betro,
44010047	“Gwanda siida jea ghaweada beega fiisu ea meppattiisana nea ninyasta Gurorooda Ghaydit gissinyasti aseasa?”
44010048	Ghwanung' eppattiisan aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristo. Ak gamus ghanyi gwandeayi eawoojusu ng'ay.
44011001	Iiduw ghwayiiy giijasoodiga ea fuga siduupcheewi mida ng'eanyiida Yahuudi gideaba eara fuga emoojiga nimwas ng'asheega Aseetta.
44011002	Gawa Betro Yerusaleemu, ak geenyareeksa nea gwasheang'nyi sea fuga ghasmeahooda,
44011003	nea geeyeeshsha, “Ang'iing'i ghwasaan andaguwi heeda fuga miyeayaat ghasmeahooda ak gimbuchcheewi?”
44011004	Hean iiduw gwarukuta Betro ng'asheega ghayi daah nea ghoong'eada gidaghayi ng'eatta:
44011005	“Ghayi nea geandi jeeda mujiineeda Yoppa nea ghamwaaschi Aseetta; nea geandi jeeda ruweanga, geahiimnaani giduurji hang'da haw, nea gerrareang'na humng'eeda, nea geng'waanyaan meatkwajeega sean assang'wan; ak geanung' ghwaan headeanyu.
44011006	Geang'weesi jeedida nea neekki ak ghaadaayi diyeanga ea diyeanga aga suurja ea diyeanga beawa jeesinga ea dariidakka humng'eeda.
44011007	Ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta eeshshiinean, ‘Betro, Ng'eada; nuusa ak giyaagi.’
44011008	Geayeeshshi manda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba gilinyooh gaba ririnnyaan ghana gida miih miy miighanyi dayiin ghuutteanyu.
44011009	Ghwanya ghuuttida leabu humng'eedean gichcha nea gwayi, ‘Haleanjeeda nimmiidu Aseetta adiguuri haleanjeeda geallaan.’
44011010	Ng'asheanji gabiikta nibwa samwagu, iiduw geattealda haleanjeesean humng'eeda.
44011011	Hean ghapka fiih samwagu aba geeshangiga sicheaksean leabu Gaysariya ak ghapka gheeda eandi.
44011012	Gwayeeshiinean Gurorooda, adeayeewana fiisu nea adibeali. Oorjoosu allah siduupcheewiin eara saawa geadeayeewi, fiisu ghee Gorneliyo.
44011013	Ak gwarukuneasa gidaghayi hissiinda malaykajeanda miinaada ak gwayeeshsha, ‘Ajeakta siida ng'eanyiida Yoppa gaguursa siisi suguura Simon, bea gheawunga suuk suguura Betro;
44011014	niny gaygwarukneey ng'asheega jea gwalealneey, ang'iing'i ea fugeaba gheang'u.’
44011015	Damani duu dang'eada dhuutta balooldean, hean gwashuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit gawuurji gidaghayi sinyasti aseasa aba mwadi.
44011016	Ak ghaapkaachi ng'asheega ghayi rugu Ng'uttamiida bea gideaba, ‘Yohaana goobeattiisana beega, ak agooga gajeepeattiisananeegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.’
44011017	Asi iniidaw Aseetta eara fuga emoojiga suuk Gurorooda Ghaydit gidagoondaneasa aseasa damanda simwaseawi Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, asi aniini geawoschi ng'eaha daheawa ng'asheega Aseetta?”
44011018	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy ng'asheesu ghwasiinda. Ng'atta geakghambiit Aseetta nea geeyi, “Aseetta niidaw eara emoojiga gheatta duukkuunooda ak ghwanyas eaweega.”
44011019	Hean fukka ghayi darda aba sawanadeeda bunu appadayda Stefanohiin gaweay ea gwasheagiidi ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Foinikke ea Saypras ea Antiyokkiya, nea gwarukkiida ng'asheanda aba heeda fuga Yahuudi.
44011020	Ak gwanda fuga mwaatkwa, was fuga leabu Saypras ea Grene, amaduw nea ghapka ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya gobalool eara fuga Yunaani, nea gwarukkwiida iitta Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
44011021	Gadiyeani geesna uurda Ng'uttamiida, hean ghamwas fuga saang'a ak ghoahaada buuneeda yamsageat Ng'uttamiida.
44011022	Gageawiit iitteaba ng'asheesu ea ghwahitta iidiga fuga ganiiseeda mida Yerusaleemu, geechcheakta Barnaba gawa Antiyokkiya.
44011023	Hitta hooweanji ak ghwadaah dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta, gahoosan; ak gwayeeshsha fukkeanji oppiidana jeedeaba doobiiwnadi itteang'wean aba heeda Ng'uttamiida nea ghwaarjeang'da;
44011024	aba gideaba niny siida miy gil, ak gwandeawa Gurorooda Ghaydit ea masaweega, ak ghapka fuga saanga heeda Ng'uttamiida.
44011025	Iiduw gawa Barnaba ng'eanyiida Darso gagasa Sauli;
44011026	hean ghwanyas ak gweadu ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya. Aba gideaba nindeayi gweayda mughuush sea fuga ganiisa, ak ghoanal fuga saang'a; nea aba Antiyokkiya ea heeda madeeda sishsheeda eguura ginealanga fuga Gristohi.
44011027	Aba eawoojikka ghapka sibanga leabu Yerusaleemu ea ghwahidu Antiyokkiya.
44011028	Hean ghamiinaada siyagi aba jeedeaba fukkeanji suguura Agapo ak gwargu ramooraneadaannyi aba uurda Gurorooda, gideaba gayghang'eat geejeeda ng'waan aba muunda ng'eanyiida sean; ghang'eada damanda waseewa Glaudio sugoochcheanda.
44011029	Ghang'eat fukka was ginealangean ak gabaniiaat gida ammu wassean, ak geeyeassa weetta fuga siduupcheewi mida Yudeeyaan;
44011030	ghoawaam lappiyeennyaawa, amahit geattaw Barnaba ea Sauli ghwaat ea ghwaahiitta heeda gweargwa.
44012001	Aba damandida ghang'eat sugoochcheanda suguura Heroode ghuutta sawanda Ganiisa.
44012002	Ghwang'waay Yakkobo oorjeeda geennyaawa Yohaana, ak gwanuus aba bwaanga;
44012003	daah nea ghabwaariiy fuga Yahuudi ng'asheanji gabiikta ak ghwang'waay Betro. Niih geesin aba damandida bea mukkatteeyda meammwattawiidean.
44012004	Iing'atta ging'ooyda geejaksa ghealooniga, ak geenung' gafur gheamughuuscheew ang'wan bea shirikkara, abeetta gabaysiina gideaba iing'atta ghweelmeeda basakka geayaat madeeda emeeda.
44012005	Geayiin Betro ghealooniga; ak ghamwaash Aseetta fuga ganiisa.
44012006	Eaweedida jea gwachchi iimuchchu gooruunna Heroodehiin, abeetta Betro gwalil aba dageascheeda shirikkaraji iyyeenya, ak ea sirada aba munyaloalaji iyyeenya, nea shirikkara suuk gafur gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda;
44012007	asi ng'ulla, ghwahidu malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoabwaay weeshinda jeeda ghooriida mida fuga ghealooniga; ak ghwasat hamarjeeda Betro nea gwayeeshsha, “Lamwaja ng'eada.” Ghoabitbit munyaloalajeega gwachchi mida geattingaaschi.
44012008	Ghwalamda malaykajeanda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ashshuuba geaw hang'weakkaagu akkiillaabi geekkaagu.” Hean gwasindunu. Hit gwayeeshsha, “Radiischeena ak giyeadu geeshteanyu.”
44012009	Ghang'eat ak ghwaat geeshta; gwaritta jarooda, nea headaannyi gwanda jeeda girgweatka.
44012010	Gaweay ak ghang'atta ghwasuut shirikkareeda madeeda ea geaba iyyeenya, ak geehitta gidaghuutta gharinnyeanda, ama sing'atta geeweay mujiini. Goottina gidaghuut nea gabwageaw, ama siritta jarooda geenyooh etteayi aba naweeda; deagheatta gwanung'usa heeda malaykajeanda.
44012011	Biissa gwajeeng'u Betro ng'asheanji ak gwayi, “Bissa neajeeng'u aba huumwa gideaba Ng'uttamiida goojeagu malaykajeandaannyi gwalealnaneani geattinga Heroode, ak goruutteaweani jeeda ng'asheega ammuukkuunaneani fuga Yahuudi.”
44012012	Iiduw nea gwajeeng'u ng'asheesu, gawa gheeh Mariya, gheamatta Yohaana bea gheawunga suuk suguura Marko, ghwahitta nea nibwatgeat buuneeda saang'a nea geemwaash Aseetta.
44012013	Iiduw nea gaguurda aba gidaghuut, hean gawa hudi suguura Rooda ghwajaat gidaghuut.
44012014	Nal ghuutta gwajeeng'u gideaba siida Betro gil, hean gahoosan muuchchi ea eamutghwajaat gidaghuut, ghafach gawa gah gwarukusa buuneeda mida gah gideaba Betro ghamiinaada aba gidaghuut.
44012015	Geeyeeshsha hudida, “Ang'iing'i gibwaageas.” Amwasiinda huda gwayeeshsha, ng'asheanji earuguuni huumwa gil. Ak geyeeshsha, “Niih jirooneadaannyi gil!”
44012016	Aba damandida Betro gudugaguurrideawa gidaghuut; iiduw geeweay ejaat gidaghuut, ama sidaah geehamng'eanyi.
44012017	Goohiimsiina buuneeda geattinda gideaba asiinda ak gwarukusa buuneeda gidaruutteayda Ng'uttamiida aba ghealooniga. Ak gwayeeshsha, arukusiina ng'asheesu Yakkobo ea fuga siduupcheewi. Hean gwaritta jarooda gawa daroar nuut.
44012018	Iimuchchu sakteayda, ea nung'ut muuwda shirikkarajeega nea geeyi nihissaani Betro.
44012019	Iiduw gagasa Heroode ama mudughwanyas, gwasikteawa shirikkara ak gojeakta ghwanung' eenuuseada. Ng'atta ghabeawa Yudeeya ak gawa goobiida ng'eanyiida Gaysariya.
44012020	Iiduw ghwanyareas Heroode muuchchi appadayda fuga ng'eanyiida Diro ea Sidoni; ak geapka headaannyi, nea abeeda ea nibalool Blasto, abeetta niny siida haw ambal gheeda sugoochcheanda gil, gaweay gamus gideaba nung' eebeaha hoyyooh, aba gideaba ng'eang'deanya ghaghus ng'eanyiideaba sugoochcheanji aba hamitta.
44012021	Ghayi eaweechcha ghang'eat Heroode ak gooshshuup geat hang'weakaaschi bea sugoochcheandumeeda, ak gawa goopteadawa hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda, hean gorgweaksa buuneeda.
44012022	Goojuur buuneeda muuchchi nea geeyi, “Niih ghuutta aseetta gil, miih dea siida!”
44012023	Deagheatta ghwalasta malaykajeanda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba moaghambiida Aseetta; ak ghwaak ghuughuutka ea ghami.
44012024	Googuulli ng'eanyiisean ng'asheega Aseetta nea gwaheedu.
44012025	Iiduw nea gabiigu Barnaba ea Sauli, Yerusaleemu nea niihiit gadiyeeda nyaawa, gweadu Yohaana bea gheawung' suuk suguura Marko.
44013001	Asi jeeda ganiiseeda Antiyokkiya abeeda gwanda sibanga, ea ginealshoodiga, nea geaba Barnaba gil, ea Simoneeda suguura siittuw, ea Lukkiyooyda ng'eanyiida Girene, ea Manaeni dea ghayi hissaheeda aba gheeda sugoochcheanda suguura Heroode ea Saulo.
44013002	Ghayi eaweechcha nea ghabwat Ng'uttamiida, nea ghwarat jalooda, hean gwayeeshsha Gurorooda Ghaydit, “Aloada Barnaba ea Saulo gwasin gadiyeeda eaguursi gwasin.”
44013003	Iing'atta radooda jalooda ea mooshta Aseetta ghwayiin geattinga nyaawa iheengeaba fiisu ak geesiksa gaweay.
44013004	Hean iiduw ea niijeakta Gurorooda Ghaydit, ghwararang'aada ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Seleugiya; ak geeng'eada hoowa ak gwading'da maleambooda haw ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Saypras.
44013005	Iiduw nea ghwahitta Salami, gwarukkwiida ng'asheega Aseetta aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi. Nea abeetta gwandeayi sea Yohaana nea ghaweat saawa.
44013006	Iiduw nea geesuut ng'eanyiida neaweesa basooda hean geahitta ng'eanyiida Bafo, sihitta geanyasa hoowa siisi was beeneetkweanda, bea emeeda Yahuudi was sibaneeda ng'uyyeega suguura Bar-Yeesu.
44013007	Siisi abeeda gwandeayi sea sugoochcheanda ahaghwa ng'eanyiida, suguura Sergio Baulo, ak ea siida mideawa fughareeda, hean gaguursa Barnaba ea Baulo aba gideaba gagasa ghwayiiy ng'asheega Aseetta.
44013008	Nea Eliimayda was benetkweanda (aba gideaba niih gidawas gheawungaaschi) ghaweada saawa, nea gagasa ghwayam sugoochcheanda goheelli masaweega.
44013009	Iiduw Sauloyda amaduw geeguura Baulo ghwanyas uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit geehhang'ooysa gheang'da siidida ak geeyi,
44013010	“Ang'iing'i guwosi balleanda meang'nyeandeenda, ak guwosi weajoochcheanda haleanjeesean doobiiweadi, ak gaba ng'uyya muuchchi ea munyinda, ak ea minung'waadani eara hutteayda naweadinga doobiiweadi bea Ng'utamiida?
44013011	Ng'ulla ghamneawa, gay ghwalasnyi Ng'uttamiida, ak gay ng'oawiida ea eamuttaaha weeshinda aseetta ea ghwahitta damwan.” Deagheatta aba geeshangiga ghwahidu headaannyi dung'usta ea misaneeda ak gagaseada buuneeda jea ghoang'wanyaada geattinda.
44013012	Iiduw ghamwas sugoochcheanda, iidaah ng'asheega bunu, aba gideaba ghabeal aba ginealshooda Ng'uttamiida.
44013013	Ghang'eat Baulo ea barandaannyi ak gwading'da maleambooda ghabeawa Baafo, ak gaweay ea ghwahitta Berga mida ng'eanyiida Bamfiliya. Ghwanung'wa heeda Yohaana fiisu ak gabiikta Yerusaleemu,
44013014	ak iiduw ghang'atta ea ghwahitta Berga hean geeweay ea ghwahitta mujiineeda Antiyokkiyaayda mida Bisidiya. Hean eaweeda Sabatto gaweay jeeda ghooriida sinealshachcheewa ak goobiitpiit.
44013015	Iing'atta nea nihit giissoomanda digheanda ea gittaabooda deayeega Muusa ea gea ng'ooruutka sibanga, hean ghang'eat fuga hees bea ghooriida sinealshachcheewa ak geechcheaksa nea geeyeeshsha, “Fuga siduupcheewi, iyoondeawi ng'asheanda ogasayi amusa appadahuukkeaba fiisu ak goomajeek goorugu.”
44013016	Hean ghang'eat Baulo ak googeachchi buuneeda nea ghamiinda geattingaaschi ak gwayeeshsha; “Ea fuga ng'eanyiida Israeeli, ea fuga sean awali gheang'da Aseetta oalleaydiit.
44013017	Aseetteaba emeeni bea Israeeli ghayi ghwaloat gheamba ghweanigaasa ak ghwanung' ghoaw fuga hees damandida mideewa ng'eanyiida Misri, ak goruudu aba geattindaannyi.
44013018	Nea aba gweannyeew haradam ghamilikghta sea saawa aba dareapcheeda.
44013019	Iiduw nea nilas uhuudeaba daroorakkiga assispwaan mida ng'eanyiida Gananiin, ghoadaw saawa ng'eanyiida nyaawa gwahearan, aba gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan ea haradam ea damanamughuush.
44013020	Ng'atta hiji hean ghoadaw fuga laja girgweaguutka ea ghwahitta sibaneeda suguura Samweeli.
44013021	Ak iiduw gagasa eattaw sugoochcheanda; hean iiduw ghoadaw Aseetta Saulo balleanda Gishi, bea dooshta Benjamin ea ghoaw gweannyeew haradam.
44013022	Iiduw nea gegeanda niny, hean ghwaloat Dawdi ghoaw sugoochcheanda nyaawa; hean gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydaannyi nea gwayi, ‘Naanyaschi aba jeeda Dawdi balleanda Yese siida mwas guroroodeanyu, ak niih ea siichchea gwasin ng'asheega sean eagasayi dasini.’
44013023	Aba siisi jea ghwahiduun niidaw Aseetta fuga Israeeli lealnoochcheanda, Yeesu, gawuurji gidaghayi helleesiinda.
44013024	Damanda miih ghwahinna ghanyi gooshoohu Yohaana ak gwarukkwiisa fuga sean bea Israeeli gideaba gammiissa gwaduukkuuna ring'eega nyaawa ak geeppattiisan.
44013025	Iiduw nea niihiit Yohaana gadiyeadaannyi gwayeeshsha, ‘Ghoaghanyi gili aniini eawoschi ng'eaha? Aniini meawosi siitta oofurdiin. Manda, ak gwanda siida jea gamaseawnean, ak aniini ea mammiisean deattin deandooda geakkaaschiin.’
44013026	“Fugeaduupcheewi, balloojiga dooshta Abrahaamu, ea buuneessean mida jeedeang'wa awali gheang'da Aseettean, giijasi bea lealnoodean siyanneasa.
44013027	Aba gideaba fuga mida Yerusaleemu ea fuga nyaawa ambaliischi, ak ea mwanala niny ghana gwajeeng'u ng'asheega sibanga sissoomani aba giliwas sabatto, hean ghoahiit aba girgweaksiinda.
44013028	Ak earappeadi ea meadaaha ramaseanda miisa nuustaannyi, geemus Bilatto ak ghwanung' eenuus.
44013029	Iiduw nea geehiit ng'asheega sean ghayi sung'oorsa badaydaannyi, gerrareang'na uhuuda geetta, ak geeyiin jeeda bung'eeda.
44013030	Ak gooduuna Aseetta jeeda miyeeda;
44013031	ak gabussa eawoojiga saang'a fukka ghayi adeana aba Galilaaya ea ghwahitta Yerusaleemuun, was ghamneawa muushoodigaaschi aba heeda buuneeda.
44013032	Aseasa geapkaannyi eyeaneegwa giijasta miy ng'asheandida ghayi heelleesa Aseetta gheamba ghweanigaasaan.
44013033	Ak ea nisissa aba heedeanya suwoschi diibigaaschi aba duunnooda Yeesu; gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda aba jeeda gittaabooda nyiigheegeaba iyyeenya gideaba, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleandeanyu, aniini eanean neajiilleey.’
44013034	Damandida gooduunna jeeda fuga nimeewean, aba gideaba adagabiikta gichcha hooweanji ak gamunyiit, hean gwayi, ‘Gaydagooneegwa ghwaooda ghaydit bea huumwa ghayi bea Dawdi.’
44013035	Ak gwayi aba jeemba gittaabwajaan bea nyigheega, ‘May nung'waada Siidaang'u Ghaydit ghwanyas munyida.’
44013036	Eara Dawdi iing'atta sinooda gadiyeeda Aseetta damanda seaygeadaannyi, hean ghami, ak gebunyuudayyi ghwanigaaschi, ak ghwanyas saseadaannyi munyinda;
44013037	Nea siitta aduuna Aseetta jeeda miyeedean amwanyasa munyinda.
44013038	Ak ghoanalli ng'asheanji, fugeasu eaduupcheewi gideaba aba naweedeaba siisi gajeerukuneegwa samsiinda ring'eeda,
44013039	ak aba niny siisi nyooh ghamwas gaygoobal geaw aba haleanjeessean gidagwachchi maygwasa aba deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa.
44013040	Asi ashageada geat, adaghwanyaseagwa gea ghayi beangwargu subanga nea gwayi:
44013041	‘Ang'ulla, agooga fuga foola fiih, ahamwang'eanyi, ak goroodayi; aba gideaba geasinnyi ng'asheanda aba damandeang'wa, ng'asheanda mwajamwasa gil, eara gwarukuneegwa siida.'"
44013042	Damanda ritteawa hean gamus buuneeda gabiigu gichcha eaweeda sabattoyda jea ghwaan gwargu muuchchi iitteaba ng'asheesu.
44013043	Iiduw nea ghwadardaawa buuneeda girgweageeda gheeda sinneaoshachcheewa, hean ghwaat geeshta geaba Baulo ea Barnaba fuga saang'a bea Yahuudi ea fuga emoojiga suuk ghayi weay dineeda Yahuudi, hean goobaloola saawa gideaba aweayeena mwadi aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
44013044	Hitta eaweeda sabattoyda bassa ghabwat geat fugeaba mujiineedida gooleeysiit ng'asheega Aseetta.
44013045	Hean ghwadaah fuga Yahuudi fuga saang'a, nea ghapka gwashissa ghaang', hean geeheawa ng'asheega gwachchi rukku Baulo, nea geebiissa eng'ng'eawi.
44013046	Gabalool Baulo ea Barnaba aba meaynatta nea gwayi, “Gammiisa gideaba gayghanyi erukuneegwa ammadeeda ng'asheanda Aseetta. Amaduw nea ghoaheawi ak gohindi geat gili mammiiseegwa eaweega manda muudeanooda, ang'ulla, gajeeyamsiina geat emoojiga.
44013047	Aba gideaba niih gidaghayi rukuneasa Ng'uttamiida, nea gwayi, ‘Naanung' huwa weeshinda emoojiga, ak gihuwi lealeanooda ea ghwahitta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.'"
44013048	Iiy fuga emoojiga ng'asheanji, gahoosan ak geakghambiit ng'asheanda Aseetta; nea giikka ghayi sirarsean ghwanyas eaweega manda muudeanoodean hean ghamwas Aseetta.
44013049	Ghaghayda ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida aba ng'eanyiitta seaniin.
44013050	Iiduw ghoahaak fuga Yahuudi gadeemga was fuga hees ghayi bada Aseetta ea headiga hees siiwali gheang'da bea mujiineedida, hean ghaghabwas Baulo ea Barnaba, ak gehoan ghang'amwa ng'eang'da nyaawa.
44013051	Ng'atta gabardeaysa birjeanda geeshanga nyaawa, ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Ikkoniyo.
44013052	Gahoosan ginealanga nea ghwanyas Gurorooda Ghaydit.
44014001	Hitta ng'eanyiida Ikkoniyo gaweay jeeda ghooriida sinnealashachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi, ng'atta ghamiinaada ak gwarukuta ng'asheega Aseetta ak ghamwas fuga saang'a, was fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
44014002	Nea fuga Yahuudi suuk heawa ng'asheesu goong'uchchi buuneeda was emoojiga suurja ak ghwadattas fughareenga nyaawa ghaheawa fuga siduupcheewi.
44014003	Iiduw goobiida hoowa ea gageawiit, nea gabaloola meaynatta appadayda Ng'uttamiida, nea gamuuwwu ng'asheanda dagheerjeandumeadaannyi, nea ghoadaw gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi jea gwasin aba geattinga nyaawa.
44014004	Gwaheelli fugeaba mujiineedida; gea maba meatkweeda fuga Yahuudi suuk gaba meatkweeda giijasoodiga.
44014005	Hean gagasa fuga emoojiga ea fuga Yahuudi, ea fuga nyaawa ambaliischi ak geegasa naweeda jea esawana giijasoodiga nea geefta lagheanga,
44014006	iiduw nea gwajeeng'u ng'asheanji gwasalda gaweay ng'eanyiida Listra ea Derbe, mida jeeda ng'eanyiida Lugaonia, ea ng'eanyiida neekkeewa;
44014007	hit goobiida hoowa nea gwarukwiida giijasta miy.
44014008	Aba ng'eanyiitta bea Listraan gwanda siisi apteada bea geeshanga badeeda; ghang'eada deaghayi sijiila miih ghanyi gaweelweel.
44014009	Siisi abeetta gooleeysiit Baulo damanda baloola; hean gang'ulla Baulo siisi muuchchi, ak ghwadaah gideaba siisi gwandeawa masaweega jea eahhaabwa,
44014010	hean gwayeeshsha aba ghuutta haw, “Miinaadawana geeshangaagu.” Hean ghang'eat siitta aba geeshangiga ak gawa.
44014011	Daah emeettuw gidasin Baulo, hean goojur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayi, Lugaoniya nea gwayi, “Niiiseasa aseechcheekka nea gawuurji buuneeda!”
44014012	Gaba siisi sing'assa gheawungaaschi Barnaba geeguura Seu nea Baulo, aba gideaba niny siida gwachchi balooli, geeguura Heeme.
44014013	Iiduw ghwahidu ashoohoochcheanda gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Seu mida ritteayda mujiini, nea gweadu heewga ea shiipka deakghweeda ak ghwayiin gidaghuutta mujiini, ak gagasa emeeda ghoadaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweedean.
44014014	Iiy giijasoodiga was Barnaba ea Baulo ng'asheanji, hean ghabwaashaada hang'weakka nyaawa ak gwasalda gaweay jeedeaba emeetta nea gooyyeawda.
44014015	Nea geeyi, “Buneeda, ghwasaan andagoosinnyi ng'asheesu? Aseasa geawoschi buuneeda mideawa searoojiga uurjeewaneegwa, ak geapkaannyi erukuneegwa giijasta miy, ak ghoanung'waadi haleanjeeni bea mwadaaghaan, ak gooyamsi geat Aseetta majeek ghayi bwat humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda ea haleanjeessean mida jeeda.
44014016	Ghayi garay Aseetta ghwanung'waada gilinyooh ea emoojiga gil gwasin gidagasa;
44014017	ak eara aba sarean ea miih ghwanung'waada muwwunoodeaba geaw aba ng'asheega miyaas sin, gagooneegwa roopta leabu humng'eeda ea booga aba damandaannyi, ak ghwanung' gwalang'u guroruunatkeagwa aba daghwara ea hooseaneega.”
44014018	Eara gabalooldunu ghwaraay gideaba gajeatteala buuneeda amoadawa giijasoodiga haleanjeeda sisapa geadi bea ghadooweeda.
44014019	Iiduw ghapka fuga Yahuudi leabu ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya ea Ikkoniyo; ak gafoolan buuneeda, ak geefutta Baulo lagheanga ak geengiir ea erruutteawa jeeda mujiini, nea geaghayi gili nimi.
44014020	Hean iiduw nea gwaneaweesa ginealanga hean ghang'eat ak gabiikta jeeda mujiini; muchchu eaweedeabiyyeenya goodeayi Barnaba ng'eanyiida Derbe.
44014021	Ahiit rukwiideayda giijasta miy aba mujiini nea ninyas ginealanga saang'a, hean ghang'eatng'eat gabiikta Listra ea Ikkoniyo ea ghwahitta Antiyokkiya,
44014022	hean goomajeek guroruunatka ginealanga, nea gobaloola gideaba oppiidana jeeda masaweega, ak gwayeeshsha gajeanyasa sawanaduutka saang'a ijea eweaya jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
44014023	Iiduw nea niloat gweargwa jea ghoahaaghwa aba jeeda ganiisa, aba mooshta Aseetta ea raditta jalooda, ghwayiin geattinga Ng'uttamiida was dea mwas saawa.
44014024	Iiduw ghang'eatng'eat gaweay nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Bisidiya, ak ghwahitta Bamfiliya.
44014025	Iiduw nea ghoahiit rukwiideayda ng'asheanda aba ng'eanyiida Beerge, hean ghang'eat gaweay Attaliya;
44014026	hean ng'eada hooweanji gealach bugusta basooda nea geeding'da maleambooda haw nea geebiikta Antiyokkiya; heeda ghayi siittawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta aba gadiyeeda nihiit.
44014027	Iiduw nea ghwahitta, geebwadageat ganiisa ak geerukusa ng'asheega sean nisissa Aseetta saawa, ea gidanijaatta Aseetta gidaghuutta masaweega aba heeda fuga emoojiga.
44014028	Hean goobiida hooweanji ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a sea ginealanga.
44015001	Iiduw ghapka fiisu ng'ay leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi ak ghoanal fuga siduupcheewi, nea gwayeeshsha, “Imeayaadeagwa ghasmeahooda gawuurji gidaghayi bea deaweedeeda Muusa, abeetta ea majeelealneegwa.”
44015002	Ng'asheanji ghwanung' gwardu sheang'nyeeda ak gobalool Baulo ea Barnaba sea saawa, ak gealoat Baulo ea Barnaba sea buuneeda mwaatkwa ak geanung' gaweay Yerusaleemu heeda giijasoodiga ea heeda gweargwa ghoanyaashta ng'asheanji.
44015003	Iiduw nea goojeakta ganiisa gaweay gwasik dageascheeda Foynikke ea dea Samariya, nea gwarukku gideaba fuga emoojiga niyamsa geat Aseetta, ak gahoosan buuneessean appadayda fuga siduupcheewi.
44015004	Hean gaweay amahitta Yerusaleemu, ghwadeapta fuga ganiisa bea hooweanjiin ea giijasoodiga ea gweargwa, hean geerukuta ng'asheega sean sin Aseetta aba badahuukka nyaawa.
44015005	Iiduw ghang'eat fiih suuk mideawa masaweega was fuga Farisayo, ak gwayi, “Ghwahit gideaba gajeeyaat fiisu ghasmeahooda, ak geerukusi ghoang'ng'waay deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa.”
44015006	Hean ghabwat geat giijasoodiga ea gweargwa ak gabaloola badaydeaba ng'asheanji.
44015007	Geebalool ea gageawiit baloolda, hean ghang'eat Betro ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga eaduupcheewi, agooga ghoanalli gideaba ghayi ammwadi Aseetta ghwaloadan aba bugusteang'wa, ak aba ghuutteanyu ghwayiiy fuga emoojiga ng'asheanda giijasta miy ak ghammwas.
44015008	Nea Aseetta nal guroruunatka buuneeda gamuwwu ng'asheanji ak ghoadaw saawa Gurorooda Ghaydit gawuurji gidaghayi gondaneasa aseasa;
44015009	ak ea masna shiitmeeda aba aseasa ea saawa, ak goohuun guroruunatka nyaawa aba masaweega.
44015010	Asi ghwasaan andagoosimsimnyi Aseetta ak ghoayiinnyi gheatkweakka ginealanga jokki nea eara ghweanigaasa ghana aseasa ameammuusi?
44015011	Ak geamwaschi gideaba aseasa gajeelealneasa aba naweeda dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ewuurjeewana saawa.”
44015012	Gwayi buuneessean saw; ak gooleeysiit Barnaba ea Baulo nea gwarukwiisa buuneeda gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi sin Aseetta aba jeannyaawa aba jeeda fuga emoojiga.
44015013	Ahiit baloolda nyaawa, ghwasha Yakkobo nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi,
44015014	Simon ghwasaan nea nirgu gidaghayi deaptaayda Aseetta fuga emoojiga, ak ghwaloat fiisu ng'ay aba jeannyaawa ghoaw fugaaschi. Ak aba niih ghamwas ng'asheega sibanga, gawuurji gissung'waarda.
44015015	Nea ng'asheanji ghamwas muuchchi ng'asheega sibanga, gawuurji gissung'waarda,
44015016	‘Iing'atta ng'asheesu gaydabiigu, ak gaydadeas gichcha gheedida bea Dawdiin, ghayi abeadaan; gaydabiikta dadeas heeda nyar, ak gaydanung' ghamiinaada,
44015017	ak buneesuurja gaygagasa Ng'uttamiida, sea emoojiga sean ghayi sigurriisiina gheawungeasu.
44015018	gwayi Ng'uttamiida, ng'eaha siida ghayi nung' ghwanal buuneeda ng'asheesu ammwadi.’
44015019	“Asi aba girgweageedeanya nihi, adootteawiichchi fuga emoojiga yamsa geat Aseetta,
44015020	ak ging'oorsi gideaba adoayaaji hamichchoojiga mideawa ririnnyeanda gidamawosa Aseetta ak ghwasaja geat hiseadayeandumeeda ea gida sing'ng'waay ghuutta ea foojeanda.
44015021	Aba gideaba ghang'eada seaygoojiga gwandeawa Muusa fuga rukkwiida ng'asheagaaschi aba jeesinga giliwas mujiini, iissa geassoamwa gilinyooh ea sabatto gil aba jeesinga ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa.”
44015022	Ng'atta ghwadaah giijasoodiga ea gweargwa gideaba amiy ea fuga sean bea ganiisa, gideaba ghwaloat fiih iyyeenya aba jeannyaawa ak ghwanung' gaweay ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya sea Baulo ea Barnaba. Hean gealoat Yuudaayda suguura Barsaba, ea Sila, ak fiisu geannaal muuchchi aba jeeda fuga siduupcheewi,
44015023	ak ghwaat barawajeanda sung'waardunu, “Fuga eaduupcheewi was giijasoodiga ea gweargwa, heeda fuga siduupcheewi was fuga emoojiga mida Antiyokkiya ea Siriya ea Gilikkiya, ghaghachcheagwa.
44015024	Geeyiinyi gideaba gwanda fiisu ng'ay leabu ng'eang'deanya ak ghamwanmwaneagwa aba ng'asheega nyaawa, nea ghwanung' ea moapta ng'eanyi fughareengeagwa, nea ng'asheesu sin fiisuun ea meattawi aseasa,
44015025	ak aba heedeanya amiy gideaba gajeeneajeatta gilagi, ak gealoat buuneeda ak geechcheagu ng'eang'deang'wa nea goodeana fuga subwariinyi was Barnaba ea Baulo,
44015026	fuga ghayi ramagu gabeagu eaweega nyaawa aba badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
44015027	Ghamneawa geechcheagu heedeang'wa Yuuda ea Sila, ak gaygwarukuneegwa saawa ng'asheega uurji suuh aba ghuusiga nyaawa.
44015028	Ak amiy aba heeda Gurorooda Ghaydit ea heedeanya gideaba majeesareenneegwa sarean nuut geaghus haleanjeetta miseegwean:
44015029	nea gideaba anung'waada hamichchoojiga sighadoawana gidamawosa Aseetta ea foojeanda adoayaaji bannyeega gidasing'ng'waay ghuutta ea hiseadayeandumeeda. Abeeda iyohhelleewi geat haleanjeani abeeda ghoattoabiiwji. Ebeaseayu.”
44015030	Iiduw geechcheakta gaweay, ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya ghabwada geat fuga mwas Aseetta, amahit geettayda barawajeanda.
44015031	Hean nea geassoamwa barawajeandida ghwanung' gahoosan aba ng'asheega ammajeek saawa.
44015032	Nea Yuuda ea Sila, abeeda saawa ea sibanga gil, hean goomajeek fuga siduupcheewi aba ng'asheega saang'a ak ghwanung' gamajeekcheewiidi.
44015033	Ng'atta nea nibiida hoowa askwearjoojusu ng'ay gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi nea ghabeawa weada gabiiksa fukka ghayi ajeaguun.[
44015034	Ng'asheesu manda jeeda ng'ooruutkeaba garay, Ghwadaah Sila gideaba ghwahit gobiida hoowa.]
44015035	Hean iiduw goobiida Baulo ea Barnaba Antiyokkiya, nea gonnealshi nea geerukkwiida ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, sea fiih suuk saang'a.
44015036	Iing'atta eawoojusu ng'ay gwayeeshsha Baulo Barnaba, “Beenni eebiikta mujiinajeega ghayi surukwiideaysi ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida, eadaaha fuga siduupcheewi gissin.”
44015037	Gagasa Barnaba gideaba gaygoodeayi sea Yohaaneeda suguura Marko.
44015038	Hean ghwadaah Baulo gideaba mwahida gideaba gaygodeayi siida ghayi nung'usa heeda saawa aba ng'eanyiida Bamfiliya, ak ea meadeayi saawa gadiyeeda.
44015039	Hean gwardu sheang'nyeeda haw aba dageascheeda nyaawa ea iiduw gwaheelli; hean goodeayi Barnaba Marko ghwalach bugusta basooda ak gaweay ng'eanyiida Saypras,
44015040	ng'atta ghwaloat Baulo Sila ak godeayi, ak ghwanung' fuga siduupcheewi ghabeawa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida.
44015041	Hean ghang'eat gwasik ng'eanyiida Siriya ea Gilikkiya nea goomajeek ganiisajeega.
44016001	Iiduw ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Derbe ea Listra. Nea abeeda gwanda hoowa ginealaneeni suguura Dimotteo, was balleanda gatmooda Yahuudi mideawa masaweega; nea ghwaan gaba emeeda suguura Yunaani.
44016002	Nea abeeda ea nimuuwwu fuga siduupcheewi mida Listra ea Ikkoniyo ng'asheagaaschi.
44016003	Baulo abeeda gagasa gideaba gaygoodeay sea niny; hean ghwaat ghasmeahooda aba fuga Yahuudi mida hooweanji, aba gideaba ghwanal sean gideaba ghwaan gaba emeeda Yunaani.
44016004	Damanda beawa nea gwasik jeeda mujiinajeegean, hean ghoadaw gang'ul ng'asheega gasa giijasoodiga ea gweargwa aba Yerusaleemu.
44016005	Hean ghwanyas ganiisajeega uurda aba masaweega, ak ghoahaada monneeda nyaawa galeagasean.
44016006	Iiduw geesik ng'eanyiida Fregiya ea Galattiya aba gideaba ghaheawa Gurorooda Ghaydit gwarukwiida ng'asheanda aba ng'eanyiida Asiya.
44016007	Iiduw nea geehitta monghooda ng'eanyiida Musiya, geegasa eeweay Bittuuniya, hean amoadawa gheatta beatta Gurorooda Yeesu;
44016008	hean geang'atta nea geesik ng'eanyiida Musiya, ak gaweay ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Drowa.
44016009	Hean eaweedida geehiimsa Baulo siyagi bea ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya nea ghamiinaada aba hoowa ak gamus Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Ageawuni beenni Makkedooniya weadeasa.”
44016010	iing'atta nea ghwadaah gitta siihiimsean, deagheatta geegasayi eng'eada eweaya Makkedooniya, eahhiida ng'asheega gurneasa Aseetta erukusiina saawa giijasta miy.
44016011	Sing'eadi Drowa hean geeding'di maleambooda ak geelaji bugusta basooda ak geeweayi ea eehitta Samodrakke, ammuchchu geahitti ng'eanyiida Neppoli,
44016012	sing'eadi hoowa geehitta ng'eanyiida Filippi, mujiineeda haw mida Makkedoniya, was ng'eanyiida ambal Ruumi. Hean geeppiidi mjiineetta eawoojusu ng'ay,
44016013	hean eaweeda Sabatto geeweayi ea eritteawana gidaghuut ak geeweayi ghuutta eenda, nea geeghanyi gideaba gwanda heeda jea eamwaashana Aseetta; hean geppiitpiichchi ak geeppaloolji gadeemsu bassageat hoowa.
44016014	Abeeda gwanda gatmoanagi aleeyseasa iit suguura Lidiya, leabu mujiineeda Diyattira, nea gwasheahhiida hang'weakka oomng'i, haw sheayeat ak gabada Aseetta. Hean ghwajaat Ng'uttamiida guroroadaannyi goleeysiit muuchchi ng'asheega rugu Baulo.
44016015	Iiduw nea sippattiisan, sea fugeaba gheannyi, hean gaguurneasa nea gwayi, “Iinoadaayi gideaba aniini geawoschi doabiiwaat aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, abeeda ghoapkaannyi oppiidana gheenyu.”
44016016	Ghayi eaweechcha nea geeweayi heeda sibatta Aseetta, geeroonnyeewi hudi was ging'ng'oonyaneeda mideawa gurorooda ng'ushteayda, nea inyeessa aba ng'ushtaaydaannyi ghwanung' ghwanyas meanang'oodigaaschi lappiyeeda saang'a.
44016017	Hean ghwaat hudida geeshta Baulo ea geeshteanya nea goojuur nea gwayeena, “Fiisu soomjooga Aseetta haw gil, ak ghapka gwarukuneegwa naweeda lealeanooda.”
44016018	Seareedida bea hudideani inyeesa gwasnu askwearjoojiga saang'a, gwaybwak ea ghwanyareas Baulo, ak gwayamsa geaw meang'nyeandida bea eendean ak gwayeeshsha, “Aba gheawunga Yeesu Gristo geayi ritteawana hudi.” Hean gwaritta aba geeshangiga.
44016019	Daah meanang'oodigiga bea hudideaniin ng'asheanji ea gideaba naweedida eawoojusu nyassa meanang'oochcheandumeedean biissa mutgwanda, hean geang'ng'waay Baulo ea Sila ak geengiir ea ehiitta jeannaada was madeeda fuga hees ambaliischi;
44016020	ak iiduw geayaat heeda fuga laja girgweaguutka ak geeyeeshsha, “Fiisu fuga Yahuudi gil ak ghwadattas mujiineedeanya.
44016021	Aba gideaba gwarukwiisa buuneeda deaweedeeda mammiiseasa aseasa fuga Ruumi gideaba gajeeng'ng'waanya ak geeyaachchi geeshta.”
44016022	Ghwaat geeshta nyaawa emeettuw nea ninyareas nea geegasa eabwar ak gageanu fuga laja girgweaguutka ak ghwanung' efakta hang'weakka Baulo ea Sila aba uurda ak ghwanung' ebwar aba ng'aritka.
44016023	Iiduw nea nihit bayiiga nea sisawan muuchchi, hean geejaksa ghealooniga, ak geeyeeshsha furiischoochcheanda gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda gideaba furiischeena muuchchi.
44016024	Iiy ng'asheanji, hean gageanu ak ghwaat jeeda ghooriida duukteawa niirja mida hoowa bea gahiin ak geerassa geeshanga nyaawa gumsheekka daranajeega.
44016025	Hitta bugusta eaweeda abeeda Baulo ea Sila ghamwaash Aseetta nea gwasarman sarmeeda gigheambiitta Aseetta, nea gooleeysiit buneesuurja bea ghealooniga,
44016026	deagheatta gwasimgeaw ng'eanyiida, ak ghwanung' gwadumdum sindeetta gheeda sirattiisa buuneeda; miighoaw gil goottina gidaghuudajeega ak goottineada eara munyalaalajeega siratta fukka bea ghealoonigean.
44016027	Iiduw nea ghang'eat shirikkarajeanda gwachchi furiischi nea ghwadaah gidaghuut ajaadaat, hean gafagu bwaangeadaannyi ak gagasa gwanuus geaw, nea ghaghay gil nuwaapta buuneeda mida ghealooniga.
44016028	Hean gaguurda Baulo nea goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Adinuusi geaw aba gideaba aseasa geendi hiji sean.”
44016029	Hean gaguurda shirikkarajeanda eyeadu gheaboong'nyeanda amahit ghafwach gawa gah, nea ghabwaadan aba muuwda ak goobeedeaysa madeeda Baulo ea Sila,
44016030	hean gooruudu jarooda ak goobearsa nea gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga Mureeda, ak daysin naaha ijea dalaalaan?”
44016031	Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Mwasa Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak gajeelealneey, ea fugeaba gheang'u.”
44016032	Hean geerukusa ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida niny ea fugeaba gheanyi sean.
44016033	Iiduw ghwaat shirikkarajeandida ghoah ak goohuun deaneaduutkeaba fukkeani eaweedida, hean geeppattiisan aba geeshangiga niny ea fugeaba gheanyi.
44016034	Ng'atta ghwaat shirikkarajeandida gheanyi, ak ghoadaw gichchea ghwaak; ak gahoosan sea fugeaba gheanyi aba gideaba nimwas Aseetta.
44016035	Muchchu sakteayda, goojeakta fukka laja girgweaguutkean shirikkara nea gwayeeshsha, “Aweayeena ak goosiksi fukka mida ghealoonigean.”
44016036	Gawa shirikkarajeandida gwachchi furiischiin ak gwarukusa Baulo ng'asheega nea gwayeeshsha, “Niijeagu fukka laja girgweaguutkean eesikseegwa; asi arinni ak gooweayi nea goobea hoyyooh.”
44016037	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa geebwareasa aba madeeda buuneeda, nea meergweakseasa, ak gabiissa aseasa eawosa fuga ng'eanyiida Ruumi, hit geejakseasa ghealooniga; ak ghamneawa geegasa esikseasa aba makcheameeda? Manda! Nung'waada ghapka saawa gwasikseasa.”
44016038	Goodeelsa shirikkarajeega ng'asheanji heeda fuga laja girgweaguutkean, iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta gideaba fuga ng'eanyiida Ruumi gil;
44016039	ghapka gamearmearani. Gooruuna gah ak gwayeeshsha abeawana jeedeaba mujiineedida.
44016040	Iiduw nea gwaritteawa ghealooniga ak gaweay gabareassa Lidiya; hitta nea ghwadaah fuga duupchi, hean goomajeek amahit ghang'eang'eat gaweay.
44017001	Muchchu ghang'eatng'eat gaweay nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Amfippooli ea Appoloniya, ghwahitta ng'eanyiida Desalonikke, mida ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi.
44017002	Hean gawa Baulo jeeda ghooriida, gawuurji gideabeawoojusu bea geallaan, ak gwasheang'dooschi sea buuneeda aba ng'asheega Ng'ooruutka Ghaydit eawooji diktam ea agi;
44017003	abeeda gwarukusa buuneeda gidanyaah ng'ooruutka bea gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas hang'weaniidooda ak gwaduuna miyeeda, ak gabiikta gwayeeshsha, “Yeesuheeni ghamneawa earukuneegwean, Gristo gil.”
44017004	Hean iiduw ghamwas fuga mwaatkwa ak ghwaat geeshta Baulo ea Sila; ak eara fuga saang'a bea Yunaani awali gheang'da Aseetta ea gadeemga saang'a was fuga hees.
44017005	Gwashissa ghaang' fuga Yahuudi, ak gaweay ghamwaghaada fuga munyas seara saang'a aba jeeda mujiini ak gooyuuk buuneeda, hean geeng'eessa gheeh Yason, nea geegasa erruudu jarooda ak geayaat madeeda buuneeda.
44017006	Ama iiduw nea mudeanyas, hean geengiir Yason eayaat sea fiisu ng'ay siduupcheewi ak geayaat ea eehitta madeeda sugoodiga mujiini, nea geechchuur nea geeyi, “Fiisu yam ng'eanyiidean nupka eara hiji,
44017007	ak Yason ea nideapta fiisu; ak fiisu seaniin eanisin ng'asheanda meatteayi sea digheanda sugoochcheanda suguura Gaysaari, nea gwayi, gwanda sugoochcheanda nuut suguura Yeesu.”
44017008	Hean gwahirbaban sugoodiga ambal mujiin iiyiy ng'asheanji.
44017009	Iiduw geeyaaga ghoorjooda Yason ea fugaaschi, amahit geesiksa gaweay.
44017010	Deagheatta gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi Baulo ea Sila eawa gaweay Berooya; hean hitta hooweanji geeweay jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea fuga Yahuudi.
44017011	Fugeaba ng'eanyiitta gooleehiidiit muuchchi mawuurji fuga ng'eanyiida Desalonikke, aba gideaba ghwadeapta ng'asheanda aba hooseaneega, ak ghwasikkiideawa ng'ooruutka ghaydidi galagasean ghwadaah gideaba ng'asheega huumwa gil.
44017012	Ak ghamwas fuga saang'a, aba jeedeaba fiisu eara gadeemga miih ng'ay was fuga hees bea fuga Yunaani ea headiga.
44017013	Iiduw nea ghwayiiy fuga Yahuudi bea ng'eanyiida Desalonikke gideaba Baulo gwarukwiida ng'asheega Aseetta earaba ng'eanyiida Berooya, geeweay ama sihitta geeyuuk buuneeda nea geang'uda foolayda.
44017014	Deagheatta gojeakta fuga siduupcheewi Baulo gawa ng'eanyiida ghuutta basooda nea Sila ea Dimotteo saawa goobiida hoowa.
44017015	Iiduw fukka ghwanyawa adoabiiw Baulohiin ghwaat ea ghoahiitta Adene; hean ghwanung' eyeassa Sila ea Dimotteo, gideaba abeanni alamwajaana hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay.
44017016	Damani ammuukghna Baulo saawa aba Adeenehiin, abeetta ea ninyareas muuchchi aba gideaba ghwadaah mujiineedida nea saang'a duguuga sinung' ghoaw aseechcheekka.
44017017	Aba damani mideawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewean hean gwasheang'nyi sea fuga Yahuudi ea emoojiga suurja awalli gheang'da Aseetta, ea fuga naadi galagasean ea fuga mida hoowa.
44017018	Iiduw gwaroannyi sea fuga suguura Eppikuriya ea Stoigi mideawa fughareenga. Hean gwayeeshsha fuga mwaatkwa, “Siisi ajuuriin gagasa gwayiin?” Gwayi mwaatkwa, “Iisung'ulayi ea rabascheanda rukkwiida giijasta aseechcheekka meenala,” aba gideaba gwarukku ng'asheega Yeesu ea ng'asheega dunnooda.
44017019	Hean geang'ng'waay amahit geayaat heeda Areoppago, ak geeyeeshsha, “Geegasayi eanala gidawas ginealshooni eesh gwachchi igooniin?
44017020	Aba gideaba ng'asheesu iyeaduun aba idigaasa gidabunu gil; asi geegasayi eanala deayeegeaba ng'asheesu gidawas.”
44017021	Fuga ng'eanyiida Adene ea rabasta abiitta hoowa ea mandeawana gheatta jea gwasna gil nuut geaghus rukwiideayda ng'asheega ea giileeysiindeabiit bea ng'asheega bunu.
44017022	Hean ghamiinaada Baulo aba madeeda emeeda mida hiji suguura Areoppagohiin ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea fuga ng'eanyiida Adeene ghaadaayi gideaba agooga ghoabwariinyi muuchchi ng'asheega diini.
44017023	Aba damanda ang'attaawi, ghaadaayi haleanjeedeang'wa bea ghadoweeda, ghaadaayi aba heeda wagiida heeda sung'oorsa ng'asheesu, ‘Heeda aseetta meadaaha.’ Siida obadayi nea moanaliin, dea earukuneegwa iittaannyi.
44017024	Aseetta ghayi bwat muunda ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeesean, niny Ng'uttamiida humng'eeda gil ea ng'eanyiida, niny moobiitteena jeeda gealga sibatta Aseetta sideasa geattinga,
44017025	ak niny ea moammu geattinga buuneeda gagadiiyeesa, gawuurji gili niny gasa gil, deagoona eaweega gil, ak ghoadaw buuneeda gisimeanda ea haleanjeesean.
44017026	Ak gwasin niny aba siyagi emoojiga sean was buuneeda ak ghwanung' goobiida badayda ng'eanyiida, ama ng'atta nea niidaw damannyoojiga ghayi bay gwarukuta niny, ea monghajeega gibinda nyaawa.
44017027	ak abeeda gagasa Aseetta earappeadi rar gideaba eara ghanyi ghawaas niny ak ghwanyas niny. Nea niny ea miih sheageewa siida wassean.
44017028	‘Iisindi jeadaannyi aseasa gendeawi eaweega, ak geeweelweelli, ak gendeawi sasanuukkaasa;’ gawuurji gidanyaashta siyagi aba duumdaannyi nea gwayi, ‘Aba gideaba geewoschi diibigaaschi.’
44017029	Ak aseasa iisiwoschi diibiga Aseetta, ea mwahida gideaba geenung' gawuurji Aseetta lagheanga meang'meang'i, ghana lappiya, ghana lagheaneeda, sin siida ea ghwadaamdaam aba gearinda.
44017030	Damanda lendeeda ninaawa geaw Aseetta, ak ghamneawa gwarukusa buuneeda gideaba aduukkuunana ring'eegeagwa,
44017031	aba gideaba nisin eaweeda jea goorgweaksiina fuga muunda ng'eanyiida nea ghoadoabiiw, aba siitta ghayi loat ninyiin, ak ea niidaw buuneessean ng'asheesu nea goomajeek aba gidaduutteayda aba jeeda miyeeda.”
44017032	Siyiiy iitta ng'asheega duunnooda miyeeda, hean gwajuuga nwaatkwa; nea mwaatkwa gwayeeshsha, “Geegasayi elleeysiiniit gichcha ng'asheanji.”
44017033	Hean ghang'eat Baulo gwanung'usa heeda fukka.
44017034	Iiduw ghwaat geeshtaannyi fuga mwaatkwa ak ghamwas, aba jeedeaba fiisu siyagi Dionisiya gil was siida gheeda girgweageeda bea Areoppago, ea biissa gatmooni suguura Damaari ea fiih suuk mideawa.
44018001	Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghang'eat ghabeawa Adeene ak gawa ng'eanyiida Goriinto.
44018002	Hitta hoowa ghwanyasa siispa Yahuudi suguura Akkila, ghayi sijiilsa ng'eanyiida Bontas, nea ris gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Ittaliya sea gatmoadaannyi suguura Brisila, aba gideaba Glaudio abeeda ninung' gwaritteawa fuga sean bea Yahuudi ng'eanyiida Ruumi. Hean ghang'eat Baulo gawa ghwadaah fiisu;
44018003	iiduw aba gideaba gwasin gadiyeanagi gopteada sea saawa, ak gagadiiyi, aba gideaba gadiyeeda nyaawa sinooda udahabaschajeega.
44018004	Inyeessa eaweeda Sabatto, gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gabalool nea ghaghurghur fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
44018005	Iiduw nea ghapka geaba Sila ea Dimotteo nea gwaleabu Makkedoniya, ghoang'eat Baulo rukwiideayda giijasta, nea gwarukusa fuga Yahuudi gideaba Gristo niny Yeesu.
44018006	Iiduw nea ghaheawa nea geeng'ng'eawi, hean ghang'eat ghwalalakta hang'weakaaschi nea gwayeeshsha, “Foojeandeang'wa gagasa goobiida iheengeagwa! Aniini meandeawani gidamuy. Ak gidang'eada ghamneawa gaydaweesa emoojiga.”
44018007	Ng'eada hoowa gawa goobiida gheapa siisi suguura Ditto Yusto, was siida bada Aseetta, nea gheedeaba siisi gwanda murdeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa.
44018008	Nea Grispayda was siida ahaaghwa ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ghamwas Ng'uttamiida, sea fugeaba gheanyi sean; nea eara fuga Goriinto iiy gidabaloolda Baulo ghamwas ak geppattiisan.
44018009	Ghayi aweanagi gwayeeshsha Ng'uttamiida Baulo aba jeeda girgweatka, “Adibeali, rukwiida giijasta miy nea adisiindi.
44018010	aba gideaba aniini ea ang'iing'i geendeayi, manda siisi jea ghwasannyi ghana gwasawannyi; aba gideaba hiji bea mujiiniin geandeawi fuga saang'a.”
44018011	Hean goobiida ng'eanyiitta ea gwaduulu gweanyagi ea shealah nea ghoanaal ng'asheanda Aseetta aba jeannyaawa.
44018012	Ak damanda waseewa Galiyo sugoochcheanda ahaghwa ng'eanyiida Akkaya, gaguuyi fuga Yahuudi ak gang'eessa Baulo ak geayaat gheeda sirgweachcha,
44018013	nea geeyi, “Siisi ghaghurghur buuneeda ghabwat Aseetta aba naweeda mwaada geeshta deaweeda.”
44018014	Damanda miih gabaloola Baulo, ghwalamda Galiyo ak gwayeeshsha fuga Yahuudi, “Gwachchi inyeeda eanisin gidamuy ghana ng'asheanda mwadoabiiwa, abeeda gaydealeeyseegwa iit, Ea fuga Yahuudi;
44018015	ama sughus ng'asheega sheang'nyeeda bea ng'asheega ea gheawunga deaweedeedeang'wa, adaaha agooga nea goobeayi geat; aniini ghaheawi doaw sichchea gorgweakkiisa ng'asheesu.”
44018016	Ak ghahoan gooruutteawa jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha.
44018017	Hean geeng'eessa sean ak geeng'ng'waay Sostene, was siida ambal ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa, ak geebarsa madeeda girgweageeda. Nea Galiyo gang'ula nea maduupeewana gil ng'asheanji.
44018018	Iing'atta ng'asheesu gobiida Baulo hoowa eawoojiga saang'a, hean ghang'eat gwanung'usa heeda fuga duupchi ak gawa ng'eanyiida Sirya, nea godeayi Brisila sea Akkila. Ng'atta ghwareakghu budeagaaschi aba Gengreya, aba gideaba ghayi gwandeawa radannyeanda.
44018019	Gabiikta ng'eanyiida Efeeso, ak gwanung'usa saawa hoowa; hean gawa niny jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ak gwasheang'dooschi sea fuga Yahuudi.
44018020	Hean geemus endeayi gilgeaw, ak ghaheawa.
44018021	Damani ng'eada gawean gwayeeshsha, “Gaydabiigu heedeang'wa gichcha ng'eang'deang'wa iimwas Aseetta.” Hean ghang'eat gwading'da maleambooda ak ghabeawa Efeeso.
44018022	Gawa amahitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya, ghwararang'aana ak gawa googeechchi fuga ganiisa, amahit ghang'eat gawa Antiyokkiya.
44018023	Hit goobiida hoowa eawoojusu ng'ay ak gawa nea ghabeawa daroar ak gawa daroar nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Galittiya ea Firgia, nea goomajeek ginealanga.
44018024	Ghayi gwanda siispa Yahuudi suguura Appolo sijiilsa ng'eanyiida Aleksandariya, ghwahidu ng'eanyiida Efeeso. Siisi abeeda baloolaneeda gil, ak gabiissa ghwanal muuchchi ng'ooruutka ghaydidi.
44018025	Aba gideaba niny ghayi sinnaal naweani bea Ng'uttamiidean; ak ea guduashang'shang' guroroadaannyi, hean ghoanaal muuchchi nea gabaloola badayda Yeesu, nea ghwadoabiiw ak siisi ghwanal gibattiisanda ghayi bea Yohaana akghwahit.
44018026	Hean ghoang'eat balooldaannyi aba muraneandumeeda aba jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa; hean iiduw nea ghwayiiy Brisila sea Akkila ghuuttaannyi, geayaat ak geennaal muuchchi ng'asheega Aseetta.
44018027	Iiduw nea gagasa ghoaghaaw gawa Akkaya, gageanu fuga siduupcheewi ak gommajeek niny, ak geeng'waar barawajeanda gaweesa ginealangiga ghwadeapta siisi. Damanda hittaawa hoowa, ghaweat fukkeanji muuchchi ghayi mwas aba dagheerjeandumeedean,
44018028	aba gideaba gabalool nea mwaawala gil ea ghwajoar fuga Yahuudi aba eeshpwaara, nea ghoahiimu aba ng'ooruutka ghaydidi gideaba Gristo niny Yeesu.
44019001	Damanda mideewa Appolo Goriinto, hean ghang'atta Baulo nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida ea ghwahitta Efeeso hitta ghwanyasa hoowa ginealang'su ng'ay.
44019002	Hean gwayeeshsha saawa, “Heappi noanyaschi Gurorooda Ghaydidi damanda oamwaseewi?” Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Manda, eara gideaba gwanda Gurorooda Ghaydit miyeayiinya.”
44019003	Goobearsa gichcha nea gwayeeshsha, “Abeetta Ghoanyaschi gibeattiisanda uurjiin?” Geeyeeshsha, “Gibeattiisanda Yohaana.”
44019004	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Yohaana ghayi goobattiisan aba gibattiisanda duukkuunooda ring'eega, ak gwayeeshsha buuneeda amwasa jea gweadu geeshteanyu, was Yeesu.”
44019005	Hean siyiiy ng'asheesu geeppattiisan aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
44019006	Iiduw nea ghwayiin Baulo geattingaaschi iheenga nyaawa, gaba niishuubeesa Gurorooda Ghaydit; ghang'eat gaba niibaloola iit nuut nea gwaramoorani ng'asheega.
44019007	Monneeda buuneessean ea damaniyyeenya.
44019008	Gawa jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa gwarukwiida ng'asheega gheambalmeeda Aseetta nea ghabwadatka ea gwaduulu sheah samwagu, nea goobalool buuneeda nea gwasheang'dooschi aba ng'asheega sugochcheandumeeda Aseetta;
44019009	ak mwaatkwa eahang'oonyi iheen ak ghaheawa ghamwas, ak gong'eawi Naweedida aba madeeda buuneeda, hean ghang'eat gwaheelli fiisu, ak gaweay hichpa geat nea ghwaat ginealanga, ak goobalool galagasean aba seammooda gheappa siisi suguura Dirano.
44019010	Ng'asheesu gwasindunu ea goosha gweannyeew iyyeenya, ea ghwayiiy fuga sean bea ng'eanyiida Asiya ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida sea fuga Yahuudi ea gea Yunaani.
44019011	Gwasin Aseetta gwadeagooda haw aba geattinga Baulo,
44019012	inyeessa gageanu buuneeda weasta hang'da rassa manandaannyi ak geeyeassa fuga miyeani, ak ghahaabwa geeyooning'weaka nyaawa, ak eara fuga bearji meang'eenda gwaritteawa.
44019013	Abeeda gwanda fiisu ng'ay bea Yahuudi neaydooschi aruuttiida meangeenda munyas inyeessa gamanya rukkuunooda gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, appadahuukka fuga mideawa meangeenda munyas nea gwayi, “Geeyeenyi ritteaysiina siisi aba gheawunga Yeesu diitta rukwiida Baulohiin.”
44019014	Eara balooji ispwa bea ashoohoochcheanda haw bea Yahuudi suguura Sikkewa eara saawa gwanda jeedeaba fiisu sin gadiyeaniin.
44019015	Ghwalamda meang'nyeandeenda ak gwayeeshsha saawa, “Ghaanalli Yeesu, ak ghaanalli eara Baulo; as agooga goowoscho geabeang'a?”
44019016	Hean gootkwealsa siidida bearji meang'nyeandeendean saawa ak ghwajoar sean, aba uurda, hean gwasalda jarooda gwaritteawa jeedeaba gheedida nea dawiiri nea sukghuraada.
44019017	Hean geanal iitteaba ng'asheanji aba ng'eanyiida Efeeso ea ghwayiiy gil wassean was fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani; ea ghang'ut buuneeda sean muuwda; ak geekghambiit gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
44019018	Iiduw ghapka fuga saang'a numwas Aseetta ak gwaduukkuuna ring'eega aba madeeda buuneeda ea ng'asheega munyas ghayi sina.
44019019	Nea fuga saang'a ghayi sina ng'asheega meang'nyeandumeeda ghoamughuush gittaabajeega nyaawa ak ghaghwarda aba madeeda buuneessean; gwayiida monneeda lappiyeeda sishaaha gittaabwajeegiga ak ea sagalamnyooji haradam ea damanamughuush.
44019020	Ak aba sarean gageawiit iitta ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida nea ghwanyas uurda muuchchi.
44019021	Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghwanung' Gurorooda ghang'eat Baulo gawa nea gwasik ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya ea Akkaya ak gawa Yerusaleemu nea gwayi, “Iyaahitti hoowa, gaydawa dadaah eara Ruumi.”
44019022	Ng'atta goojeakta fiih iyyeenya was weedangaaschi nea Dimotteo gil ea Erasto, nea niny ghanyi goobiida Asiya eawoojusu ng'ay.
44019023	Aba damandida ghoaptu deakghuyandeeda haw aba ng'asheega Naweeda.
44019024	Aba gideaba siisi suguura Demetriyo, sina lappiya, ghayi biissa gwasna ghoorajeega sibatta Aseetta sisna lappiya bea Artemi, iissa ghwanung' ghwanyas deekshoodiga haleanjeesaang'a.
44019025	Ghang'eat ghabwada geat, fuga gadiyeeda ea fiih suuk sin gadiyeeda uurji ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea oorjooga, ghoanalli gideaba daghwardeanya gwaleabu heedeaba gadiyeani.
44019026	Ak ghamneawa gajayiinya nea gajadeaksiina geat ng'asheega ak ea meakghusa aba Efeeso niriikghta googuulli ng'eanyiisean bea Asiya niny nighurghur fuga saang'a nea ghwayam fughareenga buuneeda nea gwayi aseechcheekkiga sisna geattingean miih aseechcheekka huumwa gil.
44019027	Miih gideaba gadiyeedeanya gwanda jeeda washta foolaweega, eara gheeda sibatta aseetta was gatmooda suguura Artemi, ak geanung' ghoaw gili miih gili, ak geegeandeawa hawundaannyi, biissa gagadoowani Asiyaayda sean ea muunda ng'eanyiida.”
44019028	Iiy ng'asheesu geenyareesi ak geechchuur nea geeyi, “Arteemeeda Efeeso ahaw!”
44019029	Hean ghwadaakghuyan buuneeda sean bea mujiini; ak geetkwealsa ak geeng'waay Gayo ea Aristago saawa abeeda fuga ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya nea gaba bwaranagi sea Baulo, hean geesaldeawa ea eehitta heeda sideanganna.
44019030	Baulo niny abeeda gagasa gawa jeedeaba emeani, ak ghoadeal ginealanga.
44019031	Ak goojeaksa Baulo fuga hees bea Asiya was fugaaschi ghayi duupchi, ak geemus nea geeyeeshsha, adiidu guwi heeda sideanganna.
44019032	Aba damandida gaba siisi ajuur, nea mwaatkwa gabalooldunu; gwayibwak ea ghwadarda girgweageedida ea eamudeanal gidasibattiisa geat.
44019033	Iiduw gwayi buuneeda mwaatkwa siida eadu deakghuyandeeda Iskanda gil, aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi ghwanung' gawa madeeda buuneeda. Hean gang'wachsa Iskanda buuneeda geattindaannyi, ak ghaweat geaw aba baloolda aba madeeda buuneeda.
44019034	Sidaah gideaba niny siida Yahuudi gil, hean geechchuur ea goosha aseechcheew iyyeenya nea geeyeena, “Arteemeeda Efeeso ahaw!”
44019035	Iiduw nea ninung' siida ng'oorshachchi ghwasiinda emeeda gwayeeshsha, “Ea headiga Efeeso, moanali gideaba mujiineeda Efeeso furiischoochcheanda gheeda sibatta aseetta bea Arteemeeda hawi, ak ea dea lagheaneeda abinna humng'eedeani?
44019036	Ak ea manda siida jea ghwashaang' ng'asheesu, asi asiinda, ak ea adoojirjirsi sinooda ng'asheanda.
44019037	Aba gideaba ghamneawa gooyeadu fiisu hiji nea manda ginijagwat aba jeeda gealga sibatta Aseetta nea miigoong'eawi aseetteanya was gatmooda.
44019038	Asi Demetriyo ea fugaaschi bea gadiyeeda, iimida ng'asheanda jea goorgweaksiina siida wassean, asi gealga sirgweachcha ea fuga laja girgweaguutka gwanda; asi orgweaksiina geat aba hoowa.
44019039	Ama mida gilnuut sajaada ogasayi, ayaada madeeda emeeda eesin.
44019040	Aba gideaba aseasa geendi jeeda washta jea ergweakseasa aba deakghuyandeani bea ghamneaweani, ak ea manda samsiinda aba deakghuyandeeni seaniin ak geanung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta deakghuyandeani.”
44019041	Iiduw nea niihit ng'asheesu hean ghoadaarda girgweageeda.
44020001	Iiduw nea ning'atta deakghuyandeedida, hean gaguursa Baulo ginealanga ak goomajeek jeesinga nyaawa ak ghang'eat gawa ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya.
44020002	Hean nea gwasik jeeda ng'eanyiida nea goomajeek saawa gawa ng'eanyiida Yunaani.
44020003	Ng'atta goobiida hoowa sheeh samwagu, muchchu nea gagasa fuga Yahuudi ng'asheega munyas appadaydaannyi nea abeeda eanigasa niny gawa ng'eanyiida Siriya, hean gwasheamu ak gabiigu nea gwasku naweeda Makkedoniya.
44020004	Gawa nea goodeayi Soppattoyda was balleanda Birho leabu Desalonikke; ea Gayoyda leabu Derbe, ea Dimotteo ea Dikkiko sea Drofimoyda ng'eanyiida Asiya.
44020005	Fiisu goosheedeawaneasa ak ghoamukghneasa aba ng'eanyiida Drowa,
44020006	hean geabeawi ng'eanyiida Filippi nea geeding'di maleambooda iing'atta eaweeda mukkattajeega memmattawiitta, ghang'atta eawooji muut ak geahitti heannyaawa aba Drowa, akkeeppiidi hoowa eawooji ispwa.
44020007	Eaweeda madeeda bea eawooji ispwa, nea abeeda ea subwachchi geat easuunya mukkatte, hean goobalool Baulo saawa, nea abeeda gagasa gideaba gaygawa iimuchchu; hean googeawiit baloaldaannyi ea ghoaw bugusta eaweeda.
44020008	Abeeda gwanda beascheekka saang'a aba jeedeaba gheetta sideeksa uhuudeaba niirjean nea subwachchi geat.
44020009	Nea abeeda gwanda balleanji mwanang' suguura Ewudekko apteada aba seawadeeda. Hean ghwalas gheatta ruweanga damanda baloola Baulo ea gageawiit; ea eeyibwak ea ghwajoar ruweanga, ng'atta ghang'adaana humng'eeda uhuuda gheeda siroap samwagu ak geegatkanna ng'eanyi nea nimi.
44020010	Ghwararang'aada Baulo amahitta gwahiiysa geaw, ak ghwayiin daghattaannyi nea gwayi, “Adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi, aba gideaba eaweagaaschi gudugwanda.”
44020011	Iiduw nea gabiikta Baulo gwadiyeada ak ghwasuuy mukkatte ak ghwaak, hean goobalool saawa, ea gageawiit, geeyibwak ea goorearu aseetta, ak ghang'eat Baulo gawa.
44020012	Ng'atta geayaat balleanda ghoah nea majeek, ak ghwanyas buuneeda hawdeayda.
44020013	Iiduw geeshsheedi eweaya mwadi ak geeding'di maleambooda, ak geegasayi ettiing'da Baulo; aba gideaba niny abeeda nibada beatta jea ghwala ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
44020014	Iiduw nea geeroonnyeesi Asso, hean geettiing'di niny ak geapkaannyi ea eahiinna Mitilene.
44020015	Geabeawi jeeda basooda ea eahitta Giyo eaweedeaba iyyeenya; eaweeda bassa geahiitti Samos; ammuchchu eaweeda niirja geahitti Miletto.
44020016	Aba gideaba gagasa Baulo ghwalach bugusta basooda gwasik Efeeso, aba gideaba magassa ghwashing'da aba ng'eanyiida Asiya; aba gideaba gwalamajeesa hitteayda Yerusaleemu, ijea ghoammu ghwahitta eaweeda Bendekosti.
44020017	Damanda mideewa Miletto goojeaksa eeguursa gwearugwa ganiisa mida Efeeso.
44020018	Hean hidu headaannyi, gwayeeshsha saawa, “Agooga ghoanalli gideabiideatti aba heedeang'wa damanyoojiga sean ng'eada dea nallaabi geeshteanyu ng'eanyiida Asiya,
44020019	nea geagadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida nea geayeadayi geaw ng'eanyi muuchchi nea geasni dabeakka ea samsiinda anyaschi aba foolayda fuga Yahuudi;
44020020	ea gideaba miih daheawa rukunooda ng'asheanda wassean miiseegwa, ak ghaanalleagwa aba eeshpwara nea ghaabeawi gheawi ak geawi gheawi,
44020021	ak geamuuwwiisi sean fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani ak gearukusi iitta duukkuunooda aba heeda Aseetta ea iitta masaweega mida jeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
44020022	Ak ghamneawa, ng'ulla, geawi Yerusaleemu, nea ghwaadan Gurorooda, nea mwaanali ng'asheega jea gabussean aba hoowa;
44020023	geaghus gitta nimuwwunean Gurorooda Ghaydit aba mujiinajeega sean bea gideaba ghoamuukghunaan ghealooniga ea sawanadeeda.
44020024	Ak ea mwanung' ghoaw eaweegeasu gil ghana danung' ghoaw gidaghaloamwaat, geagasayi ghanyi dahiit gadiyeedeanyu anyaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak geammuuwwu iitta giijasta miy bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
44020025	Asi ghamneawa, ng'ulla, aniini ghaanaalleagwa oagasean nea geaneayeewi jeedeang'wa nea geerukkwiidi giijasta sugoochcheandumeeda ak ea manda siida jea gudughwadaah gheamamdeanyu.
44020026	Asi ng'asheesu geamuwwuneegwa askwareani gideaba mandanean gidinyeanda aba foojeandeang'wa oagasean,
44020027	aba gideaba miih danung'waada rukunooda girgweageeda Aseetta. Asammiisiina geat oagasean sea hawanda,
44020028	was gea ghayi nung' Gurorooda Ghaydit ahuuwa fuga jea ghoahaaghwa, ak goong'ulayi ganiiseeda Aseetta ghayi nyas aba foojeanda Balleandaannyi bea saseadaannyi.
44020029	Ak ghaanalli iimuchchu nea neawi gayghwahidu jeedeang'wa suuyeekka ng'weani, jea ea mayghwalach hawanda;
44020030	nea aba jeedeang'wa agooga gaygwarinna fuga jea gwargu ng'asheega ng'ooweatta, jea ghwanung' ghwaat ginealanga geeshta nyaawa.
44020031	Asi oang'ng'wearni, nea ghoapkaachchi gideaba aba gweannyeew samwagu miih danung'waada rekusiimba giliwas siih aba dabeakka.
44020032	Ak ghamneawa ghadawjeegwa Aseetta ea ng'asheanda dagheerjeandumeeda, jea ghoammu gwadeekneegwa nea gagooneegwa hearaniischooda aba jeeda fuga sean ghayi simmiidu.
44020033	Ak ea miih dashissa ghaang' lappiyeeda siida ghana lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ghana eagweega.
44020034	Ak ghoanalli agooga gideaba aniini geagasayi aba geattingeasu, ak ghaanyaschi haleanjeeda aba gitteenna, sea fugeandeawi.
