44020035	Aba haleanjeessean naahiimneegwa gideaba iisawaneattunu abeeda giweadi fuga ng'arng'ari, nea ghoapkaachchi ng'asheega Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, heeda eneewa, ‘Ghang'wana giidaydeayda mwasamwa gideaba geegoonnyi,'"
44020036	Iing'atta rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gwatkuy ak ghamwaash Aseetta sean.
44020037	Ng'atta gooyyeawda sean ak ghwayiin Baulo daghanuunatka nyaawa nea ghwasam,
44020038	ghwanung' gwaramagu gagiisan sean appadaydeaba ng'asheandida rukutean, bea gideaba maygudu abiikta adaaha gheamamdeanyu. Hean geayaat heeda maleambooda.
44021001	Iiduw nea gwaheelli saawa, hean geeding'di maleambooda ak geeweayi ea ehitta ng'eanyiida Gosi muchchu geeweayi ea ehitta Roode, sing'eadi hoowa geeweayi Battara.
44021002	Sihiitti hoowa geanyaschi maleambooda jea gawa ng'eanyiida Foinikke, hean geeding'di ak geeweayi.
44021003	Iiduw nea geang'ng'weardi geedaayi ng'eanyiida Saypras, hean geelaabi meatkweeda geattinda ghaadaam ak geeweayi Siriya, iiduw geewuschi aba ng'eanyiida Diro; aba gideaba gajeerrareeng'u dabitta mida jeedeaba maleambooni.
44021004	Sihitti hoowa geenyasi ginealanga ak geendeayi ea ghang'atta eawooji ispwa, hean gabaloola ginealang'su uurda Gurorooda ak geeyeeshsha Baulo aduwi ng'eanyiida Yerusaleemu.
44021005	Iiduw nea niisha askwearjoojigaasa, geeweayi bareannyeekkaasa nea ghoadoabiiweasa sean ea gadeemga nyaawa ea diibiga nyaawa, ea gooruutteawaneasa mujiini; hean sihitti ghuutta basooda geetkunyi ak geemwaaschi Aseetta nea geakghachchi geat sean.
44021006	Hean iiduw geeheeli ak geeding'di maleambooda nea gabiikta saawa ghoah.
44021007	Iiduw nea gwaduulean bareannyeekka aba Drowa, geeweayi ea ehitta Domayi; ak geekkeachcheewi fuga siduupcheewi ak geendeayi eaweechchaanjagi.
44021008	Iimuchchu geeweayi Gaysariya, amasihitti geeweayi gheeh Filippo was siida rukwiida giijasta miy, niny gaba jeedeaba fughayi assispwa siloat ak geeppiidi gheannyi.
44021009	Ak siisi ghayi gwandeawa haw ang'wan miyeasat, nea abeeda haweesu gwarukwiida ramooranga.
44021010	Iiduw nea geeppiidi hoowa eawoojusu ng'ay, iiduw ghwahidu sibaneeda suguura Agabo leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi.
44021011	Hidu heedeanya gageanda ghealooda mananda Baulo ak ghwarada geeshangaaschi ea geattingaaschi ak gwayeeshsha, “Gwayi Gurorooda Ghaydit, ‘Fuga Yahuudi mida Yerusaleemu gayghwarattunu siisi bea ghealooniin, ak geeyiin geattinga emoojiga.'"
44021012	Siyiinyi ng'asheesu, hean geemearmearanayi aseasa ea fukka mida hooweanjiin gideaba adagawa Yerusaleemu.
44021013	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Agooga goosinnyi naaha, shookka nea googasayi ang'udanaan guroroodeanyu muuwda? Aba gideaba meakghusa gideaba geerattean, geawoschi hidaat eara enuusan aba Yerusaleemu aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.”
44021014	Iiduw nea ghaheawa ng'asheagaasa, hean geasiindi ak geeyeenyi, “Nung'waada gwasin Ng'uttamiida gidagassiida.”
44021015	Iing'atta gibindeaba eawoojigiga, hean gearachchi sareendeanya ak geeweayi Yerusaleemu.
44021016	Nea geetteayyeewi ginealanga mwaatkwa bea ng'eanyiida Gaysariya ak ghwaadeasa ea ghoahiittaneasa gheeh Mnasoni was siida ng'eanyiida Saypras, ak siisi was ginealaneeda, ak ea siida jea eppiidana gheannyi.
44021017	Sihitti Yerusaleemu, ghwadeaptaneasa muuchchi fuga siduupcheewi aba hooseaneega.
44021018	Iimuchchu geetteayi sea Baulo ea eeweaya gheeh Yakkobo ak eara gweargwa sean gwanda hoowa.
44021019	Hit gigeachcheeda hean gwarukuta iitta huumwa bea ng'asheega sean sissa Aseetta fuga emoojiga aba gadiyeadaannyi.
44021020	Siyiiy ng'asheesu, geekghambiit Aseetta. Ak geeyeeshsha niny, “Ea oorjeediyya, ghamneawa gidaahi gideaba gwanda fuga Yahuudi nyiit sagalamnyoojiga ak ghamneawa ea numwas; ak ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheega deaweeda.
44021021	Ak ea sinyas iittaang'u gideaba inyeessa ginaali fuga Yahuudi mida bugusta emoojiga ghaheawa Muusa, amwaada diibiga nyaawa ghasmeahooda ak ea adaghwaat geeshta searoojiga fuga Yahuudi.
44021022	Ghamneawa gajeesna naaha? Gajeasinyas iitta gideaba nihidu.
44021023	Asi ghamneawa sinda gissurukuneey. Geendeawi fiih ang'wan ghayi mideawa radannyeanda,
44021024	geanda fisu ak gimmiidu geaw sea saawa ak giidaydi haleanjeeda deaschi gimmiinooda, ak ghwareakghwa iheenga nyaawa. Ak abeeda ghwanal buuneessean gideaba manda gil appadayda ng'asheega surgu appadaydaang'u duukku ang'iing'i gipteadi nea ging'ulayi deaweeda.
44021025	Ng'asheega badaydeaba fukka was Emoojigean numwasiin, goolla eng'oorsiina barawajeanda gideaba adaghwaak giliwassean sibwara heelga aseechcheekka ng'uyyeega, ea gideaba adeali foojeanda, adeayaak bannyeega diyeayda wassean sing'ng'waay ghuutta, ak geepuut hiseadayeandumeeda.”
44021026	Muchchu ghang'eat Baulo ak goodeayi fukkeanji ghadoweeda ak ghoammiidu geaw sea saawa ak gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gwarukusa buuneeda huydeanda eaweeda gimmiinoodeabwa geat nea gaba siisi adayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi appadahuukka nyaawa.
44021027	Iiduw nea niriikghta goosha eawooji ispwa hean ghwadaah fuga Yahuudi leabu Asiya ak ghwadaah nea gwanda jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, hean geehaak emeessean ak geeng'ng'waay,
44021028	ak geechchuur nea geeyi, “Ea fuga Israeeli apkaani aweadeesa! Siisi niih dea ghayi aneali buuneeda aba ng'eanyiisseani ak ghwanung' gafool buuneeda deaweeda ea ng'eang'i; ak gabiissa gweadu fuga Yunaani jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ea nung'uda ririnnyeanda heeda ghadit.”
44021029	Ng'asheanji geerukuna gideaba geadaah ammwadi siisi suguura Drofimo bea ng'eanyiida Efeeso, nea gwandeawa niny aba mujiini ak geeghay gideaba Baulo gweadu jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta.
44021030	Hean googuuli mujiineesean nea ghwadakghuyan ea ghapka buuneessean leabu meadajeega sean ak ghabwat geat hean geeng'ng'waay Baulo ak geengiir ea eruutteawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gearat ghuutta gheeda.
44021031	Damandida duu eegassa nuustaannyiin, hean ghwanyas iidi shirikkarajeanda haw gideaba Yerusaleemu nidakghuyan.
44021032	Gooseelu shirikkarajeanda haw aba geeshangiga lugooda shirikkara ea ashoohoodiga nyaawa ak gaweesa saawa; ang'wearda nea ghwadaah shirikkarajeanda haw ea lugoodaannyi bea shirikkara, hean geenung'waada bayiiga Baulo.
44021033	Gaweesa shirikkarajeanda haw Baulo ak ghwang'ng'waay, ak gwayeeshsha aradana munyaloalaji iyyeenya, amahit ghoabwaarda, siida was ng'eaha, ea ginnisin.
44021034	buuneeda mwaatkwa mida jeedeaba emeedida goojuur nea marukuna gili nuut gwargu diitta; ea mutghwanal gichchea gwasin aba giijuureandeaba fiisu, hean gwarukusa fugaaschi gideaba ayaada Baulo ghealooniga.
44021035	Iiduw nea sihitta ak ghoalla giding'eanda gidaghuut, geeyibwak ea ghwasar shirikkara aba gideaba niraanya emeeda;
44021036	aba gideaba ghwaat geeshtaannyi emeetuw nea goojuur nea gwayi, “Anuusa!”
44021037	Damani riikghta eahhiinna Baulo ghealoonigean, hean gamus shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Gisagasayi darukuneey ng'ashaani?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ginali iitta emeeda Yunaani?
44021038	Ang'iing'i muwosi siida ng'eanyiida Misri, heetta neekki ang'eat ng'uchcheeda ak ghwaat fiih sagalamnyooji ang'wan, bea Asaasin ghwaat dareapcheeda?”
44021039	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini geawoschi siida Yahuudi, leabu Darso mida Gilikkiya, aniini geawoschi siida mujiineeda miih nalaat; eaniyean siksean deabalool fiisu.”
44021040	Hean sisiksa gabalool, hean ghamiinaada Baulo aba uhuuda giding'eeda ak ghamiinda geattinda gwareekusa buuneeda ghwasiinda hean ayi saw buuneeda, hean ghoang'eat gabalool aba ghuutta Ebraniya nea gwayi:
44022001	“Fuga eaduupcheewi, ea geaba Bwaabwa, eaniyean olleaydiit dargu ng'asheegeasu aba madeedeang'wa.”
44022002	Siyiiy gidabaloolda aba ghuutta Ebraniya, hean geeyi saw ak geelleeysiit muuchchi aba damanda baloola ak gwayi:
44022003	Aniini geawoschi siida Yahuudi, geejiilsean ng'eanyiida Darso mida Gilikkiya, ak geahissiini heeda mujiineeni, ak ghwaanaalaan Gamaliyeeli muuchchi ng'asheega deaweedeeda ghayi bea gweargwaasa ak geasinnyi gadiyeeda Aseetta gawuurji gidaghamneawa owuurjeewi agooga.
44022004	Ghayi inyeessa ghaanung' ghwanyas hang'weaniidooda fukka aat Naweaniin nea geanuuseadi, ak ghaarachchi, inyeessa geajaksi ghealooniga sean headiga ea gadeemga,
44022005	ng'asheesu aba damandida gamuuwwu ashoohoochcheanda haw ea gweargwa sean bea girgweageeda aba gideaba gagoonan barawajeanda fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ghaayaachchi Dameski, hean geawi daang'ng'waay fukkeanji ak geayeadu Yerusaleemu nea sirada geattinga ammuchchu geabwar.
44022006	“Iiduw nea geawi bareannyeekkeasu nea geaneekkiisi Dameski, abeeda nihitta aseetteaba lah bea askweari, deagheatta ghoabwaanyan weeshinda haw muuchchi leabu humng'eeda.
44022007	Ak geabeedeaysi ng'eanyi ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta siida nea gwayi, ‘Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan andagighabwaschaan?’
44022008	Ak ghaanyaaschi, ‘Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil Ng'uttamiida?’ Ak gwasha nea gwayeeshshean, ‘Aniini geawoschi Yeesuyda Nasareetti ighabwasi.’
44022009	Fukkeanji gwachchi eandeawiin ghwadaah weeshindida ak eamiighwayiiy ghuutta siida abaloolan.
44022010	Ak geabearsi gideaba, ‘Ghamneawa gaydasin naaha Ng'uttamiida?’ Ak gwayeeshshean Ng'uttamiida, Ng'eada ak guwi Dameski ak gajeerukuneey haleanjeesean jea eegoonnyi sina.
44022011	Hean nea muttaammu daang'wearda aba weeshindida ng'waaniin, hean ghoang'ng'waanyaada geattindeanyu fukwachchi eandeawi ea ghoahiittanaan Dameski.”
44022012	“Abeeda siyagi suguura Ananiya was siida doabiiwaat ang'ng'waay muuchchi deaweeda, biissa gwarukkuuna buuneessean bea Yahuudi mida hoowa ng'asheega miyaas badaydaannyi,
44022013	ghwahidu heedeanyu, ak ghamiinaada aba murdeedeanyu ak gwayi, ‘Oorjeediyya Sauli, ang'wearda.’ Hean ghang'weardi aba geeshangiga ak ghaadaayi niny.
44022014	Hean gwayeeshshean, ‘Aseetta ghweanigaasa niloannyi aba gidagasa, ak gidaahi dea Assagi Doabiiwaat ak giyiinyi ghuuttaannyi;
44022015	ak gayhuwa muushoochcheanda aba heeda buuneessean, aba ng'asheega idaahi nea giyiinyi.
44022016	Ghamneawa gimuughu naaha? Ng'eada eppattiisannyi, ak geehhuun ring'eegaagu, nea giguursi gheawungaaschi.'"
44022017	“Iiduw nea geebiikti Yerusaleemu ak ghamwaaschi Aseetta aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseettean, hean geargweadayi
44022018	ghaadaayi niny ak gwayeeshshean, ‘Lamwaja ak gibeawi Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba fiisu mayghamwas ng'asheesu imuuwwu bea badaydeanyuun.’
44022019	Ghaalamdi ak geayeeshshi, ‘Ng'uttamiida, saawa ghwanal muuchchi gidaghayi eabadiinniidi jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa ak ghang'ng'waannyi buuneeda nea ghaabwarji fuga mwasnyi ak geajaksi ghealooniga.
44022020	Eara damanda ghayi sihhiidaawa foojeanda muushoochcheandaang'u suguura Stefaano, abeeda geandi heeda ak ghaadaayi aba heedeanyu gideaba ng'asheandida ghwadoabiiw, ak geefurji hang'weakkeaba fukka nuusiin.’
44022021	Ak gwayeeshshinean, ‘Una aba gideaba gaydeajeaktaneey heeda sheagi was ng'eanyiida emoojiga.'"
44022022	Geelleeysiit ama rugu ng'asheanji; hean geechchuur muuchchi nea geeyi, “Oang'ng'aamwana siisi hiji ak goonuuschi! Mammiisiina giibinda.”
44022023	Ea mwasiinda giijuureanda nea gooyuuk hang'weakka nyaawa nea gwasaksa birjeanda humng'eeda,
44022024	hean gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda haw ayaada ghealooniga ak ghoabwarji nea ghoannyaashchi ng'asheesu ak gajeanala gidajuura fiisu ea gwasnu appadaydaannyi.
44022025	Iiduw nea nihit raditta aba ghealooniga, ghoanyaash Baulo shirikkarajeanjagi miinaada aba hoowa nea gwayeeshsha, “Heappi ghwadoabiiwi gideaba geabwar siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, nea miyeergweaksa?”
44022026	Iiy ng'asheanji shirikkarajeandida gawa gwarukusa shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi sina naaha? Siisi gaba ng'eanyiida Ruumi.”
44022027	Hean gaweesa shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Heappi rukunean, ang'iing'i guwosi siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi?” Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea geawoschi.”
44022028	Ghwalamda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Eara aniini geawoschi siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, aba gideaba ghaadaydi lappiyeeda saang'a.” Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini ghayi geejiilsean ng'eang'i.”
44022029	Hean ghang'eatng'eat gaweay aba geeshangiga fukka gwachchi gasa goonyeeri ng'asheegean aba geeshangiga; eara shirikkarajeanda haw iiduw ghabeal, iijeeng'u gideaba Baulo siida ng'eanyiida Ruumi gil, ea gideaba gwachchi nirada.
44022030	Iimuchchu sakteayda, gagasa danal gidabaysiina fuga Yahuudi giheakteaydaannyi, ak abeeda goottin, ak ghwanung' ghabwat gea ashoohoodiga hees sea gweargwa girgweageeda, ak gweadu Baulo ak ghwanung' ghamiinaada aba madeannyaawa.
44023001	Hean gang'ula Baulo fukka bea girgweageedean muuchchi ak gwayeeshsha niny, “Fugeaduupcheewi, aniini geabiideawi gurorooda miy aba madeeda Aseetta ea ghoaw ghamneawa.”
44023002	Ghwalamda ashoohoochcheanda haw suguura Ananiya ak gwayeeshsha fukka miinaada aba murdeadaannyiin, alasa ghuutteaba siisi.
44023003	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Gayghwalasnyi Aseetta ang'iing'eani uwosi ghamarda siyeasha ronghoodean! Iijea apteada ak girgweaksean aba naweeda deaweeda, nea ang'iing'i giyami deaweeda ak ginung' eabwaran?”
44023004	Gwayeeshsha fukka miinaada aba hooweaniin, “Aba sarean ging'eaway ashoohoochcheanda haw bea Aseetta?”
44023005	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi, miidanal gideaba niny ashoohoochcheanda haw gil; aba gideaba geang'waar, ‘Adirgu ng'asheanda muy aba badayda siida ambal fugaagu.'"
44023006	Hean nea gwajeeng'u Baulo gideaba fukka bea girgweageedean mwaatkwa Sadukkayajeega gil nea mwaatkwa ea Farisayajeega gil, hean goojuur aba madeeda girgweageeda nea gwayi, “Fugeaduupcheewi, aniini geawoschi Farisayajeanda, balleanda Farisayu; ak geandeawi mureeda aba gidaararji ea duunnooda miyeeda ak ghamneawa geergweaksean.”
44023007	Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, hean gwardu jaliida aba heeda fuga Farisayu ea gea Sadukkayo ea ghabwaasha girgweageeda.
44023008	Aba gideaba gwayi fuga Sadukkayo manda duunnooda, ghana malaykajeanda, ghana gurorooda; nea fuga Farisayajeega ghamwas gideaba suuh gwanda sean.
44023009	Hean ghoahaada giijuureanda; ak ghamiinaada ng'oorshoodiga mwaatka bea Farisayu ak ghoaniikgh nea gwayi, “Aseasa meadaahi gilimuy aba heedeaba siisi. Siisi ideeppa eaniibalool gurorooda ghana malaykajeanda abeeda gwanda naaha?”
44023010	Geeyi bwak ama heedu jaliida ea ghang'ut muuwda shirikkarajeanda haw nea gwayi, eannean Baulo gajeabwaashaada, ak gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda eaniyean oappitta jeedeaba fukka ak goong'ng'oonyu Baulo amahit ghoattealdi ghealooniga.
44023011	Hean eaweeda bassa gwadaah Baulo nea ghamiinaada Ng'uttamiida aba murdeadaannyi ak gwayeeshsha, “Adibeali, aba gideaba nimuwwuunean aba Yerusaleemu, ak gaymuwwuuni aba Ruumi.”
44023012	Iimuchchu sakteayda, gaweay gwasin fuga Yahuudi makcheameeda ak ghwaak habeawooda gideaba, “Mwajeayaaga gil nea mwajealeaha gil ea eaghus ea sinuuschi Baulo.”
44023013	Fuga gasa enuus Baulo ghwanaawa haradam.
44023014	Hean geeweay heeda ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa ak geeyeeshsha, “Aseasa siyaaji habeawooda gideaba majeayaaga gil ea eaghus ea sinuuschi Baulo.
44023015	Eaniyean agooga ea gweargwa gheeda girgweageeda, ochcheaksiina shirikkarajeanda haw gideaba eanni Baulo heedeang'wa ak goohindi geat giloogasayi anala ng'asheega muuchchi aba headaannyi ak geawoschi hidaat enuusa nea miih gwaneekkiit.”
44023016	Hean ghwayiiy ng'asheesu balleanda huda geennyea Baulo, hean gawa heeda abiitta shirikkara ak gwarukusa Baulo ng'asheesu.
44023017	Hean gaguursa Baulo shirikkarajaanjagi ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyea aada balleanji heeda shirikkarajeanda haw gwanda ng'asheanda gasa gwarukusa.”
44023018	Ghwaat balleandida ea ghoahiitta heeda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Goojeakneani Bauloyda mida ghealooniga deanneey balleanji aba gideaba gwanda ng'asheanda jea gwarukuneey.”
44023019	Hean ghoang'ng'waay shirikkarajeanda haw geattinda balleandida ak ghwaat hichpwa geaw ak ghoannyaash, “Gigasayi rukunean naaha?”
44023020	Ak gwayeeshsha, “Heetta niirgweach fuga Yahuudi ak gwaheelleesa gideaba gajeepka eemusnyi aada Baulo gheeda sirgweachcha nea gaygwahinda geat fukka bea gheeda sirgweachcheen giligasa ghwanal ng'asheega muuchchi aba badaydaannyi.
44023021	Asi adumwasi aba gideaba ghamneawa gwanda fuga abiina haradam jea gwanuus, eaniyaak habeawooda gideaba maygweagischi nea mayghwali gil ea eaghus ea sinuus Baulo; ghamneawa saawa ghoammughu gidajea nyaasha ang'iing'i.”
44023022	Ghwalamda shirikkarajeanda haw ak gwayeeshsha, “Eaniyean adaghwayiiy siih gideaba nihidu rukunean ng'asheanji, asi ng'eada una.”
44023023	Hean gaguursa shirikkaraji iyyeenya ak gwayeeshsha, “Iibea eaweeda samwagu ghoang'aapchi shirikkaraji bughalaji iyeenya sea shirikkaraji laadam ea damwanamughuush mideawa farasajeega ea shirikkaraji bughalaji iyyeeya ng'uchcheatta ng'utkeakka ak gooweayi ng'eanyiida Gaysariya.
44023024	Ak gigasayi faraaseeda jea gwading'da Baulo, ak giyeadu nea gaba seayu ea ahiinni heeda Feliiseeda was sugoochcheanda haw.”
44023025	Ak ghang'waardunu barawajeanda:
44023026	“Aniini Gilawdiyooyda Lisiya gil, ak geang'oorneey barawajeanji ang'iing'i Sugoochcheanda Mureeda Feliisi. Seayu.
44023027	Siisi ghoang'ng'waay fuga Yahuudi, ak gwaramagu gwanuus, iiduw geawi roonnyeeda nea geadeani shirikkara ak ghaweachchi, ak geegu iitta gideaba siisi gaba ng'eanyiida Ruumi.
44023028	Hean geagasayi danal gidinyeandeaba siisi, ak ghayaachchi madeeda girgweageeda.
44023029	Hean geajeeng'u gideaba geergweaksiina sheang'nyeeda ng'asheega deaweedeeda gheannyaawa, ak ea mwaadaahi ramaseanda sin siisi miisa nuusta ghana gawa ghealooniga.
44023030	Iiduw nea geeyeanean iitta gideaba geesin badiida gichchea gwanuusta, hean geabay deadu headaang'u, gwargu fuga argweaksa gidamideayeesa siisi.”
44023031	Hean gageanu shirikkara aba gitta ghayi sinnaldaan, ak ghwaat Baulo eawa ea ghoahiitta heeda Antipatri.
44023032	Iimuchchu gabiikta shirikkareetta heeda abiitta, nea ghwanung'wa heeda shirikkareeda beawa farasajeega nea ghwaat Baulo.
44023033	Geeweay, ama sihitta ng'eanyiida Gaysariya ak ghoadaw sugoochcheanda barawajeandida, hean geayiin Baulo madeadaannyi.
44023034	Ahiit gissoomandeaba barawajeandida, hean ghoannyaashta gideaba gwaleabu ana daroar. Iiduw ghwanal gideaba gwaleabu ng'eanyiida Gilikkiya.
44023035	Ghwalamda ak gwayeeshsha, “ Gaydealeeysiit girgweageadaang'u iihidu fuga ahaaktaneey. Ak gwayeeshsha, ayaada jeeda gheeh Heroode ak goofurji.”
44024001	Iing'atta eawooji muut ghang'eat ashoohoochcheanda haw suguura Ananiya hean ghwaan nea goodeana gwearsu ng'ay ea dinagiida suguura Dertulo. Hean ghwayiin madeeda sugoochcheanda haw gidasiihaaktaawa Baulo;
44024002	iiduw nea geeguursa, ghoang'eat Dertulo giiheakteayda nea gwayi, “Dea nihaghwideawaneasa iissa geehoosannyi nea geebeayi hoyyooh, nea aba gheambalmeadaang'u, Feliseeda Mureeda, nirdu ng'asheega siyamyam appadaydeaba ng'eanyiin,
44024003	aba naweadinga sean ea heeda wassean iissa geamwaschi ng'asheesu aba badiischooda.
44024004	Ak ea meegassi deammiikta aseettaang'u, geemuscheeyi aba alooheadaang'u alleeyseasa iit muuchchi.
44024005	Aba gideaba sidaayi siisi gaba ng'ooweatta, siida ang'eedi giiheakteayda buuneeda aba jeeda fuga Yahuudi sean mida muunda ng'eanyiida, ak gabiissa ea siida mida madeeda fuga Nasarayo gil.
44024006	Ak siisi gagasa ghang'uda ririnyeanda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak iiduw geang'ng'waannyi. Ak [geegasayi eergweaksiinana naweeda deaweedeeda ghaheanya.]
44024007	Iihahidu shirkkarajeanda haw sunguura Lisiya ak ghwareadeasa aba uurda.
44024008	Asi ginyaashi ang'iing'i gwadeeppa nyasa aba headaannyi ng'asheega sean siihaaktaawi.”
44024009	Ghwaroap ghuutta fuga Yahuudi nea gwayeeshsha ng'asheesu siihaaktaawa ghoahiimu gideaba sean huumwa gil.
44024010	Hean nea gwayeeshsha sugoochcheanda haw baloola, ghwasha Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Ghaanalli gideaba niyaagi gweannyeekka saang'a aba gadiyeani bea lachchooda girgweaguutkean aba jeedeaba emeani. Asi gaydaweat geaw nea geahoosannyi.
44024011	Giimmuusi gakkiisiina geaw huumeandeaba ng'asheanji, gideaba miighwanaawa eawooji damaniyyeenya dea nabeawi damwaash Aseetta aba Yerusaleemu;
44024012	ak ea miyeenyasanaan hich nea geesheang'nyeewi siih ghana ehidu nea ghang'waalng'waalli buuneeda, aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghana jeeda ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa ghana hiji wassean bea jeeda mujiini.
44024013	Ghana sikteawana ng'asheanda ahaaktaawanaan;
44024014	asi ghaamwaschi ng'asheanji aba madeadaang'u, nea gideaba aba naweeda, was dea diini, iissa ghaabwachchi Aseetta ghweanigaasa, ak ghaamwaschi ng'asheega sean siyiin madeedeanyu aba deaweeda ghana dea sung'oorsa sibanga,
44024015	nea ghaaghuschi Aseetta, ak eara saawa ghamwas ng'asheanji, bea gideaba gaygwanda duunooda aba heeda fuga doobiiweadi ea gea miih doobiiweadi.
44024016	Iissa aniini ghaanyaschi sawanadeeda galeagasean ak ghaanyaschi fughareeda miy aba heeda Aseetta ea heeda buuneeda.
44024017	Iing'atta gweanyeekka saang'a ghawunnyi deassa fuga emeedeanyu haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda ea gujaweeda.
44024018	Damandida easni ng'asheesuun, ghwahidu nea ning'atta gimmiinoodeaba geaw aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea manda emeani eandeawi ghana deakghuyandeeda.
44024019	Abeeda gwanda fiispa Yahuudi ng'ay leabu ng'eanyiida Asiya, fiisu gidabal gwachchi ghapka hiji ak goshooynaneegwa ak gwasin gichchea ghoahaaktaawa, iimida ng'asheanda wassean jea ghoahaaktaawanaan.
44024020	Ghana nung'waada fiisu gwargu ramaseanda deaksean aba damanda ghayi amiinaadawi aba madeeda girgweageeda,
44024021	geaghus ng'ashaanjagi earukutti nea ghaamiinaadi aba madeannyaawaan, ‘Appadayda duunnooda fuga nimeewa ghoaw gissirgweaksiinanean ghamneawa aba madeedeang'wa.'"
44024022	Abeeda Feliksi ea doobiiwaat fughara aba Naweeda, iiduw gwayeeshsha, “Iihidu hiji shirikkarajeanda suguura Lisiya, gaydeang'weersa girgweageadaang'u.”
44024023	Hean ghoadaw shirikkarajeanda iitta gideaba ayiina gah ak ghoanung' goobal geaw gilimwanang', ak ea adoakghuumnyi fugaaschi duupchi aba eassiinda haleanjeeda gasa.
44024024	Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwahidu Feliksi nea godeana gatmoadaannyi suguura Drusila, bea emeeda Yahuudi; hean ghwanung' eeyeadu Baulo amahit gooleeysiit ng'asheega baloola bea iitta masaweega Yeesu Gristo.
44024025	Damanda balool Baulo ak ghwasat ng'asheega doobiiwnatta ea gheadeenda ea iitta girgweaksiinda jea ghwahidu, ghabeal Feliksi ak gwayeeshsha, “Nyoobiikta, iyaanyaschi gheatta gichcha gaydaguurneey.”
44024026	Inyeessa damandida ghaghay gideaba Baulo gayghwasaaw. Hean inyeessa gaguursa ak goobalool.
44024027	Muchchu nea ning'atta gweannyeew iyyeenya, ghoaghiis hoorgeeda Feliksi siisi suguura Barkiyo Festo; ak gagasa gooduupchi geaw fuga Yahuudi, muchchu Feliksi ghwanung'wa Baulo ghealooniga.
44025001	Muchchu ghwahidu Festo jeeda ng'eanyiidaannyi, ng'atta eawooji samwagu hean ghang'eat ak gawa Yerusaleemu nea ghabeawa Gaysariya.
44025002	Hean ghang'eat ashoohoodiga hees sea fuga hees bea Yahuudi ak geattaw iitta girgweageeda Baulo, hean geemus,
44025003	ghamwas eyeadu siida Yerusaleemu, aba gideaba geasach naweeda jea eabwara ghami damanda mideewa naweeda.
44025004	Ghwalamda Festo ak gwayeeshsha, Baulo geefur aba hoowa bea Gaysariyahiin, ak aniini geagasayi dawa hoowa askwearjoojusu duwaawiin.
44025005	“Asi,” aba ginnyah, “fukka ambaliischi aba jeedeang'wean anung' deadeayi, ama iimida ng'asheanda muy nisin siisi abeeda gorgweaksa.”
44025006	Iing'atta gibindeaba hoowa eawooji sis ghana damanamughuush sea saawa, iiduw gawa Gaysariya, muchchu gawa jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ak goopteada aba hoorgeeda amahit gwayeeshsha ayeanni Baulo.
44025007	Iiduw nea geeyeadu, hean gwaneaweesa fuga Yahuudi leabu Yerusaleemu ak geahaakta, hean geenappiisa ng'asheega saang'a durmani moammu gogingiini.
44025008	Hean ghaweat geaw Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Aniini manda gidinyeanyi neasinnyi bea ng'asheega deaweedeeda fuga Yahuudi, ghana gheeda sibatta Aseetta ghana ramaseanda aba heeda sugoochheanda suguura Gaysaari.”
44025009	Festo abeeda gagasa ghoammiidu geaw aba heeda fuga Yahuudi, hean ghoanyaash Baulo nea gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi una Yerusaleemu ak geergweakseeyi aba ng'asheesu nea gindi madeedeanyu?”
44025010	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Aniini ghaamiinaadi aba heeda sirgweachcha bea Gaysaari, ak hiji ea heeda miisean ergweaksiinanean gil; ginali muuchch gideaba manda ng'asheanji muy neasissi fuga Yahuudi, ak eara ang'iing'i ginali muuchchi.
44025011	Ama naaramwaschi deaweeda ghana ineasinnyi ng'asheanda muy wassean miisa miyeeda, amwaaheawani miyeeda; ama ng'asheesu sirgweaksiinaneaniin ii miih huumwa ea manda siida jea ghwaadan, gaydaang'aatta girgweageedeanyu heeda Gaysaari.”
44025012	Hean gabalool Festo sea gweargwaaschi bea gheeda girgweageeda, gwayeeshsha, “Gigasayi ghang'atta girgweageedaang'u gawa heeda Gaysaari; gajakkuwi heeda Gaysaari.”
44025013	Ng'atta eawoojusu ng'ay ghwahitta Gaysariya sugoochcheanda suguura Agripa sea Bernise googeachchi Festo.
44025014	Hean goobiida hoowa ea gageanu eawoojiga saang'a, iimuchchu ghoadaw Festo sugoochcheanda iitta girgweageeda nea gwayeeshsha, “Gwanda siih hiji ghayi nung'wa Feliki ghealooniga;
44025015	nea damandida eandeawi Yerusaleemuuni, hean ghapka ashoohoodiga hees ea gweargwa fuga Yahuudi ak geahaakta, ak geemusan deargweaksa.
44025016	Ak geayeeshshi saawa, niih miih naweeda fuga Ruumi, aba gideaba gajeergweaksa siida siihaakta nea miih gwaroannyi fuga ahaakta ak geattaw gheatta jea ghaweada geaw aba ng'asheesu sihhaktaawan.
44025017	Hean nea ghabwat geat aba hiji, ea mwashing'dani iimuchchu geawi jeeda gheeda sirgweachcha ak geapteadi, ak ghaanung' eyeadu siidida.
44025018	Iiduw nea ghamiinaada fukkeanji ahaaktaan, ea miidayiiy ng'asheanji muy siihaaktaawa ak ea mawuurji gidagwachchi eararsiindi;
44025019	ak geaghus sheang'nyeeda nyaawa sea niny aba ng'asheega diini ea badayda siisi suguura Yeesu ghayi meah, ak goomajeek Baulo gideaba eamajeek.
44025020	Hean roat gichchea daanyaashta huumeandeaba ng'asheesu, geabearsi gideaba gigasayi una Yerusaleemu ak geergweakseey aba ng'asheesu sihhaktawaneeyiini?
44025021	Iiduw gamus Baulo gideaba anung'waadanaan deabiida ghealooniga ak gayghoang'aatta girgweageedaannyi heeda sugoochcheanda haweewa sean, ghaanung' eefur ea ghwahitta eaweeda jea daada heeda Gaysaari.”
44025022	Ghwalamda Agrippa ak gwayeeshsha Festo, “Geagasayi eara aniini dealleeysiit siisi.” Ghwalamda Festo ak gwayeeshsha, “Gajalleeysiiniit numuji.”
44025023	Iimuchchu gaweewa gharbeeda Agrippa jeeda gheeda girgweageeda sea Bernike, nea goodeay shirikkareeda hees, ea fuga hees bea mujiini. Hean ghwanung' Festo eruudu Baulo.
44025024	Hean ghang'eet Festo ak gwayi, “Ea sugoochcheandeanya was Agrippa ea buuneessean mida hiji siisi mida madeedeang'wean goong'ulayi niih ghayi gooniiksean fuga Yahuudi mida ng'eang'i ea gea mida Yerusaleemu, inyeessa geechchuur nea geegasa nuustaannyi.
44025025	Ak aba meatkweedeanyu ea mwaadaahi ng'asheanji nisin muy miissa miyeeda; geaghus gideaba gagasa niny ghoang'aatta girgweageadaannyi heeda sugoochcheanda haweewa sean, hean ghaanung' eyeadu.
44025026	Ak aniini ea meandeawani gidahuumwa jea dang'oorsa siideanyu haw aba badaydeaba siisi. Ak ghoaw ng'asheanji eayeanni madeedeang'wean raanya madeadaang'u ang'iing'i Sugoochcheanda was Agrippa, ak inyearayi ng'asheega gaydanyas gichchea dang'waar.
44025027	Aba gideaba ghaadaayi mwadoabiiwa, gideaba ghaayaachchi siida ghealooniga nea meeng'oorsiina ng'asheega siihaaktaawa.”
44026001	Gwayeeshsha Agrippa Baulo, ng'atta ghamiinda Baulo geattindaannyi “Neagoonnyi gheatta ng'eada baloola ang'iing'i.”
44026002	“Aniini ghaaghanyi geandeawi gheamamda aba gideaba geandi madeadaang'u, Sugoochcheanda was Agrippa, eannean gaydabalool aba weetteaba geaw appadayda ng'asheega sean ahaaktaawanaan fuga Yahuudi,
44026003	aba gideaba ang'iing'i ginali muuchchi naweadinga sean ea jaleadingeagwa bea fuga Yahuudi; ak geamuscheey aleeysean iit nea gimilikghti.
44026004	“Seareedeanyu ea giibindeanyu ghang'eada jeepcheandumeedeanyu, geagadiyeatti ghang'eada mwadi aba jeeda emeedeanyu aba ng'eanyiida Yerusaleemu, ak ghwanal fuga sean bea Yahuudi.
44026005	Ak ghayi gabean ghwanalan nea iigasa ghoammu gamuuwwu gideaba ghayi geabean dawas majeek nea ghaayaachchi naweeda diineedeanya doabiiwaat ak geabiideatti Farisayajeanda.
44026006	Ak ghamneawa ghaamiinaadi aba hiji ergweaksean aba gideaba ghaararji neajeeda ghayi heelleesa Aseetta sea gheambaghweanigaasa.
44026007	nea diitta ghus dooshingaasa was damaniyyeenyean gil ak ghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas iibwat Aseetta eawa ea askweari. Nea aba gidaararji gidaghamna ahaaktaawanaan fuga Yahuudi ea sugoochcheanda!
44026008	Ea fuga Yahuudi ghwasaan anda agooga ghoaraannyi amwasa ng'asheanji bea gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gooduudu fuga nimeewean?
44026009	Aba huumwa aniini ghayi geadeaksi geaw gideaba gamiisean dasin haleanjeesean, maweapchi sea gheawunga Yeeseeda ng'eanyiida Nasareetti.
44026010	Geasinyi ng'asheesu aba Yerusaleemu; ak ea meekghusa gideaba naarachchi fuga saang'a ghaydidi, iiduw nea geenuuseada ghaamwaschi earaniini.
44026011	Inyeessa ghaanung' ghwanyas sawanadeeda aba jeeda ghoorajeega sinnealshachcheewa sean nea geading'si gong'eawi Aseetta; inyeessa ghaanyareaschi muuchchi aba badahuukkeaba fiisu, hean geawi ak ghaaghabwaaschi aba mujiinajeega sheagi.”
44026012	“Aba jeedeaba bareannyeeksu eawi Dameskiin nea geandeawi gheambalmeeda ea barawajeanda leabu heeda ashoohoodiga heesiin.
44026013	Ea sugoochcheanda ghayi eaweechcha nea geandi naweeda ghaadaayi weeshinda abwaay leabu humng'eeda, nea aba eeshmeeda ghang'al dea aseetta arearu, ak gwaneaweesean weeshinda ea bareandeanyu.
44026014	hean geappeedeaysi ngeanyi, ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyah aba iitta fuga Ebraniya, ‘Sauli, Sauli, ghwasaan anda ang'iing'i gighabwaschaan? Ahang'waay aba headaang'u gideaba gaydasa geetta ng'aniip.’
44026015	Ak ghaanyaschi, ‘Ang'iing'i ng'eaha gil Ng'uttamiida?’ Ghwasha Ng'uttamiida nea gwayi, ‘Aniini Yeesuudida ighabwaasi.
44026016	Asi ng'eada ak gimiinaadi aba geeshangaagu; aba gideaba naahiimneey geaw appadayda ng'asheanji ak ghaloachcheay ak ghoaloachchi amaduw ghaloachchi ak gimmuusi ak gamuuwwu haleanjeeda gwachchi nidahi aba heedeanyu ea heedeaba fukka jea dabassean,
44026017	gaydalealnaneey heeda buuneeda ea heeda emoojiga, eajeakseey,
44026018	ak ghwayam gheanyanga nyaawa, geat gwaheelli misaneeda ak gaweay jeeda weeshinda ak gwaritteawa jeeda uurda Shattaani amahit gwayamsa geat Aseetta, ak ghwanyas samsiinda ring'eega ea giibinda aba jeeda fukka ghayi simmiidu aba masaweega aba jeedeanyuun.'"
44026019	“Ea sugoochcheandeanyu was Agrippa, aba sareani aniini miih daahang'waay uhuudeanyu aba gitta gissiihiimnaan aba humng'eedean,
44026020	ak aba madeeda ghaang'eachchi rukwiideayda ng'asheega Aseetta aba ng'eanyiida Dameski, ea Yerusaleemu ea ng'eanyiisean bea Yahuudi, ea heeda fuga emoojiga, gideaba gwaduukkuuna ak gwayamsa geat Aseetta ak ghoahiimu aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa gideaba niduukkuuna.
44026021	Hean aba ng'asheanji iiduw ghoang'ng'waanyan fuga Yahuudi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ak gagasa gwanuusan.
44026022	Iiduw ghaweadan Aseetta ak ghoaw gidaghamna amiinaadawi nea geawoschi majeek nea geamuuwwiisi ng'asheega fuga manang'i ea gea hees, nea ng'asheega eabalooli ea gea ghayi rugu sibanga ea Muusa gil gideaba gayghwahidu:
44026023	bea gideaba Gristo gayghwanyas sawanadeeda, ea gideaba niny ihuuw dea asheeda eattuuna miyeeda, gaygwarukkwiida iitta weeshinda aba heeda fugaaschi ea heeda fuga emoojiga.”
44026024	Aba damani weada geaw Baulo aba balooldean, hean ghang'eat Festo goojuur nea gwayeeshsha, “Baulo, ang'iing'i gibwageas, gissoomani ittaang'u hawiin ning'ulnyi geeska.”
44026025	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea Festo, siida mureeda, aniini mwabwa geas, geargu ng'asheega fughareeda bea huumeanda.
44026026	Aba gideaba sugoochcheanda ghwanal iitteaba ng'asheesu, ak aniini ghammuschi deabalool nea mwaawali gil; aba gideaba ghaanalli muuchchi gideaba manda eara ng'ashaanjagi mwanala niny, aba gideaba ng'asheanji meesna aba heeda funyaat.
44026027	Heappi sugoochcheandeanyu was Agrippa, subanga gumwasi? Ghaanalli gideaba gumwasi.”
44026028	Ghwalamda Agrippa ak gwayeeshsha Baulo, “Aba gheadi nuwaas gigasayi nung' doaw siida Gristohi?”
44026029	Ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea nuwaas ghana ea geaw gaydamus Aseetta ea miih ang'iing'i gil gabeachchi, eara fuga sean aleeyseaniit ghamneawa gidabal gawuurjeewean ak ea meeratta gawuurjeewean.”
44026030	Hean ghang'eat sugoochcheanda haw ea sugoochcheanda haw bassa ea Bernikke ea buuneessean gwachchi abiitpiit mideay.
44026031	Iiduw nea ghang'eatng'eat gaweay geebalooleada nea geeyi, “Siisi miih gwasin gilmuy miisa miyeeda ghana ghealooniga.”
44026032	Siisi inyeeda gwachchi ea miih ghoang'aatta girgweageadaannyi heeda Gaysaari, gwachchi gajeesiksiina.
44027001	Iiduw nea nihidu beatta ng'eanyiida Ittaliya, hean geattayda Baulo goodeayi sea fiisu ng'ay mida ghealooniga, nea gafur fiisu shirikkarajeanda haw bea “Gharmuchcheanda Agustoyda suguura Yuliya.”
44027002	Hean geeding'di maleambooda haw leabu Adiramito, maleamboodida abeeda ghwariikghta ghwahitta mujiineeda mida ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida Asiya, hean geeng'ng'eachchi ghuutta beatta nea abeeda geetteayeewi siispa ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya suguura Aristarko leabu ng'eanyiida Desalonikke.
44027003	Iimuchchu geefuufchi aba Sidoni; ak gwasissa Uuliya Baulo gawa googeachchi fugaaschi duupchi nea gearrear.
44027004	Sing'eadi hooweanji geeweayi nea geegeanni ng'eanyi Saypras, aba gideaba ghoadealeasa jeammeeda.
44027005	Hean nea silaji bugusta basooda Gilikkiya, ea Bamfiliya, geehidu Mira mida Lugiya.
44027006	Hean sihitti hoowa ghwadaah Shirikkarajeandida maleambooni haw leabu Aleksandariya nea gawa ng'eanyiida Ittaliya, hean goodiing'daneasa.
44027007	Hean geeweayi nea geeghwalghwalaadi ea ghwasang'ayiit eawoojiga ea iiduw ehitta mujiineeda Nido nea sisawani, aba gideaba gudang'wan jeammeeda inyeessa ghoadealeasa, hean geadoabiiwji eweaya nea geeleapnani Grette ng'eanyi nea neekkeewa Salmone.
44027008	Ak geeweayi nea geeghwalghwalaadi nea geesikchi ghuutta basooda ak geahittaawi sawanadeeda hiji suguura Ghuutta basooda miy nea neekkeewa mujiineeda Laseya.
44027009	Ghayi nea ning'atta eawoojiga saang'a, nea bareanyeekka gwanda washta ak eara damanda siratta jalooda ea goolla ghang'atta, hean gwareekusa Baulo saawa nea gwayeeshsha,
44027010	“Ea oorjooga ghaadaayi bareannyeeksu ikkaasaan gajeeshageadana ak gayghwaageasa lugooda, majeeghus dea sareenda ea maleambooda akghwahit, eara dea aweagaasa.”
44027011	Ak gooleeysiit shirikkarajeandida muuchchi siida mwanmwan maleambooda ea siida bea maleambooda, nea maduuppa ng'asheega gwachchi rugu Baulo.
44027012	Ak hooweanji sindean amwahida aba giibinda damanda gooroogeeda, hean iiduw gagasa fuga saang'a gideaba isimmu geeweayi ea ehitta ng'eanyiida Foynikke, mida ghuutta basooda ng'eanyiida Grete, mida meatkweeda wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa, ea wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, ak geeppiidi hoowa damanda gooroogeeda.
44027013	Hean iiduw nea ghaghuudu jeammeeda leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, hean ghaghay saawa gideaba ninyas gidagasa, hean geettin maleambooda ak geeweay nea geesik ghuutta basooda neekkeewa Grete.
44027014	Miighoagil ghaghuudu jeammeeda ng'waan, wunda shaarara leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa;
44027015	hean ghwalas jeammeeda maleambooda ea ghwaraay beatta aba jeammeeda, geanung'waadi gagutgutta aba gideaba meammuusi eatteala.
44027016	Iiduw nea geang'atti nea gealamwajaadi aba murdeeda ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega suguura Gawuda, geayaaji milaada aba giding'deayda maleambooda mwanang' uhuuda maleambooda haw.
44027017	ng'atta gageanu gidasittenniida ak ghwarada maleambooda; iiduw ghabeal nea ghaghay gili jea ghoabitta jeeda iseaskweanda, ng'atta ghwanung' gojiileada gidasumwanmwana, amang'atta geahoan.
44027018	Iiduw nea niraanya jeammeetta, hean iimuchchu geesuuy sareenda mida jeeda maleambooda ak geejaksa jeeda basooda;
44027019	eaweedeaba samwagu geehiista haleanjeeda mida maleambooda aba geattinga.
44027020	Muchchu nea ning'atta eawoojiga saang'a nea miyeedaa aseetta ghana miinga, nea manda madeedeanya siilakghta, iiduw goosha gitta sirarji gwachchi jea gwalealneasean.
44027021	Iiduw nea nigeanu buuneeda eawoojusu ng'ay nea mandeawana hamitta, hean ghang'eat Baulo ak gwayeeshsha, “Ea oorjooga, inyeeda goolleeyseaniit, ak ea meeng'amwani Grette, gwachchi washi ea lugooni mwajeanyasa.
44027022	Ak ghamneawa geayeeshshineegwa adoabealli; aba gideaba manda eara siyagi jea gahutta eaweegaaschi geaghus maleambooda akghwahit.
44027023	Aba gideaba ghoossa eawa gwahisseani malaykajeanda Aseetta eabeayi nea geabadayi, ghwahidu ak gwayi,
44027024	‘Baulo adibeali; gaygwasa gideaba gaymiinaada aba madeeda Gaysaari; ak ea nigoonnyi Aseetta baraandaang'u sean.’
44027025	Asi adoabealli, aniini geandeawi masaweega aba heeda Aseetta ak gaygwasa girrukkunean.
44027026	Ak maleamboodeanya gayghwaat jeammeeda ea ghwahitta ng'eanyiini mida bugusta basooda.”
44027027	Hean ng'atta eawooji damanang'wan, nea gagutguttaneasa jeammeeda googealeasa meatkwajeega sean bea basooda Adiriya, hean bugusta eaweeda ghaghay fukka bea maleamboodean gideaba sineekkiisa ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
44027028	Iiduw geegeanu ak geerassa lagheaneeda uhuuda mareamarooda ak geeppuutta jeeda basooda eadaa gidayang'da sheaginda, ak geanyas geeshan haradam; iiduw geebiikta gichcha eeppuutta mareamarooda ak geenyas geeshan damanamuut.
44027029	Iiduw geewal gideaba gajiiduw gagul maleambooda lagheanga, hean geegeanu laghean ang'wan jea ghoammu ghoadeal maleambooda ak geerassa uutta maleambooda ak geappuutta jeeda basooda ak geamwaash Aseetta gabean gaweeshiit.
44027030	Hean iiduw gagasa ghawaapta fukka bea maleamboodean, ak ea nirareang'sa maleambooda jeeda basooda, ak gwahinda geat giliweay mwadi goorareang'sa jeeda basooda lagheanga jea ghoadeal maleambooda,
44027031	ghwalamda Baulo ak gwayeeshsha shirikkarajeanda haw ea shirikkara, “Fiisu bea maleamboodean imeabiidana jeeda maleambooda ea mayghaghu.”
44027032	Hean gageanu shirikkarajeega ak ghwalach mareamarajeega maleambooda, ak geenung'waada gawa.
44027033	Iimuchchu nea gaweeshiit, gamus Baulo gweagiischi sean nea gwayeeshsha, “Askwareani deaba damanang'wan gil nea geammuughu nea geerat jalooda, ak ea miih ayaaga gil.
44027034	Asi geamuscheegwa ayeagischeena; aba gideaba gajanyasa uurda, aba gideaba eara budeanjagi bea iheengeagwa manda dea jea ghwaroat.”
44027035	Iiduw nea ghoahiit balooli, hean gageanu mukkatte ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta aba madeennyaawa hean ghabwanach ak ghwaak.
44027036	Hean ghoabit ng'eanyi jeesinga nyaawa ak gaba siisi agiischi.
44027037	(Moonneeda fuga mida jeeda maleambooda ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam ea damwallah.)
44027038	Iiduw nea nilang'u, hean geesuuy sareenda maleambooda, ak geegeanu mushoodakka ngano ak geehisa jeeda basooda.
44027039	Ng'atta nea numuchchu, eamut ghwanal ng'eanyiitta heeda was, hean geadaa ghwanadeeda basooda ea iseaskweanda ghuutta basooda, hean geebaloola gideaba eenung' gawa maleambooda hoowa.
44027040	Hean geegeanu ghoabuutta gitta sirattiisa lagheangean ak geenung'usa jeeda basooda, ak aba damandida geepealbeal mareamarajeegiga sirada gissimanmanniidean; hean geegeanu weastideani adeeli jeammeedean ak geetting'da eeyiin madeeda maleambooda hean geeweesa iseaskweandida.
44027041	Hean ghoabitta maleambooda jeeda iseaskweanda saang'a uurji dulgwajeanda; ak ghoang'ng'waay madeeda maleambooda iseaskweanda ea ghwaraay ghwasat geaw, nea uutta maleambooda gwahirja laweajajeega.
44027042	Iiduw gagasa shirikkara gwanuuseada fuga ghealooniga aba gideaba ghoawal gideaba fiisu gwadeeppa ghabwar gaydooda ea gwaritteawa jeeda basooda ak gawappiida;
44027043	ng'atta gagasa shirikkarajeanda haw ghoaghu Baulo, ghoaghuum ea masna ng'asheanda gasa gwasin. Gwayeeshsha fuga ammu ghabwar gaydoodean dahisana geat jeeda basooda googeawsa ng'eanyiida ghajaam,
44027044	nea fuga buuneeda suurja ghoang'ng'waanyaada beehajeega maleambooda ghana beareadanga loadaana maleambooda. Hean ghoaw gidaritteayda buuneessean nea gaba seayu ak ghwahitta ng'eanyiida ghajaam.
44028001	Iiduw nea geebea seayu, geejeeng'u gideaba ng'eanyiitta geeguura Molta.
44028002	Nea fuga ng'eanyiitta amiyaas muuchchi aba gideaba ghwadeaptaneasa ak gagwarneasa beasta eesasean, aba gideaba ghang'at humng'eeda ak gwanda jeammeeda.
44028003	Iiduw gageanu Baulo goolliimu ghweenga ak ghwayiin jeeda beasta, hean gwajakna beasta ichchibooda jeeda ghweenga ak ghaghanya, amwahit ghabwarda ghaat aba geattindaannyi.
44028004	Daah fukkeanji gidabwardayda ghaat diyeayda aba geattinda, gaba niih eesha nuut, “Siisi isung'ulayi ghayi ea nibwar siida. Ak earanighu aba jeeda badooda, gili mwayghamwas doobiiwnatta ghoaghu aweagaaschi.”
44028005	Hean gwalalaksa diyeayda jeeda beasta, ak ea miih gwasma gil ichchibooda.
44028006	Ghoammuughu nea ghaghay gili jea ghoapka geattinda ghana ghoabeada aba geeshangiga ak ghami; geebassa ea gageawiit ak ea meedaaha gili muy, hean ghwayam fughareenga nyaawa ak gwayi, aseetta gil.
44028007	Abeeda ea neekkeewa hoowa madameespa siisi haw bea ng'eanyiitta suguura Bubliyasi, hean ghwadeaptaneasa ak geeppiidi gheanyi eawooji samwagu.
44028008	Abeeda ghamnyaan ghweanda Bubliyasi gabearji sheagheeda nea gabearji jeeda; hean gabareessa Baulo ak ghamwaash Aseetta amwahit ghwayiin geattingaaschi uhuuda siida miyaan ak ghahaap.
44028009	Iiduw nea geesin ng'asheanji, ghapka fuga miyeani sean bea ng'eanyiitta ak geehaap.
44028010	Ak ghoamwareasa buuneeda; ak eara damandida sing'eadi nea gajeeweaya bareannyeekkean, hean geeyiin eara jeeda maleambooda haleanjeeda wassean sigasayi.
44028011	Ng'atta sheesamwagu hean geeng'eachchi eeweaya nea geeding'di maleambooni mida ng'eang'i damanda gooroogeeda leabu Aleksandariya suguura Oorjooga was Saleahooga.
44028012	Hean geeweay ea ehitta mujiineeda Sirakasi ak geeppiidi hooweanji eawooji samwagu.
44028013	Iiduw geeng'eadi hoowa ak geehitti mujiineeda suguura Regiyam; ng'atta aweachchanjagi ghang'eat jeammeeda leabu wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara, hean eaweedeabiyyeenya geehitti Butteoli.
44028014	Sihitti hooweanji geenyasi fuga siduupcheewi ak gammiiseasa gideaba endeayeena sea saawa ea ghang'atta eawooji ispwa. Ng'atta geehitti ng'eanyiida Ruumi.
44028015	Iiduw nea ghwanyas iitta fuga siduupchcheewi mida hooweanji iitteanya ghapka ghwadeaptaneasa aba hiji battiisa geat buuneeda suguura Appiya, “Gealsamwagu bea Agiischooda.” Daah Baulo ng'asheanji hean gabadiischeesa Aseetta ak ghoabit ng'eanyi.
44028016	Nea geehitti Ruumi, geamwas goopteada Baulo nea gaba geaw sea shirikkarajeanjagi jea gafur.
44028017	Ng'atta eawooji samwagu gaguursa fuga ambaliischi bea Yahuudi; iiduw nea ghabwat geat goobalool nea gwayeeshsha, “Fuga eaduupcheewi, earappeadi aniini manda gilmuy neasinnyi aba heeda fugaasa ak ea miih daheawa naweadinga ghayi bea gweargwaasa, ak geeng'ng'waanyaan amahit geejaksean ghealooniga aba Yerusaleemu ak geeyiinan geattinga fuga Ruumi.
44028018	Iiduw nea gwasikteawean, gagasa gwasiksean aba gideaba iisiippaloolan ea meedaaha ng'asheanji muy miissa miyeadeanyu.
44028019	Iiy ng'asheanji fuga Yahuudi ghaheawa gideaba gajeesiksean, ghwanung' fiisu ghang'atta girgweageedeanyu heeda Gaysaari, nea ghanyea manda ng'ashaan jea daahaaktaawa fuga emeedeanyu.
44028020	Ghoaw gideagurnaneegwa ak geebaloolli aba gideaba geeratteewean munyaloalajeega aba gitta ghus fuga Israeeliin.”
44028021	Ghwalamda saawa ak gwayeeshsha, “Aseasa manda barawajeanda sinyaschi leabu ng'eanyiida Yahuudi appadaydaang'u, ak ea manda eara siyagi siduupcheewi nihidu hiji nirgu ghana gabaloola ng'asheanda muy appadaydaang'u.
44028022	Ak ghang'wana geelleeysiit ng'asheega leabu ghuuttaang'u ang'iing'eesean; ea gididaakti ng'asheesu, asi geenalli gideaba geerukkuuna badahuukkeaba fiisu bea diineeniin ng'asheega munyas aba gideaba gabaloola buuneeda.”
44028023	Iing'atta nea niheelleesa eaweeda jea gwaroonnyeewa, gaweesa fuga saang'a eanyasa gheeda abiitta. Gwarukusa nea gweassa geaw ghang'eada sakteayda ea ghoaw shing'ada muwwunooda ng'asheega sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, nea ghaghurghur aba ng'asheega Yeesu, aba deaweedeeda ghayi bea Muusa ea dea sibanga.
44028024	Hean ghamwas fiisu ng'ay ng'asheagaaschi, nea mwaatkwa ea mwamwasa.
44028025	Iiduw ghang'eat gaweay nea moang'ng'waanya geat baloolda nyaawa iing'atta ng'asheanda assagi rugu Baulo bea gideaba, “Aba huumwa ghoadoabiiw Gurorooda Ghaydit aba ng'asheega rukusa ghwanigaasa aba naweeda sibaneeda suguura Isaaya:
44028026	‘Una heedeaba fiisu, ak giyeeshshi, ing'shooda gajayiinya huumwa ak ea mwajanala, ging'weerdeayda huumwa ak ea mwajadaaha.
44028027	Aba gideaba guroruunatkeaba fiisu eahang'oonyi, nea iidiga nyaawa eadurmani aba iing'shooda, nea gheanyanga nyaawa ea nudukutta; ak amwadaaha aba gheanyanga nyaawa, ak ghwayiiy aba iidiga nyaawa, ak ghwanal aba guroruunatka nyaawa, ak gwayamsean geat ak gaheaba.'"
44028028	Asi agooga anala gideaba lealeanooda Aseetta siyeassa fuga, “Emoojiga; saawa gaygooleeysiit.” [
44028029	Ng'ooruutka suuk bea garayi ghoahaat ghealoodeaba 29, Ahiit rukunoodeaba ng'asheesu, gaweay fuga Yahuudi gabiikta gealga nyaawa nea gaba siisi anyeari nuut ng'asheega.]
44028030	Ng'atta goobiitta hoowa ea ghang'atta gweannyeewi iyyeenya nea goodayyiida lappiya aba gibindeaba gheawi, inyeessa ghwadeapta buuneessean hidu gooloong'sa,
44028031	gwarukkwiida sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta nea goonealli ng'asheega badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo ng'asheesu gwasin aba eeshpwaara nea manda siisi adeal.
45001001	Baulo, soomjeanda Yeesu Gristo, suguursa ghoaw giijasoochcheanda, sisach aba gadiyeeda giijasta miy bea Aseetta
45001002	ghayi siheelleesa ammwadi aba naweeda sibangaaschi aba jeeda ng'ooruutka ghaydidi,
45001003	giijasi miy bea badayda Balleandannyiin, leabu jeeda jeatta Dawdihiin aba gissijiilda aba saseeda
45001004	Balleanda Aseetta sihhiimu gideaba gwandeawa uurda aba Gurorooda ea ghaydidanda aba duunnoodaannyi aba jeeda miyeeda, Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya,
45001005	nea appadaydeaba niny ghayi geanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda ea giijasoochcheandumeeda ak ghwanyas mureeda ea masaweega aba ghawungaaschi aba jeeda emoojiga sean;
45001006	nea ghabwada agoogeeni suguureewaneegwa fuga jea gaba Yeesu Gristohiin;
45001007	aba fuga sean mida ng'eanyiida Ruumi, ghayi bwariiy Aseetta, suguursa ghoaw fuga ghaydidi: Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
45001008	Gidamadeeda geabadiischeesi Aseetteanyu aba Yeesu Gristo appadahuukkeagwa oagasean aba gideaba masaweegeagwa geerukkwiida aba muunda ng'eanyiissean.
45001009	Aba gideaba Aseetta muushoochcheadeanyu gil, eagadiyeesi aba guroroodeanyu aba jeeda Giijasta miy bea Balleandaannyi, nea iissa ea meapuri aba rukunooda badahuukkeagwa galeagasean aba jeeda mooshteanyu bea Aseetta,
45001010	ak geamuschi gideaba gayghamwasan Aseetta ak ghammuuschi dahidu heedeang'wa.
45001011	Aba gideaba geagasayi muuchchi dadaheang'wa, ak abeeda geagoonnyeegwa haleanjeeda gurorooda ak abeeda gagooneegwa uurda,
45001012	nea abeeda geeheettu nea geemmajeekchi geat aba masaweega giliwas siida, deang'wa ea deanyu.
45001013	Iiduw fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi anala, gideaba iissa geagasayi galeagasean wunooda heedeang'wa, (ak geattealan ea ghoaw ghamneawa), ak abeeda ghaanyaschi haghweega aba heedeang'wa, gawuurji gidanyasti aba jeeda emoojiga.
45001014	Geandeawi gidamisean aba heeda fuga Yunaani ea geamawosa, heeda fuga was weaghoodiga ea gea dasheahi:
45001015	Asi, aniini geagasayi muuchchi rukkwiideayda Giijasta Miy earaba heedeang'wa agoogeeda mida ng'eanyiida Ruumi.
45001016	Aba gideaba maydabwaspwas aba Giijasta Miy, ba gideaba uurda Aseetta gil dea eadu lealeanooda aba heeda siida wassean mideawa masaweega, heeda siida Yahuudi ammadeeda ak gabassa siida Yunaani.
45001017	Aba gideaba doobiiwnatta Aseetta geattahaach aba jeadaannyi, ghang'eada masaweega ea gagul masaweega, gawuurji gidasung'waarda gideaba, “Siida doabiiwaat aba masaweega gaygoobiideewa masaweega.”
45001018	Aba gideaba nyarasta Aseetta sittahaach aba humng'eeda appadayda fuga heawa ea gea munyas amaduw aba munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ghaminighis humeanda.
45001019	Aba gideaba ng'asheega jea eanal aba heeda Aseetta nidaajiit aba jeennyaawa, aba gideaba niihiimsa Aseetta saawa.
45001020	Hean dea sisna ng'eanyiida aba gidameadaakta niny, raanya uurdaannyi maygammudean aba gidawasta Aseetta, sidaah aba jeeda haleanjeeda ghayi sisin.
45001021	Ak earappeadi nal Aseettean ghanyea masissiina mureeda niny gawuurji Aseetta ghana gabadiischeesa niny, hean ghoaw duguuga mwadaagha aba iheenga nyaawa nea fughareenga nyaawa marachchi gil geanung' gamisaniit.
45001022	Fuga hinda geat gili weaghoodi, gwadasheahiidi,
45001023	ak gooyamuuji gigheambiitta Aseetta manda mudeanooda ak ghwanung' gawuurji haleanjeeda uurji sea siida jea ghami munyinda ghana dariidakka ghana diyeanga ghana diyeanga badiinna ng'eanyi.
45001024	Iiduw ghwanung'waada Aseetta goobiida jeeda haleanjeeda bwariiy guroruunatka nyaawa ak gwasin ririnnyeanda, ak gwajakteaysa sasanuukka nyaawa mureeda.
45001025	Aba gideaba niyamuuji humeanda Aseetta ghoaw ng'uyyeega, ak ghabwat gida sidamali nea gagadiyeesa nea ghwanung'waada Aseetta sin halanjeessean, siduumsheesa damanda manda mudeanooda! Amin.
45001026	Aba sareani ghwanung'waada Aseetta gwasin gidashissa ghaang'. Ak eara gadeemga nyaawa ghwayam searoojiga miisa gissisinniida, ak gwasinda gidaghayi mawosa seareetta bea gisisinniidean,
45001027	gwasnu eara headiga ghwanung'waada seareetta bea gissindeaydooscheatta sea gadeemgean ak gwayamsa geat headiga aba geawunnyeekka gheanyanga, ak gwasin headiga ng'asheega baspaseega sea headiga ak ghwanyas aba sasanuukka nyaawa ghoorjooda aba gidiinyeannyeekka nyaawa.
45001028	Hean nea ghwadaah gideaba mwahida gideaba gayghamwas Aseetta, ghwanung'waada Aseetta gwasin searoojiga munyas gasa fugheerga nyaawa.
45001029	Ninnyiit jeesinga nyaawa ng'asheega sean munyas, munyinda, ea shidoodeaba ghaang; geawunda gheangda. Lajoodeaba ghuut, ea nuusta buuneeda, ea jaleadinga, ea reengaweega, sichcheeda, fuga aga badahuukkeaba geat,
45001030	nappiisa geat ng'uyyeega, fuga biissa ghwasit Aseetta, bea ghwarja, fuga manda gidamwanang', bea ghwarjeeda, fuga iissa gwasin ng'asheega munyas, masinsiina ghweaniga nyaawa mureeda,
45001031	fuga dasheahi, mandeawana masaweega, biissa ng'weani jeesin, fuga mabayyiida suurja.
45001032	Earappeadi nal muuchchi digheanda Aseetta nea fuga sina ng'asheesu gammiisa miyeeda, ameakghusa gideaba gwasin ng'asheesu, iissa ghamwas eara fuga sina ng'asheesu.
45002001	Asi mondeawani samsiinda, ea siida, neada guwosi ng'eaha, irgweaksi siinuut, aba inyas girgweaksi siida ada abeeda girgweaksi geaw ang'iing'i, aba gideaba ang'iing'eada argweaksa siida, gisni ng'asheanda uurji diitta.
45002002	Ak geanalli aseasa gideaba girgeageeda Aseetta gaba huumwa appadahuukka fuga sina ng'asheesu.
45002003	Ang'iing'i siida, iissa girgweakkiissi fuga sina ng'asheesu, ak gisni ang'iing'i ng'asheegiga gwachchi sin saawaan, gajammuusa siyoara ghoorjooda Aseetta?
45002004	Ghana ang'iing'i irari nga'sheega baruureega aba ng'eenindaannyi ea gidamajeekta ea riyeang'deayda? Ak ea minali gideaba ng'eeninda Aseetta gayghoadoabiiwnyi ea ghoahiittaneey jeeda dukkunooda?
45002005	Nea aba hang'ooynattang'u bea gurorooda mandeawana duukkuunooda gidiiwsi geat nyarasta aba eaweetta nyarasta jea ghwahinna ghoorjooda Aseettean.
45002006	Imuchchu ghoadaw giliwas siida gitteenna seang'ayda ng'asheega nisin:
45002007	aba heeda fuga milikghta aba sinooda gadiyoojiga miyaasiin gagaseadayyi gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea ng'asheega maygameewa, gayghoadaw eaweega manda muudeanooda;
45002008	nea fukka aheakkiida suurjeaniin biissa ea moawalla ng'asheega huumwaan, nea gwasinniisa mureeda ng'asheega munyas, gay ghwanyas nyarasta ea gharbeeda.
45002009	Ak gaygwanda deawiitmeeda ea sawanadeeda aba heeda buuneessean sina ng'asheega munyas, ammadeeda siida Yahuudi ea siida Yunaani,
45002010	duukku gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea hoyyooh aba heeda siida wassean sina ng'asheega miyaas, ammadeeda siida Yahuudi akkabassa siida Yunaani.
45002011	Aba gideaba aba heeda Aseetta manda shiitmeeda.
45002012	Aba gideaba fukka sean ghayi adiiy nea manda deaweedean, gay gwarooda nea manda deaweeda, nea fuga sean adiiy mideawa deaweeda gajergweaksiina deaweeda.
45002013	Ak ea miih fuga iiy deaweeda gil gea jea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba madeeda Aseetta, geaghus fukka sina deaweeda jea eattaw doobiiwnatta.
45002014	Aba gideaba fuga emoojiga mandeawana deaweeda aba gealaan was gidagasa deaweeda, niiw deaweeda aba heannyaawa, earappeadi mandeawana deaweeda.
45002015	Ak ghoahiimu gadiyeeda deaweedeeda ghayi sung'oorsa guroruunatka nyaawa, nea gamuuwwu fughareenga nyaawa ea gidamida jeesinga nyaawa, ghoahaakta ghana eesamsa saawa
45002016	nea aba eaweettida aba ginnyaashta giijasteanyu miy, goorgweaksa Aseetta makcheamuutka buuneeda aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
45002017	Ak ang'iing'i iguuri geaw siida Yahuudi nea gikghusi deaweeda ak gighwari geaw aba gidindeayeatti Aseetta
45002018	ak ginali gitta bwariiy ninyiin, ak gumwasi ng'asheega was gea miyaas, ak abeeda ea sinnaalnyi aba deaweeda,
45002019	ak inali aba huumwa gideaba ang'iingi guwosi siida ahhaghwa fuga ng'oowwi, weeshinda fuga mida jeeda misaneeda,
45002020	siida aneali fuga dasheahi, ginealshoochcheanda diibiga, gwandeawa aba jeeda deaweeda saseeda aba fughareeda ea humeanda,
45002021	asi ang'iing'eada anaal fiih suuk, ghwasaan anda minali geaw ang'iing'i? Ang'iing'eada rukkwiidi gideaba adijagwadiischi siida, gijagwadiischi ang'iing'i?
45002022	Ang'iing'eada iyeenniisi siida adimealuuli, gimealuuli ang'iing'i? Ang'iing'eada sit haleanjeeda sibada sinung' gawuurji aseechcheekka ak gijagwadi gheeda sibatta Aseetta?
45002023	Ang'iing'eada iissa gighwari geaw gideaba ginali deaweeda, iissa gijakteaysi Aseetta mureeda aba heheeweega deaweeda?
45002024	Ak geang'waar gideaba, “Gheawunga Aseetta iissa geerukuna ng'asheega munyas aba jeeda emoojiga appadahuukkeagwa.”
45002025	Aba gideaba giyyiilda gammiisa iwosi siida sissa mureeda deaweeda ama inuusi deaweeda abeeda giyyiildaang'u aniiw gideaba miih una giyyiilda.
45002026	Nea siida miyeayaat giyyiilda iyang'ng'waay deaweeda, abeeda nyoattaannyi bea beetta giyyiilda majeanung' ghoaw gil nuwa giyyiilda?
45002027	Nea fukka miyeayaat ak ghoanng'waay deaweedean, heapi maygorgweakseegwa agoogeeda mideawa gittaabooda deaweeda ea giyyiilda ak gwanuus deaweeda.
45002028	Aba gideaba niny miih Yahuudajeanda huumwa gil appadaw, ak ea miih giyyiilda huumwa gabeachchi badayda saseeda.
45002029	Niny Yahuudajeanda gil aba gurorooda, ea giyyiilda huumwa leabu jeeda guroroooda, ghaydit ak ea meemmaseawa nuut. Nea dumsheesiindaannyi ea maygwaleabu heeda buuneeda gaygwaleabu heeda Aseetta.
45003001	Asi siida Yahuudi gaburda naaha? Ama giyyiilda gwarachi naaha?
45003002	Gaburda muuchchi aba naweadinga sean. Aba madeeda fuga Yahuudi siittaw ng'asheega gasa Aseetta.
45003003	Gay gawuurjiin abeeda ii mwamwasa fuga mwaatkwa? Nyootta masaweega nyaawa gay ghoammu ghwayam doobiiwnatta Aseetta?
45003004	Manda! Aseetta adoobiiwaat galeagasean earappeadi bea ng'uyya buuneessean. Gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka, “Ng'asheagaagu iissa iirgu eadoobiiweadi, nea girgweageeda iissa gijooriischi.”
45003005	Nea munyasnachcheakkaasa iyadahaach doobiiwnatta Aseetta, gajeayeanaan? Gajeeyeena Aseetta miidoabiiwaat iiyeadu ghoorjooda? (Aba hiji geabalooldi siida.)
45003006	Manda! Aba dascheani gwachchi gay ghoammu Aseetta gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida nea ghoadoabiiw?
45003007	Asi aba ng'uyyeegeasu iiniibiida huumeanda Aseetta jeeda gigheambiitta abeeda ghwasaan gudeergweaksiinanean siida riing'eeda?
45003008	Ak abeeda ghwasaan inyas measni ng'asheega munyas ghwahidu gea miyaas? Aba gideaba fuga beasheasa goorgweakseasa aseasa nea gwayi. Girgweageeda nyaawa ghwadoabiiw.
45003009	Asi gajeayeanaan? Aseasa fuga Yahuudi geewoschi miyaas muuchchi? Manda, eara gili mwanang'. Aba gideaba sisikteawi aseasa gideaba buuneessean, fuga Yahuudi ea fuga Yunaani, eara saawa gwanda jeeda uurda ring'eeda,
45003010	gawuurji gissung'waaarda; “Manda siida doabiiwaat, mandana eara akkalealla;
45003011	manda siida nal gil, manda siida gaseadayyi Aseetta.
45003012	Niyam geat sean, ak ea nimunyasiidi sean; manda siida sina ng'asheega miyaas, eara akkalealla.”
45003013	“Muwooguukka nyaawa bung'eeda abwara ghuusi, nea ng'ushapkeakka nyaawa iissa gwareengani buuneeda.” “Gwarittuuna ghuusiga nyaawa furooda uurji dea ichchibooda.”
45003014	“Ghuusiga nyaawa ghwannyiit mooshteayda ng'waan.”
45003015	“Geeshanga nyaawa eang'weani aba gihideayda foojeanda,
45003016	naweadinga nyaawa sik sea gwanda nyariida ea hirbabandeeda,
45003017	nea ghanyea mwanala naweeda hoyyooh.
45003018	Nea gheawalmeeda Aseetta ghanyea manda gheanyanga nyaawa.”
45003019	Asi sinalli gideaba ng'asheega sean rugu deaweeda gwarukuna badahuukka fuga mida jeeda deaweeda, ak abeeda gearat ghuusiga sean, ak gawa ng'eanyiisean jeeda girgweageeda Aseetta;
45003020	ak ea manda siida jea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba madeadaannyi aba gadiyoojiga deaweeda, nea aba deaweeda iissa geanyas fughareeda ring'eeda.
45003021	Ak ghamneawa doobiiwnatta Aseetta ea nidaajiit nea manda deaweeda, aba gideaba sibanga ea deaweeda gamuuwwu ng'asheesu,
45003022	ak ea doobiiwnatta Aseetta gil, aba naweeda masaweega mida jeeda Yeesu Gristo aba heeda buuneessean mideawa masaweega. Aba gideaba maheelli;
45003023	aba gideaba nisin buuneessean ring'eeda, ak ghwasunyeawa gigheambiitta Aseetta,
45003024	iissa geattaw doobiiwnatta mwadaagha aba dagheerjeandumeadaannyi, aba naweetta bea lealeanooda mida heeda Gristo Yeesuun;
45003025	nea niny ghayi ea ninung' Aseetta ghoaw siida jea goohuun buuneeda, aba foojeandaannyi, ak geanyas aba masaweega. Ak abeeda ghoahiimu doobiiwnattaannyi ak gwasindunu nea gagasa ghoahiimu gideaba niny adoobiiwaat ak ghwanung'waada Aseetta ring'eega ghayi siisheeda eesin;
45003026	ak ghoadaajiit aba damani gideaba niny ea doabiiwaat ea gideaba gaygoomajeek siida mideawa masaweega aba jeeda Yeesu.
45003027	Asi gwandeenu ghwaroadeaba geaw? Sirassa jarooda. Aba deaweedeeda uurjiin? Aba deaweedeeda jea eesini? Manda! Geaghus deaweedeeda mideawa masaweega.
45003028	Asi sidaayi gideaba siida iissa ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba masaweega nea meakna sinooda deaweeda.
45003029	Ama Aseetta niny Aseetta fuga Yahuudi gil akghwahidi? Niny miih Aseetta emoojiga seani? Huumwa, niny Aseetta emoojiga seani.
45003030	Aba huumwa Aseetta iiyagi, nea dea jea ghoadaw doobiiwnatta fukka siyaat giyyiilda aba masaweegeani abeeda gay ghoadaw doobiiwnatta eara fukka miih gaweay giyyiildean aba masaweega.
45003031	Abeeda gajeayamwa deaweeda aba masaweegiga? Manda! Iisiyam abeeda geemajeekchi deaweeda.
45004001	Asi gajeayeanaan appadayda Abrahaamooda was gheambaaghweandeanya aba saseeda?
45004002	Asi abeeda Abrahaamu iinyas doobiiwnatta aba gadiyeeda, abeeda gwandeawa gichchea ghaghwara geaw, ak ea miih madeeda Aseetta.
45004003	Aba gideaba gwayiin Ng'ooruutka? “Abrahaamu ghamwas Aseetta, ak geanung' ghwanyas niny doobiiwnatta.”
45004004	Nea siida sin gadiyeeda, ea majeanung' ghoaw mushaahareadaannyi gissiittaw mwadaagha gajeanung' ghoaw sileeda.
45004005	Nea aba siida masna gadiyeeda ghus gideaba ghoadaw doobiiwnatta siida mammiisiina, abeeda masaweegeaba siisi sinung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta.
45004006	Ak ghwanyaashtunu Dawdi nea gabadiischeesa siitta adaw Aseetta doobiiwnatta nea masna gadiyeedeani:
45004007	“Ghang'wana fukka sisamsa gidinyeannyeekka nyaawaan, ea giikka siihuun ring'eega nyaawaan;
45004008	ghang'wana siitta may ghoapkaat Ng'uttamiida ring'eadaannyiin.”
45004009	Asi, ng'wanaweesu geargu appadahuukka fuga nuweay giyyiilda, ghana earaba heeda fuga miih eayaat giyyiilda? Aba gideaba geayeennyi “Abrahaamu sinung' ghoaw masaweagaaschi doobiiwnatta.”
45004010	Abeeda geattawdaan niny? Geattaw ammwadi ghana iing'atta beatta giyyiilda? Miih iing'atta beatta, ghwanyas nea miyeayaat giyyiilda.
45004011	Iiduw ghwanyas giyyiilda ak ghoaw gwadeagooda ghana mascheewda doobiiwnatta mideawa aba masaweega nea miih gawa giyyiilda. Ak abeeda ghoaw niny ghweanda fuga mideawa masaweega nea miyeayaat giyyiilda ak abeeda eara saawa ghwanyas doobiiwnatta,
45004012	gwasnu eara ghweanda giyyiilda, nea meakna gideaba nuweay giyyiilda, geaghus gideaba ghwaat naweetta bea masaweega ghayi aat Abrahaamu nea miyeayaat giyyiildean.
45004013	Aba gideaba heelleesiindida bea Abrahaamu ea jeattaannyiin, bea gideaba gaygwahearan ng'eanyiida mwaani aba deaweeda geattaw aba doobiiwnatta siittaw aba masaweegean.
45004014	Aba gideaba iijea ghoaw fuga deaweeda fuga jea gwahearaniischi, masaweega ak ghoaw heelleesiinda gidamwadaagha.
45004015	Aba gideaba deaweeda dea anyareesi fiih gil, aba gideaba ii manda deaweeda abeeda ea may gwanda gidinyeanda.
45004016	Asi ng'asheanji gapnu aba masaweega, ak abeeda heelleesiinda ghoang'waay geat sea dagheerjeandumeeda, ak abeeda gamajeegiit heelleesiindida aba heeda jeachcheengaaschi sean, nea meakghusa fukka bea deaweedean ak ghwahit geabwada eara fukka mideawa masaweega Abrahaamun, was gheambaaghweandeanya eesaseaniin,
45004017	gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Nanung' huuwa ghweanda emoojiga saang'a,” aba madeeda Aseetta ghayi mwas, adaw eaweega fuga nimeewa ak gaguursa ak ghwanung' goobiida haleanjeeda mandana.
45004018	Ak gafurda ng'asheega meammu eefurda, ak abeeda ghoaw ghweanda emoojiga saang'a, aba gidaghayi sinyaashta, “Ak ea gichchea gwadeenna diibiga jea jiila gil.”
45004019	Niny miighabealbeal aba masaweega aba iing'ula niny saseadaannyi, sam gidasam miyeeda aba gideaba niriiksa gweannyeew bughala aba gweargumeeda, ghana iing'ula nyootta jeatta mida jeeda Saara.
45004020	Nea iisibaloola badayda ghanyea mashta aba iitta heelleessiinda Aseetta, hean gamajeegiit aba masaweega, nea ghoaghambiit Aseetta,
45004021	nea ghwanal aba huumwa gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gwasin ng'asheega niheelleesa.
45004022	Ak geanung' ghoaw “masaweega aba headaannyi doobiiwnatta.”
45004023	Nea ng'asheega, “surgu appadaydaannyi,” ea meang'waara aba niny akghwahit,
45004024	earaba aseasa. Gajeegoaneasa aseaseeda mideawa masaweega aba ninnyeeda ghayi aduunna Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanya jeeda miyeeda,
45004025	ak geenuus aba gidiinyeannyeakkaasa ak gooduudu ak geenyaschi doobiiwnatta.
45005001	Asi iisugoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba masaweega, abeeda geanyaschi hoyyooh aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
45005002	Nea appadaydeabwa niny ea sinyaschi naweeda dagheerjeandumeeda ghamneawa simiinaadawiin, nea geehoosannyi aba rarooda gigheambiitta Aseetta.
45005003	Ameakghusa niih, aseasa geehoosannyi aba jeeda sawanaduutkaasa, nea geanalli gideaba sawanadeeda iissa gweadu milikghteayda,
45005004	nea milikghteayda gaygweadu hang'ooynatta jeeda, nea hang'ooynatta jeeda gaygweadu rarooda,
45005005	nea rarooda ea maygwareenganneasa, aba gideaba bariinyeega Aseetta nigeawiit ghwayiin jeesingaasa Gurorooda Ghaydit ghayi sugooneasa aseasan.
45005006	Aba gideaba damandida meendeawani uurdean, iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda ghami Gristo appadahuukka fuga munyas.
45005007	Ghwasaan, inyas gayghami siida appadayda siida doabiiwaat, iiduw ghoammu siida gabadaksa miyeeda appadayda siida miy.
45005008	Iiduw aniihiimu Aseetta bariinyeagaaschi niny nea gaba geaw appadahuukkaasa aseasa aba gideaba Gristo ghami appadahuukkaasa nea abeeda ea gudeebeaha riing'a.
45005009	Ak gay ghwaraanya iisugooneasa doobiiwnatta aba foojeandaannyi, ak ghwaraanya muuchchi gajeelealnaneasa jeedeaba nyarastida bea Aseettean appadaydaannyi.
45005010	Aba gideaba damanda duuw eawooseewana weajoodiga geettuupchaneasa sea Aseetta aba miyeeda Balleandaannyi, raanya muuchchi, iing'atta giduupcheeda geelealneasa aba jeeda aweagaaschi.
45005011	Ameakghusa niih, geehoosannyi aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, nea appadaydeaba niny ghamneawa asinyaschi giduupcheeda.
45005012	Asi ring'eeda iihidu jeeda ng'eanyiida appadayda siida assagi ak gweadu ring'eani miyeeda, iiduw ghwahitta miyeeda heeda buuneessean aba gideaba nisin sean ring'eeda,
45005013	aba huumwa ghwahidu ring'eeda jeeda ng'eanyiida nea miyeegu deaweeda, ak ring'eeda ea meyiitta aba heeda manda deaweeda.
45005014	Nea abeeda miyeeda goombalischi damanda Adam ea gagul Muusa, ak gabiisa goombal eara fuga miih gwasin ring'eeda uurji dea Adam was siida sigala dea jea ghwahidu.
45005015	Nea gidasiittayda ea mawuurji sea gidiinyeanda. Aba gideaba ghayi iimeewa fuga saang'a aba gidiinyeamba siyagi, ak ghwaraanya muuchchi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ea gidasugu aba dagheerjeandumeeda siida assagi was Yeesu Gristo naawda appadahuukka fuga saang'aani.
45005016	Amaduw gidasiittayda mwadaagha ea mawuurji sea gidiinyeandida bea siida assagiin. Aba gideaba girgweageeda iissa gamaseaw gidiinyeanda jea gweadu ghoorjooda, duukku gidasugu appadahuukka gidiinyeannyeekka saang'a gaygweadu doobiiwnatta.
45005017	Aba gideaba ghayi iyadiiy siyagi, hean goombaliischi miyeeda appadaydeaba siitta assagiin, gay ghwaraanya muuchchi fukka jea ghwanyas dagheerjeandumeeda naawda ea gitta siittaw mwadaaghaan aba doobiiwnatta, ak abeeda gay goombaliischi aba jeeda eaweegeaba siitta assagi was Yeesu Gristohiin.
45005018	Asi ghayi aba gidiinyeanjagi geergweaksa buuneessean hean aba gadiyeemba siyagi doabiiwaat gweadu eaweega aba heeda buuneessean.
45005019	Asi gwasnu iiheawa siyagi iiduw ghwanyas buuneessean ring'eeda, gwasnu eara iisin siyagi mureeda iiduw ghwanyas buuneessean doobiiwnatta.
45005020	Deaweeda ghwahidu ak gwaheedu gidinyeandida muuchchi, ammuchchu nea gwaheedu ring'eeda hean gwaheedu dagheerjeandumeeda ea ghwanaawda,
45005021	gawuurji gidambalda ring'eeda miyeeda, gwasnu eara miyeenooda goombal doobiiwnatta ak gweadu eaweega manda muudeanooda aba naweetta bea Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanyean.
45006001	Asi gajeayeanaan? Gajeeppiidana jeeda ring'eeda ak abeeda gwaheedu dagheerjeandumeeda?
45006002	Manda! Aseaseeda ghayi simeewayi appadayda ring'eeda gajeeppideattaan gichcha jeeda ring'eeda?
45006003	Moanali gideaba aseaseeda ghayi siippattisaneasa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu geeppattiisaneasa aba jeeda miyeadaannyi?
45006004	Asi geepnyeasa sea niny aba naweeda giibattiisanda aba jeeda miyeada, ak gawuurji gittutteayda Gristo aba jeeda miyeeda aba naweetta bea gharbeeda Ghweandean, gwasnu earaseasa gagasa eabeawana jeeda weeshinda mideawa eaweega eashish.
45006005	Aba gideaba gawuurji gidaghayi siikkuuyeattaneasa sea niny aba jeeda miyeadaannyi, gwasnu gajeekkuuyaneasa gawuurji gidaghayi dutteayda niny.
45006006	Nea geanalli gideaba sasanuukkaasa bea garayi geengoorsiinnyi sea niny ak abeeda ghwanyawa saseani bea ring'eedean nyariida, ak ea mudeahuuwa gichcha soomjooga ring'eeda.
45006007	Aba gideaba siida nimi sihheelli ring'eeda.
45006008	Asi ghayi iisimeewuudayi sea Gristo, abeeda geamwaschi gideaba iimuchchu gajeendeayeena sea niny.
45006009	Nea geanalli gideaba iimuchchu nea gwaduunna Gristo miyeeda abeeda ea maygudu gabiikta ghami; nea miyeeda ea maygwandeawa uurda appadaydaannyi.
45006010	Aba gideaba miyeeda ghayi meah gameewsa badayda ring'eeda nibwagi akghwahit, ak aba giibindaannyi niny, goobiideewa badayda Aseetta.
45006011	Gwasnu earagooga asna geat fuga nimeewa aba ring'eeda ak goowooschi fuga majeekcheewi aba heeda Aseetta aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
45006012	Asi adagoombal ring'eeda sasanuukkeagwa ammu gameewa, nea ghoamwaschi gitta gasean.
45006013	Nea adiiduw ghoattaydi sasanuukeagwa ghoaw dabitta jea eesna ng'asheega munyas bea ring'eeda, ghang'wana ghoattawji geat Aseetta nea goowuurjeewi fuga majeekcheewi iing'atta miyeeda, nea ghoattawji Aseetta sasanuukkeagwa ghoaw dabitta doobiiwnatta.
45006014	Aba gideaba maygudu goombal ring'eeda sasanuukeagwa, aba gideaba moondani jeeda deaweeda, goondi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda.
45006015	Asi naaha? Gajeesna ring'eeda aba gideaba meendani jeeda deaweeda nea gweagu gideaba geendi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda? Manda!
45006016	Moanali gideaba iyoaytaydi geat agooga awuurjeewana soomjooga mideawa mureeda, noahuuyi soomjoogeaba siitta oosissi mureedean, ghana dea ring'eeda, ghoanung' ghoaw siida gadiyeesa ring'eeda jea gweadu miyeeda, ghana siida gadiyeewa mureeda jea gweadu doobiiwnatta?
45006017	Ak gagasa ebadiischeesa Aseetta, aba gideaba ghayi goowooschi soomjooga ring'eeda amaduw goosinnyi mureeda aba gurorooda gawuurji fughareetta ghayi siinnaleagwean,
45006018	amang'atta nea sinung' ooppala geat ak goosheagiidi ring'eeda, iiduw ghoahuuyi soomjooga doobiiwnatta.
45006019	Asi geabalooli nea gearukutteaydi siida, aba ng'arng'arandeang'wa bea geallaan. Aba gideaba ghayi noattaydi sasanuukkeagwa gwasin ririnnyeanda ea munyinda haw, asi ghamneawa oattawa sasanuukkeagwa doobiiwnatta ak geammiidu.
45006020	Aba gideaba damanda oowoseewi soomjooga ring'eeda, abeeda gooppalli geat nea goowooschi sheageewa doobiiwnatta.
45006021	Abeeda ghoanyaschi alooheemba naaha aba damandida oosinni ng'asheekka ghamneawa nung' ghahameagwa ng'eanyiin? Aba gideaba huydeandeaba ng'asheesu miyeeda gil.
45006022	Ak ghamneawa iisinung' ooppala geat ak goosheagiidi ring'eeda ak geanung' ahuuwa soomjooga Aseetta, abeeda gichchea anyasa gimminnooda gil, ama aba huydeanda gajanyasa eaweega manda muudeanooda.
45006023	Aba gideaba mushaahareeda ring'eeda miyeeda gil, nea gichchea gagu Aseetta mwadaagha ea eaweega manda mudeanooda gil aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu Ng'uttamiideanya.
45007001	Fuga eaduupcheewi moanali (gideaba ng'asheesu geabalooli fuga nal deaweeda) gideaba deaweeda goobal siida iiduweamajeegi?
45007002	Aba gideaba gatmooda mideawa siyeeda nirada deaweeda aba siyeeda damanda duweamajeegiin, ammuchchu nea ghami siyeeda, abeeda ea siitin deaweedeedida bea siyeedean.
45007003	Asi abeeda gajeeguura gili mealuul iimideayi sea ng'eedeeda nuut iiduu ea majeek siyeadaannyi. Ama meah siyeedaannyi abeeda gaygoobal geaw aba deaweedeedida, ama gheah siinuut abeeda ea mamealuula.
45007004	Asi gwasnu fuga eaduupcheewi, earagooga noomeewsi deaweeda, aba saseeda Gristo, ak ghoahuuyi haleanjeemba siinuut, siida ghayi duunna jeeda miyeeda ak abeeda geenyaksi Aseetta haghweega.
45007005	Aba gideaba damanda duweeppiideewana saseeda aba gassooda ring'eeda, mida appadayda deaweeda, sin gadiyeeda aba sasanuukaasa ak iiduw gwajiilsa miyeeda haghweega.
45007006	Nea ghamneawa ea sittinneasa aba jeeda deaweeda, aba gideaba simeewwiisi gidaghayi nung' eahuuwa soomjooga, ak abeeda ea meegadiyeeni aba hiing'eadayda deaweedeeda sung'waar geaghus aba jeeda Gurorooda.
45007007	Asi gajeeyeanaan? Neada deaweeda ea ring'eedea? Eara gwasa! Gwachchi iimanda deaweeda, gwachchi ea mwaydanal ring'eeda. Ak ea mwaydanal geawunda gheangda iimarukuna deaweeda nea gwayi, “Adishti ghaang'.”
45007008	Iiduw ghwanyas gheatta ring'eeda aba diigheandida, ak gwasin aba jeedeanyu haleanjeessean siimmu eeshissa ghaang. Aba gideaba ring'eeda ii manda deaweeda ea nimi.
45007009	Nea abeeda geawooschi majeek nea abeeda ea manda deaweeda, ammuchchu nea ghwahidu digheanda, gamajeegiit ring'eeda ak ghaameayi;
45007010	ak digheandida jea gweadu eaweegean gweadu miyeeda heedeanyu.
45007011	Aba gideaba ring'eeda ghwanyas gheatta aba digheanda, gwareengannean amang'atta gwanuusan.
45007012	Asi deaweeda aa ghaydit, ak diigheanda earada aa ghaydit nea gabiissa aa doabiiwaat, ak aa miy.
45007013	Heapi gitta miyiin niyeadu miyeeda heedeanyu aniini? Eara gwasa! Ring'eeda gil, ak gweadu miyeeda jeedeanyu ak gwajakta gidamiy, ak abeeda geahhiimu ring'eeda gideaba ring'eeda, ak aba naweeda digheanda ghwanyas ring'eeda haw meammu etteen.
45007014	Aba gideaba geanalli beadi deaweeda gaba gurorooda; amaduukku aniini geawooschi siida beachchi saseeda, sishaaydaawa jeeda ring'eeda.
45007015	Aniini mwaanali eara gideasinnyi, aba gideaba iissa gitta aabwariinyiin ea maydasin, iissa geasinnyi gitta mwaabwariinyiin.
45007016	Iiduw nea geasinnyi gitta mwaabwariinyiin, abeeda ghaamwaschi gideaba deaweeda aamiy.
45007017	Asi ghamneawa miih aniini gil deasin ng'asheesu, gwasin ring'eetta mida jeedeanyuun.
45007018	Asi ghaanalli gideaba jeedeanyu manda gidamiy, niih aba saseedeanyu. Iissa geagasayi dasin gil doabiiw, ak ea maydasin.
45007019	Aba gideaba gitta miy aabwariinyiin iissa ea measni, iissa geasinnyi gida mwaabwariinyi.
45007020	Asi ghamneawa iissa iyeasinnyi gitta meagassiin, measni aniini nea gabwageaw, iissa gwasin ring'eetta mida jeedeanyuun.
45007021	Asi naadaayi deaweedeani gideaba aniineeda gasa gwasin ng'asheanda miyiin iissa gwaneawu ng'asheanda muy.
45007022	Aba gideaba geahoosassi deaweedeeda Aseetta aba jeedeanyu,
45007023	amaduw ghaadaayi aba saseedeanyu deaweeda nuut nea gang'uchchi sea deaweedeeda fughareedeanyu ak ghwanung' doaw soomjeanda deaweedeeda ring'eeda mida jeeda saseedeanyuun.
45007024	Aniini meahoosani earahay! Niih gajea ng'eaha gil jea gwalealnanean saseani bea miyeedean?
45007025	Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'utamiideanya! Asi iisunu aniini geagadiyeesi deaweedeeda Aseetta aba fughareedeanyu nea aba saseedeanyu geagadiyeesi deaweedeeda ring'eeda.
45008001	Asi ghamneawa manda girgweaksiinda appadahuukka fuga mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
45008002	Aba gideaba deaweedeeda Gurorooda eaweega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu nigoonan gibaldeaba geaw, aba heeda deaweedeeda ring'eeda ea miyeeda.
45008003	Aba gideaba ng'asheekka meammu aba deaweedean, aba gideaba manda uurjeenga aba ng'asheega saseedean, iiduw aba gijeaknooda ajeagu Aseetta Balleandaannyi nea ghwanung' gawuurji siida mideawa ring'eeda, amaduw appadayda ring'eeda iiduw goorgweaksa ring'eeda mida saseeda;
45008004	ak abeeda gwasa ginnyaashta deaweeda aba jeesingaasa aseaseeda meaduubi ng'asheega saseeda geaduupchi ng'asheega gurorooda.
45008005	Aba gideaba fukka aat geeshta ng'asheega saseedean iissa ghoapkaat iheenga nyaawa ng'asheega saseeda, amaduukku fukka aat geeshta ng'asheega guroroodean ghwayiin iheenga nyaawa ng'asheega Gurorooda.
45008006	Aba gideaba gidagasa saseeda miyeeda gil, nea gidagasa gurorooda ea eaweega gil ea hoyyooh.
45008007	Nea fughareeda sikkeal ng'asheega saseeda ea muy aba heeda Aseetta; ghanyea mwamwasa deaweedeeda Aseetta, nea aba huumwa ghanyea maygwasissa mureeda;
45008008	nea fukka aat geeshta saseedean, ghanyea may ghoammu goohoosan Aseetta.
45008009	Ak ea moowosi fukka aat geeshta ng'asheega saseedean, gowoschi fuga Gurorooda, aba huumwa iimida jeesingeagwa Gurorooda Aseetta. Siida mandeawana Gurorooda Gristo ghanyea maba niny.
45008010	Nea Gristo ii mida jeesingeagwa earappeadi sasanuukeagwa nimeewa aba ring'eedean, guroruunatkeagwa ea majeekcheewi aba doobiiwnatta.
45008011	Nea gurorooda siida ghayi aduunna Yeesu jeeda miyeeda ii mida jeedeang'wa, abeeda siida ghayi aduunna Gristo Yeesu jeeda miyeedean, gay ghoaghu sasanuukkeagwa jea gameewa aba guroroadaannyi mida jeesingeagwa.
45008012	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, geendeawi siileeda, nea maba saseeda, ak geayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega saseeda,
45008013	nea iyoppideewi ng'asheega saseesa gajameewwa, ama oppideewi Gurorooda abeeda ghoanung' gameewa gadiyoojiga saseeda ak abeeda gajanyasa eaweega.
45008014	Aba gideaba buuneessean adoabiiw Gurorooda Aseetta, fiisu abeeda ea balloojiga Aseetta gil.
45008015	Aba gideaba ghayi meegoaneagwa gurorooda soomjeandumeeda jea gweadu muuwda, ghayi geegooneegwa gurorooda jea ahuuweewana balloojiga. Nea geeyeawdi, “Bwaabwa! Bwaabwa!”
45008016	Gurorooda niny gamuuwwu sea guroruunatkaasa gideaba aseasa geewooschi diibiga Aseetta,
45008017	ama suwooschi diibiga, adabeeda geewooschi fuga jea gwahearaniischi, fuga adaw Aseetta hearaniischooda, jea gwahearaniischi sea Gristo, asaha, iisisawaneasa sea niny abeeda iimuchchu geakghambiideasa sea niny.
45008018	Aba gideaba ghaanung' ghoaw sawanadeen bea ghamneawean gili miih gili iyeahiimnyeadi sea giigheambiitta numuji jea eettahaachneasa.
45008019	Aba gideaba haleanjeessean weelweel appadayda ng'eanyiida gafuurda nea gahoosan aba furdeayda gidaheachta balloojiga Aseetta;
45008020	nea haleanjeeda ghayi sisin geanung' ghoaw duguuga mwadaagha, nea miih gidagassiida niny gil gidagassiida deaghayi nung' earara,
45008021	aba gideaba haleanjeessean weelweel gay ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat ak geegeandeawa jeeda soomjeandumeeda eadu nyariida, ak geanung' ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat bea giigheambiitta diibiga Aseetta.
45008022	Ak geanalli haleanjeessean weelweel iissa gamnyeani sean nea gwasawana ea ghoaw ghamneawa;
45008023	ak ea meakghusa haleanjeeda sisin, earaseaseeda mideawa haghweega madeeda bea Gurorooda, ak earaseasa geenniikghchi aba guroruunatkaasa, nea geammuughu eahuwa balloojiga nea lealnooda sasanuukaasa gil.
45008024	Aba gideaba aseasa geelealneasa aba gitta sirarjiin. Nea gitta sirarji nea geadayiin ea miih gichchea earar gil. Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha jea ghwarar gitta daahiin?
45008025	Ama sirarji gittta meadaahaan, abeeda geefurdi nea gearjeang'di.
45008026	Gwasnu eara Gurorooda ghaweadeasa aba ng'arng'arandeanya, aba gideaba meammuusi eamwaashta Aseetta gidahaguuwsiindaneasa, iiduw iissa ghamwaash Gurorooda ghawooda appadahuukkaasa nea gaba geaw nea gwasawana aba gisimeanda meammu eergu.
45008027	Nea siida sikkiideawa guroruunatka buuneeda ghwanal fughareeda Gurorooda, aba gideaba Gurorooda gamusiischeesa fuga ghaydidi aba gidagassiida Aseetta.
45008028	Ak geanalli gideaba aba jeeda ng'asheega sean iissa gwasin Aseetta gadiyeeda miy sea fukka bwariiy ninyiin, fukka ghayi suguursa aba gidagassiida ninyiin.
45008029	Aba gideaba fukka ghayi bay ghwanal niny ammwadiin geegala sea balleandaannyi, ak abeeda ghoaw niny siichchea eeshsheeda eeji aba jeeda fuga eaduupcheewi saang'a.
45008030	Amaduw fukka ghayi bay ghwaloat ammwadiin, iiduw earaga siguursa, amaduw fukka guursean hean ghoadaw nea fukka adaw doobiiwnattean ghoadaw gigheambiitta.
45008031	Asi gajeeyeenaan appadaydeaba ng'asheesu? Aseetta iimida meatkweedeanya, abeeda gwanda ng'eaha uhuudeanya?
45008032	Ninyeeda ghayi mabwayda eara Balleandaannyi assakkalealla, ak gagu appadahuukkaasa easasean, niny maygagoaneasa haleanjeeda miyaas sea ninyi?
45008033	Niih gajeang'eaha jea goorgweaksa fuga loat Aseetta? Aseetta gil dea adayyiida doobiiwnatta;
45008034	gaygoorgweakseegwa ng'eaha? Gristo Yeesu gil, ghayi meah, huumwa, ak gwaduunna miyeeda, ak gwanda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, amaduw gamusiischoaweasa?
45008035	Ak ea ng'eaha gil siida jea gooheellaneasa sea bariinyeega Gristo? Heappi, gajea hang'weaniidoodea, ghana deawiitmeeda, ghana sawanadeeda, ghana jalooda, ghana dawiishnatta, ghana halootta, ghana bwaanga?
45008036	Gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Apwadaydaang'u geenuuseasa askwearda sean, sinung' eewuurjeewana gisilga jea eenuuseada.”
45008037	Manda, aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu seaniin iissa geang'alli fuga jooriischi, aba heeda siida ghayi bwariinyeasa.
45008038	Aba gideaba naanalli aba huumwa gideaba ea miyeeda, ghana eaweega, ghana malaykajeega, ghana gea ambaliischi, ghana ng'asheega ghamneawa bunu, ghana gea jea ghwahidu, ghana fuga mideawa uurda,
45008039	ghana haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda, ghana haleanjeeda mida ng'eanyi, ghana gidawassean may ghoammu gooheellaneasa sea bariinyeega Aseetta mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanya.
45009001	Asi geargu huumwa aba jeeda Gristo, mearukuni ng'uyyeega; nea eara fughareedeanyu gamuuwwu ng'asheega badaydeanyu aba jeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
45009002	gideaba geandeawi giiseaneega muuchchi ea sawanadeeda measha aba jeeda guroroodeanyu.
45009003	Ak gwachchi aniini geagasayi gideaba gajeamwaashtanaan ak geheellewean Gristo appadahuukka fuga eaduupcheewi bissea buweadeegeasu gil aba emeedeanya.
45009004	Saawa fuga Israeeli, nea saawa ea balloojiga gil, was gigheambiitta, ea neajeeda, ea giidaydeayda deaweeda, ea baditta Aseetta ea heelleesiinda;
45009005	aba geannyaawa gwanda gheamba ghweaniga, bea emeannyaawa, aba saseeda, aba heannyaawa Gristohi. Aseetta haweawa haleanjeessean gagasa eebadiischeesa ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
45009006	Nea miih gideaba niyamwa ng'asheanda Aseetta aba gideaba may ghoaw buuneessean bea Israeeli jeatta Israeeli,
45009007	ak ea miih diibiga Abrahaamu sean aba gideaba jeattaannyi gil, “Geagus aba naweeda Isakka abeeda jeattang'u gajeeguurdeaweey.”
45009008	Nea miih gideaba saawa miih diibiga sijiila saseeda gea was diibiga Aseetta, saawa diibiga heelleesiinda gea was jeattaannyi.
