45009009	Aba gideaba ng'asheanda neajeeda niigil, “Gay dahidu damanda uurji niih, nea Saara gajeaninyas balleanda.”
45009010	Ak ea meakghusa niih, eara Rebeekka iigweayiit aba siyeanagi was Isakkaayda was ghweandeanya,
45009011	earappeadi saawa miyeejiin ak ea miigwasin ng'asheanda miy ghana dea muy, ak abeeda gitta gasa Aseetta aba loottean abeeda geesin, nea miih aba gadiyeeda gil geaghus aba gidaguurdeayda, ak geeyeeshsha,
45009012	“Siida haw gaygagadiiyeesa dea mwanang.”
45009013	Gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Naabwariinyi Yakkobo ak ea naasichchi Esawu.”
45009014	Asi gajeeyeanaan? Neada heeda Aseetta gwanda munyinda? Manda!
45009015	Aba gideaba gwayeeshsha Muusa, “Gay dabwayda siida eagasayi dabwayda, ak gaydasamsa siida eagasayi dasamsa.”
45009016	Asi meakghusa gitta gasa siidean gil ghana badiidaannyi, geaghus aba baydeayda Aseetta.
45009017	Aba gideaba ng'ooruutka gwargu appadayda Faraawo gideaba, “Ghayi ghaanung' miinaada appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghaahiimneey uurdeanyu, ak abeeda geerukkwiida gheawungeasu aba jeeda ng'eanyiissean.”
45009018	Asi iissa ghabwayda siida gasa ghabwayda, nea goomajeek gurorooda siida wassean gasa niny.
45009019	Asi gajayeeshshinean aniini, “Ghwasaan anda niny gudugagaseadayyi gidinyeanda? Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha jea ghamilikghta gitta gasean?”
45009020	Ak ang'iing'i siida guwosi ng'eaha jea ghwasha ghuutta Aseettean? Gidasisin ak gwayeeshsha dea sin, “Ghwasaan anda gisinduneani?”
45009021	Neada siida sina dahuunatka mandeawana uurda aba heeda sigeeda, ak gageanu mughuusheanda sigeeda ak gwasin dabichcheanjagi miy, ak gwasin nuut dea majeahhaak ghaang'i?
45009022	Asi naaha iigasa Aseetta ghoahiimu nyarastaannyi nea ghwanung' eanala uurdaannyi, ak ghamilikghta muuchchi nea ghwarjeang'da aba dabitiida nyarasta sisissa nyaroodean,
45009023	ak ghwanung' eanala gitteenna gigheambiittaannyi dabitta baydeayda, ghayi nibay gwasisin ammwadi aba giigheambiittaannyi,
45009024	meakghusa fuga Yahuudi ak ghwahit, gaguursa eara fuga emoojiga?
45009025	Aba huumwa gwayi aba jeeda Hoseeya, “Fukka mawosa fugeasuun gaydaguura ‘fugeasu,’ nea ninyeeda ghayi meabwariinya gaydaguura dea abwariinyi.”
45009026	“Nea heeda ghayi siyeeshshiina saawa, ‘Moawosi fugeasu’, gajeeguura ‘balloojiga Aseetta majeek.'"
45009027	Eara Isaaya ghwanya ghuutta appadayda Israeeli nea gwayi: “Nea moonneeda Israeeli earappeadi saang'a ea gwadeenna iseaskweanda basooda, eang'ay gea jea eelealu;”
45009028	Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida gay gwasin ng'asheandaannyi appadayda ng'eanyiida ak gorgweaksa nea gooduumduum ak ghoadayda.
45009029	Hean gawuurji gidaramoaranda Isaaya, “Inyeeda Ng'uttamiida bea lugooda ea mwanung'uneasa diibiga, ghwanyawa gajeasuwuurjeewi Sodooma ak gowuurjeewi Gomoora.”
45009030	Asi gajeayeanaan? Gajeeyeena fuga emoojiga mwaada geeshta doobiiwnatta ninyas doobiiwnatta, nea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba masaweega;
45009031	nea fuga Israeeli ang'ng'waay doobiiwnatta ea simmajeek aba deaweeda ea miighoahiit deaweedeedida.
45009032	Nea gweaguuni? Gweagu gideaba mwaada geeshta aba masaweega, ghaghus naweetta bea gissin saawaan. Nea gagul lagheaneetta beanya fihiin,
45009033	gawuurji gidasung'waarda, “Ng'ulla, ghaayiinyi Sayuuni lagheaneeda beanya fiih, lagheaneeda jea ghwanung' goobeedeayi; nea siida mwas niny ea mwajeappwaspwas.”
45010001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, gideagasayi muuchchi aba guroroodeanyu iyamwaashchi Aseetta appadahuukka fuga Israeeli ea gideaba abeeda geelealu.
45010002	Geamuuwwu appadahuukka nyaawa gideaba gwandeawa badiida aba gassooda Aseetta, amaduw ea meabwadana fughareeda.
45010003	Nea isidasheahiidi appadayda doobiiwnatta leabu heeda Aseetta, ak gagasa ghoang'eat danyaawa. abeeda ea modeagana geat doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
45010004	Aba gideaba Gristo muudeanooda deaweeda, ak abeeda siida wassean mideawa masaweega abeeda ghwanyas doobiiwnatta.
45010005	Muusa ghang'waar gideaba siida sina ng'asheega doabiiw aba deaweeda, gaygoobiideewa nih.
45010006	Nea doobiiwnattida sinyassa masaweegean gwayi, adiiduw giyeeni aba jeeda guroroadaang'u, “Gajea ng'eaha gil jea gwadiyeada gawa humng'eeda?” (Niih abeeda eannooda Gristo bea ng'eanyi gil)
45010007	ghana gideaba “Gay gawa ng'eaha uutta ng'eanyiida?” (Niih gideaba geescheeng'na Gristo uutta ng'eanyiida heeda fuga nimeewa).
45010008	Neada gwayiin? Gwayi ng'asheanda eaneekeeweey, ak gabissa gwanda ghuuttaang'u ak gabissa gwanda guroroadaang'u, (nea ng'asheanda ghayi bea masaweega ghayi sirukkwiidi);
45010009	aba gideaba, iirgu aba ghuuttaang'u gideaba Yeesu Ng'uttamiida gil, ak gumwasi aba guroroadaang'u gideaba ghayi gooduunna Aseetta jeeda miyeeda, gay lalaana.
45010010	Aba gideaba siida iissa ghamwas aba gurorooda ea ghwanyas doobiiwnatta, ak siida gwargu aba ghuutta ea ghwanyas lealeanooda.
45010011	Aba gideaba gwayi ng'ooruutka, “Manda siida wassean mwas niny ak ghabwaspwas.”
45010012	Aba gideaba manda gidaheeleetta siida Yahuudi ea dea Yunaani; aba gideaba niny Ng'uttamiida buuneessean gil, bissa gwandeawa baruureega appuneessean guuriisa niny.
45010013	Aba gideaba, “Siida wassean jea gaguurna gheawunga Ng'uttamiida gay ghwalaalaan.”
45010014	Asi gajamusischeesindaan siida mandeawana masaweega? Ak gay ghwamwastaan nea miih ghwayiiy iittaannyi? Ak gay gwayiing'shattaan ii manda siida rukkwiida giijasta?
45010015	Ak gay gwarukkwiidaaydaan siida ii miyeechcheakta? Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Amiyaastaan geeshanga fuga rukkwiida Giijasta miy!”
45010016	Iiduw ea moang'ng'waanya buuneessean giijastida miyiin; aba gideaba gwayi Isaaya, “Ng'uttamiida ng'eaha siida mwas iitta siittawji?”
45010017	Asi masaweega ging'eettaannyi iing'da gil, nea iing'da gweadu ng'asheanda surukkwiida bea Gristo.
45010018	Ak ghanyaashti gichcha, neada saawa ea miih ghwayiiyi? Huumwa gil niyiiy; “Ghuusiga nyaawa nighayda aba ng'eanyiissean, nea ng'asheega nyaawa ea nihitta muudeanooda ng'eanyiida.”
45010019	Ak ghoanyaashti, neada fuga Israeeli mwanala? Ammwadi gwayi Muusa, “Gay danung' ashissiina ghaang' fuga mawosa eamwa; nea eemeeda dasheahi gaydanung' anyareessa.”
45010020	Eara Isaaya ghabwadakta ak gwayi, “Ninyasan fuga ghayi magassean; neahiimsi geaw fukka moanyaashta iitteanyu.”
45010021	Nea aba heeda fuga Israeeli gwayi, “Askwearda sean ghaamiindi geattingeasu aba heeda fuga manda mureeda ea fuga was muranga.”
45011001	Asi gay danyaashta, Heappi! Aseetta niheawa buuneedaannyi? Manda! Aba gideaba earaniini geawoschi siida Israeeli, was siyagi aba jeeda jeatta Abrahaamu, was siida dooshta Benjamini.
45011002	Aseetta miih ghaheawa fugaaschi ghayi bay ghwanal. Ghana moanali ng'asheega ghayi rugu ng'ooruutka appadayda Eliya, gidaghayi ahaaktaayda fuga Israeeli ammadeeda Aseetta?
45011003	“Ng'uttamiida subwar sibangaagu, ak ea sinyarja heeda wagiidaang'u, ak ea sikghusan aniini nea gabwageaw, ak gagasa eaweegeasu.”
45011004	Iiduw ghwasha Aseetta nea gwayeeshshaan? “Neabuussi geaw fiih sagalamnyooji ispwa matkunnya aba madeeda Baali.”
45011005	Asi gwasnu eara damani bea ghamneaweani gwanda gheaptanga ghayi siloat aba dagheerjeandumeeda.
45011006	Abeeda ii dagheerjeandumeeda, abeeda ea maba gadiyeeda sisin; abeeda dagheerjeandumeeda ea mudu ea dagheerjeanduuma gil.
45011007	Abeeda ghoawattaan? Fuga Israeeli ghwaraay ghwanyas gidagasa. Nea fukka ghayi loadiin ghwanyas, nea suurja geemajeek,
45011008	gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda bea gideaba, “Aseetta ghoadaw gurooruunatka hang'oonyi, ak eara gheanyanga nyaawa ea moang'wearda nea mayiing'shi iidiga nyaawa, ea ghoaw askweareani bea ghamneawean.”
45011009	Ak gabiissa gwayi Dawdi, “Measajeega nyaawa gagasa ghoaw ghealooda gheatta ea ghaseeda, ak ea gadageeda jea ghwaak gil mureandooda aba heanyaawa;
45011010	gheanyanga nyaawa sinung' gamisaniidi ea moang'wearda, ak ginung' gaguumiisachchi mananuunatka nyaawa damanda mammuudeana.”
45011011	Asi ghanyaashti, Heapi nidiiy ea goobeedeayi? Manda! Aba gidinyeanda nyaawa iiduw ghwanyas fuga emoojiga lealeanooda ea ghwashit ghaang fuga Israeeli.
45011012	Asi gidinyeanda nyaawa iiniiw baruureega jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea reanyaweega nyaawa ghoaw baruureega aba jeeda emoojiga suurja, abeeda hidooda badiischeesiinda nyaawa majaahawi!
45011013	Asi ghamneawa geebaloolleegwa agoogeeda was emoojiga. Aba gideaba geewooschi giijasoochcheanda emoojiga,
45011014	gaydaghwar gadiyeedeanyu ak abeeda ghanung' gwashissean ghaang' fugeasu was Yahuudi, ak abeeda gealealu mwaatkwa.
45011015	Asi heeheeweega nyaawa ghayi iyeadu gidupcheeda badayda ng'eanyiida, abeeda masitta nyaawa naaha gil ii miih eaweega gil iing'atta miyeeda?
45011016	Asi murmurjeanda isiittayda ghoaw haleanjeeda sisabwa geadi was haghweega madeeda iighaydit, gwasnu eara murmurjeanda sean; ak eara hawunnyeanda iighaydit, gwasnu eara damealga.
45011017	Nea damealga mwaatkwa iisihirjeaweada, ama ang'iing'eeda was maseytunajeanda dareabeetta, sing'eapsa bugusta nyaawa, ak goobareannyi baruureega geetta sabiibu asi damealga adoaghwarji geat.
45011018	Asi iighwari geaw, giipkaadi gideaba miih ang'iing'i gil dea ang'ng'waay hawunnyeanda, hawunnyeanda gil dea ang'ng'waanyi ang'iing'i.
45011019	Asi gajeena, “Damealgiga ghayi gealach aba gideaba geegasa eang'eapsean aniini jeedida.”
45011020	Asi huumwa. Gealach aba nyootta masaweega nyaawa, nea gimiinaadi aba masaweaga. Adighwari geaw, ghang'wana gibeali.
45011021	Aba gideaba ghayi iimwanung'waada Aseetta damealga ghayi bea mwadiin, gwasnu earang'iing'i ghanyea may ghwanung'waadaneey.
45011022	Asi nala ng'eeninda ea ng'weaninda Aseetta: ng'weaninda aba heeda fuga abeada, amaduukku ng'eeninda Aseetta aba headaang'u, gagasa gideaba gaywosa ng'eeni; masa gidada earang'iing'i gajeelakseey ng'eanyi.
45011023	Gwasnu eara fiisu, iyabiida jeeda heeheeweega masaweega, gajeebiikta eang'aapta gichcha, aba gideaba Aseetta gwandeawa uurda jea ghang'aaptaawa gichcha.
45011024	Aba gideaba ghayi iisilaknaneey geetta mseeytunajeanda dareabeetta, amahit geang'aaptaneey, aba heeda mawosa heeda ghayi bea mwadi, mida heeda sihisa geetta msabiibu, abeeda ea mayghwaraanya muuchchi damealgiga bea geallaaniin eng'eapsa heeda msabiibajeanda ghayi leabu.
45011025	Asi awosa milmili aba ghwarjeedeang'wa, geagasayi anala gili funyaadiin, fuga eaduupcheewi: nihidu hang'ooynatta badahuukka fuga Israeeli, ea ghwahitta monneeda emoojiga hidu.
45011026	Abeeda fuga Israeeli gay ghwalaalaan, gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Gay ghwahidu Lealnoochcheanda jea gwaleabu Sayuuni, ak gaygooheelli munyinda sea Yakkobo;”
45011027	“amaduw niih ea neajeedeanyu gil sea saawa iyeageandi ring'eega nyaawa.”
45011028	Iiduw appadayda Giijasta Miy aniiw weajoodiga Aseetta apadahuukkeagwa; nea aba ng'asheekka bea loodittean eaniiw fuga subwariiy appadahuukka ghweanigaasa.
45011029	Haleanjeeda sugu ea guurnooda moammu ghwayamwa.
45011030	Gawuurji gidaghayi moosissiindani Aseetta mureeda iiduw ghamneawa anoanyaschi baydeayda aba nyootta nyaawa bea mureeda;
45011031	asi ghamneawa niiw fuga manda mureeda ak abeeda aba baydeayda sihhiimneegwa abeeda eara saawa ghwanyas baydeayda.
45011032	Aba gideaba Aseetta niidayda buuneessean ghoaw fuga manda mureeda, ak abeeda ghabwayda sean.
45011033	Asi gitteenna meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea weaghuumeeda ea fughareeda Aseetta! Nea meammu eesikteawa girgweageadaannyi, nea naweadingaaschi ghanyea meegaseadayyi!
45011034	“Aba gideaba gajea ng'eaha siida jea ghwanal gidagasa Ng'uttamiida, ghana gajea ng'eaha siida was deebaneadaannyi?”
45011035	“Ghana gajea ng'eaha gil siida jea aniidaw gida ammwadi, ak gajeebiikta eattawi?”
45011036	Aba gideaba headaannyi ea naweedeaba niny ea niny gwaleabu haleanjeessean. Giigheambiitta gammiisa niny ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
45012001	Asi, geamuscheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi aba baydeayda Aseetta, oattayda sasanuukkeagwa ghoaw haleanjeeda majeekcheewi sigadoowanniida, ghaydit bwariiy Aseetta, nea baditteang'wa bea huumwa gil.
45012002	Adiiduw gommaseawji giduurji ng'eanyiida, geaghus ghanyi eayameagwa ak geanung' ahuuwa fuga eashish aba fughareengeagwa, ak abeeda ghoanalli muuchchi gidabwariiy Aseetta was ng'asheega miyaas, sumwas biissa ea majeekcheewi.
45012003	Aba gideaba dagheerjeandumeeda sugoonan gearukusi giliwassih aba jeedeang'wa ea mang'ulla geaw ea ghwanaawa damanda hit, gidabal gwandeawa gassooda nea gorgweaksa geaw, aba haleanjeeda nea goodeen, gawuurji gidadawda Aseetta giliwassih aba masaweega nea goodeen.
45012004	Aba gideaba gawuurji saseeda iissa gwandeawa damealga saang'a nea damealsu ghanyea masna gadiyeanagi,
45012005	gwasnu eara aseaseeni saang'aan, geewooschi saseanagi aba jeeda Gristo, ak gaba roobadeeni roochchi sea nuut.
45012006	Asi ii nukwa geegoaneasa haleanjeeda heelleat aba dagheerjeandumeeda sigooneasa, asi eegadiyeatta: ea sibaneandumeeda gil, aba gitteenna masaweegaasa;
45012007	ii gadiyeeda gil, aba jeeda gadiyeedeanya; ama ii siida anealshi, aba jeeda ginealshoadaannyi;
45012008	ea siida reekkwiisa buuneeda gil, aba jeeda reekusiindaannyi; ea siida adayyiida haleanjeeda, aba jeedeesh; ea siida weeda buuneeda mideawa doobiiwnatta; siida sina gadiyeeda baydeayda, biissa gahoosani.
45012009	Bariinyeega gagasa gaba huumwa; sit ng'asheanda muy, nea ghoang'ng'waannyi ng'asheega miyaas;
45012010	abariinnya geat agooga, aba bariinyeega huumwa bea oorjooga giyeang'wa nea aba mureeda gooshsheedi buuneeda suurja.
45012011	Nea adoabealbealli aba badiida, ak goondeawi badiida aba jeeda gurorooda, nea googadiyeesi Ng'utamiida.
45012012	Ahoosana aba gitta oararjiin, amilikghta sawanadeeda, amwaasha Aseetta galeagasean.
45012013	Oattayda haleanjeeda gasa fuga ghaydidi, awosa fuga innyeani jeesin.
45012014	Abadiischeesiina fuga sawaneegwa; abadiischeesiina nea ghanyea adoamwaashti.
45012015	Ahoosana sea fuga hoosan, oyyeawda sea fuga ayyeawda.
45012016	Gagasa andeawana iitteaba geat agooga; adoaghwarji geat muuchchi aba gassooda ng'asheega hees, agassa ng'asheega manang'i. Adoahuuyi fuga jea ghaghuuda geat fughareeda.
45012017	Iisimaneey siida ng'asheanda muy ea aduwaldaawi ng'asheanda muy, asna ng'asheega miyaas aba madeeda buuneeda.
45012018	Iiduw aba meatkweedeang'wa abeaha hoyyooh aba heeda buuneessean.
45012019	Fuga abwariinyi, adoowalliidi mureandooda aba heedeang'wa, ghang'wana ghoanung'waadi ghawalda nyarasta Aseetta; aba gideaba geang'waar, “Waldeayda mureandooda deanyu, gay dawalda aniini gwargu Ng'uttamiida.”
45012020	Manda, “Iibearji weajoochcheandaang'u jalooda, giidaw gichchea ghwaak, amabearji muwooshta, giidawi beega; aba gideaba iisni ng'asheanji abeeda giyiini uhuudaannyi rarayga beasta.”
45012021	Adaghwajoarnyi munyinda, gagasa joara munyinda aba miyinda.
45013001	Daba siisi sissa mureeda fuga ambaliischi. Aba gideaba manda sugoochcheandumeeda maleapna heeda Aseetta, ak eara giikka midean earaga ghwayiin Aseetta.
45013002	Asi gwasnu earaba siida shaang' fuga ambaliischi siisi gang'uchchi sea ng'asheanda guuh Aseetta, nea fuga shaang' gay ghwanyas ghoorjooda.
45013003	Aba gideaba sugoodiga iissa ea mwanung' ghabeal fuga miyaas, iissa ghwanung' ghabeal fuga sina ng'asheega munyas. Asi gigasayi amiiwali fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida? Sina ng'asheega miyaas, ak abeeda gay ghaghwarnyi,
45013004	aba gideaba niny soomjeanda Aseetta gil appadaydaang'u. Ama iisni ng'asheega munyas, gishageadi, aba gideaba niny meatta bwaanga mwadaagha; aba gideaba niny soomjeanda Aseetta jea ghwalas aba nyarasta siida sina ng'asheega munyas.
45013005	Asi ghang'wana gwasin siida mureeda, ak ea adisni aba mulsiinda nyarasta Aseetta akghwahit, sina aba gitta apkaatta uhuudaang'uun.
45013006	Aba sareani goottayyiidi gwaadi, aba gideaba fuga ambaliischi fuga gadiyeeda bea Aseetta, nea ghoashng'u aba jeedeaba gadiyeeni.
45013007	Oattawa buuneessean haleanjeeda doobiiwsa, siida gwaadi adawa gwaadi, nea siida gujaweeda adawa gujaweeda, siida haguuw gideaba gajeawal gheangda deattaw gheawalmeeda, nea siida haguuw mureeda deattawa mureeda.
45013008	Adiiduw gindeawi sileeda siida wassean, anung'waada eaghus bariinyeegeaba geat, aba gideaba siida bwariiy giischewoochcheandaannyi niing'ng'waay deaweeda.
45013009	Digheannyeekka ayi, “Adimealuuli, Adinuusi siida, Adijagwadiischi, Adishissi ghaang' gissiida,” ghana gwanda diigheannuut wassean, geekkuuyeasa jeedeaba ng'asheanji, bea gideaba, “Bwariiyda gischewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw.”
45013010	Bariinyeega moammu gwassisa gischeewoochcheanda ng'asheanda muy, asi bariinyeega giimajeekta deaweeda gil.
45013011	Asi iisinalli gideaba nihitta damanda jea eang'eatng'eadana jeeda ruweanga. Aba gideaba ghamneawa lealeanoodeanya eaneekkeewaneasa muuchchi ea eamawuurji damanda ghayi sumwaseewi;
45013012	eaweeda nigeawiit muuchchi, askwearda ea nineekiit. Asi eehista gadiyoojiga misaneeda ak geashshaash dabitta weeshinda;
45013013	asi eara aseasa gagasa eabeada fuga mida heedeesh, miih geawunda gheang'da gil ea booktumeeda, miih ng'asheega munyas gil ea hiseadayeandumeeda, miih jaliida gil ea lajoodeaba ghuut.
45013014	Ookweala Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, nea adoong'ulayi ng'asheega saseeda ghana asna gidagasa.
45014001	Siida ng'arng'ar aba masaweega, adeapta, nea adoojaluudayeewi aba fughareadaannyi.
45014002	Siida mideawa masaweega ghwaak haleanjeessean nea siida ng'arng'ar ghwaak nyeanyiida.
45014003	Siida iiyak gida ea adagafool siitta mwaaga, nea eara siitta mwaagaan ea adagoorgweaksa siitta agiin; aba gideaba niny numwas Aseetta.
45014004	Ak guwosi ng'eaha ea argweaksiina soomjeamba siinuut? Aba gideaba aba heeda siidaannyi haw adaw gadiyeeda iissa ghamiinaada ghana ghoabeada. Asi, gajeanung' ghamiinaada, aba gideaba ghoammu Siida haw ghwanung' ghamiinaada.
45014005	Siinuut iissa ghwanung' aamiy askwearjeanjagi, ea ghang'al suurja, nea siinuut iing'ula askwearjoojiga sean ghwanung' gawuurji. Asi daba siisi ammajeek fughareadaannyi.
45014006	Siida ng'ulla askwearjeanda, iissa gang'ulla aba sinooda mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida. Gwasnu eara siida iyak gida, ghwaak aba sinooda mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, nea gabadiischeesa Aseetta; nea siida nung'waada, ghwanung'waadawa mureeda aba heeda Ng'uttamiida ak gabadiischeesa Aseetta.
45014007	Aba gideaba aba jeedeang'wa manda siida ammu goobiideewa geaw, ak ea manda siida ammu ghami nea gaba geaw.
45014008	Aba gideaba iisiippiidi ng'eanyiida, geeppiidi appadayda Ng'uttamiida, amasimeewayi, geemeewayi appadayda Ng'uttamiida; asi, iisiippiidi ng'eanyiida ghana eemeewa, geewoschi fuga Ng'uttamiida.
45014009	Aba gideaba Gristo ghayi ghami ammuchchu gabiikta gamajeegiit, ak goombal fuga nimeewa ea gea majeekcheewi.
45014010	Ama ang'iing'i, ghwasaan anda giirgweaksi oorjeeda giyeang'wa? Ghana ang'iing'i, anda gufooli oorjeeda giyeang'wa? Aba gideaba gajeamiinaada easasean aba madeeda hoorgeeda girgweageeda Aseetta;
45014011	aba gideaba geang'waar, “Gawuurji gideandeatti, aba girrugu Ng'uttamiida, giliwas gudung'da gajeekula ng'eanyi ammadeedeanyu, nea giliwas ng'ushapta gaygwaduumsheesa Aseetta.
45014012	Asi gwasnu giliwassih aba jeedeanya gaygagu iittaannyi aba madeeda Aseetta.”
45014013	Asi adagudu ergweakkiisiina geat, ak ghang'wana siida ea masna gichchea ghabwaay ghana gwaruusa oorjeeda geannyaawa.
45014014	Ghaanalli ak ghaabwadi gideaba neasikteawi muuchchi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gideaba manda gidamideawa ririnyeanda aba simnoadaannyi; amaduw aba heeda siitta daah gida ak ghwanung' ghoaw gilibea ririnyaaniin, aba heedeaba siisi gili gaba ririnyaan.
45014015	Iiduw oorjeeda giyeang'wa iisawana ea gagiisan appadayda hamitta iyaagi, abeeda eamudumidana jeeda bariinyeega. Adiiduw gubwari siida darari aba hamittaang'u iyaagi nea siisi ghayi ghami Gristo appadaydaannyi.
45014016	Asi alooheedeang'wa adiiduw geerukuna munyinda.
45014017	Aba gideaba gheambalmeeda Aseetta miih agiischooda gil ea leeshooda, ada doobiiwnatta gil ea hoyyooh ea hooseaneega aba jeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit;
45014018	aba gideaba siida gadiyeesa Gristo aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu siisi goohoosan Aseetta ak ghabwada gideaba siisi ghamwas buuneeda.
45014019	Asi iisunu geang'ng'waanyi ng'asheega hoyyooh ea ng'asheega miyaas jea gwadeekneegwa.
45014020	Aba iitta hamitta, adiiduw gidattasi gadiyeeda Aseetta. Haleanjeessean aba huumwa amiyaas, ak ea muy aba heeda siida wassean jea ghwanung' ghoabeada suurja aba hamittak;
45014021	ghang'wana aamwaaga siida bannyeega ghana ghwali difaayi ghana gwasin ng'asheanda wassean jea ghabwaay oorjeeda giyeang'wa.
45014022	Masaweekka indeawiin, gagasa mideawana aba jeadaang'u aba madeeda Aseetta; ghang'wana siitta meargweaksiina geaw aba ng'asheandida mwasiin.
45014023	Iiduw siida mideawa machmajeega sirgweaksa, iyak, ea mwaaga aba masaweega, nea gidawassean sisin iimeesnana masaweega ea ring'eeda.
45015001	Asi gamiiseasa aseaseeda mideawa uurjeenga eaweeda fuga ng'arng'ari, ak ea adeabwariinyi geat aseasa nea geabwaageat;
45015002	aba jeedeanya daba siisi ahoosan gischeewoochcheandaannyi aba ng'asheega miyaas ak geemmajeek masaweagaaschi.
45015003	Aba gideaba Gristo mwabwariinya geaw; gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Ng'asheega munyas rukuneey fuga ruguun ninyasan aniini.”
45015004	Aba gideaba ng'asheega sean ghayi sung'waar aba askwearjoojigeaba mwadiin geang'waar ak abeeda ghoadoabiiweasa, ak aba alooheeda ea gidamajeektaneasa ng'ooruutka abeeda geanyaschi gissirarji.
45015005	Nea Aseetta mideawa alooheeda ea giimajeekta gagasa gagooneegwa duupcheeda agooga nea goobwaageat, nea googali geat Gristo Yeesu,
45015006	abeeda aba ghuudagi abeeda ghoakghambiichchi Aseetta ea Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
45015007	Asi daba siisi deapta nuut, gawuurji gida ghayi deaptaaydaneegwa Gristo, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
45015008	Aba gideaba geayeeshshiineegwa, Gristo ghoaw soomjeanda aba heeda fuga ghasmeahooda appadayda ng'asheega huumwa bea Aseetta, ak abeeda ghoadaajiit heelleeda ghayi siittaw ghweanigeagwa,
45015009	ak abeeda ghoaghambiit fuga emoojiga Aseetta aba baydeaydaannyi. Gawuurji gissung'waarda, “Asi gaydaduummiseey aba jeeda emoojiga, ak gay dasarmani gheawungaagu;”
45015010	ak gebiikta eeyi, “Ahoosana emoojiga, sea fugaaschi;”
45015011	nea gichcha gwayi, “Oduumshesiina Ng'uttamiida, emoojiga sean, ak goorukusi buuneessean gwaduumsheesa niny;”
45015012	nea gichcha gwayi Isaaya, “Gayghwahidu hawunnyeanda Yeesi, ak gay ghwahidu goombal emoojiga, ak ea siida jea ghaghus emoojiga gil.”
45015013	Asi Aseetta rarooda gagasa ghoannyiideagwa hooseaneega sean ea hoyyooh aba masaweega, ak abeeda aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit goppiidi jeeda rarooda.
45015014	Asi neasikteawi aniini iitteang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, gideaba earagooga goondeawi alooheeda haw, ak ghwanyiideagwa fughareenga sean, ak ghoammuuschi oattoabiiwa geat.
45015015	Ak ghamneawa ghaang'waarji nea ghaamwanyiichchi muuchchi nea geapkeaneegwa aba miyeenooda goonan Aseetta,
45015016	ak abeeda ghahuuyi siida gadiyeeda bea Gristo Yeesu aba jeeda emoojiga, ak abeeda geasissi gadiyeeda Giijasta miy bea Aseetta gadiyeeda was ashoohoochcheandumeeda ak abeeda ghoaw emoojiga haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda miyaas, iing'atta nea nimmiidu Gurorooda Ghaydit.
45015017	Aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu geandeawi gichchea daghwara geaw aba gadiyeedeanyu aba madeeda Aseetta.
45015018	Iiduw ea maydaammu dargu ng'asheanda masna Gristo aba gadiyeedeanyu, danyas buuneeda aba heeda emoojiga, aba ng'asheanda ak gissin,
45015019	aba uurda gwadeagooda ea ng'asheega deamdeameadi, aba uurda Gurorooda Ghaydit, nea gwaneayeewa ng'eanyiissean ghang'eada Yerusaleemu ea geeng'oojiga ea ghwahitta Ihiriko ak gearukkwiidi Giijasta miy bea Gristo,
45015020	aba jeedeaba gassoodeanyu bea Giijasta miyiin, ea miih aba heeda ghayi surukusa gheawunga Gristo, ak abeeda ea meadeeksheewani uhuuda sindeetta ghayi deas siinuut,
45015021	gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda bea gideaba, “Fukka miyeerukusa giijasta miyiin gay ghwadaah niny, ak gayghwanal fukka ghayi miih ghwayiiyiin.”
45015022	Aba sareani geetteellean galeagasean amwaawuni ng'eang'deang'wa.
45015023	Duukku ghamneawa iinukwa muttandeawa gheatta gadiyeeda aba ng'eang'i, ak ghaabwadi gideaba nigeawiit dagaseadayyi wunoooda ng'eang'deang'wa gweannyeekka saang'a,
45015024	ghaararji dadaheagwa nea ghaang'atti dawa ng'eanyiida Spaniya, abeeda ghaalamwaji bareannyeekkeasu doan dadaheagwa agooga, ak ghaanyaschi weetteang'wa, gilimwanang'.
45015025	Amaduw ghamneawa geawi Yerusaleemu dagadiyeesa fuga Ghaydidi.
45015026	Aba gideaba gahaguuw fuga Makkedoniya ea gea Akkaaya ghoawaam gujaweeda aba weetta fuga ghaydidi mida hoowa bea Yerusaleemu biissa ea barbariin;
45015027	ghabwariiy saawa gideaba gaygwasindunu, ak ea huumwa gil, gwandeawa sileeda appadahuukeaba fiisu; aba gideaba fuga emoojiga isuguuyi ghawooda abeeda gammiisa gideaba gayghaweat aba haleanjeeda sinyas aba ghawooda.
45015028	Iiduw nea naahiichchi gadiyeetta ak ghaadawji saawa gissiwwaam gaydabeawa heedeang'wa ak geawi ng'eanyiida Spaniya;
45015029	ak ghaanalli gideaba iyaahidu ng'eang'deang'wa gaydoan nea geawoschi hidaat aba ghawooda Gristo.
45015030	Fuga eaduupcheewi, geamuscheegwa aba naweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo ea aba bariinyeega Gurorooda eang'ng'waanya geat ea aniini aba mooshta Aseetta aba madeeda Aseetta appadaydeanyu,
45015031	ak geelealnean aba heedeaba fukka mandeawana masaweega mida ng'eanyiida Yuudeeya, ea gadiyeedeanyu eandeawi aba Yerusaleemuun ghamwas fuga ghaydidi mida hoowa,
45015032	ak abeeda ghaahidu ng'eandeang'wa nea geahoosannyi aba gidabwariiyda Aseetta ak abeeda geafuufchi sea saawa.
45015033	Aseetta mideawa hoyyooh gagasa goobiida headeang'wa oagasean. Amin.
45016001	Geagasayi danung'uneagwa hudiyya suguura Foibe, was siida gadiyeesa ganiiseeda mida ng'eanyiida Gengreya,
45016002	ak geagasayi gideaba gajadeapta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida, gawuurji gidahaguuwda fuga ghaydidi, ak ghoaweachchi aba ng'asheega wassean deeppa gagasa aba heedeang'wa, aba gideaba niny nuweat fuga saang'a ak ghaweadan earaniini.
45016003	Aghada Briska ea Akkiila, was fuga sin gadiyeeda sea aniini aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
45016004	saawa ghayi eahideadi eara ealajaada gheetkweakka nyaawa aba eaweegeasu, ak ea miih aniini gil akghwahit, eara ganiisajeega sean bea emoojiga ghoaghadeagwa;
45016005	oakghada eara ganiiseeda mida jeedeaba gheannyi. Oakghada Epainettoyda abwariinyi, was siida madeeda mwas Gristo aba ng'eanyiida Asiya.
45016006	Oakghada Mariyaayda ghayi deawiit muuchchi aba jeedeang'wa.
45016007	Oakghada Androniiko sea Yuuniya, was fugeaduupcheewi ghayi siraduudayeewean; biissa analaat aba jeeda giijasoodiga, nea saawa goosheedeawean nalooda Gristo.
45016008	Oakghada Ampliyanooyda abwariinyi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
45016009	Oakghada Urbano, was siida easnuudayeewi aba jeeda Gristo ea Stakkisiiyda abwariinyi.
45016010	Oakghada Appeeleeyda was siida doabiiwaat aba jeeda Gristo. Ak oakghada fuga gheeh Aristobulo.
45016011	Oakghada Heeroodiooni was siideaduupcheewi, oakghada fuga gheeh Narkiso, mideayi sea Ng'uttamiida.
45016012	Oakghada fukkadiyeeda mida jeeda Ng'uttamiida, was Drifaina ea Drifosa. Oakghada Bersisiyda abwariinyi biissa gagadiyi muuchchi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
45016013	Oakghada Rufo, was siida gadiyeeda haw bea Ng'uttamiida, ea ghaamwat biissa ea iyya gil.
45016014	Oakghada Asinkrito, Flegoni, Herme, Batroba, Herma, sea oorjooga giyeanya mideawa.
45016015	Oakghada Filologo ea Yuliya, Nereya, sea huda ghaamwat, ea Olimpa, sea fuga sean ghaydidi mideawa.
45016016	Oakghada geat aba samitta ghaydit. Ghoaghadeagwa ganiisajeega sean bea Gristo.
45016017	Fuga eaduupcheewi, geamuscheegwa gideaba ang'ulla fuga eattu jaleadinga ea ng'asheega jea gwaruusa buuneeda, mawoosa giinealshooda ghayi sinnaleagwa; asi ohheelleewana geat.
45016018	Aba gideaba fuga sina ng'asheesu magadiyeesiina Ng'uttamiideanya was Gristo, saawa gagadiyeesa jeesinga nyaawa, nea gaba geat aba ng'asheega nyaawa bea ng'uyyeega iissa gwareengani guroruunatka fuga manang'i fughareeni.
45016019	Aba gideaba mureedeang'wa ninal buuneessean, ak geahoosannyi appadahuukkeagwa, ak geagasayi gideaba gajahuuwa fuga mideawa weaghuumeeda aba jeeda ng'asheega miyaas, nea ghoahuuyi fuga doobiiweadi aba nga'sheega munyas;
45016020	nea Aseetta mideawa hoyyooh gaygabay ghwanung' adattasa Shattaani aba geeshangeagwa. Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeedeang'wa.
45016021	Dimotteoyda was siida gadiyeeda sea aniini ghoaghadeagwa; sea Lukkiyo, ea Yasooni ea Soosipatroyda eaduupcheewi.
45016022	Aniineeda was Dertiyo siida ng'waar baroajeanji gil, ghoaghadeagwa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
45016023	Gayooyda was siida eabareassi ea ganiiseessean ghoaghadeagwa. Erastooyda was siida adiing'ng'iida lappiya sea Gwarto, ghoaghadeagwa.
45016024	Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeedeang'wa oagasean. Amin.
45016025	Asi ghamneawa siitta ammu goomajeegeagwean, aba gitteascheetta sea giijasteanyu miy ea gissurukkwiideayda Yeesu Gristo, ak gwadeaschi sea gidaheachta makcheameetta ghayi funyaat ng'eada deaghayi bea garayiin,
45016026	ak geattahaach ghamneawa aba ramooranga sung'waar amaduw ghwanal emoojiga, aba gidaghayi rukutteayda Aseetta manda muudeanooda, ak abeeda gwasin mureeda aba masaweega,
45016027	heeda Aseetta mideawa weaghuumeeda gagasa nyasa giigheambiitta damanda manda mudeanooda aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo! Amin.
46001001	Baulo, ghayi suguursa aba gidagassiida Aseetta ghoaw giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu, ea oorjeediyya was Sosteene,
46001002	Heeda ganiiseeda Aseetta mida Goriinto was fuga ghayi simmiidu aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ghayi suguursa ghoaw fuga ghaydidi, sea fuga sean guriisa gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo aba heeda wassean. Niny Ng'uttamiida nyaawa gil, ea deanya.
46001003	Gagasa andeawana dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooh leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
46001004	Geabadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa appadayda dagheerjeandumeeda Aseettaa ghayi sugooneegwa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
46001005	ak aba naweadinga sean geepparureegwa aba jeedeaba niny aba weaghuumeeda ea fughareeda sean.
46001006	Ak abeeda gawuurji muuwwuunooda Gristo gidamajeekta aba jeedeang'wa,
46001007	ak abeeda ea mwashoadeewaneegwa haleanjeeda sugu bea guroorooda, nea ghoammuughu giidaheachta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo;
46001008	niny gaygoomajeegeegwa ea ghwahitta mudeanooda, nea manda ramaseanda aba eaweeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
46001009	Aseetta ea doabiiwaat, was deaghayi gurneegwa ak abeeda gobareannyeewi Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo was Ng'uttamiideanya.
46001010	Geamuscheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, gideaba abaloolda gilagi oagasean, nea adagwanda dageascheedeang'wa fuurjeeda, ak gidabal goguuyi aba fughareanagi ea girgweageanagi.
46001011	Aba gideaba nirukunean fuga Gloe gideaba gwanda jeedeang'wa jaliida, fuga eaduupcheewi.
46001012	Asi gideargu niih gil gideaba giliwas siih aba heedeang'wa iissa gwayi, “Aniini geabeayi Baulo,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Appolo,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Geefa,” ghana, “Aniini geabeayi Gristo.”
46001013	Heappi neada Gristo gabearshi? Heappi Baulo ghayi geengoor appadahuukkeagwa? Ghana heappi geepaatiisaneegwa aba gheawunga Bauloohi?
46001014	Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba gideaba miih deabattiisan siida aba ng'eang'deang'wa geaghus Grispo ea Gayo;
46001015	adiiduu gwayi siih ghayi geeppattiisan aba gheawungeasu.
46001016	(Geabattiisannyi eara fuga gheeh Stefaano. Iing'atta suuh ea mwaapkaadi ea neabattiisanyi siih nuut wassean.)
46001017	Aba gideaba Gristo ghayi meajeaknean deabattiisan, goojeaknean darukkwiida giijasta miy nea meakna bareaynatta weaghuumeeda, ak abeeda ea moawa beehiida Gristo gidamwadaagha.
46001018	Aba gideaba ng'asheanda beehiida aba heeda fuga roodeadi leendeeda gil, nea aba heedeanya aseaseeda silealu ea uurda Aseetta.
46001019	Aba gideaba geang'waar, “Gaydanyarja weaghuumeeda fuga weaghoodi, nea fughareenga fuga mideawa fughareeda gaydaheawa.”
46001020	Gwandeenu siida was weaghoochcheanda? Gwandeenu ng'oorshoochcheanda? Gwandeenu siida argweaji bea damani? Neada Aseetta ea miih ghwanung' ghoaw lendeeda weaghuumeeda ng'eanyiida?
46001021	Nea, aba weaghuumeeda Aseetta, ghanyea mwanala ng'eanyiida Aseetta aba naweeda weaghuumeeda, gohoosan Aseetta aba naweeda lendeetta bea ng'asheega surukwiidiin ak abeeda geelealu fukka numwasiin.
46001022	Aba gideaba fuga Yahuudi gagaseadayyi gwadeagwajeega, nea fuga Yunaani gagaseadayi weaghuumeeda,
46001023	amaduukku aseasa geerukwiidi Gristoyda ghayi singoor, aba heeda fuga Yahuudi gwaruusa fiih nea aba heeda fuga emoojiga ea lendeeda gil,
46001024	nea aba heeda fuga suguura, sean Yahuudi ea Yunaani, Gristo ea uurda Aseetta ea weaghuumeeda Aseetta.
46001025	Aba gideaba dasheaynatta Aseetta gaburdeawa muuchchi fughareeda buuneeda, nea ng'arng'aranda Aseetta gwandeawa uurda muuchchi ea ghoadaraam buuneeda.
46001026	Asi asikteawana gurnoodeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi; aba jeedeang'wa miih weaghoodi fuga saang'a aba ing'ulleegwa buuneeda, miih saang'a gea mideawa uurjeenga, ak ea miih saang'a fuga sijiilsa gealga hees;
46001027	iiduu ghwaloat Aseetta ng'asheekka sifool bea jeeda ng'eanyiidean ak ghoabwaaspwaas fuga mideawa fughareenga, ghwaloat Aseetta haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari mida ng'eanyiida ak ghoobwaaspwaas gea mideawa uurjeenga,
46001028	Aseetta ghwaloat haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari sifool aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ea haleanjeeda mandana, ak ghwanung' ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha gea mida,
46001029	ak ea manda siida jea ghoammu ghaghwar geaw aba madeeda Aseetta.
46001030	Niny gumdooda eaweegeagwa gil aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ghayi nung' Aseetta ghoaw weaghuumeedeanya, ea doobiiwnatteanya ea gimmiinnooda, ea lealeanooda;
46001031	asi gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waarda, “Siida ammu ghaghwar geaw, daghwara geaw appadayda Ng'uttamiida.”
46002001	Hean iyaawunnyi heedeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, mwaawuuni darukuneegwa muuwwuunooda Aseetta aba ghwarjeeda ghana aba weaghuumeeda.
46002002	Aba gideaba aniini meagassi danal ng'asheanda wassean aba jeedeang'wa geaghus Yeesu Gristo, dea ghayi singoor.
46002003	Nea aniini ghayi gendeayi nea geawoschi ng'arng'ar ea muuwda sea hirbabandeeda;
46002004	nea girgweageedeanyu ea giijasteanyu ghanyea maba ng'asheega gurguriischooda bea weaghuumeeda, gagadiiyi Guroorooda aba uurda,
46002005	ak abeeda masaweegeagwa ea mabeachchi weaghuumeeda buuneeda, gagasa gwaleabu uurda Aseetta.
46002006	Nea jeeda fuga nihittiisa heeda aba masaweega ginaali weaghuumeeda, earappeadi miih weaghuumeedeaba damani ghana dea fuga ambaliischi aba damani, was gea jea gammuudean gil.
46002007	Ak geergu makcheameetta ea weaghuumeetta funyaat bea Aseettean, ghayi nung' Aseetta ghoaw digheanda ammwadi aba gigheambiitteanyean.
46002008	Ea manda aba jeeda fuga ambaliischi aba damani dea nal ng'asheanji; aba gideaba inyeeda heetta ghwanal, abeeda ea maygongoor Ng'uttamiida ghambiidaat.
46002009	gawuurji gissung'waarda, “Haleanjeeda manda gheang'da nidaah, ghana iitta niyiiy, haleanjeeda nigeawiit gwasissin Aseetta appadahuukka fuga bwariiy niny.”
46002010	Aseetta niihiimneasa aseasa aba naweeda Guroorooda. Aba gideaba Guroorooda iissa ghwanal haleanjeessean, eara haleanjeeda mida jeeda Aseetta.
46002011	Niih gajea ana siih jea ghwanal fughareemba siih nuut iimeakghusa guroorootta mida jeessiidean? Gwasnu manda siida ammu ghwanal fughareeda Aseetta geaghus Guroorooda Aseetta.
46002012	Aseasa meanyasi guroorooda ng'eanyiida, geanyaschi guroorooda leabu heeda Aseetta, ak abeeda geenalli gidagoaneasa Aseetta aba innyeanda jeeda.
46002013	Ak geerukwiidi gili aba ng'asheega maleapna weaghuumeeda anaal fiih siida geaghus dea anaal fiih Guroorooda, ak gwaroobu humeanda guroorooda aba heeda fuga mideawa Guroorooda.
46002014	Siida maba guroorooda mayghwanyas gida jea ghoadaw Guroorooda Aseetta, aba gideaba aba headaannyi lendeeda gil, ak ea mayghwanal aba gideaba geaghus eanal aba jeeda gurorooda.
46002015	Siida gurorooda iissa goorgweaksa haleanjeessean, nea niny ghanyea manda siida jea goorgweaksa.
46002016	“Aba gideaba, siida nal fughareeda Ng'uttamiida ng'eaha, ak abeeda ghoanaal?” Duukku aseasa gendeawi fughareeda Gristo.
46003001	Nea aniini fuga eaduupcheewi mwammuusi deabalooldaneegwa fuga mideawa gurorooda, geaghus awuurjeewana fuga saseeda, nea goowuurjeewi diibiga Gristo.
46003002	Aniini ghaabiyeagwa eanooga, meagooneegwa hamitta hang'waay; aba gideaba agooga miyoammuusa; asi eara ghamneawa miyoammuusa,
46003003	aba gideaba agooga gudabeaha saseeda. Nea iimida jeedeang'wa lachng'eanyiida ea ng'alealleeda, abeeda mowosi fuga saseeda, nea ghoabeadi fuga geallaani?
46003004	Aba gideaba iyayi siyagi, “Aniini geabeayi Baulo,” nea gwayi nuut, “Aniini geabeayi Appolo,” abeeda agooga ea mowosi buuneeda?
46003005	Asi Appolo ng'eaha? Ama Baulo ng'eaha? Soomjooga ghayi nung amwasa gil, gawuurji gidadawda Ng'uttamiida giliwas siih gwasin.
46003006	Aniini ghayi geahisti, ak ghwayiin Appolo beega, nea dea arruudu ea Aseetta.
46003007	Siida hista miih gili ghana siida iin beega geaghus Aseetta arudu.
46003008	Siida hista ea dea iin beega gooyang'deayyi, amaduu gay gaba siisi nyas gimeardaannyi gawuurji gidaghayi sinda gadiyeeda.
46003009	Aba gideaba aseasa geewooschi fuga sin gadiyeeda Aseetta; agooga goowooschi madamnyeanda Aseetta, nea goowooschi gheeda Aseetta.
46003010	Aba gitteenna dagheerjeandumeeda goonan Aseetta, ak geawuurjeewi siida geariir haweewa fuga deekshi geasinyi sindeetta, ak gwadeeksheewa siinuut uhuuda. Ak ea daba siisi ng'ula gitteeksheatta aba uhuudeaba sindeedi.
46003011	Aba gideaba manda siinuut jea gwasin sindeetta nuut, geaghus diitta ghayi nigeawiit eesiniin, nea Yeesu Gristohi.
46003012	Iiduu nea gwadeeksheewa siinuut uhuudeaba sindeedi, iideakta lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ghana lappiya, ghana lagheanga haw sheayeat, ghana geediga, ghana seenga, ghana nyeega,
46003013	abeeda gajeattajiit gadiyeemba giliwas siih; aba gideaba gayghoahiimu eaweettida, aba gideaba gajeattaajiida beasta, ak abeeda gwasin beasta gadiyeeda ghayi sisin giduurji.
46003014	Nea gadiyeeda sin siida wassean nea gwadeeksa uhuudeaba sindeettida gayghaghu abeeda gayghwanyas gimearda.
46003015	Nea siida dattasa gadiyeadaannyi, gay ghwaak lugooda, amaduuku niny gajeelealu, gay gawuurji gili mwanmwandaawa jeeda beasta.
46003016	Moanali gideaba agooga goowooschi gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea Aseetta, ea gideaba Guroorooda Aseetta gwanda jeedeang'wa?
46003017	Siida iinuus gheeda sibatta Aseetta, gay gwanuus Aseetta siisi. Aba gideaba gheeda Aseetta aaghaydit, nea agooga gil.
46003018	Siida adagwareengani geaw. Siida idaah geaw, gideaba gwandeawa weaghuumeeda aba jeedeang'wa aba gweannyeeksu adadashahiida ak abeeda ghwanyas weaghuumeeda.
46003019	Aba gideaba weaghuumeedeaba ng'eanyiini leendeeda gil aba heeda Aseetta. Aba gideaba geang'waar, “Siida ang'ng'oonyi siida weaghoot aba jeeda milmilanda nyaawa,”
46003020	nuut gichcha, “Ng'uttamiida ghwanal fughareenga fuga weaghoodi gideaba mwarachchi gil.”
46003021	Asi siida wassean adagagwarsa geaw buuneeda. Aba gideaba haleanjeessean geagwa gil,
46003022	ea Bauloohi, ghanea Appoloohi, ghanea Geefaahi, ghanea ng'eanyiida, ghanea eaweega, ghanea miyeeda, ghanea haleanjeeda ghamneawa mida, ghanea gea jea ghwahidu gil, suuh geagwa sean;
46003023	nea agooga goowooschi fuga Gristo; nea Gristo gaba Aseetta.
46004001	Niih gidagasa ghwadaaktaneasa siida gil, gideaba geewooschi soomjooga Gristo ea fuga siitteaga gadiyeeda funyaat bea Aseetta.
46004002	Nea gissigasa aba heeda fuga siitteaga gadiyeeda doobiiwnatta gil.
46004003	Nea aba heedeanyu niih ea ng'asheanda mwanang' gil gideaba goorgweaksean agooga ghana girgweageeda wassean bea buuneeda. Ak aniini ea miih deargweaksa geaw.
46004004	Aba gideaba aniini mwaanali gidawassean appadaydeanyu, ak ghanyea meesiksean. Ng'uttamiida dea jea goorgweakseani.
46004005	Asi iissa ea adoorgweaksi ng'asheanda nea miighwahitta damanda nea miighwahidu Ng'uttamiida. Jea ghoabwaay haleanjeeda funyaat mida jeeda misaneeda, ak ghoadahaach ng'asheega mida jeeda gurorooda. Abeeda giliwas siih gay ghwanyas gwarsiinda aba heeda Aseetta.
46004006	Ak geamuschi haleanjeani seaniin sea Appolo ak abeeda ghoanyagaadi, fuga eaduupcheewi, ak abeeda ghoanaalaneasa ea moannaawani gitta ghayi sung'waariin, ak abeeda ea mwaghwara geaw siih aba jeedeang'wa aba giduuksiideaba geaw bea siinuut.
46004007	Ghwadaah ng'eaha gidawassean sajaadawaat aba jeedeang'wa? Ak gondeawi naaha ghayi moanyasi? Ama ghayi oanyaschi, ghwasaan inyas ghoaghwarji geat ea gawuurji gili megooneegwa?
46004008	Asi nihit noolang'uuchchi! Asi nihit noobaruurji! Nea iimeendani ea noahuuyi sugoodiga! Nea appadaydeaba niih ea noombaliischi, ak abeeda geeguuyi gheambalmeeda sea agooga!
46004009	Aba gideaba naapkaachchi gideaba Aseetta ghayi gwasneasa aseasa giijasoodiga eahuuwa fuga huydeana sean, ewuurjeewana fuga sirgweaksiina miyeeda; aba gideaba suhuuyi meagheang'da aba ng'eanyiida, ea aba heeda malaykajeega ea heeda buuneeda.
46004010	Aseasa geewooschi dasheahi appadayda Gristo, amaduu agooga goondeawi weaghuumeeda appadayda Gristo. Aseasa geewooschi ng'arng'ar, nea agooga goondeawi uurda. Agooga geesinneegwa mureeda, nea aseasa ghanyea meesinneasa mureeda.
46004011	Aba damani bea ghamneawean geebearjeewi jalooda ea muwooshta, ak ea mekkwealsheeni muuchchi, geabwareasa, ak ea meendeawani gealga,
46004012	geebiissi edeawiida nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda aba geattingaasa. Iising'ng'eawweasa geebadiischeesi, iisibwareasa gearjeang'di.
46004013	Iisibeasheagwa googasayi duupcheeda; sunung' eahuuwa haleanjeeda mwadaagha aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, nea geewooschi haleanjeeda mwadaagha aba haleanjeessean.
46004014	Ng'asheesu mwaang'waari nea geegasayi dabwaaspwaaseegwa, geabaysiini miinda gheang'deang'wa nea geahindaneegwa diibiga abwariinnyi.
46004015	Aba gideaba earappeadi ondeawi ginealshoodiga manda moonneeda aba jeeda Gristo, ea moondeawani ghweaniga saang'a. Aba gideaba aniini naahuuyi ghweandeang'wa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu aba naweeda giijasta miy.
46004016	Asi geamuscheegwa, ayeanni geeshteanyu.
46004017	Hean ghoaw gideajeakni Dimotteo heedeang'wa, was jeepteanyu abwariinnyi, biissa adoabiiwaat aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida, jea goopkeaneegwa naweadingeasu aba jeeda Gristo, ak gawuurji gideanealshacheatti aba ng'eanyiissean aba jeesinga ganiisajeega sean.
46004018	Asi buuneeda mwaatkwa nung'ut ghwarjeeda nea ghaghay gilimaydoan heedeang'wa.
46004019	Nea gaydabay doan heedeang'wa iimwas Ng'uttamiida, ak ea mwajeaghu gideaba gaydasikteawa ng'asheega fuga ghwarjeeda gaydasikteawa eara uurjeenga nyaawa.
46004020	Aba gideaba sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta manda jeeda baloolda, gwanda jeeda uurda.
46004021	Ghoabwariinyi anneeda? Gaydoan heedeang'wa nea geayeadu bileangida, ghana jea doana bariinyeega ea guroorooda garbabu?
46005001	Gwanda iitta huumwa nighayda bea gideaba jeedeang'wa gwanda fuga mideawa searoojiga munyas, ak gabiissa ea muy ea manda earaba jeeda emoojiga; bea gideaba iissa siida gwalluudayi gatmooda ghwaan.
46005002	Ak ghoaghwarji geat! Gwachchi mang'wana gogiisannyi? Siida nisin ng'asheanji oang'ng'aamwana jeedeang'wa.
46005003	Nea earappeadi meandani aba saseeda geandi aba guroorooda, ama uurji gileandi, abeeda ea meargu girgweaksiinda
46005004	aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu nang'aatti girgweaksiinda siida sin ng'asheanda muy sunuun. Hean nea ghoabwachchi geat, abeeda eara guroroodeanyu gaygwanda hiji, sea uurda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu,
46005005	ak geattaw Shattaani siisi ak ghwanyas saseadaannyi lasooda, ak abeeda gelealu guroroadaannyi aba eaweeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
46005006	Ghwaroodeang'wa bwaageat miimiy. Moanali gideaba gidamwanang' mwattaw ghoammu ghoamwattawiit murmurjeanda seani?
46005007	Asi ageanda mattawandeaba garayi ak abeeda ghoahuuyi murmurjeanda eesh, ak ea huumwa gil miyeammwattawiideegwa. Aba gideaba Gristo, was dayeenda gisilleanda bea basakka, ning'atta giidaydeayda.
46005008	Asi esna ghweelmeeda, nea miih dea mattawanda ghayi bea garayi was mattawanda bwada geawunda gheang'da ea munyinda, gagasa gaba mukkatteyda meammwattawiida, niih weeshinda jeeda gil ea huumwa.
46005009	Geang'oorneegwa aba barawajeanji itteanyuun, gideaba adooguuyeewi fuga mealuuli;
46005010	meayeeshshiineegwa eara hay gideaba adooguuyeewi fuga munyas bea jeedeaba ng'eanyiini, ghana fuga geawwi ghaanyan, ea fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ghana fuga bada gidamawosa Aseetta, abeeda gwachchi gajea gideaba gagasa ang'amwana jeeda ng'eanyiida gil.
46005011	Ak geang'oorneegwa gideaba adoobareannyeewi siida was oorjeeda suguura dea giyeang'wa, iyaadiiy ghana gwaseeja haleanjeeda, ghana ea siida bada haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta, ghana ea siida ang'eawi buuneeda gil, ghanea siida boogidi, ghana ea siida areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, siissunu adoamwaschi eara gideaba gajoombuchcheewana.
46005012	Abeeda gaygwarachchi naaha iyeargweaksi fuga jarooda? Nea ea miih fukka mida jeeda ganiisaan gil gea jea argweaksiina.
46005013	Aseetta gaygoorgweaksa fuga mida jarooda. “Ak ghahoan fuga munyas aba jeedeang'wa.”
46006001	Ideeppa gwanda jeedeang'wa siida giisan appadayda oorjeeda ghaamwat, ghwadoabiiw gideaba gaygabadaksa gawa ghoahaakta aba madeeda fuga miih doobiiweadi nea ghwanung'waada fuga ghaydidi?
46006002	Moanali gideaba fuga ghaydidi gaygoorgweaksa ng'eanyiida? Ama abeeda ng'eanyiida ijeaorgweaksiina agooga, abeeda ea moahiidi iyorgweaksi ng'asheega manang'i?
46006003	Moanali gideaba galannya gajeergweaksiina malaykajeega? Asi abeeda ea may ghwaraanya, ng'asheesu bea ghamneaweani!
46006004	Asi iyoondeawi girgweaguutka sunu, ghwasaan inyas ghoayiinnyi madeeda fuga meawwala gheanyanga aba jeeda ganiisa?
46006005	Geargu ng'asheesu nea geagasayi dabwaspwaseagwa. Heappi gwasin gideaba aba jeedeang'wa manda siida eara siyagi was weaghoochcheanda ammu ghwalach girgweageeda fuga gheannyaawa,
46006006	iissa gawa siida ghoahaakta oorjeeda ghaamwat, ea biissa aba madeeda fuga mandeawana masaweega?
46006007	Hean gohheakkiidi geat agooga ak ghoaw joorda aba heedeang'wa. Neada ea mwang'wana goosawani aba gidiinyeanji? Neada ea mwang'wana gearreannyi haleanjeadaang'u?
46006008	Iiduu earagooga iissa goottinnyi nea goorreedayi haleanjeeda, nea iissa ghoareachchi eara fuga oduupcheewi.
46006009	Ghana moanali gideaba fuga miih doobiiweadi maygwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta? Adeereenganneegwa; fuga munyas searooji gil, ghanea fuga bada haleanjeeda gidamawosa Aseetta, ghanea fuga mealuuli, ghanea fuga ashiigi suurja,
46006010	ghana mareanghooga, ghana fuga geawi ghaanyan, ghana leeyda, ghana fuga giing'weaka, ghana fuga areedi fiih haleanjeeda jea gwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta.
46006011	Nea aba jeedeang'wa ghayi goowooschi fuga sina ng'asheesu. Iiduu ea siihhuuneegwa, ak ea simiineegwa, ak geegooneegwa doobiiwnatta aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ea aba Gurorooda Aseetteanya.
46006012	“Haleanjeessean aba heedeanyu ghwahit,” ak ea miih sean gil gea doabiiw. “Haleanjeessean ghwadoabiiw aba heedeanyu,” ak aniini ea meagassi gideaba gayghoaw soomjeanda gidawassean.
46006013	“Hamitta gaba jeeda, nea jeeda gaba hamitta,” ak gaygwanyarja Aseetta duwaaw. Amaduukku saseeda ea maba mealuuleega, gaba Ng'uttamiida, nea Ng'uttamiida gaba saseeda.
46006014	Nea Aseetta ghayi gooduudu Ng'uttamiida ak gaygooduunneasa aseasa aba uurdaannyi.
46006015	Heappi nea ea moanalli gideaba sasanuukkeagwa damealga Gristohi? Asi gay dageanu damealga Gristo ak ghanung' ghoaw damealga giweakshoochcheanda? Manda!
46006016	Ghana moanali gideaba siida guuyi sea giweakshoochcheanda niiw saseanagi sea ninyi? Aba gideaba geang'waar, “Fiisu assiyyeenyean gay ghoaw saseanagi.”
46006017	Nea siitta guuyi sea Ng'uttamiidean gaguuyi gurooroonagi sea niny.
46006018	Asalda anung'wana heeda mealuuleega. Gilinyooh ea riing'eeda gil sin siida gwanda badayda saseeda; amaduukku siida mealuul gwasin riing'eeda aba saseadaannyi nea gabwageaw.
46006019	Ammoanali gideaba sasanuukkeagwa gheeda sibatta Aseetta gil bea Guroorooda Ghaydit mida jeedeang'wa, ghayi gooneegwa Aseetta? Nea sasanuukkeagwa ea miih geagwa gil.
46006020	Agooga geashaheagwa. Asi, oakghambiida Aseetta aba sasanuukkeagwa.
46007001	Asi aba iitta ng'asheekka ghayi oang'warjiin. Ghang'wana ng'eedeeda aamwasada gatmooda.
46007002	Iiduu aba simsimda ea ng'asheega mealuuleega, gilinyooh ea ng'eedeeda gil gagasa gwandeawa gatmoadaannyi, nea giliwas gatmu gagasa gwandeawa siyeadaannyi.
46007003	Ng'eedeeda dandeayeatta gatmoadaannyi gittoobiiwusa aba jeeda gheeda, ak gwasnu eara gatmooda aba heeda siyeadaannyi.
46007004	Asi gatmooda meabala saseadaannyi, goobal siyeadaannyi; ak gwasnu eara siyeeda meabala saseadaannyi, goobal gatmoadaannyi.
46007005	Adooheewachchi geat inyeessa gooneaji damanda, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi gheatta mooshta Aseetta; ak iiduu goobiiksiinnyi gichcha, ak amwanyasa Shattaani gheatta gichchea gwasimdaneegwa imandaneegwa gheadeenda.
46007006	Asi geargu ng'asheesu nea geagoonyi gheatta, nea miih digheanda gil.
46007007	Nea gidagwachchi aabwariiydi aniini gideaballi gawuurjeewean buuneessean, amaduu gaba siisi nyas gidaghayi miy sajaada adaw Aseetta, siisi geattaw gili nea niirja geattaw gilnuut.
46007008	Ak geayeeshshi fuga miih gageeshshi ea masiinng'weega ghang'wana gwandeawa siida geaw gawuurjeewean aniini.
46007009	Amadeappa ghwaraay giingng'ooydeaba geat, ea dageeshshi. Aba gideaba ghang'wana gageeshshi mwasamwa gideaba gayghaghwarda geawunda gheang'da.
46007010	Ak gaydarukusa fuga nigeeshshi, ak ea miih aniini Ng'uttamiida gil, gatmooda adagwaheelli sea siyeadaannyi,
46007011	(amadeappa gwaheelli, ea deabideada nea gaba geaw, ghana gabiikta gwaneaji sea siyeadaannyi), ea gideaba siyeeda adaghwanung' gatmoadaannyi.
46007012	Nea buuneeda suurja gearukusi aniini miih Ng'uttamiida gil gideaba iimida oorjeeda giyeanya wassean mideawa gatmooda mandeawana masaweega, ak ghamwas gideaba gay gwandeayi sea niny adaghwanung' gatmoani.
46007013	Nea gatmooda mideawa siyeeda mandeawana masaweega, nea ghamwas gideaba gaygwandeawa Gatmoani, ea adaghwanung'sa heeda siyeadaannyi.
46007014	Aba gideaba ng'eedeetta mandeawana masaweegean gajeammiidu appadayda gatmoodaannyi, ak eara gatmootta mandeawana masaweegean gajeammiidu appadayda siyeadaannyi. Ghwanyawa iimasunu diibigeagwa gajeamiimiyaas, amaduuku ghamneawa ea ghaydidi.
46007015	Nea fuga nigeennyi mandeawana masaweega igasa ghwadarda, ea dadarda; aba sareani oorjeediyya ea hudiyya ea miih radeadi. Aba gideaba Aseetta gaguurneasa aba hoyyooh.
46007016	Gatmooda ginaldiin ang'iing'i ea jea lealni siyeadaang'u? Ng'eedeeda gaynaldaan ang'iing'i ea jea lealni gatmoadaang'u?
46007017	Giduurji sean daba siisi abiideatta gidaghayi goondaneey Ng'uttamiida giibinda, ea gidaguursiinda Aseetta. Ak niih ea gidearukkwiidi aba jeeda ganiisajeega sean gil.
46007018	Heappi siida iissa geaghus eguursa nea siyaat giyyiilda? Asi adagageanda girooraneeda giyyiilda. Siida damanda siguursiina miih gawa eeyyiili? Asi adagagasa giyyiilda.
46007019	Beatta giyyiilda miih gili ak siida miiyeeyyiil ea miih gili, geaghus ging'ng'ooyda digheanda Aseetta.
46007020	Daba siisi abiideatta gidaghayi bea mwadi suguursiinda.
46007021	Ang'iing'i ghayi geeguurneey nea guwosi ging'ng'oonyaneeda? Adiiduubayi. Asi iimmuusi gideaba gajabala geaw, ada abeeda ghwahit.
46007022	Aba gideaba siida siguursa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida nea ging'ng'oonyaneeda gil, siisi goobal geaw aba heeda Ng'uttamiida. Gwasnu eara siida suguursa nea goobal geaw niny ging'ng'oonyaneeda Gristo.
46007023	Agooga geashaheagwa aba sheayeeda haw; adeahuuyi ging'ng'oonyaneemba siih.
46007024	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, damanda wassean siguursiina siida, gagasa gwandeayi sea Aseetta.
46007025	Asi ghamneawa aba fuga miigageeshshi, meandeawani digheanda Ng'uttamiida, geargu aba fughareedeanyu aniineeda nubwaydanaan Ng'uttamiida aba gideaba geawoschi doabiiwaat.
46007026	Ghaaghanyi iyeang'ulayi aba sawanadeeni bea ghamneawean ghwahit gideaba siida gaygoobiideatta giduurji bea ghaneawa.
46007027	Heappi niratteey geeshshooda? Adigasayi gideaba gajabala geaw. Ang'iing'i giibali geaw miih geeshsheena? Adiiduu gigasayi geeshshooda.
46007028	Asi igeeshshi, ea misni ring'eeda, nea eara huda iisighi ea masna ring'eeda. nea fukka geshshiin gayghwanyas sawanaduutkka ng'eanyiida, ak gaydaweasaneegwa gili.
46007029	Geayii fugea eaduupcheewi, damanda sigasa nineekkiit muuchchi; ghang'eada ghamneawa ak gagal mwadi fukka mideawa gadeemgean gidabal gobiideatta fuga mandeawana,
46007030	nea fuga giisan ea dawuurji gili magiisana, nea fuga hoosan ea dawuurji fuga mahoosana, nea fuga shaah haleanjeeda ea dawuurji fuga mandeawana haleanjeeda,
46007031	nea fukka mideawa gadiyeeda aba jeeda ng'eanyiidean ea dawuurji fuga masna gil. Aba gideaba haleanjeeda muunda ng'eanyiida gay ghang'atta.
46007032	Geagasayi oppala geat aba deawiitmeeda. Siida miih gageeshshi iissa gwadeawiissa ngasheega Ng'uttamiida, gida jea gohoosanda Ng'uttamiida;
46007033	nea siida nigeeshshi iissa gwadeawiit aba ng'asheega muunda ng'eanyiida, was gichchea goohoosanda gatmoadaannyi,
46007034	nea gidagasa ea nibearshi. Nea gatmooda meegeenna ghana huda iissa gwadeawiit appadayda Ng'uttamiida, gichchea ghoawaatta siida ghaydit aba saseeda ea gurorooda; nea gatmooda sigeena iissa gwadeawiit appadayda haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida, gichchea gohoosanda siyeadaannyi.
46007035	Geargu ng'asheanji ak abeeda ghoanyagaadi, ak ea miih gideaba ghaghuumnyeegwa agooga, geagasayi gideaba gajooppiidana jeeda doobiiwanatta ea naweeda miy ak ghaghu mooshteang'wa mabwaasha aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
46007036	Asi siida idaah gideaba masissiina huda jea ghaghi gidahaguuw, nea geawundaannyi bea gheang'da gwandeawa uurda, ak ea mayghwashiy gidagasa, gidabal gwasin gitta gasean: ghang'wana gageennyi, masna ring'eeda.
46007037	Nea siida wassean hang'waanyiit aba jeeda guroroadaannyi, ak ghanyea mediing'siina nea ghoammu ghoadeal gitta gasean, ak ea nimanya aba jeeda guroroadaannyi, gideaba gaygwandeawa ghoaw gatmoadaannyi, abeeda ghoadoabiiw.
46007038	Nea eara siida adayda hudaannyi ghoadoabiiw; nea dea meaghi ghoadoabiiw muuchchi.
46007039	Gatmooda aradaat iduugwanda siyeadaannyi. Amaduu nea nimi siyeadaannyi, ea niibal geaw ak ghoammu ghaghi siida gasa niny, ak geaghus fuga mida jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
46007040	Nea aba girgweageedeanyu gaygahoosan ak gang'wana muuchchi inyeeda goobiideada ameaghi. Aba gideaba earaniini iyeang'ulay geandeawi Gurorooda Aseetta.
46008001	Asi ghamneawa aba iitta hamichchoojiga siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta; geanalli gideaba “Aseasa easasean gendeawi fughareeda.” Fughareeda iissa ghaghwar geaw, nea bariinyeega iissa gwadeegu.
46008002	Siida iighay gili nal ng'asheanda, siisi mwanala eara gil eara ghamneawa, mwanalda gidagwachchi haguuw ghwanalda.
46008003	Nea siida iibwariiy Aseetta, abeeda siisi ghwanal Aseetta.
46008004	Hean aba iitta agitta hamitta siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, geanalli gideaba, “Gidamawosa aseetta mayghwashng'u,” ea gideaba manda Aseetta nuut geaghus akkalealla.
46008005	Earappeadi mida fuga suguura aseechcheekka, aba humng'eeda ghana ng'eanyiida, aba huumwa gwanda “aseechcheekka” saang'a ea “ng'uttamooji” saang'a,
46008006	iiduu aba heedeanya aseasa Aseetta aakkalealla, was Ghweanda, was deaghayi leabu haleanjeessean, ak geepiideewi bwadaydaannyi ak gabiissa gwanda Ng'uttamiinagi, was Yeesu Gristo, ghayi rinna haleanjeessean badaydeaba niny, nea eara aseasa geepiideewi niny.
46008007	Eara gwasa, miih sean gil gea mideawa fughareani. Geaghus suuh ng'ay, aba gideaba nineaji haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, nea fughareenga nyaawa, ng'arng'ari, ea sung'uda ririnnyeanda.
46008008	Nea hamitta ghanyea maygagwarseasa aba heeda Aseetta. Iisunung'waadi agitta amwasunyeawaneasa gil, ama siyaaji ea maygooheadeeseasa gil.
46008009	Asi ashageada giibali itteang'wa bwaageadiin adiiduu gwaruusa fukka ng'arng'ariin.
46008010	Aba gideaba siida idaannyi, ang'iing'eeda mideawa fughareeda, nea gipteadi ak giyeagiischi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta, neada ea majiiduu gwayeessa jihi, iing'arng'ar fughareedaannyi, ak ghwaak hamitta siittaw maloonghajeega?
46008011	Nea aba fughareadaang'u genuus siida ng'arng'ar, was oorjeeda giyeang'wa ghayi meah Gristo appadaydaannyi.
46008012	Asi iyoonung' gwasin fuga oduupcheewi ring'eeda nea gookkachchi fugheerga nyaawa nea ng'arng'ari, abeeda ea noottiiysi Gristo.
46008013	Asi, hamitta ijea ghoaw gichchea ghabwaay oorjeediyya, abeeda ea may guttaak bannyeega, ak abeeda amwabwaanyi oorjeediyya.
46009001	Neada aniini meabali geawi? Aniini meawosi giijasoochcheanda? Aniineeda ea miih dadaah Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanya? Agooga moowosi gadiyeedeanyu aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida?
46009002	Aba gideaba iimeawoosi giijasoochcheanda, aba heeda buuneeda suurja, iiduu geawoschi aba heedeang'wa agooga; aba gideaba agooga goowooschi girooraneeda giijasoochcheandumeedeanyu aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
46009003	Niih gidearukwiisi fuga sikkiideaweani.
46009004	Neada ea madoobiiwseasa gideaba geyeagiischi nea geeleeshi?
46009005	Neada ea mammiiseasa gideaba getteayeewi gatmooda, aba jeeda neayeedeanya eewuurjeewana giijasoodiga suurja sea oorjooga geenyea Ng'uttamiida sea Geefa?
46009006	Ghana sughus Barnaba sea aniini was fuga jea gagadiiyi ak ea mwanyasa hamitta?
46009007	Niih gajea ana shirikkarajean gil jea gawa ng'uchcheeda aba lappiyeadaannyi niny nea gaba geaw? Niih gajea ng'eaha gil siida jea gwahista msabiibu jea ea may ghwaak haghweagaaschi? Niih gajea ng'eaha gil jea gooheagwiischi ak aamwali eanooga haleanjeeda ahaaghwa?
46009008	Heappi ng'asheesu geargu aba gheambalmeeda siida? Neada deaweeda earada marukuna ng'asheesu?
46009009	Aba gideaba aba jeeda deaweedeeda Muusa geang'waar gideaba, “Adiradi ghuutta heeyda dattas booga.” Abeeda gajeeyeena Aseetta gang'ula ng'asheega heewga?
46009010	Neada niny ea mabaloolana badahuukkaasa? Ng'asheesu geang'waar appadahuukkaasa, aba gideaba siida bwar ng'eanyi iissa gidabal ghabwar ng'eanyi nea ghwarar nea siida las booga ea dalasa nea ghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas booga.
46009011	Abeeda aseasa ghayi iisihisi mbeeyooda miyaas bea gurorooda jeesingeagwa, abeeda gajea ng'asheanda haw gil gideaba gealaji haleanjeedeang'wa oanyaschi?
46009012	Asi iinyas buuneeda suurja haleanjeeda doabiiw aba heedeang'wa, abeeda amearaanyani aseasa? Iiduu, ea meagasi aseasa gideaba gajeattoabiiwdunu, iissa geamilikghti haleanjeassean ak ameatteali Giijasta miy bea Gristo.
46009013	Moanali gideaba fukka sin gadiyeeda aba gheeda sibatta Aseettean gwanyassa hamitta nyaawa gheeda sibatta Aseetta, nea fuga sin gadiyeeda, aba heeda wagiida iissa amwanyasa haleanjeetta sisappa geadi bea lukghumajeegeani?
46009014	Gwanu, eara Ng'uttamiida gwargu gideaba fukka rukkwiida Giijasta miyiin gay ghwanyas hamitta nyaawa appadayda Giijasta miy.
46009015	Amaduu aniini ghanyea miih dasin aaragi aba ng'asheesu doabiiwiin, ak amwang'waari aba gideaba geagasayi danyas haleanjeani. Aba gideaba ghang'wana ghaameayi mwasamwa gideaba gayghaweedanaan siida ghwaroodeanyu bea geaw.
46009016	Earappeadi earukkwiidi Giijasta miyiin manda gichchea daghwara geaw. Aba gideaba sugoonan dasin gadiyeani. Eamuy deanyu imearukwiidani giijasta miy!
46009017	Aba gideaba iyeasinnyi aba gideagassiidi aniini, abeeda geandeawi gimearda; ama iimii gideagassiidi aniini, abeeda gadiyeeni geetteaganean.
46009018	Abeada giimeardeanyu annaaha? Ada nihi: gideaba gaydarukwiida giijasta miy nea meegu gili, ak aamwanung' eegu gittoobiiwsean aba rukwiideayda giijasta miy.
46009019	Earappeadi eaballi geaw aba heeda buuneessean iin geasinyi geaw ging'ng'oonyaneeda buuneessean, ak abeeda geanyaksi geaw fuga saang'a.
46009020	Iissa geawuurjeewi Yahuudi aba heeda fuga Yahuudi, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga Yahuudi; aba heeda fuga deaweeda, iissa geasinyi geaw siida deaweeda, earappeadi meandani jeeda deaweedean, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga ang'ng'waay deaweeda.
46009021	Nea fukka manda jeeda deaweedean geasinyi geaw gilimeandani jeeda deaweeda, nea miih gideaba meandeawani deaweeda aba heeda Aseetta gil, nea geawoschi siida mideawa deaweeda aba heeda Gristo, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fukka mandeawana deaweedean.
46009022	Aba heeda fuga ng'arng'ari iissa geawoschi ng'arng'ar, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi fuga ng'arng'ari. Geandi damannyoojiga sean aba heeda buuneessean, ak abeeda aba naweadinga sean ghaanyaschi gichchea dalealdeayda buuneeda.
46009023	Ak geasinyi haleanjeessean appadayda giijasta miy, ak abeeda geeppareannyi ghawooda sea buuneeda suurja.
46009024	Neada ea moanali gideaba fuga galleada iissa gwasalda sean gang'aleallli, nea siida jea ghwanyas shiipka aagi? Asi agalleada ak ghoanyaschi.
46009025	Nea siida mida jeeda deangheeda iissa ghwasaja geaw haleanjeessean.Asi iissa gwasindunu ak abeeda ghwanyas shiipka, ak geegalleadi ak abeeda geanyaschi shiipka mayghwadattasa.
46009026	Asaha, earaniini mwaafwaji mwadaagha nea manda gidabuurbuurji, ak ea meakuli dawuurji siida bwar jeammeeda;
46009027	aba sareani geasawannyi saseedeanyu nea geagadiiyi, ak amwahuuwi siida rukwiisa giijasta buuneessuurja, amaduu ghaahuuyi aniini siida jea eaheawa.
46010001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, geagasayi anala gideaba, gheambaghwanigaasa ghayi gookkwa shamooghooda sean, ak ghoaghaawa sean basooda,
46010002	amang'atta geeppattiisan sean ghoaw fuga Muusa aba jeeda shamooghooda ea jeeda basooda,
46010003	ama ng'atta ghwaak sean hamittida bea guroroodean
46010004	ak ghwali sean beekka bea guroroodean. Aba gideaba ghwaleaydaawa badayda lagheaneeda was gurorooda ghayi aat geeshta, nea lagheaneetta ea Gristohi.
46010005	Nea gwanda fuga saang'a aba jeennyaawa magassa Aseetta; ammuchchu gealas uhuuda aba dareapcheeda.
46010006	Asi ghamneawa ng'asheesu niiw reekusiinda aba heedeanya, ak abeeda ea meegassi ng'asheega munyas.
46010007	Nea adoowoschi fuga bada haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, ak goowuurjeewi giduurji fuga mwaatkwa; gawuurji gidaghayi sung'waar bea gideaba, “ buuneeda ghayi gobiitpiit gweagiischi nea gwaleeshi, ama ng'atta ghang'eatng'eat ghwaanghan.”
46010008	Nea adeemealuulli ak gewuurjeewi gidasiinda fuga mwaatkwa aba jeennyaawa, ak ghoabeada fiih sagalamnyooji diktam ea samwagu aweachchaanjagi.
46010009	Nea adaghanyi eesna Ng'uttamiida, ak geewuurjeewi gidaghayi simda fuga mwaatkwa aba jeannyaawa, ak ghwaak inchipkeega;
46010010	nea adoannikghti gidaghayi aniikghta fuga mwaatkwa aba jeannyaawa, ak ghwalas uhuuda habitkwajeega.
46010011	Asi ghamneawa, ng'asheesu ghwanyas nea gawuurji reekusiinda, ak geang'waar ghoahiimu gichchea eabeada, aba heeda fuga jeagweadu mudeanooda gweannyeekka.
46010012	Asi siida eeshsha geaw giminaadi dang'ulla geaw adiiduu ghoabeeda.
46010013	Manda simsimda ninyaseagwa agooga mawosa dea geallaan aba heeda siida. Aseetta doabiiwaat, nea niny ea mayghwanung'waada eesmeegwa ea ghwanaawa uurjeengeagwa, earappeadi jea eesmeegwean gaygwasin naweeda jea aritteawana ak abeeda ghoammuuschi arjeang'da.
46010014	Asi fugeasu abwariinnyi, aba sareani anung'waada baditta gidamawosa aseetta.
46010015	Geabalooldaneegwa fuga mideawa fughareenga; asi otteemsheesiina agooga ng'asheesu earguun.
46010016	Bayooktida bea ghawooda sippareannyi aba ghawoodean, heappi miih giibareannyeeda foojeanda Gristohi? Ama mukkateeyda subwanajaadi miih giibareannyeeda saseeda Gristohi?
46010017	Aba gideaba gwanda mukkatteheanagi, nea aseasa geawoschi saang'a ak gewooschi saseanagi, aba gideaba aseasa eesasean geanyaschi banajaneedeaba mukkatteydida assagiin.
46010018	Ang'ulla fuga Israeeli; neada ea miih fukka ghayi akk haleanjeeda giyyiilda bareannyi sea heeda wagiidea?
46010019	Asi gaydayiin? Gaydayi hamitta sighadoawana haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta gili, ghana maloonghajeanda gili?
46010020	Manda, geargu gideaba haleanjeetta sisappa geadi adayda fuga mandeawana masaweega ghoadaw meangeenda nea moadawa Aseetta. Ak ea meagassi aniini gideaba gajabareannyeewana meangeenda.
46010021	Mwajoammuusa aleayda bayookta Ng'uttamiida ea bayookta meang'eenda. Ak ea mwajoammuusa oppareannyeena measeeda Ng'uttamiida ea measeeda meangeenda.
46010022	Ghana sigasayi eang'udana Ng'uttamiida lachng'eanyiida? Neada gendeawi uurda ea eburdeawana ninyi?
46010023	“Haleanjeessean ghwahit,” ak ea miih haleanjeessean gil gea jea ghaweat fii, ak ea miih sean gil gea jea gwadeegu.
46010024	Siida adagagakkiisa geaw haleanjeeda miyaas, ghang'wana gagasa ghwanyas gischeewoochcheandaannyi gidamiy.
46010025	Ayaaga haleanjeessean sikghaas aba heeda sisheahhiideawa bannyeega was jeeda naada nea adoonnyeariidi aba gidamwachmwach fughareedeang'wa.
46010026	Aba gideaba, “Ng'eanyiida gaba Ng'uttamiida, sea haleanjeessean mida jeeda.”
46010027	Asi iguurneey siida mandeawana masaweega hamitteaba shing'ada ak gigasayi beatta, aga gidawassean sugoonnyi nea adinyaashti ng'asheanda wassean aba gidamwachmwach fughareeda.
46010028	(Ama deeppa gwayeeshshineey siih, “Gili geattaydaawa lukghumajeega,” iiduu nea mang'ulleey siida ghwanyawa rukuneey, ea aba gidamwachmwach fughareeda,
46010029	geargu gitta mwachmwach fughareadaannyiin, miih geagwa gil, adiiduu giyaagi.) Ghwasaan abeeda inyas gibaldeanyu bea geaw jea goorgweaksa fughareemba siinuut?
46010030	Abeeda iyaagi nea geabadiischeesi Aseetta, abeeda ghwasaan inyas geeng'ng'eawwean aba gili abwachchi Aseettean?
46010031	Asi iyooyeagiischi ghana iyooleeshi, ghana iyoosinnyi ng'asheanda wassean, asna sean aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
46010032	Adoanung' goodiiy fuga Yahuudi ghana gea Yunaani ghana ganiiseeda Aseetta,
46010033	asi gawuurji gidiissa eagassiidi aniini deahoosan buuneessean aba haleanjeessean easinnyi, ak ea meegassi gideaba gaydanyagaada nea gabwageaw, geagasayi dea buuneessean, ak abeeda geelealu.
46011001	Awuurjeewanean aniini, gawuurji gideabeaheatti Gristo.
46011002	Asi ghaaghwarjeegwa aba gideaba noapkachchaan aba haleanjeessean ea gideaba noang'ng'waanyi searoojikka ghayi eagoonnyeegwean.
46011003	Ak geagasayi anala gideaba giliwas gatmooda ea ng'eedeeda Gristo gil, nea uhuuda gatmooda ea siyeadaannyi, nea uhuuda Gristo ea Aseetta.
46011004	Ng'eedeeda wassean moora Aseetta, ghana gwaramoorani ng'asheega nea gwadukuta uhuudaannyi, ghoabwaaspwaas uhuudaannyi,
46011005	nea gatmooda wassean mwaash Aseetta ghana gwaramoorani ng'asheega nea madukuta uhuudaannyi masissiina uhuudaannyi mureeda, abeeda gawuurji gili uhuudaannyi sireakghu.
46011006	Aba gideaba gatmooda ii madukuta uhuudaannyi, ghang'wana ghwareakghu budeagaaschi; amadeeppa gaba baspaseega gideaba gayghwalach gatmooda buudeagaaschi ghana eareakghu abeeda ghang'wana gwadukuta uhuudaannyi.
46011007	Aba gideaba ng'eedeeda mammiisiina gideaba gaygwadukuta uhuudaannyi, aba gideaba niny geegala sea gigheambiitta Aseetta; nea gatmooda ea gigheambiitta ng'eedeeda gil.
46011008	(Aba gideaba ng'eedeeda maleapna heeda gatmooda, gwaleabu gatmooda heeda ng'eedeeda.
46011009	Nea ng'eedeeda ea meesna appadayda gatmooda, nea gatmooda geesin appadayda ng'eedeeda.)
46011010	Niih gidasibaysiina gil gideaba gatmooda gagasa gwandeawa gichchea gwadukutteawa uhuudaannyi, appadahuukka malaykajeega.
46011011	(Eara gwasa, aba heeda Ng'uttamiida asi gatmooda miih gili, ii manda ng'eedeeda nea ng'eedeeda ea miih gili ii manda gatmooda,
46011012	aba gideaba gatmooda ghayi gwarinna heeda ng'eedeeda gwasnu eara ng'eedeeda ghamneawa gwajiilu gatmooda. Nea haleanjeessean gwaleabu heeda Aseetta.)
46011013	Asi asikteawana nea gobwageat; ghwadeabiiwi gideaba ghamwaash gatmooda Aseetta nea madukuta uhuuda?
46011014	neada geallaan ea moanaaleagwa gideaba ng'eedeeda ii mideawa buudeega geawwi ghoabwaaspwaas geaw,
46011015	Iiduu gatmooda ii mideawa buudeega geawwi gahaguuwsa? Aba gideaba geattaw budeega geawwi gwadukuta saseeda.
46011016	Amadeeppa gwanda siida gasa ghang'ut foolayda, ghanyea meanali seareeda nuut ghana eara ganiisajeega Aseetta.
46011017	Asi aba goonidi eagoonnyeegwa ng'asheesu bea gichchea abeadaan, mwaaghwareegwa, aba gideaba iyoabwachchi geat, moobatteeni geat alooheeda, goobatti geat munyinda.
46011018	Aba gideaba gidamadeeda, iyoroonnyi nea goowoschi ganiisa, anayiinyi gideaba gwanda jeedeang'wa dardeayda; ak hich ghaamwaschi,
46011019	aba gideaba jeedeang'wa ghaghanyi gwanda foolayda ak abeeda fuga sumwas aba heedeang'wean abeeda geanal.
46011020	Asi iyoabwachchi geat, ea mwahida gideaba gajayaaga hamitta Ng'uttamiida.
46011021	Aba agiischooda, iissa gaba siisi geanda hamittaannyi, nea siyagi gabearji jalooda nea niirja ea boogideat.
46011022	Naaha! Neada ea moondeawani gealga jea ayeagiischeewana nea gooleeshi? Ghana ofoolli ganiiseeda Aseetta nea ghoanung ghabeal fuga mandeawana gil? Gaydayeeshshineegwaan? Gaydagwarseegwa aba ng'asheanji? Manda! Maydagwarseegwa.
46011023	Aba gideaba ghaanyaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida gitta ghamneawa eagoonnyeegwa agoogean, nea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesuun eaweetta jea ealaabwa bwadawiin gageanu mukkatte,
46011024	hean, iing'atta badiischeesiinda, ghabwanach, ak gwayi, “Niih saseedeanyu gil ghayi sibeagu appadahuukkeagwa, asindunu aba giipkeatteanyu.”
46011025	Gwasnu iing'atta agiischoodeaba shing'ada gageanu bayookta ak gwayi, “Bayoogi neajeedeesh gil aba foojeandeanyu. Asindunu, iinyooh aleesheena, aba giipkeatteanyu.”
46011026	Aba gideaba iyoayaaji mukkatteheeni nea ghoaleaydi bayoogi, goorukkwiidi miyeeda Ng'uttamiida ea ghwahitta eaweeda jea ghwahinna.
46011027	Nea siida wassean, akk mukkatte ghana ghwalealeada bayookta Ng'uttamiida aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa, abeeda gaygwanyaksa geaw giidinyeanda ak ghang'uda saseeda ririnnyeanda ea foojeanda Ng'uttamiida.
46011028	Nea siida ea dasikteawana geaw, ak ghwaak mukkatte ak ghwaleayda bayookta.
46011029	Aba gideaba siida wassean akk nea ghwali nea masikteawana ghwaak nea ghwali ghoorjooda saseadaannyi.
46011030	Niih gidaghamneawa nung' gang'arng'ariidi fuga saang'a aba jeedeang'wa gil nea gamnyeani, nea mwaatkwa ea nimeewa.
46011031	Ama inyeetta ghwanyawa gergweaksi geat huumwa, ghwanyawa ea majeergweakseasa.
46011032	Nea iyargweakseasa Ng'uttamiida, geanung' eanyasa mureeda ak abeeda ea mergweakseasa sea fuga muunda ng'eanyiida.
46011033	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, iyoabwachchi geat nea googasayi ayeagiischeena, ommuukkuuni geat,
46011034	siida ibearji jalooda, ea deagiischi aba gheannyi, adiiduu gweadu nyeascheedeang'wa girgweaksiinda. Nea ng'asheega suurja iyaawunnyi gaydarukuneegwa.
46012001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, asi ghamneawa aba iitta haleanjeeda sugu bea gurorooda, aniini meagassi amoanali.
46012002	Ak ghoanalli gideaba damanda ghayi owoseewi fuga mandeawana masaweega, geehutteawweegwa ak ghoabwachchi haleanjeeda mawosa aseetta, ak earagwasa ghaghanyi sihheelleewaneegwa.
46012003	Asi geagasayi gideaba anala gideaba manda siida jea gabaloola badayda Gurorooda Aseetta jea gwayi, “Yeesu sumwaashta!” Ak ea manda siida jea gwayi, “Yeesu Ng'uttamiida gil,” geaghus gwargu Gurorooda Ghaydit.
46012004	Asi gwaheelli giimmuusta sugu, nea Gurorooda ea agi;
46012005	Ak gabiissa gwaheelli sinjeenga gadiyeeda, nea Ng'uttamiida ea agi;
46012006	Iiduu gwaheelli uurda gadiyeeda, nea Aseetta ea akkalealla dea adoabiiw sean appadahuukka buuneessean.
46012007	Nea giliwas siih goohiimsa Aseetta Guroroadaannyi aba alooheeda buuneessean.
46012008	Aba gideaba siyagi aba Gurorooda geattaw gwarukku weaghuumeeda, nea geattaw nuut gwarukku ng'asheega aba fughareeda aba gidabwariiyda Gurorooda,
46012009	nuut geattaw masaweega aba Guroroodida, nea nuut geattaw giimmuusta jea ghoahaabwa buuneeda aba Gurorooda assagiin,
46012010	nea nuut geattaw gadiyeeda jea gwasna ng'asheega deamdeameedi, nea nuut geattaw sibaneandumeeda, nea nuut gooheeldooschi guroruunatka, nuut heeluutka ghuusiga emoojiga, nea nuut geattaw rooppiideayda ghuusiga emoojiga.
46012011	Nea gadiyoojusu seaniin gwasin akkalealla aba Gurorootta assakkaleallaan, ak gwalakkiisa giliwas siih nea gabwageaw gawuurji gitta gassiida ninyiin.
46012012	Gawuurji gitta waseatta agi saseedean ak gabiissa gwandeawa damealga saang'aan, earappeadi damealga saang'aan gaba saseanagi, ak ea giduurji earaba heeda Gristohi.
46012013	Nea aba Guroroanagi geppaattiisaneasa aba saseanagi, fuga Yahuudi ghanea fuga Yunaani gili, ea ging'ng'oonyanga gil ghanea fuga abal geat gil, hean geanung' ghwaleayda sean Guroroanagi.
46012014	Aba gideaba saseeda mandeawana dameallanjagi gil asaang'a.
46012015	Iyayi geeshta, “Aniini meawosi geattinda, ak ea meabeahi saseeda,” niih miih gidamaygabeaheewa saseeda gil.
46012016	Ama ayi iitta, “Aniini meawosi gheang'da, ak ea meabeahi saseeda,” niih miih gidamaygabeaheewa saseeda gil.
46012017	Abeeda saseessean iihuuw gheang'da, abeeda iing'da gaygwanda yeenu? Amabeeda huuw saseessean iitta, abeeda gwandayeenu joonda gida?
46012018	Hean aba giduurji, Aseetta gageanu googuuyi giliwas roabwada mida saseeda, aba giliwas roabwada aba gidagassiida.
46012019	Ghwanyawa inyeeda ghoaw roobuutka sean roobwadeanagi, abeeda saseeda gaygwanda yeenu?
46012020	Amaduu ghamneawa roobuutka asaang'a, amaduukku saseeda aagi.
46012021	Ak ea mayghoammu gheang'da gwayeeshsha geattinda, “Aniini meagasseey,” nea moammu gwayeeshsha uhuuda geeshanga, “Aniini meagasseegwa.”
46012022	Abeeda iisiyam, roobuutkiga bea saseeda sideaksa ng'arng'arannyeekkean gea sigasa muuchchi gil,
46012023	nea roobuutkiga bea saseeda mahaguuwa mureedean gajeattawa mureeda haw muuchchi, nea roobuutkaasa manda leanga geanung' gwandeawa leanga muuchchi ea ghwanaawda.
46012024	Aba gideaba roobuutkaasa mideawa alooheeda magassa gil. Nea Aseetta ghayi gwasin saseeda, ak ghoadaw mureeda muuchchi roobadeetta ashoayiin,
46012025	ak abeeda ea dardaawaat saseeda, ak abeeda gang'ula geat roobuutka, gaba roobadeeni ng'ula nuut.
46012026	Nea iisawana roobadeanagi, abeeda gwasawana roobuutka sean; nea iisisissa mureeda roobadeanagi, abeeda gahoosan sean.
46012027	Asi noahuuyi saseeda Gristo nea gaba siisi was roabadeadaannyi.
46012028	Nea Aseetta ea niloat giijasoodiga madeeda aba jeeda ganiisa, deaba iyyeenya sibanga, geaba samwagu ea ginealshoodiga, ea fuga sina ng'asheega deamdeameadi, ea fuga aheabi buuneeda, ea weedanga, ea fuga ambaliischi, ea fuga baloolla ghuusiga emoojiga mwaatkwa.
46012029	Neada ea giijasoodiga seani? Neada ea sibanga seani? Neada ea ginealshoodiga seani? Ak gwasna sean ng'asheega deamdeameadi?
46012030	Neada ea siittaw sean giheapta fuga miyeani? Neada gabaloolla sea iit muudi? Ak ghoammu sean rooppiideayda ng'asheega?
46012031	Asi agassa muuchchi haleanjeeda hees jea eegu. Ak gaydahiimneegwa naweeda miy muuchchi miyadaaha.
46013001	Eara dabaloola ghuusiga fuga muunda ng'eanyiida ea dea malaykajeega, nea meandeawani bariinyeega, abeeda anaahuuyi gharinnyeanda ajuuri ea deebajeanda was moonngeanda.
46013002	Nea eara dandeawa uurda sibaneandumeeda, ak ghaanalli makcheamuutka sean bea fughareeda, ak geandeawi masaweega sean, ammu goobaleak giijeega, ak ea meandeawani bariinyeega, meawosi gil.
46013003	Iyaadaydi haleanjeedeanyu sean eandeawi, ama adaydi saseedeanyu eaghwarda, ak ea meandeawani bariinyeega, ea meanyasi gil.
46013004	Bariinyeega iissa ghamilikghta nea innya jih; bariinyeega mandeawana lachng'eanyiida ghana ghwarjeeda;
46013005	ak ea maba ghunduufka ghana ghwarjeeda. Bariinyeega ea maska naweadaannyi nea gaba geaw; ak ea miih assas nyaras ghana gwandeawa sichcheeda;
46013006	ak ea mahoosanniisiina ng'asheega munyas, iissa gahoosassa ng'asheega doobiiweadi.
46013007	Bariinyeega iissa ghamilikghta ng'asheega sean, ak ghamwas ng'asheega sean, ak ghwarar ng'asheega sean ak ghwarjeang'da aba ng'asheega sean.
46013008	Bariinyeega manda mudeanooda; nea iimida ramooranga gayghang'atta; gwasnu eara iitta emoojiga, gaygammuudean, ama mida fughareeda gayghang'atta.
46013009	Aba gideaba fughareangaasa iissa ea mwahitta nea eara ramoorangaasa ea mwahitta;
46013010	Iimuchchu nea ghwahidu gitta hidaadiin, abeeda gayghang'atta gitta miih hidaadiin.
46013011	Ghayi nea guttawos jeepta, iissa geabalooldi jeepta, ak geattemsheatti jeepta, ak gwadeenna fughareedeanyu dea jeepta; hean nea geeheedu doaw ng'eedeeda, ghaanung'waadi ng'asheega jeepchcheandumeeda.
46013012	Aba gideaba ghamneawa geeng'ulli geat giyooh aba jeeda misaneeda, nea damandida gaygwaroonnyi gheanyangaasa. Asi ghamneawa ghaanalli aba meatkweenagi; damandida gajadanal muuchchi, aba gideaba Aseetta ghwanalan muuchchi.
46013013	Asi masaweega ea ghusooda ea bariinyeega, ngasheesu assamwaguun, aba jeedeaba ng'asheesu daahaw muchchi bariinyeega gil.
46014001	Anung' ghoaw bariinyeega, gidajea agassa, nea goosinnyi badiida aba haleanjeeda jea eegu bea gurorooda, raanya gideaballi ghoaramwaarji.
46014002	Aba gideaba siida baloola iitnuut meabaloola buuneeda goobalool Aseetta; aba gideaba manda siida nal ng'asheagaaschi, niny gwarukku makcheameeda funyaat aba jeeda Gurorooda.
46014003	Nea aba meatkweeda niirja, siida ramoorani gobalool buuneeda aba gidiing'nooda nyaawa nea goomajeek ea geandeayda salagheang'da.
46014004	Siida baloola iitnuut goomajeek geaw niny, nea siida rukku ramooranga goomajeek ganiisa.
46014005	Ak geagasayi aniini gideaba gajabaloolana iit nuut, nea ghwaraanya muuchchi gideaba gajaramoarana. aba gideaba siida ramoorani ahaweewa siida baloola iit nuut, geaghus gwarooppu siinuut, ak abeeda geemmajeek ganiisa.
46014006	Ak ghamneawa fuga eaduupcheewi, iyaawunnyi heedeang'wa ak geabaloolli aba iit nuut, abeeda gaydanung' anyagaadaydaan, geaghus darukuneegwa nea ghadahaaji ghana aba fughareeda, ghana daramooran, ghana aba ginealshooda?
46014007	Eara haleanjeeda mandeawana guroruunatka, uurji durumbeatti, ghanea gidondoriida gil, iimwanya nea gwaheelli nyeashta, gajeanaldaan duumda was?
46014008	Aba gideaba giguuleanda iinyaa nyeashta meanala, gajeang'eaha siida jea ahidaat aba ng'uchcheeda?
46014009	Asi gwasnu earagooga; iyoobalooli iit nuut meanala, gajeang'eaha jea ghwanal gissurgu? Aba gideaba gajuurjeewana siida rukkwiisa ng'asheega jeammeeda.
46014010	Asi gwanda iidiga saang'a heelli aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak ea manda dea meanala girrugu.
46014011	Abeeda iimwanali ginnyah iittida, gaydoaw rabascheanda aba heeda siida balool nea siida balool gayghoaw rabascheanda aba heedeanyu.
46014012	Gwasnu earaba heedeang'wa; aba gideaba googasayi muuchchi gideaba gajahuuwa fuga mideawa uurda aba Gurorooda, agassa muuchchi gideaba gajandeawana ak ghoadeaschi ganiisa.
46014013	Asi, siida baloola iit nuut ea damwaasha Aseetta eattaw rooppiideayda.
46014014	Aba gideaba iyaamwaashchi Aseetta aba iit nuut, ghamwaach guroroodeanyu Aseetta, nea fughareedeanyu ea mandeawana haghweega.
46014015	Abeeda gaydasin naaha? Gaydamwaash Aseetta aba gurorooda earada gaydamwaash aba fughareeda, gaydasarman aba gurorooda ak gaydasarman earada aba fughareeda.
46014016	Eara gwasa, ang'iing'i iibadiischeesi aba gurorooda, siitta uurji gilimida jaroodean gaygwayeendaan “Amina,” iing'atta badiischeesindaang'u iimwanala gidurgu?
46014017	Aba gideaba gwadeeppa badiischeesiina muuchchi, iiduu siida niirja eamaloossiina gil.
46014018	Geabadiischeesi Aseetta aba gideaba geabalooli iit nuut ea dadarameagwa oagasean;
46014019	amaduu, aba jeeda ganiisa ghabwariinyi gideaba gaydabaloola ng'asha muut aba fughareedeanyu, ak ghanaalli buuneeda suurja, eaghwalabwa hoowa gideaba gaydabaloola ng'asha sagalamnyooji damanamughuush aba iit nuut.
46014020	Fuga eaduupcheewi, adoahuuyi diibiga aba fughareengeagwa; ahuuwa diibiga aba ng'asheega munyas, nea aba fughareengeagwa ghoahuuyi fuga hees.
46014021	Geang'waar aba jeeda deaweeda gideaba, “Aba ghuusiga fuga baloola iit nuut, ea biissa ghuusiga rabasta gaydeabalool fiisu, ak earagwasa ghanyea maygoleeysean iit, gwargu Ng'uttamiida.”
46014022	Asi, iit nuut gwadeagooda gil ak ea maba fuga mideawa masaweega, gaba fuga mandeawana masaweega, nea ramooranga ea maba fuga mideawa masaweega.
46014023	Asi iibwat geat ganiiseessean ak gabaloola sean iit nuut, amaduu ghwahidu gah fuga jarooda, ghanea fuga mandeawana masaweega gil, heappi maygwayi goobeayi geasi?
46014024	Ama ramoaran sean, amaduu ghwahidu gah siida iiyiin gaygoohiimsa munyindaannyi, nea ng'asheekka sean iiyiin gaygoorgweaksa,
46014025	Makcheameeda jeadaannyi gajeanung' ghwadaajiit; ak abeeda gwatkuy, ak gayghabwat Aseetta ak gwargu gideaba aba huumwa Aseetta gwanda jeedeang'wa.
46014026	Fuga eaduupcheewi, asi gajeeyeanaan? Iyoobwachchi geat, gaba siisi mideawa duumda, ea ginealshooda, ea gidaheachta, ea iit nuut, ghana rooppunooda ng'asheega.
46014027	Siida iibaloola iit nuut, ea dabaloola fiih iyyeenya ghanea samwagu gil adaghwanaawa, nea dasinna galannyoojiga gwayamuuttooschi; ak ea darooppuuna siyagi.
