46014028	Iimanda siichchea gwarooppu, ea daba siisi siinda aba jeeda ganiisa, deabaloola geaw niny ea Aseetta.
46014029	Nea sibanga ea dabaloola nea iyyeenya ghanea samwagu, ak ea dasikteawana ng'asheega surgu.
46014030	Nea isittaheachsa ng'asheanda siinuut apteada, adasiinda siida ghwanyawa bea madeeda.
46014031	Aba gideaba ghoammuuschi oagasean gaba siisi ramoaran, ak abeeda ghwanal sean, nea geemmajeek sean;
46014032	nea gurooruunatka sibanga iissa gwasissa gadiyeeda sibanga.
46014033	Aba gideaba Aseetta miih Aseetta ang'uuttooschi fiih gil, niny gaba hoyyooh. Gawuurji aba jeeda ganiisajeega sean bea fuga ghaydidi.
46014034	Nea gadeemga ea dasiinda aba jeesinga ganiisajeega. Aba gideaba manda gheatta jea gabaloola, gagasa gweada geat ng'eanyi, gawuurji ginnyaashta deaweeda.
46014035	Ama mida ng'asheanda wassean gasa ghwanal, ea daanyaasha siyeedinga nyaawa aba ghoah. Aba gideaba gaba baspaseega gideaba gaygabalool gatmooda aba jeeda ganiisa.
46014036	Heappi! Ng'asheanda Aseetta ghang'eada heedeang'wa ghana hisseegwa agooga nea goabwageadi?
46014037	Siida iyeeshsha geaw guwosi sibaneeda gil, ghana ea siida gurorooda, gayghamwas ng'asheesu eang'oorneegwean gideaba gwargu Ng'uttamiida.
46014038	Nea siida imwanala ng'asheesu, ea mwajeanaal niny.
46014039	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, asna badiida ak googasayi muuchchi ramooranda ng'asheega, nea adoaheawi fuga baloola iit nuut;
46014040	nea goosni ng'asheega sean badiida ea alooheeda.
46015001	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, ghamneawa gaydeapkeanneegwa Giijastida miy ghayi earukuneegwean, ghayi oang'ng'waanyi was dea oamiinaadawi,
46015002	amaduu geelealneegwa, aba iyoang'ng'waanyi muuchchi ak geaghus gaba masaweegeagwa mwadaagha.
46015003	Aba gideaba geagonnyeegwa giijasta majeek bea huumwa ghayi sigoonan, bea gideaba Gristo ghami aba riing'eagaasa gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka,
46015004	ea gideaba geebuy, ea gideaba geettuudu eaweetteaba samwagu, aba ginnyaashta ng'ooruutka,
46015005	ea gideaba nibussiinnyi sea Geefa, ea biissa ginealangiga attamaniyyeenyean.
46015006	Iimuchchu gabussiinnyi sea fuga naawa bughalaji muut aba damwanagi, nea aba jeedeaba fiisu gwanda gea saang'a duugwanda eara ghamneawa, nea mwaatkwa gwanda gea nimeewa.
46015007	Iimuchchu gabussiinnyi sea Yakkobo, ea gichcha giijasoodiga sean.
46015008	Amaduu aba huydeandeaba sean, geabussinnyeewi aniini, ak geawuurjeewi siida siji nea miih ghwahitta damandaannyi.
46015009	Aba gideaba aniini geawoschi mwanang'eawa giijasoodiga, biissa ea mammiissean gideaba gajeeguureewean giijasoochcheanda, aba gideaba ghayi naaghabwaschi ganiiseeda Aseetta.
46015010	Iiduu aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta anaahuuyi gideawuurjeewi bea ghamneawa, nea dagheerjeameadaannyi aba heedeanyu ea maba mwadaagha. Aba meatkweeda niirja ghaaraanyi muuchchi aba sinooda gadiyeeda ea dalaabwa hoowa siida wassean aba saawa, nea miih aniini gil, niih gwasin dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta mida heedeanyu.
46015011	Asi ii aniini gil, ghanea fukka, niih gissurukkwiidi gil, ak hean ghoamwaschi.
46015012	Asi ghamneawa iinukkwa geerukkwiida gideaba Gristo niduunna miyeeda, anda ak gwayeena fuga mwaatkwa manda duunnooda fuga nimeewa.
46015013	Ama manda duunnooda fuga nimeewa, adabeeda Gristo ea miih gwaduudu;
46015014	ama Gristo ii miih gwaduudu, abeeda rukkwiideaydeanya bea giijasta gaba mwadaagha ak masaweegeagwa gaba mwadaagha.
46015015	Iissa earaseasa geanung' eahuuwa gili sinappiisi Aseetta ng'uyyeega, aba gideaba gemuuwwu gideaba niiduudu Gristo, was dea miih gwaduudu ii huumwa gil gideaba ghami ak ea miih gwaduudu.
46015016	Aba gideaba ii meettuttuuna fuga nimeewa, abeeda eara Gristo ea miih gwaduudu.
46015017	Ama Gristo iimii gwaduudu, masaweegeagwa gaba mwadaagha, adabeeda ea gudandana jeeda riing'eegeagwa.
46015018	Gwasnu abeeda eara fukka sean ghayi meewa aba jeeda Gristohiin ea nirooda.
46015019	Aba gideaba aba jeedeaba eaweesu bea ghamneawean isindeawi rarooda aba heeda Gristo, gidabal geabwaydaneasa ea ealaabwana hoowa buuneessean.
46015020	Ak aba huumwa Gristo ea nuduunna miyeeda, was haghweega madeeda aba jeeda fuga nimeewa.
46015021	Aba gideaba miyeeda ghayi gweadu siida, gwasnu eara duunnooda miyeeda gweadu siida.
46015022	Gawuurji ghayi aba Adam gameewa buuneessean, gwasnu earaba heeda Gristo gaygwaduuttu sean.
46015023	Ak gaygaba siisi siittuudu aba badiida Aseetta: Nea Gristo ea haghweega madeeda gil, nea damanda jea ghwahinna gayghwaan heeda fuga was gea Gristo.
46015024	iing'atta hiji gayghwahidu mudeanooda, damanda jea ghoadawa Aseetta was Bwaabwa gheambalmeeda iing'atta nyarjeawuda sugoochcheandumeeda ea fuga ambaliischi sean ea uurda.
46015025	Ak ghanyi goombaliischi ea eaghus ghwayiin weajoodigaaschi sean jeeda baneaguuka geeshangaaschi.
46015026	Weajoochcheanda huydean jea eejakta miyeeda gil.
46015027	“Aba gideaba Aseetta niyiin haleanjeen jeeda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi.” Haleanjeessean siyiin hing'eadaydaannyi, ak ea daach gideaba numwas siida iin haleanjeessean jeeda baneaguukkaaschi.
46015028	Asi iisiyiin haleanjeessea jeeda baneaghuukka geeshangaaschi, abeeda Balleanda gayghwayiin geaw jeeda baneaguukka Aseetta, ak abeeda Aseetta ghoaw haleanjeessean aba hichpa giliwas siida.
46015029	Asi ghamneawa gwayeenaan buuneeda isippattiisa aba hoorgeeda fuga nimeewa? Iimuchchu nea meettuunna fuga nimeewa earahay, abeeda buuneeda geppeattanniisa naaha aba hoorgeeda nyaawa?
46015030	Abeeda ghwasaan inyas geendi jeeda gidiinyeanda damannyoojiga seani?
46015031	Fuga eaduupcheewi, aniini geargu ng'asheesu nea ghaaghwarji geaw appadahuukkeagwa agoogeeda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanyean, iissa genuusan galeagasean!
46015032	Gaydanya naaha abeeda iyeabalooldi siida, aniini geang'uchcheewi diyeanga aba Efeesohiin? Aba imaduuttuuna fuga nimeewa, “Asi eyeagiischeena nea geeleeshi, aba gideaba numuji gajeemeewwa.”
46015033	Adeereenganneegwa, “Baloolda muy iissa gwanuus searoojiga miyaas.”
46015034	Anung' ghwadoabiiw fughareengeagwa, ak ea adagudoosinnyi riing'eeda. Aba gideaba buuneeda mwaatkwa mandeawana fughareeda Aseetta. Geergu ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghoabwaaspwaaschi.
46015035	Iiduu gwadeeppa ghoanyaashta siih, “Fuga nimeewa gettuuttaydaan? Ak gayghapka nea gweadu sasanuukka uurjiin?”
46015036	Ea siittasha, haleanjeeda ihisti maygwahissa heeda ea eaghus ghanyi ghami.
46015037	Nea gidihisti ea miih bookcheanda niheedu, iissa gheang'nyeanda, deeppa gaba nngano ghana gaba booga suurja.
46015038	Nea Aseetta ghoadaw saseeda loat nea gilinyooh ea mbeyooda gil iissa ghwanyas saseadaannyi.
46015039	Aba gideaba sasanuukka sean mawuurji, amaduu sasanuukka buuneeda gawuurji, nuut gaba diyeanga, nuut gaba dariidakka, nuut gaba ghweayeega.
46015040	Ak gwanda sasanuukka humng'eeda ea sasanuukka ng'eanyiida; nea gigheambiitta sasanuukka humng'eeda ea agi, nea gigheambiitta sasanuukka ng'eanyiida ea nuut gil.
46015041	Asi gwanda gigheambiidagi bea Aseetta, ak gigheambiit nuut gaba sheeda, nea gigheambiit nuut gaba miinga; aba gideaba ming'weanda gwaheelli sea ming'weanda aba gigheambiitta.
46015042	Gwasnu eara duunnooda fuga nimeewa. Gidasihista iissa ghami, nea gisittuudu ea mayghami.
46015043	Geehista nea ghasghasaat, ak geettuunna nea gwandeawa gigheambiitta. Geehista ng'arng'aranda, ak gettuudu nea gwandeawa uurda,
46015044	Geehista saseeda geallaan, ak gettuudu saseeda gurorooda. Iimida saseeda geallaan, gwanda eara dea gurorooda.
46015045	Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Siida madeeda was Adam ghoaw siida mideawa eaweega,” nea Adamooda huydean ea Gurorooda adawi buuneeda eaweega gil.
46015046	Nea dea asheeda giibinda ea miih saseeda gurorooda gil, geaghus saseetta bea geallaaniin amang'atta ghabwat saseeda gurorooda.
46015047	Siida madeeda ghayi gwaleabu ng'eanyiida, ak geesna birjeanda; siideaba iyyeenya gwaleabu humnng'eeda.
46015048	Gawuurji siitta bea birjeandean, ea giduurji fukka sisna birjeandean gil; gawuurji siitta bea humng'eedean, ea giduurji fukka bea humng'eedean gil.
46015049	Ak gawuurji sea gissuwuurjeatti sea siida ghayi sisna sigeedean, gwasnu geewuurjeewi siitta ghayi leabu humng'eedean.
46015050	Gearukuneegwa ng'asheesu, fuga eaduupcheewi: saseeda ea foojeanda maygwahearan sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ghana dea jea ghami mayghoammu gwahearan dea mayghami.
46015051	Asi ng'ulla gearukuneegwa agooga makcheameeda. Aseasa majeemeewwa sean, ak gajeayameesa eesasean,
46015052	aba gheadi nuwaas, aba dukuteayda gheanyanga ea jeaditta, damanda jea ghwanyaasha durumbeatteeda huydean. Aba gideaba gayghwanya durumbeatti, ak gaygwaduuttu fuga nimeewa, ak ea maygudu ghwadaah miyeeda, ak aseasa gajeayameesa.
46015053	Aba gideaba saseani meewean gayghanyi gookkwa saseeda mayghami, nea saseeda jea ghami abeeda gookkwa saseeda mayghami.
46015054	Abeeda niih iissa ghamiin eaweetta jea gookkwealla saseeda mayghamiin, nea diitta meewean gookkwa dea mayghami, abeeda aba damani gaygwasa ng'asheanda ghayi sung'waar: “Miyeeda sijoar, ak ea nisa jooriischchooda.”
46015055	“Ea miyeeda, jooriischoadaang'u gwanda yeenu? Ea miyeeda, ng'weanindaang'u gwandayeenu?”
46015056	Ng'weaninda miyeeda ring'eeda, nea uurda riing'eeda ea deaweeda gil.
46015057	Iiduu gagasa ebadiischeesa Aseetta, dea goona jooriischchooda aba Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
46015058	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinnyi, andeawana alooheeda, ak ea adoabealbealli, ak goosinnyi galeagasean gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida, ak ghoanalli gideaba gadiyeedeang'wa miih mwadaagha gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
46016001	Aba iitta gujaweeda jea ghaweat fuga mideawa masaweega ghaydidi, aba gidaghayi earukusiindi ganiisajeega Galattiya, earagooga asindunu.
46016002	Eaweetta madeeda aba eawooji ispwa aba jeedeang'wa daba siisi adiing'da gil deenna gidamideawa, ak ea mowweamsheeni iyahiidu.
46016003	Damanda jea dahinna, gaydeajeakta fuga jea ageanni ghwaat barawajeanda ea haleanjeeda oattaydi ak ghwaat gujaweedeang'wa ea ghoahiitta Yerusalmeemu.
46016004	Nea abeeda idoabiiw gideaba gaydeadeayi aniini, abeeda gaydeadeayi sea saawa.
46016005	Asi gaydabareasseegwa agooga iing'atta beatta ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya, aba gideaba geagasayi dasku jeeda ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya,
46016006	ak gwadeeppa deabiida heedeang'wa ghana deabiida damanda gorogeeda, ak abeeda ghoammuuschi aweadaan dalamwajaada aba bareannyeekkeasu, aba heeda eagasayi dawa.
46016007	Aba gideaba meagassi dagoonneegwa ghamneawa nea ghaang'atti; aba gideaba ghararji deabiida ng'eang'deang'wa gilinuwaas, iimwas Ng'uttamiida.
46016008	Ak gayghanyi deabiida ng'eanyiida Efeeso ea ghwahitta damanda ghweelmeeda Bendegoosti,
46016009	aba gideaba nijaada gidaghuut muuchchi aba gadiyeedeanyu aba hiji, earappeadi saang'a weajoodiga.
46016010	Eaweeda hinna Dimotteo, goong'ulayi goobiida heedeang'wa nea mwabeada, aba gideaba gwasin gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida gawuurji gideasindi aniini.
46016011	Asi adagafool siih niny. Anung' ghwalamwajaada aba bareannyeekkaaschi nea ghabeawa hoyyooh, ak abeeda gabiigu heedeanyu; aba gideaba ghamuughu niny sea fuga eaduupcheewi.
46016012	Iiduu aba iitta Appoloyda was oorjeediyya, geamuschi muuchchi gabareasseegwa sea fuga eaduupcheewi, nea niny iinyas gheatta gayghwan.
46016013	Oang'ng'wearni, nea ghoamiinaadi muuchchi aba jeeda masaweegeagwa, adarusiitta nea ghoanyaschi uurda.
46016014	Ng'asheegeagwa sean iyoosinnyi asna aba bariinyeega.
46016015	Asi ghamneawa, fuga eaduupcheewi, agooga ghoanalli gideaba gheeh Stefaano fuga madeeda gil asheeda gwayamu geat aba ng'eanyiida Akkayahi, ak ea niidayda geat aba gadiyeesiinda fuga ghaydidi;
46016016	geamuscheegwa asissiina mureeda fuga sunu ea heeda siida wassean sin gadiyeeda ea fuga deawiit.
46016017	Ak geahoosannyi aba gideaba nihidu geaba Stefaano ea Fotunatto ea Akaiko, aba gideaba fiisu nidukuta seawadeeda ashoay iimoondani agooga;
46016018	aba gideaba ninung' ghahawda guroroodeanyu ea guroruunatkeagwa. Asi anala muuchchi fuga sunu.
46016019	Ghoaghadeagwa ganiisajeega mida Asiya. Akkila sea Briska, sea ganiiseeda mida jeeda gheannyaawa.
46016020	Ghoaghadeagwa fuga siduupcheewi sean. Oakghada geat aba samooda ghaydit.
46016021	Aniini Baulo gil, ak geang'oorneegwa giighadi aba geattindeanyu aniini.
46016022	Siida wassean mwabwariinya Ng'uttamiida, gagasa eamwaashta. Ng'uttamiideanya ghwaan!
46016023	Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gagasa andeawana.
46016024	Gagasa andeawana bariinyeegeasu oagasean aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu. Amin.
47001001	Baulo, was giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidabwariiyda Aseetta, ea Dimotteoyda was oorjeediyya. Heeda ganiiseeda Aseetta mida Goriinto, sea fuga ghaydidi sean mida jeeda ng'eanyiida sean bea Akkaaya:
47001002	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
47001003	Gagasa eakghambiida Aseetta, Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Bwaabwa mideawa baydeayda, Aseetta geanniida salgheang'da sean,
47001004	geanniida salgheang'deanya sean ea sawanadeeda, ak abeeda geammuuschi earaseasa egeandeawana salgheang'da fukka mida jeeda sawanaduutka seaniin, aba salgheang'da geandeawaneasa Aseettean.
47001005	Gawuurji gissippareannyeatta muuchchi sawanaduutka Gristo, gwasnu aba naweeda Gristo geeppareannyi muuchchi eara geandeayda salgheang'da.
47001006	Iiduw aseasa iisisawaneasa, gweagu geandeayda ogeandeawaneasa salgheang'da, ea lealeanooda; ama sigeandeawaneasa salgheang'da, gweagu geandeayda ogeandi salgheang'da, ak ghoanalli aba damanda oamilikghtaawi nea ghoarjeang'di aba sawanaduutkiga sisawaneasa aseasaan.
47001007	Nea gitta sirarji aba heedeang'wean ea majeettumduum; aba gideaba geanalli gitta oppareannyeatti sawanaduutkaasaan, abeeda gajooppareannyeana geandeayda salgheang'deanya.
47001008	Aba gideaba aseasa meegassi adasheahiitta, fuga eaduupcheewi, appadayda sawanadeetta sinyaschi aba ng'eanyiida Asiyahiin; aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi hidaat, gearaanyi eamilikghta ak ghang'aaleasa ea ealagaana earaba eaweaga.
47001009	Ghwasaan, geaghanyi gili ninyas girgweaksiinda miyeeda; gabaysiina gideaba gayghwanung' eahuuwa fuga huumwa ak ea miih aseasa gil earaba heeda Aseetta aduuttu fuga nimeewa;
47001010	niny ghoaghuuhaneasa jeeda washta haw bea miyeeda, ak gaygabiikta ghoaghuheasa; nea aseasa ea sirarji niny gideaba gaygabiikta ghoaghuheasa.
47001011	Earagooga aweadeasa aba mooshta Aseetta, ak abeeda gabadiischeesa fuga saang'a appadahuukkaasa aba badiischeesiindida ghayi sugoaneasa aseasa aba sheayda mooshcheenga saang'a aba heeda Aseettean.
47001012	Aba gideaba aseasa geaghwari geat ng'asheanji, nea gitta muuwwu fughareengaasaan gil ak ghoaw gissibeadi aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, ak gabiissa ghwaraanya muuchchi aba heedeang'wa, aba ghaydidanda ea baditta Aseetta bea huumwa, nea miih aba weaghumeeda ng'eanyiida gil geaghus aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta.
47001013	Ak ea manda ng'asheanda sung'oorneegwa geaghus giikka oammuuschi oassoamwana ak ghoanalliin; ak ghaararji aniini gideaba gajanala ng'asheesu muuchchi,
47001014	gawuurji gitta oanaldi gilimwanang' ng'asheega mwaatkwaan, ak abeeda googwareessi appadahuukkaasa gawuurji gichchea eebeaheattaneegwa aseasa aba eaweetta Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
47001015	Iiduw nea ghaanalli ng'asheanji, hean geagasayi doan heedeang'wa ammwadi, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi hooseaneega deabiyyeenya;
47001016	ak geegasayi dabareesseegwa nea ghaang'atti dawa Makkedoniya, amang'atta geayammu geaw doan Makkedoniya, ak geabiigu ng'eang'deang'wa ak abeeda ghaanyaschi weetta aba heedeang'wa aba bareannyeekkeasu jea dawa ng'eanyiida Yahuudi.
47001017	Neada aniini ghayamyamnyi geawi iyeagasayi dasin ng'asheanji? Neada geasinnyi badiideanyu aniini ak geawuurjeewi siida ng'eanyiida, ak ghwahit iyeayennyi Eah ghana Manda aba damanagi?
47001018	Nea aba huumwa aba gidadoabiiwaatta Aseetta, ng'asheandeanya aba heedeang'wa ea miih Eah gil ea Manda.
47001019	Aba gideaba Balleanda Aseetta, was Gristo Yeesuun ghayi surukku iittaannyi aba jeedeang'wa, Silwano ea Dimotteo ea aniini, miih Eahi ghana Manda; nea aba jeedeaba niny galeagasean iissa ea Eah gil.
47001020	Aba gideaba helleesiinda sean bea Aseetta iissa ghwanyas Eah aba jeadaannyi. Niih gissurukkuuni Amin gil appadaydaannyi, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
47001021	Ak ea Aseetta gil dea amajeegideasa aba naweeda Gristo, ak ghoaw dea rukuneasa;
47001022	nea niny ea siida ghayi arooreasa gil, ak gagoaneasa Guroroodaannyi ak ghwayiin jeesinga guroruunatkaasa ak gawuurji raduutka.
47001023	Iiduw geeguursi Aseetta ghoaw mushoochcheandeanyu, ak abeeda iyaawunnyi ea moanyasi sawanadeeda ak ghoaw gissitteelsiinanean hinnooda Goriinto.
47001024	Nea miih gideaba geegasayi eeppala masaweegeagwa; geegadiyi sea agooga aba hooseaneegeagwa, aba gideaba ghoomiinaadi muuchchi aba masaweegeagwa.
47002001	Asi geatteemsheesi geaw aba fughareedeanyu ak ea meanneegwa wunoodeanyu jea dabareasseegwa sawanadeeda.
47002002	Aba gideaba iyaang'udaneegwa giseaneega, abeeda gajeang'eaha siida jea gohoosanan aniini ii miih siitta anung' gagiisaniini?
47002003	Ak ghang'waarji gawuurji gideasindi, ak abeeda iyaawunnyi ea measawanani aba heedeaba fukka ghwanyawa jea ghwanung' dahoosaniin. Aba gideaba ghadaayi aba huumwa aba jeedeang'wa oagasean, gideaba hooseaneegeasu gajea hooseaneegeagwa gil oagasean.
47002004	Aba gideaba geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu nea geandeawi sawanadeeda haw ea hang'weaniidooda aba jeeda gurorooda nea geabeayi dabeakka saang'a, nea miih gideaba geagasayi asawanana gili, geagasayi anala bariinyeegeasu eandeawi appadahuukkeagwa gitteenna aba hawunda.
47002005	Ama deeppa ea ninung' siih ghwanyas nuut sawanadeeda, ea meagealna heedeanyu aniini, nea aba haleanjeeda mwaatkwa sitteenniida ea adinung' ghang'waaniit aba heedeang'wa oagasean.
47002006	Siida sunu ghoahiit ghoorjooda ghayi adaw fuga saang'a;
47002007	hean ghang'wana giyami geaw ak gisamsi nea gigeandeawi salgheang'da, ghana gajiiduw ghwajoar giseaneega ng'waan muuchchi.
47002008	Ak geamuscheegwa gideaba ohhimsiina nea goommajeekchi bariinyeegeagwa aba headaannyi.
47002009	Niih gideang'oorsi barawajeanji gil, gideaba geagasayi dasin danal ea goosissi mureeda ng'asheega sean.
47002010	Siida wassean oosamsi, earaniini gaydasamsa. Gidaneasamsi, ama deeppa eaneasamsi gidawassean, niih gweagu badahuukkeagwa aba madeeda Gristo,
47002011	adaghwanyas Shattaani gheatta jea ghwanyagaadawa appadahuukkaasa; aba gideaba meewosi dasheahi aba gitta gasean.
47002012	Hean nea ghahitti Droa darukkwiida giijasta miy bea Gristo, ghwajaada gidaghuut aba heedeanyu aba heeda Ng'uttamiida;
47002013	ak ghanyea moapta ng'eanyi fughareedeanyu aba gideaba mwadaahi orjeediyya was Ditto aba hoowa. Ng'atta geegasayi fuufta appadahuukka nyaawa ak geawi ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya.
47002014	Asi badiischeesiinda gammiisa Aseetta, nea ghoadoabiiweasa aba naweeda Gristo aba hooseaneega, ak aba aseasa ghwadarda shearooda ng'andit bea fughareadaannyi aba hiji wassean.
47002015	Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi shearooda ng'andit bea Gristo aba madeeda Aseetta, aba heeda fuga lalaan ea heeda fuga nirooda,
47002016	aba hichpa siih shearooda ng'andit gil ng'eada miyeeda ea ghwahitta miyeeda, aba hichpa siih nuut ea shearooda ng'andit ng'eada eaweega ea ghwahitta eaweega. Siida nilang'uuda ng'asheesu ng'eaha?
47002017	Aba gideaba aseasa meewuurjeewani buuneeda suurja saang'a, fuga sheahhiida ng'asheanda Aseetta; gagasa ewuurjeewana fuga mideawa doobiiwnatta, was fuga adaw Aseetta gadiyeeda, aba madeeda Aseetta iissa geebaloolli appadayda Gristo.
47003001	Asi sing'ng'eachchi giding'noodeaba geat gichcha? Ghana sigasayi gidagassiida buuneeda suurja barawajeega gwarsiinda jea ghapka heedeang'wa, ghana gwaleabu heedeang'wa?
47003002	Agooga gowoschi barawajeandeanya bea gwarsiinda, sing'oorsa jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa, biissa analaat nea ghoassoamwa buuneessean;
47003003	ak ghoahhiimu gideaba gowoschi barawajeanda leabu heeda Gristo sugoaneasa aseasa, meang'waarana galaamu geang'waara Gurorooda Aseetta majeek, ak ea miih badahuukka lagheanga gil geeng'oorsa badahuukka guroruunatka hang'oonyi bea buuneeda.
47003004	Nea geendeawi masaweega aba madeeda Aseetta aba naweeda Gristo.
47003005	Miih gideaba geahhiichchi geat aseasa gil aba gipkeatta ng'asheanda wassean gideaba gwaleabu heedeanya aseasa; hidoodeanyu gwaleabu heeda Aseetta,
47003006	aba gideaba niny dea nung' eammuusa eahuwa fuga gadiyeesa neajeedeesh, meng'oorsiina jeeda barawajeanda geang'waar aba jeeda Gurorooda; aba gideaba gissung'waar was deaweeda gaygwanuus, nea Gurorooda gagoona eaweega.
47003007	Asi ghamneawa deaweedeeda miyeeda, iissa ghafnya geaw jeeda barawajeega lagheanga, ghwaan nea gweadu gigheambiitta ak abeeda ea mang'ulla fuga Israeeli gheamamda Muusa aba gidameang'meang'da, amaduw ghwasuunya aba giduurji,
47003008	abeeda deaweedeeda Gurorooda ea majeefurda ak ea majeadeapta aba giigheambiitta hawi?
47003009	Nea iimida gigheambiitta jeeda deaweeda jea gweadu girgweaksiinda, abeeda deaweedeeda doobiiwnatta gagasa ghang'atta aba gigheambiitta.
47003010	Aba huumwa, appadaydeaba ng'asheesu, gidaghayi mideawa gigheambiitta ea mudugwandeawa gigheambiitta earahay, nea gweagu gigheambiitida adaraamiin.
47003011	Nea gitta suunyaan iyeadu gigheambiitta, abeeda gidajea ghwashng'u gaygwandeawa gigheambiitta haw muuchchi.
47003012	Ak iinukwa gendeawi rarooda, ng'asheanda uurjunu, ada abeeda gewoschi muranga,
47003013	nea mewuurjeewani Muusayda ghayi dukuta gheamamdaannyi ak abeeda ea mwadaaha muuchchi fuga Israeeli mudeanoodeaba gigheambiittida suunyaan.
47003014	Iiduw fugheerga nyaawa geanung' gahang'oonyiidi; aba gideaba eara askweareani damanda sissoamwana neajeedeaba garayi, gili sikkwealliisa uhuudean gudugwanda heeda, geaghus egeanda iguuyi siida sea Gristo.
47003015	Eah eara askweareani isissoamwa deaweedeeda Muusa geedukuta fugheerga nyaawa;
47003016	nea siida iiyamsa geaw Ng'uttamiida hean geegeanda gitta awiimiin.
47003017	Asi ghamneawa Ng'uttamiida Gurorooda, nea heeda mida Gurorooda Ng'uttamiida, gwanda giibaldeaba geaw.
47003018	Hean aseasa eesasean, aba gheamamda meedukuta, ng'ulla gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida, siyam gawuurji sea niny ghang'eada gigheambiitta ea gagul gigheambiitta; aba gideaba ng'asheanji gwaleabu heeda Ng'uttamiida was Gurorooda.
47004001	Asi aba sareani, iinukwa gendeawi gadiyeeni aba baydeayda Aseetta, ghanyea meabealbeali.
47004002	Siheawi ng'asheega baspaseega, ea naweadinga ng'uyyeega; ak geaheawi gideaba gajeesna milmilanda ghana eyyamujeena sea ng'asheanda Aseetta, geaghus aba ng'asheega huumeanda surgu aba eeshpwara ak geaghwarji geat aba giliwas fughareemba siih aba madeeda Aseetta.
47004003	Ama deeppa giijasteanya miy afunyaat, ada abeeda geaghus afunyaat aba heedeaba fukka rodeadiin.
47004004	Aba sareani aseetteaba ng'eanyiini ninung' gang'oowiidi fughareenga fuga mandeawana masaweega, ak ghaweada deakta weeshinda giijasta miy mideawa gigheambiitta Gristo, nea niny gawuurji sea Aseetta.
47004005	Aba gideaba meerukkuuni ng'asheega badahuukkaasa aseasa geerukku gideaba Gristo Yeesu Ng'uttamiida, ea gideaba aseasa geewoschi soomjoogeagwa appadayda Yeesu.
47004006	Ak ea Aseetta gil dea ayi, “Nung'waada weeshinda ghoabwaay jeeda misaneeda,” nea niny ghoabwaay jeesinga guroruunatkaasa ak ghoadaw weeshinda fughareeda gigheambiitta Aseetta aba gheamamda Gristo.
47004007	Asi aseasa geendeawi gheaseeda aba jeeda haleanjeeda sigeeda, ak ghoahiimu gideaba uuri hawiin gwaleabu heeda Aseetta nea maleapna heedeanya aseasa.
47004008	Geesawaneasa aba naweadinga sean, ak ea mwasuunya uurjeangaasa; iissa geehirbabannyi, ak ghanyea meanyeahani;
47004009	geesawaneasa, ak ea meenung'useasa heeda; iissa geefutteeweasa ng'eanyi, ak ea meeshshealani;
47004010	galeagasean geesareenni badahuukkaasa miyeeda Yeesu, ak abeeda geattahaach eaweega Yeesu aba sasanuukkaasa.
47004011	Aba gideaba aseaseeni sindiin iissa geattaydaneasa enuusseasa galeagasean appadayda Yeesu, ak abeeda geattahaach eaweega Yeesu aba sasanuukkaasa jea gameewa.
47004012	Abeeda gagadiyi miyeeda aba sasanuukkaasa, nea gagadiyi eaweega aba sasanuukkeagwa.
47004013	Amaduw iinukkwa geendeawi gurorootta bea masaweegean geang'waar gideaba, “Ghaamwaschi, ak ghoaw gideabalooli,” earaseasa sumwaschi, ak ghoaw gissibalooli,
47004014	nea abeeda geanalli gideaba siida ghayi aduudu Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, gaygoduunneasa earaseasa sea Yeesu ak ghwayiineasa mwadeadaannyi sea agooga.
47004015	Aba gideaba ng'asheega sean gaba badahuukkeagwa nea gidahadaatta dagheerjeandumeeda muuchchi, ghoahaada badiischeesiinda aba heeda fuga saang'a, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta.
47004016	Asi majeabealbeala. Earappeadi iissa gawosiidi sasanuunatkkaasa, iiduw guroruunatkaasa iissa gewweshiit giliwas eaweechcha.
47004017	Aba gideaba sawanadeedeanya sinyaschi gaba gheadi nuwaas ak gwasinneasa gigheambiitta haw manda gichchea eegala,
47004018	aba gideaba meeng'ulli haleanjeeda sidaah geaghus haleanjeetta meadaahaan. Aba gideaba haleanjeeda sidaah ghang'atta, nea haleanjeetta meadaahaan gwandeawa eaweega mammuudeana.
47005001	Aba gideaba geanalli beadi udahabeascheanji itteanya bea hiji bea muunda ng'eanyiidean eaweeda sinyarjeawa, gendeawi gheeda leabu heeda Aseetta, gheeda meesnana geattinga, ghaydit manda mudeanooda mida humng'eeda.
47005002	Aba huumwa aba hiji iissa geamnyaannyi nea geegasayi muuchchi eshshubeasa gibindida bea humng'eedean,
47005003	nea abeeda isishshubeasa gajeadaheasa nea meewosi dawiiri.
47005004	Nea damani duu eendana jeedeaba gheawiin, iissa gessiimi aba sawanadeeda; nea meakna gideaba majeekkwealeasa gil, gweagu gideaba gajeekkwealeasa muuchchi, ak abeeda gitta iissa ghamiin abeeda gayghwanukghta eaweega.
47005005	Nea siida ghayi sineasa appadaydeaba ng'asheanji ea Aseetta gil, amaduw gagoaneasa Gurorooda uurji raduutka.
47005006	Asi gewoschi daruuschi galeagasean; ak geanalli gideaba damani duwea majeekcheewi sasanuukkaasaan geewoschi sheageewa Ng'uttamiida,
47005007	aba gideaba geabeawi masaweega, nea meabeani deakta.
47005008	Asi edaruusiitta, ak abeeda ghang'wana geesheagiidi saseeda ak geppiidi ghoah sea Ng'uttamiida.
47005009	Ada endana ghoah ghana ea meendani, geesinnyi gissippurbuurji ak abeeda geehhoosannyi niny.
47005010	Aba gideaba gajeahitta eesasean madeeda hoorgeeda girgweageeda Gristo, ak abeeda gaba siisi nyas gidamiy ghanea gidamuyi, gawuurji gitta ghayi sin aba saseedean.
47005011	Asi, geanalli gissiwwaldi gheang'da Ng'uttamiida, iissa geaghurghurji buuneeda; nea gissuwuurjeewi ghwanal Aseetta, ak ghaararji gideaba analaat earaba jeesinga fughareengeagwa.
47005012	Ak aseasa ea meegwarseegwa geat gichcha geegasayi gideaba gajaghwara geat agooga appadahuukkaasa, ak abeeda ghoammuuschi ashaaha ng'asheegeaba fukka gwara geat aba madeeda buneedean nea miih aba jeeda guroroodaannyi.
47005013	Aba gideaba iinung'uleasa geeska, gweagu badayda Aseetta; ama sindeawi fughareangaasa, gweagu badahuukkeagwa.
47005014	Aba gideaba bariinyeega Gristo iissa gwasinneasa uurda aba gideaba aseasa sumwaschi gideaba siyagi ghayi ghami appadahuukka buuneessean; asi abeeda ea nimeewa sean.
47005015	Ak ghami appadahuukka buuneessean, ak abeeda fukka majeekcheewiin ea meabiideewana badahuukka nyaawa abeeda goobiideewa dea meah appadahuukka nyaawa amaduw geettuudu.
47005016	Ghang'eada ghamneawa, asi aseasa meesissiini siida wassean mureeda aba ng'asheega saseeda; earappeadi aseasa sinalli Gristo gideaba siida gil, amaduw ghamneawa ea mudea gissinaldi.
47005017	Nea siida iimida jeeda Gristo, ea niiw siideesh; haleanjeedeaba garayi ning'atta, ng'ulla, nihidu haleanjeedeashish.
47005018	Amaduw haleanjeessean gwaleabu heeda Aseetta, ghayi aduupchaneasa aseasa sea niny aba naweeda Gristo, amang'atta gagoaneasa gadiyeeda giduuupcheeda;
47005019	nea aba jeeda Gristo gooduupchi geaw Aseetta ng'eanyiida, ak ea mang'ulla gidiinyeanyeekka mida badahuukka nyaawaan ak gagoaneasa giijasta giiduupcheeda.
47005020	Asi geewoschi fuga sichcheakta bea Gristo, hean gamusiischooweasa Aseetta. Geemearmearanneegwa appadayda Gristo, ottuupcheewana geat Aseetta.
47005021	Appadahuukkaasa geanung' ghoaw niny ring'eeda nea niny ea mwanala ring'eeda, ak abeeda aba niny geahuuyi doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
47006001	Nea aseasa iisisinnyi gadiyeeda sea niny, hean geemuscheegwa gideaba adiiduw ghoanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta mwadaagha.
47006002	Aba gideaba gwayi, “Damanda sumwas gealeyseey iit, ak ghaweachcheey eaweetta lealeanooda.” Ng'ulla, ghamneawa damanda sumwasi; ng'ulla ghamneawa eaweeda lealeanooda
47006003	Meagassi eayiina naweemba siida wassean gichchea gwaruusa, ak abeeda eameedeaksiina gadiyeedeanya munyinda,
47006004	nea iisuwuurjeewi soomjooga Aseetta abeeda geaghwarji geat aba naweadinga sean, aba naweetta haw bea milkghteaydean, aba sawanaduutka, hang'ooynachcheekka habitkwajeega,
47006005	bayiiga, ghealooniga, gidumduumda, gadiyoojiga, ging'weernooda, jalooda;
47006006	ea aba alooheeda, ea fughareeda, ea gihang'ooyda, ea innyeanda jeeda, ea aba Gurorooda Ghaydit, ea bariinyeega huumwa,
47006007	aba ng'asheanda huumwa, ea aba uurda Aseetta; ea baditta doabiiw bea ng'uchcheeda mida geattinda dugwa ea geattinda ghaadaam;
47006008	aba mureeda ea nyootta mureeda, iisismaneasa ng'asheega munyas ghana eesmaneasa ng'asheega miyaas. Ak geenung' eahuuwa fuga rengani buuneeda nea geerukku huumeanda;
47006009	ak geewuurjeewi fuga meanala, nea geanaleasa muuchchi; ak geewuurjeewi fuga meewa nea gung'ulayi geewoschi majeekcheewi; ak geewuurjeewi fuga siyaaga ghoorjooda, ak ea menuussa;
47006010	geewuurjeewi fuga giisan, nea ghana gehoosannyi galeagasean; nea geewuurjeewi fuga barbari, nea ghana geepparuurji fuga saang'a; geewuurjeewi fuga mandeawana gil, nea ghana geendeawi haleanjeessean.
47006011	Ghuusigaasa sijaachchi aba heedeang'wa, ea fuga Goriinto; nea guroruunatkaasa ea nibareahiidi.
47006012	Aseasa meakghumeagwa, agooga ghoaghuumeegwa haleanjeetta oabwariinnyiin.
47006013	Aba yamitteaba geaw geabalooldi gili eabaloolli diibiga, oapwargiida guroruunatkeagwa.
47006014	Adiiduw ghoang'ng'waanyi geat sea fuga mandeawana masaweega. Aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa, aba gideaba gwanda dupcheemba naaha mida dageascheeda doobiiwnatta ea heheweega? Nuut gichcha gwanda rorochcheemba naaha mida dageascheeda weeshinda ea misaneeda?
47006015	Gwanda giyang'deayyeemba naaha dageascheeda Gristo sea Gidamuy? Ghana siida mideawa masaweega neada gaygwandeayeesa naaha sea siida mandeawana masaweega?
47006016	Neada gwanda neajeemba naaha dageascheeda gheada sibatta Aseetta sea gidamawosa Aseetta? Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi gheeda sibatta Aseetta majeek; ak gawuurji ginnyaashta Aseetta nea gwayi, “Gaydeabiida jeannyaawa, nea gaydaneayeewa jeanyaawa, ak gaydoaw aniini Aseetta nyaawa, nea ghoaw saawa fugeasu.
47006017	Asi arinnana jeannyaawa, ak gohhelleewi geat saawa gwargu Ng'uttamiida, ak ea adoang'ng'waanyi gida mideawa ririnnyeanda; ak abeeda gaydadeagwa ghoah.
47006018	Gaydoaw Bwaabwa aba heedeang'wa, ak gajahuuwa agooga balloojigeasu ea haweegeasu, gwargu Ng'uttamiida mideawa uurda.”
47007001	Iinukkwa gendeawi hellesiini fugeasu abwariinyi, abeeda ghang'wana geehhuunnyi geat aba ririnnyoojiga sean bea saseeda ea gurorooda nea geemmajeekchi ghaydidanda aba gheawalmeeda Aseetta.
47007002	Ajanneasa guroruunatkeagwa, aba gideaba miyeettiiysiina eara siih, ak ea miyeang'ala siih seawshooda, ak ea miyeanyagaada aba hichpa siih.
47007003	Aniini mearukuni ng'asheanji aba girgweaksiindeang'wa, aba gideaba neabay dargu ammwadi gideaba agooga goondi jeeda guroruunatkaasa, iisimewuudayi ghana iisindeayi.
47007004	Ak geandeawi muraneandumeeda haw appadahuukkeagwa; ak gaydaghwar geaw muuchchi appadahuukkeagwa; ak ea naanyaschi hawdeayda. Earaba sawanaduutkaasa, aniini geahoosannyi muuchchi.
47007005	Nea eara damanda sihittaawi Makkedoniya, ghanyea mwanyasa sasanuukkaasa hawdeayda geanyaschi sawanaduutka aba gheatkweakka sean ak geeng'uchchi appwadaw, nea jiih gwanda muuwda.
47007006	Nea Aseetta, geanniida salgheang'da fuga giisan, gageanda salgheang'deanya aba hinnooda Ditto,
47007007	ak ea meakghusa hinnoadaannyi ghabwada geandeayda salgheang'da gawuurji gidaghayi ogeandeaydi salgheang'daannyi, gawuurji girrukuneasa bea gidoogassiidi, ea gidogiisandi, ea gidogassiidi weetteanyu, ak abeeda geahoosannyi muuchchi.
47007008	Aba gideaba earappeadi nanyareascheagwa aba barawajeandeanyu, maydagiisan aba gili (earappeadi neagiisannyi aba giliiin,) aba gideaba ghadaayi gideaba barawajeandida niinyareaseagwa, earappeadi gheadi nuwaasi.
47007009	Aba giduurji, neahoosannyi, nea meakna gideaba gogiisannyi agooga, gweagu gideaba geanung' agiisan ea eanung' aduukkuunana; aba gideaba googiisandi fuga bada Aseetta, ak ea mwageagwa lugooda aba badahuukkaasa.
47007010	Aba gideaba giseaneega fuga bada Aseetta iissa gweadu dukkuunooda eadu lealeanooda ak ea manda gichchea ghwanung' giisana, nea giiseaneega muunda ng'eanyiida gaygweadu miyeeda.
47007011	Asi ang'ulla badiini bea fuga bada Aseettean gaygwanyakneegwa naaha agooga, ak ea gassoomba naaha bea furoodeaba geediin, niih ana nyaras gil, niih hirbabandeemba naaha, bariinyeespa naaha, giidaydeaydeaba geaw bea naaha, ghoorjoomba naaha! Aba gheatkweakka sean noahhiimu geat gideaba mondeawani ramaseamba gil aba ng'asheanji.
47007012	Asi earappeadi eang'oorneegwean, mwang'waari appadaydeaba siitta adiiyiin, ak ea maba badaydeaba siitta sittiysean, geebaysiina gideaba bariinyeegeagwa aba heedeanya gajeattajiit aba heedeang'wa aba madeeda Aseetta.
47007013	Asi gegeandeawaneasa salgheang'da. Nuut aba geandeayda sigeandeawaneasa salgheang'da geehoosannyi muuchchi aba hooseaneega Ditto, aba gideaba fughareadaannyi noanung'unyi oagasean gafuuf.
47007014	Aba gideaba iyaaghwarji geaw aba madeadaannyi aba ng'asheanda wassean appadahuukkeagwa, ea maydabwaspwas; gaygawuurji haleanjeesean surukuneegwa huumwa gil, ak eara ghwaroodeang'wa bea geat ammadeeda Ditto ea niiw huumwa.
47007015	Nea guroroadaannyi iissa gwaritta damannyooji sean appadahuukkeagwa, iyapkaat mureedeang'wa bea oagasean, ea muuwda ea boodanda damanda oang'ng'waanyi niny.
47007016	Geahoosannyi, aba gideaba geandeawi masaweega muuchchi aba badahuukkeagwa.
47008001	Fugeaduupcheewi, geegasayi anala dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ghayi sihhiimu aba jeesinga ganiisajeega Makkedoniya,
47008002	nea aba jeeda simsimda ng'waan ea sawanadeeda, hean aba hawunda hooseaneega nyaawa ea barbarannyeekka nyaawa raanya ea nibaruur muuchchi nea goobal geat aba meatkweeda nyaawa.
47008003	Ak ghoadayda aba gidammuusta, ak gaydamuuwwu, ea ghwanaawda, aba gidagassiida saawa,
47008004	gamuseasa muuchchi eattaw gheatta jea gobareannyi gadiyeani bea weetta fuga ghaydidiin,
47008005	nea niih ea miih gidasirardi gil, ammwadi ghanyi ghoadaw geat Ng'uttamiida ea biissa aseasa aba gidagassiida Aseetta.
47008006	Iiduw geamiinnyi gheang'da Ditto nea geegasayi gawuurji gidaghayi bean ghoang'eatta, gagasa ghoahiit aba jeedeang'wa gadiyeeni mideawa dagheerjeandumeedean.
47008007	Ghamneawa iyoang'aldi aba haleanjeessean aba masaweega, ea rukunooda, ea fughareeda, aba jeeda guroroossean, ea aba jeeda bariinyeegeagwa aba heedeanya, asikteawana gideaba ghoang'aldi aba gadiyeeni bea dagheerjeandumeedean.
47008008	Asi geargu ng'asheanji nea miih gideaba geagonnyi digheanda, geagasayi asikteawana aba dagheerjeandumeeda buuneeda suurja ak abeeda bariinyeegeagwa earada gaygaba huumwa.
47008009	Aba gideaba noanalli dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, earappeadi baruuriin, hean ghabwarbwariit appadahuukkeagwa, ak abeeda aba barbarandaannyi ghoahuuyi baruurji.
47008010	Nea appadaydeaba ng'asheanji gadagooneegwa badiida: ghwahit muuchchi ghamneawa aba heedeang'wa gihiitteaba gitta gweayda heetta ng'attaan ak ea meakghusa sinooda gibwadi gassooda,
47008011	asi aba gidowosti hidaat aba gidoogassiidi gagasa gweatteayyi sea gidoahhiitti aba jeeda haleanjeeda ondeawi.
47008012	Aba gideaba iinyooh gwanda hidooda, abeeda gajeamwas aba gitta mideawa siidean, nea miih aba gitta mandeawaneani.
47008013	Aba gideaba mearukuni ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghwanyas fuga mwaatkwa hooseaneega nea ghoanyaschi agooga sawanadeeda,
47008014	iiduw aba ng'asheega giiyang'deyyeeda aba haleanjeedeang'wa ghamneawa ondeawi saang'a gagasa ghaweat fukkasa, ak abeeda haleanjeeda saang'a mideawa ghaweadeagwa iyoogasayi, ak abeeda gaygwanda giyang'deayyeeda.
47008015	Gawuurji gissung'waarda gideaba, “Siida awaam ea ghwasaang'anyiit maburda gil, nea dea awaam geang'ay mwasunyeawana gil.”
47008016	Gagasa eebadiischeesa Aseetta iin jeeda Ditto gassoodida eandeawi aniini aba weetteang'wean.
47008017	Aba gideaba niny mwakghusa ging'ng'ooyda ng'asheandeanya, niny abeeda gagasa muuchchi hinnooda heedeang'wa aba uhuudaannyi.
47008018	Hean gechcheagu niny sea orjeediyya nigeawiit iitta aba rukkwiideayda Giijasta miy aba jeesinga ganiisajeega seaniin;
47008019	ak ameakghusa niih akghwahit, niny ghwaloat ganiisajeega ak geanung' etteayeewana damanda sibeawi eesnanaa gadiyeedeanya bea bariinyeega, aba gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiida ak ghoaw gwadeagooda gitta miy gasa jeesingaasaan.
47008020	Ak ea meagassi gideaba gaygwarukuna siih badahuukkaasa ng'asheega munyas appadayda gimmuusta sugu ak gang'ula gisilachchiida haleanjeeda,
47008021	nea geeshsheedi ghanyi eapkaada ng'asheega miyaas, nea miih ammadeeda Ng'uttamiida gil akghwahit, earaba madeeda buuneeda.
47008022	Hean geechcheagu sea saawa oorjeediyya nigeawiit eesimsim ak geadaayi gideaba aahiidaat aba haleanjeesaang'a, ak ghamneawa ea hidaat muuchchi ea ghang'alda appadayda masaweegaaschi adareemshi aba heedeang'wa.
47008023	Asi aba iitta Ditto, niny bareannyeandeanyu ak ea siida easnuudayeewi gadiyeeda appadahuukkeagwa gil; nea gabiissa gagasa iitta fuga siduupcheewi, saawa fuga ajeagu ganiisajeega, ak ea gigheambiitta Gristo gil.
47008024	Asi oahhiimda aba madeeda ganiisajeega, bariinyeegeagwa ea gissughwardi geat appadahuukkeagwa aba heedeaba fiisu.
47009001	Asi ghamneawa ghwaraanya aba heedeanyu gideaba geang'oorneegwa iitta haleanjeeda sisappa geadi jea eattaw fuga ghaydidi,
47009002	aba gideaba ghaanalli gidowosti hidaat, ak ghaaghwari geaw appadahuukkeagwa aba heeda fuga Makkedoniya, nea gideaba fuga Akkaya ahidaat ghang'eada nndeara; iiduw gidoogasayi eanimajeek fuga saang'a mwaatkwa.
47009003	Iiduw geajeagu fuga eaduupcheewi ak abeeda amoawa ghwaroodeanya bwaageat appadahuukkeagwa gidamwadaagha aba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda gowoschi hidaat, gawuurji gidearukuteaydi jea awuurjeewana;
47009004	amaduw nea ghawunnyi nea geadeani fuga Makkedoniya, ak ghaahidu nea mowosi hidaat, gajeappwaspwaseasa, ak abeeda ea mwajeammuusa eerukuna gil appadahuukkeagwa, aba damani sindi jeeda masaweegean.
47009005	Hean ghadaayi gideaba ghwadoabiiw rekusiinda fuga eaduupcheewi ak ghwahidu heedeang'wa goshooynanean, ak gabean gwasin gitta sugu ghayi ohelleesiin, ak gagasa ahidaat ak ea mawuurji gissidiing'sa gawuurji gissittaydaawa masooda.
47009006	Asi gaydargu ng'asheanji: siida hista gea ng'ay gayghwalach gea ng'ay, nea siida histeawa innyeanda jeeda gayghwalaja innyeanda jeeda.
47009007	Daba siisi sinda gadiyeeda gidagassiida aba uhuudaannyi, adagwasin nea magassa ghana eediing'sa, aba gideaba Aseetta ghabwariiy siitta adayyiida haleanjeeda aba jeedeeshiini.
47009008	Nea Aseetta ghoammu ghoannyiideagwa ghawooda, ak abeeda gondeawi agooga heluutka haleanjeessean aba galeagasean abeeda ghoannyiideagwa muuchchi aba giliwas gadiya miy.
47009009	Gawuurji gissung'waarda bea gideaba, “Nidaarda, ak ghoadaw fuga barbari; doobiiwnattaannyi gayghwashng'u damanda manda mudeanooda.”
47009010	Nea siida adaw mmbeyooda siida jea gwahista ak ghoaw mukkattee ghoaw hamitta gaygagooneegwa ak gwalakkuuneegwa haleanjeeda ak ghwanung' ghoahaada booga aba doobiiwnatteang'wa,
47009011	Gajeenung' abaruura aba naweadinga sean abeeda gwannyeaniidi jeesingeagwa muuchchi, nea aba naweedeanya gayghoadaw Aseetta badiischooda;
47009012	aba gideaba gadiyeeni maygabeachchi gideaba gayghaweat fuga ghaydidi aba gidagasa, gayghwanung' gabadiischeesa buuneeda Aseetta muuchchi ea ghwanaawda.
47009013	Aba simsimdeaba gadiyeeni, gajoakghambiida Aseetta aba mureedeang'wa aba masooda Giijasta miy bea Gristo, ea appadayda innyeanda jeesingeagwa oattawji saawa ea buuneessean;
47009014	nea saawa ghamwaash Aseetta muuchchi appadahuukkeagwa, aba dagheerjeandumeeda naawda mida jeedeang'wa.
47009015	Ebadiischeesiina Aseetta aba gidagooneasa meammuusi rukunoodean!
47010001	Aniini Baulo, geamuscheegwa nea gabwageaw, aba garbabanda ea ng'eeninda Gristo, nea iissa geawoschi ng'eeni aba gheanyangeagwa, nea iyeawoschi sheageewaneegwa geawoschi daruus!
47010002	Asi geamuscheegwa gideaba isindeayi ea mwahiimni dargooda aba gitta amwaschiin ak geahiimsi fuga rar gideaba aseasa geayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega gasa ng'eanyiida.
47010003	Earappeadi sindi ng'eanyiidean aseasa meeng'uchcheewani fuga mida ng'eanyiida,
47010004	aba gideaba dabitteanya sing'uchcheatti maba saseeda suuh gwandeawa uurda Aseetta ak gwanyarja uurda lugooda.
47010005	Ak geenyarji fughareenga sean gasa godiing'u geat appadayda fughareeda Aseetta, ak geaghaschi giliwas fughara ak abeeda gwasissa mureeda Gristo,
47010006	nea geewoschi hidaat eayaagana ghoorjooda fuga manda mureeda, damanda hida mureedeang'wa.
47010007	Ang'ulla haleanjeeda mida madeeda gheanyangeagwa. Siida iirar gideaba gaba Gristo ea dapkaattunu niny gideaba niny siida Gristo, adabeeda earaseasa gewoschi.
47010008	Earappeadi aghwarji geaw gilimwanang'iin aba gheambalmeeda sindeawi, ghayi goaneasa Ng'uttamiida ak abeeda gedeekneegwa nea miih gideaba gajeenyarjaneegwa, ghanyea majeappwaspwaasan.
47010009	Meagasi eadaah gideaba geagasayi deamuuweagwa aba barawajeega.
47010010	Aba gideaba gwayeena, “Barawajeegaaschi eadurmani nea gwandeawa uurda nea saseadaannyi iimida hiji ea ng'arng'ar, nea eara girgweageadaannyi geefool.”
47010011	Fuga sunu gagasa ghwanal gideaba ng'asheega surgu aba barawajeanda damanda meandeewani hiji, iissa geesinnyi iimida hiji.
47010012	Miih gideaba geegasayi eebadaksiina eahhaadana geat fuga gwara geadi ghana eegalana geat fuga adiing'ng'u geat gil. Hean nea gaba siisi adeena geaw niirja, ak gaba siisi gala geaw niirja, ak ghanyea manda ginnal.
47010013	Ak aseasa ea mwajeaghwara geat ea ghwanaawda, geaghus gheadeendida goaneasa Aseettean, nea gideaba gajeammuusa eahinna heedeang'wa gil.
47010014	Nea meattaardani geat ea ghwanaawa gheadeendeanya, nea eara gwasa ghanyea miyeahinna heedeang'wa; aba gideaba geewoschi fuga madeeda asheeda ghwahidu heedeang'wa nea geeyeadu Giijasta miy bea Gristo.
47010015	Nea mwajeaghwara geat ea ghwanaawa deascheeda aba sawanadeeda buuneessuurja gil; abeeda gendeawi rarooda gideaba gaygwaheedu masaweegeagwa gagasa gwaheedu gadiyeedeanya aba jeedeang'wa,
47010016	Ak abeeda gajeammuusa erukkwiida giijasta miy aba daroorakka suurja sheageewaneegwa, nea meaghwari geat aba gadiyeeda ning'atta sinooda aba jeemba madamnyeamba siih nuut.
47010017	“Neada siida ghwargeaw, ghaghwarageaw Ng'uttamiida.”
47010018	Aba gideaba miih siida gwarageawiini gil jea eamwas geaghus siitta jea ghaghwar Ng'uttamiidean.
47011001	Gideaballi ghwanyawa ghoamilikghti lendeedeanyu gilimwanang'. Amilikghta sea aniini!
47011002	Aba gideaba aniini geashisseegwa ghaang' aba shidoodeaba ghaang' bea Aseetta, aba gideaba neanyearriiseegwa Gristo ak ghaadaydaneegwa awuurjeewana sibeeda miy weesa ng'eedeanagi.
47011003	Iiduw ghabealli, gawuurji gidaghayi renganniida ichchibooda Haawa aba milmilandaannyi, gajeehutteawi fughareengeagwa ak ghoanung'waadi doobiiwnatta ea alooheeda Gristo.
47011004	Aba gideaba iihidu siinuut ak gwarukuneegwa Yeesu nuut nyooh ea miih dea ghayi sirukkuneegwa, ghana oang'ng'waanya guroroonnuut mawosa dea oang'ng'waanyi, ghana iyoamwaschi giijasta miy nuut mawosa dea ghayi oamwaschiiin, abeeda goosissi mureeda gitta.
47011005	Aba gideaba ghaaghanyi manda gidashoadeawanaan aba gidamideawa giijasoodiga hees.
47011006	Earappeadi aniini eawoschi siida moammu gabalooliin, niih miih gideawuurjeewi aba fughareeda gil; naweadinga sean sinung'unyi ghwadaajiit ng'asheesu aba heedeang'wa aba haleanjeessean.
47011007	Heappi aniini neasinnyi ring'eeda iyayaachchi geaw ng'eanyi ak abeeda geakghambiideegwa, aba gideaba ghayi gearukkuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta nea moattaydani gili?
47011008	Nareachchi ganiisajeega suuk haleanjeeda nyaawa goonan saawa ak abeeda ghaweachcheegwa.
47011009	Nea aniini damanda sindeayeewi nea geegasayi weettean, ghanyea miih dasawan siida wassean, aba gideaba haleanjeeda eagasayi gagoonan fuga eaduupcheewi leabu Makkedoniya. Ak geahelleewi geaw haleanjeessean ak ea measawaneegwa aba gidawassean.
47011010	Ak gawuurji gidabiideatta huumeanda Gristo jeedeanyu, ghanyea manda siida jea gwadukutta ghuutteanyu aba ghwaroani bea geawiin aba daroorakka ng'eanyiida Akkaya.
47011011	Abwanaaha? Gweagu gideaba mwabwariinyeagwa agooga? Ghwanal Aseetta gideaba ghaabwariinyeagwa!
47011012	Nea gideagasayi dasin gaydasin, ak abeeda ghabwaanyi ng'asheegeaba fukka gasa aba jeeda gadiyoojiga nyaawa bea ghwarjeedean gwasinda gadiyeeda gidasisindi aseasa.
47011013	Aba gideaba fuga uurji suuh giijasoodiga ng'uyyeega, nea iissa gwasin gadiyeeda aba rengaweega, fuga iissa ghwayamgeat ak gwasin geat giijasoodiga Gristo.
47011014	Ak ea mayghaham fiih ng'eanyi, aba gideaba eara Shattaani iissa ghwayamyam geaw gawuurji malaykajeanda weeshinda.
47011015	Adabeeda ea miih ng'asheanda haw gil gideaba eara soomjoagaaschi earaga iissa ghwayam geat ak gawuurji soomjooga doobiiwnatta. Huydeanda nyaawa gaygawuurji sea gadiyoojiga nyaawa
47011016	Asi geargu gichcha gideaba, adaghwanung' siida doaw gili eawoschi dasha; earappeadi oanung' dasunuun, amwastanaan siittasha, ak abeeda earaniini ghaaghwarji geaw gilimwanang'.
47011017	(Ng'asheega eargu mearukuni aba gheambalmeeda Ng'uttamiida geawuurjeewi siida dasha, aba jeedeaba ghwarooni bea geaw ararji;
47011018	nea fuga saanga iissa ghaghwara geat haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida, ak earaniini gaydaghwar geaw.)
47011019	Aba gideaba hooseaneegeagwa ghamilikghta fuga dasheahi, nea agooga gowoschi weaghoodi!
47011020	Aba gideaba iissa ghoamilikghti eara siida nung' ahuuwa ging'ng'oonyanga ghana ghwanukghutaneegwa, ghana ghwanyagaadawaneegwa, ghana ghwayiineegwa heettiyeada, ghana ghwalas gheamamuunatkeagwa.
47011021	Aba baspaseegeasu, gaydayi, aseasa geewoschi ng'arng'ari aba ng'asheanji! Nea gidawassean ghwara geaw siida gaydaammu earaniini gaydaghwara geaw, geabalooldi siittasha, earaniini gaydaammu daghwara geaw gitta.
47011022	Saawa ea fuga Ebraniyahi? Earaniini geawoschi. Saawa fuga Israeeli? Earaniini geawoschi. Saawa jeatta Abrahaamu? Earaniini geawoschi.
47011023	Saawa soomjooga Gristohi? Gharaanyi aniini, geabalooldi siida geeska, biissa gaba gadiyeeda haw, gharaanyi muuchchi aba ghealooniga, bea bayiiga meammu eyiida, nea ghariikghti aba miyeeda galeagasean.
47011024	Aba heeda fuga Yahuudi naanyaschi bayiiga niba muut niaanyaschi bayi haradam shoada akkalealla.
47011025	Subwaranaan fuga Ruumi ng'aritka niba samwagu; ak ea sufuttewean lagheanga nubwagi. Ak ea ninyar maleambooda niba samwagu; ak geabiidi jeeda basooda eawa ea askweari;
47011026	aba bareannyeekkeasu bea galeagasean, iissa gwaramaknean guldeayda ghealooniga iissa geashageadi aba fuga areedi buuneeda haleanjeeda, ak geashageadi aba emeedeanya, ak geashageadi aba emoojiga, ak geashageadi aba mujiini, ak geashageadi aba dareapcheeda, ak geashageadi aba jeeda basooda, ak geashageadi aba fuga eaduupcheewi bea ng'uyyeega,
47011027	aba sawanadeeda ea deawiitmeeda, ea ging'weernooda galeagasean bea eawa, aba jalooda ea muwooshta, iissa ahoaghuut ea meandeawani hamitta, aba jeammeeda ea ng'ayinda hang'weakka.
47011028	Ea mabeachchi ng'asheesu, gwanda eara ng'asha suuk appadaydeanyu bea galeagasean, nea machmajooda ng'ullooda ganiisajeega seani.
47011029	Ak ea ng'eaha gil siida ng'arng'ar, ak amwang'arng'ariidi aniini? Ak ea ng'eaha siida sinung' ghoabeada, ak amwanyareasi aniini?
47011030	Imisean ghwaroodeaba geaw, gaydaghwara geaw haleanjeeda ahiimu ng'arng'arandeanyu.
47011031	Aseetta was Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu, ninnyeeda ghayi sibadiischeesa ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda, ghwanal gideaba mearukuni ng'uyyeega.
47011032	Abeeda aba hoowa bea Dameskiin sugoochcheanda mida hing'eadayda sugoochcheanda haw bea ng'eanyiida Aretta abeeda gafur mujiineeda Dameski ak abeeda ghoang'ng'waanyan,
47011033	ak gearrarang'dawaan sooscheanda ak gessiigan seawadeeda ghamarda, ak ghadaraamnyi geattingaaschi.
47012001	Asi gaydaghwar geaw; earappeadi manda gichchea danyagaadawa, ak gajeahhiimnaan nea geattahaach Ng'uttamiida.
47012002	Aniini ghaanalli siyagi aba jeeda Gristo nea aba jeemba gweannyeew damanang'wan geayaat ea ehhiitta humng'eedeaba samwagu, ada gwandeawa saseeda ghana ea mandeawana saseeda aniini mwaanali, ghwanal Aseetta.
47012003	Ak ghaanalli gideaba siisi geng'ng'ooysa Nyeamus, ada gwandeawa saseeda ghana ea mandeawana saseeda aniini mwaanali, ghwanal Aseetta,
47012004	ak gwandeawa haleanjeeda meammu eergu, biissa ea moommu siida rukunooda.
47012005	Appadaydeaba siisi gaydaghwar geaw ama duukku badaydeanyu ea mwammuusi daghwar geaw, geaghus appadayda ng'asheega ng'arng'arandeanyu.
47012006	Aba gideaba inyeeda ghwanyawa geagasayi daghwar geaw, gwachchi ea maydawos dasha, aba gideaba gaydargu ng'asheega huumwa. Iiduw ghang'ng'waanyi geaw, ak abeeda ea manda siida jea ghoapkaat gil appadaydeanyu ea ghang'al gitteaksa heedeanyu ghana gwayiing'sa heedeanyu.
47012007	Ak goheellewean ghwaroodeaba geaw aba seang'ayda dagheerjeandumeeda sittahaach, ak geegoonan aniini halaghweeneeda aba saseeda, giijasoochcheanda Shattaani, ak goodeawiidan, ak goheellewean ghwarjeeda.
47012008	Niba samwagu geamuschi Ng'uttamiida appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghang'amwanaan;
47012009	ak gwayeeshshinean niny, “Dagheerjeandumeedeanyu ghoahiinnyi, aba gideaba uurdeanyu iissa gamajeegiit aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda.” Ak gaydahoosan muuchchi iyaaghwari geaw ng'arng'arandeanyu, ak abeeda gobiida uurda Gristo badaydeanyu.
47012010	Appadayda Gristo, asi, naahiichchi aba ng'arng'aranda, ea giing'weakka, ea sawanaduutka, ea ghabasta, ea habitkwajeega; aba gideaba damanda eawosi ng'arng'ar, hean geawoschi majeek.
47012011	Nadashahiichchi! Ak ghoanung' agooga dasnu, ak gahaguuwan gideaba gajagwarsean agooga. Aba gideaba meawosi mwanang'eawa giijasoodiga suurja hees, earappeadi meawosi giliin.
47012012	Nea gwadeagwajeega giijasoochcheanda huumwa sisin aba jeedeang'wa aba milikghteayda sean, aba gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga ea gadiyoojiga hees.
47012013	Iiduw ea nishoadeewaneegwa naaha ea eemowuurjeewani ganiisajeega suurja, geaghus gideaba aniini miidasawaneegwa? Asamsean appadaydeaba ramaseanji!
47012014	Niih ghamneawa deaba samwagu nea geawoschi hidaat aba wunooda heedeang'wa. Ak ghanyea maydoaw sareenda, aba gideaba miidagasa haleanjeedeang'wa, ghaaghuschi gassoodeang'wa agooga; aba gideaba mammiissiina diibiga gideaba gaygoodiiwsheesa ghweaniga nyaawa, ea gheamadiga nyaawa, geaghus godiiwsheesa ghweaniga ea gheamadiga diibiga nyaawa.
47012015	Nea aba gideahoosandi aniini iyeagadiyeatti nea gegadiyeettanean, appadahuukka guroruunatkeagwa. Asi iyaabwariinyeegwa muuchchi, abeeda gajeabwariinyan gilimwanang'i?
47012016	Asi eanung'waada gwasnu, aniini miidasawaneegwa, geawoschi milmil, ak goyeenyi, ghawaamnyeegwa aba ghasooda.
47012017	Neada ea mwaanyagaadawaneegwa appadahuukka fuga eajeagu?
47012018	Ghayi geareekusi Ditto nea geayeeshshi una, ak geajeagu orjeetta bea giyeanyean sea niny. Neada Ditto ea ninyagaadawaneegwa aba gili? Neada aseasa ea meegadiyeattani Guroroodida? Neada ea meallabwaadani geeshangiga?
47012019	Ghoang'ng'wa apkaada gideaba geefurji geat aba heedeang'wa? Niih ammadeeda Aseetta geebaloolli aba jeeda Gristo, nea aba sean gedeegu bariinyeegeagwa, fuga abwariinyi.
47012020	Aba gideaba ghaawalli dahidu ak ea moowuurjeewani gideagassiidi dahidu nea goowuurjeewi, ak ea moahiimni nea geewuurjeewi gitta moogassiidaniin; ea gideaba gwadeeppa gwanda jaliida, geawunda gheang'da, ea nyarasta, shidoodeaba ghaang', giheakteayda, soomeanda baloolda, rengaweega ea deakghuyandeeda.
47012021	Aniini ghaawalli gideaba gajiiduw iyaawunnyi gichcha gayghwahiing'naan Aseetteanyu aba madeedeang'wa, ak abeeda geagiisannyi appadahuukka fuga saang'a ghayi sin ring'eeda ammwadiin ak ea miih gwaduukkuuna munyinda, ea munyinda, ea hiseadayeandumeeda ghayi sineadayyi.
47013001	Niih deaba samwagu gil aba wunooda awunnyi heedeang'wa. Gidinyeanda wassean gayghwadajiit aba ghuusispa mushoodi iyyeenya ghanea samwagu.
47013002	Asi geareekusi fukka ghayi sin ring'eeda ammwadiin sea buuneessean, ak ghamneawa geareekusi saawa earea meandani hiji, gawuurji gidaghayi easindi damanda eandeawi hiji aba hinnoodeanyu bea iyyeenya, bea gideaba iyaawunnyi gichcha ea maydaaghu saawa,
47013003	iiduw nea gogaseadayi asikteawana gideaba Gristo balool aba jeedeanyu. Niny miih ng'arng'ar aba heedeang'wa, niny gwandeawa uurda aba jeesingeagwa.
47013004	Aba gideaba niny ghayi gengoor aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda, ak gobiideewa uurda Aseetta. Nea gewoschi ng'arng'ari appadaydeaba niny, amaduw nea gagadiyeeseegwa gajendeayeena sea niny aba uurda Aseetta,
47013005	Asi asawsiina geat agooga, adaaha ea ghoang'ng'waanyi masaweegeagwa. Asma geat, agooga. Ghana moanali agooga gideaba Yeesu Gristo gwanda jeesingeagwa? Geaghus aba huumwa araanya gideaba gajeesmeegwa!
47013006	Ak ghaararji gideaba gajanala gideaba aseasa miyearaanya.
47013007	Iiduw geamoashchi Aseetta ea moosni ng'asheanda muy, miih gideaba geegasayi eadaheasa gideaba sismeasa gil, geegasayi asna ng'asheanda doabiiw, earappeadi suwuurjeewi aseasa fuga raay.
47013008	Aba gideaba meammuusi eesna ng'asheanda wassean yamuuji sea huumeanda, geaghus eesna ng'asheanda was huumeanda.
47013009	Aba gideaba geehoosannyi isuwoschi ng'arng'ari ak gondeawi agooga uurda. Gissumwaashchi Aseetta gideaba gagasa amajeegiitta.
47013010	Ghang'waarji barawajeanji nea geawoschi sheageewaneegwa, nea geabaysiini gideaba iyaawunnyi ea mwang'waaniidi aba uurdeanyu bea gheambalmeeda ghayi goonan Ng'uttamiida jea dadeekna nea miih dea nyarjeawda.
47013011	Aba huuydeanda, abeaha seayu fugeaduupcheewi. Asna naweadingeagwa, ayiinya gideargu, daba siisi mwas nuut, abeaha weayda, ak abeeda Aseetta mideawa bariinyeega ea weayda gaygoobiida heedeang'wa.
47013012	Okkatta geat aba samoodeaba geat ghaydit.
47013013	Ghoaghadeagwa fuga sean ghaydidi. Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ea bariinyeega Aseetta ea bareannyeeda Gurorooda Ghaydit gagasa andeawana oagasean.
48001001	Baulo giijasoochcheanda, nea maleapna heeda buuneeda ghana gwasku naweeda siida, gwasku heeda Yeesu Gristo ea heeda Aseetta was Ghweanda, ak gooduunna niny jeeda miyeeda,
48001002	ea oorjooga giyeanya sean eandeawi, Aba heeda ganiisajeega mida Galattiya:
48001003	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo,
48001004	nea gabeagu geaw aba riing'eagaasa ak gwalealnaneasa aba jeeda seaygean bea ghamneawa munyasiin, gawurji gidagasiida Aseetta was Ghweanda;
48001005	niny gwandeawa gigheambiitta ea ghoow damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
48001006	Aniini nihamwan ng'eanyi aba gidoobay anung'usiinda heeda dea ghayi guurneegwa aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda Gristo ak gooyamsi geat giijasta miy nuut,
48001007	miih gideaba gwanda giijasta miy nuut gil, iiduw gwanda fuga mwaatkwa adeawiideegwa nea gagasa ghoaschoorda giijasta miy bea Gristo.
48001008	Duukku aseasa ghana malaykajeanda humng'eeda, iirukneegwa giijasta wassean mawasa dea ghayi sirukuneegwa, gagasa eamwaashta.
48001009	Gawuurji gidagwachchi sibean eerukna, ak eara ghamneawa geergu gichcha, gideaba siida wassean irukuneegwa giijasta mawosa dea ghayi oadeapti, gagasa eamwaashta.
48001010	Neada goaghayi gili eagasayi dashiit buuneeda, ghana Aseetta? Ghana eegasayi deahoosan buuneeda? Asi iiduw deahoosani buuneeda, ea maydoaw soomjeanda Gristo.
48001011	Oorjoogiyya geagasay gideaba gajanala gideaba giijasta miy ghayi earukwiidi maleapna heeda buuneeda.
48001012	Aba gideaba mwaanyasani hichpa siih, ak ea moanalaan siih, gwaleabu naweeda giidaheachta Yeesu Gristo.
48001013	Agooga noayiinyi iitta ghayi bea giibindeanyu aba jeeda diineeda fuga Yahuudi gideaba geasawannyi muuchchi fuga Ganiiseeda Aseetta nea geagasayi dalas uhuuda;
48001014	ak geandi mwadi aba ng'asheega dineeda Yahuudi ea dadaraam fuga seaygeedeanyu aba jeeda buuneedeanyu, al geabiissi dawos ng'waan aba searoojiga ghweanigaasa.
48001015	Hean iiduw nea niloadaan Aseetta nea miyeejiilan, ak gaguurnean aba dagheerjeandumeadaannyi,
48001016	ak geanung' ghoahimnaan Balleandaannyi, ak abeeda geerukkwiidi aniini iittaannyi aba jeeda emoojiga, aniini mwaawunani saseeda ea foojeanda,
48001017	ghana dascheang'da dawa Yerusaleemu heeda oorjooga asheedeawean ghoaw giijasoodiga, aniini geawi ng'eanyiida Araabiya; ak geabiigu Dameski.
48001018	Ng'atta gweannyeew samwagu, geawi Yerusaleemu dabareessa Gefa, ak geabiidi gheannyi eawooji damwanamuut.
48001019	Ak ea manda giijasoocheanji naadaay nuut geaghus Yakkobo oorjeeda gheamatta Ng'uttamiida.
48001020	(Nea ng'asheega eang'oorneegwa, aba madeeda Aseetta miih ng'uyyeega gil!)
48001021	Iiduw geawi meatkwajeega ng'eanyiida Siriya ea Gilikkiya.
48001022	Nea abeeda ea miih ghwadaahan aba gheanyanga fuga Ganiisajeega Gristo mida Yudeeya;
48001023	Gabeachchi gideaba ghwayiiy iitta gideaba, “Siida ghayi sawaneasa ghamneawa gwarukwiida giijasta miy bea masaweegiga ghayi gasa ghwalas uhuudean.”
48001024	Hean geekghambiit Aseetta aba badaydeanyu.
48002001	Hean ng'atta gweanyeew damwana ang'wan geabiikti dascheeng'da gichcha dawa Yerusaleemu nea geadeayeewi Barnaba, ak eara Ditto geadeayeewi.
48002002	Hean ghascheang'di aba giidaheachta; ak ghayiinnyi madeennyaawa (ak ghayiinnyi aba makcheameeda madeedeaba fukka siiwwal gheanyangean) giijasta miy earukwiidi aba jeeda eemoojiga, amaduw ea mwafwaji ghana dafwach mwadaagha.
48002003	Ak eara Dittoyda eadeayeewi earappeadi siida emeeda Yunaani gil, ea miyeediing'sa eaditta giyyiilda.
48002004	Iiduw appadayda oorjoogiyya bea ng'uyyeega siyeanna makcheameeda, ahuudaan ak ghamwaal giibaldeanya bea geat aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, ak gagasa ghwaadeasa jeeda soomjeandumeeda,
48002005	dukku aseasa eameamwasi itta nyaawa eara gilimwanang, aba gideaba geegasayi goobiida heedeang'wa humeanda gijasta miy.
48002006	Nea ng'asheega leabu heeda fuga siiwwal gheanyangean nea geanung' ghoaw giliin (aba heedeanyu mwayamwa gil; aba gideaba Aseetta mashiitta buuneeda) fukka eayeennyi, fuga siiwwal gheanyangean manda gichchea gooheannean aniini;
48002007	hean iiduw gwajeeng'u saawa gideaba sugoonan darukkwiida giijasta miy aba heeda fuga meayada giyyiilda, gawuurji Betro gwarukkwiida giijasta miy aba heeda fuga siyaat siyyiil
48002008	(aba gideaba siitta gadiyi sea Betro aba gadiyeeda giyyiilean gagadiyi eara niny aba heedeanyu appadayda emoojiga),
48002009	iiduw nea ghwanyas dagheerjeandumeeda ghayi sugoonan, Yakkobo ea Geefa ea Yohaana, siiwwal gheanyangean, gagoonan sea Barnaba geattinda dugwa bea weechcheeda, bea gideaba gajeeweaya heeda fuga emoojiga nea gaweay saawa heeda fuga siyyiil;
48002010	ak goopkanneasa gideaba eepkaada fuga barbari, was gitta easawani aba gasooda sinoodean.
48002011	Iiduw nea ghwahidu Geefa ng'eanyiida Antiyokkiya, geawoowsi niny aba gideaba niny ghamiinaada nea niidiiyi.
48002012	Damandida miih ghapkaana fiisu ng'ay ajeagu Yakobo, abeeda goombuuchchi sea fuga emoojiga; ama iiduw nea ghapka hean ghwanung'waada gimbuchcheeda ak gabiikta bwadaw ak gooheeli geaw aba gideaba ghwoawal fuga siyyiil.
48002013	Ak eara fuga mwaatkwa bea Yahuudi ghwayamgeat sea niny, eara Barnaba iiduw ghwaat geeshta nyaawa aba gimmiinoodeaba geat.
48002014	Iiduw nea ghadaayi gideaba fukka madoobiiwsiina giijasta miy bea huumwa, geayeeshshi Gefa aba madeeda buuneessean, “Earappeadi uwosi siida Yahuudi, ak gibiideatti siida emoojiga nea muwuurjeewani siida Yahuudi, gayding'siindaan siida emoojiga gideaba gaygobiideatta siida Yahuudi?”
48002015	Aseasa, bean eewosa fuga Yahuudi aba jeatta ak ea meewasi fuga emoojiga bea ring'eega,
48002016	nea geanalli gideaba siida majeattaw doobiiwnatta aba sinnooda deaweeda, geaghus aba masaweega Yeesu Gristo, aseasa ghayi geamwaschi Gristo Yeesu ak abeeda geegoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba masaweega Gristo, nea miih aba sinooda deaweeda, aba gideaba aba sinooda deaweeda manda siida jea eattaw doobiiwnatta.
48002017	Ak aseasa isigakkiisi geat doobiiwnatta aba madeeda Gristo, geadaa gideaba geebea ring'a, heappi Gristo niiw siida gadiyeeda bea ring'eeda? Manda!
48002018	Aba gideaba iyaadeaschi gichcha ng'asheekka ghayi eanyarjiin, ghahiimu gideaba aniineessean geandeawi gidinyeanda.
48002019	Aba gideaba aniini aba naweeda deaweeda geameewsi deaweeda, ak abeeda geandeawi Aseetta.
48002020	Geengooran sea Gristo, ak geawoschi majeek ak ea miih aniini gil, Gristo eamajeek aba jeedeanyu, ak majeeknatta eandeawi ghamneawa aba saseeda, geandeewi aba masaweega Balleanda Aseetta, dea bwarinyan ak gabeagu eaweegaaschi aba badaydeanyu.
48002021	Meagassi daheawa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta; ak doobiiwnatta iisinyasa naweeda deaweeda, asi Gristo ghami mwadaagha.
48003001	Ea fuga Galattiya dasheahi! Goong'ushooneegwa ng'eaha, Yeesu Gristo geala bwadaw ak geengoor aba eeshpwara aba madeedeabeang'a?
48003002	Geagasayi danyaashta ng'asheanjagi, aba heedeang'wa, Heappi ghoanyaschi Gurorooda Ghaydit aba sinooda deaweeda, ghana aba gideaba ghooyiinyi aba masaweega?
48003003	Ak gowoschi dasheahhiidunu? Nea ghoang'ng'eachchi ghuutta sea Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak ghamneawa ghoahhiichchi aba saseeda?
48003004	Ghoanyaschi sawanadeeda haw sunu mwadaagha? Iimwadaagha gil ea huumwa.
48003005	Aseetta goneegwa Gurorooda Ghaydit, ak gwasin ng'asheega deamdeameadi aba jeedeang'wa, gwasin ng'asheesu aba sinooda deaweeda, ghana gideaba ghwayiiy aba masaweega?
48003006	Gawuurji gidaghayi, “Mwasta Abrahaamu Aseetta ak geenung' ghoaw doobiiwnatta.”
48003007	Asi anala gideaba fuga mideawa masaweega, suuh diibiga Abrahaamu gil.
48003008	Gabean gwargu Ng'ooruutka gideaba Aseetta gayghoadaw fuga emoojiga doobiiwnatta aba masaweega, Ak Giijasta Miy gabean gwaruksa Abrahaamu gideaba, “Gayghoadaw Aseetta ghawooda eemoojiga sean appdaydaang'u.”
48003009	Nea fukka mideawa masaweegean, gajeattaw ghawooda gawuurji Abrahaamooda mideawa masaweega.
48003010	Ak fukka sean sina ng'asheega deaweedean abeeda ea sumwashta; aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka, “Simwaashta gilinyooh ea siih gil mwaada geeshta ng'asheega sean sung'oorsa jeeda gittaabooda deaweeda.”
48003011	Asi ghamneawa adaach gideaba manda siida jea ghoodaw Aseetta doobiiwnatta aba naweeda deaweeda; aba gideaba, “Siittoabiiwaat gayghwanyas gibiinda aba masaweega;”
48003012	Ak deaweeda ea mwahinnana masaweega, duukku “Siida sina ng'asheesu gaygoobiida jeedeaba ng'asheesu.”
48003013	Gristo goottinnaneasa jeeda mooshteayda deaweeda, aba gideaba niny sumwaashta aba badahuukkaasa aba gideaba gwayi Ng'ooruutka, “Sumwaashta gilinyooh ea siih gil siratta aba uhuuda geetta,”
48003014	ak aba jeeda Gristo gayghwanyas emoojiga ghawooda Abrahaamu, ak abeeda geanyaschi helleesiinda Gurorooda Ghaydit aba masaweega.
48003015	Asi iyeagaligeat sea siida, oorjoogiyya: manda siichchea ghoammu gageanda neajeeni, ghana ghoahaat, iining'atta nea sisikteawa.
48003016	Asi heelleesiinda ghoadaw Aseetta Abrahaamu ea jeattaannyi. Ak ea mayi, “Ea jeachcheenga,” nea gwargu buuneessean; nea ghana gwargu akkalealla, “Ea jeattaang'u,” nea Gristoohi.
48003017	Niih gidanyaashchi: deaweedeeda, ghayi hidu iing'atta gweannyeew bughalaji ang'wan ea diktam ea damanamughuush, ea mwahinna neajeeda aba jeeda gweayda iinisikteawa Aseetta amaduw ghwanung' ghoaw heelleesiinda gidamwadaagha.
48003018	Aba gideaba hearaniischooda gweadu deaweeda, ak ea maygweadu heelleesiinda; amaduw ghoadaw Aseetta Abrahaamu aba heelleesiinda.
48003019	Abeeda deaweeda ghwasaan? Geegu aba gideaba geesin ng'asheega munyas, ea eeyi bwak ea ghwahidu jeattaannyi ghayi sibean eattaw heelleesiinda; ak ghoaw hawunda malaykajeega aba naweetta bea siida aduuptooschi suurjean..
48003020	Asi siida aduuptooschi meaduupchi siyagi ak Aseetta aagi.
48003021	Heappi deaweeda gwaheelli sea heelleesiinda Aseetta? Manda aba huumwa; aba gideaba inyeeda geegeanu deaweedeeda ammu ghoadaw buuneeda eaweega, gwachchi buuneeda gayghwanyas doobiiwnatta aba naweeda deaweeda.
48003022	Niih nibean gwargu Ng'ooruutka gideaba nijooriischi ring'eeda aba ng'eanyiisean geettaajiitunu aba gideaba fukka mwas Yeesu Gristohiin gayghwanyas heelleesiindida ghayi siruksean aba masaweega.
48003023	Damanda ghayi miih ghwahinna masaweega, abeeda geendi jeeda deaweeda, siratteasa ea ghwahidu masaweegiga jea eattaajiidiin.
48003024	Aba sareeni deaweeda gawuurji ashoohooda gweanneasa heeda Gristo, ak geenyaschi doobiiwnatta aba masaweega.
48003025	Ak daanihinna masaweega deaweeda eamudea ashoohooda gil;
48003026	aba gideaba aba jeeda Gristo noowoschi oagasean balloojiga Aseetta, aba naweeda masaweega.
48003027	Aba gideaba agoogeeda ghayi sippatttisaneegwa aba naweeda Gristo, aba sareani ea nookwealli Gristo.
48003028	Ak biissa ea maheelli siida Yahuudi ea siida Yunaani, ghana siida was ging'ng'oonyaneeda ghana dea abalgeaw. Ea manda ng'eedeeda ghana gatmooda; aba gideaba agooga noowaschi agi aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu.
48003029	Asi agooga iyoowoschi fuga Gristo, agooga earada gowoschi jeatta Abrahaamu, aba sareeni hearaniischooda deang'wa gil aba heelleesiindida.
48004001	Ak ng'asheanda jea darukuneegwa ea nihi, siida jea gwahearaniischi iiduw ea jeepta gil, amwang'alla ging'ng'oonyaneeda, earappeadi haleanjeesean gaaschi gil;
48004002	niny aba damani gwanda geattinga fuga sitteaga gadiyeeda ea fuga furiischi ea ghwahitta damandida ghayi rugu ghwaaniin.
48004003	Eara aseasa; ghayi nea geawaschi diibiga geewoschi ging'ng'oonyanga ak geegadiyeesi meang'nyeandeenda ambaliischi aba ng'eanyiida.
48004004	Iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda, hean goojeagu Aseetta Balleandaannyi, jiilu gatmooda, aba jeeda deaweeda,
48004005	ak goottin fukka mida jeeda naweeda deaweedean, ak geenung' eewosa balloojiga.
48004006	Iiduw inoawoschi balloojigaaschi hean goojeagu Aseetta Gurorooda Balleandaannyi jeesingaasa, ayeawda nea gwayeena, “Aba! nea gideaba Bwaabwa gil!”
48004007	Asi aba heeda Aseetta muduwosa ging'ng'oonyaneeda muwosi balleanda, ama muwosi balleanda abeeda eamuwoosi siida jea gwahearaniischi.
48004008	Ak aba damandida ghayi miih analana Aseettean, abeeda googadiyeesi fuga mawosa aseechcheekka.
48004009	nea ghamneawa iinoanalli Aseetta, ghana ghwanaleagwa Aseetta, gajabiiktaydaan bwadaw gichcha jeeda haleanjeeda ng'arng'ari was meangeenda, ak googasayi abiikta jeeda ging'ng'oonyaneandumeeda gichcha?
48004010	Agooga gong'ng'oonyayi eawoojiga ea sheega ea damanda ea gweannyeekka!
48004011	Aniini ghaabealli aba agooga ghaghanyi gideaba gadiyeeda easinnyi aba badahuukkeagwa niiw mwadaagha.
48004012	Oorjoogiyya, geamuscheegwa awuurjeewaneani, aba gideaba aniini geawuurjeewaneegwa. Ea manda gilmuy noosinean;
48004013	Ak ghamneawa ghoanalli gideaba aba munyinda saseeda gearukuneegwa giijasta miy dea madeeda;
48004014	ak earappeadi amyaannyi ea miih afoolean ghana aheawaan ak ghoadeaptaydanaan malaykajeanda Aseetta, gawurji Gristo Yeesu.
48004015	Gwandeenu abeeda ng'wanaweega oyeenniisi geat geendeawi? Aba gideaba geamuwwuneegwa gideaba aba damandida inyeeda ea gilijaaghamwas gil gajallootta gheanyangeagwa ak googoonnyean.
48004016	Heappi! Ghamneawa ea neawoschi weajoochcheandeang'wa aba gideaba gearukuneegwa huumeanda?
48004017	Fiisu gagasseegwa, ak ea magasseewaneegwa naweeda miy, saawa gagasa gwajapseegwa jarooda, ak abeeda agooga googasayi saawa.
48004018	Galagasean amiy gideaba geedeawiissa buuneeda suurja aba ng'asheega miyaas, ea miih gideaba damanda sindeayi gil gabeachchi.
48004019	Ea diibigeasu manang'i, geasawani muuchchi aba badahuukkeagwa, ea eeyibwak ea ghwadaajiit Gristo aba jeesingeagwa!
48004020	Gideaballi gwachchi geendeayi sea agooga ghamneawa ak ghwayamwa seareedeanyu, aba gideaba nung'udan muuwda appadahuukkeagwa.
48004021	Asi rukunean, ang'iing'eeda gasa gawa jeeda deaweeda, neada ea niyiinyi deaweeda?
48004022	Ghayi geang'waar gideaba Abrahaamu gwandeawa ballooji iyyeenya, agi gaba datmooda was ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niirja gaba gatmooda aabal geaw.
48004023	Nea balleanda ging'ng'oonyaneeda geejiilda gideajusu bea saseeda, ak balleanda gatmooda abal geaw geejiila heelleesiinda.
48004024	Asi niih giweaghanda gil: gadeemsu neajuut iyyeenya. Akkalealla gwaleabu Gijeeda Sinaayi, ak gwaji diibiga was ging'ng'oonyanga; nea Hagaari.
48004025	Aba gideaba Hagaari gawuurji gijeeda Sinayi mida ng'eanyiida Araabiya; ak gwandeawa iitteaba geat sea Yerusaleemooni bea ghamneaweani, aba gideaba gwanda jeeda ging'ng'ooyda sea diibigaaschi.
48004026	Ak mujineeda Yerusaleemeeda mida humng'eeda goobal geaw, ak niny ea iyya gil.
48004027	Geeng'waar aba jeeda ng'ooruut gideaba, “Hoosana ang'iing'eeda was sonooda nyajeat majiilla; ajuura muuchchi nea giyyeawdi ang'iing'eeda ghayi ninyasa sawanadeeda jeatta; aba gideaba diibiga gatmooda mandeawana siyeeda asaang'a ea ghang'al gatmooda mideawa siyeeda.”
48004028	Ak ghamneawa oorjoogiyya geewuurjeewi Isakka aba gideaba goowoschi diibiga heelleeda.
48004029	Ak aba damandida ghayi sijiilda gea eawoojusu bea gealaniin, inyeesa goodeawiit diita ghayi sijiilla Gurorooda, ak eara ghamneawa ea gidurji gil.
48004030	Ak gwayiin ng'ooruut? “Gwayi hoana ging'ng'oonyaneeda ea balleandaannyi; aba gideaba balleanda ging'ng'oonyaneeda maygwahearaniischi sea balleanda gatmooda abalgeaw.”
48004031	Asi oorjoogiyya, aba sareani aseasa meawasi diibiga ging'ng'oonyaneeda, geawaschi diibiga gatmooda abal geaw.
48005001	Aba giibaldeaba geat ninung' Gristo eeppala geat; asi amiinaada nea goomilmiliidayi, ak ea adagudoomwaschi gichcha gideaba gajeerassa gheatkweakkeagwa jokkeeda soomjeandumeeda.
48005002	Aniini Baulo gil, ak geayeeshshiineegwa iisiyyiileegwa abeeda Gristo ea maygwalooseegwa gil.
48005003	Ak geamuwwiisi ng'asheanji gichcha giliwas siih eyyiil gammiisa gideaba gayghoang'ng'waay deaweedajeega sean.
48005004	Asi silealneegwa aba Gristo, agoogeeda jea egooneegwa doobiiwnatta aba deaweeda; noappeadi ak gooritteawi jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda.
48005005	Aba gideaba aba gurorooda aba naweeda masaweega geammuughu gissirarji aba doobiiwnatta.
48005006	Aba gideaba siida iimiida jeeda Gristo Yeesu eyyiil ghana ea meeyyiila aba headaannyi miih gili, gidahaw masaweega mideawa bariinyeega gil.
48005007	Asi agalleadi muuchchi; ak ea ng'eaha weadaneegwa gideaba gajasissiina mureeda huumeanda?
48005008	Ghurghuri maleapna heeda siida ghayi guurneegwa.
48005009	Hamiireeda mwanang'i gayghwanung' ghaghuut geat murmurjeanda sean.
48005010	Aniini ghaaghuschi Ng'uttamiida ea gideaba mwajayamwana mwajadaakta ng'asheega gidadaakti aniini; nea siida adeawiideegwa agooga gayghwanyas girgweaksiindaannyi, siida wassean.
48005011	Ak earaniini oorjoogiyya iyearukwiidi ng'asheega giyyiilda, abeeda ghwasaan anda gudeesawanan? Abeeda aba hiji russooda beehiida ea sigeanda.
48005012	Aniini gideaballi fukka nung' ea mooppidi ng'eanyiin ghwalajaada geat!
48005013	Aba gideaba geeguurneegwa anyasa giibaldeaba geat, oorjoogiyya; ak ea adoanung' ghoaw giibaldeang'wa bea geat nyasitta gheatta ng'asheega gasa saseeda, nea aba bariinyeega ea daba siisi huuw soomjeamba nuut..
48005014	Aba gideaba deaweedajeega sean geemmajeek aba jeemba ng'asheanjagi, “Nea niih gil, bea gideaba, bwariyda gischeewoochchandaang'u gidibwariydi geaw.”
48005015	Asi iighanyaadi nea ghoanyeannyeahaadi geat gooshageachchi adagaba siisi ak nuut.
48005016	Asi geayeeshshineegwa, Aweayeena aba gurorooda nea ghanyea majaduulni haleanjeeda gasa saseeda.
48005017	Aba gideaba saseeda gagasa gitta magassa Guroroodean, ak eara Gurorooda gagasa gitta magassa saseedean; aba gideaba suuh gwasheang'nyi ak ea mwajoammuusa asna gidoogasayi.
48005018	Ak iyoonung' goobaleegwa Guroorooda maygoobaleegwa deaweeda.
48005019	Ak ng'asheega munyas sina saseeda aadaach nea suhu; hiseadayeandumeeda, ririinnyeanda, ng'asheega munyas,
48005020	mealuuleega, benetkweandumeeda, furjeeda, jaliida, geawunda gheangda, nyarasta, shidoodeaba ghaang', dardeayda, nabitta ng'uyyeega,
48005021	ng'ullooda siida aba gheang'da muy, booktuumeeda, leeshooda, ea ng'asheega uurji suuh. Neabean damiin gheang'deang'wa gawuurji gidaghayi eareekusiindi gideaba fuga sina ng'asheega sunu maygaweay jeeda Gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
48005022	Ak haghweega Gurorooda ea barinyeega, hooseaneega, hoyyooh, milighteayda, inyeanda jeeda, miyinda, ea doobiiwnatta,
48005023	Garbabanda, ging'ng'ooydeaba geaw, appadaydeaba ng'asheesu manda deaweeda.
48005024	Fukka was gea Yeesu Gristohiin ningoorda saseeda ea ng'asheagaaschi munyas bwariiy nea gagasa.
48005025	Iisippideewi gurorooda gagasa eweaya nea geandeawi gurorooda.
48005026	Adeegwaray geat mwadaagha, ak ea adeesadayi geat, nea adeeng'ulli geat gheanyanga munyas.
48006001	Oorjoogiyya, iyoadaayi siida nea niibitta jeeda ring'eeda asi agoogeani owoschi fuga guroroodean ootteelni siisi aba gurorooda garbabu. Fura geaw, ang'iing'i adiiduw geesimnyi.
48006002	Daba siisi sar sareemba nuut, daba siisi ahiit deaweedeeda Gristo.
48006003	Ak siida iiyeeshsha geaw guwosi gil, nea miih gili, adagwareengani geaw.
48006004	Ak daba siisi sawsa gadiyeadaannyi nea gabageaw, ak gayghwanyas gichchea ghaghwara geaw niny aba gadiyeadaannyi, nea miih hichpa siih nuut gil.
48006005	Aba gideaba gaygaba siisi sar sareandaannyi nea gabageaw.
48006006	Siida sinnaal ng'asheanda deabareannyi haleanjeeda miyaas sean siida annealshi.
48006007	Adereenganneegwa, Aseetta meereenganna, aba gideaba siida gayghwalach gidawassean ghayi hista.
48006008	Aba gideaba siida hista ng'asheega aba saseadannyiin, aba jeeda saseadaannyi gayghwalach munyinda; duukku siitta histeawa guroroodean, aba jeeda gurorooda gayghwalach eaweega manda mudeanooda.
48006009	Ak ea adeeburji aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas aba gideaba gajeelaja iihitta damanda imiyeepra.
48006010	Ak damani duu eendeawana gheattean esissiina buuneessean ng'asheega miyaas, ak ghwaraanya fukka mideawa masaweegean.
48006011	Ang'ulla ng'oorshooni gidang'waardi nea geaheettu ng'ooruutka ak geang'oorneegwa aba geattindeanyu aniini.
48006012	Suuh fukka gasa gideaba gayghoahiimu geediin gil jea gwadiing'seegwa giyyiilda, aba gideaba ea meesawana saawa aba beehiida Gristo.
48006013	Ak eara gea siyyiil, mwaada geeshta deaweeda, saawa gagasa gideaba gajeeyiileegwa, ak ghaghwar geat aba sasanuukkeagwa.
48006014	Ak aniini ea adaghwarji geaw aba gidawassean geaghus gigheambiitta beehiida Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, aba gideaba aba naweani bea beehiidean singoorsa ng'eanyiida heedeanyu, ak aniini singoorsean heeda ng'eanyiida.
48006015	Siida eayaat eyyiil ghanea meayaada miih gili, ghana dea miyeayaat eyyiil geegasa ghoaw siideesh.
48006016	Hoyyoo ea baydeayda gagasa ghwanyas fukka sean ang'ng'waay deaweedeeni, appadayda Israeeleeda Aseetta.
48006017	Gidang'eada ghamneawa adagoodeawiidan siih; aba gideaba aniini geandeawi girooraneeda Yeesu aba saseedeanyu.
48006018	Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo gagasa gobiida jeeda guroruunatkeagwa, oorjoogiyya. Amin.
49001001	Baulo, Giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu, aba gidagasiida Aseetta, Heeda fukghaydidi biissa ea doobiiweadi aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
49001002	Gagasa gagooneegwa Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooh Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
49001003	Ghawooda daba Aseetta ea Bwaabwa Ng'utaamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ghayi goaneasa ghawooda aba jeeda Gristo aba giliwas ghawooda gurorooda aba daroorakka humng'eedean,
49001004	iiduw nea ghwaloadeasa nea miyeabwat sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak geewoschi ghaydidi nea geawoschi fuga meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas aba madeadaannyi.
49001005	Niny ghwaloodeasa aba bariinyeega eahuwa balloojigaaschi aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo, aba gidagasiida niny,
49001006	aba duumsheesiinda gigheambiitta dagheerjeandumeeda gooneasa mwadaagha aba naweeda Balleandaannyi bwariiy.
49001007	Aba niny geendeawi ghuhooda aba foojeandaannyi, was samsiinda ring'eeda, aba gitteenna dagheerjeandumeadaannyi.
49001008	Ak gagooneasa ea ghwanawda.
49001009	Aba gideaba nideajiinneasa aba weaghuumeeda sean ea makcheameeda funyaat bea gitta gasean, aba gitta bada appadayda Gristo was gidagasa iihitta damandean,
49001010	ak goguuyi haleanjeessean aba niny, haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda ea gea mida badayda ng'eanyiida.
49001011	Aba niny, aba gitta gassiida ninyiin was dea ahiit haleanjeessean aba gitta gassiidean,
49001012	aseaseeda ghayi sibean earara Gristo amwadi sittoobiiweasa ak geegeanneasa eeppiidana nea geeduumsheesi gigheambiittaannyi.
49001013	Ak agooga aba jeedeaba niny noayiinyi ng'asheanda huumwa, nea giijasta miy bea lealeanoodeang'wa, ak ea noamwaschi niny, nea gorooreegwa heelleeda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
49001014	ak geasikteawi hearaniischoodeanya ea eeyi bwak ea eanyasa, ak geeduumsheesi giigheambiittaannyi.
49001015	Aba niih deaghayi nayiinyi aniini iitta masaweegeagwa aba badayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea gidoabwariiydi fuga ghaydidi sean,
49001016	ea miih danung'waada badiischeesiinda appadahuukkeagwa, inyeessa ghaapkaachcheagwa iyamwashchi Aseetta,
49001017	ak abeeda Aseetta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Bwaabwa gigheambiitta, gagasa gagooneegwa guroroadaannyi bea weaghuumeeda ea dea gidaheechta jea analana niny,
49001018	Gheanyanga mida jeesingeagwa gagasa eayyeat, ak ghoanalli rarooda gidaguurdeaydaneegwa giduurji, ea meanang'oochcheandumeadaannyi ea giigheambiitta hearaniischoodaannyi aba heeda fuga ghaydidi,
49001019	nea aba gitteanna hawunda uurdaannyi meammu eetteen aba heedeanya was fuga mideawa masaweega, aba gidagadiyeatta uurdaannyi haw
49001020	ghayi ahiit aba jeeda Gristo damanda aduunna jeeda miyeeda, ak ghwanung' goopteada aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa aba daroorakka humng'eeda,
49001021	hean goombal fuga ambaliischi sean ea gheambalmeeda ea uurda ea sugoochcheandumeeda, ak ghang'attaawa gheawunga sean ghayi sing'at, ak ea miih aba seaygeeni gil eara diitta jea ghwahiduun;
49001022	ak ghwayiin haleanjeesean hing'eadayda geeshangaaschi ak ghoadaw hawunda haleanjeessean appadayda ganiisa,
49001023	was saseadaannyi, nea hidoadaannyi gil was dea annyiit haleanjeessean aba jeeda haleanjeessean.
49002001	Ak gagooneegwa eaweega, nea abeeda ea noomeewayi aba gidinyeannyeekka ea ring'eega,
49002002	was gea ghayi oayaachchi geeshta nea goommaseawji seareetta bea ng'eanyiidean, nea ghoayaachchi geeshta sugoochcheanda mideawa uurda humng'eeda, gurorootta ghamneawa sin gadiyeeda aba jeeda balloojiga fuga manda mureedean.
49002003	aba suuh ghayi earaseasa sippiidi eesasean jeeda haleanjeeda gasa sasanuukkaasa, nea geayaachchi geeshta haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ea uhuuda, nea geebean eewosa diibiga nyarasta, ak geewuurjeewi fuga mwaatkwa.
49002004	Nea Aseetta baruur aba baydeayda, aba jeeda bariinyeegaaschi haw aba gidabwariiydaneasa,
49002005	earappeadi ghayi simeewayi aba gidinyeannyeekkaasaan, iiduw ghwanung' eduuttuuna sea Gristo, (aba dagheerjeandumeeda silealneegwa),
49002006	ak goodunneasa sea niny ak ghwanung eepiitpiida sea niny aba jeeda ng'eanyiida guroorooda, aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
49002007	nea aba seaygoojiga jea ghwahidu gwadeeppa ghoahiimu meanang'oochcheandumeeda meammu eetteen aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi aba innyeanda jeeda aba heedeanya aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
49002008	Aba dagheerjeandumeeda silealneegwa aba naweeda masaweega; ea masna milmilandeang'wa osinnyi, niih gagu Aseetta,
49002009	ak ea miih gisin siida, asi gilinyooh ea siih gil adaghaghwar geaw.
49002010	Aba gideaba aseasa geawaschi gadiyeadaannyi, gwasinneasa naweeda Gristo Yeesu, aba gadiyoojiga miyaas, ghayi bean gwasin Aseetta ammwadi, gideaba eyaada geeshta.
49002011	Asi oapkaada gideaba ghayi agooga goowaschi fuga emoojiga aba saseeda, ak geegureewaneegwa fuga miih eyyiil aba gissuguura giyyiilda, sisissa saseeda aba geattinda,
49002012	oapkaada gideaba eara agooga aba damandida sihheellaneegwa sea Gristo, ak geehheelaneegwa sea emeeda Israeeli, ak goowoschi rabasta neajeeda heelleessiindida, ak ea mondeawani gidoararji nea manda Aseetta jeeda ng'eanyiida.
49002013	Ak ghamneawa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu agoogeeni ghayi owaschi sheagiin ea sinnekkideegwa aba foojeanda Gristo.
