49002014	Aba gideaba niny hoyyooydeanya, nung' eahuwa easasean agi, ak gwanyarja ghamarda beashooda bea furjeeda,
49002015	iiduw nea ghoahiit geandeayda deaweeda aba saseadaannyi aba digheannyeekka ea huumeannyeekka, ak abeeda gwasin siideesh nea gaba geaw ghoaghiisa gea assiyyeenya, ak gwasin hoyyooh,
49002016	hean gooduumpcheeweasa easasean Aseetta aba saseanagi aba naweeda beehiida, ak gwaduulu furjeeda.
49002017	Ak ghwahidu ak gwarukkwiida hoyyooh aba heedeang'wa agoogeeni sheagiin ea hoyyooh aba heeda fuga neekki;
49002018	aba niny aseaseen seaniin simmuuschi eeneekkiisiinana Bwaabwa aba guroroonagi.
49002019	Asi ghang'eeda ghamneawa agooga moowoosi rasbasta ghana fuga ng'atta, goowooschi fuga bea ng'eanyiida sea fuga ghaydidi bissa awosa fuga gheeda Aseetta,
49002020	sideeksa badayda sindeatta ghayi bea giijasoodiga ea subanga, ak Gristo niny ea lagheaneeda haw washiini,
49002021	niny ghwasar gheassean, ak googuuyi ak ghoaw gheessibatta Aseetta ghaydit bea Ng'uttamiida;
49002022	aba niny eara agooga geedeekseegwa jeedeaba niny ghoaw heechchea goobiida Aseetta aba jeeda Gurorooda.
49003001	Aba sareani aniini Baulo, was siida ghealooniga Gristo Yeesu aba badahuukkeagwa agooga fuga emoojiga,
49003002	ama deeppea noayiinyi iitta sitteaganean bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta ghayi sugoonan appadahuukkeagwa,
49003003	gidanung' danalda makcheameeda aba giidaheachta gawuurji gidang'waardi nea ghanuwasichi.
49003004	Ak iyoassoomi ng'asheesu ang'waarjiin, abeeda gajajeeng'ni gidaanaldi gili funyaat bea Gristohiin,
49003005	ak ea meanung' ghwanal balloojiga buuneeda aba seaygoojiga suurja gawuurji gidaghamneawa sittaheachsiinda giijasoodigaaschi ghaydidi ea sibanga aba naweeda Gurorooda;
49003006	nea gideaba, fuga emoojiga fuga jea gwahearaniischi gil ea aseasa aba hearaniischoonagi, nea gaba saseanagi, nea geeguuyeesi heelleesindaannyi mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu aba naweeda Giijasta Miy.
49003007	Appadaydeaba giijasi miyiin geanung' doaw siida gadiyeeda gawuurji gidagoondanean Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda ghayi sugoonan aniini aba uurda sin gadiyeadaannyi.
49003008	Aba aniini, earappeadi eawoschi mwanang'eawa fuga sean ghaydidin, abeeda geegu dagheerjeandumeani, ak gearukkwiiisi fuga emoojiga meanang'oochcheandumeeda meesikkideawana bea Gristo,
49003009	ak ghwanung' ghwadaah buuneeda sean badiida makcheameeda ghayi sufuy aba gweannyeekka aba heeda Aseetta sin haleanjeessean;
49003010	ak aba naweeda ganiisa abeeda weaghumeeda Aseetta meammu ettean abeeda ghwanal sugoodiga ea gheambalmeeda aba jeeda daroorakka humng'eeda.
49003011	Ng'asheanji gwasin nea gabaysiina gidagassiida maygammudean jeeng'u Gristo Yeesuuyda was Ng'uttamiideanyean,
49003012	nea aba niny geendeawi dargooda nea geammuughu beatta aba masaweegaasa aba jeedeaba niny.
49003013	Asi geamuscheegwa adagabur iheengeagwa aba sawanaduutkkeasu aba badahuukkeagwa, was giigheambiitteang'wa.
49003014	Ak aba sareani geatkunyi aba madeeda Bwaabwa,
49003015	was gumdooda gealga sean bea ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda ak geguushteawa,
49003016	hean abeeda aba gitteenna meanang'oocheandumeeda gigheambiittaannyi gwadeeppa gagooneegwa gimajeekta ea uurda aba naweeda Guroroadaannyi aba siideaba jih,
49003017	nea goobiida Gristo jeesingeagwa aba naweeda masaweega, ak geng'eapseegwa jeeda bariinyeega,
49003018	hean abeeda ghwanyas uurda jea goobareannyi sea fuga ghaydidi sean gitteenna baraknatta ea geawunda ea geawunda humng'eeda ea gidayang'da sheaginda jeeda,
49003019	nea ghoonalli bariinyeega Gristo ng'al fughareenga, ak abeeda geanyiideagwa hidooda sean bea Aseetta.
49003020	Asi aba ninnyeeda mideawa uurda gadiyi aba jeesingaasa ghoammu gwasin ng'asheega saang'a ea ghang'al haleanjeeda sumuschi ea gea siipkaachchi,
49003021	daba niny gigheambiitta aba jeeda ganiisa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu ea ghoaw jeachcheenga sean ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
49004001	Asi aniini, geawoschi siida ghealooniga appadayda Ng'uttamiida, geamuscheegwa gideaba oattoabiiwa eaweega deaschi sea gurnooda ghayi suguurneegwa,
49004002	nea gooyeadayi geat ng'eanyi ak goowooschi garbappi, nea ghoahhang'waannyi nea goomilikkideaysi geat aba bariinyeega,
49004003	agassa gideaba gajaguyeena aba Gurorooda nea gearadaneagwa hoyyooh.
49004004	Saseeda aagi, ea Guroroonagi, gidaghayi siguursiindaneegwa,
49004005	Ng'uttamiinagi, masaweega ea agi, giibattiisanda aagi,
49004006	Aseetta aagi was Ghweandeanya easassean, ak ghang'attaawa sean ak gagadiiyi aba jeedeaba sean ak gwanda jeeda buuneessean.
49004007	Nea dagheerjeandumeeda gaba siisi siittaw aba aseesa aba gitteenna gidaguh Gristo.
49004008	Hean geeyi, “Iiduw nea gwadiyeada ea gawa humng'eeda heeshsheagi godeayi fuga ng'utta, ak ghoadaw buuneeda haleanjeeda.”
49004009	(Aba rukunooni ayi, “Gwadiyeada,” gideabeadaannyi naaha ii miih gideaba earada ghwararang'an ea ghwahidu heeda hiing'aada aba jeeda ng'eanyiida.
49004010	Dea ghayi rarang'aan dea earada diyeada gwasheagiit ea ghwalaabwa hoowa humng'eeda seani, ak abeeda ghoannyiit haleanjeesean.)
49004011	Hean gageanu mwaatkwa ghoaw giijasoodiga, nea mwaatkwa ghoaw sibanga, nea mwaatkwa ghoaw fuga jea gwarukkwiida giijaasta miy, mwaatkwa ghoaw haghweadoodiga ea ginealshoodiga,
49004012	ak ghoadaw fuga ghaydidi uurda jea gwasna gadiyeeda Aseetta ak geemajeek saseeda Gristo,
49004013	ea eeyi bwak ea eanyasa masaweega siguuyeesi ea fughareeda Balleanda Aseetta ak geehittiisi heeda eahuwa headiga, aba gideenda gitteenna hidooda Gristo;
49004014	aba gideaba adeebiikti gichcha eahuuwa diibiga, ak geejakseasa hoowa ea hoowa, nea ghwadeasa gilinyooh ea jeammeeda bea ginealshooda fughareenga, aba milmilanda buuneeda ea seechmeeda nea geayaachchi naweedinga reengani buuneeda.
49004015	Asi, eang'ng'waanya humeanda aba barinyeega nea geeheettu ea eahitta heedeaba niny aba haleanjeesean, ninnyeeda was uhuuda aba jeeda Gristo,
49004016	niny googuuyi saseessean ak ghwanung' ghoang'ng'waay geat robuutka, ak ghoadaw gilinyooh ea roobadeeda gil gichchea gwasinda gadiyeadaannyi muuchchi ak aba sareani gwaheedu saseessean nea ghwadeas geaw aba barinyeega.
49004017	Asi gearukneegwa ng'asheanji, aba appadayda Ng'uttamiida, gideaba adoappideatti gidabiideatta fuga emooji, saawa gootteemsheesa ng'asheega mwadaagha mwahida.
49004018	ak fughareenga nyaawa ea sunung' gamisaniidi, ak ea sihheelli sea eaweega Aseetta, aba leendeeda mida jeanyaawa nea gwasin hang'ooynachcheekka jeesinga nyaawa;
49004019	Iiduw nea nideang'suusi ghoobutta geat jeeda ririnnyeanda ak abeeda gwasin gilinyooh ea ng'asheega munyas gil.
49004020	Ak agooga ea miih gissinnaaldaneegwa appadayda Gristohi.
49004021	abeeda ghayi iyoayiinyi ak geannaleagwa appadaydaannyi, humeanda mida jeeda Yeesu.
49004022	Oappuuda searoojigeagwa bea garayi bea giibinda biissa eamuy aba haleanjeeda sigaseadayyi reengani fiih,
49004023	asna geat gaweeriidi guroruunatgeagwa ea giitteemshoodeang'wa.
49004024	Ak daba siisi mideawa guroroodeesh, sisin gawurji Aseetta aba doobiiwnatta huumwa ea ghaydiidanda.
49004025	Asi anung'waada ng'uyyeega, daba siisi abaloola gischeewochcheandaannyi humeanda, aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi fuga weechchi.
49004026	Anyareasa ak ea adiidu goosinnyi ring'eeda; ak ea adagamikta nea gudawosa nyareeseadi,
49004027	ak eadoottawji meang'nyeandeenda gheatta.
49004028	Mareanghweanda danung'waada gwadishta, dang'eada ghuutta gadiyeeda miy aba geattingaaschi, ak ghwanyas gichchea ghoadaw fukka gassean.
49004029	Adagwarinna ghuusigeagwa ng'asheega munyas, inyeessa goobalooli gaamiyaas jea ghaweat gilinyooh ea siida gil, ak ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga aleeyseegwa iit.
49004030	Ak ea adoong'udi gurheamiida Gurorooda Ghaydit bea Aseetta, aba headaannyi sirrooreegwa aba eaweeda ghuhooda.
49004031	Asi ageandeana geat ng'asheega sean ng'weani was mukkunooda ea nyarasta ea gijuureanda ea nappooda ng'uyyeega nea gooshsheagiidi geat gea munyas sean,
49004032	asi awosa innyeani jeesin aba heeda buuneeda suurja, bayyiida buuneeda, sammiisa geat, gawuurji gidasamsiindaneegwa Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo.
49005001	Asi ayaada geeshta Aseetta awuurjeewana diibiga subwariiy.
49005002	Ak ghoabeawi barinyeega, gawuurji gidabwariiydaneasa Gristo ak ghoadayda geaw appadahuukkaasa, ak ghoaw haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda ng'andit aba heeda Aseetta.
49005003	Nea hiseadayeandumeeda ea ng'asheega munyas sean ghana gassooda ng'asheega munyas adiiduw geyiingsa jeedeang'wa, aba gideaba niih ghwahit aba jeeda fuga ghaydidi.
49005004	Ak ea adiiduw geyiing'sa heedeaeng'wa ng'asheega baspaseega ea gea leendeeda ghana nyootta mureeda.
49005005	Agooga ghoanalli ng'asheanji gideaba siida hiseada ghana dea sina ng'asheega munyas ghana dea gaseadayyi haleanjeeda ea dea (bada gidamwadaagha ghwanung' ghoaw Aseettaannyi) manda dea jea gwahearan gheambalmeeda Gristo ea Aseetta.
49005006	Adagwareenganeegwa siih aba ng'asheega mwadaagha, aba gideaba ng'asheega uurji suh, gayghwahidu nyarasta Aseetta badahuukka balloojiga manda mureeda.
49005007	Asi adiiduw goobareannyeewi saawa,
49005008	aba gideaba ghayi agooga gowoschi misaneeda, ak ghamneawa gowoschi weeshinda aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida; asi abeada diibiga weeshinda
49005009	(aba gideaba haghweeega weeshinda geenyassa jeeda haleanjeessean miyaas ea doobiiwnatta ea huumwa),
49005010	nea ghoang'ng'eachchi nalooda gidabwariiy Ng'uttamiida.
49005011	Iissa ea adoosinnyi gadiyoojiga manda haghweega bea misaneeda iissa ghang'wana ghoanung'waadi.
49005012	Aba gideaba gaba baspaseega rukunooda ng'asheega sisin aba makcheameeda;
49005013	nea gidawassean iisunung' ghwadaajiit aba heedeesh abeeda gajeadaah, aba gideaba gidawassean sidaah weeshinda.
49005014	Hean ghoaw gidasirukuna ng'asheanji bea gideaba, “Ng'eada ang'iing'eeda ing'utti ghaat, duunana heeda fuga nimeewa, ak Gristo gaygagoonnyi weeshinda.”
49005015	Ang'ulla muuchchi aba gidoabeadi, adoowuurjeewi fuga manda fughareenga, awuurjeewana gea mida fughareenga,
49005016	ak googadiyeatti muuchchi damani ondeawiin aba gideaba askwearjoojusu gea munyas gil.
49005017	Aba sareani adoowaschi dasheahi, gagasa anala gideaba Ng'uttamiida gagasa naaha jea asna.
49005018	Asi adooboogidayi aba difaayeeda jea gahutteawweegwa; ghang'wana geannyideagwa Gurorooda Ghaydit.
49005019	Oppaloolana geat ng'asheega nyiigheega ea duumjeenga guuskuseega ea sarmoojiga gurorooda, asarmasiina Ng'uttamiida nea ghoammiidu daghanuunatkeagwa aba jeesingeagwa sean,
49005020	nea goobadischeesi Aseetta was Bwaabwa galagasean aba ng'asheega sean aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
49005021	Asinisiina geat mureeda gawuurji gidoosinnisiindi Gristo mureeda.
49005022	Gadeemga, asinnisiina siyeenatkeagwa mureeda gawuurji gidoosinnisiindi Ng'uttamiida.
49005023	Aba gideaba siyeeda goombal gatmoodaannyi, gawurji gidambalda Gristo ganiisa, nea niny ea lealnoochcheandaannyi gil.
49005024	Gawuurji gidasinnisiinda ganiisa Gristo mureeda, asi eara gadeemga dasisiina siyeenatka nyaawa mureeda aba haleanjeesean.
49005025	Siyeenatka, abwariinya gadeemgeagwa, gawuurji gidabwariyda Gristo ganiisa ak gabeagu geaw appadaydaannyi,
49005026	ak abeeda gabaysiina gimminoadaannyi nea goohuun aba beega ea ng'asheanda.
49005027	Abeeda gwanyaksa geaw ganiiseeda ghambiidaat, mandeawana munyinda, ghana ng'asheega munyas sean, ak ea ghaydit biissa ea meerukunana badayda munyinda.
49005028	Ak eara headiga gamiisa gideaba gayghabwariiyda gadeemga nyaawa gidabwariyda saseenukka nyaawa. Siida bwariy gatmoodaannyi eara niny ghabwariy geaw.
49005029	Aba gideaba manda siida sit saseadaannyi, inyeesa ghoarear nea gookwealsheesa, gawuurji gidahinniida Gristo ganiisa,
49005030	aba gideaba aseasa geewaschi roobuutka saseadaannyi.
49005031	“Aba seareani ng'eedeeda gaygwanung'sa heeda ghwaan ea ghaamwat ak gwandeayi sea gatmoodaannyi, ak fiisu assiyeenyean gayghoaw saseanagi.”
49005032	Makcheameeni funyaadiin ahaw ak aniini geabalooli badayda Gristo ea ganiisa;
49005033	ak daba siisi bwariyda gatmoodaannyi saseadaannyi, ak gatmooda ea dasissiina siyeedaannyi mureeda.
49006001	Diibiga, asissiina mureeda ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba ng'asheanji ghwadoabiiw.
49006002	“Sissiina gweanu mureeda ea geamadu” (diigheanji niih digheanda madeeda gil mideawa heelleeda),
49006003	“Ak ginyasi ng'wanooda nea gibiidi gweannyeeka saang'a jeeda ng'eanyiida.”
49006004	Ghweaniga, adoonnyareesayi diibigeagwa, oarreara nea ghoanung' ghwanyas mureeda ea ginealshooda Ng'uttamiida.
49006005	Soomjooga, asissiina mureeda fugeagwa hees bea ng'eanyiida, aba muuwda nea ghoabwaadannyi, ea doobiiwnatta gurorooda, gawurji giloosissi Gristo;
49006006	nea miih gideaba googadiyeesi aba gheanyanga gil akghwahit, gawuurji fuga ahoosan buuneeda, gagasa gawuurji soomjooga Gristo, nea goosinnyi ng'asheega bwariiy Aseetta leabu jiih,
49006007	asna gadiyeedeang'wa nea goobeayi jeesinga miyaas aba gideaba googadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida miih siida gil,
49006008	nea ghoanalli gideaba gidamiy wassean sin siida, gaygabiikta ghwanyas gichcha aba heeda Ng'uttamiida, ea ging'ng'oonyaneeda gil ghanea siida abalgeawi.
49006009	Fuga hees, asissiina ng'asheega sunu saawa, nea ghoanung'waadi gimuuwda, nea ghoanalli gideaba dea was siida nyaawa haw ea deang'wa gwanda humng'eeda, ea gideaba headaannyi manda shiitmeeda.
49006010	Aba huuydeanda awoosa majeekcheewi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida ea aba gimmuusta ea uurdaannyi.
49006011	Oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda sean bea Aseetta ak gajoammuusa otteala ng'asheega rengaweega bea meang'nyeandeenda.
49006012	Aba gideaba ng'uchcheedeanya maba saseeda ea foojeanda gaba badayda sugoochcheandumeeda ea gheambalmeeda appadayda fuga ambaliischi bea jeedeaba misaneani, appadayda shirikkareeda meangeenda munyas aba jeeda daroorakka humng'eeda.
49006013	Asi aba sareani oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda sean bea Aseetta, ak abeeda gajoammuusa ang'uchcheena damandida bea ng'asheega munyasiin, abeeda iyoahhiichchi ghoamiinaadi.
49006014	Asi amiinaada, nea radeadi mananunatkeagwa aba huumeanda, ak gookkwealli nea goodiinyi igeambooda ng'uchcheeda doabiiwaat aba daghanunatkeagwa,
49006015	ak gidoogassiidi rukkwiideayda Gijasta Miy bea hoyyooyda anung' gawurji geekka aba geeshangeagwa;
49006016	appadaydeaba suuh seaniin, oang'waanya igeambooda masaweega, ak abeeda gajoammuusa ahiirjeaweeda geatka sean bea furgweega bea diitta muyiin.
49006017	Ak ghoang'ng'waanyi nngoofajeanda hang'way bea lealeenooda, ea bwangeeda Gurorooda was ng'asheega Aseetta.
49006018	Amwaasha Aseetta damannyoojiga sean aba jeeda Gurorooda aba mooshta sean bea Aseetta ea baditta. Ak ghoang'ng'wearu nea ghoashng'u aba baditta Aseetta appdahuukka fuga ghaydidi sean,
49006019	ak gwasnu earaba heedeanyu, ak abeeda ghammuuschi darukuta iyajaachchi ghuutteanyu ak gearukuti makcheameeda funyaat bea giijasta miy,
49006020	Ak aniini geawoschi siida sichcheagu ak geandi ghealooniga; asi amwaasha Aseetta appadaydeanyu dammu darukta giijasta miy ghabeada gidamiisean rukuteayda.
49006021	Asi agooga iyoogasayi anala gideawurjeewi ea gideasinnyi, gaygwarukuneegwa Dikikoyda abwariinyi was oorjeediyya ak gabiissa ea siida doabiiwaat gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida niny gaygwarukuneegwa haleanjeessean.
49006022	Ak ea neajeagu niny heedeang'wa appadaydeaba ng'asheesu, ak ghoanalli gissuwuurjeewi, nea goomajeek jeesingeagwa.
49006023	Gagasa ghwanyas oorjoogiyya hoyyooh ea bariinyeega ea masaweega leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
49006024	Gagasa gagooneegwa Aseetta dagheerjeandumeeda sea fuga sean bwariiy Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, appariinyeega manda mudeanooda.
50001001	Baulo ea Dimotteo, was soomjooga Gristo Yeesu, heeda fuga ghaydidi sean mida naweeda Gristo Yeesu, mida ng'eanyiida Filippi, sea jeagiischoodiga Ganiisa sea weedanga Ganiisa.
50001002	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo
50001003	Aniini inyeesa geabadischeesi Aseetteanyu iyapkaachcheagwa,
50001004	inyeesa galeagasean iyaamwaaschi Aseetta, hean ghaamwashchi appadahuukkeagwa aba hooseaneega,
50001005	geabadiischoweegwa aba guyeedeang'wa aba giijasta miy siguuyeesi ghang'eada mwadi ea ghoaw ghamneawa.
50001006	Ak geasikteawi siitta ang'eat gadiyeeda miy aba jeedeang'wean gayghoahiit aba eaweeda Yeesu Gristo.
50001007	Asi ghwadoabiiw aba heedeanyu gideaba gaydahiit suuh appadahuukkeagwa oagasean, aba gideaba neang'ng'ooyseegwa jeedeanyu, aba gideaba gowoschi oagasean fuga eaweechcheewi aba dagheerjeandumeeda, aba jeeda ghealoonigeasu ea aba furooda aba giimajeekta giijasta miy.
50001008	Aba gideaba Aseetta muushoochcheandeanyu gil, aba gideagassiidi deatteang'wa oagasean, aba bariinyeekka leabu heeda Gristo Yeesuun.
50001009	Nea niih ea mooshteanyu bea Aseetta gideaba gwaheedu bariinyeegeagwa muuchchi aba fughareeda haleanjeeda ea weaghumeeda sean,
50001010	hean abeeda goosikteawi gida hidaat, ak ghammiidu nea meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas aba eaweeda Gristo,
50001011	nea sinnyiideagwa haghweega doobiiwnatta leabu naweeda Yeesu Gristo, aba gigheambiitta nea geduumsheesa Aseetta.
50001012	Asi oorjoogiyya geagasayi anala gideaba sawanaduutka sean ghayi anyaschi, iiduw ghwanung' gawa giijasta miy mwadi,
50001013	ak ghamneawa ea sinalli aba heeda furiischoodiga sean ea heeda buuneessean gideaba ghealoonigeasu gaba badayda Gristo;
50001014	nea oorjooga saang'a bea giyeanya ea sunung' ghamwas Ng'uttamiida aba ghealoonigeasu, ak ea ninyas muraneandumeeda muuchchi ak gwarukwiida ng'asheanda Aseetta nea mwabeala.
50001015	Aba huumwa gwanda fuga inyeesa gwarukwiida iitta Gristo aba lajoodeaba ghuut ea foolayda, nea suuk gearukwiida aba gidamiy sigasa.
50001016	Iiduw gwarukkwiida aba barinyeega, nea ghoanalli gideaba aniini geayiinan hiji daweat giijasta miy;
50001017	nea fuga madeeda gwarukwiida iitta Gristo nea meamajeega, nea marukta aba jeeda eesh, nea ghaghay gideaba gayghoahaat sawanadeedeanyu aba ghealoonigeasu.
50001018	Ak ea naaha? Aba giliwas nawa, ea gaba ng'uyyeega, ghanea aba huumwa, Gristo geerukkwiida; ak geahoosannyi appadaydeaba ng'asheanji.
50001019	Eah, gaydahoosan. Aba gideaba ghaanalli aba jeeda mooshteang'wa bea Aseetta nea ghaweadeagwa Gurorooda Yeesu Gristo ng'asheesu gayghwayamwa iisittaydanaan,
50001020	ak ea gidaararji gil gideaba ghaaghuschi muuchchi ak ea maydabwaspwas earahay, ak geawoschi majeek gawuurji gideabeawoojusu ak ghamneawa gwasnu Gristo gajeesissa mureeda appadaydeanyu, inameayi ghana iduudanda.
50001021	Aba heedeanyu giibinda Gristoohi, nea miyeeda ea nyasooda.
50001022	Nea iimida eaweega jeeda saseeda, abeeda aba heedeanyu ea haghweega gadiyeeda gil. Nea gitta jea dalloadiin ea mwaanali.
50001023	Geaminighisan aba dageascheemba ng'ashiyyeenya. Geagasayi dawa dandeayi sea Gristo, aba gideaba gidang'wana gil.
50001024	Amaduw amiy muuchchi iyeabiidi aba saseeda appadahuukkeagwa.
50001025	Iyaghuschi suuh, ghaanalli gideaba gaydashng'u sea agooga oagasean, nea gooweayi mwadi nea gohoosannyi aba masaweega,
50001026	nea aba jeedeanyu gajanyasa gigheambiitta haw aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, aba hinnoodeanyu bea heedeang'wa gichcha.
50001027	Anung' ghoaw searoojigeang'wa bea eaweega gweatteayyi sea giijasta miy bea Gristo, ama iyaawunnyi dadaheagwa ak ghadayeagwa ghana ea meandani, geagasayi dayiiy appadahuukkeagwa gideaba ghoamiinaadi muuchchi aba jeemba guroroonagi, nea goobeayi fughareanagi nea goong'alealleesi masaweega giijasta miy,
50001028	Nea moawwali weajoodigeagwa aba ng'asheanda wassean. Aba gideaba aba heennyaawa suuh gwadeagooda majeek bea nyariida, nea aba heedeang'wa ea gwadeagooda lealeanoodeang'wa, ea gideaba gwaleabu heeda Aseetta.
50001029	Aba gideaba agooga geegooneegwa gheatta appadayda Gristo jea agadiyeesiina, ea mabeachchi masaweega gwanda eara gideaba gajeesawaneegwa appadaydaannyi,
50001030	ak goondeawi ng'uchcheeda ghayi oodeaksi heedeanyuun, ak gooying'si heedeanyu gideaba geandeawi eara ghamneawean ghoadaayi gideaba guttanda jeeda.
50002001	Nea iimida gimajeekta jeeda Gristo, ghana gichchea goomajeek bariinyeega, ghana gidasuguyeesa aba jeeda Gurorooda, ghana iimida bariinyeega ghana baydeayda,
50002002	oahhiida hooseaneegeasu nea gobeayi fughareanagi, nea gawuurji bariinyeegeagwa, nea ghoang'ng'waay geat ng'asheegeagwa, nea gobeayi fughareanagi.
50002003	Adisni ng'asheanda aba shidoodeaba ghaang' ghana aba ghwarjeeda, sina aba eatteaba geaw bea ng'eanyi nea ginung' ghoaw buuneeda suurja fuga miyaas ea ghang'alleagwa.
50002004	Adagaba siisi ng'ula gidagasa niny akghwahit, daba siisi ng'ula gidagasa buneesuurja.
50002005	Andeawana ng'asheesu aba jeesingeagwa, ghayi ondeawi aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
50002006	earappeadi niny ghayi uurji sea Aseetta, ea mwanung' ghoaw gil uurjeatta bea Aseettean ak ghoaw gichchea ghoang'ng'waay.
50002007	Ak gwahinda geaw siida mandeawana gil, nea gawuurji sea soomjeanda, ak geeji nea gawuurji buuneeda.
50002008	Iiduw nea geadaah nea gawuurji siida, ghwaat geaw ng'eanyi nea gwasin mureeda ea ghwahitta miyeeda, eara miyeeda uhuuda beehiida.
50002009	Aba sareani ghoaw gida ading'deawa Aseetta humng'eeda muuchchi ak ghoadaw gheawunga laabwa hoowa gheawunga suurja,
50002010	aba gideaba aba gheawunga Yeesu giliwas gudung'uda gaygwatkuy, gea fuga mida humng'eeda ghana gea mida ng'eanyiida, ea gea mida uutta ng'eanyiida,
50002011	ak gaygaba siisi rukuna ghuutaannyi gideaba Yeesu Gristo Ng'uttamiida gil, aba gigheambiitta Aseetta was Ghweanda.
50002012	Asi fugeasu abwariinyi, aba gideajusu ondeayeatti mureeda galagasean, asi ghamneawa, ea adoosinnyi gideaballi ghwaraanya muuchchi iimeandani hiji, agadiyeesiina lealeanoodeang'wa aba muwda nea ghoabwadannyi;
50002013	aba gideaba Aseetta gagadiiyi aba jeesingeagwa, ak gagooneegwa gassooda ea sinooda ng'asheega miyaas gasa niny.
50002014	Asna ng'asheega sean nea adagwarinnaneegwa ginikghta ghana sheangnyeeda,
50002015	ak ea meerukunana badaydahuukkeagwa ng'asheega munyas nea ghoahuyi fuga manda giidinyeanda, diibiga Aseetta meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas mida bugusta seaygeeda gwaneadi bea ng'ooweatta, ak ghoayeatti weeshinda, aba jeannyaawa aba jeeda ng'eanyiida,
50002016	nea ghoong'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheanda eaweega, ammuuchchu eaweeda Gristo ghammuuschi daghwar geaw aba gideaba mwaafwaji mwadaagha ghana dagadiyi mwadaagha.
50002017	Eara eayiinan uhuuda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda appadayda masaweegeagwa, aniini geahoosannyi nea geang'weelayi sea agoogeeni seaniin.
50002018	Gwasnu earagooga ang'weella nea gohoosannnyi sea aniini.
50002019	Ak ghaararji aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu gideaba gaydeajeagu Dimotteo gabean ghwahidu heedeang'wa, ak abeeda geegwarsean aba iitteang'wa.
50002020	Aniini meandeawani siih nuut uurji niny, bea huumwa nea gwahirbaban aba ng'asheega badahuukkeagwa.
50002021	Saawa gaba siisi ng'ula gidabwariiy, nea miih fukka bea Yeesu Gristohiini.
50002022	Dimotteo ghamneawa ghwaloat gil aba headaang'u, gawuurji balleanda ea ghwaan niny geaweechcheewi aba gadiyeeda giijasta miy.
50002023	Ghaararji gideaba gaydabean deajeagu iyadaayi gichchea gawuurji ng'asheegeasu;
50002024	ak ghaamwaschi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida gideaba earaniini gaydabean dahidu.
50002025	Geagasayi deajeagu heedeang'wa Epafraditto, was oorjeediyya, easnudayeewi gadiyeeda, was shirikkarajeanda uurjeewean, nea giijasoochcheandeang'wa gil, nea weedaneeda gil aba haleanjeedeanyu eagasayi.
50002026	Nea niny abeeda gagasa ghwadaheangwa oagasean, ak ghang'ut giseaneega aba gideaba noayinyi gideaba niny ghamnyaan.
50002027	Aba huumwa ghamnyaan, ea ghwariikghta ghami. Iiduw ghabwayda Aseetta niny, ak ea meakghusa niny, earappadaydeanyu, amaduw ea moawa aba heedeanyu sawanadeeda naawda.
50002028	Aniini geagasayi muuchchi deajeagu niny, ak abeeda gohoosannyi aba iyoobiikti adaaha gichcha, ak abeeda ghwasuunya ng'asheegeasu.
50002029	Asi adeapta niny aba hooseaneega sean aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida, ak fuga uurji niih gammiisa gideaba gajeattaw mureeda,
50002030	aba gideaba gwaramagu ghami aba gadiyeeda Gristo, nea gwaramagu gabeagu eaweegaaschi ak ghoahiit gadiyeedeang'wa aba heedeanyu.
50003001	Asi aba huydeanda, oorjooga giyeenya, ahoosana aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida. Ak geang'oorneegwa ng'asheega uurji gikka nea meapri, ak abeeda gaygwalealneegwa.
50003002	Ashageada gudajeega, ashageada fuga gadiyeeda munyas, ashageada fukka iissa ghwalajaada saseedean.
50003003	Aba gideaba aseasa geewoschi giyyiilda huumwa, gadoowan Aseetta aba gurorooda, ea gheambalmeeda aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu, fuga mwarara ng'asheega saseeda.
50003004	Earappeadi eandeawi gichchea darara saseeda. Siida wassean iimideawa gichchea ghwarara saseeda gharaanyi aniini:
50003005	Geayadan giyyiilda eaweedeaba sis, ak geawoschi siida emeeda Israeeli, bea dooshta Benjamin, ak geawoschi siida Ebraniya jiih fuga Ebraniya; nea aba ging'ng'ooyda deaweeda geawoschi Farisayajeanda,
50003006	ak geasinnyi badiida muuchchi dasawan ganiisa, appadayda doobiiwnatta sinyasa deaweeda majeerukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas.
50003007	Nea haleanjeetta sean ghayi anung' ghoaw gidahuumwa aba heedeanyuun ghamneawa ghanung' gawuurji roodaweega appadayda Gristo.
50003008	Aba huumwa ghaanung' ghoaw haleanjeesean gil nirooda aba gitta naawda aba nalooda Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiideanyuun. Appadaydaannyi naanung' gwarooda haleanjeessean, ak ghanung' ghoaw haleanjeeda mwadaagha, ak abeeda ghaanyaschi Gristo
50003009	ak geanyasan aba jeadaannyi, ak ea meandeawani doobiiwnatteanyu, mida jeeda deaweeda, geaghus diitta sinyassa naweeda masaweega aba jeeda Gristohiin, doobiiwnattida leabu heeda Aseetta sinyas aba masaweegean;
50003010	ak abeeda ghaanalli niny ea uurda duunnoadaannyi, ak geawurjeewi niny aba jeeda miyeadaannyi.
50003011	Ak abeeda iijea ghoaw ghaanyaschi duunnooda miyeeda.
50003012	Ak ea miih gideaba naanyaschi ghana gideaba neawoschi hidaat gil; geamajeekchi badiida danyas ak ghoaw deanyu, aba gideaba ninung' Gristo Yeesu doaw siidaannyi.
50003013	Oorjoogiyya, aniini meaguureewani geaw siida ninyas; ak geasinnyi ng'asheanjagi, ghaanung' gwaroossean ng'sheega mida bwadaw ak geamiriikchi beatteaba mwadi heeda mida gittasiyiin mwadiin.
50003014	Geamajeekchi beatta dagal heeda gidabuurbuurji jea danyasa gimear jea gwaleabu gurnooda leabu heettiyeada bea Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
50003015	Anung'waada fukka ikkasa nihittiisa heedean gwasnu fughareenga nyaawa; nea aba jeedeang'wa iimida gidagasa eerada gayghoahiimneegwa Aseetta.
50003016	Anung' eakghusa ging'ng'ooyda huumeanda aba gitta sinyaschiin.
50003017	Oorjoogiyya, oang'ng'waanya searoojigeasu, nea gorroorji fukka abiideatta gidoowuurjeewiin nea googalaneasa.
50003018	Aba heeda fuga saang'a, nearukuneegwa ak ghamneawa gearukuneegwa nea ghabuudu dabeakka, anung'waada gawuurji weajoodiga beehiida Gristo.
50003019	Mudeanoodeaba fiisu nyariida gil, ak aseetta nyaawa ea jeeda gil, ak ng'asheega aghambiida geat ea gea baspaseega gil, mideawa fughareenga ng'asheega ng'eanyiida.
50003020	Aba gideaba aseasa ng'eang'deanya gwanda humng'eeda, ak ghamneawa geammuughu lealnoochcheanda, nea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristoohi,
50003021	jea ghwayam sasanuukkaasa nyeauuriin, ak ghwanung' gawuurji sea saseadaannyi ghambiidaat, aba uurda iissa ghoommu gwasin ghapka haleanjeessean headaannyi.
50004001	Asi, orjoogiyya, abwariinyi nea geagasayi, was hooseaneegeasu ea shiipka amiinaada nea goomajeegichchi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiideanyu, fugeasu abwariinyi.
50004002	Geamuschi Eudiya ak geamuschi Sintikke gideaba aduupcheena aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida.
50004003	Ak geamuscheey earang'iing'i, siideanyu bea huumwa eaduupchcheewi, eaniyean weada gadeemsu, aba gideaba gagadiyi sea aniini aba iitta giijasta miy sea Glemeenti sea fugeasu mwaatkwa eaweechcheewi, mida gheawunga nyaawa jeeda gittabooda eaweega.
50004004	Ahoosana aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida galagasean; ak geabiikti dayi, Ahoosana.
50004005	Anung' ghwanal buuneeda sean milikghteadeang'wa. Ng'uttamiida nineekkiit.
50004006	Adootteawiichchi geat aba ng'asheanda wassean, geaghus aba mooshta Aseetta nea ghoamwaschi ghawooda, nea ghoabwachchi Aseetta ak ghwanal Aseetta gidoogasayi wassean.
50004007	Nea hoyyooyda Aseetta, adaraam fughareenga sean, gaygafur jeesingeagwa ea fughareengeagwa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
50004008	Asi oorjoogiyya gidahuydean jea otteemsheesiina niih, ng'asheega sean was gea huumwa, ea gea mideawa mureeda, ea gea doobiiweadi, ea gea miyaasi, ea gea subwariiyi, ea dagheerjeandumeeda iimida miyinda wassean, ghana giigheambiitta miy wassean, otteemsheesiina ng'asheesu.
50004009	Ng'asheega ghayi sinnalleagwa leabu heedeanyu ak ghoong'ng'waanyi nea ghoayinyi nea goodeaksi heedeanyu, asna suuh, ak Aseetta mideawa hoyyooh gaygoobiida heedeang'wa.
50004010	Aniini neahoosannyi muuchchi aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba huydeanda iiduw ea noobiikti otteemsheesiina badaydeanyu, gawuurji gidaghayi otteemsheesiindi gideawuurjeewi ak eamwonyasi gheatta.
50004011	Ak ea miih gideaba geargu ng'asheesu nea gwanda gideagasayi, aba gideaba aniini nanalli aba damannyoojiga sean gideawuurjeewi ak ghoahiidan gideandeawi.
50004012	Ghaanalli hing'eanooda, ak ghaanalli nyasooda haleanjeeda; aba gheatkweakka sean, sinnaalan lang'uudadeeda ea jalooda, dandeawa haleanjeeda ghanea meandeawani.
50004013	Ghammuuschi dasin haleanjeessean aba siitta goonan uurdean.
50004014	Ak eanoosinnyi ng'asheanda miy aba damanda sindeayeesi jeeda sawanadeedeanyu.
50004015	Nea agooga fuga Filippi, ghoanali gideaba aba damandida bea ging'eatta Giijasta miyiin, damanda ealeapni Makkedoniya, manda ganiiseeda eaweechcheewi aba ng'asheanji bea giidaydeayda ea ging'ng'ooydean geaghus agooga;
50004016	ak eara aba damanda eandeewi Desalonikke imiisean gooyeanean haleanjeeda eagasayi ak ea mabeachchi eaweechchanjagi.
50004017	Miih gideaba geagasayi haleanjeeda jea agoonean gil; geagasayi haghweega jea ghoahaada aba monneedeang'wa.
50004018	Ak ea naanyaschi haleanjeesean, ea ghwanaawda, aba seang'ayda; was gea ghayi eanean Epaforodittoyda leabu heedeang'wa, was haleanjeeda ogoonnyi, was shearooda nagheeda ng'andit, ea haleanjeeda sisapa geadi bea ghadoweeda biissa ghabwariiy Aseetta.
50004019	Nea Aseetteanyu gaygagooneegwa haleanjeessean oogasayi aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi aba gigheambiitta mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
50004020	Asi eakghambiida Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
50004021	Oakghada fuga ghaydidi sean mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu. Ghoaghadeagwa oorjoogiyya eandeawi aba hiji.
50004022	Ghoaghadeagwa fuga ghaydidi sean, ghwaraanya gea abiitta gheeh Gaysaari.
50004023	Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeeda gurooruunatkeagwa.
51001001	Baulo was giijasoochcheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidagasiida Aseetta, ea Dimotteo oorjeeda iyya.
51001002	Heeda Aseetta fuga ghaydidi doobiiweadi was oorjoogiyya aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu mida Golosaayi: Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooh jea gwaleabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweandeanya.
51001003	Inyeessa galagasean geabadischeesi Aseetta was ghweanda Ng'uttamiideanya Yeesu Gristo, iisumwaashchchi Aseetta appadahuukkeagwa
51001004	aba gideaba siyiinyi iitta masaweegeagwa appadayda Gristo Yeesu ea gidoobwariydi fuga sean ghaydidi,
51001005	aba gideaba gidoararji jea egooneegwa aba hoowa bea humng'eedean. Aba ng'asheanda noobay ayiinya ammwadi aba jeeda giijasta miy bea huumwaan,
51001006	nea nihidu heedeang'wa, ea gidaguulleatta ng'eanyiissean gil, ak gwaji haghweega ak gwaheedu gawurji gidaheetteayda aba heedeang'wa, ghang'eada damanda ghayi oayinyi ak ghoanalli dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta bea huumwa,
51001007	gawuurji gidanaaldaneegwa Epafra was soomjeanda subwariinyi. Niny ea doabiiwaat nea gagadiyeesa Gristo appadahuukkeagwa
51001008	ak ea ninung' eanala bariinyeegeagwa aba gurorooda.
51001009	Ak aba sareani dea ghayi siyinyi ng'asheesu ea miyeenung'waada mooshta ghawooda appadahuukeagwa, gideaba gagooneegwa Aseetta fughareeda huumwa bea gidagassiida niny ak gagooneegwa weaghumeeda ea nalooda aba jeesingeagwa,
51001010	ak abeeda gajoommuusa oppideatta gidagasiida Ng'uttamiida nea goosinnyi gichchea goohoosan, ak gibindeang'wa gaygwaji haghweega aba gadiyoojiga miyaas neagoheettu aba fughareeda Aseetta.
51001011	Gagasa gagooneegwa gimusta sean bea uurdaannyi gheambiidaat, jea oammuusa nea ghoammuughu haleanjeesean nea goobeayi hoseaneega,
51001012	nea goobadischeesi Bwaabwa nung' eammuusa eanyasa gheatta hearaniischooda sea fugaaschi ghaydidi aba jeeda weeshinda.
51001013	Ak niny gwalealnaneasa jeeda uurda misanumeeda ak goobaleageasa ea ghwadeasa jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Balleandaannyi bwariiy,
51001014	nea aba niny geendeawi lealeanooda nea ea samsiinda ring'eeda.
51001015	Nea niny geegala Aseetta miidaachi ak ea duweachcheeda gil aba haleanjeesean;
51001016	aba gideaba haleanjeessean geesin appadaydeaba niny, gea mida humng'eeda ea gea mida ng'eanyiida, gea daach ea gea miih daach, ea hoorgajeega sugoodiga gil, ghanea sugoochcheandumeeda ghanea gea ambaliischi ghanea gheambalmeeda suuh seaniin gwasin niny nea gwasin appadaydaannyi.
51001017	Niny ghayi gabay gwanda madeeda haleanjeessean, nea aba niny ghwanoas geat haleanjeessean.
51001018	Nea niny ea uhuuda saseeda gil, nea dea Ganiisa, nea niny ea ging'eetta, ak ea duweachcheeda leabu miyeeda, ak abeeda ghoaw siichchea goosheedeawa haleanjeessean.
51001019	Aba niny gammiisa goobiida headaannyi haleanjeeda hidaat bea Aseetta,
51001020	nea aba niny gooduupchi geaw haleanjeessean gea mida ng'eanyi ghana gea mida humng'eeda, ak gwasin hoyyooh aba foojeanda weay appadayda beehiidaannyi.
51001021	Nea ammwadi agooga ea sihheelleweegwa nea gowoschi munyas fughareen, nea gosinnyi sinaweega munyas,
51001022	ak ea niduupchi aba saseadaannyi niny aba miyeadaannyi, ak abeeda ghwanung' ahuuwa fuga ghaydidi meerukunana badahuukka ng'asheega munyas ammwadeadaannyi.
51001023	Asi iyoppiidi jeeda masaweega, ak ghoomiinaadi nea noahang'waanyichchi, nea meayameagwa aba heeda giijasta miy oayiinyi, ghayi surukkwiisa haleanjeessean mida hiing'eadayda humng'eeda, nea aniini Baulo geawoschi siidaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
51001024	Ak ghamneawa geang'weelayi aba sawanadeeda anyaschi appadahuukkeagwa, nea aba saseedeanyu ghahiichchi giikka shoodaan aba sawanadeeda Gristo appadayda saseadaannyi, nea ea ganiisa,
51001025	ak aniini ea sinung' doaw siideaba gadiyeani, gawurji siida siitteaga gadiyeeda Aseetta sigoonan appadahuukkeagwa, ak geasinnyi gadiyeeda Aseetta ak geanal,
51001026	nea makcheameani ghayi sifuyiin ghang'eada gweannyeekka ghayi bea garayiin ea jeachcheenga ak ghamneawa ea siitteajiisa fugaaschi ghaydidi.
51001027	Aba jeannyaawa ghwaloat Aseetta ak ghwanung' ghwanal emoojiga gitteenna hawunda meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea makcheameeda gheambalmeadaannyi was Gristoyda mida jeedeang'wa, was rarooda gigheambiitta.
51001028	Niny geergu aseasa, nea gereekusi giliwas siih nea geannaalji giliwas siih aba weaghuumeeda sean, ak geeyeadu giliwas siih nihissa heeda aba jeeda Gristo.
51001029	Nea geasawannyi geaw aba niih, nea geamajeekchi aba uurda sinoodeaba gadiyeeni iin jeedeanyuun.
51002001	Geagasayi anala gideadeawiitti appadahuukkeagwa, ea badahuukka fuga mida ng'eanyiida Laodokiya, ea gikka miighwadahaniin,
51002002	abeeda geemmajeek guroruunatka nyaawa, nea gaguuyi aba barinyeega, ak ghwanyas meanang'oochcheandumeeda sean bea huumwa, ak ghwanal makcheameetta bea Aseetta was Gristohiin,
51002003	nea jeadaannyi ea sufuysa gheaseeda bareaynata uhuuda ea fughareenga.
51002004	Geargu niih aba gideaba adiiduw ghoamwaschi gwareenganeegwa siida aba ng'asheega ng'uyyeega.
51002005	Earappeadi eawoschi sheagi aba heedeang'wean, geendeayi aba gurorooda, ak geahoosanyi muuchchi aba gideaba neajeeng'u gidamiyda giibindeang'wa ea gidamajeekta masaweegeagwa appadayda Gristo.
51002006	Asi agooga ghayi ghoodeapti Gristo Yeesu was Ng'uttamiida, asi oppiidana jeadaannyi,
51002007	nea goongooreadi hawungeagwa ak geemmajeegeegwa aba jeadaannyi ak gamajeegiit masaweegeagwa, ak gawuurji gidaghayi siinnaaldaneegwa, nea goobadiisachcheesi.
51002008	Asi ashageada adaghaghaseagwa siida ak gahuttaneegwa aba fughareedaannyi bea mwadaagha aba searoojikka bea buneedean, aba haleanjeedeaba garayi bea meangeenda mida jeeda ng'eanyiida nea miih dea Gristoohi.
51002009	Aba gideaba headaannyi gwanda hidooda sean bea Aseetta nea goobiida badaydaannyi.
51002010	Ak agooga eanoonyaschi eaweega hidaat appadaydeaba niny, nea niny ahaweewa fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea gea ambalischi.
51002011	Nea appadaydeaba niny earagooga siyaadeagwa giyyiilda aba giyyiilda meesnana geattinga, nea ghoanung'waadi ng'asheega saseeda aba giyyiilda Gristo,
51002012	nea geepnyeegwa sea niny aba gibattiisanda, amaduw geettuunneegwa sea niny aba masaweega aba gadiyeeda Aseetta, ghayi aduunna niny jeeda miyeeda.
51002013	Hean agooga, goomeewayyi aba riing'eegeagwa ea aba sasanuukkeagwa meayaada giyyiilda, iiduw ghoadaw Aseetta eaweega sea niny, ak ea nisamseasa ring'eagaasa sean,
51002014	iiduw nea nibuus ng'ooruutka mida badahuukkaasa jea goorgweakseasaan, gageanu ak ghwasach ak goongoorsa uhuuda behiida.
51002015	Ak ghoareat fuga mideawa uurda gheambalmeeda dabitta ng'uchcheeda ak geanu ghoaw gichchea eahhiimda aba eeshpwara aba saawa, ak gahoosan appadahuukka nyaawa.
51002016	Asi adagoorgweakseegwa siida aba giinyeashteayda gichchea eayaak ghana gichchea eali ghana badayda ghweelmeeda ghana aba ng'ushshiinda sheeda ghana Sabatto,
51002017	suuh jirooneeda ng'asheega jea ghwahidu; nea gidahuumwa ea Gristo gil.
51002018	Asi adaghaweadaneegwa siih gil, aba giimajeekta eatteaba geaw bea ng'eanyi ea ghadoowanda malaykajeega, nea ghamiinaada aba giidaheachchteaba geaw, nea ghaghwar geaw mwadaagha aba fughareadaannyi bea saseeda,
51002019	ak ea mwanoasa geat sea uhuuda, nea aba niny ghoang'ng'waay geat saseassean aba roobuutka ea mayiishka, ak gwaheedu aba heennooda leabu heeda Aseetta.
51002020	Ama inoomeewudayeewi Gristo aba haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida was meangeenda, ghwasaan anda gooppiideatti gili duu abeaha ng'eanyiida? Ghwasaan inyasghoamwaschi huumeannyeekka nyaawa,
51002021	“Adoang'ng'waanyi, ak eadoosamu, nea adoosachchi.”
51002022	(Ak ghoahiimu haleanjeeda jea goosha iisigadiyeatta), aba giduurji ginealshooda buuneeda ea gissurukutteayda?
51002023	Suuh seaniin aba huumwa gawuurji gwadeagooda mideawa weaghuumeeda ak ghoang'eat ghadooweeda aba eatteaba geat bea ng'eanyi aba gidahang'waay gasa saseeda, ak ea marachchi gil ak moammu ghoadeal gitta gasa saseedean.
51003001	Asi agooga isittunneegwa sea Gristo, asi agassa haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda hooweanji mida Gristoohiin, niny nipteada aba geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta.
51003002	Oppkeatta haleanjeeda mida humng'eeda galagasean, miih gea mida ng'eanyiida gil.
51003003	Aba gideaba agooga goomeeway ak eaweegeagwa ea sifuy sea Gristo aba heeda Aseetta.
51003004	Iiduw isiittaajiit Gristoyda was eaweegaasa, abeeda eara agooga gajeettaajiideagwa sea niny aba jeeda giigheambiitta.
51003005	Asi anung'waada ng'asheega munyas bea munda ng'eanyiida mida saseenuukkeagwa: was hiseadayeandumeeda, ririnnyeanda, geawunda gheang'da muyi, giitteemshooda muy, ea shidoodeaba ghaang', ea ghadoowanda gidamawosa Aseetta.
51003006	Appadaydeaba ng'asheesu gayghwahidu ng'weaninda Aseetta.
51003007	Ak eara agooga ghayi gooneayeewi jeedeaba ng'asheesu nea gooppiidi jeeda.
51003008	Ak ghamneawa ghoanung'waadi ng'asheesu seaniin; nyarasta, ea ng'weaninda, munyinda, ea beeshta, ea ging'weakka aba ghuusigeegwa.
51003009	Adoonappiisi geat ng'uyyeega, nea gooyeeshshi geat noasuuchchi searoojigeaba garayi, ea gissisinniida
51003010	ak gookkweali searoojiga eashish, sinung' gaweeriidi ak ghoanalli nea geegala ninnyyeeda ghayi bwaat.
51003011	Ak aba sareani ea maheelli siida Yunaani ghana dea Yahuudi, dea siyaat giyyiilda ea dea miyeayaat giyyiilda, bunyeanda, ghana siida mwanala gil, soomjeanda, ghana dea abal geaw, nea Gristo ea sean gil aba jeeda haleanjeesean.
51003012	Asi okkwealsheatta fuga niloat Aseetta, ghaydiidi subwariiy, bea jeesinga bayyiida buuneeda, ea ng'eeninda, eattoodeaba geat bea ng'eanyi, miyinda ea milighteayda,
51003013	daba siisi sar sareambwa nuut, nea goosammiisi geat, iimida siida nidiysa nuut, gawurji gidaghayi samsiindaneegwa Ng'uttamiida, ak gwasnu eara agooga asindunu.
51003014	Iing'atta suuh seaniin gamiiseegwa andeawana barinyeega, aba gideaba gaygooroonnyi haleanjeesean ghoaw gilagi hidaat.
51003015	Ak ghoanung' goombalischi hoyyooyda Gristo aba jeesingeagwa, aba gideaba agooga geeguurneegwa awasa saseanagi. Nea ghoahuuyi fuga badiischooda.
51003016	Anung' goobiida ng'asheanda Gristo jeedeagwa nea gwaheedu, anaala nea gaba siisi reekusa nuut aba weaghumeeda sean, nea goosarmannyi nyiigheega ea sarmoojiga gurorooda nea goobadiischeesi Aseetta aba guroruunatkeagwa.
51003017	Nea gilwassean osinyi, aba ng'asheanda ghana sinooda, asna sean aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, nea goobadischeesi Aseetta was Ghweanda aba naweedeaba niny.
51003018	Gadeemga, asissiina siyeenatkeagwa mureeda, niih gidahaguuwsa Ng'uttamiida.
51003019	Siyeenatka abwarinya gadeemgeagwa nea adoonyareekiisi.
51003020	Diibiga, asissiina ghweanigeagwa ea gheamadigeagwa mureeda aba haleanjeesean, aba gideaba ng'asheanji gidagasiida Ng'uttamiida.
51003021	Ghweaniga, adoonnyareesayi diibigeagwa, aba gideaba gajiidu ghwalagaan.
51003022	Soomjooga, amwasa ng'asheega sean bea meanang'oodigeagwa bea ng'eanyiida, nea miih aba gheanyanga gil, gawurji fuga sin alooheeda aba heeda buuneeda, asi gamiiseegwa agadiyeena nea eashish guroruunatkeagwa, nea ghoawalli Ng'uttamiida.
51003023	Gilwassean osinyi, asna nea goobeayi jeesinga miyaas, gawuurji giloosissi Ng'uttamiida,
51003024	Nea ghoanalli gideaba gaygagooneegwa Ng'uttamiida mushaahareedeang'wa bea hearaniischooda, ak googadiyeesi Ng'uttamiida was Gristo.
51003025	Aba gideaba siida wassean sina ng'asheega munyas gayghwanyas mushaahareadaannyi uurji dea sina nea maygwanda shiitmeeda.
51004001	Fuga hees asissiina soomjoogeagwa ng'asheega miyaas doobiiweadi, ak ghoanalli gideaba eara agooga gondeawi Siida haw aba humng'eeda.
51004002	Oppiidana muuchchi jeeda mooshta Aseetta, nea ghoang'wearu aba ng'asheanji nea goobadischeesi;
51004003	ak ghoamwaschi Aseetta appadahuukkaasa, ak goottinneasa Aseetta gidaghuut aba ng'asheanda, ak geerukuti gitta funyaat bea Gristo ghayi siyiissean ghealoonigean,
51004004	Ak abeeda ghadaajiichchi, aba gideagassiidi rukunooda.
51004005	Abeawana weaghumeeda aba madeeda fuga mwamwasa, nea googadiyeatti muuchchi damanda sugooneegwa.
51004006	Asi ng'asheegeagwa gagasa gwandeawa dagheerjeandumeeda galeagasean, nea gwasamu balang'da, ak abeeda ghoanalli gichchea ashaayda ng'asheega buuneessean.
51004007	Iitteanyu sean gaygwarukneegwa Dikikko; niny oorjeediyya abwariinyi was siida gadiyeeda doobiiwaat, ak ea soomjeanda eandeawi bea Ng'uttamiida.
51004008	Ak ea neajeag'u niny heedeang'wa appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ghoanalli gissuwuurjeewi ea gideaba gaygoomajeek jeesingeagwa,
51004009	niny gaygoodeana Onesimo, oorjeediyya doobiiwaat abwariinyi, nea niny gaba jeedeang'wa. Ak gaygwarukneegwa ng'asheega sean sisin aba hiji.
51004010	Ghoadeagwa Aristarkoyda eandeayeesi ghealooniga sea Marko, was oorjeeda hudagheamatta Barnaba, (iittaannyi noanyaschi gideaba iihidu heedeang'wa ghoadeapchi),
51004011	Yeesuuyda suguura Yusto. Nea fiisu ea fuga ghasmeahooda gil aba jeeda fugeandeayeesi gadiyeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta, ea niiw fuga geandewanean salgheang'da.
51004012	Epafrayda was siida jeedeang'wa was soomjeanda Gristo Yeesu, ghoaghadeagwa nea goopkeatteegwa galeagasean nea gwasin badiida aba moashtaannyi bea Aseetta, ak ghoamiinaadi nea sumwaseagwa aba haleanjeetta gasa Aseettean.
51004013	Aniini geawoschi mushoochcheanda aba gideaba ghadaayi gidadeawiitta appadahuukkeagwa ea gikka mida Laodokiyean ea gikka mida Hierappoliin.
51004014	Lukkayda was bwanamwagaanga bissa dabwariiyiin ea Dema ghoaghadeagwa.
51004015	Oakgha oorjoogiyya mida Laodokiya ea gea mida Nimfa ea fuga ganiiseeda gheannyi.
51004016	Baroajeanji isissoamwa aba heedeang'wa, ghoanung' easoamwa eara aba Ganiisa mida Laodokiya, ama ditta sung'oorsa Laodokiyahiin ghoassoami agooga.
51004017	Arukusiina Arkipa, “Gideaba ng'ulla muuchchi gadiyeetta goonnyi Ng'utamiidean sina nea gihiidi.”
51004018	Giighadi ghaang'waarji aniini Baulo aba geattindeanyu. Oppkaada gideaba sirattean. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda.
52001001	Baulo, ea Silwaano, ea Dimotteo, Heeda ganiiseeda Desaloniikke mida heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo: Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooh.
52001002	Geabadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa oagasean, nea geapkachcheagwa aba jeeda mooshteanya bea Aseetta,
52001003	nea ghapkachcheegwa aba madeeda Aseetteanya was Ghweanda, gadiyeedeang'wa bea masaweega ea bariinyeegeagwa gadiiyi ea milikghteaydeang'wa bea rarooda aba jeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
52001004	Aba gideaba geanalli, fuga eaduupcheewi bwayiiy Aseetta, gideaba niny niloadeagwa;
52001005	bea gideaba giijasteanya miy mwahinna heedeang'wa nea geaghus ng'asheanda akghwahit, ghabwada gwandeawa uurda, ea Gurorooda Ghaydit nea geesikteawi muuchchi. Ak ghoanalli siisi sirguun giduurji jea goobiida heedeang'wa, appadahuukkeagwa.
52001006	Ak ghoahuuyi fuga adeascheeweasa geat ea geeshta Ng'uttamiida, iing'atta nea noang'ng'waannyi ng'asheanda aba sawanadeeda haw, sea hooseaneega Gurorooda Ghaydit;
52001007	hean ghoahuuyi gichchea eegala aba heeda buuneessean mideawa masaweega aba ng'eanyiida Makkedooniya, ea ng'eanyiida Akkaya.
52001008	Ea meakghusa gideaba ghwadambiir ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida aba heedeang'wa aba Makkedoniya ea Akkaya, iiduw masaweegeagwa aba heeda Aseetta ea niwa mwadi aba daroorakka sean, ea eeyi bwak ea eamudeammuusa eerukuna gil.
52001009	Aba gideaba saawa nea gaba geat gwarukkwiida iitteanya gidaoadeaptaydaneasa aba jeedeang'wa, ea gidooyamsiindi geat Aseetta nea ghoanung'waadi haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta ak googadiyeesi dea mideawa eaweega ea Aseetta huumwa,
52001010	nea ghoammuughu Balleandaannyi jea gwaleabu humng'eeda, ghayi aduunna miyeeda, nea Yeesu gil, lealnaneasa nyarasta jea ghwahidu.
52002001	Aba gideaba fuga eaduupcheewi ghoanalli, gideaba gidasupkaandi heedeang'wa miih mwadaagha gil;
52002002	eara gwasa ning'atta sawanadeedeanya nea geapwaaspwaseasa aba Filippi, aba gidoanaldi, hean goomajeegeasa Aseetteanya ak gearukuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta aba madeeda fuga eang'alealleewi.
52002003	Aba gideaba gissumuschi maleapna heeda ramaseanda ghana ririnyeanda, ghana eesin aba milmilanda;
52002004	gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa Aseetta gheatta Giijasta miy, ea gidasurukwiidi, nea mewuurjeewani fuga ahoosani buuneeda, geewoschi fuga ahoosan Aseetta nal guroruunatkaasa.
52002005	Aba gideaba moang'ng'waa eerukuna ng'asheega ghwarooodeaba geat, aba gidoanaldi, ghana shidoodeaba ghaang', nea Aseetta ea muushoochcheanda gil;
52002006	nea ghanyea miyeegassa gharbeeda aba heeda buuneeda, ghana heedeang'wa ghana hichpa fiih suuk, ghana gwadeeppa ea sigasayi aba gideaba gewoschi giijasoodiga Gristo.
52002007	Iissa gewoschi ng'eeni aba jeedeang'wa, gawuurji gidang'ulliida gheamatta diibigaaschi.
52002008	Gwasnu earaseasa geaghuscheegwa aba bariinyeega muuchchi, ak gehoosannyi nea meakghusa goonda giijasta miy bea Aseetta akghwahit, gegonnyeegwa eara guroruunatkaasa, aba gideaba nowoschi fugaasa subwariinyi.
52002009	Ak ghoapkaachchi gissuburdi ea gissisawaneatti, fuga eaduupcheewi; aba gideaba iissa geegadiyi eawa ea askweari, ak ea meesawani siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa, nea geerukuneegwa giijasta miy bea Aseetta.
52002010	Agooga gowoschi muushoodiga, ak gwasnu eara Aseetta, ea gidaghayditta ea gidadoabiiwatta ak gabiissa ea meeyeatteana ghuut searoojigaasa aba heeda fugeagwa mideawa masaweega;
52002011	aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli, gawuurji ghweanda ea diibigaaschi, iissa geamiinnyi gheang'ba giliwas siih nea geemmajeegiideegwa nea gerekuseegwa
52002012	ak ghoabeadi gidahaguuwdaneegwa aba madeeda Aseetta, ghayi guurneegwa agooga ak abeeda goweayi jeeda sugoochcheandumeadaannyi ea gigheambiittaannyi.
52002013	Nea iissa geebadiischeesi Aseetta galeagasean appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, gideaba deanoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheanda Aseetta ghayi oyiing'si heedeanya, ea moang'ng'waaydani ng'asheanda buuneeda ghoanung' gawuurji ng'asheanda Aseetta, biissa gagadiyi aba jeedeang'wa agoogeeda mideawa masaweega.
52002014	Aba gideaba agooga, fuga eaduupcheewi, ahuuwa fuga jea godeascheweegwa geat ganiisajeega Aseetta aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu mida ng'eanyiida Yudeeya; aba gideaba noanyaschi sawanadeeda uurji diitta aba heeda fuga ng'eang'deang'wa gawuurji gidasissiinda fuga Yahuudi,
52002015	dea ghayi nuus sean Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea sibanga, ak gooruuttaneasa jarooda, ak ghoanyareas Aseetta nea ghaheawa buuneessean
52002016	nea ghoadealeasa aseasa ea meerukusiini fuga emoojiga gideaba gajeelealu ak gawuurji gili sinnyiit gideenda ring'eega nyaawa. Iiduw ea nihidu nyarasta Aseetta badahuukka nyaawa aba huydeanda.
52002017	Hean nea geegeandeawaneasa heedeang'wa, fuga eaduupcheewi, aba gheadi nuwaas, aba saseeda nea miih aba gurorooda gil, geamilikghti nea geegasayi muuchchi aba gassooda haw bea huumwa deakta gheanyangeagwa;
52002018	asi geegasayi eapkaana heedeang'wa aniini Baulo, gichcha ea gichcha ghoadealeasa Shattaani.
52002019	Neada raroodeanya ea naaha ghana hooseaneega ghana shiipka jea daghwara geaw aba madeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba hinnoadaannyi? Neada ea miih agoogea?
52002020	Aba gideaba agooga gowoschi gharbeedeanya ea hooseaneagaasa.
52003001	Asi aba damanda mudeammuuseewana eamilikghta gichcha, geadaayi ghwahit geanung'waneasa bwadaw ng'eanyiida Atteene nea geabwaageat.
52003002	Ng'atta gechcheagu orjeediyya was Dimotteo, was soomjeanda Aseetta bea Giijasta miy bea Gristo, goodiing'u masaweegeagwa ak goomajeegeegwa,
52003003	ak siida ea adagwahirbaban aba sawanaduussu, aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli beadi sugooneasa ng'asheanji.
52003004	Nea aba damanda sindeayeewi sea agooga geebay erukuneegwa gideaba gajeanyasa sawanadeeda; ak gawuurji gidahittaayda, ak ghoanalli.
52003005	Gwasnu earaniini aba damanda muttammuuseawa gichcha milikghteayda, geajeagu siida danal masaweegeagwa, aamwahinna siitta jea gwasmeegwean ak gwasmeegwa, amaduw gaba gadiyeedeanyu mwadaagha.
52003006	Hean ghamneawa nea ghwahidu heedeanyu Dimotteoyda leabu heedeang'wa, ak gweanneesa giijasta miy bea masaweegeagwa ea bariinyeegeagwa ak gwargu gideaba ghoapkachcheasa galeagasean, nea googasayi deakteanya, gawuurji gissigassiidi aseasa deakteang'wa agooga,
52003007	Fuga eaduupcheewi, abasareani earappeadi sindi jeeda sawanadeedeanya sean ea giseaneega sihawdi isinyaschi iitteang'wa aba naweeda masaweegeagwa;
52003008	Aba gideaba ghamneawa gendeawi eaweega, aba iyoaminaadi nea gomajeekchewiidayi aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
52003009	Aba gideaba gajeammuusa eattawdaan Aseetta badiischooda appadahuukkeagwa, aba hooseaneekka sean sindeawiin. appadahuukkeagwa aba madeeda Aseetteanya.
52003010	Nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta muuchchi eawa ea askweari ak abeeda geadaayi gheanyangeagwa nea geesissinnyi ng'asheega ashoay bea masaweegeagwa.
52003011	Asi Aseetteanya was Ghweandeanya sea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu gagasa ghoadoabiiw naweedeanya ea eahinna heedeang'wa;
52003012	gagasa ghwanung' Ng'uttamiida oahhaadana nea gooppiidi jeeda bariinyeegeaba geat, aba heeda buuneessean, ak gawuurji gissisindi aba heedeang'wa,
52003013	ak gomajeek guroruunatkeagwa ea meyeatteeweegwa ghuusi aba ghaydidanda aba madeeda Aseetteanya was Ghweanda, aba damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu sea fugaaschi sean ghaydidi.
52004001	Aba huuydeayda, fuga eaduupcheewi, geemuscheegwa nea geamiinnyi gheang'deang'wa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu, ak gawuurji gissinnaaldaneagwa aba heedeanya gidanisiindaneegwa oppiideatta nea gohhoosannyi Aseetta, ak gawuurji gidoosindi agooga, ak gagasa agooga asna muuchchi ea ghwanaawa.
52004002	Nea ghoanalli gideaba ana ng'asha gil ghayi sugoonnyeegwa leabu heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu.
52004003	Aba gideaba ng'asheesu gea bwariiy Aseetta gil was gimmiinnoodeang'wa, ak gohhelleewi geat hiseadayeandumeeda;
52004004	ak ea daba siisi nal gichchea ghagheanda niny gatmooda aba ghaydidanda ea mureeda,
52004005	nea miih aba geawunda gheang'da muyi, ak gowuurjeewi fuga emoojiga mwanala Aseetta;
52004006	ak ea manda siida adiiy, ghana godiiysa oorjeeda ghaamwat aba ng'asheanji, aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida dea jea ghawalda mureandoodeaba haleanjeeni seaniini, gawuurji gissibeani eamiinda gheang'deang'wa aba mureeda.
52004007	Aba gideaba Aseetta maguurneasa eppiidana jeeda ririnnyeanda was ng'asheega munyas, gagasa eppiidana jeeda ghaydidanda.
52004008	Nea siida heawa ng'asheesu, ea mwaheawa siida ghaheawa Aseetta, goneegwa agooga Guroroodaannyi Ghaydit.
52004009	Aba iitta bariinyeega oorjooga giyeanya moogassi gideaba gaygang'oorneegwa siih, aba gideaba agooga ninaleagwa Aseetta bariinyeegeaba geat;
52004010	ak aba huumwa ghoabwariinyi oorjookkiyeanya sean mida ng'eanyiida Makkedoniya ayda. Asi geemucheegwa fuga eaduupcheewi, gideaba asna ea ghwanaawa niih muuchchi,
52004011	nea geagasayi goobiitpiit nea ghwasiinda, ak gang'ula ng'asheegeagwa, ak googadiyi aba geatting'eagwa, gawuurji gissurukuteaydi;
52004012	ak abeeda gajanyasa mureeda aba heeda fuga emoojiga, ak ea adooghuschi buuneeda aba haleanjeeda.
52004013	Fuga eaduupcheewi asi aseasa meegassi amoanali gil, aba iitteaba fukka nimeewean, ak abeeda ea mogiisandani fuga mandeawana rarooda.
52004014	Ghang'eada dea sumwaseewi gideaba Yeesu ghami ak gwaduudu gichcha, earagwasa, aba naweeda Yeesu, gaygweadu Aseetta sea niny fukka nililiin.
52004015	Aba niih geerukuneegwa aba ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida, bea gideaba aseaseeda suwoschi majeekcheewi, sunung'waneasa heeda ea ghwahidu damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiidean, majeshsheedeawana fukka ghayi nilil aba jeeda miyeedean.
52004016	Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida gaygwashuubean niny nea gwaleabu humng'eeda ea shookcheanda haw mideawa digheanda, ea nyeashta malaykajeanda haw, sea nyeashta durumbeatteeda Aseetta. Ak abeeda fukka ghayi meewwiisa jeeda Gristohiin gajeeshsheeda ettuuttu;
52004017	hean abeeda aseaseeda suwoschi majeekcheewiin, suhuuydeannyiin, gajeassealdaneasa sea saawa aba jeeda shamoghuutka, ak geadeapti Ng'uttamiida aba heettiyeada; ak abeeda gajendeawana Ng'uttamiida galeagasean.
52004018	Asi ageandeawana geat salgheang'da aba ng'asheesu.
52005001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, aba ng'asheega iitta damanda ghana eaweetta jea gawas, moogassi gideaba gaydang'oorneegwa.
52005002	Aba gideaba agooga ghoanalli beadi eaweetta Ng'uttamiida gayghwaanda gidawunniida mareanghweanda eawa.
52005003	Hean iyayi buuneeda, “Gebeayi weayda nea gebeayi seayu,” deagheatta ghwahidu nyariida badahuukka nyaawa gawuurji gidanyassiida gatmooda lajooda aba jeatta jeepta, ak ea manda gichchea gamulsiinda.
52005004	Ak ea moondani jeeda misaneeda, fuga eaduupcheewi, ea ghwanung' eaweettida ghahameegwa ng'eanyi gawuurji mareanghweanda.
52005005	Aba gideaba agooga oagasean noahuuyi balloojiga weeshinda, ea balloojiga askweari; aseasa mebeahi eaweeda ghana misaneeda.
52005006	Asi adeelilli ruweanga, ea ewuurjeewana buuneeda mwaatkwa, asi eang'ng'weerna, nea geetteennyi.
52005007	Aba gideaba fuga rooji gwarooji eawa, nea eara fuga boogidi iissa gaboogidi eawa.
52005008	Duukku, aseasa deesuwooseewi fuga askwearda, gagasa endeawana gheadeenda, nea geediinyi daghanuunatkaasa igeambooda masaweega ea bariinyeega, nea nngoofanjeandeanya bea gharinnyeanda gagasa eanung' ghoaw rarooda jea gweadu lealeanooda.
52005009	Nea Aseetta ghayi masneasa ak abeeda ghwalas uhuudeanya, gagasa eanyasa lealeanooda appadayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo,
52005010	dea ghayi meah appadahuukkaasa aba ising'eatng'eachchi ghana eella abeeda geendeayi sea niny.
52005011	Asi daba siisi amajeek nuut ak ea daba siisi adiing'u nuut gageawiit, gawuurji gidoosindi.
52005012	Fuga eaduupcheewi, geemuscheegwa gideaba, asissiina mureeda fuga sin gadiyeeda aba jeedeang'wa ak gabiissa gwanda madeedeang'wa aba jeeda Ng'uttamiida nea geewwoowseegwa,
52005013	asissiina mureeda nea ghoawwalli gheang'da aba bariinyeega aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa. Gagasa abeaha weayda nea gobeayi geat.
52005014	Ak geemuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, owwoowsiina gheanyanga fuga ghaleehooda, ommajeega fuga giyoonnyi, aweada fuga ng'arng'ari, ak gimilikghti sea buuneessean.
52005015	Ang'ulla siida wassean adaghwawaldaawa ng'asheanda muy dea muy, iissa ghoayaachchi geeshta ng'asheanda miy galeagaseab, agooga nea goobeayi geat ea biissa aba heeda buuneessean.
52005016	Ahoosana galeagasean,
52005017	amwaasha Aseetta damannyoojiga sean,
52005018	abadiischeena aba giliwas gil; aba gideaba niih gidabwariiyda Aseetta aba heedeang'wa aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
52005019	Adoottealli Gurorooda,
52005020	adofoolli ramooranga,
52005021	asimsima haleanjeessean; ak ghoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheanda miy,
52005022	ohhelleewana geat munyinda wassean.
52005023	Gagasa ghoammiidu Aseetta mideawa weayda sasanuukkeagwa sean, nea gaba geaw; ak gagasa gahamiyaasiit gamiyeasiidi guroruunatkeagwa ea jeesingeagwa ak geemmajeek nea meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas aba damanda hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
52005024	Ninyeeda guurneegwa adoabiiwaat, ak gayghoammiineegwa.
52005025	Fuga eaduupcheewi, amusiischoaweasa.
52005026	Oakghada fuga siduupcheewi sean aba samooda ghaydit.
52005027	Geamuscheegwa appadayda Ng'uttamiida, ossomassiina fuga eaduupcheewi sean barawajeanji.
52005028	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo oagasean.
53001001	Baulo ea Silwano, ea Dimotteo, ea ganiiseeda Desaloniikke mida jeeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa sea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
53001002	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda leabu heeda Aseetta was Ghweanda, sea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
53001003	Aseasa gammiiseasa ebadiischeesiina galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ea gittoobiiwsiinda gil, aba gideaba masaweegeagwa niheedu muuchchi, nea bariinyeega gilwas siih aba jeedeang'wa aba hichpa nuut ea niihaada.
53001004	Amaduw earaseasa ea sugwareesi appadahuukkeagwa aba jeesinga ganiisajeega Aseetta aba milikghteaydeang'wa ea masaweega ondeawi aba ghabasteang'wa sean sea sawanaduutka oamilikghti.
53001005	Niih gwadeagooda girgweageeda huumwa bea Aseetta, ak abeeda geanung' ahuuwa fuga miisa gheambalmeeda Aseetta, was dea ghamneawa sisawasseegwa,
53001006	hean aba huumwa Aseetta gayghawaldawa sawanadeeda aba heedeaba fukka sawaneegwean,
53001007	ak gagooneegwa fuufta sea aseasa agoogeeda sisawan, damanda jea eattahaaja Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu jea gwaleabu humng'eeda sea malaykajeegaaschi mideawa uurjeenga beasta yeat,
53001008	nea ghawalda mureandooda masissiina mureeda giijasta miy bea Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu.
53001009	Ak gaygwasawana aba ghoorjooda nyariida manda mudeanooda ak geegeandeawa madeeda Ng'uttamiida ea heeda gigheambiitaannyi mideawa uurda,
53001010	eaweetta jea ghwahinna eakghambiit aba jeeda fugaaschi ghaydidi, ak ghahamng'eanyi buuneessean ghayi mwas ninyiin, aba gideaba muwwuunoodeanya geamwas aba heedeang'wa.
53001011	Appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, iissa geamwaashchi Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, gideaba gagasa ghwanung' Aseetteanya gahaguuweegwa guurunoadaannyi, ak ghoahiit gilinyooh aamiy gasa ea gadiyeeda masaweega aba uurdaannyi,
53001012	abeeda gwanda gharbeeda gheawunga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba jeesingeagwa, nea agooga geakghambiideagwa aba jeadaannyi aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetteanya ea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
53002001	Asi ghamneawa aba iitta hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo ea bassiinda jea eabwada geat ak gendeawi niny, geemuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi,
53002002	ak ea adagabay gwaduumduum fughareengeagwa ghana adeawiida, aba gurorooda ghana ng'asheanda, ghana aba barawajeanda sighay gwaleabu heedeanya, ahiimu gideaba eaweeda Ng'uttamiida nihidu.
53002003	Asi adagwareenganneegwa siih aba gidawassean; aba gideaba eaweettida mayghwahidu, ea ghanyi gooshoohu mwadi heheeweega, ak abeeda geattahaach siitta was roodaneeda, was balleanda roodaweegean,
53002004	diida heewachchiin ak goodiing'ng'u geaw appadayda giliwassean sugurriideawa aseetta ghana gilinyooh eebada, ea eeyi bwak ea gageanu horgeadaannyi aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, ak ghoahiimu geaw gideaba niny Aseetta.
53002005	Moapkaadi damanda ghayi sindeayeewi sea agooga nearukuneegwa ng'asheesu?
53002006	Ak ghamneawa ghoanalli gidadeal niny, abeeda geattahaach aba damandaannyi.
53002007	Aba gideaba makcheameetta bea heheweega deaweedean ghamneawa gagadiiyi; ak ghamneawa gwanda siida adeal, gaygwasindunu ea eeghus ea sigeanda aba jeennaweeda.
53002008	Abeeda diitta mandeawana deaweedean gajeattahaach, ak abeeda gaygwanuus Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu aba aroosta ghuuttaannyi ak gwanyarja niny aba deaktaannyi ea hinnoadaannyi.
53002009	Aba hinnooda dea mandeawana deaweeda aba gadiyeeda Shattaani gaygwandeawa uurda sean nea gwandeawa gwadeagwajeega ea deamdeamanga,
53002010	ea ng'uyyeega sean munyas aba heeda fuga jea gameewa, aba gideaba saawa mwamwasa bariinyeega, ak abeeda ghwanyas lealeanooda.
53002011	Ghoaw gidanung'waadawa Aseetta gobiideewa jeeda uurda roodaweega, ak ghwanung' ghamwas ng'uyyeega,
53002012	ak abeeda gergweaksa sean giikka mwamwasa huumeandean ak goohoosan geat aba jeeda ng'asheega munyasiin.
53002013	Iiduw gammiiseasa aseasa gideaba gajeebadiischeesiina Aseetta galeagasean appadahuukkeagwa, fuga eaduupcheewi bwariiy Ng'uttamiida, aba gideaba ghayi nibay ghwaloadeagwa Aseetta ghang'eada mwadi ak ghoanyaschi lealeanooda, aba gimmiinooda jea ghoammiinneegwa Gurorooda, ak ghoamwaschi huumeanda.
53002014	Aba niih ghayi guurnaneegwa aba naweeda giijasteanya miy, ak abeeda ghoanyaschi gigheambiitta Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
53002015	Asi, fuga eaduupcheewi, amiinaada nea gommajeekchi geat, ak ghoang'ng'waanyi ng'asheekka ghayi sinnalleagwean, gaba ng'asheega ghana gaba barawajeanda.
53002016	Nea abeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo niny, ea Aseetta was Ghweandeanya, ghayi bwariinyeasa ak gageandeawaneasa salgheang'da ea ghoaw eaweega mammuudeana ea gidamiy sirarji aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda,
53002017	ak gageandeawa guroruunatkeagwa salgheang'da, nea gomajeegideegwa aba giliwas gadiyeeda miy ea ng'asheanda.
53003001	Asi huydeanda fuga eaduupcheewi, amwaasha Aseetta appadahuukkaasa, ak abeeda gawa ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida mwadi aba hooseaneega, gawuurji giduurji aba heedeang'wa,
53003002	ak gelealnaneasa heeda fuga miih doobiiweadi, munyas; aba gideaba miih sean gil gea mideawa masaweega.
53003003	Iiduw Ng'uttamiida ea doabiiwaat; jea gomajeegideegwa nea ghoahaghwaneegwa aba diitta muyiin.
53003004	Amaduw earaseasa ea sughuschi Ng'uttamiida appadahuukkeagwa, nea gideaba goosinnyi ng'asheega ghayi surukuneegwa, ea gideaba gajasna ng'asheega sugoonnyeegwa aba digheanda.
53003005	Gagasa ghoadoabiiw Ng'uttamiida guroruunatkeagwa ak ghoanyaschi bariinyeega Aseetta, nea ghoamilikghti aba Gristo.
53003006	Fuga eaduupcheewi, geegoonnyeegwa digheanda, aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, ohhelleewana geat oorjeedagiyeang'wa wassean bea ghaleahu nea masna ng'asheega ghayi sing'ng'waanyaan heedeanya.
53003007	Ak ghoanalli agooga gidamiisiindaneegwa gideaba gajootteascheewana geat, ak ea meebeahi ghaleahu damanda sindeayeewi sea agooga,
53003008	nea ghanyea miyeayaaga mukkatteeheemba siida wassean nea meashaahi, geaghus aba sawanadeeda ea deawiitmeeda nea geesinnyi gadiyeeda eawa ea askweari, ak abeeda ea meesawani siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa.
53003009	Nea meakna gideaba meendeawani uurda gil, geebaysiini gideaba geegasayi ghoaw searoojigaasa gichchea agalana ak gotteascheewi.
53003010	Aba gideaba earaba damandida ghayi sindeayeewiin, gegoonnyeegwa digheanji, “Gideaba siida iimagassa gwasin gadiyeeda abeeda ea adagweagiischi.”
53003011	Aba gideaba siyiinyi gwanda jeedeang'wa fuga ghaleehooda, iissa ghasa geat ng'asheega buuneeda, nea goodeawiit buuneeda suurja.
53003012	Asi ghamneawa gajeattawa fiisu digheanda nea geamiinnyi gheang'da aba naweeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo dasna gadiyoojiga nyaawa nea ghwasiinda ak ghwanyas hamitta nyaawa jea ghwaak.
53003013	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, adoalagaannyi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas.
53003014	Ama deeppa gwanda siida wassean heawa gwasissa mureeda ng'asheandeanya surgu aba jeedeaba barawajeanji, abeeda orroora siisi, nea adiiduw goppaloolli, ak abeeda ghabwaspwas.
53003015	Ak ea doanung' ghoaw weajoochcheanda, areekusiinda gheang'da oorjeeda giyeang'wa.
53003016	Asi ghamneawa gagasa gagooneegwa weayda Ng'uttamiida ninyeeda mideawa weayda galeagasean aba naweadinga sean. Gagasa gobiida Ng'uttamiida heedeang'wa oagasean.
53003017	Aniini, Baulo, ghang'waarji giighadi aba geattindeanyu. Niih girooraneeda gil aba giliwas barawajeandeanyu; niih gideang'oorriidi.
53003018	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo oagasean.
54001001	Aniini Baulo geawoschi gijasoocheanda Yeesu Gristo aba digheanda Aseetta was lealnoocheandeanya ea Yeesu Gristoyda was ghusoodeanya.
54001002	Ea Dimotteo balleandeanyu bea huumwa aba naweeda masaweega. Nyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea baydeayda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea Yeesu Gristo was Ng'uttamiideanya.
54001003	Damanda ghayi eaweewi Makkedoniya geamuscheeyi gideaba abiidana Efeso. Ak eara ghamneawa geamuscheey aba gideaba gwanda fiisu anaal ginealshooda ng'uyyeega aghuuma fiisu.
54001004	Ak ea adagang'ulla ng'asheega ghwasildeanga ea iitooda gheambaghweaniga mamudeana jea gweadu sheangnyeeda ak ea mwalooda gil nea miih gheambalmeeda Aseetta mida jeeda masaweega, asi sindunu.
54001005	Gidasibaysiina digheanji ea bariinyeega leabu jeedeesh ea ng'asheega rinna ghuuta miy gil ea masaweega manda gimitunoodabwageaw.
54001006	Buneesuurja iimwanyasa naweeda miy ak gwayamsa geat ng'asheega mwadaagha,
54001007	Saawa gagasa gideaba gayghoaw ginealshoodiga deaweeda, ak ea mwanala ng'asheeka baloolean, nea eara ng'asheega baloola nea goomajeeksea ghanyeamwanala.
54001008	Ak geanalli gideaba deaweeda amiy, siida ii gadiyeatta aba naweeda hit,
54001009	gagasa eanala ng'asheanji gideaba deaweeda mamiisiina siida doobiiwaat, gamiisa fuga munyas, ea gea mwada geeshta deaweeda, ea fuga mwamwasa Aseetta, ea fuga ring'eega, ea gea sina ng'asheega munyas, ea fuga mabatta Aseetta, ea fuga bara ghweaniga nyaawa, ea inyeesa bara gheamadiga nyaawa, ea fuga nuusa buuneeda,
54001010	ea fuga mealuuli, ea ng'eedeeda mealuuli sea niirja, ghana fuga jagwadi suurja, ea gea ng'uyeega, ea fuga akka habeawooda ng'uyeega, ea imiida ng'asheanda wassean maweapchi sea ginealshooda bea huumwaani.
54001011	Ak gineashooni ea diitta ghayi sigoonan darukwiida Gijasta Miy bea badayda gigheambiita Aseetta diitta mideawa ghawoodean.
54001012	Aniini geabadischeesi Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya goonan uurda aba gideaba ghwadaah geawoschi doobiiwaat, ak ghwayiinan jeeda gadiyeedaanyi.
54001013	Abeeda aniini ghayi ammwadi geanyareesay buuneeda nea geang'eaway, nea geasawanyi ak ghanyaschi baydeayda aba gideaba geasinyi ng'asheesu aba leendeeda, aba gideaba meandeawani masaweega.
54001014	Ak ghanyaschi muuchi dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya, ea masaweega ea barinyeega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
54001015	Ng'asheanji huumwa gil, ak gamiisa masooda muuchi gideaba Gristo Yeesu ghwahidu munda ng'eanyiida gwalealu fuga ring'eega, ak siida madeeda aba jeedeaba fiisu ea aniini.
54001016	Ak aba seareeni ea naanyaschi baydeayda aba gideaba aniineani bea madeedean, ghoadaajiit Yeesu Gristo milightaydaanyi sean, aba heedeanyu, nea ghaahuyi siida iiduw jea etteaschi ak aba heeda fuga jea ghamwas ak ghwanyas eaweega manda mudeanooda.
54001017	Mureeda ea gheambiida daba sugoocheanda eaweega manda mudeanooda was dea maygamutmudan, ak ea midachi ninyi Aseetta gil ak ghwahit ea ghwoow eaweega manda mudeanooda. Amin.
54001018	Ea balleandeanyu Dimotteo, geagoonyeey digheanji ghoow gidiwshooda appadayda ng'asheega was ramooranga ghayi ashoohu appadaydang'u, ak appadaydeaba suuh gung'uchi muuchi ng'ucheedida.
54001019	Ak guhuwi siida masaweega bissa amiy fughara aba gideaba gwanda fuga ninung'waada miyinda fughareeda, ea ghwadatas masaweega nyaawa.
54001020	Aba jeedeaba fiisu gwanda geaba Himenayo ea Iskanda, ak fiisu eaneasachsi Shattaan aba gideaba gideaba eannaal ak ea mong'eawa Aseetta.
54002001	Gidamadeeda jea deamajeek geagasayi musiischooda ea baditta Aseetta ea mooshta ghawooda nea goobadischeesi, ak ng'asheesu geesin appadahuuka buneasean.
54002002	Amooriisiina sugoodiga ghawooda ea fuga hees sean mideawa gheambalmeeda, ak geanyaschi gibinda siippiit ng'eanyi ea hoyyooyda, ak geabwachchi Aseetta nea geepiidi naweeda miy.
54002003	Ng'asheanji amiy, ak ea mwasaati aba madeeda Aseetta was lealnoocheandeanya,
54002004	nea gasa gideaba gay ghwalaalaan buuneesseaniin, ak ghwanal gitta was humeandean.
54002005	Aba gideaba Aseetta aagi, ak eara dea aaduupchi buuneeda ea Aseetta aagi, ninyi siida was Gristo Yeesu;
54002006	miny gabeagu eaweegaaschi nea gabwageaw ak ghoaw siida jea goottin buuneessean, ak gajeemuuwwu aba damandaanyi.
54002007	Ak aniini appadaydeaba niih geayiinan doaw giijasoochcheanda ak gearukwiidi giijasta nea ghawaschi ginealshoochcheanda fuga eemoojiga danal masaweega ea huumeanda. (geargu huumwa mearukni ng'uyeega).
54002008	Asi geagasayi gwandeawa headiga geattinga miyaas, biissa ea manyareessa, biisa ea masheangdooschi. Abeeda headiga sunu ea dagatgada geattinga nyaawa googeal humng'eeda galeagasean damanda mooshta ghawooda.
54002009	Ak gwasnu eara gadeemga ea dasna suulga aba eagweega miyaas, ak gwandeawa mureeda miy gheedeenda ak ea adagwasin suulga aba buudeega sireedi ghana lagheanga meang'meang'i ea boshcheanda, ghana eagweega hees sheayat.
54002010	Ak suulga nyaawa gidabal ea gibinda nyaawa miy gil aba gideaba niih gidamiisa gadeemga awali Aseetta.
54002011	Gatmooda gamiisa gideaba gayghwasinda aba damani gassa nalooda gidean, nea ghamwas aba naweadinga sean.
54002012	Aniini measiksiini gatmooda goonealshi ghana gideaba gaygoombali ng'eedeeda, gamiisa gideaba gayghwasiinda.
54002013	Aba gideaba siida sisin bea madeeda Adam gil, ak gabassa Hawa.
54002014	Ak Adam ea miyerengani geereengani gatmooda muuchi ak ghwabitta jeeda ramaseanda.
54002015	Ak gay ghwalalaan aba jeattaanyi iimajeegiit appadayda masaweega ea bariinyeega ea giminooda ea jeeda mida gheadeenda.
54003001	Ng'asheanji huumwa gil gideaba siida jea ghoaw siida haw jea ghoahaaghwa fuga ganiisa gagasa gadiyeeda miy.
54003002	Siida haw bea ganiisa gamiisa gideaba ea meerukna gidamuy appadaydaanyi ng'eedeeda mideawa gatmoonagi, mideawa gheadeenda biissa gwandeawa weaghumeeda, siida aroottooschi haleanjeeda, deapiida buuneeda, naal goonealshi,
54003003	Miih siida boogidi gil, miih siida bara buuneeda, ak ea garbabu, miih siida gheangnyachi gil, ak ea miih siida bwariiy lapiya,
54003004	ak ea siida ammu goobal gheanyi muuchi nea ghwanung gaba diibigaaschi mureeda.
54003005	(aba gideaba siida mwaammu goombal gheanyi gay ghwamustaan ghoahaaghwa Ganiseeda Aseetta?)
54003006	Ak ea adaghoaw siida duughwalalaan askwearjoojusu neekiin, ak ghaghwargeaw ak goobeedeaysa jeeda girgweaksiinda gawurji gidasihinda Shataan.
54003007	Ak gamiisa gideaba gamuuwwuuna badaydaanyi fuga manda jeeda Ganiisa ng'asheega miyaas, aba gideaba adeergu ng'asheega munyas appadaydaanyi ak ghoabitta jeeda gadageeda Shataan.
54003008	Weedanga fuga Ganiisa eara saawa gamiisa gideaba ea fuga miyaas searooji ak ea miih fuga yamiisachchi ng'asha, ak ea miih fuga leeha difaayeeda ak ea fuga bwariiy lapiyeeda leabu naweeda mwadaabiiwa gil.
54003009	Ak saawa gamiisa gideaba goomajeek masaweega aba jeeda miy.
54003010	Fiisu gidamadeeda ghang'wana ghanyi eadaa ea jea ghoammu gadiyeani ii manda gilsidaah muyi abeeda geenung wasin gadiyeani bea weedangean.
54003011	Eara gadeemga nyaawa gamiisa ea fuga miyaas searooji gil, miih fuga nappiisa buuneeda ng'uyeega, ak gamiisa ea fuga mideawa gheadeenda gil, nea doobiiweadi aba haleanjeesean.
54003012	Weedanga Ganiisa gamiisa gideaba gaygaba ng'eedeeni bea gatmoonagi, nea ghoanaal muuchchi diibiga nyaawa naweeda miy, ak ghoomu goobal gealga nyaawa.
54003013	Aba gideaba fuga sin muuchchi gadiyeeda weedanga Ganiisa gajeewal gheangda, ak gay gooleeysiit buuneeda ak ea may ghoawal gil aba masaweega nyaawa mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
54003014	Geang'oorneey baruwajeanji nea geabaday hinnooda heedaang'u eawoojusu duwaawiin.
54003015	Ama deeppa dashingda ginali gidamiisa gibinda fuga gheeda Aseetta was Ganiiseeda Aseetta majeek, was sindeetta ea Lagheaneeda sar gheeda bea huumwa.
54003016	Ak ea huumwa gil gideaba makcheameeda baditta Aseetta ahaw. Aseetta geetaajiiti aba saseeda Ak doobiiwnataanyi ghoohiimu Gurorooda Ak ghwadaah giijasoochcheanda humng'eeda Ak geerukwiida iittaanyi aba jeeda emoojiga, Ak geamwas aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, Ak geeyaat humng'eeda heeda ghambiidaat.
54004001	Asi ng'asheanji gabean gwargu Gurorooda Ghaydit nea ghwadaajiit bea gideaba damanda huydean gwanda fuga jea gooheelli geat masaweega, ak gooleeysiit fuga ng'uyyeega ea ginealshooda Shattaani.
54004002	Aba ng'uyyeega fuga ammiittu geat, hean ghaghwarda jeesinga nyaawa saawa nea gaba geat.
54004003	Inyeessa ghoadeal buuneeda geeshshooda, ea agitta hamichchoojiga nea hamichchoojusu ghayi ghabwat Aseetta ak ghwanung' ghwadeaptaawa badiischooda fuga mideawa masaweega naal humeanji.
54004004	Aba gideaba haleanjeesean sin Aseetta amiyaas, nea manda dea jea eeheawa, gamiisa gideaba gajedeaptaawa badiischooda.
54004005	Aba gideaba haleanjeeni siminna ng'asheanda Aseetta ea mwooshta ghawooda.
54004006	Apkeasiina oorjoogiga ng'asheesu, ak gaywoosa siida gadiyeeda miy bea Gristo Yeesu, naal ng'asheega masaweega, ea ginealshooda miiy ghayi iyaadi geeshta.
54004007	Asi heawana deanghoochka munyas bea gweargwa mwaloada giliin. Ak ang'iing'i giinaali geaw baditta Aseetta.
54004008	Aba gideaba deangheeda nung' ghwanyas saseeda uurda ghwahit gilmwanang', ak baditta Aseetta ghwahit aba haleanjeesean, aba gideaba gindeawi heelleeda eaweegeaba ghamneawa ea diitta iiduw jea ghwahiduun.
54004009	Ng'asheanji huumwa gil ak gammiisa gideaba gajeemwas.
54004010	Aba gideaba ghoaw gidaghamna adeawiideasa ea gidasigadiyeatti muuchchi appadaydeaba gili. aba gideaba aseasa geeghuschi Aseetta majeek was lealnoochcheanda buuneessean, ghwaraanya gea mwas niny.
54004011	Ng'asheesu rukuta nea ginaali.
54004012	Adiidu gafool siih gheareemanandumeedaang'u, ak guwoosi siida jea eegala aba heeda fuga mideawa masaweega, aba jeeda baloolda ea giibinda sea bariinyeega ea masaweega ea alooheeda.
54004013	Damani jea doonaan, milmiliida aba giissoomanda nea gireekusi buuneeda nea ginaali.
54004014	Adinung'waadi gadiyeetta immuusi mida jeedaang'uuni, sigoonyi aba ramooraneedean, ak ghwayiin gweargwa geattinga nyaawa uhuudaang'u.
54004015	Ateemsheesiina ng'asheesu muuchi, ak giibiidi jeeda nea giing'ng'ooysi aba gideaba gay ghwadaajiit giibindaang'u aba heeda buuneessean.
54004016	Ghamwada saseedaang'u ea ginealshoadaang'u. Abiidana jeedeaba ng'asheesu aba gideaba iisini ng'asheanji gajaghuhageaw ea fukka alleeyseey iidiin.
54005001	Adiwoowsi gweargweeda, reekusiina gawurji ghweanda, ak eara gheareemanga gawurji oorjooga giyeang'wa,
54005002	gadeemga woosi gawuurji geamadu, gadeemga manang'i gawuurji haweega giyeang'wa aba alooheeda sean.
54005003	Sissiina mureeda masinng'weega was masinung'weega huumwa.
54005004	Ak masinung'weanda iimideawa diibiga ghana diibigaabwa gaaschi, gidamadeeda diibisu gagasa ghwanal gidamiisa saawa bea ng'ullooda fuga nyaawa, nea gang'ula fuga jiilu aba gideaba ng'asheanji aamiy aba madeeda Aseetta.
54005005	Nea dea was masinung'weanda huumwa, sinung'wa heeda nea gaba geaw, niih ghusoadaanyi niidaw Aseetta ak niny goomajeek mooshta ghawooda ea baditta Aseetta eawa ea askweari.
54005006	Nea masinung'weanda moammu ghoong'ng'waay geaw aba ng'asheega munyas niih niimi eara eeng'ula nea gudeamajeek.
54005007	Ng'asheesu rukkuta adiiduw abeeda adaghoaw habearga.
54005008	Gili was siih mwaghamwada fugaaschi was fugaabwa gheanyi niheawa masaweega, ak gamunyiiti ea ghang'al siida mandeawana masaweega.
54005009	Masinung'weanda adeang'waar ea gaba gweanyeewi laadam nea abeeda siyeadaanyi ghayi aagi.
54005010	Ak easumwowuna badaydaanyi ng'asheega miyaas bea gireerda diibiga, ak ea nideapta rabasta nea niihuun gishanga fuga ghaydidi ak ea niweat fuga mida jeeda sawanadeeda, ak ea nisin muuchi ng'asheega miyaas.
54005011	Ak masinung'weega was gadeemga duea manang'i adung'waari gheawunga nyaawa aba gideaba iiraanya geawunda gheangda bea saseeda gay gwanungsa heeda naweeda Gristo ak gaweay gheenda.
54005012	Abeeda saawa gajeergweaksa aba gideaba ninung'wa heeda masaweega nyaawa bea madeeda.
54005013	Nea gichcha ea meaghusa niih, ghwanaal geat ghaleehooda ak gwaneaydooschi aba gealga ak ea miih ghaleehooda gil gabeachi, inyeesa goong'uuchi buuneeda nea gwasikideawa ng'asheega nea gabaloola ng'asheega mamiisiina saawa.
54005014	Asi aniini geagasayi masinung'weega was gadeemga manang'i eegeena, ak gwaji diibiga ak goombal gealga nyaawa, aba gideaba eamwanyasa weajoocheanda gheata habearga appadahuukka nyaawa.
54005015	Aba gideaba gwanda mwaatkwa gea niyamgeat ak ghwaat geeshta Shataan.
54005016	Gatmooda mideawa masaweega imideawa masinung'weega aba gheanyi daweada ninyi nea gabwageaw masinung'weegiga, aba gideaba adaghoaw sareenda Ganiisa, Ganiisa gay ghaweati masinung'weegiga bea huumwa.
54005017	Gweargwa sin gadiyeenyaawa nea ghwoamiidu gamiisa eattaw mureeda muuchchi ghwaraanya gikka deawiitti aba rukwiideayda ng'asheega Aseetta nea goonealshiin.
54005018	Aba gideaba gwayi ng'ooruutka, “Adiradi ghuutta deeda gadiiyi.” Ak gwayi gicha, “Siida gadiiyi gahaguuwsa mushaahareadaannyi.”
54005019	Adimwasi giheakteayda badayda gweargweeda ea ingsiina gisiihaaktaawa ghuusispa fiih iyeenya ghana samwagu.
54005020	Fukka sina ring'eedean awoowsiina aba madeeda buuneessean, ak abeeda ghabeal suurja.
54005021	Ngasheanji gearukneey aba madeeda Aseetta ea madeeda Gristo Yeesu ea madeeda gijasoodiga humng'eeda siloat, sina ng'asheesu nea adilamwaji girgweaksiinda, nea adisini ng'asheanda aba shiitmeeda.
54005022	Adilamachsi inda geattinga uhuuda siida nea adung'udi geaw ring'eega buuneessuurja. Ak gishageadi geaw ak gimmiidu.
54005023	Gidang'eada ghamneawa adileehayi beega ak ghwahiti, leaha difaayeeni ng'ay aba agidi bea jeadaang'uuni ea geyoonung'weakka biikkiiseey galagasean.
54005024	Ring'ega buuneeda mwaatkwa adaach ak ea nisheeda gaweay heeda girgweaksiinda nea suuk ring'eega nyaawa gaygweadu geeshta.
54005025	Ak aba sareani sinooda ng'asheega miyaas aadaachi ak eara giikka miidaajiin ea mwajeamu eafuyi.
54006001	Soomjooga sean gammiisa gideaba gay ghwaadaw meanang'oodiga nyaawa mureeda aba gideaba meang'eawwa gheawunga Aseetta ea ginealshoodeanya.
54006002	Ak soomjoogiga was meanang'oodiga nyaawa fuga masaweegean adagafool aba gideaba oorjookkeennyaawa ghang'wana gagadiyeesa muuchchi aba gideaba suuh weat soomjooga aba gadiyeeda nyaawaan niiw fuga masaweega ak ghabwariiy. Ng'asheesu anaala nea gireekusi.
54006003	Siida wassean iyanaal fughara nuut nea mwamwasa ng'asheega mideawa eaweega Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ghana ginealshooda samgeat sea baditta Aseetta,
54006004	niih nung'ut ghwarjeeda ak ea manda gil nal, ak gaba geeska gittemshooda badayda ginyeeshteayda ng'asheega ea galleadayda ng'asheega nea aba jeedeaba suuh gwarinna ng'ullooda siida aba gheangda muy, jalliida ea ging'weaka ea meannyooda muy bea siida,
54006005	ea sheangnyeeda fuga nidatasa fughareenga nyaawa nea mandeawana humeanda ak ghaghay gili meanang'oochcheandumeeda gil.
54006006	Nea baditta Aseetta ea rearnatta meanang'oochcheandumeeda haw gil.
54006007	Aba geaba geepkaanyi badayda ng'eanyiida nea meeyeani gil, ak gajeebiikta nea meayaadi gil.
54006008	Ak iisindeawi gichea eayaaga ea hang'weaka gajeerearniitta.
54006009	Ak fukka gasa meanang'oocheandumeedean gay ghwahitta jeeda simsimda ea jeeda gadageeda ea jeeda ng'asheega munyas mabwa gil bea leendeeda nung ghwahitta buuneeda jeeda roodaweega.
54006010	Aba gideaba gumdooda ng'asheega munyas sean gweadu bariinyeega lappiya, ak buuneeda mwaatkwa ea ninungwaada masaweega aba bariinyeesu bea lappiyaan ea gwasawan jeesinga nyaawa.
