54006011	Asi ang'iingi siida Aseetta, ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheesu ak giyaadi geeshta doobiiwnata, ea baditta Aseetta ea masaweega ea barinyeega milighteayda ea garbabanda.
54006012	Ng'uchcheena muuchchi ng'uchcheedida bea masaweegean, ang'ng'waanya eaweegiga manda mudeanooda ghayi suguurnaneeyiin, ak gimuuwwu muuwwunooda miy aba madeeda muushoodiga saang'a.
54006013	Ng'asheanji gearukuneey aba madeeda Aseetta diitta adaw haleanjeesean eaweegean, ea madeeda Gristo Yeesuda ghayi muwwu muwnoodaanyi miy aba madeeda Bondiyo Bilatto,
54006014	bea gideaba ang'waanya digheanji aba doobiiwnata nea manda habearga, ea ghwahidu hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
54006015	Aba gideaba iihiitta damandaanyi gay ghwadaajiinyi Aseetta niny geekghambiit ak goombalischi nea gabwageaw sugoocheanda sugoodiga Ng'uttamiida ng'uttamoojiga,
54006016	niny nea gaba geaw mwayghami ak gwanda jeeda weeshinda majeeneekiisa ak ea manda siida nidaah ak ea manda siida ammu ghwadaah. Mureeda ea uurda daanyi gil ea ghoaw eaweega manda mudeanooda! Amin.
54006017	Fuga ghamneawa was meanang'oodiga appadayda ng'eanyiida rukusiina gideaba adagagwara geat nea ghaghus meanang'oochcheandumeani jea goosheani, gagasa ghaghus Aseetta goona haleanjeesean saang'a, ak geegadiyeati aba hoosaneega.
54006018	Dasna ng'asheega miyaas ak ghoaw meanang'oodiga aba sinooda gaamiyaas, ak ghoadayda haleanjeenyaawa nea gabareanyi sea buneesuurja aba jeeda miy,
54006019	nea goodiiwsa geat haleanjeeda ghoaw sindeetta miy aba damanda jea ghwan ak ghwanyas eaweega was gea huumwa.
54006020	Ea Dimotteo, fura muuchi diitta ghayi siteaganeeyiin ak ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheega mwaloada gil, mawoosa gea diiniin ea sheangnyeeda fughareeda suguura, “Fughareeda ng'uyyeega.”
54006021	Ak gwanda fuga suuk aba muwwunoodeaba ng'asheesu ea niramwas masaweega. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda!
55001001	Aniini Baulo geawoschi giajasoocheanda Gristo Yeesu aba gidagasiida Aseetta appadayda heelleeda eaweega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
55001002	Ea Dimotteo balleandeanyu abwariinyi. Dagheerjeandumeeda dahinna headaang'u, ea baydeayda ea hoyyooh leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya.
55001003	Geabadischeesi Aseetta eabadayi aba guroorooda miy ghan'geada damandida bea gweargweasuun inyeessa ghaapkachcheey galaagasean aba jeeda mooshteanyu bea ghawooda eawa ea askweari.
55001004	Ak geagasayi muuchchi deaktaang'u, iyaapkaachchi dabeakkaagu ak abeeda ghaanyaschi hooseaneega.
55001005	Iyaapkaachchi masaweega indeawi manda gimminnoodeaba geaw ghayi bean gwandeawa ghamageamadu suguura Loisi, ea geamadu wa Eunikke ak ghanali gideaba eara ang'iing'i gindeawi.
55001006	Ak aba seareeni geapkeaneey gideaba aseawsiina ghoahaada giimuusta goonyi Aseetta mida jeedaang'u aba damanda ghayi ayiini geattingeasu uhuudaang'uuni.
55001007	Aba gideaba Aseetta magooneasa gurorooda giyoonda, gagooneasa dea uurda bea bariinyeega ea jeeda mideawa deascheeda.
55001008	Adibwaspwasi aba muwunooda badayda Ng'uttamiideanya ghana aniineani eandi ghealooniga appadaydaanyiin, asi milikghteaysiina ng'asheega munyasiin sea aniini appadayda Giijasta Miy aba uurda Aseetta.
55001009	dea ghayi lealneasa ak gaguurneasa aba guurnooda ghaydit nea niih ea mabaysiina aba gissisinyi aseasa ak niih gabaysa ninyi ea dagheerjeandumeedaannyi. Dagheerjeandumeani geegooneasa aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu nea miyeabwat ng'eanyiida.
55001010	Ak ghamneawa dagheerjeandumeani geattaajiit aba hinnooda lealnoochcheandeanya was Gristo Yeesu Niny nijoar miyeeda, ak ghwadaajiit eaweega mayghwadattasa aba giijasta miy,
55001011	appadaydeaba ng'asheesu geayiinan doaw ginealshoochcheanda ea giijasoochcheanda darukwiida giijasta miy.
55001012	Ak aniini ghaanyaschi sawanadeeda appadaydeaba ng'asheesu ak geawoschi hidaat aba gideaba ghaanali niny dea amwaschi ak ghaanali gideaba ghwoaamu gafur giitta ghay goonaniini bwak ea ghwahitta damandida.
55001013	Ang'ng'waanya gidahiimu ng'asheega mideawa eaweega ghayi iyiing'si heedeanyu, aba masaweega ea bariinyeega mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
55001014	Fura diita miy ghayi sitteaganeeyiin aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit mida jeedeanyean.
55001015	Ang'iing'i ginali gidaghayi nung'usiindanean heeda fuga ng'eanyiida Asiya eara geaba gwanda jeeda eara geaba Figelo ea Hermogene.
55001016	Gagasa ghwoadaw Ng'uttamiida baydeada fukghea Onesiforo aba gideaba inyeesa imiighoaw gil goomajeegan nea mwabwaspwasa aba ghealoonigeasu.
55001017	Inyeessa iihidu hiji bea Ruumiin gagasean muuchi ea ghwanyasan.
55001018	Ang'iing'i ginali muuchchi gidaghayi deawiitta aba ng'eanyiida Efeeso appadaydeanyu. Gagasa ghweadaw Ng'uttamiida eaweedida.
55002001	Asi ang'iing'i balleandeanyu, darusiida aba jeeda dagheerjeandumeeda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu.
55002002	Ak ng'asheega ghayi iyiing'si heedeanyu aba madeeda muushoodiga saang'a iina ng'asheega geattinga fuga doobiiweadi jea ghoammu ghwanal suurja.
55002003	Eppareannyeena sawanadeeda sea aniini, gawuurji shirikkarajeanda doabiiwaat bea Gristo Yeesu.
55002004	Shirikkarajeanda mida jeeda ng'uchcheeda maygwadeawiit aba haleajeeda munda ng'eanyiida aba gideaba gaygoohoosan shirkkarajeandaannyi haw.
55002005	Eara siida igalleada aba jeetteangheeda mwajeattaw shiipka imagalleada muuchchi.
55002006	Siida barooda sin gadiyeeda hang'waay gammiisa gideaba gayghwanyas haghweega madeeda.
55002007	Atteemsheesiina muuchchi ng'asheesu sean earuguun, aba gideaba gaygagoonnyi Ng'uttamiida fughareeda appadayda ng'asheega sean.
55002008	Appkaada Yeesu Gristo, dea ghayi duunna miyeeda, bea dooshta Dawdi, gawuurji gidanyaashta Giijasteanyu.
55002009	Aniini geesawanan appadaydeaba Giijasi miyiin, ea eayaadan ghealooniga dawurji siida sin ng'asheega munyas, ak ng'asheega Aseetta ea mwajearat.
55002010	Ak aba sareani geamilikteaysi ng'asheega sean aba badayda fuga loat Aseetta, gideaba eara saawa ghwanyas lealeanooda mida jeeda Gristo Yeesu ea giigheambiitta ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
55002011	Ng'asheanji gammiisa masaweega. Gideaba “Aba gideaba isiimeewuuday sea niny gajeepiidana sea niny.
55002012	Nea isimilikghiti, gajeembalischeena sea niny, Nea isiheawi niny, niny earada gay ghwaheawaneasa.
55002013	Nea aseasa ii meewosi doobiiweadi, niny doobiiwnattaanny ea maygoosha. Aba gideaba niny mwayghaheawa geaw.”
55002014	Apkeassiina fugaagu ng'asheesu nea gireekusi aba madeeda Aseetta gideaba ghwoabuut ng'asheega galleadayda gea mwalooda gil nung' gwarooda fuga aleeysiit.
55002015	Milmiliida eadaanyi gideaba nimwasnyi Aseetta, siida gadiyeeda mwabwaspwasa aba gadiyeedaannyi, ak ginaali ng'asheanda huumwa aba gidamisiinda.
55002016	Ang'aamwana geaw ng'asheega mwaloada gil, mawoosa gea diiniin gikka mwamwasa fuga Aseetteani, aba gideaba fuga sunu gayghoabitta jeeda ng'asheega munyas.
55002017	Ak ng'asheanda nyaawa gaygageawiit iitta ea gawuurji udamusuura. Aba jeedeaba suuk gwanda geaba Himenayo ea Filetto.
55002018	Nea saawa ea ninung'waada naweetta bea huumeandean nea geebaloola gideaba duunnooda goolla ghwahidu, ea ghwayam masaweega buuneeda mwaatkwa.
55002019	Ak sindeetta ghayi iin Aseetta ea nimiinaada nea majeek, nea uhuudaannyi geeng'oorsa ng'asheesu, “Ng'uttamiida ghwanal gea was gaaschi.” Ak gicha gilinyooh gwarukku gheawunga Ng'uttamiida adanung'waada ng'asheega munyas.
55002020	Aba jeeda gheeda haw manda dabitta gharinga meang'meang'i ea dabitta gharinga ak ea mabeachchi suuh, gwanda eara gea geediga ea gea sigeeda suuk gwanda gea mureeda suuk ea mandeawana.
55002021	Ak siida iamiidu geaw ak gooheelli geaw ng'asheesu munyasiin niny abeeda gayghoaw dabichcheanda siihhuun ak ghwanyas mureeda haguuwsa Ng'uttamiida ak sinoodaannyi geebaysiina gwasin gadiyoojiga sean miyaas.
55002022	Asi mang'wana ng'asheega munyas bea gheareemaneandumeeda wa geawunda gheang'da, aada geeshta ng'asheega doobiiwnatta ea masaweega ea bariinyeega ea hoyyooh sea fuga sean guurriisa Ng'uttamiida aba jeeda miy.
55002023	Asi heawana sheang'nyeeda leendeeda manda jeeda fughareeda, ak ginali gideaba sheang'nyeeni gaygwaji jaliida.
55002024	Ak ea mammiisiina siida gadiyeeda Ng'uttamiida gwajala, gammiisa gideaba gajeagarbabu aba heeda buuneessean, bissa ghwanal goonealshi ak gamilikkiida ng'asheega.
55002025	Aba damandida rekkusiina fuga mwamwasa ng'asheagaaschiin, gammiisa ea garbabu aba gideaba ideappa gwasa gwadeappa ghwaadaw Aseetta fiisu duukuunooda ak ghwanal huumeanda.
55002026	Ak gabiiksa fughareenga nyaawa, ak gwaritteawa jeeda gadageeda Shattani ghayi ang'waay saawa ak gwasin gidagassiida Shattani.
55003001	Ak ginali ng'asheanji gideaba eawoojiga huuydean gay gwanda washta.
55003002	Aba gideaba buuneeda gaygaba niih bwariiy geaw, ak gaygaba siisi bwariiy lappiya, gaba nii ghwargeaw ea gea weashweashta ea gea ging'weakka ea fuga mwamwasa ng'asheega jilnoodiga nyaawa ea gea mandeawana badischooda ea gea miimiyaas.
55003003	fuga magassa fukgheannyaawa ea gea magassa gidupcheeda ea gea naba ng'uyyeega ea gea moammu ghoadeal geat ea gea ng'weani ea gea mwabariinya ng'asheega miyaas,
55003004	ea gea leappageat bwadaw ea fuga hang'oonyi iheen, ea gea gwarageat, ea gea bwariy mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida nea moasaamwa bariinyeega Aseetta.
55003005	Inyeessa gawuurji gili bada Aseetta ak ghaheawa uurdaannyi ang'aamwana geaw fiisu.
55003006	Aba gideaba aba jeedeaba suuh gwanda headiga ama inyeesa gaweay jeesinga gealga buuneeda ak gageanda gadeemga dasheahi mideawa sareenda ring'eeda nea gagis mittagheasta muunda ng'eanyiida.
55003007	Gadeemsu inyeessa gagasa nalooda ng'asheega galagasean ak moammu eara hay nalooda huumeanda.
55003008	Niih gawuurji gidaghayi heawaatta geaba Yaane ea Yambure ng'asheega Muusa ak eara fiisu ghaheawa huumeandida ak suuh ea fuga nidattasa fughareenga nyaawa gil, ak ea siheawa aba ng'asheega masaweega.
55003009	Ak ea mayghang'atta mwaadi muuchchi aba gideaba leendeennyaawa gayghwadaajiit aba heeda buuneessean, gawuurji gittajiitta leendeedeaba fiisu.
55003010	Ak ang'iing'i ea niyaadi geeshta ginealshoodeanyu ea gideabadiinniidi ea gideagassiidi ea masaweega ea milighteayda,
55003011	ea bariinyeega ea milighteada ea sawanaduutkeasu bea ng'asheega ghayi anyaschi aba ng'eanyiida Andogiya nea Igunio ea Listra, bea sawanaduutka eamilighteaysi ak gwalealneani Ng'uttamiida aba suuh seaniin.
55003012	Huumwa gil siida wassean iigasa giibinda ea baditta Gristo Yeesu gayghwanyas sawanadeeda.
55003013	Ak fuga munyasearooji ea gea ng'uyyeega gayghang'atta mwadi ak ghwaranya buuneeda nea eara saawa geereengani.
55003014	Asi ang'iing'i abiidana jeeda ng'asheega ghayi sinaalnyi nea geesikteawean aba gideaba ginali gideaba geabeang'a gil gea ghayi anaalanyi.
55003015	Aba gideaba ghang'eada jeepcheandumeeda ninali ng'ooruutka ghaydidi jea ghwanung' nyasa weaghuumeeda ea nyasa lealeanooda aba naweeda Gristo Yeesu aba masaweega.
55003016	Giliwas ng'ooruut mideawa Jeammeeda Aseetta ghwahit aba ginealshooda ea rekkusinda buuneeda aba gidinyeannyeekka nyaawa ea gidoobiiwda nea ghwanyas ghoorjooda doobiiwaat.
55003017	Abeeda aahidaat siida gadiyeeda Aseetta nea sinung' ghwahit ak gwasin giliwas gadiyeeda miy.
55004001	Gearukuneey ng'asheesu aba madeeda Aseetta ea madeeda Gristo Yeesu ditta jea goorgweaksa fuga majeekcheewi ea gea nimeewean aba gidaheachtaannyi ea aba gheambalmeadaannyi,
55004002	rukwiida giijasta wosa hidaat (damanda miseey ea damanda mammiiseey), awoowsiina ajuursiina nea gireekusi aba milighteayda sean ea ginealshooda.
55004003	Aba gideaba gayghwahidu damanda jea eaheawa ginealshooda mideawa eaweega ak ghwaat geeshta naweeda gidagasiida saawa ak gwanyaksa geat gimughuscheekka ginealshoodiga aba gideaba gwandeawa idiga jea gwasikkiideawa ng'asheega.
55004004	Ak gaygoodiilda geat ea mwayiinya ng'asheega was gea huumwa ak gwayamsa geat deanghoochka ng'uyyeega,
55004005	Asi ang'iing'i mideawana gheadeenda aba haleanjeessean, milikteaysiina gea munyas sina gadiyeeda rukwiideayda giijasta miy ahiida gadiyeedaang'u nea gidoobiiw.
55004006	Aba gideaba aniini ghamneawa gajeetaydanaan doow gujaweeda ak ea nihiitta damanda jea dameawa.
55004007	Neang'uchchi ng'uchcheeda miy, neang'uuchcheewi, ak ea nahiichi ng'weega, ak masaweega ea neafurji,
55004008	ama ng'atta suuh geegoonan shiipka aba doobiiwnatta dea iiduw eaweetta jea gagoonan Nguttamiida nea niny ea dea doobiiwaat girgweaga ak ea miih aniini gil akghwahit eara fukka sean gasa gidaheachtannyiin.
55004009	Sina badiida ak gihidu heedeanyu nea gilamwajaani.
55004010	Aba gideaba Dema ghabwariiy haleanjeeda munda ng'eanyiida ak ghang'eat gwanung'sean heeda ak gawa Desalonikke, ak Greske gawa ng'eanyiida Galattiya, nea Diitto gawa ng'eanyiida Dalmattiya.
55004011	Lukka geandeayeesi hiji nea gabageaw. Gassa Marko ak giideani aba gideaba niny gayghaweadan aba gadiyeedeanyu.
55004012	Ak Digikko ea neajeakti gawa Efeeso.
55004013	Iihidu giyeadu hang'deanyu gul ng'eanyi ghayi eanung'usi heeda Garpo bea ng'eanyiida Droa, ea gittaabwajeegiga ghwaraanya gikka sisna muuchkean.
55004014	Isganda diitta was gidang'oocheandean nisinnean ng'asheega munyas saang'a gayghawalda Ng'uttamiida gawuurji gidasinda niny.
55004015	Ak gishageadi siisi, aba gideaba ghaheawa muuchchi ng'asheegaasa.
55004016	Damanda ghayi sirgweaksinanean bea madeedean manda eara siyagi wea meatkweedeanyu ghaweadan, hean gwanung'usean heeda sean ak geamuschi gideaba gidinyeanji adeeyiin badahuukka nyaawa!
55004017	Ak ea niminaadawa Ng'uttamiida meatkweedeanyu ak gagoonan uurda aba gideaba gagasa niny darukwiida giijasta miy, ea ghwayiiy emoojiga sean, ak ghalalaani ghuutta ng'adiida.
55004018	Ak gaygwalealnean Ng'uttamiida aba ng'asheanda wassean muy, ak gayghaghamwadan ea dahitta gheambalmeedaannyi bea humng'eeda. Gigheambiita daannyi gil ea ghwoaw eaweega manda mudeanooda. Amin.
55004019	Agatta Briska ea Akkila, ea fukka mida gheeh Onesiforon.
55004020	Erasto gahuydean aba ng'eanyiida Goriinto. Drofimo geanung'usi Miletto aba gideaba ghamnyaan.
55004021	Sina badiida hinni damanda miighwahinna goroogeeda. Googatteey geaba Eubulo ea Bude ea Liino ea Glaudiyo ea oorjooga sean.
55004022	Gagasa ghwoahaaghwa guroroadaang'u Ng'uttamiida. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda.
56001001	Baulo, soomjeanda Aseetta ea biissa giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, ak ghaanung' gawa mwadi masaweega fuga loat Aseetta ea fughareeda huumeanda mideawa miyinda,
56001002	Aba jeeda rarooda eaweega manda mudeanooda, aba heeda Aseetta moammu gwanaba ng'uyyeega, sibean eheelleesa gweannyeekka goolla ghang'tta
56001003	iiduw nea ghwahitta damanda ghoadaajiit ng'ashaandaannyi ghayi sitteaganean aniini aba girrukuteayda lealnoochcheandeanya was Aseetta;
56001004	Heeda Ditto jeepteanyu bea huumwa aba naweeda masaweega sippareannyi. Gagasa nyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Gristo Yeesu was lealnoochcheandeanya.
56001005	Niih gideanung'usiinaneey ng'eanyiida Grettehi ak abeda gisni gadiyeetta shoadaan, nea giyiini gweargwa giliwas mujiinajean gawuurji gidaghayi earukuneey, siida iimeyeatteena ghuut.
56001006	Iideappa siida ea miyeerukuna badayda ng'asheega munyas nea siyeeda gatmoodassagi gil, nea diibigaaschi gwandeawa masaweega miyeergweaksiina deambilaneandumeeda ghana nyootta mureeda.
56001007	Nea jeagiischoochcheanda ganiisa, was siida sitteaga gadiyeeda Aseetta, gammiisa ea meerukunana badaydaannyi ng'asheega munyas; ak gagasa ea maba ghwarja ghanea miih assas nyaras ak ea miih leeyeanda ghana gwajala ghana gwashissa ghaang' haleanjeeda mwahida,
56001008	gamiisa ea siida innya jihi, ak gwandeawa bariinyeega haleanjeeda miyaas, nea goodeeneaeda geaw, ak ea doabiiwaat, nea ghaydit, nea ghoang'ng'waay geaw;
56001009	nea ghoang'ng'waay muuchchi ng'asheanda gawuurji gissinnaalda, ak abeeda ghoammu ghoadayda ng'asheega gichchea eabeeda aba ginealshooda huumwa nea ghwajoar fukka heawaan.
56001010	Aba gideaba gwanda fuga saang'a manda mureeda, mideawa ng'asheega mwalooda gil, nea gwareengani buuneeda, nea ghwaranya gikka siyyiiliin,
56001011	gidabal gearat ghuusiga nyaawa aba gideaba fiisu inyeesa gahutteawi buuneeda aba ginealshooda ak ghwanyas haleanjeeda aba ginealshooda mwadaagha.
56001012	Nea siyagi aba jeannyaawa, ea sibaneeda nyaawa gil, ak gwayi, “Fuga Grette gaba ng'uyya galeagasean, ak ea diyeanga munyasi, ak gaba ghaleahu nea deewwi.”
56001013	Muwwunoani huumwa gil. Asi awoowsiina saawa nea ging'waniidi, ak abeeda gamajeegiit aba jeeda masaweega,
56001014	nea adagooleeysiit gununoonga fuga Yahuudi ea ng'asheega rugu buuneeda heawa humeandean.
56001015	Aba heeda fuga miyaas haleanjeessean amiyaas, nea gea munyas ea gea mandeawana masaweega aba heannyaawa manda gidamuy; fughareenga nyaawa ea gitteemshooda nyaawa ea munyas.
56001016	Iissa gwargu gideaba geanalli Aseetta, nea iissa ghwashaang' aba sinaweega nyaawa, nea gwandeawa sichcheeda, ak ea mandeawana mureeda, mammiisiina sinooda gadiyeeda miy.
56002001	Asi ang'iing'i anaala ng'asheega miisa ginealshooda huumwa.
56002002	Fuga hees gagasa gwandeawa gheadeenda, miina gheanyanga buuneeda, mideawa fughareenga, mideawa masaweega huumwa, mideawa bariinyeega huumwa ea majeeknatta.
56002003	Ak eara gadeemga woosi gamiisa ea fuga sinniisa geat mureeda gil, nea adagwanaba ng'uyyeega, ghana leeyeanda, gamiisa gideaba gaygoonealli ng'asheega miyaas,
56002004	ak gayghoanaal gadeemga manang'i gichchea, ghabwariiy siyeenatka ea diibiga nyaawa,
56002005	nea gwandeawa fughareeda, ak ea miyaas, nea goobiida gealga nyaawa, nea innya jiih, nea gwasisa siyeenatka nyaawa mureeda, aba gideaba ea meeng'ng'eawa ng'asheega Aseetta.
56002006	Ak gireekusi eara gheareemanga gwandeawa gheadeenda.
56002007	Ahiimda geaw aba mureeda sean eadaa ormeeda gadiyoojiga miyaas, nea aba ginealshoodaang'u gihiimu seareeda miy, ea gideeneadayda,
56002008	nea ng'asheega sirgu bea huumwa ea meeyeatteena ghuussi, ak abeeda siitta heawaan ghabwaspwas, aba ng'asheanda muy jea gwarukuna badahuukkaasa.
56002009	Ging'ng'oonyanga gamiisa gideaba gaygwasiisa meanang'oodiga nyaawa mureeda, nea gahaguwsa aba halanjeessean, ak adagwasheaha ng'asheega,
56002010	ak ea adagwajagwadiisachchi, gahaguuw gideaba gayghoahiimu doobiiwnatta huumwa, ak abeeda aba haleanjeessean ghwanyas ginealshooda Aseetta was lealnoochcheandeanya.
56002011	Aba gideaba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta lealu buuneessean sittaajiit,
56002012	ak ghoanaaleasa eeheawana ng'asheega maba diini ea geawunda gheang'da, mideawa gheadeenda, ea doobiiwnatta, ea eaweeda miyaas sea Aseetta aba jeedeaba ng'eanyiini,
56002013	nea geammuughu ghusooda mideawa ghawooda ea gidaheachta gigheambitta Aseetta haw ea lealnoochcheandeanya was Yeesu Gristo,
56002014	nea niny ghoadayda geaw appadahuukkaasa ak ghaweadaneasa ng'asheega munyas sean ak ghoammiidu fuga jea ghoaw gaaschi nea gamilmiliidi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas.
56002015	Rukusiina buuneeda ng'asheesu, reekusiina nea giiwoowsi aba gheambalmeeda indeawi sean. Ak ea adiidu gafoolnyi siida.
56003001	Apkeassiina saawa gweada geat ng'eanyi aba heeda fuga ahaaghwa ng'eanyiida ea gea mideawa gheambalmeeda, ak gwasissa mureeda, nea hidaat aba gilinyooh ea gadiyeeda miy gil,
56003002	adagoong'eawi siida wassean, amulsiina jaliida, ahuuwa emoojiga miyaas, nea ghoahiimu garbabanda sean aba heeda buuneessean.
56003003	Aba gideaba ghayi ammwadi geewoschi dasheahi, ak ea meendeawani mureeda ak geewoschi roodanga, ea ging'ng'oonyanga aba miyeenooda muunda ng'eanyiida, nea geeppiidi jeeda ng'asheega munyas, ea lajoodeaba ghuut, nea ghwasteagwa buuneeda nea goostayi geat agooga;
56003004	Ak miyinda ea bariinyeega Aseetta was lealnoochcheandeanya geattajiit,
56003005	hean gwalealneasa, ea meabaysiinana sinaweagaasa doobiiweadi sisinnyi aseasa niny gwalealneasa ak geejilneasa niba iyyeenya ak ghwanung' eahuuwa fuga eashish aba Gurorooda Ghaydit,
56003006	nea gagoaneasa nea gooheedu aba naweeda Yeesu Gristoyda was lealnoochcheandeanya,
56003007	ak abeeda gegoaneasa doobiiwnatta aba dagheerjeandumeedaannyi ak geararji hearanda eaweega manda muudeanooda.
56003008	Ng'asheanji earguun huumwa gil. Ak geagasayi rukta ng'asheesu nea giimajeegi, aba gideaba fukka mwas Aseettean goobiida jeeda sinooda ng'asheega miyaas; nea suuh ea miyaas nea ghwadoabiiw aba heeda buuneeda.
56003009	Ak giing'aami geaw ng'asheega jaleadinga, ea ng'asheega suroaproabwaada, ea foolayda ea sheang'nyeeda appadayda deaweeda, aba gideaba mayghwaloat gil ak ea mwahida.
56003010	Asi siida foolayda iinireekusi dea madeeda ghana deabiyyeenya, adagudismi eara gil,
56003011	ak ginali gideaba siida uurji niih niramwas, aba gideaba gwasin ring'eeda, ea niirgweaksa geaw.
56003012	Iiduw iyeajeagu heedaang'u Attema ea Digikko, abeeda gisni badiida hinni heedeanyu ng'eanyiida Nigoppoli, aba gideaba neabaday gideaba gaydeaksa hoowa meahooda.
56003013	Sina badiida aba bareannyeekka Seena, was diinagiida ea Appolo aba buweanooda nyaawa; ng'ulla adaghoashoanya gil.
56003014	Ak eara fugaasa saawa gamiisa gideaba ghoanaal geat gibinda jeeda sinooda ng'asheega miyaas, ak gwasissin ng'asheega gasa ealamwach sinooda, ak ea mawosa gea manda haghweega.
56003015	Ghoaghannyi fuga sean eandeawi. Aghada gikka bwariinyeasa aba naweeda masaweegean. Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda oagasean.
57001001	Baulo siida ghealooniga appadayda Gristo Yeesu, ea Dimotteo oorjeeda giyeanya, heeda Filimooneeda was siideanya subwariinyi suweechcheewi aba gadiyeeda
57001002	ea Afiyayda was huda giyeanya, ea heeda Argibo was shirikkarajeanda Gristo suweechcheewi bea ganiiseeda mida jeedeaba gheang'u:
57001003	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooh leabu heeda Aseetta was ghweandeanya ea heeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo.
57001004	Geabadischeesi Aseetteanyu galeagasean iyapkachcheey nea ghamwaashchi Aseetta,
57001005	aba gideaba nayiinyi bariinyeegaagu ea masaweega indeawi appadayda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu ea heeda fuga ghaydidi sean,
57001006	ak ghamwaashchi Aseetta aba masaweagaagu suguuyeesi nyagu fughareeda miy bea haleanjeessean ikkaasa aba jeeda Gristo.
57001007	Aba gideaba naanyaschi hooseaneega muuchchi ea hawdeayda aba bariinyeegaagu oorjeediyya, aba gideaba guroruunatka fuga ghaydidi nihawda appadaydaang'u.
57001008	Aba gideaba earapeadi eawoschi muraneeda hidaat aba naweeda Gristo ak geerukuneey sina gidasigasa,
57001009	iiduw appadayda bariinyeega geamuscheey gideaba, aniini Baulo, was siida siichcheagu ak ghamneawa geawoschi siida ghealooniga appadayda Gristo Yeesu,
57001010	Geamuscheey appadayda jeepteanyu was Onesimo, nea nahuuyi ghwaan aba damanda eandeewi ghealooniga,
57001011	(Ghanyi niny mwaloada aba headaannyi gil, ak ghamneawa gwalooseey gil agooga ea aniini).
57001012	Geajeagu gabiigu headaang'u, aba gideaba niny guroroodeanyu.
57001013	Gaydahoosan aniini iyabiida heedeanyu ak ghaweadan aba meatkweedeang'wa damani eandeawi ghealooniga appadayda giijasta miyiin,
57001014	ak geagasayi ea measni gil nea mimwasi ak abeeda ea mediing'seey aloaheadaang'u geaghus aba gidigassiidi.
57001015	Niih ghaghanyi ghoaw gidasihhelleewaneey aba gheadi nuwasiin, ak iiduw goobiiksiinyi gichcha ak goopiidi hijagi damanda manda muudeanooda.
57001016	niny mudugawuurji ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niny ning'al ging'ng'oonyaneeda, niny gawuurji oorjeediyya abwariinyi, raanya aba heedeanyu ak gaygawuurjiin muuchchi aba headaang'u, aba saseeda ea heeda Ng'ttamiida.
57001017	Asi iiyoanung' doaw siida oguuyeewi, deaptaayda niny gidagwachchi jea deaptaaydanaan aniini.
57001018	Ama ideeppeanidiiyseey aba gidawassean, ghana gwandeawa sileadaang'u wassean, abeeda ging'oornean sileeni.
57001019	Aniini Baulo ang'warji ng'asheesu aba geattindeanyu, gaydawalu aniini, Mearukuni ak gindeawi sileedeanyu aba jeeda Gristo.
57001020	Asaha, oorjeediyya, sinnean ng'asheega miyaas ak ghaanyagaadi appadayda Ng'uttamiida, ak gihoosani guroroodeanyu aba naweeda Gristo.
57001021	Ghamwaaschi aba mureadaang'u, ak geang'oorneey ang'iing'i nea ghaanalli gideaba gaysina ng'asheesu ea ghwanaawa gea earukuneey.
57001022	Asi aba damani, asna ghooriida rabasta jea deabiida, aba gideaba ghaararji aba mooshteang'wa bea Aseetta gajanyasaan.
57001023	Ghoaghannyi Epafrayda eandeayeesi ghealooniga aba jeeda Gristo Yeesu,
57001024	ea Marko ea Aristakko ea Deema ea Lukka was fuga easnuudayeewi gadiyeeda.
57001025	Dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo gagasa goobiida jeeda guroruunatkeagwa.
58001001	Aseetta ghayi goobalool ghwaanigaasa aba ghuusiga sibanga aba naweadinga saang'a ea damannyoojiga saang'a;
58001002	amaduw aba mudeanoodeaba askwearjoojusu goobalooleasa aseasa aba naweeda Balleanda, ghayi loat ghoaw siida jea gwahearan haleanjeessean, ak aba niny gwasin ng'eanyiida appadaydeaba niny.
58001003	Aba gideaba niny ghoahiimu weeshinda gigheambiitta Aseetta nea gwandeawa girooraneeda ea seareedaannyi, ak ghwasar ng'eanyiida aba ng'asheandaannyi mideawa uurda. Iing'atta nea nisin gimmiinooda ring'eeda, hean gopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta was Ng'uttamiida aba hoowa bea dadaliiliin,
58001004	Ak ea sunung' gwaheedu ea ghoadaraam malaykajeega aba gideaba gheawunga ninyas ahaweewa ea ghang'al gaanyaawa.
58001005	Neada Aseetta ea niyeeshsha ana malaykajean, “Ang'iing'i nuwosi Balleandeanyu, askwareani neajiilleey?” Ghana gichcha, “Aniini gaydoaw aba headaannyi ghweanda, ak gayghoaw aba heedeanyu balleanda?”
58001006	Ak gichcha, iyeadu duweachcheadaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida, gwayeeshsha, “Nung'waada ghaghadoawan niny malaykajeega sean bea Aseetta.”
58001007	Gwayi aba heeda malaykajeega, “Gwasin ng'eaha meang'eega malaykajeega, nea ghwanung' ghoaw soomjoogaaschi ng'ushapta beasta.”
58001008	Ak gwayi appadayda Balleanda, “Horgeadaang'u, Ea Aseetta gaba eaweega manda muudeanooda, sugoochcheandumeeda doobiiw sugoochcheameeda gheambalmeedaang'u.
58001009	Gibwariinyi doobiiwnatta ak gisti fuga mandeawana deaweeda; asi Aseetta, was Aseettaang'u nimwaarnyi aba nagheeda hooseaneega ea ng'ala bareandaang'u.”
58001010	Ak, “Guwosi, Ng'uttamiida, ghayi sin ng'eanyiida aba mwadi, nea humng'eeda ea gadiyeeda geattingaagu gil;
58001011	suuh gaygameewa, nea ang'iing'i gajabiidana; ak gaygawoosiidi sean ea gawuurji hang'da,
58001012	gawuurji hang'weakka gajeammughuushghuush, ak gajeayam. Nea ang'iing'i guwuurjeewi gideawoojusu, nea gweannyeakkaaschi ea maygammuudean.”
58001013	Ak ea niyeeshsha ana malaykajean, “Apteada aba meatkweeda geattindeanyu bea dugwa, ea dayiin weajoodigaagu ghoaw hoorgeeda geeshangaagu?”
58001014	Neada malaykajeega gadiiyi ghayi sichcheagu gagadiiyeesa, appadahuukka fuga jea ghwanyas lealeanoodeani?
58002001	Asi gammiiseasa gideaba gajeeng'ulla muuchchi ng'asheega ghayi siyiinyi, ghana esheagiidana.
58002002	Aba gideaba giijasta ghayi rugu malaykajeega gaba huumwa nea giliwas ramaseanda ghana nyootta mureeda ghwanyas waldeayda doabiiw,
58002003	aseasa gajeammuusa eemuldaan imeduuppi lealeanooda haw deenu? Aba gideaba ghayi nibay gwayi Ng'uttamiida ammwadi, ak gagoaneasa fukghayi iiy niny,
58002004	nea Aseetta gamuuwwu aba gwadeagwajeega ea ng'asheega haloodi ea deamdeamanga saang'a, ea gidaguh Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwalakkuuneasa aba gidagassiida niny.
58002005	Aba gideaba Aseetta moadawa malaykajeega ng'eanyiida jea ghwahidu, was dea sibalooli.
58002006	Iiduw ea sittaajiit aba hich gideaba, “Siida neada ea naaha gil ea apkaada ghana balleanda siida, ea eeyi bwak ea ng'uulla?
58002007	Ginung' ghoaw siida mwanang' aba gheadi nuwaas ea ghwalaabwa hoowa malaykajeega, ak gishshuubi shiipka gigheambiitta ea mureeda,
58002008	ak ghwayiin haleanjeessean hing'eadayda geeshangaaschi.” Hean nea niyiin haleanjeessean hing'eadayda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi ak gagadiyeesa niny, ea manung'usiina gil bwadaw aba heeda ahaaghwa. Eara gwasa, miyeadaaha haleanjeessean nea gagadiyeesa niny.
58002009	Iiduw geedaayi Yeesu, dea aba gheadi nuwaas geanung' ghamwanng'iit ea ghwalaabwa hoowa malaykajeega, nea siyiin uhuuda gigheambiitta ea mureeda aba sawanadeeda ea miyeeda, ak abeeda aba dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta abeeda gwasamu miyeeda aba giliwas sih.
58002010	Aba gideaba ghwahit aba headaannyi, niny ea aba heeda dea ghayi abiideewa haleanjeessean, ak gweadu balloojiga sean heeda gigheambiitta ak ghoaw gidamadeeda jea gagadiyeatta bea lealeanoodean aba sawanadeeda.
58002011	Aba gideaba dea ammiidu ea gea simmiidu gwaleabu sean hijagi. Ak ghoaw gidamwabwaspwasana iguureewaneegwa fuga eaduupcheewi,
58002012	nea gwayi, “Gaydarukusa gheawungaagu fuga eaduupcheewi, appugusta fuga bwat geat gaydaduumseey.”
58002013	Nea gichcha, “Gaydayiin masaweegeasu heeda Aseetta.” Nea gichcha, “Aniini geandi hiji, ak ea nigoonan Aseetta diibiga.”
58002014	Gwasnu eara diibiga gaguuyi saseeda ea foojeanda, gwasnu eara niny gwandeawa saseeda uurji niih, ak aba naweeda miyeeda abeeda ghwadattas diitta mideawa uurda miyeedean, nea meang'nyeandeenda,
58002015	abeeda gwalealu fukka sean mida jeeda gheawalmeeda miyeedean goobiida jeeda eaweega geawwi bea soomjeandumeeda.
58002016	Ak ea daach gideaba mwaweada malaykajeega niny ghaweat jeatta Abrahaamu.
58002017	Asi gajeenung' gawuurji sea fuga duupchi aba gheatkweakka sean, ak abeeda ghoaw siida bayyiida buuneeda ea dea doabiiwaat was ashoohoochcheanda haw bea gadiyeeda Aseetta, ak gaygohuun ring'eeda buuneeda.
58002018	Aba gideaba niny ghayi gwasawana nea geesimsim, niny ghoammu ghaweat fukka sisimsimiin.
58003001	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi ghaydidi, siguuyeesi guurnooda humng'eeda, asikteawana Yeesu, was giijasoochcheanda ea ashoohoochcheanda haw masaweagaasa.
58003002	Niny adoabiiwaat aba heeda dea ghayi ajeagu niny, gawuurji gidawoseatta Muusa doabiiwaat aba jeeda gheeda Aseetta.
58003003	Eara Yeesu ea sinung' ghoaw dea doabiiwaat muuchchi biissa aghambiidaat ea ghang'al Muusa ak gawuurji siida deas gheeda gwandeawa mureeda ea ghang'al gheeda.
58003004	(Aba gideaba giliwas gheeda gwanda siida deas, nea dea deas haleanjeessean ea Aseetta.)
58003005	Nea Muusa ea doabiiwaat aba haleanjeessean mida jeeda gheeda Aseetta nea gawuurji soomjeanda, ak gamuuwwu haleanjeeda jea eergu galannya,
58003006	nea Gristo ea doabiiwaat aba jeeda gheeda Aseetta nea gawuurji balleanda. Ak geewoschi gheannyi ising'ng'waanyi muuchchi gitta sisikteawiin nea geaghwarji gitta sirarjiin.
58003007	Asi, gawuurji gitta rugu Gurorooda Ghaydidiin, nea gwayi, “Askwearean, iyoayiinyi ghuuttaannyi,
58003008	ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa awuurjeewana fuga nittambiilan, aba eaweetta simsimda aba jeeda dareapcheeda,
58003009	damanda simanean ghweanigeagwa ak ghwadaah gadiyoojigeasu aba gweannyeew haradam.
58003010	Asi iiduw ghoanyareasan seaygeedida, nea gwayi, ‘Iissa gwarooda galeagasean aba jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa; ak ghanyea mwanala naweadingeasu.’
58003011	Gawuurji gidayaakti habeawooda aba nyarasteanyu, ‘Ghanyea maygaweay heeda jea dafuufa.'"
58003012	Ang'ulla, fuga eaduupcheewi, adiiduw gobiida jeedeang'wa munyinda ea gurorooda mandeawana masaweega, jea ghwanung' oappeada ea asheagiidana Aseetta mideawa eaweega.
58003013	Daba siisi amajeek nuut galeagasean, aba hiji duueeguura “ghamneawean,” ak ea manda jeedeang'wa siida jea ghoahang'waay aba reengaweega ring'eeda.
58003014	Aba gideaba geguuyeesi Gristo, iisibeachcheewi gideaba geang'ng'waanyi muuchchi gitta sisikteawi ammwadiin ea gagul muudeanooda,
58003015	Iiduw ea siyi, “Askweareani, iyooyiinyi, ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa awuurjeewana fuga nittambiilan.”
58003016	Geabeang'a gil fuga iiy ak ghwattambiilan? Neada ea miih fukghayi leabu Misri nea ghoahaghwiidaan Muusahi?
58003017	Ak ea akkeega gil fuga anyareas gweannyeew haradam? Neada ea moanyareasa fukghayi sin ring'eeda, abeedeaysa muscheekka nyaawa dareapcheeda?
58003018	Ak ea akkeega gil fuga aksa habeawooda gideaba maygaweay heeda fuuftaannyi, neada ea miih fukka ghayi masissiina mureedeani?
58003019	Hean geadaayi gideaba mayghoammu gaweay jeeda aba nyootta masaweega.
58004001	Asi helleesiinda beatta jeeda giibindaannyi gwanda heeda, ak gidabal geabealli ak ea mwaramwasa siih aba jeedeang'wa ak geergweaksiina gideaba mwanyasa.
58004002	Aba gideaba giijasta miy ghwahittaayda heedeanya gidahittaayda heannyaawa; nea iitta nyas ghanyea maloossiina gil, aba gideaba mwanyasa masaweega aba jeeda fuga iiy.
58004003	Aba gideaba aseaseeda ghayi numwas gaygaweay jeedeaba fuuftida, gawuurji gidanyaashta niny, “Gawuurji gidayaakti habeawooda aba nyarasteanyu, ‘Ghanyea maygaweay jeeda fuufteanyu,'"earappeadi niisha gadiyoojigaaschi ghang'eada dea ghayi subwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida.
58004004	Aba gideaba gwanda heeda rugu iitta eaweetteaba ispwa nea gwayi, “Ak gafuuf Aseetta eaweetteaba ispwa aba gadiyoojigaaschi sean.”
58004005	Nea gabiikta gwayi aba hiji, “Maygaweay jeeda fuufteanyu.”
58004006	Asi earagwasa gideaba gwanda fuga jea gaweay jeeda, nea fukka ghayi asheeda ghoang'ng'waay giijasta miyiin ghwaraay gaweay jeeda aba nyootta mureeda,
58004007	gichcha gagasa eaweechcha nuut, “Askweareani” nea gwarukuna ghuutta Dawdi iimuchchu nea ning'atta damanda haw, aba ng'asheega ning'atta giideascheeda, “Askweareani, iyooyiinyi ghuuttaannyi, ea adoahhang'waanyi guroruunatkeagwa.”
58004008	Inyeeda ghayi Yoshuwa aniidaw saawa fuufta, abeeda gwachchi Aseetta ea maygabaloola eaweechcha nuut.
58004009	Asi, sighus fuufta eaweetta sabatto aba heeda fuga Aseetta;
58004010	aba gideaba siida weah jeeda fuufta Aseetta earada gayghwanung'waada gadiyeadaannyi gawuurji gidanung'waadayda Aseetta gadiyeadaannyi.
58004011	Asi egagasa gimiriikta beatta jeedeaba fuufidi, ak abeeda ea manda siida jea ghoabeadaayda gidada aba nyootta mureeda.
58004012	Aba gideaba ng'asheanda Aseetta ea majeek ak gagadiyi ak gwandeawa eaweega, ak gwandeawa uurda, ak ea ng'aniip ea ghang'al bwaangeeda ng'aniip meadajeega sean, iissa ghang'ut ak goheelli fughareeda ea gurorooda, ea robuutka ea gudadeeda, ak ghoammu gwasikteawa fughareenga ea gidabwariiy gurorooda.
58004013	Ak ammadeadaannyi ea manda gidaghayi sisin jea afunyaat, amaduw adaach haleanjeessean ea dawiiri nea daach aba madeeda gheanyangaaschi nea dea jea gorgweakseasa.
58004014	Ghang'eada damandida geendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw ambal sean ghayi sik bugusta humng'eeda, nea Yeesu, Balleanda Aseetta, asi eangn'ng'waanya muuchchi gitta sumwaschiin.
58004015	Aba gideaba meendeawani ashoohoochcheanda haw moammu ghabwayda ng'arng'arannyeakkaasa, gendeawi dea sisissa mureeda sean ak gesimsimda gidaghayi sisimsimdaneasa, amaduw ea miigwasin ring'eeda.
58004016	Asi gagasa eneekkiida aba gissirarji eapkaana heeda hoorgeeda ghambiidaat bea dagheerjeandumeeda, ak abeeda geanyaschi baydeayda ak geanyaschi dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghaweat fih damanda sigasseewa.
58005001	Aba gideaba gilinyooh ea ashoohoochcheanda haw siloat aba jeeda buuneeda gealoat gwasin gadiyeeda aba hoorgeeda buuneeda aba giduupcheeda sea Aseetta, ak ghoadayda haleanjeeda ea haleanjeeda lukghumajeega appadayda ring'eeda.
58005002	Nea ghoammu gwandeayi sea fuga mwanala gissin ea gea sadeadi, aba gideaba niny gaburda ng'arng'aranda.
58005003	Appadaydeaba ng'asheesu niny sirat ghoadayda lukghumajeega appadayda ring'eagaaschi ak ghoadayda eara gea buuneeda.
58005004	Ea manda siida ammu gwanyaksa geaw mureani, geaghus gaguursa Aseetta, gawuurji gidaguursiinda Haruuni.
58005005	Gwasnu eara Gristo miih godiing'u geaw ak geanung' ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda haw, niny ghwaloat dea ghayi eeshsha niny, “Ang'iing'i guwosi Balleandeanyu, askweareani neajiilleey;”
58005006	ak gawuurji ginnyaashta aba hich nuut, “Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda uurji Melkisedeki.”
58005007	Aba askwearjoojikka bea saseadaannyiin ghamwaash Yeesu Aseetta nea gang'ula humng'eeda ak ghabwat Aseetta, nea goyyeawda aba ghuutta haw ea dabeakka, nea gogeal heeda siida ammu ghoaghuuha niny miyeeda, ak geayiiy aba gidawalda gheang'da Aseetta.
58005008	Earappeadi was Balleanda, ghwanal mureeda aba gitta ghayi sawaniin;
58005009	amaduw nea siimmajeek ghoaw ging'eetta lealeanooda mamudeana aba heeda buuneessean sissa niny mureeda,
58005010	ak ghwaloat Aseetta ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda haw uurji Melkisedeki.
58005011	Appdaydeaba niih geendeawi ng'asheega saang'a jea eerukuna hang'waay rukunooda, earappeadi mwang'ada iidigeagwa.
58005012	Earappeadi aba damani miisa awosa ginealshoodigean, gammiiseegwa gideaba gajanyasa siih nuut jea ghoanaleegwa gichcha ng'asheega majeekcheewi bea madeeda bea Aseetta. Googasayi eanooga, miih hamitta hang'waay gil;
58005013	aba gideaba siida ghus eanooga mwanala gil aba ng'asheega doabiiw, aba gideaba niny jeepta.
58005014	Hamitta hang'waay gaba fuga nihittiisa heeda, nea giikka mideawa fughareengean ea sinnaal sinooda gichchea goheelleatta ng'asheega miyaas ea gea munyas.
58006001	Asi aseasa eweaya mwadi eanung'waada ng'asheekka ghayi bea garayi bea ginealshooda Gristohiin nea gehittiisi heeda, ak ea adagudeesinnyi sindeetta duukkuunooda aba gadiyoojiga nimeewa ak geendeawi masaweega aba heeda Aseetta,
58006002	aba iitta gimmiinnooda, ea iitta iinda geattinga iheenga buuneeda, iitta dunnooda miyeeda, ea girgweageeda maygamuudean.
58006003	Nea ng'asheesu gajeesna iimwas Aseetta.
58006004	Ak ahang'waay gideaba gaynung' gwaduukkuuna fukka ghayi nidaah weeshinda ammwadiin, fukghayi siittaw gimearda Gurorooda Ghaydit,
58006005	ak ea nisamu aloheeda ng'asheanda Aseetta ea dea uurda gweannyeekka jea ghwahidu,
58006006	amaduw ghwayam geaw nea nittambiilan, nea abeeda ea ningoor Balleanda Aseetta aba gidagassiida saawa ak gong'ng'ooysa humng'eeda aba foolda.
58006007	Aba gideaba ng'eanyiida roobassa roopta galeagasean, ak goruudu nyeega miisa fukghayi barsean, ak ghwanyas ghawooda aba heeda Aseetta.
58006008	Ama jiih halaghweenga ea ng'obeeshta, ea marachchi gil ea gwariikghta eamwaashta; nea mudeanoadaannyi ea ghwardeayda.
58006009	Asi earappeadi sibalooldunuun, aba badahuukkeagwa, fuga abwariinyi, geanalli muuchchi ng'asheega miyaas bea lealeanooda.
58006010	Aba gideaba Aseetta mandeawana ghwanooda ea ghoanaawa ghaang' gadiyoojigeagwa ea bariinyeega ghayi oahhiimu appadaydaannyi aba gadiyeesiinda fuga ghaydidi, duu asna eara ghamneawa.
58006011	Ak geegasayi giliwas siih aba jeedeang'wa dahiimna doobiiwnatta uurji diitta ak ghwanal huumeanda ea girrar ea ghwahitta huydeanda,
58006012	ak abeeda ea mwang'udeagwa ghaleehooda, ak gowoschi fuga jea goomaseaw geat fukka aba naweeda masaweega ea milikghteayda ak gohearannyi gidaghayi sihelleesa.
58006013	Aba gideaba damanda sina Aseetta helleesiinda sea Abrahaamu, nea abeeda ea manda siida haw jea gweaksa habeawooda, gweaksa geaw habeawooda,
58006014	nea gwayi, “Aba huumwa gaydagoonnyi ghawooda ak ghahaachcheey.”
58006015	Gwasnu eara Abrahaamu, aba riyeeng'deayda, ghwanyas helleesiinda.
58006016	buuneeda aba huumwa iissa gweaksa habeawooda siida haweewa saawa, nea aba mudeanooda sheang'nyeadinga nyaawa sean agitta habeawooda ea mudeanooda baloolda.
58006017	Hean nea gagasa Aseetta muuchchi gohiimsa fuga jea gwahearan helleesiindida ea gidamayghwayamwaatta seareeda aba gidagasa, hean gomajeek ng'asheagaaschi aba habeawooda,
58006018	asi aba jeemba haleanji iyyeenya moammu ghwayamwa, nea aba jeedeaba suuh ea moammu gwargu Aseetta ng'uyyeega, aseaseeda mang'aw gasa heechchea gamng'awusa abeeda ghwanyas gimajeekta ak ghwanyas rarooda ghayi siyiin madeedeanya.
58006019	Geendeawi ng'asheanji nea gwargu huumwa ak gawuurji alooheeda jea ghaweat gisimeanda, ghusooda iissa gawa heeda ghaydit laabwa hoowa hang'da subwaasha gheeda,
58006020	heeda weah Yeesu nea gawuurji siida galleada aba hoorgeedeanya, ak ea niiw ashoohoochcheanda haw manda mudeanooda nea gawuurji Melkisedeki.
58007001	Nea abeeda Melkisedekki, was sugoochcheanda Saleemu, was ashoohoochcheanda Aseetta haw bea humng'eeda, gwaronnyi sea Abrahaamu nea gwaleabu nuseadayda sugoodiga ak ghoadaw niny ghawooda;
58007002	nea Abrahaamu ghoadaw niny gida aba gilattamwanamughuush aba jeeda haleanjeessean. Niny duweachcheeda, aba isuroobu gheawungaaschi, sugoochcheanda doobiiwnatta, ak gabiissa ea sugoochcheanda Saleemu, ak ea sugoochcheanda hoyyooh.
58007003	Niny manda ghwaan ghana ghaamwat ghana rooproobanga, ak ea manda ging'eetta askwearjoojigaaschi ghana huydeanda eaweagaaschi, gawuurji sea Balleanda Aseetta nea ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda.
58007004	Asi daaha hawundaannyi gitteenna! Abrahaamooda was gheamba ghweanigaasa ghoadaw niny gilagi aba jeeda gilattamanamughuush bea easanga.
58007005	Nea eara diibiga Laawi ghayi nyas ashohoochcheandumeedean, gwandeawa digheanda aba deaweeda jea gageandeawa heeda buuneeda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush, nea heeda fuga siduupcheewi, nea eara suuh ea jeatta Abrahaamu.
58007006	Nea siisi maba roproobang'suun ghoawaam haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba heeda Abrahaamu ak ghoadaw ghawooda ninnyeeda mideawa helleesiinda.
58007007	Ak ghanyea mesheang'nyeesiina gideaba dea mwanang' nibadischeesa dea haw.
58007008	Aba hiji gageanda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba heeda fuga jea gameewa; nea aba hiji gwanda dea sumuuwwu gideaba eamajeek.
58007009	Nea ghoammu siih gwayi Laawi ninyeeda ghayi awaam haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush, ghoadayda haleanjeeda aba gilattamanamughuush aba naweeda Abrahaamu,
58007010	aba gideaba abeeda niny miyeeji damanda ronnyeewa niny sea Melkisedekki.
58007011	Asi doobiiwnatta iisinyas aba heeda ashoohoochcheandumeeda Laawi (hean aba niih ghwanyas buuneeda deaweeda,) abeeda gudeegasa ashoohoochcheannuut jea ghang'eat uurji Melkisedekki, ea ghang'al dea surgu uurji Haruuni?
58007012	Aba gideaba iimida yamitta aba ashoohoochcheandumeeda, abeeda ghwahit gideaba gajeayam eara deaweeda.
58007013	Nea siida was dea surukuna ng'asheesuun gaba eamwa nuut, manda dea nisin gadiyeeda aba heeda wagiida.
58007014	Hean adaach gideaba Ng'uttamiideanya gwaleabu jeatta Yuuda, iiduw aba gidaguyeatta sea emeetta ghanyea marukuna gil Muusa appadayda ashoohoodiga.
58007015	Iiduw ghwadajiit muuchchi ng'asheesu aba iirudu ashoohoochcheanda nuut nea gawuurji sea Melkisedekki,
58007016	amaduw ghoaw ashoohoochcheanda, nea miih aba naweeda deaweedeeda gasa saseeda gil aba jeatta geaghus aba uurda eaweega mayghwadattasa.
58007017	Aba gideaba gemmuuwwuuna badaydaannyi nea geeyi, “Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda, nea gawuurji Melkisedekki.”
58007018	Aba meatkweanagi, digheanda ghayi bea madeeda sisach aba ng'arng'arandaannyi ak ea marachchi gil
58007019	(aba gideaba deaweeda manda gissin ak gamajeegiit); aba meatkweanagi, ea sugu gidamiy sirarji, aba niih ea sineekkiissi Aseetta.
58007020	Ak ea masa nea manda habeawooda.
58007021	Nea fukka ghayi bea mwadi huuw ashoohoodigean ghwanyas hoorgajeega nyaawa nea mwaaga habeawooda, ama duukku niih geattawa habeawooda, “Nguttamiida niyaak habeawooda ak ea mayghwayam fughareadaannyi, ‘Ang'iing'i guwosi ashoohoochcheanda manda mudeanooda.'"
58007022	Ng'asheanji aba huumwa ghwanung' ghoaw Yeesu neajeeda adareamshi.
58007023	Ashoohoodiga madeeda ghayi asaang'a isiyiida, aba gideaba ghayi ghaweada miyeeda giibinda hoorgajeega nyaawa;
58007024	nea niny ghoang'ng'waay ashoohoochcheandumeadaannyi nea gomajeek, aba gideaba niny gayghwashng'u damanda mamuudeana.
58007025	Nea giduurji sean ghoammu aba damannyoojiga sean gwalealu fukka neekkiissa Aseetta aba ninyiin, nea niny gwanda galeagasean nea goduupchi saawa.
58007026	Asi ghwahit gideaba gajeendeawana ashoohoochcheanda haw uurji niih, ghaydit, meerukunana badayda ng'asheega munyas nyaah siirja, sihheelli sea fuga ring'eega, sittiing'da ea ghwalaabwa hoow humng'eeda.
58007027	Niny manda gidagasa, mawuurji ashoohoodikka heesiin, iissa ghoadayda lukghumajeega galeagasean, iissa ghanyi ghoadayda appadayda ring'eegaaschi niny amaduw ghoadayda geaw.
58007028	Aba huumwa deaweeda iissa gageanu fuga ng'arng'ari ak ghwanung' ghoaw ashoohoodiga hees, nea ng'asheanda habeawooda, eadu geeshta deaweeda, ghwaloat Balleanda ghayi bean ahidaat damanda manda mudeanooda.
58008001	Asi ghamneawa huumeanda surgu nihi: geendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw uurjunu, siida apteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea hoorgeeda sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetta was Ng'uttamiida aba humng'eeda,
58008002	niny siida gadiiy aba heeda ghaydit gil ea heeda maheemajeandida bea huumwaan ghayi masna siida gwasin Ng'uttamiidean.
58008003	Aba gideaba giliwas ashoohoochcheanda haw iissa gealoat ghoadayda haleanjeeda ea lukghumajeega; nea eara ashoohoochcheanda gammiisa gideaba gaygwandeawa gichchea ghoadayda.
58008004	Inyeeda gwachchi gwanda badayda ng'eanyiida, ea mayghoaw ashoohoochcheanda eara hay, nea gwanda ashoohoodiga adayyiida haleanjeeda aba ginnyaashta deaweeda.
58008005	Gwasin gida uurji diitta was jirooneeda haleanjeeda ghaydidi mida humng'eedean; aba gideaba damanda ramagu gwasin Muusa maheemajeanda, ghoadoabiiw Aseetta, nea gwayeeshsha, “Sikteawana gideaba gisni haleanjeessean gawuurji gidaghayi sihhimdaayda aba uhuuda gijeeda.”
58008006	Asi aba niih, Gristo ninyas gadiyeeda adareamshi muuchchi adaraam dea waas gawuurji neajeeda goduupchi muuchchi, ak ea niiw deaweeda aba helleesiinda huumwa.
58008007	Ama inyeeda neajeetta bea madeedean ea manda sirjeeda, gwachchi ea maygwanda gassoodeaba diita bea iyyeenyean.
58008008	Aba gideaba ninyas ramaseanda aba heannyaawa aba heeda eneewa: “Gwanda askwearjoojiga jea ghwahidu gwargu Ng'uttamiida, ak gaydang'eat neajeedeesh sea gheeh Israeeli ea gheeh Yuuda;
58008009	ak ea mawuurji neajeeda ghayi itteanyu sea ghweaniga nyaawa aba eaweeda ghayi ang'ng'waanyi saawa geattinda ak gearutteawi jeeda ng'eanyiida Misri; aba gideaba mudugoobiida jeeda neajeedeanyu, ak ea mududaduuba saawa aba ginnyaa Ng'uttamiida.
58008010	Niih neajeeda jea dasissa gheeh Israeeli iing'atta askwearjoojikka, aba ginnyaa Ng'uttamiida: Gaydayiin deaweedajeegeasu iheenga nyaawa, ak ghang'waarji aba jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa, ak gaydoaw Aseetta nyaawa, ak gayghoaw fugeasu.
58008011	Ea manda siida jea ghoanaal dea mideawa ghana giliwas siih ea oorjeeda ghaamwat, nea gwayeeshsha, ‘Nala Ng'uttamiida,’ aba gideaba gayghwanalan sean, ghang'eada dea mwanang'eawa saawa ea gagul dea haweewa sean.
58008012	Aba gideaba gaydawas ng'eeni aba gidinnyeannyeekka nyaawa, ak ea maydapkaat ring'eega nyaawa earahay.”
58008013	Aba rukunooda neajeedeesh ea nunung' ghawaasiit dea madeeda. Nea dea nuwaasiit ea niriikghta gammuudean.
58009001	Asi ghamneawa eara neajeeda madeeda gwandeawa digheanda gichchea eabwatta Aseetta ea heeda ghaydit aba hiji bea ng'eanyiidean.
58009002	Aba gideaba iissa geesin maheemajeanda dea madeeda nea dea siyiina gheaboonyaneeda ea measa ea mukkatteeydida bea gihimnoodean; geguura Heeda Ghaydit.
58009003	Badaydeaba hang'deaba iyyeenya bea beashooda gwanda mahemajeanda was heeda Ghaydit muuchchi,
58009004	nea gwandeawa heeda wagiida eyda meang'meang' mideawa shearooda ng'andit ea sandakkwajeanda mida jeeda neajeeda nea sikkwealsa meadajeega sean aba lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea gwandeawa bayookta meang'meang' mida hamitta suguura maana, ea bileangida Haruuni aruudu damealga, ea measeeda neajeeda;
58009005	nea uhuuda gwanda malaykajeega mideawa gigheambiitta nea gojiroon hoorgeeda ng'eeninda. Nea appadahuukkeaba haleanjeeni ea meammuusi eerukuna muuchchi nea gekkingiinayi.
58009006	Hean giding'ding'deaydeaba ng'asheesu ea sisin, iissa gaweay ashoohoodiga galeagasean jeeda maheemajeanda madeeda ak gwasin gadiyoojiga nyaawa bea mooshta ghawooda;
58009007	nea deaba iyyeenya iissa gawa ashoohoochcheanda haw nea gaba geaw, iissa gawa nibwagi aba jeeda gweayda, nea ghwaat foojeanda adayda appadaydaannyi ea dea gidinyeannyeekka buuneeda.
58009008	Nea aba niih ghoahiimu Gurorooda Ghaydit gideaba naweeda jea ghoahutta fiih heeda ghaydit miyeajaat aba hiji duu ghamiinaadawa maheemajeanda madeedean
58009009	(nea geanung' gawuurji sea damani bea ghamneawean.) Nea aba badiini, haleanjeeda siittayda ea gea lukghumajeega iissa geattayda moammu goomajeek fughareeda siida mwaash Aseetta,
58009010	ak iissa gabeachchi hamitta ea leeshooda sea gihushshooda, was deaweedajeega saseeda ghayi sugu ea ghwahitta damanda jea ebiikta eesna gichcha.
58009011	Iimuchchu nea ghwahidu Gristoyda was ashoohoochcheanda haw bea haleanjeeda miyaas jea ghwahidu, hean aba naweeda udahabeascheanda haw majeek (meesnana geattinga, nea maba badaydeaba ng'eanyiin)
58009012	iissa gawa nibwagi Heeda Ghaydit, nea mwaada foojeanda nooga ea gea muhooga niny ghwaat foojeandaannyi, ak gwasin lealeanooda manda mudeanooda.
58009013	Aba gideaba siida mideawa ring'eeda isippuunna foojeanda nooga ea gea heewga ea deareeda haghweanda iyammiidu nea ghoammu goohuun saseeda,
58009014	abeeda gayghwaranyattaan muuchchi foojeanda Gristo, dea aba Gurorooda manda mudeanooda ghoadaw geaw Aseetta nea meerukunana badaydaannyi gidamuy, gayghoammiidu fughareengeagwa aba gadiyoojiga nimeewa ak gagadiyeesa Aseetta majeek.
58009015	Asi niny dea aduuptooschi buuneeda aba neajeedeesh gil, ak abeeda fukka suguursean ghwanyas helleesiinda hearaniischooda manda mudeanooda, hean gapnu miyeeda jea gwalealna saawa jeeda ramaseannyeekka aba neajeeda ghayi bea madeeda.
58009016	Nea heeda mida hearaniischooda, abeeda miyeeda siida ghayi sin gayghang'eat ghuutta.
58009017	Aba gideaba hearaniischooda iissa gamajeegiit iihidu miyeeda, amaduw ea manda uurda aba damanda duu eamajeek dea ghayi sin.
58009018	Hean eara neajeeda madeeda ea mamajeegiida iimanda foojeanda.
58009019	Nea gilinyooh ea digheanda gil mida jeeda deaweedeeda nurukusa Muusa buuneeda, gageanu foojeanda muhooga ea gea nooga, ea beega ea budeega areeri bea gisilga ea hisoppo, ak geappuunna sean gittaabu ea buuneessean,
58009020	nea gwayeeshsha, “Suuh foojeanda neajeeda gil ghayi rukuneey Aseetta.”
58009021	Ak aba naweani ghoabuunna foojeanda maheemajeanda sea haleanjeessean sigadiydooscheatta damanda baditta Aseetta.
58009022	Aba huumwa, aba jeeda deaweeda gwaramagu eammiinna haleanjeessean foojeanda, ak iimeahhiida foojeanda ea manda samsiinda ring'eega.
58009023	Ak ghwadoabiiw gideaba haleanjeeda uurji gea humng'eeda gideaba geammiidu aba naweani, nea haleanjeeda humng'eeda geammiinna lukghumajeega miyaas mawuurji suuh.
58009024	Aba gideaba Gristo nuwa jeeda, miih gideaba gawa heeda ghaydit sisna geattinga gil, niny gawuurji sea diitta bea huumwaan, niny gawa humng'eeda huumwa, ak ghamneawa ghwahidu nea gawuurji Aseetta appadahuukkaasa.
58009025	Ak ea miih gideaba iissa gayghoadayda geaw galeagasean, gawuurji ashoohoochcheanda haw iissa gawa Heeda Ghaydit nibwagi aba jeeda gweayda nea mwaada foojeandaannyi;
58009026	aba sareani gwachchi gaygabiikkiida jeeda sawanadeeda ghang'eada dea ghayi sisna sindeetta ng'eanyiida. Ak aba niih, ghwahidu nibwagi aba mudeanooda damanda ak gageanda ring'eeda aba gidaydeaydeaba geaw ghoaw lukghumeadaannyi.
58009027	Hean gawuurji gidaghayi siittawuda siida miyeeda nibwagi, amang'atta ghwahidu girgweaksiinda,
58009028	gwasnu eara Gristo, niny ghayi geattayda nibwagi ak gageanda ring'eega fuga saang'a, gayghwahidu deaba iyyeenya, ak ea mayghwahidu appadayda ring'eeda niny gayghwaan gwalealu fukka amuukku niny muuchchiin.
58010001	Nea deaweeda ii jirooneeda ng'asheega miyaas jea gwahidu, ak ea miih ormeeda huumwa bea haleanjeetta, ea mayghoaw, aba lukghumeedida duu ettayyiida aba gilakkweayiin, ak ghoammiidu fukka nekkiissean.
58010002	Earagwasa, gwachchi ea majea nunung'waada gidaydeayda? Ak abeeda fuga moora isimmiidu nibwagi, ea mudugwandeawa gipkeatta ring'eeda.
58010003	Nea aba lukghumeani iissa ghwanung' eapkaat ring'eeda aba gilakkweay.
58010004	Aba gideaba maygwasa gideaba gaygageanda ring'eega foojeanda jiirgwa ea gea nooga.
58010005	Earagwasa, damanda hinna Gristo jeeda ng'eanyiida, gwayi, “Lukghumeeda ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ghadooweeda ghanyea migassi, nea saseeda ea nisinnean aniini;
58010006	aba lukghumajeega sughwarda ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi aba ring'eeda ghanyea mihoosassiini.
58010007	Ak geayeennyi, ‘Ean naawunnyi dasin gidigasayi, Ea Aseetta, gawuurji gissung'waarda appadaydeanyu aba jeeda gittaabu.'"
58010008	Damanda eneewa aba heettiyeada, “Ak ghanyea miigassa ghana bwariinya lukghumajeega ea haleanjeeda sughwarda sisappa geadi ea haleanjeeda sisappa geadi bea ring'eeda” (suu geattayda aba naweeda deaweeda),
58010009	ak gabiikta ghoahaat nea gwayi, “Ea, Naawunnyi dasin gidigasayi.” Niny gwanyarja dea madeeda ak abeeda ghoang'eat deabiyyeenya.
58010010	Ak abeeda aba gitta gasean abeeda gajeammiinneasa aba naweeda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi was saseeda Yeesu Gristo nibwagi ak ea majeebiikta.
58010011	Nea iissa ghamiinaada ashoohoochcheanda galeagasean damanda gadiyeadaannyi, ak imisean ghoadayda lukghumajeegiga bea galeagasean, moammu gageanda ring'eegean.
58010012	Nea Gristo iyadayda nibwagi lukghumeeda aba ring'eega, hean goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta,
58010013	hean ghoamuughu ea eayiin weajoodigaaschi ghoaw hoorgeeda geeshangaaschi.
58010014	Nea aba giidaydeawagi bea haleanjeeda sisappa geadiin ea ninung' ghwahit fukka sean simmiiduun aba damannyoojiga sean.
58010015	Ak gamuuwwuneasa Gurorooda Ghaydit nea gwayi,
58010016	“Niih neajeeda jea dasissa saawa iing'atta askwearjoojikka, aba girrugu Ng'uttamiida: Gaydayiin diigheannyeekkeasu jeesinga guroruunatka nyaawa, ak geang'oorsi jeesinga fughareenga nyaawa,”
58010017	Ak gabiikta ghoahaat gideaba, “Mayguttabiikta daapkaat ring'eega nyaawa ea ng'asheega munyas sina earahay.”
58010018	Heeda mida samsiindeaba ng'asheesu, ea maygudu gabiikta giidaydeayda haleanjeeda sisappa geadi appadayda ring'eeda.
58010019	Asi, fuga eaduupcheewi, dea sumwasi beatta heeda Ghaydit aba foojeanda Yeesu,
58010020	aba naweeda eesh mideawa eaweega janneasa aba naweeda ghamarda beashooda, nea appadayda saseadaannyi gil,
58010021	amaduw nea gendeawi ashoohoochcheanda haw haweewa gheeda Aseetta,
58010022	ghang'wana geneekkiissi nea geebeayi guroruunatka huumwa nea geesikteawi muuchchi masaweega, nea geappuunna guroruunatkaasa aloheeda ak geang'ami ng'asheega munyas ak gehhuun sasanuukkaasa aba beega miyaas.
58010023	Gagasa eang'ng'waanya muuchchi duukkuunooda sirarji nea mwabealbeala, aba gideaba siida rugu nea gohelleesi ea doabiiwaat;
58010024	ak geanalli gichchea eanung' gabarinnyiida geat buuneeda ea gadiyoojiga miyaas,
58010025	nea adeanung'waadi badoodeaba geat, ak geesinnyi seareeda fuga mwaatkwa, gidabal gaba siisi amajeek nuut, nea aba sean ghoadaayi gideaba Eaweettida girgweaksiinda nineekkiit.
58010026	Nea iisisinnyi ring'eeda aba baysiinda nea sinyaschi fughareeda huumeanda, abeeda eamaygwanda lukghumeeda appadayda ring'eega,
58010027	nea gwanda furdeayda girgweaksiinda jea ghoabeal buuneeda, ea beasta ng'waan jea ghwaak fuga was weajoodiga.
58010028	Nea siida fool deaweedeeda Muusa iissa ghami nea meabwayda aba ghuusisba muushoodi iyyeenya ghanea samwagu gil.
58010029	Abeeda iing'ulayi gajeamuydaan girgweaksiinda jea ghwanyas fuga ghasghas Balleanda Aseetta, nea ghabwara ririnnyeanda foojeanda neajeenda ghayi simmiinna, nea ghoanyareas Gurorooda dagheerjeandumeeda?
58010030	Aba gideaba geanalli aseasa siida ayi, “Mureandooda deanyu, gaydawalda aniini.” Nea gwayi gichcha, “Ng'uttamiida gaygoorgweaksa fugaaschi.”
58010031	Niih gidahaloat gil gideaba gajabeedeaysiina geattinga Aseetta mideawa eaweega.
58010032	Asi apkaada askwearjoojiga ghayi bea mwadi damanda sippwaanyaneey, hean ghoarjeang'di ng'uchcheeda ng'waan ea sawanadeeda,
58010033	nea hich iissa geng'ng'ewweegwa nea geesawaneegwa, nea hich gokkuuyi geadi sea fukka sisma ng'asheesuun.
58010034	Aba gideaba nondeawi baydeayda appadahuukka fuga mida ghealooniga, ak ghoamwaschi nea gohoosannyi aba gireetta haleanjeedeang'wa, nea ghoanalli gideaba agooga gondeawi haleanjeeda miyaas jea ghwashng'u.
58010035	Asi adiiduw goojakti gidoararji, mideawa gimearda haw.
58010036	Asi gagasa andeawana riyeeng'deayda, ak abeeda goosinnyi gidagasa Aseetta ak ghoanyaschi gitta sihelleesean.
58010037	“Asi gudughwashoada gheadi nuwaas, ak abeeda dea jea ghwahidu gayghwahidu ak ea mayghwashing'da;
58010038	nea siideanyu doabiiwaat gaygoobiideawa masaweega, ak iiraay ak gabiikta bwadaw, ghanyea maygahoosan guroroodeanyu aba niny.”
58010039	Ak aseasa ea mebeahi jeedeaba fukka biikta bwadaw ak gealas uhuudean, geebeayi gea mideawa masaweega nea gafur guroruunatka nyaawa.
58011001	Asi ghamneawa masaweega goomajeek haleanjeeda sirar, ak gwargu iitta haleanjeeda meadaaha.
58011002	Appadaydeaba niih ea ninyas gweargwa ghaydidanda huumwa.
58011003	Aba masaweega geanalli gideaba ng'eanyiida geesin aba ng'asheanda Aseetta, ak eara haleanjeeda sidaa eameesnana haleanjeeda meadaaha.
58011004	Aba masaweega Abeeli ghoadaw Aseetta lukghumeeda ea ghang'al Gain, ak aba niih geattaw doobiiwnatta, hean ghoaw Aseetta mushoochcheanda iimwas haleanjeedaannyi bea gimearda; ak ghami, ak aba masaweagaaschi ea gudugabalool.
58011005	Nea aba masaweega geettiing'da Enokki humng'eeda ak abeeda eamwadaaha miyeeda; ak ea meanyasa, aba gideaba niyaat Aseetta. Asi heeda miyeayaada abeeda easurukuna badayda gideaba niihoosan Aseetta.
58011006	Nea iimanda masaweega ahang'waay gideaba gajahoosana niny. Aba gideaba siida wassean jea gwaneekkiissa Aseetta gagasa ghwanal gideaba niny gwanda ak gomeari fukka gaseadayyi ninyiin.
58011007	Nea aba masaweega Nuuhu damanda rekusiina Aseetta aba iitta ng'asheega meedaaha, ghwayiiy ak gwasin maleambooda haw jea ghaweada fugeaba gheannyi; ak aba niih gorgweaksa ng'eanyiida ak ghoaw siida jea gwahearan doobiiwnatta sinyassa masaweega.
58011008	Aba masaweega gwasin mureeda Abrahaamu damanda suguursiina ak gawa ng'eanyiida jea ghwanyasa hearaniischooda; ak gawa, nea mwanala eara heeda gal.
58011009	Aba masaweega goobiida ng'eanyiida helleesiinda, aba jeeda ng'eanyiida buuneeda, ak goobiida jeesinga maheemajeega sea Isakka ea Yakkobo, gwahearaniischi sea niny aba heelleesiindida.
58011010	Aba gideaba gang'ula mwadi ghwadaah mujiineeda mideawa sindeetta, nea siida deas ea dea sin ea Aseetta gil.
58011011	Aba masaweega eara Saara ghwanyas uurda jea gagweayiida, earappeadi ninaawuda gweannyeakkaaschiin, nea ghwanung' ghoaw niny siida doabiiwaat mideawa helleesiinda.
58011012	Iiduw aba hichpa siyagi miy nea gawuurji gilinimi, ak geeji jeatta saang'a deenna miinga humng'eeda ak gwadeenna iseaskweanda ghuutta basooda.
58011013	Fiisu seaniin gameewwiisa jeeda masaweega, ak ea miighwanyas gidaghayi sihelleesa, ak geaghus gideaba ghwadaah nea sheagi ak ghwadeapta, ak ghwanal gideaba saawa rabasta gil ea fuga mang'aw appadayda ng'eanyiida.
58011014	Aba gideaba fuga rukku ng'asheesu ghoahiimu muuchchi gideaba saawa gagaseadayyi ng'eanyiida jea goobiida.
58011015	Nea abeeda iyapkaat ng'eanyiitta leabuun, ghwanyawa gwandeawa seawadeeda biikteayda.
58011016	Asi ghamneawa aba giduurji, gagaseadayyi ng'eanyiida miy, nea diitta bea humng'eedeani. Hean Aseetta ea moammu ghabwaspwas aba gideaba geguura Aseetta nyaawa, aba gideaba nisissa saawa mujiini.
58011017	Abrahaamu aba masaweega, eaweetta sisimsima, ghoadayda Isakka, nea ninnyeeda ghayi nyas helleesiinda hean gagasa ghoadayda balleandaannyi was haghasheeda,
58011018	nea abeeda geeyi appadaydeaba niny, “Aba Isakka gajeeguurdeaweey diibiga jeachcheengaagu.”
58011019	Ak ghwanal gideaba Aseetta ghoammu gooduunna buuneeda jeeda miyeeda; hean gwargu nea ghoawaaghan, ak iiduw gabiikta ghwanyas.
58011020	Nea aba masaweega gamus Isakka ghawooda jea ghwahidu appadayda Yakkobo ea Esaau.
58011021	Nea aba masaweega damanda meawa Yakkobo, gabadiischeesa giliwas ballean bea Yoseefu, ak gabuy uhuuda damanda moasha ghawooda nea gwadiiwa geaw bileangidaannyi.
58011022	Aba masaweega Yoseefu, aba mudeanooda eaweagaaschi gwargu ng'eayda fuga Israeeli ak ghoadayda iitta gichchea eebuyda.
58011023	Aba masaweega, Muusa damanda sijiila, ghafuy ghwaan ea ghaamwat sheah samwagu, aba gideaba ghwadaah saawa gideaba aamiy; ak ea moawala digheanda sugoochcheanda.
58011024	Aba masaweega Muusa, damanda hissiina heeda, ghaheawa eeguura balleanda hudeaba Faraao,
58011025	ak ghwaloat gideaba gaygaweechchi sawanadeeda sea fuga Aseetta ak ea moasaamwa hooseaneega jeeda ring'eeda.
58011026	Ak ghwanung' ghoaw ging'weakka ea sawanadeeda Gristo meanang'oochcheandumeeda haw mawuurji maghasuukka sittiing'da bea ng'eanyiida Misri, aba gideaba ghoamuughu gimearda.
58011027	Aba masaweega ghabeawa ng'eanyiida Misri, nea moawala nyarasta sugoochcheanda; ak ghwarjeang'da nea gawuurji siida daah Aseetta meadaaha.
58011028	Aba masaweega ghoang'ng'waay basakka ak geeppuunna foojeanda, ak abeeda iihidu Gitta nuusa duweachchajeega ea moammu ghwasat saawa.
58011029	Aba masaweega ghoaghaawa buuneeda Basoodareara gawuurji gili sik ng'eanyiida ghajaam; nea fuga Misri, iigala sinooda gawuurji gissinda saawa, ghwaak beega.
58011030	Aba masaweega ghoabeada ghamarda Yeriikko damanda neaweesiina saawa eawooji ispwa.
58011031	Aba masaweega Rahaabooda aweaksheeda ghanyea mameewuudayi fukghayi manda mureeda, aba gideaba ghwadeapta fuga buwa gheang'da.
58011032	Abeeda gaydargu naaha? Aba gideaba madeayi damanda aba rukunooda iitta Gidion, Barakka, Samson, Yeefta, ea dea Dawdi ea dea Samweeli ea Sibanga,
58011033	nea aba naweeda masaweega ghwajoar daroorakka, ak ghwanung' eesin gittoabiiw, ak ghwanyas heelleesiinda, ak ghwarat ghuusiga ng'annyeekka,
58011034	ak gwanuus beasta ng'waan, ak gamng'awa madeeda bwaanga, nea ghwanyas uurda aba jeeda ng'arng'aranda, ak gwandeawa uurda aba jeeda ng'uchcheeda, ak ghwanung' gamng'aw lugooda emoojiga.
58011035	Ghwanyas gadeemga fuga nyaawa duunna miyeeda. Mwaatkwa geesawan, nea ghaheawa ghamwas siksiinda, ak abeeda gwaduuttu gichcha ak ghwanyas eaweega miyaas.
58011036	Mwaatkwa gwasawana aba shikkooda ea bayiiga, nea ghabwada geeratta munyaloalajeega aba ghealooniga.
58011037	Geefutta lagheanga, ak geabwaash nibiyyeenya, ak genuuseada aba bwaanga; ak gwaneayi nea gookkwa eagweega gisilga ea gea nooga, ak ea barbari, nea geesawan, nea geesma ng'asheega munyas,
58011038	nea ng'eanyiida ea magassa fiisu, ak gwaneayeewa eeshtearajeaga ea gijeega, ea jeesinga bearuutka ea gwaleadinga jeeda ng'eanyiida.
58011039	Nea suuseaniin, earappeadi sisim aba masaweega nyaawaan, ghanyea mwanyasa gidaghayi siheelleesa,
58011040	iiduw nea nibada Aseetta gidamiy appadahuukkaasa, iiduw isihelleewi ghanyea maygamajeekcheewiidi.
58012001	Asi, dea nineaweesiinaneasa shamooghooda haw bea muushoodiga, gagasa easaja giliwas sareenda, ea ring'eeda nekkiisseasa muuchchi ak ghwanung' eesalda nea geemmiriikchi ng'weega siyiin madeedeanya,
58012002	nea geeng'ulayi Yeesuuyda asheeda was dea amajeek masaweagaasa, was dea aba hooseaneega siyiin madeadaannyi ghoahang'waay aba beehiida, ak gafool baspaseega, ak goopteada aba meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta.
58012003	Asi ng'ulla dea ahang'waay appadayda fuga ring'eega ea fuurjeeda appadaydaannyi, ak abeeda ea moahuuwi fuga bur ghana gea giyoonnyi.
58012004	Aba ng'uchcheedeang'wa sea ring'eeda miyoahhang'waanya ea eeyi bwak ea oahhiida foojeandeang'wa.
58012005	Ak ea niroosseegwa ng'asheega ghayi rukuneegwa nea gwahindaneegwa balloojiga? “Balleandeanyu, adiiduw gung'ulayi nea giibudeayani lasooda lasnyi Ng'uttamiida, ghana gabur iheengeagwa iilaseegwa niny.
58012006	Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida iissa ghwalas siitta bwariiyiin, ak ghwalas giliwas ballean mwas niny.”
58012007	Geaghus mureeda ak abeeda ghoahhang'waanyi. Aseetta ghwanung' ahuuwa balloojiga; gaygwanda ana ballean jea ea maygwasissa mureeda ghwaan?
58012008	Isunung'waadaneegwa nea mealaseagwa, ak gowuurji sean, nea goguuyi sean, abeeda gowoschi diibiga sishuwaanda mowosi balloojiga.
58012009	Murdeedeaba ng'asheesu, geendeawi ghwaanigaasa bea ng'eanyiida jea ghwalaseasa ak geesissi saawa mureeda. Abeeda ea mammiisseasa muuchchi gideaba gajeettuuksiina geat Bwaabeeda guroruunatka ak geanyaschi eaweega?
58012010	Aba gideaba saawa ghwalaseasa aba gheadi nuwaas aba gidamiisiinda saawa ak ghwalaseasa ak geemiyeesiidayi, ak abeeda geeguuyi ghaydidandaannyi.
58012011	Aba gheadi nuwaas bayiiga sean iisung'ula ang'waan mawuurji gissubwariiy; ammuuchchu gwaji haghweega eadu hoyyooh bea doobiiwnatta aba heeda fuga sibean eannaal ng'asheesu.
58012012	Asi agatkada geattingeagwa abittu ak goommajeekchi gutng'weakka ng'arng'ari,
58012013	ak ghoattoabiiwji naweadinga jea ghwala geeshangeagwa, nea abeeda gidamideawa badeeda ea meegeandeawana heeda roobuutka gagasa eahhaap.
58012014	Gagasa gimiriikta hoyyooh aba heeda buuneessean, aba ghaydidanda nea manda siida jea ghwadaah Ng'uttamiida iimandeawana.
58012015	Ang'ulla adaghanyi siisi mwanyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta; ak ea manda hawunnyeanda ng'weaninda ama rudu gweadu jaliida, nea aba niih ghang'ut fuga saang'a ririnnyeanda;
58012016	nea adagwanda siida sina ng'asheega munyas ghana dea meawalla gheang'da Aseetta uurji Esawu, ghayi shaayda hawundaannyi doobiiwsa aba agiischooda assagi.
58012017	Nea ghoanalli gideaba iiduw nea gagasa gwahearan ghawooda, geefool, aba gideaba mwanyasa gheatta duukuunooda, earappeadi gasa nea gobuuttu dabeakka.
58012018	Aba gideaba agooga miyapkaani heeda gidasiimmu eawaas, was ng'ushapta beasta, ea misaneeda, ea giiseaneega, ea shaarara,
58012019	ea nyeashta duruumbeatti, ea ghuutta siida ama nyaah ghwanung' ghabeal fuga iiy ak ghwanung' ea magassa gabiikta ghwayiiy giijasi nea geerukusa saawa.
58012020	Ak ea mayghoammu aba ng'asheekka surukusean, “Nea eara diyeayda iisat gijeeda, gajeefutta lagheanga.”
58012021	Huumwa, nea hoowa ghang'uda fiih muuwda nea heeda ayi Muusa, “Aniini ghaabwaadannyi aba muuwda.”
58012022	Ak ea noapkaannyi Giijeeda Sayuuni ea mujiineeda Aseetta majeek, Yerusaleemooda humng'eeda, ea heeda malaykajeega saang'a, bwat geat aba ghweelmeeda,
58012023	ea heeda fuga bwat geat was gea sishsheeda eeji sung'oorsa gheawunga nyaawa humng'eeda, ea heeda dea laja girgweaguutka Aseetta buuneessean i, wasea heeda guroruunatka fuga doobiiweadi geemiyaas,
58012024	ea heeda Yeesu, was siida aduuptooschi buuneeda bea neajeedeesh, ea dea foojeanda sippuunna jea gwanyagu haleanjeeda miyaas ng'al foojeanda Habeeli.
58012025	Asi ang'ulla adiiduw ghoaheawi ninnyeeda balool. Aba gideaba inyeeda saawa ea mamng'awa damanda heaweawa ninnyeeda reekusa saawa aba jeeda ng'eanyiida, abeeda gajeemng'awdaan iisiheawi ninnyeeda rekuseasa aba humng'eeda.
58012026	Hean ghwanung' nyeashtaannyi gwaduumduum ng'eanyiida; ak ghamneawa ea niheelleesa gideaba, “Gaydabiikta gichcha deaduumduum nea mwajeaghus ng'eanyiida gaydeaduumduum eara humng'eeda.”
58012027	Ng'asheanji bea gideaba, “Gaydabiikta gichchean,” ghoahiimu geandeayda gissittuumduum, was gidaghayi sisin, ak abeeda geappuut gitta meammu eettuumduumiin.
58012028	Asi eahuuwa fuga mideawa badiischooda aba nyasooda sugoochcheandumeeda majeettuumduum, ak geattawji Aseetta ghadoowanda huumwa, aba mureeda ea mooshta ghawooda.
58012029	aba gideaba Aseetteanya beasta nyarja haleanjeesseani.
58013001	Bariinyeega oorjoogiyya gagasa eamaduuleana.
58013002	Adiiduw ginung'waadi gideaba gajahiimsiina rabasta innyeanda jeeda aba gideaba gwanda fuga mwaatkwa niing'aatta malaykajeega nea mwanala.
58013003	Oapkaada fuga Mida ghealooniga, ak goowuurjeewi giloondeayeesi ghealooniga sea saawa. Oapkaada fukka sisawaniin, aba gideaba earagooga goondeawi sasanuukka.
58013004	Geeshshooda dasissiina mureeda buuneessean, nea eara bulaliida gagasa ea mandeawana ririnnyeanda; aba gideaba Aseetta gaygoorgweaksa fuga munyas ea gea mealuuli.
58013005	Ak giheelleewi eaweagaagu bariinyeega lappiya, ak gagasa ghoahiinnyi gidindeawi aba gideaba gwayi, “Aniini manda gichchea daraay ghana danung'useey heeda.”
58013006	Hean abeeda gajeammuusa erukuna nea geesikteawi gideaba, “Ng'uttamiida weedannyeandeanyu gil, ak aniini ea maydaawal ng'eang'i; siida gaygwasmanean naaha?”
58013007	Oapkaada fuga ahaaghwaneagwa, fukka rukuneegwa ng'asheanda Aseettean; asikteawana gichchea ghabwat geeshta eaweega nyaawa, ak googali masaweega nyaawa.
58013008	Yeesu Gristo gawuurji gideaba heetta ea ghamneawa ea gagul damanda manda mudeanooda.
58013009	Adiiduw ghoayaachchi geeshta ng'asheega saang'a ea ginealshajeega hidu; aba gideaba ghwahit geemmajeek gurorooda aba dagheerjeandumeeda, nea miih aba hamichchoojiga gil, ak ea mwanyagaada aba gidaat geeshta.
58013010	Ak geendeawi heeda wagiida nea fukka gadiiyi aba jeeda maheemajeandean ea madoobiiwsiina gideaba gayghwaak.
58013011	Aba gideaba sasanuukka diyeanga sihhiida foojeannyeekka nyaawa ak ghwaat ashoohoochcheanda haw heeda ghaydit ghoaw lukghumeeda appadayda ring'eedean geaghwarda aba jarooda murdeeda gambiini.
58013012	Eara Yeesu gwasawana aba madeettooshta ak abeeda ghoammiidu buuneeda aba foojeandaannyi.
58013013	Asi eweaya mwadi heeda mida aba jarooda was murdeeda gambiini, ak geeguuyeesi baspaseagaaschi ghayi ahang'waay.
58013014	Aba gideaba aba hiji meendeawani mujiineeda jea ghwashng'u, aseasa geegasayi mujiineeda jea ghwahidu.
58013015	Asi aba niny eegala mwadi nea geattaydi lukghumeeda dumsheesiinda Aseetta, nea haghweega ghuutta gil gea mwas gheawungaaschi.
58013016	Adoofoolli sinooda ng'asheega miyaas nea gooppareannyi haleanjeeda oondeawi, aba gideaba lukghumeeda sunu goohoosan Aseetta.
58013017	Asissiina mureeda fuga ahaghwaneegwa nea googadiyeesi; aba gideaba saawa gang'ula guroruunatkeagwa, nea gawuurji siida jea godayyii ng'asheega. Asi saawa gagasa gwasin ng'asheesu nea gahoosan, nea adagagiisan, aba gideaba ng'asheega sunu maygwarachchi gil aba heedeang'wa.
58013018	Amwaasha Aseetta ghawooda appadahuukkaasa, aba gideaba geesikteawi gideaba geendeawi fughareeda miy, nea geegasayi eesna haleanjeessean aba mureeda.
58013019	Ak geamuscheegwa muuchchi aba jeedeanyu asna ng'asheanji ak abeeda geebay eetteelnean heedeang'wa.
58013020	Asi ghamneawa Aseetta mideawa hoyyooh biikta gweadu gichcha Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu aba jeeda miyeeda, jeagiischoochcheanda haw bea gisilga, aba foojeanda neajeeda manda muudeanooda,
58013021	gagasa gagooneegwa haleanjeessean miyaas ak abeeda goosinnyi gidagasa, nea gagadiiyi aba jeedeang'wa gidagasa niny aba gheanyangaaschi aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo; nea giigheambiitta ea daannyi damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
58013022	Geamuscheegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi, oang'ng'waanya ng'asheandeanyu jea goomajeegeegwa, aba gideaba ng'asheesu geang'oorneegwa nea ghanuwaaschi.
58013023	Gagasa anala gideaba oorjeeda giyeanya was Dimotteo siittin aba ghealooniga, ak abeeda gaydabay dahidu heedeang'wa iibay ghwahidu.
58013024	Aghada fugeagwa hees ea fuga ghaydidi sean. Fukka leabu ng'eanyiida Ittalyaan ghoaghadeagwa.
58013025	Gagasa anyasa oagasean dagheerjeandumeeda. Amin.
59001001	Yakkobo, was soomjeanda Aseetta ea dea Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu Gristo, Heeda emoojiga attamaniyyeenya dardaawaat: Seayu.
59001002	Anung' ghoaw haleanjeessean hooseaneega, fuga eaduupcheewi, aba isisimsimeegwa aba gilakkil,
59001003	nea ghoanalli gideaba simooda masaweegeagwa gaygwanyakneegwa milikghteayda.
59001004	Nea alooheeda gagasa gweadu gadiyeeda majeek nea gowoschi, hidaat nea mwashoadeeweegwa gil.
59001005	Asi siida wassean mida jeedeang'wa isuunyeewa weaghumeeda, ea damwaash Aseetta, adawi buuneessean haleanjeeda aba innyeanda jeeda, nea maygwareekusa ak gajeattaw.
59001006	Ak gagasa gamus aba masaweega, nea mamwachmwaja gil, aba gideaba siida machmajiischi gawuurji laweachkweeda basooda aat jeammeeda nea geyyuuk.
59001007	Nea siida machmajiischi,
59001008	nea mabwagi nea moapta ng'eanyi aba jeeda naweadingaaschi sean, adaghwarar gideaba gayghwanyas gil aba heeda Ng'uttamiida.
59001009	Anung'waada oorjeeda giyeanya mwanang' ghaghwar geaw aba jeeda hooseaneagaaschi,
59001010	nea meanang'oochcheanda ea sihiing'u, aba gideaba gawuurji deakghweeda seenga gayghang'atta.
59001011	Aba gideaba aseetta iissa gorearu nea gweadu beasta, ak ghoaghajaam seenga; ak ghoabit deakghweadaannyi, ak goosha aloheeda. Gwasnu eara meanang'oochcheanda gayghaghajaamiit aba naweadingaaschi.
59001012	Ng'wanaweagaaschi siida riyeang'da iisisimsim, aba gideaba iing'atta nea nijoar simsimda gayghwanyas shiipka eaweega mammuudeana ghayi bay gwahelleesa Aseetta fukka bwariiy ninyiin.
59001013	Asi adagwayi siida isisimsim, “Aniini gwasimsiman Aseetta;” aba gideaba Aseetta moammu gwasimsim gidamuy ak eara niny ea maygwasimsim siida;
59001014	hean giliwas siih iissa geesimsim damanda sigassa nea geaghurghur aba gitta gasean.
59001015	Hean gitta gasa siidean iigweayiit gweadu ring'eeda; ama iiduw nea nirir ring'eetta gweadu miyeeda.
59001016	Adereenganneegwa, fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi.
59001017	Gilinyooh eahhaakta miy ea gilinyooh eattayda hidaat gwaleabu heettiyeada, ak ghwararang'aana heeda Bwaabwa weeshinda nea headaannyi ea manda yammoodeaba geaw ghana jironeeda yamitteaba geaw.
59001018	Aba gidabwariiyda niny gwajiileasa aseasa aba ng'asheanda huumwa ak gewuurjeewi haghweega madeeda aba jeeda haleanjeedaannyi ghayi sin.
59001019	Hean nea ghoanalli ng'asheesu, fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi. Asi daba siisi wassean lamajeesa iing'da ng'asheanda, nea goojiileesa baloolda, ak ea miiassas nyaras,
59001020	aba gideaba nyarasta siida maygwasin doobiiwnatta Aseetta.
59001021	Asi oshsheagiidana geat ririnnyeanda ea gassooda hawunda muy ak ghoang'ng'waanyi aba garbabanda ng'asheandida, ammu gwaleabu guroruunatkeagwean.
59001022	Nea gagasa ahuuwa fuga sina ng'asheanda, adoobeachcheewi iing'da akghwahit, nea goreenganayi geat.
59001023	Nea siida ibeachchi iing'da ng'asheanda akghwahit, nea ghanyea masna, siisi abeeda gawuurji siida ng'ulla gheamamdaannyi aba jeeda giyooh;
59001024	aba gideaba gang'ula geaw amang'atta gawa heechchea gawa ama deagheatta ea nuroossa giduurji.
59001025	Nea siida ng'ula deaweedeeda hidaat, jea gweadu giibaldeaba geaw, ak ghwashng'u, adaghoaw siida iing'shi ramasoot gagasa ea siida sina gadiyeeda gil, siisi aba sinoadaannyi bea gadiyeeda.
59001026	Siida iyeeshsha geaw gideaba gwandeawa diini, nea mwarada ng'ushaptaannyi, nea gwareengani guroroadaannyi, diineedeaba siisi marachchi gil.
59001027	Diineeda miy manda ririnnyeanda aba madeeda Aseetta was Ghweandean niih gil: bareassiinda bananga gil ea masiinung'weega aba jeeda sawanaduutka nyaawa, nea gufri geaw aba ng'asheega munyas bea muunda ng'eanyiida.
59002001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, adiiduw ghoahhiimu shiitmeeda nea ghoong'ng'waanyi masaweega Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, Ng'uttamiida gigheambiita.
59002002	Aba gideaba iiwuh siida mideawa ghuniida lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ea hang'weakka miyaas jeedeang'wa nea noabwachchi geat, eara siida bwarbwar biissa gaba hang'weakka beareadi,
59002003	amaduw goosissi mureeda siitta akkwa hang'weakka miyaasiin ak goyeeshshi, “Apteada ang'iing'i aba hiji,” ak giyeeshshi siitta bwarbwariin, “Miinaada ang'iing'i aba hoowa,” ghana, “Apteada aba hiji bea geeshangeasuun,”
59002004	abeeda miyoashiida buuneeda aba jeedeang'wa. Ak ghoahuuyi fuga ajiili girgweaguutka munyas fugheeri?
59002005	Oalleaydiit fuga eaduupcheewi abwariinyi. Heappi Aseetta ghayi miih ghwaloat fuga barbari bea muunda ng'eanyiida ak ghwanung' gabaruura masaweega nea gwahearan sugochcheandumeeda ghayi helleesa fuga bwariiyi?
59002006	Nea agooga ea nojakteaysi mureeda siida bwarbwar. Neada meanang'oodiga ea madiing'siineegwa ng'eanyi agooga, nea gongireegwa ea ghwadeagwa madeeda girgweageeda?
59002007	Nea marukunana ng'asheega munyas gheawungiga miyaas ghayi sugoneegwean?
59002008	Hean iyoosinnyi deaweedeedida bea sugoodigean gawuurji ginnyaashta ng'oruutka nea gwayi, “Bwariiyda giischewoochcheandaang'u gidubwariiydi geaw,” abeeda goosinnyi ng'asheanda miy.
59002009	Iiduw iyoashiichchi buuneeda goosinnyi ring'eeda, ak gaygorgweakseegwa deaweeda ak ghoahuuyi fuga adiiy.
59002010	Nea siida wassean iyang'ng'waay deaweedajeega sean amaduw gwaruusa ng'asheanjagi nidiiy appadahuukkeaba sean.
59002011	Aba gideaba siida ghayi ayi, “Adimealuuli,” ghabwada gwayi, “Adinuusi siida.” Earappeadi miih gamealuul ak ea ninuus siida, abeeda ea nihuuwi siida nuus deaweeda.
59002012	Asi arukuni ak goosinnyi nea gowuurjeewi fuga jea ergweaksiina deaweedeeda jea gweadu giibaldeaba geat.
59002013	Aba gideaba girgweaksiinda mayghabwayda siida mandeawana baydeayda; asi baydeayda iissa ghwajoar girgweageeda.
59002014	Fuga eaduupcheewi, gayghwaloat naaha, iyayi siida geandeawi masaweega ak ea mandeawana gadiyeeda? Masaweekka ikkaaschiin gayghoammu gwalealu?
59002015	Iideeppa adawiish oorjeeda giyeang'wa ghanea huda giyeang'wa gil ak ea mandeawana gichchea ghwaak bea galeagasean,
59002016	ak gwayeeshsha siyagi aba jeedeang'wa saawa, “Aweayeena nea gobeayi hoyyooh ak gojooyi beasta ak golang'uuchchi,” nea moattawi haleanjeeda gasa saseeda, gayghwaloat naaha?
59002017	Asi gwasnu eara masaweega nea gaba geaw iimandeawana gadiyoojiga aanimi.
59002018	Ak gaygwayi siyagi, “Ang'iing'i gindeawi masaweega ak geandeawi aniini gadiyoojiga.” Ahiimnaan masaweegaagu mandeawana gadiyoojiga, ak gaydaahiimneey masaweegeasu aba gadiyoojigeasu.
59002019	Ang'iing'i gumwasi gideaba Aseetta aagi; gidoabiiwi. Eara meangeenda ghamwas nea ghabwaadani.
59002020	Ak gigasayi eahhiimneeyi ang'iing'eeda was siida marachchi gil, gideaba masaweega iimandeawana gadiyeeda ea maygwaji?
59002021	Ghweandeanya was Abrahaamu meattawa doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga, aba damanda adaydaawa balleandaannyi was Isakka iin uhuuda heeda wagiida.
59002022	Midaahi beadi masaweega ghayi sin adeayi sea gadiyoojigaaschi, ea gideaba masaweekka geemmajeek aba naweetta bea gadiyoojigean,
59002023	iiduw gwasa ng'oruutka nea gwayi, “Abrahaamu ghayi ghamwas Aseetta, ak geattaw niny doobiiwnatta,” ak geguura siittuupchi Aseetta.
59002024	Moadaahi beadi siida sughus eattaw doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga nea meakghusa masaweega akghwahit.
59002025	Gwasnu eara Rahaabootta hiseadean eara niny meattawa doobiiwnatta aba gadiyoojiga damanda deabwa rabasta ak goruutta jarooda aba nawa nuudi?
59002026	Aba gideaba gawuurji saseeda iimanda gurorooda animi, gwasnu eara masaweega iimandeawana gadiyeeda animi.
59003001	Fuga eaduupcheewi, adoohuuyi ginealshoodiga saang'a aba gideaba ghoanalli beadi aseaseeni anealshiin jea eanyasa girgweaksiinda haw ea ghwanaawda.
59003002	Aba gideaba aseasa eesasean iissa gearamwaschi gasaang'a, ama deeppa ea mwaramwasta siida wassean aba ng'asheega rugu abeeda siisi adoabiiwaat, ak ghoammu ghwarat eara saseadaannyi sean.
59003003	Iissa isiyiinnyi ghealooniga ghuusiga faraasi ak abeeda gwasinneasa mureeda, abeeda geeppalli sasanuukka nyaawa sean.
59003004	Ang'ulla maleambajeega hees ea gwadeenachcha naaha iissa ghwaat jeammeeda ng'waan, iissa geasaja gidamwanang' muuchchi sumwanmwana ak gogeal siida mwanmwan heeda wassean gasa gawa.
59003005	Asi ng'ushapta gidamwanang' gil ak iissa ghaghwar geaw appadayda haleanjeeda hees. Dareabeetta earea haw iissa ghwaak beasta mwanang'!
59003006	Ak ng'ushapta ea beasta. Nea ng'ushapta ea gidamiidoabiiwaat gil aba jeeda fugaasa, iissa ghang'uda saseessean ririnnyeanda, iissa gong'eessa beasta haleanjeedeaba garayi, ak ghoang'eat jeeda beasta hang'weaniidooda.
59003007	Aba gideaba gilinyooh ea heluutka diyeanga gil ea dea dariidakka, ea dea diyeanga badiinna ng'eanyi ea dea haleanjeeda mida jeeda basooda, geammu eefur, ak ea nigeawiit buuneeda ghoahaaghwa.
59003008	Ak ghanyea manda siida ammu ghoahaaghwa ng'ushapta, was munyinda mwahawda, ak ghwannyiit furooda eattu miyeeda.
59003009	Aba niih geebadiischeesi Ng'uttamiida was Ghweandeanya, nea aba niih iissa geamoashti buuneeda, ghayi sisin ea eegala Aseetta.
59003010	Aba ghuuttida assagiin iissa gwarinna ghawooda ea mooshteayda. Fuga eaduupcheewi, ng'asheesu mwahida gideaba gaygwasnu.
59003011	Gheang'deenda assakkaleallaan ghoammu gwarinna beega innya ea beega ng'weani?
59003012	Fuga eaduupcheewi, heappi shabogheechcheanda, ghoammu gwaji gulageechcheanda, ghana sabiibu ghoammu gwaji shabogheetta? Asi gwasnu eara gheang'deenda moammu goruudu beega mattawi ea gea innya.
59003013	Niih ng'eaha aba jeedeang'wa mideawa weaghumeeda ea fughareeda? Aba giibindaannyi miy dahiimna gadiyoojigaaschi aba garbabanda ea weaghumeeda.
59003014	Nea iyondeawi lajoodeaba ghuut ng'waan ea gassooda shidoodeaba ghaang' aba jeeda guroruunatkeagwa, adoaghwarji geat ak ghoahuuyi ng'uyyeega aba heeda huumeanda.
59003015	Abeeda weaghumeeni ea maleapna heettiyeada, niih gaba badayda ng'eanyiida, ak ea maba gurorooda, ak gaba meang'nyeandeenda.
59003016	Aba gideaba heeda mida lachng'eanyiida ea gassooda shidoodeaba ghaang', gaygwanda mittagheasta ea giliwas ng'ashaan muy nyooh eesna.
