59003017	Duukku weaghumeeda leabu heettiyeada gidamadeeda aamiy, nuut gaba hoyyooh, ak ea garbabu, nea iissa goleeysiit ng'asheega buuneeda, nea gwandeawa haghweega miyaas, ak ea mayamiisachchi ghana gwareengani buuneeda.
59003018	Nea haghweega doobiiwnatta geehisa jeeda weayda nea gwahisa fuga sina hoyyooh.
59004001	Gweaduuni ng'uchcheeda, ak gweaduuni bearjeeda aba jeedeagwa? Miih ng'asheekka bea geawunda gheang'da ng'uchchi aba sasanuukkeagweani?
59004002	Iissa googasayi haleanjeeda ak ea mondeawani gil; gonuuschi buuneeda. Goolachchi ghuut haleanjeeda ak ea mwajanyasa; iissa gobearji nea goong'uchchi. Mondeawani, aba gideaba moomusi.
59004003	Eara amusa ghanyea mwajanyasa, aba gideaba gommunyiichchi musooda, ak abeeda goosni gitta ogasayiin.
59004004	Fuga miih doobiiweadi! Moanali gideaba idupcheewi geaw ng'eanyiida ea nihuuwi weajoochcheanda Aseetta? Asi siida wassean gasa goduupchi geaw ng'eanyiida abeeda ea nisin geaw weajoochcheanda Aseetta
59004005	Ghana oaghanyi gilirugu ng'oruutka mwadaagha nea gwayi, “Gurorooni abiitta jeedeanyean iissa gagasseasa nea ghwalajaneasa ghuudi?”
59004006	Amaduw gagoaneasa dagheerjeandumeeda naawda; nea gwayi, “Aseetta iissa ghaheawa fuga adiing'ng'u geat, ak iissa ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga eada geat ng'eanyi.”
59004007	Asi asissiina Aseetta mureeda. Oattealla Meang'nyeandeenda, ak gaygamng'aw.
59004008	Aneekkissiina Aseetta ak gaygwaneekkiseegwa agooga. Oammiinni geattingeagwa, ea fuga ring'eega, oammiinni guroruunatkeagwa, ea fuga mabwagi.
59004009	Agiisana nea gonnyahuushshi nea goyyeawdi. Reargeagwa gagasa ghwayamwa ghoaw ginyahushshooda, nea ghoaw hooseaneegeagwa giseaneega.
59004010	Ayaada geat ng'eanyi aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida, ak gaygagatkadeegwa.
59004011	Fuga eaduupcheewi adoobeerayi geat. Siida beash oorjeeda geannyaawa ghana goorgweaksa oorjeeda geannyaawa, ghabeash deaweeda nea gorgweaksa deaweeda. Nea irgweaksi deaweeda abeeda ea muwosi siida sina deaweeda abeeda ea nuhuuwi siida laja girgweaguutka.
59004012	Gwanda siyagi goona deaweeda nea goorgweakkiisa, ak ghoammu gwalealu ghana gwanuus. Ak guwosi ng'eaha inyas girgweaksi gischewoochcheandaang'u?
59004013	Asi apkaani ghamneawa, agoogeeda oyeenayi, “Askweareani ghana numuji gajeeweaya jeedeaba mujineeni ea mujineeni ak geeppiidi gweayda nea geekkeakshi ak goheadeeseasa haleanjeeda,”
59004014	amaduw ea moanali gichchea gapnu numuji. Eaweegeagwa naaha gil? Aba gideaba agooga gowoschi aroosta sidaah aba gheadi nuwaas amang'atta ghwaaroat.
59004015	Damanda ghwanyawa jea ayeenana, “Iibwariiy Ng'uttamiida, gajeewosa majeekcheewi ak geesinnyi gili ea gili.”
59004016	Ak gwasnu nukkwa ghoaghwarji geat aba ghwarjeedeang'wa. Nea ghwarjeeni sean sunuun eamuy.
59004017	Asi siida nal gidadoabiiw sinooda ak ea masna, aba heedaannyi niiw ring'eeda.
59005001	Asi ghamneawa meanang'oodiga, oyyeawda nea gokkuulli aba sawanadeeda jea gwahisseegwa.
59005002	Meanang'oochcheandumeedeang'wa nimealu, nea hang'weakkeagwa aniyaak ng'weerajeega.
59005003	Lagheangeagwa meeng'meeng'i ea lappiyeedeang'wa ning'ut girgweatka, nea girgweatka nyaawa gaygamuuwwu ng'asheega badahuukkeagwa ak gayghwaak sasanuukkeagwa gawuurji beasta. Gowweamsi haleanjeeda heeda ottiiwshachcheewi aba eawoojiga huydean.
59005004	Ang'ulla, mushaahareeda fuga gadiyeeda lach madameegeagwa, ghayi oaweachchi aba milimilanda, oyyeawda; nea shookka fuga lach ea nihitta iidiga Ng'uttamiida bea lugooda.
59005005	Agooga noppiidi jeeda ng'eanyiida nea goomnyeennyi nea gohoosannyi; ak ea noanung' gwariisha guroruunatkeagwa aba eaweetta jea ghwahinna nuusta.
59005006	Agooga norgweaksi, ak gonuuschi siida doabiiwaat; nea niny ghanyea miighoadealeagwa.
59005007	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, amilikghta ea ghwahitta damanda jea ghwahinna Ng'uttamiida. Ang'ulla, siida bwar ng'eanyi iissa gafurda haghweega ng'eanyiida bea sheayeeda haw, iissa ghamilikghta ea ghanyi ghwanyas roopta madeeda ea dea huydean.
59005008	Eara agooga amilikghta. Ommajeega guroruunatkeagwa, aba gideaba hinnooda Ng'uttamiida nineekkiit.
59005009	Fuga eaduupcheewi, adonnikkiisi geat, aba gideaba gajiiduw gergweakseegwa; ang'ulla siida laja girgweaguutka ghamiinaada aba gidaghuudajeega.
59005010	Aba gideaba gichchea agalana was sawanadeeda ea milikghteayda, fuga eaduupcheewi, oapkaada sibanga ghayi rugu ng'asheega aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida.
59005011	Ang'ulla, geguuri fiisu fuga mideawa ng'wanaweega aba gideaba ghamilikghta. Ak ea noayiinyi iitta milikghteayda Ayuubu, ak ea noadaayi gidabaysiina Ng'uttamiida gwandeawa baydeayda nea garbabu.
59005012	Fuga eaduupcheewi, aba haleanjeessean, adiiduw giyaagi habeawooda, aba humng'eeda ghana aba ng'eanyiida, ghana aba habeawooda wassean, iyoyeennyi eah gagasa ghoaw eah, nea iyoyeennyi manda gagasa ghoaw manda, ak abeeda ea moppedeaysiini jeeda girgweaksiinda.
59005013	Siida ghaheang'wa nubussa sawanadeeda? Gagasa ghamwaash Aseetta. Gwandeawa hooseaneega wasseani? Ea dasarmana duumda duumsheesiinda.
59005014	Aba jeedeang'wa gwanda siida miyaani? Daguursiina gweargwa ganiisa, ak abeeda ghamwaash Aseetta appadaydaannyi, ak ghoamwaara nagheeda aba gheawunga Ng'uttamiida;
59005015	nea mooshta Aseetta aba masaweega gaygwalealu siida miyaan, ak gaygagatkat Ng'uttamiida; amadeeppa ea nisin ring'eega, abeeda gajeesamsa.
59005016	Daba siisi duukkuuna ring'eemba nuut, nea gaba siisi mwaash Aseetta appadayba nuut, ak abeeda geahhaabeagwa. Siida doabiiwaat imwaash Aseetta gwandeawa uurda haw sin gadiyeeda.
59005017	Eliya niny siida gil mideawa searoojiga uurji sea gaasa, ak ghamwaash Aseetta muuchchi amwaroabwana roopta, ak ea maroabwana roopta gweannyeew samwagu ea shealah.
59005018	Gabiikta gichcha ak ghamwaash Aseetta ak ghwaroabwan, ak gwaji ng'eanyiida haghweagaaschi.
59005019	Fuga eaduupcheewi, siida wassean aba jeedeang'wa ineayi ea gwasheagiida huumeanda ak godeelu siih nuut gabiigu,
59005020	abeeda ea danala gideaba siida adeelu siida ring'eeda ea gwarinna jeeda ramaseanda naweadaannyi gaygwalealna guroroadaannyi miyeeda ak gaygwadukuta seang'ayda ring'eega.
60001001	Betro, giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, fuga was mang'aweannyeekka ak ea Dardawaat aba ng'eanyiida Bonto, ea Galattiya, ea Gabadokkiya, ea Asiya, ea Bittiniya,
60001002	ghayi siloat ak goojeakta Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak ghoammiidu Gurorooda aba mureeda appadayda Yeesu Gristo nea geappuunna foojeandaannyi: Gagasa elakkuuneegwa dagheerjeandumeeda ea weayda.
60001003	Badiischeesiinda gaba Aseetta was Bwaabwa Ng'uttamiideanya Yeesu Gristo! Aba baydeaydaannyi haw sibiikta eejiileasa gichcha ak gagoaneasa eaweega eashish sirarji aba naweeda duunnooda Yeesu Gristo aba jeeda miyeeda,
60001004	ak geanyaschi hearanda may ghwadattasa, mandeawana ririnnyeanda, nea mayghwasis, sighamwat aba humng'eeda appadahuukkeagwa,
60001005	ak aba uurda Aseetta geefreegwa aba naweeda masaweega aba lealeanooda hidaat jea eattaajiit damanda huydean.
60001006	Aba niih gohoosannyi, earappeadi ghamneawa jea anyasa sawanaduutka saang'a gheadi nuwaas,
60001007	ak abeeda aba simsimda masaweegeagwa miyaas ng'al lagheanga meang'meang'i jea gwarooda, earappeadi iissa geesim aba beasta, ak abeeda geadaah gideaba gwandeawa dumsiinda ea gharbeeda ea mureeda aba gidaheachta Yeesu Gristo.
60001008	Earappeadi miyadaaha ninyiin ghoabwariinyi; ak earappeadi ghamneawa miyadaaha ninyiin noamwaschi niny ak gohoosannyi aba ng'weellooda ea gigheambiitta meammu eergu.
60001009	Gawuurji huuydeanda masaweegeagwa abeeda gajanyasa lealeanooda guroruunatkeagwa.
60001010	Sibanga ghayi ramoaran dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghoaw deang'wa gagaseadayyi nea goonyearriida iitteaba lealeanoani;
60001011	goonyearriida siida was ghana damanda ahiimu Gurorooda Gristo mida jeannyaawa damanda rukuna sawanadeeda Gristo ea gigheambiitta jea imuchchu ghwahidu.
60001012	Hean geettaheachsa saawa gideaba magadiyeesiina badahuukka nyaawa, appadahuukka haleanjeeda ghamneawa rukuneegwa fukghayi rukuneegwa giijasta miy aba naweeda Gurorooda Ghaydit siichcheagu leabu humng'eedean, ng'asheesu ghayi gagaseadayi malaykajeega ghwadaah.
60001013	Asi ommajeega fughareengeagwa, adeeneada ng'asheega, nung' gwaheedu gidirari appadayda dagheerjeandumeeda jea ghwahidu heedeang'wa aba damanda siittahaaja Yeesu Gristo.
60001014	Awuurjeewana diibiga mideawa mureeda, ak adagudoobiiksi jeeda ng'asheegeagwa munyas bea mwadi bea leendeedeang'wa,
60001015	asi deaghayi guurneegwa aaghaydit, earagooga awosa ghaydidi aba giibindeang'wa sean;
60001016	aba gideaba gway ng'ooruutka, “Gajawasa ghaydidi aba gideaba aniini geawooschi ghaydit.”
60001017	Agooga iyoomwashchi awuurjeewana Bwaabwa jea goorgweaksa giliwas siih nea manda shiitmeeda aba giduurji sinaweagaaschi, asi abeawana muuwda damandeang'wa oowosi mang'aweannyeekka.
60001018	Agooga ghoanalli gideaba leendeedeagwa meawalda aba haleanjeeda ghayi ohearannyi aba ghweanigeagwa, nea miih aba haleanjeeda jea ghwadattasa gil uurji lappiya ghana lagheanga meang'meang'i,
60001019	geesna foojeanda haw sheayeat bea Gristo, uurji sea dayeenda gisilleanda manda siirjeeda ghana badeeda.
60001020	Niny ghayi geebean ealoat nea miyeabwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida, ak geattaajiit aba huuydeandeaba askwearjoojusu appadahuukkeagwa.
60001021	Nea appadaydaannyi gondeawi rarooda aba heeda Aseetta, ghayi aduunna niny jeeda miyeeda, ak ghoadaw giigheambiitta, ak eara masaweegeagwa ea raroodeang'wa gwanda heeda Aseetta.
60001022	Nea ghoammiidu jeesingeagwa aba mureedeang'wa aba heeda huumeanda aba bariinyeega huumwa aba heeda oorjoogiyya, abariinnya geat huumwa aba jeeda gurorooda.
60001023	Agooga meejiileegwa niba iyyeenya, aba mbeeyooda jea goosha geejiilneegwa aba diitta maygooshean, aba ng'asheanda Aseetta mideawa eaweega biissa gwanda;
60001024	Aba gideaba “Saseessean gawuurji nyeega, Nea gharbeadaannyi sean gawuurji deakghweeda seenga. Iissa seenga ghaghajaamiit ak ghoabit deakghweadaannyi,
60001025	ak ng'asheanda Ng'uttamiida gayghwashng'u ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.” Ak ng'asheanji ea Giijasta Miy surukuneegwa gil.
60002001	Asi ageandeawana geat munyinda sean ea milmilanda sean ea nyootta doobiiwnatta ea shidoodeaba ghaang' ea beeshta sean.
60002002	Gawuurji diibiga manang'i siji ghamneawa, agassa eanooga miyaas bea gurorooda, ak abeeda goohissiini heeda lealeanooda;
60002003	ak ea noosamu gideaba Ng'uttamiida gwandeawa alooheeda.
60002004	Beenni headaannyi, ninyeeda was lagheaneeda mideawa eaweega, ghayi heawa buuneeda ak aba heeda Aseetta ea siloat ak gaba sheayeeda haw;
60002005	ak goowuurjeewi lagheanga mideawa eaweega, ak geadeaseagwa awosa gheeda gurorooda, ak ghoaw ashoohoochcheandumeeda ghaydit, jea ghoadayda haleanjeeda gurorooda sisappa geadi bea ghadoweeda was gea jea ghamwas Aseetta aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo.
60002006	Geang'waar aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gideaba: “Ng'ulla, ghayiinyi uhuuda Sayuuni lagheaneeda, lagheaneeda washiini, siloat, haw sheayeat, ak gilinyooh ghamwas niny ea mwajeapwaaspwaas.”
60002007	Asi agoogeeda mideawa masawaweega, gaba sheayeeda haw, nea aba heeda fuga mwamwasaan, “Lagheaneeda fool fuga deekshi aniiw lagheaneeda haw washiini.”
60002008	Nea “Lagheaneeda jea gwaruusa buuneeda, lagheaneeda jea ghwanung' goobeedeayi;” ak goobeedeayi aba gideaba masissiina mureeda ng'asheanda, was gissunung' gaweay gwasin.
60002009	Nea agooga goowoschi emeeda siloat, ashoohoochcheandumeeda ambaliischi, emeeda ghaydidi, was fuga Aseetta, ak abeeda goorukkwiidi sinaweagaaschi deamdeameadi was dea guurneegwa arinnana jeeda misaneeda ak gooweayi jeeda weeshindaannyi haw.
60002010	Ammadeeda ghayi moowosi buuneeda ak ghamneawa eanoowoschi fuga Aseetta; ammwadi ghayi miyanyasa baydeayda ak ghamneawa eanoanyaschi baydeayda.
60002011	Fuga abwariinyi, geamuscheegwa nea goowuurjeewi rabasta ea fuga mang'aw mulsa haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ng'uchchi sea guroruunatkeagwa.
60002012	Andeawana searoojiga miyaas aba jeeda emoojiga, aba gideaba iisinapsa badahuukkeang'wa ng'uyyeega gideaba goosinnyi ng'asheega munyas, hean iing'ula sinaweegeagwa miyaas ghoaghaambiit Aseetta eaweeda jea ghwahinna.
60002013	Sissiina Ng'uttamiida gadiyeeda aba madeeda buuneeda earea heeda sugoochcheanda haw ambaliischi gil,
60002014	ghanea heeda sugoochcheanda haw sichcheagu ak ghwaaga ghoorjooda fuga sina ng'asheega munyasiini ak gwaduumsheesa fukka sina ng'asheega doabiiwiin.
60002015	Aba gideaba niih gidagassiida Aseetta gil, gideaba aba sunooda ng'asheega miyaas abeeda geanung' ghwasiinda leendeeda fuga dasheahi.
60002016	Oppiideatta fuga abal geat, ak ea mogadiyeattani gibaldeaba geat aba funyooda ng'asheega munyas, asi oppiideatta soomjooga Aseetta.
60002017	Asissiina mureeda buuneessean. Abwariinya fugeagwa. Owwala gheang'da Aseetta. Ottawa sugoochcheanda haw mureeda.
60002018	Soomjooga, asissiina fugeagwa hees mureeda aba mureeda sean, ea gea miyaas eara heeda fuga jooriischi,
60002019	Aba gideaba iissa siida geesikteawa iyapkaat Aseetta, nea ghamilikghta sawanadeeda nea geesawan nea mwadoabiiwa.
60002020	Aba gideaba gajea alooheemba naaha iyoosinnyi gidamuy nea geabwar nea ghoajeang'di, abeeda noanyaschi alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetta?
60002021	Nea aba niih ea suguurnaneegwa, aba gideaba eara Gristo gwasawana appadahuukkeang'wa, ak gagooneegwa gichchea agalana, gideaba gajayaada geeshtaannyi.
60002022	Niny miih gwasin ring'eeda; ak eara ng'asheanda milmilanda ea miiyeeyiing'sa ghuutaannyi.
60002023	Niny ghayi iisiing'ng'eawi ea miighoodeelda ging'weakka; nea eara iisawana ea miigoomuuw siih; ghaghus ninyeeda laja girgweageeda nea ghoadoabiiw.
60002024	Niny ghwasar ring'eagaasa aba saseadaannyi aba uhuuda geetta, ak abeeda geemeewayi aba ring'eeda, ak geewoschi majeekcheewi aba doabiiwnatta, aba deanneaduutkaaschi ea siihabeasa.
60002025	Aba gideaba ghayi nooroottidi gisilga, ak ghamneawa ea noobiiksi Jeagiischoochcheanda was dea fur guroruunatkeagwa.
60003001	Asi eara agooga gadeemga, asissiina siyeendingeagwa mureeda, aba gideaba, iimiida gea masissiina mureeda ng'asheega, geeksu nea manda ng'asheanda geaghus searoojiga gadeemga nyaawa,
60003002	iing'ula mureedeang'wa ea searoojiga miyaas.
60003003	Suulgeagwa adagabeachchi suulgeapwadaw bea giireetta buudeega ea giishuupta haleanjeeda meang'meang'i ea giishuupta hang'weakka miyaas,
60003004	gammiisa gawos siida funyaat aba gurorooda bea suulga mayghwadattasa ak gabiissa ea ng'eeni nea siindeawoot guroaru, nea aba madeeda Aseetta ea haw sheayeat.
60003005	Niih gidasinniida gadeemga rar Aseetta gil ak gwasin suulga nyaawa nea gwasissa siyeendiga nyaawa mureeda,
60003006	ak gawuurji gidaghayi sissiinda Saara mureeda Abrahaamu, ak gaguura niny ng'uttamiida. Ak ghamneawa goowoschi diibigaaschi iyoosinnyi ng'asheega doabiiw nea moanung' ghoabealeagwa gil.
60003007	Ak gwasnu eara agooga siyeendiga, anala gichchea andeayeena sea gadeemgeagwa aba fughareeda, nea ghoottawji gatmooda mureeda, aba gideaba niny siida mandeawana uurda gil, aba gideaba saawa ea agooga gajahearana dagheerjeandumeeda eaweega, ak abeeda ameateala mooshteang'wa bea Asseetta.
60003008	Ng'asheanda huydean niih gil, awoosa gilagi, ak goobayiidi geat nea ghoabwariiydi geat oorjoospwa ghaamwadagi, nea goowoschi ng'eeni ak gooyeadayi geat ng'eanyi.
60003009	Adowalliideawi ng'asheanda muy dea muy ghana ging'weakka ea ging'weakka; ghang'wana gidawi ghawooda, aba gideaba geeguurneey appadaydeaba ng'asheanji, ak abeeda ginyasi ghawooda.
60003010	Aba gideaba “Gili was siih bwariiy eaweega ak gwadaah askwearjoojiga miyaas, dadeala ng'ushaptaannyi adagwargu ng'asheanda muy ak eara ghuuttaannyi adagwargu milmilanda;
60003011	ak ea danung'waada ng'asheega munyas ak gwasin gea doabiiw; ak ea dagassa weayda, ak ghwaat geeshta muuchchi.
60003012	aba gideaba gheanyanga Ng'uttamiida gang'ula fuga doabiiweadi, nea iidigaaschi ea jaadaat ghwayiiy mooshta Aseetta. Ak gheamamda Ng'uttamiida gwanda badayda fuga sina ng'asheega munyas.”
60003013	Ak ghamneawa gaygwasawaneegwa ng'eaha iyoomilmiliidayi aba sinooda ng'asheega doobiiweadi?
60003014	Eara gwasa asawanana appadayda doabiiwnatta, gajeegooneegwa ghawooda. Adoawalli saawa, nea adaghang'udeegwa muuwda,
60003015	aba jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa asissiina Gristo mureeda gawuurji Ng'uttamiida. Nea galagasean gowoschi hideadi nea goofurji giliwas siih guurneegwa aba rarooda mida jeedeagwean, ak goosinnyi aba garbabanda ea mureeda;
60003016	nea ghoanung' gamiyeasiidi fughareengeagwa, ak abeeda isipwaspwaseagwa, abeeda fukka ang'eawwi alooheedeang'wa aba jeeda Gristoohiin abeeda geanung' ghabwaspwas,
60003017	aba gideaba ghang'wana sawanadeeda inyasi aba sinooda ng'asheega miyaas ii gidagassiida Aseetta gil, mwasamwa sinooda ng'asheega munyas.
60003018	Aba gideaba Gristo eara niny ghami nibwagi appadayda ring'eeda, ninnyeeda doabiiwaat appadayda gea miih doobiiweadi, aba gideaba gweanneassa heeda Aseetta ak geenuus saseadaannyi nea guroroadaannyi geettuudu;
60003019	Ak iiduw gawa ak gwaruksa giijasta fukka mida ghealoonigean,
60003020	suuh ammwadi masna mureeda, aba damanda milikghtaawa Aseetta ak gafurda aba damanda Nuuhu, damanda sisna maleambooda, nea abeeda fuga ng'ay assis gwaleala aba jeeda beega.
60003021	Gibattiisanda deaschi sea ng'asheesu ghamneawa gwalealneegwa, nea miih gideaba gageandeawa saseeda ririnnyeanda gil geemus Aseetta aba fughareeda miy, aba duunnooda Yeesu Gristo,
60003022	nea niny eanuwa humng'eeda ak gwanda meatkweeda geattinda dugwa bea Aseetta, sea malaykajeega, ea gheambalmeeda, ea uurda ak gagadiyeesa niny.
60004001	Asi aba gideaba Gristo ghwanyas sawanadeeda saseadaannyi, eara agooga oang'ng'waanya dabitta ng'uchcheeda bea gassoodida, aba gideaba ninnyeeda sisawan saseeda niny ninung'waada ring'eeda,
60004002	nea heessunung' abiideewa siida badayda ng'eanyiida aba ng'asheega gasa saseeda nea miih gidagassiida Aseetta gil.
60004003	Anung'waada damanda heeda ning'atta ghwahit aba sinooda ng'asheega gaseadayyi fuga emoojiga, giibinda sihiseada, geawunda gheang'da, booktuumeeda, sinooda ghweelmeeda, ghweelmeeda difaayeeda, ea baditta gidamawosa Aseetta,
60004004	ak ghahamng'eanyi saawa iidaa gideaba moguyeesiini jeedeaba ng'asheesu bea roodaweegean, amang'atta ghoabwaaspwaseagwa;
60004005	ak gayghoadayda iitta gidaniibideatta aba madeeda siitta jea goorgweaksa giikka duugwandachchiin ea giikka nimeewean.
60004006	Niih gissurukkwiideaysa giijasta miy gil earaba heeda fuga nimeewa, eappeadi sirgweaksa aba saseedean gawuurji buuneeda, abeeda gaygoobiideewa gurorooda gawuurji Aseetta.
60004007	Ak muudeanooda haleanjeessean ea nineekiit, asi amilmiliitta ak ghoang'wearu aba baditta Aseetta.
60004008	Appadaydeaba suuh seaniin asna badiida muuchchi ak ghoabwariinyi geat, aba gideaba bariinyeega gwadukta ring'eega saang'a.
60004009	Adeepiida geat nea ghoanung'waadi sichcheeda aba jeedeang'wa.
60004010	Aba gideaba niba siisi nyasta gissiittaw mwadaagha daba siisi gadiyeatta sea nuut, nea goowuurjeewi fuga miyaas sitteaga gadiyeeda healli bea dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetta:
60004011	siida wassean balool, gawuurji dea rukku ng'asheega Aseetta; nea dea wassean sin gadiyeeda, dawuurji dea sin gadiyeeda aba uurda adaw Aseetta; ak abeeda aba haleanjeessean geakghaambiit Aseetta aba naweeda Yeesu Gristo. Gigheambiitta gammiisa niny ea gheambalmeeda ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
60004012	Fuga abwariinnyi, adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi aba habeawooda ea sawanadeeda jea ghwahidu badahuukkeagwa ak goomajeegeegwean, ak gawuurji gili busseegwa ng'asheandeesh.
60004013	Asi ahoosana aba gideaba nooppareanyi sawanaduutka Gristo, ak abeeda earagooga gohoosannyi nea goong'weelayi damanda jea eattahaaja gigheambiittaannyi.
60004014	Iisiyeattawaneegwa ghuut aba gheawunga Gristo ea ng'wanaweegeagwa gil aba gideaba gurorooda gigheambiitta bea Aseetta gwanda badaydeang'wa.
60004015	Nea aba jeedeang'wa ea adagwasawaneatta siida dea nuusa buuneeda, ghana mareanghweanda, ghana dea sina ng'asheega munyas, ghana dea ng'waanjih;
60004016	ama deeppa gwasawana siih aba gideaba siida Gristo gil, asi adaghabwaspwas, nea aba jeedeaba gheawungiga bea Gristohiin ea daghambiida Aseetta.
60004017	Asi nihitta damanda jea eang'eada girgweaksiinda fuga gheeda Aseetta, ak iisiing'eada heedeanya, abeeda huydeanda nyaawa gaygawuurjiin deaba fukka mwamwasa giijasta miy bea Aseettean?
60004018	Nea “Siida doabiiwaat iiramwagaan aba nyasooda lealeanooda, abeeda fuga meawalla gheang'da Aseetta ea fuga ring'eega gajeedeaksa yeenu?”
60004019	Asi fukka sawana aba gidagassiida Aseettean ghoadoabiiw aba giidaydeayda jeesinga nyaawa heeda Deabwat haleanjeessean biissea doabiiwaat.
60005001	Geamuschi gweargwa mida ng'eang'deang'wa, eara aniini geawoschi gweargweeda geawujeeweegwa, ak geawoschi muuwshoochcheanda sawanadeeda Gristo, ak geendeayeesi giigheambiitta jea iiduw eattaajiit.
60005002	Oahaaghwana mughusheanda fuga Aseetta ghayi siitteaganeegwa, nea goomiineadaysi, nea meediingseegwa, asna aba gidoogassiidi nea adoosinnyi aba gideaba googasayi lappiyeeda baspaseega, asi asna nea goommajeekchi,
60005003	nea adoowuurjeewi fuga ambaliischi aba heedeaba fukka mida hiing'eadaydeang'wean gidabal ghoahuunyi gichchea eegala aba mughusheandida.
60005004	Iiduw nea geattajiit Jeagiischoochcheanda haw, gajanyasa shiipka giikka mayghaghajaamiit bea gigheambiittean.
60005005	Gwasnu earagooga gheareemanga asissiina gweargwa mureeda. Okkweala geat, oagassean, nea gaba siisi sissa nuut mureeda, aba gideaba, “Aseetta iissa ghaheawa fuga ghwarjeeda, ak ghoadaw dagheerjeandumeeda fuga eada geat ng'eanyi.”
60005006	Asi ayiina geat hiing'eadayda geattinda Aseetta hoauur, ak iihitta damanda abeeda goodiing'neegwa.
60005007	Ak ghoattawji niny sawanaduutkeagwa sean, aba gideaba niny gwadeawiissa muuchchi ng'asheegeagwa.
60005008	Andeawana gheadeenda nea ghoang'ng'wearu. Aba gideaba weajoochcheandeang'wa was meang'nyeandeenda gawuurji ng'adiida ak gwanyeara daghatta, nea gwaneay gagasa siida jea ghwanukghuta.
60005009	Ak ghoaheawi niny, awasa majeek aba masaweega, nea ghoonalli gideaba sawanadeeda ghwanyas fukghaheanya mida muunda ng'eanyiida.
60005010	Iiduw nea ghang'atta sawanadeedida gilimwanang', hean Aseetta mideawa dagheerjeandumeeda sean, ghayi guurneegwa apkaani jeeda gigheambiiittaannyi manda muudeanooda aba jeeda Gristo, gaygoodeelu niny, ak goomajeegideegwa.
60005011	Headaannyi gagasa gwanda gheambalmeeda damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
60005012	Geang'oorneegwa barawajeanji nea ghaweadan Silwaano, niny ghaadaayi oorjeediyya doabiiwaat gil, ak geang'ayiichchi ng'asheesu bea reekusiindean nea geargu gideaba niih dagheerjeandumeeda huumwa gil bea Aseetta; amiinaada appadaydeaba niih nea gowoschi majeekcheewi.
60005013	Ganiiseeda mida Babelooni, ghayi siloat eara ninyiin, ghoaghadeagwa; ak gwasnu eara balleandeanyu was Marko.
60005014	Ookkatta geat nea goosamayi geat aba bariinyeega. Gagasa anyasa weayda oagassean mida jeeda Gristoohiin.
61001001	Simon Betro gil, soomjeanda ea giijasoochcheanda Yeesu Gristo, heeda fukka ninyas masaweega uurjeewaneasean, aba doobiiwnata Aseetteanya, ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo.
61001002	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda nea gehheaseegwa weayda jea anala Aseetta ea Yeesu Ng'uttamiideanya.
61001003	Aba gidawaseetta Aseetta ea uurdaannyi gagooneasa easassean haleanjeeda miisa eaweega ea gea maduuppa aseetta, aba naweetta bea fughareadaannyiin ghayi guurneasa jeeda gheambalmeadaannyi miy,
61001004	nea niny ea nigooneasa heelleedaannyi haw biissa gaba sheayeeda haw ak abeeda aba niih ghoammuuschi amng'awana munyinda mida jeeda ng'eanyiida aba gitta gasa saseedean, ak ghoahuuyi fuga sin ng'asheega Aseetta.
61001005	Aba sareani asna badiida ak ghoahhaadi masaweegeagwa aloheeda, ak ghoabwadi aloheeda fughareeda,
61001006	ea fughareeda ak ghoayiinnyi ging'ng'ooydeaba geat, ging'ng'ooydeaba geat, abwadana doobiiwnatta, ghoabwadi doobiiwnatta aloheeda,
61001007	nea aloheeda ghoabwadi bariinyeega oorjooga giyeang'wa, ghoabwadi bariinyeega oorjooga giyeang'wa bariinyeega.
61001008	Aba gideaba ng'asheesu iyoondeawi sean, gayghwanung' ea moobeahi ghaleehu, nea moawa fuga mandeawana haghweega, aba nalooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
61001009	Aba gideaba siida mandeawana ng'asheesu ang'oaw, aba gideaba mayghwadaah haleanjeeda mida hoosheagiin, ak ea niroosa gidaghayi simiteayda ring'eegaaschi bea garayi.
61001010	Asi fuga eaduupcheewi, ahoosana nea goomilmiliidayi aba guurnoodeang'wa ea gissiloattaneagwa, aba gideaba iyoosinnyi ng'asheesu ea majoappeeda;
61001011	ak gajanyasa muuchchi beatta jeeda sugoochcheandumeeda manda muudeanooda bea Ng'uttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheandeanya was Yeesu Gristo.
61001012	Nea iissa geagasayi galeagasean deapkeanneegwa ng'asheesu, earappeadi oanalli ak geemajeek jeeda huumeanda ondeawiin.
61001013	Iyeang'ulayi ghwadeabiiw, aba hiji duudandean, daheadeagwa agooga iyeapkeanneegwa,
61001014	hean ghaanalli gideaba nineekkiit damanda jea dameawa, aba gidahiimdeayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo.
61001015	Ak gaydasikteawa gideaba iihidu beatteanyu abeeda gajoammuusa gipkeatteaba ng'asheesu damanda wassean.
61001016	Aba gideaba meayaadi geeshta ghwasiildeanga sisna milmilinda damanda sinung' anala uurda ea hinnooda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, geewoschi muushoodiga daah aba gheanyanga uurdaannyi.
61001017	Nea aba damanda nyasa mureeda ea gigheambiitta aba heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak ghwanya ghuutta leabu heeda dea mideawa uurda gigheambiitta, “Niih Balleandeanyu abwariinnyi, ahoosanan muuchchi,”
61001018	Geayiinyi ghuutta leabu humng'eeda, aba gideaba geendeawi niny aba uhuuda giijeeda ghaydit.
61001019	Ak geendeawi muuchchi ng'asheanda siramoaran ak ghoaw huumwa. Ak gisni muuchchi nea gisikteawi ng'asheesu nea gawuurji gheaboonyaneeda yeat aba heeda misana, ea ghaghar gayeew ea gorearu ming'weanda muchchuunooda aba jeesinga guroruunatkeagwa.
61001020	Gidamadeeda anyooghanyi anala ng'asheanji, gideaba manda ramooraneeda aba jeeda ng'ooruutka gidaroopteayda siida aba uhuudaannyi,
61001021	aba gideaba manda ramooraneeda oang'ng'wa gwaleabu uurda siida, buuneeda ghwaat Gurorooda Ghaydit ak gwargu ng'asheega leabu heeda Aseetta.
61002001	Ng'atta gwarina jeeda buuneeda sibanga ng'uyyeega earappeadi jea gwanda giinealshoodiga ng'uyyeega aba jeedeang'wa, fuga jea gweadu ginealshooda nyariida aba makcheameeda, ak ghwashaang' Siida haw ghayi shaang' saawa, ak gweassa geat nyariida.
61002002	Nea fuga saang'a gayghwaat geeshta hiseadayeandumeeda nyaawa, nea appadahuukka nyaawa gayghwadaajiit naweeda huumeanda.
61002003	Nea aba shidooda nyaawa bea ghaang' gaygoheadeesa haleanjeeda appadahuukkeagwa aba ng'asheega ng'uyyeega; ghang'eada garayi girgweageeda nyaawa ghanyea maygafuuf, nea nyariida nyaawa ghanyea maygwalil.
61002004	Aseetta ghayi iimwanung'waada malaykajeega adiiy, hean gwahisa jeeda maloonghajeega ak ghwayiin jeesinga shoomeanga misana earassa ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda;
61002005	niny ghayi iimwanung'waada ng'eanyiida ghayi bea garayi ak ghoaghu Nuuhu, was siida doabiiwaatt, sea fiih iispwa, damanda eanna roopta gittunuwaas badayda ng'eanyiida fuga mabatta Aseetta;
61002006	nea iiyam mujiinajeega Sodooma ea Gomoora, ak ghwanung' ghoaw deareeda ak ghwaaga ghorjooda saawa ak gwanuseada nea ghwanung' ghoaw gichchea eegala aba heeda fuga mabatta Aseettean;
61002007	iing'atta nea gwalealu Luttuyda doabiiwaat, gagiisan muuchchi aba hiseadayeandumeeda fuga munyas.
61002008	Hean ghwadaah naaha siitta doabiiwaadiin ak ghwayiiy naaha damanda mideewa jeannyaawa, iissa geannyareas aba jeadaannyi doabiiwaat galeaga sean aba sinaweega nyaawa maweeda.
61002009	Asi Ng'uttamiida ghwanal gichchea gwalealdeayda fuga awali gheangda Aseetta aba jeeda simsimda, nea ghwayiin fuga miih doabiiweadi ghoammuughu ghealooda ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda,
61002010	nea ghwaraanya giikka aat geeshta ng'asheega gasa saseeda aba gassooda ng'asheega munyasiin nea gafool gheambalmeedean. Daruuschi mideawa uurjeenga meawalla ging'weakka haleanjeeda gheambiideadi,
61002011	nea eara malaykajeega earappeadi hees ak ea majeekcheewiin, ghanyea miih goong'eawi girgweageeda appadahuukka nyaawa aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida.
61002012	Nea suuh, gawuurji diyeanga manda fughareenga, diyeanga nal haleanjeessean, ghayi sijiilsa gideaba gajeang ng'waay ak genuus, ang'eawi haleanjeeda mwanala, ak gajealas uhuuda aba nyariida sea saawa,
61002013	ak gwasawana aba gidiinyeanda aba gidinyeanda nyaawa. Ak ghwanung' ghoaw miyeenooda leeshooda askwearda. Asi gwandeawa washta ea agitta badayda, gwaleeshi nea gwareengani geat, aba jeeda ghweelmeeda nyaawa bea leeshooda sea agooga.
61002014	gheanyanga nyaawa ghwannyiit hiseadayeandumeeda, ak ea malang'uutta aba ring'eeda. Iissa gwareengani jeesinga ng'arng'ari. Ak gwandeawa gurooruunatka sinnaal shidoodeaba ghaang'. Diibiga sumwaashta!
61002015	Gwanung'usa heeda naweeda doabiiwaat, ak gwarooda; ak ghwaat naweeda Balaamu was balleanda Beori, ghayi bwariiy nyasooda gidageattinda muy aba naweeda mwadoabiiwa,
61002016	ak niny geewoowsa aba giidiinyeandaannyi; digeeda manda ghuutta baloolda siida ak ghoadeal geeska sibaneeda.
61002017	Fiisu gawuurji gheanyanga eenda manda beega, ak gawuurji gichcha dung'usta ghuutta jeameeda, ak giibinda nyaawa ea siyiin heeda misana muuchchi.
61002018	Aba gideaba iissa gwargu ng'asheega hees bea ghwarjeeda, aba haleanjeeda gasa saseeda aba munyinda iissa gwareengani buuneeda mang'awa heeda fuga abiida jeeda ramaseanda.
61002019	inyeesa gwaheelleesa sea buuneeda gideaba gay ghwanyas giibaldeaba geat, nea ghana saawa ea ging'ng'oonyanga sina ng'asheega munyas gil; aba gideaba gidajoar siida, abeeda gayghoaw ging'ng'oonyaneedeaba gidida.
61002020	Aba gideaba, fukka iniibuut ririnnyeanda muunda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba ninal N'guttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo, iighas gichcha ng'asheega ak geajoar, abeeda huydeanda eaweega nyaawa gaygamunyiit ea ghwanaawa diitta bea madeedean.
61002021	Aba gideaba ghang'wana gwachi ea mwanala naweetta doabiiwaatiin mwasamwa gideaba ghwanal ak iiduw ghwanung'wa heeda diigheandida ghaydit siitawiin sawaan.
61002022	Ak saawa gawuurji sea ng'asheanda surukuta aba ghwasiildeanga ghayi bea huumwa, bea gideaba, “Gudeeda nibiiksa geeseegaaschi, ak nuut gichcha geeyeeshsha, ukkurmeeda sihhuun nibiikta goobeerbeershi aba jeeda sheang'ng'weeda.”
61003001	Niih ghamneawa barawajeandeaba iyyeenya gil eang'oorneegwean oorjooga abwariinyi, nea aba jeedeaba suuh duwaawiin ea neapkeanneegwa ak gagatkat fughareengeagwa miyaas;
61003002	ak ghoopkaachi ng'asheega ghayi rugu sibanga ghaydidi ea diigheandida bea Ng'uttamiida ea lealnoochcheanda aba naweeda giijasoodigeagwa.
61003003	Gidamadeeda geagasayi anala ng'asheanji bea gideaba damanda huydean gay ghapka fuga bwariiy shikkooda nea gay gwashikkeegwa, nea ghwaat geeshta gidagasa sasanuukka nyaawa
61003004	nea gwayi, “Gwandeanu gissiheelleatta ghayi bea hinnoadaannyi? Aba gideaba ghang'eada damandida iimeewa gheambaghwaanigaasa, goobiideatta haleanjeessean gideawoojusu ghang'eada deaghayi subwada ng'eanyiida.”
61003005	Nea iissa gafool mwadaagha ng'asheanji bea huumwaan bea gideaba aba ng'asheanda Aseetta, ghayi geesin humng'eeda, ak gwardu ng'eanyiida aba jeeda beega aba naweeda beega,
61003006	nea abada ng'eanyiida ghayi mida geanung' ghwaak beega ak goosha.
61003007	Nea aba ng'asheandida ea sunung' ghoamuughu humng'eeda ghamneawa mida ea ng'eanyiida beasta, geattiiw ea ghwahitta eaweeda girgweaksiinda ea dea nyariida fuga munyas.
61003008	Asi adofoolli ng'asheanji assagi bea huumwaan, oorjoogeasu abwariinyi, bea gideaba aba heeda Ng'uttamiida eaweechchanjagi gawuurji sea gweannyeew sagalama, nea gweannyeew sagalama gawuurji eaweechchanjagi.
61003009	Asi Ng'uttamiida miih lambeech aba heelleesiindaannyi gawuurji girarda mwaatkwa gideaba alambeech, niny iissa ghamilightaneagwa, nea magassa gideaba gayghwaroat siih, niny gagasa gideaba gayghwanyas sean dukkunooda.
61003010	Nea eaweeda Ng'uttamiida gay ghwahitaayda mareanghweanda, aba eaweettida gay ghwaroat humng'eeda aba nyeashta haw, nea haleanjeeda sean ghayi bea mwadi gayghwanyar aba jeeda beasta, nea ng'eanyiida ea gadiyoojigaaschi mideawa gajeaghwarda goosha.
61003011	Hean iinukwa gajeattaarda haleanjeessean, gammiisa gideaba gajawosa fuga uurjiin aba jeeda eaweega ea ghaydidanda ea munyinda,
61003012	ng'atta ghoammuughu nea ghoanung' ghwalamwajaan hinnooda askwearjeanda Aseetta, aba gideaba humng'eeda gajeayyeat ak geenyarja, ak haleanjeeda gayghwanyar aba beasta!
61003013	Nea aba heelleedaannyi geammuughu humng'eedeesh ea ng'eanyiideesh mida jeeda doabiiwnatta.
61003014	Asi, oorjooga abwariinyi, iinukkwa ghoammuughu ng'asheesu, ommajeega ghwahidu niny nea manda badahuukkeagwa gidamuy ghana eerukuna badahuukkeagwa gidamuy, geaghus weayda.
61003015	Ak agooga ghwaanali gideaba gidamilighteayda Ng'uttamiideanya gay gwasmaneegwa lealeanooda, ak eara oorjeeda giyeanya subwariiy was Baulo gang'oorneegwa aba weaghuumeetta siitaw ninyiin,
61003016	hean nea gabaloola ng'asheesu gawuurji gissinda aba jeeda barawajeagaaschi sean. Gwanda haleanjeeda hang'oonyi aba jeannyaawa jea eanal, nea dea dasha ea dea moapta ng'eanyi iissa ghwayam ghoaw nyariida, gawuurji gidanyaashta ng'ooruutka suuk.
61003017	Asi fugeasu aabwariinyi, iyoobean anala ng'asheesu ammwadi, asi afrageat, adaghwaadaneegwa ghaat giidiinyeannyeekkeaba fiisu, ak ghoanung'wi heeda giibindeang'wa majeek.
61003018	Ahissiina heeda aba dagheerjeanduumeeda, ea nalooda Ng'uttamiideanya ea lealnoochcheanda was Yeesu Gristo. Headaannyi gwanda gharbeeda ghamneawa ea ghoaw eaweega manda muudeanooda. Amin.
62001001	Gitta ghayi ng'eat ammwadi ghayi siyiinyi, akkeadaayi aba gheanyangaasa, ak geedaayi nea geang'ng'waanyi aba geattingaasaan, was ng'asheanda eaweegean,
62001002	nea eaweega geanung' ghwadaajiit, akkeadaayi, ak geemuuwwu, ak geerukuneegwa eaweega manda mudeanooda mida heeda Bwaabwa ak geanung' ghwadaajiit aba heedeanya,
62001003	gitta ghayi sidaayi ak geayiinyiin geerukuneegwa earagooga ak abeeda geebareannyi sea aseasa; nea bareannyeedeanya gwanda heeda Bwaabwa ea heeda Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo.
62001004	Ak geeng'oorneegwa ng'asheesu ak abeeda ghwahit hooseaneegaasa.
62001005	Niih ng'asheanda ghayi siyiing'si headaannyi gil ak geerukuneegwa, gideaba Aseetta weeshinda gil ak jeadaannyi ea manda misaneeda earahay.
62001006	Isiyeennyi geebareannyeewi niny nea geneayeewi jeeda misaneeda, geanapchi ng'uyyeega nea meeppiidani naweeda humeanda;
62001007	nea isineayeewi jeeda weeshinda, gawuurji gidamideatta niny jeeda weeshinda abeeda easibareannyi aseasa, ak foojeanda Yeesuuyda was Balleandaannyi gaygoohuun ring'eegaasa sean.
62001008	Isiyeeshshi geat meendeawani ring'eeda, gereenganayi geat, nea ea manda humeanda jeedeanya.
62001009	Nea isidukkuni ring'eagaasa, niny awaam nea doabiiwaat, ak gaygwasamsa ring'eagaasa, ak gohuuneasa aba haleanjeessean mwadoabiiwa.
62001010	Isiyeshshi geat miyesna ring'eeda, geanung' gaba niny ng'uyya, nea ng'asheandaannyi ea manda jeedeanya.
62002001	Diibigeasu manang'i, geang'ooneegwa ng'asheesu ak abeeda ea moosni riing'eeda; ama mida siida nisin riing'eeda, abeeda gendeawi siida ghuutteanya aba heeda Bwaabwa nea Yeesu Gristoyda doabiiwaat gil;
62002002	nea niny ea siida jea ghoadayda leadeeda riing'eagaasa, ak ea meakghusa gaasa akghwahit eara riing'eega muunda ng'eanyiissean.
62002003	Appdaydeaba niih abeeda geanalli gideaba geanalli niny, ising'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaaschi.
62002004	Nea dea eena, “Ghaanalli ning” nea gafool digheannyeekkaaschi gabang'uyya, ak eara humeanda eamanda jeadaannyi;
62002005	nea siida ang'ng'waay ng'asheandaannyi, aba jeedeaba niny bariinyeega huumwa bea Aseetta nideay. Aba jeedeaba niih geanalli gideaba geendi jeadaannyi:
62002006	siida eena gwanda jeedeaba niny gammiisa gideaba gayghabeada gidabeada niny.
62002007	Fuga abwariinnyi, meang'oorneegwa digheandeesh, niih digheanda ghayi bea garayi ghayi oayiinyi ammwadiin gil; digheandeaba waas ng'asheanda ghayi oayiinyi.
62002008	Ak geang'oorneey digheandeesh bea huumwa aba jeadaannyi ea jeedeang'wa, aba gideaba misaneeda ning'atta ak ea niiboong'u weeshinda huumwa.
62002009	Siida eena geandi jeeda weeshinda, nea ghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat gwanda jeeda misaneeda eara ghamneawa.
62002010	Nea siida bwariiy oorjeeda ghaamwat, siisi gwanda jeeda weeshinda, nea aba jeadaannyi eamanda ng'asheanda jeagweadu russooda.
62002011	Nea siida sit oorjeeda ghaamwat gwanda jeeda misaneeda ak gwaneayeewa jeeda misaneeda ak ea mwanala heeda gal, aba gideaba nidukuta gheanyangaaschi misaneeda.
62002012	Geang'oorneegwa agooga, diibiga manang'i, aba gideaba sisamsa riing'eegeagwa, appadaydaannyi.
62002013	Geang'oorneegwa agoogaa, ghweaniga, aba gideaba nonalli ninnyeeda ghayi bean ghang'eada ging'eetta. Geang'oorneegwa agooga, gheareemanga, aba gideaba noajoarji diitta muyiin. Geang'oorneegwa agooga, diibiga aba gideaba nonalli Ghweanda.
62002014	Neang'oorneegwa agooga ghweaniga, aba gideaba nonalli ninnyeeda ghayi bean ghang'eada ging'eetta. Neang'oorneegwa agooga gheareemanga, aba gideaba gondeawi uurda, nea goobiida ng'asheanda Aseetta jeedeang'wa, ak ea noattaraamnyi diitta muyiin.
62002015	Adoabwariinyi ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeeda mida muunda ng'eanyiida. Aba gideaba siida bwariiy ng'eanyiida, bariinyeekka bea Ghweandeen ea maygwanda jeadaannyi.
62002016	Aba gideaba haleanjeessean mida muunda ng'eanyiida, was haleanjeeda gasa saseeda ea haleanjeeda gasa gheanyanga ea ghwarjeeda eaweega, suuh maleapna heeda Ghweanda, gwaleabu heeda ng'eanyiida.
62002017	Ak ng'eanyiida gayghang'atta sea ng'asheagaaschi bea geawunda gheang'da; nea deasina gidagassiida Aseetta gaygoobiida ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda.
62002018	Diibiga, niih damanda huydeani; gawuurji gidaghayi oayiing'di bea gideaba gayghwahidu weajoochcheanda Gristo, ak eara ghamneawa ea goolla ghapka gea saang'a was weajoodiga Gristo; hean ghoaw gidasinali gideaba damanda huydeani.
62002019	Nea saawa ghabeawa heedeanya, ak ea maba meatkweedeanya; aba gideaba inyeeda gaba meatkweedeanya, gwachchi gaygoobiida heedeanya; hean ghang'eatng'eat gwaritta jarooda, ak ghwadaajiit gideaba maba sean meatkweedeanya.
62002020	Ak agooga ea nimwareagwa dea ghaydit, ak ghoanalli oagasean.
62002021	Geang'oorneegwa nea meakna gideaba moanali humeanda gil, gweagu gideaba ghoanalli, ak ginali gideaba manda ng'uyyeega jea gwaleabu jeeda huumeanda.
62002022	Gaba ng'eaha ng'uyya geaghus dea shaang' gideaba Yeesu miih Gristo gil. Niih weajoochcheanda Gristohi, dea shaang' Bwaabwa ea Balleanda.
62002023	Manda siida jea ghwashaang' Balleanda akkwandeawa Ghweanda. Dea mwas Balleanda gwandeawa eara Ghweanda.
62002024	Anung'waada ng'asheega ghayi oayiinyi ammwadi goobiida jeesingeagwa. Asi iyabiida jeesingeagwa ng'asheega ghayi oayiinyi ammwadi, abeeda gajooppiidana jeeda Balleanda ea jeeda Ghweanda.
62002025	Nea niih ea heelleeda ghayi rukuneasa gil, nea ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
62002026	Geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu appadayda fukka gasa gwareenganneegwean;
62002027	nea gimearda ghayi oanyaschi aba headaannyiin gwanda jeesingeagwa, ak ghanyea moogassi ghoanaleagwa sih; aba gideaba gimeardida ghoanaaleagwa haleanjeessean, ak ea huumwa, ak ea manda ng'uyyeega, gawuurji gidaghayi anaaldaneegwa, oppiidana jeadaannyi.
62002028	Asi ghamneawa diibiga manang'i, oppiidana jeadaannyi, aba gideaba ihidu abeeda geaghuschi ak ea meebiiktani bwadaw aba baspaseega aba hinnoadaannyi.
62002029	Iyoanalli gideaba niny ea doabiiwaat, abeeda ghoanalli gideaba siida sina ng'asheega doobiiweadi gwajiilu niny.
62003001	Ang'ulla niih bariinyeega uurjiin gil gooneasa Ghweanda, bea gideaba egureewaneasa diibiga Aseetta, ak ea gidasuwuurjeewi gil. Ak abeeda ghoaw gidamwanalaneasa ng'eanyiida ak ea mwanala niny.
62003002	Oorjooga abwariinnyi, asi ghamneawa suwoschi diibiga Aseetta; ak ea miighwadaajiit gichchea ewuurjeewana, ak geanalli gideaba ihidu gajeewuurjeewana niny, aba gideaba gajeadaaha giduurji.
62003003	Nea giliwas siih rar niny iissa ghoammiidu geaw gawuurji gidamiyda niny.
62003004	Siida wassean sina riing'eeda gwandeawa ramaseanda aba deaweeda; aba gideaba riing'eeda ramaseanda deaweeda gil.
62003005	Nea ghoanalli gideaba niny ghwaan gageanda riing'eega, nea niny jeadaannyi ea manda riing'eeda.
62003006	Manda siida mida jeadaannyi ak gwasin riing'eeda; ak ea manda siida sina riing'eeda jea ea nidaah niny ghana ghwanal niny.
62003007	Diibiga manang'i, adagwareenganneegwa siih; siida sina ng'asheega doobiiweadi gwandeawa doobiiwnatta, gawuurji gidamideayeatta doobiiwnatta.
62003008	Siida sina riing'eeda gaba meang'nyeandeenda; aba gideaba meang'nyeandeenda ghayi gollagabean gwasna riing'eeda. Gissibaysiina wunooda Balleanda Aseetta geattaajiit ghwadattas gadiyeeda meang'nyeandeenda.
62003009	Manda siida jiilu Aseetta ak gwasna riing'eeda; aba gideaba seareeda Aseetta gwanda jeadaannyi, ak ea maygwasin riing'eeda aba gideaba gwajiilu Aseetta.
62003010	Aba niih abeeda gajeadaah gideaba diibiga Aseetta akkeega gil, ak ea akkeega gil diibiga meang'nyeandeenda, aba gideaba dea masinna ng'asheega doobiiweadi maba Aseetta, ghana dea mwabwariinya oorjeeda ghaamwat.
62003011	Aba gideaba niih giijasta ghayi oobean ayiinya ammwadi gil, gideaba abwariinnya geat,
62003012	ak ea adoowuurjeewi Gain ghayi was siida muy ak gwanuus oorjeeda ghaamwat. Ak ghwasaan inyas gwanuus? Gweagu sinaweagaaschi munyas nea oorjeeda ghaamwat ea doabiiwaat.
62003013	Oorjoogiyya, adaghahameagwa ng'eanyi, aba gideaba ghwasteagwa ng'eanyiida.
62003014	Aseasa geanalli gideaba sisuuchchi miyeeda ak geeweayi jeeda eaweega, aba gideaba geabwariinyi fuga suduupcheewi. Nea damwabwariinya goobiida jeeda miyeeda.
62003015	Giliwas siih nyooghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat abeeda gwanuusa buuneeda, ak agooga gonalli gideaba siida nuusa buuneeda mandeawana eaweega manda mudeanooda aba jeadaannyi.
62003016	Aba niih sinalli bariinyeega, aba gideaba niny gabeagu eaweagaaschi appadahuukkaasa; asi gammiiseasa earaseasa eebeakna eaweagaasa appadahuukka oorjoogiyya.
62003017	Nea siida iimideawa haleanjeeda ng'eanyiida ak ghwadaah oorjeeda ghaamwat nea gwanda gidagasa, ak ghaweada gida aba jeadaannyi, abeeda bariinyeega Aseetta gwandeattaan jeadaannyi?
62003018	Diibiga manang'i, adeabwariinyi aba gadiyeeda ghana baloolda gagasa eabwariinya aba sinooda ea huumeanda.
62003019	Aba niih gajeanala gideaba geebeayi huumeanda, ak geesikteawi aba jeesingaasa aba madeadaannyi
62003020	iyargweakseasa jeesingaasa; aba gideaba Aseetta ahaweawa jeesingaasa, ak ghwanal haleanjeessean.
62003021	Fuga abwariinnyi, iimeargweakseasa guroruunatkaasa, abeeda gendeawi gissirarji aba madeeda Aseetta;
62003022	ak iissa geenyaschi gidasumuschi, aba gideaba geang'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaaschi nea geesinnyi gidabwariiy niny.
62003023	Nea niih ea digheandaannyi gil, gideaba ea mwasa gheawunga Balleandaannyi wa Yeesu Gristo nea geebariinyayi geat, gawuurji gidagoondaneasa.
62003024	Buuneessean ang'ng'waay digheannyeakkaaschi goobiitta jeadaannyi, nea goobiida niny jeannyaawa. Aba sareani abeeda geanalli gideaba goobiida jeedeanya, aba Gurorooda ghayi goaneasa.
62004001	Fuga abwariinnyi, adoamwaschi giliwas gurorooda, iissa ghoo nyooh asma guroruunatsu ak ghoadaayi ea gaba Aseetta; aba gideaba nihidu jeeda ng'eanyiida sibanga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega.
62004002	Aba niih abeeda gajanala Gurorooda Aseetta: gurorooda mwas gideaba Yeesu Gristo nuwu nea ghwaana saseeda gaba Aseetta,
62004003	nea gurorooda wassean mwamwasa Yeesu maba Aseetta. Niih gurorooda daheawa Gristohi, was deaghayi oayiinyi gideaba gayghwahidu, ak ghamneawa ea nigeawiit ghwahidu jeeda ng'eanyiida.
62004004	Diibiga manang'i, agooga goobeayi Aseetta, ak ea noajoarji saawa; aba gideaba dea mida jeedeang'wa ahaweawa dea mida jeeda ng'eanyiida.
62004005	Suuh gaba ng'eanyiida, ak gabaloola ng'asheega ng'eanyiida, ak goleeysiit ng'eanyiida saawa.
62004006	Aseasa geebeayi Aseetta. Siida nal Aseetta gaygoleeyseasa iit, nea deamaba Aseetta ea maygoleeyseasa iit. Ak aba seareani gajeanala gurorooda huumwa ea gurorooda ramaseanda.
62004007	Ooroogeasu abwariinnyi, ebariinnya geat aba gideaba bariinyeega gwaleabu heeda Aseetta, ak giliwas siih mideawa bariinyeega gwajiilu Aseetta, ak ghwanal Aseetta.
62004008	Nea siida mandeawana bariinyeega ea miighwanal Aseetta aba gideaba Aseetta bariinyeega gil.
62004009	Aba seareani bariinyeega Aseetta geattajiit aba jeedeanya, gideaba Aseetta goojeagu Balleandaannyi was haghasheeda badayda ng'eanyiida, ak abeeda geanyaschi eaweega appadaydaannyi.
62004010	Nea niih ea bariinyeega, miih gideaba geabwariinyi aseesa Aseetta ghabwariinyeasa niny ak goojeagu Balleandaannyi ghoaw dea adayda leadeeda riing'eegaasa.
62004011	Fugaabwariinnyi, iinukkwa ghabwariiyduneasa Aseetta, gammiisa gideaba gajeebariinya geat.
62004012	Manda siida nidaah Aseetta; isibariinyayi geat, abeeda Aseetta goobiida jeedeanya, ak bariinyeagaaschi ea niihit aba jeedeanya.
62004013	Aba seareani geanalli gideaba geeppiidi jeadaannyi, ak eara niny gwanda jeedeanya, aba gideaba nugoaneasa Guroroadaannyi.
62004014	Ak aseasa asidaayi nea simuuwu gideaba Bwaabwa nijeagu Balleandaannyi ghoaw lealnoochcheanda ng'eanyiida.
62004015	Giliwas siih mwas gideaba Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta gil, abeeda Aseetta goobiida jeadaannyi nea goobiida niny jeeda Aseetta.
62004016	Aseasa geanalli ak geamwaschi Aseetta appadahuukkaasa. Aseetta bariinyeega gil, ak siida abiida jeeda bariinyeega, goobiida jeeda Aseetta, ak goobiida Aseetta jeadaannyi.
62004017	Aba jeedeaba bariinyeesu sihhiit aba heedeanya, ak geamwaschi aba eaweeda girgweaksiinda, aba gideaba giduurjeatta niny ea gissuwuurjeatti gil aba badaydeaba ng'eanyiini.
62004018	Aba jeeda bariinyeega manda muuwda, ak bariinyeega huumwa gaygageanda muuwda. Aba gideaba muuwda gwandeawa ghoorjooda, ak siida mideawa muuwda ea miih hidaat aba bariinyeega.
62004019	Aseasa geabwariinyi, aba gideaba goosheeda niny ghabwariinyeasa.
62004020	Siida iyayi, “Ghabwariinnyi Aseetta,” nea ghwasit oorjeeda ghaamwat, abeeda siisi gabang'uyya; aba gideaba siida mwabwariinya oorjeeda ghaamwat nidaa, moammu ghabwariiy Aseetta miighwadaah.
62004021	Ak digheanji gagooneasa niny gideaba siida bwariiy Aseetta, dabwariinya eara oorjeeda ghaamwat.
62005001	Siida wassean mwas gideaba Yeesu niny Gristo gil siisi jeepta Aseetta, siida wassean bwariiy ghwaan ea ghaamwat ghabwariiy jeepta.
62005002	Aba seareani geanalli gideaba geabwariinyi diibiga Aseetta, isubwariinyi Aseetta nea geang'ng'waanyi digheannyeekkaschi.
62005003	Aba gideaba niih bariinyeega Aseetta, nea gideaba geesissi mureeda digheannyeakkaaschi. Nea digheannyeakkaaschi ea miidurumani.
62005004	Aba gideaba gissijiila Aseetta iissa ghwajoar ng'eanyiida; nea niih ea jooriischchooda joar ng'eanyiida gil, nea masaweagaasa.
62005005	Anneeda dea joar ng'eanyiida geaghus iimii dea was gideaba Yeesu Balleanda Aseetta?
62005006	Niih deaghayi wuna beega gil ea foojeanda, Yeesu Gristo, ak ea meakghusa beega akghwahit ghoana beega ea foojeanda.
62005007	Ak Gurorooda ea deamuuwwu gil, aba gideaba Gurorooda huumeanda gil.
62005008	Gwanda mushoodi samwagu, Gurorooda gil, ea beega ea foojeanda; assuuh assamwaguun ghamwas geat.
62005009	Iisumwaschi muuwwuunoona buuneeda, abeeda muuwwuunoona Aseetta aahaw muuchchi; aba gideaba niih muuwwuunoona Aseetta gil gideaba nimuwwu iitta Balleandaannyi.
62005010	Siida mwas Balleanda Aseetta gwandeawa muuwwuunoadaannyi aba jeadaannyi. Nea deamwamwasa Aseetta ghwanung' gaba ng'uyya, aba gideaba mwamwasa muuwwuunoona Aseetta appadayda Balleandaannyi.
62005011	Ak nea niih ea muuwwuunooda gil, bea gideaba, Aseetta gagoaneasa eaweega manda mudeanooda, ak eaweesu gwanda jeeda Balleandaannyi.
62005012	Siida mideawa Balleanda gwandeawa eaweega; nea dea mandeawana Balleanda Aseetta ea mandeawana eaweega.
62005013	Geang'oorneegwa ng'asheesu agoogeeni mwas gheawunga Balleanda Aseettean, ak abeeda ghoanalli gideaba goondeawi eaweega manda mudeanooda.
62005014	Anniih ea gidaararji gil aba headaannyi, gideaba iisumuschi gil aba gidagassiida niny gayghwayiinyeasa.
62005015	Ak isinalli gideaba gayghwayiinyeasa aba giliwas sean sumwaashchi, geanalli gideaba gajeanyasa haleanjeetta sigasayiin.
62005016	Siida wassean idaa oorjeeda ghaamwat nea gwasin riing'eeda maba miyeeda, abeeda damwaasha ghawooda, ak gayghoadaw Aseetta eaweega appadahuukkeaba suuh sina riing'eega maba miyeedean. Gwanda riing'eeda was dea miyeeda; meayeeni gayghamwaash Aseetta appadaydeaba niih.
62005017	Gidawassean mwadoabiiwa riing'eeda gil, ak gwanda riing'eeda mawosa dea miyeeda.
62005018	Geanalli gideaba giliwas Balleanda Aseetta maygwasin riing'eeda, ak Balleanda Aseetta gaygafurgeaw, ak eara diitta muyiin ea mayghwasat.
62005019	Aseasa geanalli gideaba geebeayi Aseetta, ak ng'eanyiissean goombal diitta muyiin.
62005020	Ak aseasa geanalli gideaba Balleanda Aseetta goolla ghwahidu, ak gagoaneasa fughareeda eanala ninnyeeda was huumwa; ak aseasa geendi jeadaannyi ninnyeeda was huumwa, aba jeeda Balleandaannyi was Yeesu Gristo. Niih dea was Aseetta huumwa gil, ea eaweega manda mudeanooda.
62005021	Diibiga manang'i, afrageat aba duguuga sinung' ghoaw aseechcheekka.
63001001	Gweargweeda, ea gheamatta siloat sea diibigaaschi, abwariinyi aba huumwa, ea meaghusaan aniini eara fuga sean nal huumeanda,
63001002	appadaydeaba huumeanji mida jeedeanyean, gaygoobiida jeedeanya damanda manda mudeanooda:
63001003	Dagheerjeandumeeda, ea baydeada, ea hoyyooh gajeendeawana, nea gaygwaleabu heeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ea heeda Yeesu Gristoyda was Balleanda Ghweanda, aba huumeanda ea bariinyeega.
63001004	Geahoosannyi muuchchi iyadaayi diibigaagu mwaatkwa nea ghwaat naweeda huumeanda gawuurji gidaghayi goondaneasa Ghweanda.
63001005	Ak ghamneawa, geamuscheey gheamatta, miih gideaba geang'oorneey digheanda eesh gil, digheanji deaghayi sibean endeawana ammwadiin gil, bea gideaba ebariinnya geadi.
63001006	Ak bariinyeega ea nihi, gideaba eweaya nea geayaachchi geeshta digheannyeekkaaschi; ak niih ea digheanda, gawuurji gidaghayi oayiing'di ammwadi gideaba oppiidana jeeda bariinyeega.
63001007	Aba gideaba nirinna badayda ng'eanyiida fuga saang'a bea ng'uyyeega, gea mwamwasa gideaba Yeesu Gristo ghwahittayda siida; anni ea diitta bea ng'uyyeegeani, ak ea dea mwamwasa Gristo gil.
63001008	Ang'ulla sasanuukkeagwa, adoohutteawayi geanoosinnyi, ak ghoanyaschi gimearda hidaat.
63001009	Siida wassean weah mwadi nea moang'ng'waanya ginealshooda Gristo mandeawana Aseetta; dea abiida jeeda ginealshooda gwandeawa sean Bwaabwa ea Balleanda.
63001010	Siida ihidu heedeang'wa nea meanna ginealshooni, abeeda ea adideapti aba gheang'u nea adiigeachcheewi;
63001011	aba gideaba siida ageachchi siisi gabareannyi gadiyoojigaaschi munyas.
63001012	Earagwasa geandeawi ng'asheega saang'a eagasayi dang'oorneey, ghang'wana ea mwang'waari aba galaamu ea gardaasajeanda, ghaararji gideaba gaydoan dadaanyi ak geabaloolleey nea geeng'ulayi geat, ak abeeda gamajeegiit hooseaneagaasa.
63001013	Gagoonyi seayooda diibiga huda geamadu siloat.
64001001	Gweargweeda, heeda Gaayooyda abwariinyi, eabiissi dabwariiy aba huumwa.
64001002	Siida abwariinyi, ghamwaashchi Aseetta gideaba ghwadoabiiw ng'asheegaagu sean ak guwosi majeek; ak ghaanalli gideaba guroroadaang'u eamajeek.
64001003	Ak geahoosannyi muuchchi iihidu fuga eaduupcheewi mwaatkwa ak gamuuwwu masaweagaagu bea huumwa aba jeeda eaweagaagu, ak ea huumwa gil giyaadi geeshta huumeanda.
64001004	Ea meandeawani hooseaneega haw ng'al niih, gideaba ghayiinyi gideaba diibigeasu ghwaat geeshta huumeanda.
64001005	Siida abwariinyi, niih gisni ng'asheanda doabiiw gideaba gisissi oorjookkiyeang'wa gadiyeeda, raanya gea was rabasta,
64001006	was fuga muuwwu bariinyeagaagu aba madeeda ganiisa. Gajadoabiiwa iinung' gaweay bareannyeekka haguuw gadiyeeda Aseetta.
64001007	Aba gideaba saawa gaweay appadaydaannyi ak ea moang'ng'waanya gil aba heeda fuga emoojiga.
64001008	Asi gammiiseasa gideaba eadeapta fuga uurji suuh, ak geawoschi fukkadiyeeda bea huumwa.
64001009	Gwanda ng'asheega neang'oorsi fuga Ganiisa; nea Diotrefesta, bwariiy gawa mwadiin mwamwasa gheambalmeedeanyu.
64001010	Asi iyaawunnyi, gaydeadu iitta gissin, aba gideaba iissa goojuur nea gwarukuna badaydeanyu ng'asheega munyas. Ea mabeachchi suuh, ghaheawa niny ghwadeapta fuga eaduupcheewi, ak ghoaghuum eara fukka gasa ghwadeapta saawaan ak gooruutteawa jeeda ganiisa.
64001011	Fugabwariinyi, adoogali sinooda ng'asheega munyas, anala geaw alooheeda. Siida sina alooheeda siisi gaba Aseetta; ak dea sina ng'asheega munyas ea miih ghwadaah Aseetta.
64001012	Demetrio nimuuwwu fuga saang'a ng'asheega badaydaannyi, ak eara huumeanda gamuuwwu; ak earaniini geamuuwwu, ak ginali gideaba muuwwuunoodeanyu huumwa gil.
64001013	Gwachchi geandeawi ng'asheega saang'a jea dang'oorneey, ak ea meagassi dang'waar aba galaamu ea wiino;
64001014	ak ghaararji gideaba gaydabay dadaanyi, ak abeeda gajeebaloola nea geeng'ulayi geat.
64001015	Beaha hoyyooh. Ghoaghannyi fuga siroroochcheewi. Aghada fuga siroroochcheewi, ea giliwas siih bea saawa.
65001001	Yuuda, soomjeanda Yeesu Gristo was oorjeeda geennyea Yakkobo, Heeda fuga suguursa, abwariinyi aba jeeda Aseetta was Bwaabwa ak geettiiwsa Yeesu Gristo:
65001002	Gagasa elakkuneegwa baydeayda, ea hoyyooh, nea gegooneegwa bariinyeega.
65001003	Fuga abwariinyi, geagasayi muuchchi dang'oorneegwa iitta lealeanoodeanya bea geallaan, ak ghadaayi ghwahit gideaba geang'oorneegwa nea geamuscheegwa ak geeng'allealleesi masaweega ghayi sugu nibwagi ak ea majeebiikta siittaw fuga ghaydidi.
65001004	Aba gideaba gheatta ninyas fuga mwaatkwa gaseadayyi aba makcheameeda ghang'eada garayi ak geegwalu aba girgweaksiinda, fuga maba aseetta hutteawi dagheerjeandumeeda Aseetteanya ak ghoabuutta jeeda hiseadayeandumeeda nea ghwashaang' Siideanya haw assakkalealla was Ng'uttamiida, Yeesu Gristo.
65001005	Asi ghamneawa geagaasayi deapkeaneegwa, earappeadi siirukuneegwa muuchchi nibwagi ak ea maygudeebiikta, gideaba dea ghayi lealna buuneeda jeeda ng'eanyiida Misri, imuchchu ghwalas uhuudeaba fukka mwamwasaan.
65001006	Nea malaykajeega mang'ulla muuchchi hoorgajeega nyaawa ak ghang'amwa heeda eajusu abiitta ea nirattiisa niny jeeda munyaloalajeega maygammuudean aba jeeda misaneeda ea ghwahitta eaweetta haw bea girgweaksiindean;
65001007	gawuurji Sodooma ea Gomoora ea mujiinajeega neekkeewa, fukka abeeda gwasna ng'asheega munyas gawuurji gidaghayi sin fukka nea geayaat geeshta ng'asheega saseeda nea geegala ak ghwanyas girgweaksiinda beasta manda muudeanooda.
65001008	Ak eara fiisu aba jeeda girgweatka nyaawa ghang'uda saseenuuka nyaawa ririnyeanda, ak ghaheawa gheambalmeeda ak geeng'ng'eawi haleanjeeda gheambiideadi.
65001009	Nea Mikkaeleeda was malaykajeanda haw, gang'alealii sea meang'nyeandeenda, nea gwasheang'nyeesa saseeda Muusa, miih gabadaksa rukunooda ging'weakka appadayda girgweageeda mida badaydaannyi, geaghus gideaba gwayeeshsha, “Gagasa goowoowseey Ng'uttamiida.”
65001010	Nea fiisu goong'eawi haleanjeeda mwanala, nea aba haleanjeetta nal amwadiin iissa gwasin gawuurji diyeanga manda fughareenga, gajealas uhuuda.
65001011	Dashageeda saawa! Aba gideaba ghwaat geeshta naweeda Gaini, ak ghwanung'waada geat ghwanyas ng'asheega munyas bea Balaamu, ak goosha aba gidaghayi heawatta Goora.
65001012	Suuh geeyeatta ghuussi aba ghweelmajeegeagwa, aba damanda leeshoodeang'wa iyoabwachchi geat, nea iissa goong'ulayi geat; shamooghuutka manda beega, nea iissa ghwaat jeammeeda; geediga manda haghweega doomeelda shing'da, nimeewa deabiyyeenya, ak gealoatta;
65001013	laweajajeega hees bea basooda, jakkiisa humng'eeda furghooda aba baspaseega nyaawa; miinga neayi nea heeda hiing'aada gwanda misaneeda haw sittiiw ea ghwahitta damanda manda muudeanooda.
65001014	Appadaydeaba suuh Enokki aba seaygeedeaba ispwa ng'eada Adamu gayghwaramoaran, nea gwayi, “Ng'ulla, Ng'uttamiida ghwaan nea goodeana malaykajeagaaschi meammu eyiida, gwanuuseada aba girgweaksiinda,
65001015	ak goorgweaksa buuneessean, ak ghoadaw gidinyeanda buuneessean meawalla Aseetta, aba searoojiga nyaawa sean maba Aseetta ghayi nisin aba gitta magassiida Aseettean, ea aba haleanjeeda ng'weani rukku siida ring'eeda meawalla Aseetta appadaydaannyi”.
65001016	Fiisu inyeessa ghoaniikgh, fuga mideawa sichcheeda, inyeessa ghwaat geeshta ng'asheega nyaawa gasa, fuga hees ghuussi gwara geat, reengani buuneeda ak ghwanyas gheatta gidagasa.
65001017	Asi agooga fugeasu abwariinyi, oapkaada, ng'asheega ghayi bay gwargu giijasoodiga Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo;
65001018	nea gwayeeshshiineegwa, “Eaweeda huydean gaygwanda fuga inyeessa jea gwajuuga buuneeda, nea ghwaat geeshta gassooda ng'asheega nyaawa meawwalleawana Aseetta”.
65001019	Suuh fuga inyeessa ghwanung' ghwaan dardeayda gil, fuga ng'eanyiida, mandeawana Gurorooda.
65001020	Nea agooga, fuga abwariinyi, amajeegiitta appadayda masaweegeagwa ghaydidi muuchchi; nea ghoamwaashchi Aseetta aba Gurorooda Ghaydit;
65001021	afrageat aba jeeda bariinyeega Aseetta; nea ghoammughu baydeayda Ng'uttamiideanya was Yeesu Gristo, ea ghwahitta eaweega manda muudeanooda.
65001022	Anung' ghamwas mwaatkwa, gea mideawa machmajeega;
65001023	alealni mwaatkwa, nea ghoassealdaawi jeeda beasta, nea mwaatkwa goobayyiidi aba muuwda, nea ghoasichchi eara hang'da sung'uda ririnyeanda saseeda.
65001024	Asi ghamneawa aba heeda ninnyeeda ammu ghwanung' eamooppeadani ak ghwaadeagwa nea meeyeatteweegwa ghuussi aba madeeda gigheambiittaannyi aba hooseaneega,
65001025	heeda Aseetta bwageaw, lealnoochcheandeanya aba naweeda Yeesu Gristoyda was Ng'uttamiideanya, daba gigheambiitta niny, ea hawunda, ea sugoochcheandumeeda, ea gheambalmeeda, dea ghayi ng'eada garayi, ea ghoaw ghamneawa, ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda. Amin.
66001001	Niih giidaheachta Yeesu Gristo gil, ghayi adaw Aseetta niny gohiimsa soomjoagaaschi ng'asheega jea gabay ghwahidu; ak ghwanung' eanal aba gijeakteayda malaykajeandaannyi gaweesa soomjeandaannyi was Yohaana,
66001002	amaduw gamuuwwu Yohaana iitta ng'asheanda Aseetta ea muwwunooda iitta Yeesu Gristo, ea iitta haleanjeessean ghayi daah.
66001003	Ghang'wana siida assoamwa aba ghuutta haw ng'asheega was ramoorangeasu, ak ghang'wana fukka iiyiin, ea dea ang'ng'waay ng'asheega sung'oorsa jeedean; aba gideaba damanda nineekkiit.
66001004	Yohaana heeda ganiisajeega assispwa mida Asiya: Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda ea hoyyooyda leabu heeda dea mida ea dea bean gwanda dea jea ghwahidu, leabu heeda guroruunat ispwa mida madeeda hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda,
66001005	biissa gwaleabu heeda Yeesu Gristoyda was muushoochcheanda doabiiwaat, was duweachcheeda fuga nimeewa, ak goombal sugoodiga mida ng'eanyiida. Heedeaba ninnyeeda bwariinyeasa ak gottineasa ehelleewana ring'eegaasa aba foojeandaannyi
66001006	ak gagoaneasa sugoochcheandumeeda, ak geahuuyi ashoohoodiga aba heeda Aseettannyi ea Ghweanda, giigheambiitta daannyi ea sugoochcheandumeeda ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda. Amin.
66001007	Ng'ulla, ghwaan nea godeana shamooghuutka, ak gayghwadaah niny giliwas gheang'da, ea giliwas siih ghayi ng'ut niny; ea emoojiga sean bea ng'eanyiida gaygaguuttu heareagaaschi. Asaha. Amin.
66001008	“Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega,” dea madeeda ea dea huuydean, aba ginnyaah Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta, dea mida ea dea bean gwanda ea dea jea ghwahidu, was Aseetta mideawa uurda.
66001009	Aniini geawoschi Yohaana, oorjeeda giyeang'wa deaghayi oppareannyeewi sawanadeeda ea sugoochcheandumeeda ea milikghteayda nea ghoahhangng'waanyi, nea gwanda ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega suguura Batmo appadayda ng'asheanda Aseetta ea muwuunooda ng'asheega Yeesu.
66001010	Muchchu geandi jeeda Gurorooda eaweeda Ng'uttamiida, hean ghayiinyi nyeashta haw appadaydeanya, nyaashta giguuleanda nea gwayi,
66001011	“Ng'oorsiina haleanjeeda idaahi jeeda gittaabu ak giyeassi ganiisajeega assispwa, dea Efeeso ea Smirna ea Bergamo ea Diyattira, ea Sardi ea Filadelfiya ea Laodekkiya.”
66001012	Hean ghayamnyi geaw dadaah nyeashttida abaloolaniin, hean ghaadaayi gheaboonyan ispwa meang'meang'i mida deageaw,
66001013	ak ghaadaayi aba dang'adigeaba hoorgajeegiga siida uurji balleanda siida, nea nishshuup hang'da gulng'eanyi, ak ea nirassa daghattaannyi innyeashta sisna lagheanga meang'meang'i;
66001014	uhuudaannyi ea budeagaaschi ea eashish ea ghawaar gea gisilleanda eesh, ea eashish ea ghawaar gapkeanda; nea gheanyangaaschi ghawaar ng'ushapta beasta,
66001015	ak geeshangaaschi gawuurji gharinnyeanda mur sisiy muuchchi ea gawuurji gilisihhuuna duwayda beasta, nea fuydaannyi ghwanyaashta dea beega saang'a;
66001016	ak ghoang'ng'waanya miin ispwa aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa, ak gwarinna ghuuttaannyi bwangeeda shidaat meadajeega sean, ak gheamamdaannyi gawuurji aseetta dagu muuchchi.
66001017	Iiduw nea ghaadaayi niny, geabeedeasi geshangaaschi ea dawuurji siida nimi. Hean ghwayiin geattidaannyi bea dugwa uhuudeanyu nea gwayi, “Adibeali, Aniini geawoschi dea madeeda ea dea huydean ea dea majeek;
66001018	ghayi ghameayi, ak ging'ulayi geawoschi majeek; ghayi ghaameayi, asi ng'ulla geawoschi majeek damanda manda mudeanooda, ak geandeawi gissiittinna gidaghuutta Miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega.
66001019	Asi ng'waara haleanjeeni idaahiin, ea gea ghamneawa mida, ea gea iiduw jea gabassa iing'atta suuh.
66001020	Makcheameedeaba miingiga as ispwa ideaksi geattindeanyu bea dugean, ea hoorgajeekka as ispwa meang'meang'iin, miingiga as ispwaan, malaykajeega ganisajeekka as ispwaani ak eara hoorgajeekka as ispwa meang'meang'iin ea ganiisajeekka assispwaan gil.
66002001	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Efeeso ng'waara, ‘Ng'asheega ninyeeda mideawa miinga assispwa aba geattindaannyi bea dugwa nea gwaneayeewa dageascheeda hoorgaji ispwa bea gheaboonyanga meeng'meeng'i.
66002002	Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu, ea sawanadeadaang'u ea milikghteaydaang'u nea giihang'waanyi, ea gidamiimmuustani milikghta fuga munyas iissa gilinyooh ghanyi sima fukka guura geat giijasoodiga nea mawosean, ak gidaahi gideaba gaba ng'uyya;
66002003	ak ghaanalli gihang'ooydaang'u nea gimilikghti nea gidiing'di gheawungeasu, ak ghanyea miih bura.
66002004	Ak geandeawi ng'ashaan appadaydaang'u, bea gideaba ninung'wi heeda bariinyeegaagu bea mwadi.
66002005	Asi apkaada gidabwaanyi, ak giduukkuuni ak gibiiksi gadiyoojiga ghayi isni bea madeeda. Ak imisni, gaydahidu headaang'u, ak gaydageanda hoorgeeda gheaboonyaneedaang'u aba heeda mida, ea eaghus duukkuunana.
66002006	Ak gindeawi ng'asheanji gideaba gisti gadiyoojiga fuga Nikkolayi, ak eara aniini ghaasichchi.
66002007	Gilinyooh googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea dea jooriischi gaydanung' ghwaak haghweega geetta eaweega, mida jeeda madamnyeanda mwanang' bea Aseettean.'"
66002008	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Smirna ng'waara, ‘Ng'asheega madeeda ea dea huydean, was dea ghayi meah ak gabiikta gamajeegiit.
66002009	Ghaanalli sawanadeadaang'u ea barbarandaang'u, (ak guwosi meanang'oochcheanda), ak ghaanalli eara ging'weakeaba fiisu eena geewochi fuga Yahuudi nea mawosean, nea saawa ea ghooriida sinnealshachcheewa bea Shattaani.
66002010	Asi adiiwali ng'asheega jea nyasa was sawanadeeda. Ng'ulla, meang'nyeandeenda niriikghta gwahisa buuneeda mwaatkwa mida jeedeang'wa ghealooniga, ak abeeda gesimsimeegwa, ak aba jeemba askweajooji damanamughuush gajanyasa sawanadeeda. Wosa doabiiwaat ea hitta miyeeda, ak gaydagoonnyi shiipka mideawa eaweega.'"
66002011	“Siida agar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea dea jooriischi ea mayghwanyas sawanadeeda miyeedeaba iyyeenya.”
66002012	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Bergamo ng'waara: ‘Suu ng'asheega dea mideawa bwaangeeda ng'aniip meadajeega duwaawi.’
66002013	“Ghaanalli heediibiitti, heeda mida hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Shattaani gil; ak ang'iing'i ea ning'waanyi muuchchi gheawungeasu, ak ea miih heawana masaweegeasu eara damandida bea Antiippa was muushoocheandeanyuun, was siideanyu doabiiwaat, sinuuksa bugusteang'wa, was heeda abiitta Shattaaniin.
66002014	Ak geandeawi ng'asheesu ng'ay appadaydaang'u: gideaba gindeawi fiisu ng'ay aba hoowa aat geeshta ginealshooda Balaamu, niny ghayi ghoanaal Balakki ak gwaruusa balloojiga Israeeli ak ghwanung' ghwaak hamichchoojiga siyaat lukghumajeega siittaw haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta ea biissa mealuleega.
66002015	Ak eara ang'iing'i gindeawi fuga aat geeshta ginealshooda fuga Nikkoolayi.
66002016	Asi duukkuunana. Nea iimiduukkuunani, gaydahidu headaang'u nea ghalamwajaannyi ak gaydang'uchchi saawa aba bwaangeeda leabu ghuutteanyu.
66002017	“Gilinyooh googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean. Nea siida jooriischi gaydaadaw hamitta suguura maana ghayi sifuy ak gaydaadaw lagheaneedeesh, ak badaydeaba lagheanean geeng'oorsa gheawunga eashish, mwanala siih geaghus siitta ang'ng'waayiin.”
66002018	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Diyattira ng'waara: ‘Ng'asheega Balleanda Aseetta, bea gheanyanga oar ng'ushapta beasta, ak geeshangaaschi gawuurji lagheaneeda mur sisiy muuchchi.’
66002019	Ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu, ea bariinyeegaagu ea masaweegaagu ea gidigadiyeatti ea milikghteaydaang'u nea giihang'waanyi, ak gichcha gadiyoojigaagu huydean ghangal gea ghayi bea madeeda.
66002020	Ak geandeawi ng'ashaan appadaydaang'u, bea gideaba ang'iing'i gimilikghti gatmoodida suguura Yesebeeliin, guura geaw sibaneeda ak ghoareatta soomjoogeasu ak ghoanaal mealuuleega nea ghwaak haleanjeeda siyaat lukghumajeega siittaw gidamawosa Aseettean.
66002021	Ak ea naadawji gheatta gwaduukkuuna, ak ghaheawa duukkuunooda mealuuleegaaschi.
66002022	Ng'ulla, gaydayiin gatmoodida muunda aba miyeanda, nea fukka jea gamealuul sea ninyiin gaydadaw sawanadeeda haw, ea eaghus gwaduukkuuna ng'asheega sina;
66002023	ak gaydabwar diibigaaschi gameewa. Ak gayghwanal ganiisajeega sean gideaba aniini geawoschi siida sikkiideawa fughareenga ea guroruunatka, ak gaba siisi adawji aba jeedeang'wa gitteaschi sea gadiyoojigeagwa.”
66002024	“Nea fuga mida jeedeang'wa aba ng'eanyiida Diyattira, was fuga moang'ng'waanya ginealshooniin, fuga mwanala gidaguura buuneeda mwaatkwa haleanjeeda sheagi jiih bea Shattaani, aba heedeang'wa gaydayi, mwaydayiin badahuukkeagwa sareenda nuut;
66002025	ghusa ging'ng'ooyda gidindeawi, ea dahidu.
66002026	Nea siida jooriischi ak ghoang'ng'waay gadiyoojigeasu ea ghwahitta huydeanda, gaydanung' goombal fuga emoojiga,
66002027	ak gayghoohaaghwiida saawa bileangida gharinnyeanda, gawuurji gidiissa ghwanyarda haleanjeeda sisna sigeeda ak ghoaw banajanga, gwasnu earaniini naanyaschi uurda leabu heeda Bwaabwa;
66002028	ak gaydaadaw ming'weandida bea muchchuunoodean.
66002029	Gilinyooh googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”
66003001	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Sardi ng'waara: ‘Suuh ng'asheega ninyeeda mideawa guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta ea miinga assispwaan gil.’ ‘Ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu; gideaba gindeawi gheawunga majeeknatta, nea nimeawi.
66003002	Ang'wearni, ak gimajeegi ng'asheega shoada jea gweadu miyeeda, aba gideaba miih dadeaksa gadiyoojigaagu alooheeda aba madeeda Aseetteanyu.
66003003	Asi apkaada gidaghayi inyasi ea gidaghayi iyiinyi; asi ang'ng'waanya gidida, ak giduukkuuni. Ak iming'wearni gaydahittaayda mareanghweanda, ak ea mwaynala damanda jea dahinna headaang'u.
66003004	Ak gindeawi gheawung'su ng'ay aba ng'eanyiida Sardi, fuga miighang'uda hang'weakka nyaawa ririnyeanda; ak gaydeadeayddooschi saawa nea sishshuubeasa hang'weakka eeshish, aba gideaba gammiisa.’
66003005	“Nea siida jooriischi gajeekwealsa hang'weakka eeshish, ak ea maydeabuus ghawungaaschi aba jeeda gittaabwajeanda eaweega; ak gaydamwas gheawungaaschi aba madeeda Bwaabwa, ea madeeda malaykajeagaaschi.
66003006	Gilinyooh googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”
66003007	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiiseeda Filadeelfiya ng'waara: ‘Suuh ng'asheega siida ghaydit gil assakkalealla, bea huumwa, mideawa gissiittinna gidaghuutta sugoochcheandumeeda Dawdi, siida amattin ea manda siida ammu ghwarat, siida amarat ea manda siida jea goottin.’
66003008	“Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu. Ng'ulla, aniini naayiinnyi madeadaang'u gidaghuutta jaadaat, moammu siih ghwarat; aniini ghaanalli gideaba gindeawi uuri mwanang', ea gideaba ging'ng'waannyi ng'asheandeanyu ak ea miih shaang'a gheawungeasu.
66003009	Ng'ulla, gaydanung' ghoaw fukka was gheeda sinnealshachcheewa bea Shattaani eena geawoschi Yahuudi nea mawosa ak gwanaba ng'uyyeegean, ng'ulla, gaydanung' ghapka ak gwatkuy aba madeeda geeshangaagu, ak ghwanal gideaba ghaabwariinyeay.
66003010	Aba gideaba ning'ng'waannyi ng'asheandeanyu bea milikghteayda nea gihang'waanyi, ak aniini gaydafurnyi, nea giritti aba damanda simsimda jea gwahissa ng'eanyiisean, ak gwasimsim fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida.
66003011	Gaydahidu nea ghaalamwajaannyi; ang'ng'waanya muuchchi gidindeawi, ak ea mooreannyi siih shiipkaagu.
66003012	“Siida jooriischi gaydanung' ghoaw daraneeda aba jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetteanyu; ak ea mayghanyi gwaritteawa jeeni, ak gaydang'oorsa badaydaannyi gheawunga Aseetteanyu, ea gheawunga mujineeda Aseetteanyu, nea Yerusaleemooda eeshi, rarang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetteanyu, ea gheawungeasu giikka eashishiin.
66003013	Gilinyooh googar iitta, ea dayiinya ng'asheesu rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”
66003014	“Heeda malaykajeanda ganiseeda Laodekkiya ng'waara: ‘Ng'asheega siida was Amin, was siida doabiiwaat was mushoochcheanda huumwa, was ging'eetta haleanjeessean sin Aseetta.’
66003015	“Aniini ghaanalli gadiyoojigaagu: gideaba muwosi garbabu nea muwosi gharaat. Ghang'wana guwosi garbabu ghana wosa gharaat!
66003016	Asi, aba gideaba guwosi shang'shang', nea muwosi garbabu ghana wosa gharaat, gaydang'udaneey ak giritteawi ghuutteanyu.
66003017	Aba gideaba giyeeni aniini geawoschi meanang'oochcheanda ak ea neabaruurji, ak ea meagassi gil; ak ang'iing'i ea minali gideaba mindeawani uurda, nea guwosi bwarbwar, ak giwosi ng'oaw, nea guwosi dawiish.
66003018	Ak gaydayeeshshiineey, shaaha aba heedeanyu lagheanga meeng'meeng'i siihuuna beasta, ak abeeda gaywosa meanang'oochcheanda, nea giikwealli hang'weakka eashish, ak ea meadaaha baspaseega dawiishnattaang'u, ak gaynyasa meajooda jea eashana gheanyangaagu ak abeeda gingweardi.
66003019	Fukkeanji abwariinyiin, inyeessa geawoowsi nea ghabwarji; asi milmiliida ak giduukkuuni.
66003020	Ng'ulla, ghaamiinaadi aba gidaghuut nea geagulgulli; siida jea ghwayiiny ghuutteanyu ak ghwajaat gidaghuut gaydoan headaannyi ak geambuuchcheewi, nea eara niny goombuuchcheewean.
66003021	“Siida jooriischi gaydanung' goopteada nea geendeayi aba uhuuda hoorgeedeanyu bea gheambalmeeda, gawuurji gideajooriischeatti ak geapteadi sea Bwaabwa aba uhuuda hoorgeedaannyi bea gheambalmeeda.
66003022	Gilinyooh googar iitta, dayiinya ng'asheanji rukusa Gurorooda ganiisajeegean.”
66004001	Iing'atta ng'asheesu ghang'weardi, ama deagheatta gwanda humng'eeda gidaghuutta jaadaat. Hean ghuutta gwachchi ayiinyi bea madeedean goobaloolan nea ghwanyaashta giguuleanda, nea gwayi, “Beenni hiji, ak gaydahiimneey gichchea ghwahidu iing'atta ng'asheesu.”
66004002	Deagheatta geandi jeeda Gurorooda, hean ghamiinaada hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda aba humng'eeda, nea goopteada siida aba uhuudeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean!
66004003	Nea siida apteadawa uhuuda iisung'ula ghawaar lagheaneda mur ea dea dughwaang, nea hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean gwaneaweesa gidaghuweang'da sheagiitka ama sung'ula ea nyawiish.
66004004	Ak gwaneaweesa hoorgeedida bea gheambalmeedean hoorgaji diktam ea ang'wan bea gheambalmeeda, ak ghaadaayi gwearu diktam ea ang'wan, aba uhuudeaba hoorgajeegiga bea gheambalmeedean nea goobiitbiit, nea siikwealsa hang'weakka eashish, nea iheenga nyaawa gwanda shiipka lagheanga meeng'meeng'i.
66004005	Nea heeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda iissa gwarinna dadamandeeda, nea ghuusiga ea nyeashta gighweeendandeeda, nea madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ghwayeat gheaboonyan ispwa bea beasta, nea guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta;
66004006	nea madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda gawuurji gili mida basooda daliil oar giyooh, nea ghameameang'. Nea gwaneaweesa hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, aba meadajeega sean bea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, gwanda diyean ang'wan majeekcheewi, hean ghwanyiit gheanyanga mwadi ea bwadaw:
66004007	diyeayda madeeda majeek gawuurji ng'adiida, nea diyeaydeaba iyyeenya majeek gawuurji heeyda, diyeaydeaba samwagu majeek gwandeawa gheamamda uurji dea siida, nea diyeaydeaba ang'wan majeek gawuurji rabearda ng'eatta.
66004008	Nea diyeanga assang'wan majeekcheewiin, gaba niih bea meang'i lah, hean ghoang'wearu gang'ula meadajeega ea jih, nea askweari ea eawa ghanyea miih ghwanung'waada sarmeeda, “Dea Ghaydit, dea ghaydit, dea ghaydit, Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Haw uuri, niny dea mida ea dea bean gwanda ea dea jea ghwahidu.”
66004009	Ak ghoadaw diyeanga majeekcheewiin giigheambiitta ea mureeda ea badiischooda ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda maygoosha, damanda manda muudeanooda,
66004010	inyeessa gwearsu was diktam ea ang'waniin goobeedeaysa madeeda siitta apteada aba uhuudeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ak ghaghadoawan ninnyeeda majeek eaghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda; nea gwajaksa shiipka nyaawa madeeda hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean, nea gwasarman,
66004011	“Ng'uttamiideanya was Aseetta gammiiseey ang'iing'i gigheambiitta ea mureeda ea uurda, aba gideaba ghayi gisni haleanjeessean, nea aba gidigassiidi gisni ak goobiida.”
66005001	Hean geadeaksi geattinda dugwa bea siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean gittaabooda sung'waar jeeda ea badayda, nea siirroor aba giirooran ispwa;
66005002	ghaadaayi malayakkajeanda mideawa uurda nea gwarukkwiida ng'asheega aba ghuutta haw, nea gwayi, “Gammiisa ng'eaha gideaba gaygoottin gittaabu ak gwanyarjeaweeda giiroorangaaschi?”
66005003	Ak ea manda siida aba humng'eeda ghana ng'eanyiida ghana uutta ng'eanyiida ammu goottin gittaabu ghana goong'weersa jeeda,
66005004	hean geayyeawdi muuchchi aba gideaba meadaaha siida miisa giittindeaba gittaaaboani, ghana gong'weersa jeeda.
66005005	Ak gwayeeshshean siyagi aba jeedeaba gweargiga, “Adiyyeawdi; daaha, ng'adiida emeeda Yuuda, was Hawunyeanda Dawdi, niny nijooriischi, ak gaygoottin gittaabu, ea giiroorangaaschi as ispwa.”
66005006	Hean ghaadaayi aba dageascheeda hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ea diyeangiga majeekcheewi assang'waniin ea bugusteaba gweargiga, ghamiinaada Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea gawuurji gili silach gheatta, nea gaba gujaw ispwa ea gheanyan ispwa, nea Guroruunat ispwa bea Aseetta gil sichcheakta gaweay ng'eanyiissean;
66005007	hean gawa ak gageanda gittaabu aba geattinda dugwa bea siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean.
66005008	Hean nea gageanu gittaabu ghoabeada diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin sea gweargiga attiktam ea ang'waniin aba madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ak gaba niih ang'ng'waay gidondooriida, ea gweeriida sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea ghwannyiit hideeda ng'andit, was mooshta Aseetta bea fuga ghaydidi;
66005009	hean gwasarman sarmeedeesh, nea gwayi, “Gammiiseey ang'iing'i geannooda gittaabu ak giittin giiroorangaaschi, aba gideaba ghayi gealach ghaattaang'u nea aba foojandaang'u giidaydi leadeeda buuneeda aba heeda Aseetta aba giliwas eamwa ea iitta ea buuneeda ea ng'eanyiida,
66005010	ak ginung' ghwanyas sugoochcheandumeeda ea ashoohoodiga aba heeda Aseetteanya, nea saawa gaygoombal ng'eanyiida.”
66005011	Deagheatta ghang'weardi, ak ghayiinyi aba murdeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea dea diyeangiga majeekchewiin ea dea gweargwa ghuusiga malaykajeega saang'a meammu eyiida,
66005012	nea geeyi aba ghuutta haw, “Gammiisa Dayeenda Gisilleanda ghayi silach gheatta, ghwanyas uurda ea meanang'oochcheandumeeda ea weaghumeeda ea hawunda ea mureeda ea gigheambiitta ea ghawooda!”
66005013	Ak gilinyooh gwanda humng'eeda ea badayda ng'eanyiida ea uutta ng'eanyiida ea jeeda basooda, ea haleanjeessean mida jeadaannyi, gwayi, “Ghawooda ea mureeda ea gigheambiitta ea giimuusta gwandeawa ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda!”
66005014	Ak gwayi diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin, “Amin!” ak gobeedeayi gweargwa ak ghaghadoawan.
66006001	Ng'atta ghaadaayi aba hoowa Dayeenda Gisilleanda nea goottin giirooraneanagi aba jeedeaba gikka as ispwaan, ak ghaayiinyi aba jeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin nea gwayi, aba nyeashta haw uurji gighweendandeeda, “Beenni!”
66006002	Hean ghadaayi, asi ng'ulla faraseedeesh, nea gwanda badaydaannyi siida mideawa ghuweang'da; hean geattaw shiipka, ak gwaritta ak gwajooriischi nea ghwajoar.
66006003	Iiduw nea goottin girooraneedeaba iyyeenya ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida bea iyyeenya majeegiin nea gwayi, “Beenni!”
66006004	Hean gwardu faraasajeanda nuut, nea areara muuchchi; nea siidida mida badaydean geenung'u gageanda weayda aba badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gwanuusa geat buuneeda; ak niny geattaw bwangeeda haw.
66006005	Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba samwagu, ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida bea samwaguun majeegiin nea gwayi, “Beenni!” Hean ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi faraasajeanda duw, nea siida mida badayda gwandeawa gidasigalla haleanjeeda aba geattindaannyi;
66006006	ghaayiinyi giduurji nyeashta aba bugusteaba diyeangiga majeekcheewi asang'waniin, nea gwayi, “Gweeriida nngano nea gogween iyyeenya sishaaha dinarajanjagi, ea gweeriida riighu bea nnganooyda suguura shayiiri sishaaha dinaari; ak ea adidattasi, nagheeda ea difaayi!”
66006007	Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba ang'wan, ghaayiinyi ghuutteaba diyeaydida majeek bea ang'waniin nea gwayi, “Beenni!”
66006008	Hean ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi, faraseeda mur, nea siida mida badayda ea Miyeeda gil, nea goodeayi Gheeda maloonghajeega; ak geattaw uurda appadayda ng'eanyiida hiji mwanang', ak gwanuus aba bwaanga ea geejeeda ea dauni ea diyeanga ng'weani bea ng'eanyiida.
66006009	Iiduw nea goottin giirooraneedeaba muut, hean ghaadaayi aba jeeda heeda wagiida guroruunatka fukghayi silajada gheatkweakka appadayda Ng'asheanda Aseetta, ak gamuuwwu ng'asheesu;
66006010	goojuur aba ghuuttahaw nea geeyi, “Ea Ng'uttamiida ambaliischi, ghaydit bea huumwa, gajeeyi bwak ea ghoaw eeju nea miyargweaksiina ak giwaldi foojeandeanya appadahuukka fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida?”
66006011	Ak gaba niih siittaw hang'deesh geaw nea geeyeeshsha anyooh ghanyi afuufa ea gameaji gageawiit, ea gwadeayi monneeda bareanda nyaawa was soomjooga ea fuga duupchi jea enuusta gidaghayi sinuusta saawa.
66006012	Iiduw nea ghwajaat giirooraneedeaba lah, ghaadaayi, ak geang'ulayi sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida; ak gwattuudu gheang'da Aseetta ea gawuurji hang'weakka sisna guniya, nea eara sheeda ghawaar foojeanda,
66006013	nea miinga humng'eeda gang'adeesa badayda ng'eanyiida gawuurji gidiissa gojiroonda shabongheechcheanda haghweagaaschi damanda gooroogeeda nea gooyuuk jeammeeda;
66006014	hean genung'u ghwaroat humng'eeda ea gawuurji gittaabooda sumughut, nea gilwas giija ea ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega gajeanung' ghang'amwa heeda mida.
66006015	Nea sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiida ea fuga hees, ea shirikkaarajeega hees ea meanang'oodiga ea gea mideawa uurjeenga, ea gilwas siih, soomjeanda, ea dea abal geaw, hean gafuysageat jeesinga gwaleadinga ea dageascheeda lagheanga gijeega,
66006016	hean gaguursa gijeega ea lagheanga nea gwayeeshsha, “Oppeedeayseasa ak ghoafunyeasa aba madeedeaba gheanyangeaba siitta apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean, ea aba nyarasta Dayeenda gisilleanda;
66006017	aba gideaba eaweetta haw bea nyarasta nyaawa nihidu, ak ea ng'eaha gil jea ghoammu ghamiinaada aba madeeda?”
66007001	Iing'atta suuh ghaadaayi malaykaji ang'wan nea ghamiinaada aba murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, nea ghwadeal jeammeeda leabu murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba ea mwaghuunna jeammeeda appadayda ng'eanyiida, ghana aba jeeda basooda ghana ghaghuut geetta wassean.
66007002	Ghadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea gwascheang'na heeda arearuuna aseetta, nea gwandeawa giirooraneeda Aseetta majeek, hean gaguurda aba ghuutta haw ak gaguursa malaykajeegiga assang'wan ghayi siittaw uurda jea gwasawana ng'eanyiida ea basoodean,
66007003	nea gwayeeshsha, “Adoosawannyi ng'eanyiida ghana basooda ghana geediga, ea eaghus ea siyiinnyi girooraneeda gheamanuunakka soomjooga Aseetteanya.”
66007004	Ghaayiinyi monneeda fuga sirroor, fiih sagalamnyooji bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan sirroor, aba giliwas eamwa aba jeeda balloojiga Israeeli,
