66007005	gea emeeda Yuuda gerroor fiih sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Ruuben sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Gaadi sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
66007006	gea emeeda Asheeri sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Naftali sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Manaase sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
66007007	gea emeeda Simon sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Laawi sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Isakkaari sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya,
66007008	gea emeeda Sabulooni sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Yooseefu sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya, gea emeeda Beenjamin sagalamnyooji damaniyyeenya sirroor.
66007009	Iing'atta ng'asheesu ghaang'weardi, ak ging'ulayi, ghaadaayi, emeeda saang'a manda siida ammu gwayiida, fuga leabu giliwas daroar ea emoojiga sean ea buuneeda ea iitta nea ghamiinaada aba madeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean, ea madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea gookkwa hang'weakka eashish, nea ghoang'ng'waay damealga milayga aba geattinga nyaawa,
66007010	nea goyeawda aba ghuutta haw nea geeyi, “Lealeanooda gaba Aseetteanya apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, ea heeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda!”
66007011	Abeeda malaykajeega sean ghamiinaada aba murdajeega sean bea hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ea dea gweargwa, ea deaba diyeangiga majeekcheewi asang'waniin, ak goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi aba madeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean ak ghaghadoawan Aseetta
66007012	nea gwayi, “Amin! Ghawooda ea gigheambiitta ea weaghuumeeda ea badiischooda ea mureeda ea uurda ea hawunda daba Aseetteanya ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda! Amin.”
66007013	Hean gwayeeshshean gweargweenagi, “Fiisu akkeega, akkwa hang'weakka eashish gulng'eanyiin, nea fiisu gwaleabu yeenu?”
66007014	Geayeeshshi niny, “Siida mureeda, ginali ang'iing'i.” Hean gwayeeshshean, “Suuh fuga leabu jeedeaba sawanadeetta hawiini; ak eanihuun hang'weakka nyaawa geawwi ea ghwanung' gaweeriidi aba foojeanda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.
66007015	Ak gwanda madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda Aseetta, nea gagadiiyeesa askweari ea eawa aba jeedeaba gheannyi sibatta Aseetta; ak ninyeeda apteada aba uhuuda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda gaygookkwa saawa aba gideaba gwanda hiji.
66007016	Ak ea maygudu ghwadaah jalooda, ghana ghwaak muwoash gichcha; ak ea mayghwaak daknooda saawa, ghana gilwas daknooda ng'waan.
66007017	Aba gideaba Dayeeneanji bea Gisilleanda mida bugusta hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean gayghoaw jeagiischoochcheanda nyaawa, ak gaygoodoobiiwseegwa gheang'deenda mida beega mideawa eaweega; ak Aseetta gaygoobuus dabeakka sean mida gheanyanga nyaawa.”
66008001	Iiduw nea goottin Dayeenda Gisilleanda giirooraneedeaba ispwa, hean gwayi humng'eeda saw gheadi nuwaas.
66008002	Ak ghaadaayi malaykajeandeaba ispwa nea ghamiinaada aba madeeda Aseetta, ak geattaw saawa durumbeataji ispwa.
66008003	Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanda nuut ak ghamiinaada heeda wagiida, nea gwandeawa dabichcheanda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i simmikkisiinda, ak geattaw hideeda ng'andit saang'a ak googuuyi sea mwoshta Aseetta bea fuga sean ghaydidi appadayda heeda wagiida eyda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i mida madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda;
66008004	ng'atta gwadiyeada aroosteaba hideetta ng'andidiin sea mooshta Aseetta bea fuga ghaydidiin aba geattinda malaykajeanda ea ghwahitta madeeda Aseetta.
66008005	Iiduw gageanu malaykajeanda dabichcheandida ak ghoannyiit beasta leabu heeda wagiida, ak gwajaksa badayda ng'eanyiida; hean ghwanya nyeashta ea gighweandandeeda humng'eeda, ea nyeashta nea ghoabwaay dadamandeeda, ea sawooda ng'eanyiida.
66008006	Ng'atta gwasissin geaw malaykajeandeaba ispwa mideawa durumbeattaji ispwa nea gagasa ghaghuut.
66008007	Hean goguul malaykajeanda madeeda, ak ghwahidu roopta lagheanga ea beasta, nea gaguuyi foojeanda, ak goobissa badayda ng'eanyiida; hean ghwaak ng'eanyiida beasta ea eappuut hiji mwanang', ak ghwaak beasta geediga ea ghoabuut suung'ay, nea eara nyeega nyawiiri sean ghwaak beasta.
66008008	Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba iyyeenya durumbeatteadaannyi, hean geejaksa jeeda basooda giduurji giijeeda haw, nea ghwayeada beasta;
66008009	nea basooda heeda haw ghoaw foojeanda, nea diyeanga heeda haw majeekcheewi mida gameewa aba jeeda basooda, nea maleambajeega hees genyarjeaweada heeda haw.
66008010	Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba samwagu durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghang'adaana humng'eeda ming'weanda haw, nea ghwayeatta gheaboong'nyeanda, ak goobissa eeniga heeda haw ea gheanyanga eninga mideawa beega.
66008011	Ak gheawungeaba ming'weandida geguura Ng'weaninda, nea beega heessaang'a gang'weaniidi, ak gameewa fuga saang'a appadaydeaba beesu, aba gideaba sinung' gang'weaniidi.
66008012	Ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba ang'wan durumbeatteadaannyi, ak geawwiim gheang'da aseetta heeda haw, ak eara gheang'da sheeda geawwiim heeda haw, ak eara gheanyanga miinga geawwiim heeda haw, ak abeeda uurda nyaawa abwaanya geanung' gamisaniit heeda haw; nea askwearjeanda heeda haw ea madakna, ak gwasnu eara eaweeda heeda haw.
66008013	Hean ghaang'weardi, ak ghaadaayi rabearda ajuur muuchchi, nea ghang'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, nea gwayi, “Ashageada, ashageada, dashageada fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida, damanda jea ghwanyaasha giguleanda nuut nea niriikghta goguul malaykajeega assamwaguun!”
66009001	Hean goguul malaykajeandeaba muut durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghaadaayi ming'weanda ng'adaana humng'eeda ak goobissa badayda ng'eanyiida, ak geattaw gidajea goottina ghuutta shoomanda mammuudeana;
66009002	goottin shoomanda mammuudeana, hean gwarinna aroosta jeedeaba shoomandida, nea gawuurji aroosta duwayda haw, ak ghwanung' gamsaniiti gheang'da aseetta ea humng'eeda aba aroostida bea jeeda shoomandean.
66009003	Gwarinna jeedeaba aroostida deashamga ak ghapka badayda ng'eanyiida, hean geattaw uurda uurji dea mideawa udagilbajeega ng'eanyiida;
66009004	ak geeyeeshsha adoosawannyi nyeega mida ng'eanyiida ghana gilwassean nyawiish, ghana giliwas geetta geaghus fukka mandeawana giirooraneeda Aseetta aba gheamanuunatka nyaawaan;
66009005	geattaw gheatta jea gwasawana saawa sheah muut, ak ea miih gideaba gaygwanuuseada saawa gil, ak sawanadeeda nyaawa gawuurji siida ghanya Udagilba, iighanya siida.
66009006	Ak eawoojikka gaygagasa buuneeda miyeeda ak ea mayghwanyas; ak gaygagasa miyeeda, ak gaygamng'aw miyeeda aba madeannyaawa.
66009007	Ak sinoodeaba deashamsu gawuurji farasajeega, nea hidaat aba ng'uchcheeda; nea iheenga nyaawa gwanda duguuga uurji shiipka sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i; ak gheamanuunaka nyaawa gawuurji gheamanuunaka buuneeda,
66009008	nea buudeega nyaawa gawuurji buudeega gadeemga, nea geeshatka nyaawa gawuurji geeshatka ng'adiida;
66009009	ak daghanuunatka nyaawa gwadiiy igeambooda injilga uurji gharinnyeanda, nea ghuusiga dabiniga nyaawa gawuurji ghuutta muttukajeega, ea farasajeega saang'a weay ng'uchcheeda nea ghwalamwajaada.
66009010	Nea gwandeawa shoomng'eega uurji udagilbajeega, ak gaba halaghweenga, ak uurjeenga nyaawa jea gwasawana buuneeda sheemuut gwanda shoomng'eega nyaawa.
66009011	Ak gwandeawa sugoochcheanda ambal saawa was malaykajeanda shoomanda mammuudeana, ak gheawungaaschi aba iitta fuga Ebraniya geguura Abadooni, nea aba ghuutta Yunaani geeguura Appoliyoni. (nea gideaba habitkweeda).
66009012	Asi halootta madeeda ning'atta; ng'ulla, gayghwahidu haloochcheew iyyeenya.
66009013	Hean ghaghuut malaykajeandeaba lah durumbeatteadaannyi, ak ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyaasha jeedeaba gujakkiga assang'wan bea heeda wagiida eyda meang'meang' mida madeeda Aseettean,
66009014	nea gwayeeshsha malaykajeandeaba lah mideawa durumbeattiin, “Siksiina malaykajeekka asang'wan sirassa jeedeenda haw suguura Furatiin.”
66009015	Hean geesiksa malaykajeekka assan'gwaniin, ghayi sikghuum ea ghwahitta damandideaniin, ea eaweedida ea sheeda, ea gweayda, ak gwanuus buuneeda heeda haw.
66009016	Ak monneeda shirikkareeda mida badayda farasajeega ea sagalamnyooji diktam niba sagalamnyoojiga saang'a meammu eyiida; ghaayiinyi monneeda nyaawa.
66009017	Nea niih ea gidadaakti farasajeega gil aba gidasihhiimnaan; fuga mida badahuukka gwadiiy igeamboonda oar beasta nea ghabwada oomnatta ea gikkayda, nea iheenga farasajeega gawuurji sea iheenga ng'annyeekka, ak gwarinna ghuusiga nyaawa beasta ea aroosta ea giikkayda.
66009018	Aba niih gwanuus buuneeda heeda haw aba dawni, ea aba beasta ea aroosta ea gikkayda rinna ghuusiga nyaawa.
66009019	Aba gideaba uurdeaba farasajeesu gwanda ghuusiga nyaawa ea shoomng'eega nyaawa; aba gideaba shoomng'eega nyaawa gawuurji ichchipkeega, nea gwandeawa iheenga, nea inyeessa gaganyeattiida.
66009020	Nea buuneeda mwaatukwa, mwabwara dawni, ghanyea maduukkuunana aba gadiyoojiga nyaawa sin aba geattinga nyaawa ghana ghwanung'waada ghadoowanda meangeenda ea haleanjeeda mawosa Aseetta sisna lagheanga meang'meang'i ea shiliingajeega ea lagheanga areeri ea lagheaneeda ea geetta, nyooea moammu ghoang'wearda ghana ghwayiiy ghana gaweelweel;
66009021	ak ea maduukkuuna nuusta nyaawa bea buuneeda, ghana beeneetkuumeeda nyaawa, ghana munyasnachcheekka nyaawa ghana gwadishta nyaawa.
66010001	Ng'atta ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut mideawa uurda nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea sikwealsa shamooghooda, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda gidaghuweang'da sheagitka, nea gheamamdaannyi ghawaar aseetta, nea geeshangaaschi gawuurji daranajeega beasta.
66010002	Nea gwandeawa gittaabooda mwanang' giittineat aba geattindaannyi. Ak ghoallaabwa geashtaannyi bea geattinda dugwa jeeda basooda, nea geashtaannyi ghaadaam ghoallaabwa badayda ng'eanyiida.
66010003	Nea gooyeawda aba ghuutta haw, nea ghwanyaashta daghatta dea ng'adiida; iiduw nea gooyeawda, ghwanya ghuusigeaba gighweendaannyeekkiga assispwaan.
66010004	Ng'atta nyeashteaba gighweendannyeekkiga assispwaan, abeeda ea neagasayi dang'waar, hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta leabu humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Aroora ng'asheesu rugu gighweendannyeekkiga assispwaan, ak ea ading'waari.”
66010005	Nea malaykajeandida gwachchi adayiin ghamiinaada aba jeeda basooda ea badayda ng'eanyiidean ghamiinda geattindaannyi bea dugwa googeal humng'eeda,
66010006	ghwaak habeawooda aba ninnyeeda majeek ea ghoaw damanda manda mudeanooda, ninnyeeda bwat humng'eeda ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ea ng'eanyiida ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ea basooda ea haleanjeeda mida jeeda, ak ea maygudugwanda shing'deayda,
66010007	geaghus aba askwearjoojiga jea ghaghuuda durumbeatti malaykajeandeaba ispwa, abeeda makcheameeda Aseetta aba heeda soomjoagaaschi was sibanga gaygamajeegiit.
66010008	Hean gabiikta goobaloolan ghuuttida gwachchi ayiinyi leabu humng'eedean nea gwayi, “Una, ak gigeandi gittaabootta giittineat mida geattindeaba malaykajeandida miinaada appadayda basooda ea badayda ng'eanyiidean.”
66010009	Geaweesi malaykajeandida ak geayeeshshi goona gittaaboani mwanang'iin; ak gwayeeshiineen, “Geanda, ak giyaagi; ak gayghang'waaniit aba jeadaang'u, nea aba ghuuttaang'u gajea inyaanda maleeda.”
66010010	Geageandi gittaabooda mwanang' aba geattinda malaykajeanda ak ghaayaaji; ak ea inyaanda maleeda aba ghuutteanyu, hean iyaahiichchi agitta ghang'waaniit aba jeedeanyu.
66010011	Geyeeshinean, “Gammiiseey rukuta gichcha ramooranga appadayda fuga saang'a ea emoojiga ea iitta ea sugoodiga.”
66011001	Ng'atta gegoonan ng'archeanda uurji bileangida sitteenniida, ak gwayeeshshean, “Ng'eada ak gideeni gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea heeda wagiida ea fuga mida jeeda gadoowani Aseetta,
66011002	ak ea adiideeni bugharjeanda mida bwadaw bea Aseetta; dakta bwadaw, aba gideeda siittaw daroorakka, ak gayghwadattas mujiineeda ghaydit sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya.
66011003	Ak gaydaadaw Muushoodigeasu assiyyeenya uurda ak ghwaramwaar eawooji sagalam ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam, nea siikwealsa guniyajeega.”
66011004	Suuh geedikka assiyyeenya suguura masaytunajeegean gil, ea hoorgajeekka bea gheaboonyanga assiyyeenya miinaada aba madeeda Ng'uttamiida ng'eanyiidean.
66011005	Nea siida iigasa gwasawan saawa, gwariinna beasta ghuusiga nyaawa ak ghwaak weajoodiga nyaawa. Ak ghoammu ghwayam beega ghoaw foojeanda, nea iigasa gayghwalas ng'eanyiida aba gilwas lasita.
66011006	Saawa gwandeawa uurda jea ghwarada humng'eeda, ak ea mwaroabwana damanda ramwaarana, ak gwandeawa uurda appadayda beega ak ghwayam ghoaw foojeanda, ak ghwalas ng'eanyiida aba giliwas dawni, aba gidagassiida.
66011007	Iiduw nea niihiit muuwnooda nyaawa, gaygang'uchchi diyeaydida leabu jeeshoomanda mammudeanean sea saawa, ak gayghwajoar ak gwanuus saawa,
66011008	nea muscheekka nyaawa gaygwalil aba ghuutta naweeda mujiineetta hawiin, nea geegala Sodooma ghana Miisri, was heeda ghayi singoorsa Ng'uttamiida nyaawa.
66011009	Aba eawooji samwagu ea gil gang'ula headiga buuneeda ea emoojiga ea iitta ea daroorakka gumgeenga nyaawa ak ghaheawa gideaba gajeebuy.
66011010	Nea fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida gaygahoosan appadahuukka nyaawa nea gang'weela ak saawa gweattiisa geat haleanjeeda sippareannyi, aba gideaba sibang'su assiyyeenyean gwasawan fukka mida badayda ng'eanyiidean.
66011011	Iing'atta eawooji samwangu eagil hean ghwahidu gisimeanda eaweega leabu heeda Aseetta ak gawa jeannyaawa, hean ghang'eatng'eat ghamiinaada aba geeshanga nyaawa, hean ghang'ut fukka daahiin muuwda haw.
66011012	Geeyiy nyeashta haw leabu humng'eeda nea gwayeeshsha saawa, “Apkaani hiji!” Gwadiyeada humng'eeda nea ghabeawa jeeshshamooghooda, nea gang'ula weajoodiga nyaawa.
66011013	Nea aba damandida abeeda gwanda sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida, ak ghoabeada mwaatkweanagi mwanang' bea mujiin; ak gameewa fiih sagalamnyooji ispwa aba sawoodida bea ng'eanyiidean, ak ghang'ut muuwda geesippuut, ak ghoaghaambiit Aseetta humng'eeda.
66011014	Ning'atta shageatteaba iyyeenya; ng'ulla, niriikghta ghwahidu shageatteaba samwangu.
66011015	Ghaghuut durumbeatteadaannyi malaykajeandeaba ispwa, ak ghwanya ghuusiga ajuur aba humng'eeda, nea geeyi, “Sugoochcheandumeeda ng'eanyiida goolla ghoaw sugoochcheandumeeda Ng'uttamiideanya ea dea Gristoydaannyi, ak gaygoombaliischi ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.”
66011016	Ak gwearguga attiktam ea ang'wan abiitbiida hoorgajeega nyaawa bea gheambalmeedean ammadeeda Aseettean goobeedeayi ak ghabwada jeesinga ng'eanyi nea ghamwaash Aseetta,
66011017	nea gwayeenna, “Geebadiischooweey ang'iing'i, Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta mideawa uurda, gindi nea gibean midana, aba gideaba nigeandi uurdaang'u haw ak giimbaliischi.
66011018	Ak gwanyareesi emoojiga, ak ghwahidu nyarastaang'u, nea ghwahidu damanda jea ergweaksiina fuga nimeewa, nea geammwaar soomjoogaagu was sibanga ea gea ghaydidi, ea fukka awali gheawungaaguun, was gea manang'i ea gea hees, ak geedatas suuh datas ng'eanyiidean.”
66011019	Ng'atta geettin Gheeda sibatta Aseetta mida humng'eeda, ak geadaah sandakwajeanda digheanda aba jeedeaba gheannyi sibatta Aseetta; abeeda gwanda dadamandeeda, ea nyeashta, ea gighweendandeeda humng'eeda, ea sawooda ng'eanyiida, ea roopta haw muuchchi bea lagheanga.
66012001	Ng'atta geadaah gwadeagooda haw aba humng'eeda was gatmooda siikwealsa aseetta, nea gwanda jeeda baneaguukka geeshangaaschi sheeda, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka miinga attamaniyyeenya;
66012002	niny abeeda ea bungaroochcheanda gil, ak goyeawda aba lajooda jeatta, ak gwasawana aba jeatta.
66012003	Ng'atta geadaah gwadeagooda nuut aba humng'eeda, ng'ulla, hararjooda haw areara, mideawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush, nea iheenga nyaawa gaba niih mideawa shiip ispwa.
66012004	Nea shoomng'eandaannyi goongir miinga humng'eeda heeda haw, ak gwahisa badayda ng'eanyiida. Hean ghamiinaada ichchiboodida aba madeeda gatmoodida riikghta gwaji jeeptean, ak abeeda ghwanukghuta jeaptaannyi damanda jiila;
66012005	hean gwaji jeepta was balleanda, ak gayghwaahaaghwa emoojiga sean aba bileangida gharinyeanda, ak jeeptaannyi geettiing'da ea gawa heeda Aseetta ea heeda hoorgeadaannyi bea gheambalmeeda,
66012006	iiduw gamng'aw gatmoodida gawa dareapcheeda, nea nisissa Aseetta heechcheagoobiida, ak geerrear ak goobiida hoowa eawooji sagalama ea bughalaji iyyeenya ea laadam.
66012007	Ng'atta ghang'eat ng'uchcheeda aba humng'eeda, gang'uchi Mikaeeli ea malaykajeagaaschi sea hararjootta; ak gang'uchi ichchibooda sea saawa ea malaykajeegaaschi,
66012008	iiduw geajoar ak ea mudugwanda heechchea goobida aba humng'eeda.
66012009	Ak geejaksa ng'eanyi hararjootta haw was ichchiboodeaba garayiin, suguura Meang'nyeandeenda ea Shattaani, was dea reengani ng'eanyiisseaniin, ak geejagu badayda ng'eanyiida, ak eara malaykajeagaaschi geehisu ghapka ng'eanyi sea niny.
66012010	Ak ghaayiinyi nyeashta haw nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Ghamneawa lealeanooda ea uurda ea Sugoochcheandumeeda Aseetteanya ea gheambalmeeda Gristoydaannyi nihidu, aba gideaba sijaksa ng'eanyi dea aheakkiida fuga siduupcheewi, ninyeeda aheakkiida aba madeeda Aseetteanya askweari ea eawa.
66012011	Ak ghwajoar aba foojeanda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ea aba ng'asheanda muwuunnooda nyaawa, ak ea mwabwariinya eaweega nyaawa eara gaweayi miyeeda.
66012012	Asi ang'weella, Ea humng'eeda, ea agoogeeni ondijeedean! Asi agooga ashageada, Ea ng'eanyiida ea basooda, aba gideaba meang'nyeandeenda nirarang'aan ghwahidu heedeang'wa nea gaba nyarasta haw aba gideaba ghwanal gwandeawa gheadi nuwaas!”
66012013	Iiduw nea ghwadaah ichchiboodida gideaba sijaksa badayda ng'eanyiida, hean ghwaat geeshteaba gatmoodida jiih jeepta was balleandean.
66012014	Ng'atta geattaw gatmoodida meang'i iyyeenya bea rabearda haw ak ghang'eatta gawa dareapcheeda sheageewa ichchiboodida, ak gawa heeda jea gweagiischi gheadi nuwaas, sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya.
66012015	Hean gwarinna ghuutteaba ichchiboodida beega uurji gea enda, appadayda gatmootta, ak ghwanung' ghwaat guldeayda.
66012016	Iiduw ghaweat ng'eanyiida gatmooda, ak ghwajaat ng'eanyiida ghuuttaannyi ak ghwanukghta eendida rinna ghuutta ichchiboodean.
66012017	Hean gwanyareeksa ichchibooda gatmoodida, ak ghang'eat gawa ghoang'eat ng'uchcheeda sea jeatta siippuut bea gatmoodean, sea fukka ang'ng'waay digheanyeekka Aseetta nea gammuuwu iitta Yeesuun. Ak ghamiinaada appadayda iseaskweanda basooda.
66012018	Hean ghaminaada ichchibooda aba ghuutta basooda.
66013001	Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda nea ghwadambiir aba jeeda basooda, nea gwandeawa gujaw damwanamughuush ea iheen ispwa, ak gwanda shiip damwanamughuush uhuuda gujakkaaschi ak gwandeawa gheawunga ging'weakka aba iheenga gujakkaaschi.
66013002	Nea diyeaydida adaayiin gawuurji mariirda, nea geeshangaaschi gawuurji idamooda, ak ghuuttaannyi gawuurji ghuutta ng'adiida. Ak ghoadaw hararjooda diyeayda uurdaannyi ea hoorgeadaannyi bea sugoochcheandumeeda ea gheambalmeeda haw.
66013003	Ghaadaayi uhuunagi aba iheengaaschi gawuurji gili mideawa dearjooda miyeeda, nea deanneandeadaannyi bea miyeeda ea nihaap, ak ghwaat geashta diyeayda ng'eanyiissean aba muuwuda.
66013004	Hean ghaghadoowan buuneeda ichchiboodida, aba gideaba niidaw gheambalmeadaannyi diyeayda, hean ghaghadoowan diyeaydida nea gwayi, “Gawuurji ng'eaha diyeayda, ak gayghoammu ng'eaha gang'uchi sea niny?”
66013005	Ak geattaw diyeayda ghuutta jea gabaloola ng'asheega hees bea ging'weakka, ak geattaw gheambalmeeda jea gwasna gadiyeadaannyi sheeh haradam ea iyyeenya;
66013006	hean ghwajaat ghuuttaannyi gong'eawi Aseetta, nea gong'eawi eara gheawungaaschi ea heeda abiitta, nea gea abiitta humng'eeda.
66013007	Ak geesiksa gang'uchchi sea fuga ghaydidi ak ghwajoar. Ak geattaw gheambalmeeda appadayda gilinyooh ea emoochean gil ea buuneeda ea iitta ea emoojiga,
66013008	nea haleanjeessean mida muunda ng'eanyiida gayghaghadoawan niny, giliwas siih miyeeng'oorsa gheawungaaschi jeeda gittaabooda eaweega bea Dayeenda Gisilleanda ghayi sinuus nea miyeebwat sindeetta ng'eanyiida.
66013009	Gilinyooh gwandeawa iitta dayiinya:
66013010	Siida wassean iijea gawa ghealooniga, gaygawa ghealooniga; siida wassean iilach gheatteaba niirja aba bwaanga, eara niny gajealach gheatta aba bwaanga. Niih heeda mida gihang'ooyda ea doobiiwnatta fuga ghaydidi.
66013011	Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda nuut siyeeng'u nea gwaleabu badayda ng'eanyiida; nea gwandeawa gujaw iyyeenya nea gawuurji Dayeenda Gisilleanda ak gabaloolda ichchibooda.
66013012	Ak gagadiyeatta gheambalmeedeaba diyeaydida bea madeedean iisidaah, ak ghwanung' ghoaghadoawan ng'eanyiida ea fuga mida jeeda diyeaydida bea madeedean, nea dearjoadaannyi bea miyeeda ea nihaap.
66013013	Ak gwasin gwadeagwajeega hees, nea iissa ghwanung' ghwararang'aana beasta humng'eeda ak ghwahidu ng'eanyi madeeda buneeeda;
66013014	nea aba gwadeagwajeega siittaw gwasin aba madeeda diyeaydean, hean gwareengani fukka mida ng'eanyiidean, ak ghwanung' gwasin giduurji diyeayda silasa bwaanga ak ea gudugwanda;
66013015	ak geanung' gaguusa jeammeeda gidida uurji diyeaydean ak abeeda ghoammu gidida uurji diyeaydean gabalool, ak ghwanung' ealajaada gheatkweakka fuga mwaghadoawana gitta uurji diyeaydean.
66013016	Hit gageanu sean fuga manang'i ea gea hees, fuga sean was meanang'oodiga ea gea barbari, sean fuga abal geat ea ging'ng'oonyanga, ak geayiin giirooranga geattinda dugwa ghana gheamamuunatka,
66013017	ak abeeda ea siida jea ghoammu ghwasha gil ghana ghwashaayda, geaghus gwandeawa giirooraneedida was gheawungeaba diyeaydideaniin, ghana moonneeda gheawungaaschi.
66013018	Ak niih geeguura weaghumeeda: ninyeeda mideawa fughareeda jea ghwanal ea dayiitta moonneedeaba diyeanyi, nea niih ea gidittiida buuneeda, nea moonneadaannyi ea bughalaji lah ea laadam ea lah.
66014001	Ng'atta ghaang'weardi, ak ghadaayi gwanda uhuuda Giijeeda Sayuuni Dayeenda Gisilleanda nea ghamiinaada, nea gwandeayi sea niny fiih sagalamnyooji bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan nea gwandeawa gheawungaaschi ea gheawunga Ghwaan nea sung'oorsa gheamamuunatka nyaawa.
66014002	Ak ghaayiinyi nyeashta nyaasha humng'eeda uurji nyeashta beega saang'a ak gawuurji nyeashta gighweendandeeda haw; ak nyeashi ayiinyiin gawuurji nyeashta fuga gidondoorajeega las gidondoorajeega nyaawa,
66014003	nea gwasarman duumdeesh aba madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda ea madeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin ea madeeda gweargwa. Ak ea manda siida ammu ghoanal geaw duumdida, geaghus fukka as sagalama ea haradam ea ang'wan ghayi sikghu appadayda ng'eanyiidean.
66014004	Suu gea miih ghang'uda geat ririnyeanda aba gadeemga, aba gideaba ea ghaydidi; nea suuh ea gea eadageeshta Dayeenda Gisilleanda gil aba hiji wea sean; assuh ea sikghu aba jeeda buuneeda nea gawuurji haghweega madeeda aba heeda Aseetta ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda,
66014005	ak ghuusiga nyaawa ea manda ng'uyyeega, aba gideaba gwannya gilimuy.
66014006	Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea ghang'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, nea gwandeawa giijasta miy manda muudeanooda jea gwarukwiisa fuga mida muunda ng'eanyiida, ea giliwas eamwa ea emeeda ea iitta ea buuneeda;
66014007	ak gwayi aba ghuutta haw, “Oawwala Aseetta nea ghoattawji niny gigheambiitta, aba gideaba damanda girgweageadaannyi nihidu; aghadoawana niny deabwat humng'eeda ea ng'eanyiida, ea basooda ea gheanyanga eenda.”
66014008	Gweadu geeshta malaykajeanda nuut bea iyyeenya, nea gwayi, “Niibeadi, Niibeadi Babeleeda haw, aba gideaba ginung' ghwali emoojiga sean difaayeeda gitta igasayi muyiin.”
66014009	Gweadu geeshta nyaawa malaykajeanda nuut bea samwagu, nea gwayi aba ghuutta haw, “Giliwassean ighadoawan diyeanyi ea gissirattiida, ak ghwanyas giirooraneeda aba gheamamdaannyi ghana geattindaannyi,
66014010	eara niny gayghwali difaayeeda nyarasta Aseetta, sisin nea meekkuuyi gil aba jeeda bayookta nyarastaannyi, anniny gajeesawan aba beasta ea giikkayda aba madeeda malaykajeega ghaydidi, ea madeeda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.
66014011	Ak gwadiyeada aroosta sawanadeeda nyaawa eaghoaw gweannyeekka manda muudeanooda; ak ea mayghwanyas fuufta, askweari ghana eawa, nea fuga ghadoawan diyeanyi gil ea gissirattiida, ea giliwas siida wassean mideawa giirooraneeda gheawungaaschi.”
66014012	Hiji heeda mida gihang'ooyda fuga ghaydidi gil, nea fuga ang'ng'waay digheanyeekka Aseetta gil ea masaweega Yeesu.
66014013	Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu: Ghang'wana siida meah ghamneawa meewsa heeda Ng'uttamiida. Ghang'wana huumwa, gwayi Gurorooda, ak gafuuf iing'atta gadiyeeda nyaawa, aba gideaba sinaweega nyaawa ghwaat geeshta!”
66014014	Hean ghang'weardi ak ghaadaayi shamooghooda eesh, nea uhuudeaba shamooghooni goopteada siida uurji balleanda siida, nea uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, nea gwanda geattindaannyi barda ng'aniip.
66014015	Gwarinna jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta malaykajeanda nuut, ak gaguurda aba ghuutta haw, gaguursa siitta apteada aba uhuudeaba shamooghoodean, “Adealda bardaang'u, ak guwi laja, aba gideaba booga ng'eanyiida niheas.”
66014016	Hean siitta apteada appadayda shamooghoodean gwajaksa bardaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gealach ng'eanyiida.
66014017	Ng'atta gwarinna malaykajeanda nuut jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta mida humng'eeda, anniny gwandeawa barda ng'aniip.
66014018	Ak gwarinna malaykajeanda nuut heeda wagiida, nea dea burdeawa uurda beasta gil, ak gaguursa dea mideawa bardida ng'aniibiin aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha, “Geanni bardida ittaang'u ng'aniibiin ak gibinni dayeega msabiibooda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba haghweagaaschi niheas.”
66014019	Hean gwajaksa malaykajeandida bardaannyi badayda ng'eanyiida ak gaptu msabiibooda badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gwajaksa sabiibu jeeda shoomanda haw simurriisa difaayeeda nyarasta Aseetta;
66014020	ng'atta geadattas gitta muura difaayiin aba jarooda heeda mawosa mujiini, hean gwarinna foojeanda jeedeaba gitta muura difaayiin, ea gageawiit ea gooyang'da ghealooda faraasi, ea gooyang'da gilomittaji bughalaji iyyeenya ea seedam ea damwallah.
66015001	Hean ghaadaayi gwadeagooda nuut aba humng'eeda, nea ahaw ak daamdaamwaat, malaykaji ispwa mideawa sawanaduut ispwa was gea huydean, aba gideaba appadaydeaba suuh niduulean nyarasta Aseetta.
66015002	Ghaadaayi giduurji basooda giyooh guuyi beasta, ak fukka joar diyeayda ea gissirattiidean ea monneeda gheawungaaschi, nea ghamiinaada aba murdeeda basoodida bea giyoohiin, nea gwandeawa gidondoorajeega Aseetta aba geattinga nyaawa.
66015003	Ak gwasarman duumda Muusa, was soomjeanda Aseetta, ea duumda Dayeenda Gisilleanda, nea geeyi, “Gadiyoojigaagu isinayi ea hees nea deamdeameadi, Ea Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Hoauur! Naweadingaagu doobiiwnatta gil ea huumwa, Ea Sugoocheanda gweannyeekka sean!
66015004	Ngeaha gil deamoawalnyi ak ghoaghaambiit gheawungaagu, Ea Ng'uttamiida? Aba gideaba ang'iing'i guwasi ghaydit nea gibwageaw. Aba gideaba gayghapka emoojiga sean ak ghaghadoawannyi, aba gideaba girgweageadaang'u siittaajiit.”
66015005	Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghang'weardi ak ghaadaayi gheeda sibatta Aseetta bea maheemajeanda bea muuwunooda mida humng'eeda nea nijaada,
66015006	ak gwarinna jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta malaykaji ispwa nea gwandeawa sawanaduut ispwa, nea gookkwa hang'weakka miyaas meeng'meeng'i, nea daghanuunatka nyaawa ea sirat aba ghealooda meang'meang'.
66015007	Hean gageanu akkalealla aba jeedeaba diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin ak ghoadaw malaykajeekka assispwaan gweeraji ispwa sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i nea ghwanyiit nyarasta Aseetta majeek ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda;
66015008	ng'atta geannyiit gheeda sibatta Aseetta aroosta leabu heeda gigheambiitta Aseetta ea dea leabu uurdaannyi, ak ea manda eara siyagi ammu gawa jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta ea eaghus ghwahit sawanaduutkiga assispwa bea malaykajeekka assispwaan.
66016001	Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw nyaasha jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta nea gwayeeshsha malaykajeekka assispwaan, “Aweayeena ak ghoahhiidi gweerajeekka as ispwa bea nyarasta Aseetta mida badayda ng'eanyiidean.”
66016002	Gawa malaykajeanda madeeda ak ghoahiida gweeriidaannyi aba badayda ng'eanyiida, hean ghoaptu deanneaduutkka munyas bea ririnnyeanda mideawa giirooraneedeaba diyeaydideani ak ghaghadoawan gitta sirattiida ninyiin.
66016003	Nea malaykajeandida bea iyyeenyean goohiisa gweeriidaannyi jeeda basooda, ak ghwayamwa gawuurji foojeanda siida meah, hean gameewa haleanjeesean mideawa eaweega mida jeeda basooda.
66016004	Gohiida malaykajeandida bea samwaguun gweeriidaannyi jeeda eeniga ea gheanyanga beega, ak ghoaw foojeanda.
66016005	Ak ghaayiinyi malaykajeanda ambal beega nea gwayi, “Ang'iing'i guwosi doabiiwaat aba girgweaguutkaagu, ang'iing'eeda indi nea ghayi gindi, Ea Dea assagi Ghaydit.
66016006	Aba gideaba buuneeda niihiida foojeanda fuga ghaydidi ea gea sibanga, ak anidawi saawa foojeanda ghwali. Ak ea gidamiisa!”
66016007	Ak ghaayiinyi heeda wagiida nea gooyeawda, nea gwayi, “Huumwa gil Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta mideawa uurda, girgweaguutkaagu huumwa gil nea ghwadoabiiw!”
66016008	Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea ang'waniin gweeriidaannyi badayda aseetta, ak geenung' ghaghwarda buuneeda aba beasta;
66016009	ak geaghwarda buuneeda aba beasta ng'waan, ak ghamwaashta saawa gheawunga Aseetta mideawa uurda appadaydeaba sawanaduussu, ak ea maduukkuunana ak ghoadaw niny gigheambiitta.
66016010	Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea muudiin gweeriidaannyi badayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedeaba diyeaydida, ak geenung' gamsaniit sugoochcheandumeadaannyi; hean ghwanyeannyea buuneeda ng'ushapkeakka nyaawa aba silalga
66016011	ak ghamwaashta Aseetta humng'eeda aba sawanaduutka nyaawa ea deanneaduutka nyaawa, ak ea maduukkuunana sinaweega nyaawa.
66016012	Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea lahiin gweeriidaannyi jeeda eenda haw suguura Frattiin, hean ghwajaam beagaaschi, ak geesissin naweeda sugoodiga leabu heeda ghayeawa.
66016013	Ng'atta ghaadaayi, ng'asheega rinna ghuutta ichchibooda ea ghuutta diyeayda ea gea ghuusiga sibanga ng'uyyeega, ea guroruunat samwagu munyas uurji udagheambagajeamajeega;
66016014	suuh guroruunatka meangeenda gil, sina gwadeagwajeega, inyeessa gwaritta ak gaweesa sugoodiga mida gigheawda bea ng'eanyiissean, ak ghoamughuush saawa aba ng'uchcheedida aba eaweetta haw bea Aseetta Hoauuriin.
66016015	“Asi, gaydoanda mareanghweanda! Ghang'wana siida majeek, nea ghaghamwat hang'weakaaschi ak ea mawa nea dawiish ak geadaa baspaseagaaschi!”
66016016	Ak goomuguushsa saawa hiji suguura aba ghuutta Ebraniya Armagedooni.
66016017	Gohiisa malaykajeandida bea ispwaan gweeriidaannyi humng'eeda, ak gwarinna nyeashta haw jeeda gheeda sibatta Aseetta, heeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, nea gwayi, “Nigeawiit gwasa!”
66016018	Hean gwardu dadamandeeda, ea nyeashta, ea gighweendandeeda, ea sawooda haw bea ng'eanyiida dea eara heeda ghayi miigwardu dea uurji niih dea niibiideewa buuneeda badayda ng'eanyiida, aba gideaba sawooni bea ng'eanyiidean ahaw.
66016019	Hean gwaheelli mujiineetta hawiin niba samwagu, ak ghoabeada mujiinajeega emoojiga, ak ghwaapkaat Aseetta Babelooneetta hawiin, ak geattaw gweeriida difaayeeda nyarastaannyi.
66016020	Gilinyooh ea ng'eanyiida neaweesa beega gaygamng'aw, ak ea manda giijeega jea gudeadaah;
66016021	hean gang'adeesa buuneeda roopta haw bea lagheanga durmani muuchchi, ak goobitpissa buuneeda nea gwaleabu humng'eeda, ea eeyi bwak ea ghamwaashta buuneeda Aseetta aba sawanadeeda nyas aba lagheanga, ak ghoabeal fiih sawanadeedida.
66017001	Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanjagi bea jeedeaba giikka assispwa mideawa gweeraji ispwaan ak gwayeeshinean, “Beenni, gaydaahiimneey girgweaksiinda hiseadayda haw abiitta badayda beega saang'aan,
66017002	nea nihiseada sea sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiida, ak gea mida badayda ng'eanyiida ea niboogit aba difaayeeda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi.”
66017003	Hean ghwaadan aba jeeda Gurorooda ea dawa dareapcheeda, ak ghaadaayi gatmooda nea goopteada aba badayda diyeayda areara nea ghwannyiit saseeda gheawunga ging'weakka, nea gwandeawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush.
66017004	Ak gatmoodida ea niikwa hang'da oomu ea dea areara, nea siittaamdaamwa lagheanga meeng'meeng'i ea gea haw sheayeat ea sageekka, ak gwanda geattindaannyi bayookta mida lagheanga meeng'meeng'i biissa ghwanyiit ng'asheega munyas ea ririnyeanda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi;
66017005	ak gheamamdaannyi geeng'oorsa gheawunga makcheameeda, “Babelooneeda haw, gheamatta fuga hiseada bea ng'asheega munyas bea ng'eanyiida.”
66017006	Ghaadaayi gatmoodida, nea niboogit aba foojeanda fuga ghaydidi sea foojeanda sinuus appadayda Yeesu. Hean nea ghaadaayi gatmoodida ghahamwan ng'eanyi gidahaw.
66017007	Hean gwayeeshinean malaykajeanda, “Ghwasaan anda gihami ng'eanyi? Gaydarukuneey makcheameedeaba gatmoani, ea dea diyeayda mideawa iheen ispwa ea gujaw damwanamughuush aat gatmooniin.
66017008	Diyeaydideani idaahiin abeeda gwanda, ak ea mandana, ak gaygwadiyeanna uutta shoomanda mammudeana ak gawa heeda ng'asheega munyas. Ak fuga mida badayda ng'eanyiida miyeeng'oorsa gheawunga nyaawa jeeda gittaabooda eaweega dea sibwada sindeetta ng'eanyiida, gayghahamng'eanyi idaah diyeaydida. Aba gideaba gwanda, ak ea mandana ak gayghwahidu.
66017009	Ak niih geeguura heeda fughareeda mida weaghuumeeda: iheengiga as ispwaan gijeaga as ispwa apteadawa gatmoani gil;
66017010	ak gwanda eara sugoodi ispwa, nea muut aba jeannyaawa ea niibeada, akkalleala gwanda, ak niirja ea miighwahidu, nea iihidu gayghwashng'u gilinuwaas.
66017011	Nea diyeaydida mida ak ea mandanean, niny deaba sissi ak niny gaba jeedeaba giikka assispwaan, ak niny gawa jeeda ng'asheega munyas.
66017012	Ak gujakkiga attamwanamughuush idaahiin ea sugoodiga attamwanamughuush gil, was gea miighoang'ng'waay uurda sugochcheandumeeda, ak ea ninyas gheambalmeeda gawuurji sugoodiga aba aseadeanagi, sea diyeayda.
66017013	Saawa gaba fughareanagi ak saawa ghoadaw diyeaydida uurda nyaawa ea gheambalmeeda;
66017014	ak suuh gaygang'uchi sea Dayeenda Gisilleanda, ak gayghwajoar Dayeenda Gisilleanda saawa, aba gideaba niny Ng'uttamiida ng'uttamoojiga gil ea Sugoochcheanda sugoodiga, ak suuh mideawa ninyiin ea gea geguursa gea suloat ea gea doobiiweadi.”
66017015	Hean gwayeeshshinean, “Beegigeani idaahiin, bea heeda apteadawa hiseadaydideaniin, ada buuneeda gil ea emoojiga ea iidiga.
66017016	Ak gujakkiga attamwanamughuush idaahiin, ea diyeaydida ak gayghwasit hiseadaydida ak gajeenung' ghang'ut salgheang'da nea dawiish, ak gajeeyaak banyeagaaschi ak gajeenung' gamurjan aba beasta,
66017017	aba gideaba Aseetta niyiin guroruunatka nyaawa ak ghwasareanda gidagasiida nea gaba fughareanagi ak ghoadaw diyeaydida uurda sugoochcheandumeeda nyaawa, ea gwasa ng'asheega Aseetta.
66017018	Ak gatmoodida idaahiin ea mujiineetta hawiin gil mideawa gimbaliischooda appadayda sugoodiga badayda ng'eanyiideani.”
66018001	Iing'atta suuh ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nuut nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea gwandeawa gheambalmeeda haw; ak ghoabwaay ng'eanyiida gigheambiittaannyi.
66018002	Hean gaguurda aba nyeashta haw nea gwayi, “Niibeadi, niibeadi Babelooneeda haw! Niwosi heeda jea goobiida meang'ngeenda, ak ea heeda abiitta gilinyooh ea gurorooda muyi, ea heeda abiitta gilinyooh ea dariideanda muyi;
66018003	aba gideaba emoojiga sean nili difaayeeda ng'asheagaaschi munyas gaseadayyi, ak eara sugoodiga ng'eanyiida nihiseada sea niny, nea fuga ageakshi bea ng'eanyiida ea ninyas meanang'oochcheandumeeda aba uurda hiseadayeandumeadaannyi.”
66018004	Hean ghayiinyi ghuutta nuut nyaasha humng'eeda nea gwayi, “Aritteawana headaannyi, fugeasu, adooguuyeewi ring'eedaannyi, adiiduw ghoanyaschi sawanaduutkaaschi;
66018005	aba gideaba ring'eadaannyi sijip ea ghwahitta humng'eeda, ak eanipkaat ng'asheagaaschi munyas Aseetta.
66018006	Oattawa siida gidagoneegwa niny, ak ghoattawji niny niba iyyeenya aba sinaweagaaschi; Okkuuyeena nibiyyeenya aba badaydeaba niny aba jeeda bayookta aguuyeesa niny.
66018007	Aba gidaghambiitta geaw niny nea gwanda jeeda hiseadayeandumeeda, ottawa niny gheadeendida was sawanadeeda ea giiseaneegean. Aba gideaba gwayi niny aba jeadaannyi, ‘Neapteadi sugoochcheanda was gatmooda nea meawosi masinung'weanda, ak ea maydadaa giiseaneega,’
66018008	aba gideaba sawanaduutkaaschi gayghwahidu eaweechanjagi, miyeeda ea giiseaneega ea jalooda, nea niny gajeenung' ghwaak beasta; aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gwandeawa uurda ak gaygoorgweaksa niny.”
66018009	Nea sugoodiga ng'eanyiida, hiseada abeeda gwahiseada sea niny, gaygooyeawda nea gaguuttu heareega appadaydeaba niny iidaa aroosta beasta sighwardaawa niny;
66018010	ak gayghamiinaada nea sheagi, aba muwda sawanadeadaannyi, nea gwayi, “Eamuy daannyi! eamuy daannyi! mujiineetta hawiin, mujiineeda Babelooni mideawa uurda! Aba gideaba jeemba aseadeenagi gayghwahidu girgweaksiindaang'u.”
66018011	Ak fuga ageakshachi bea ng'eanyiida gaygooyeawda nea gaguut heareega appadaydaannyi aba gideaba manda siida jea gutghwasha haleanjeannyaawa,
66018012	haleanjeeda sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ea lappiya, ea lagheanga hees sheayeat ea sageekka, ea hang'weakka miyaas bumbuni, gea oomng'i ea gea buudeega ea gea areeri, ea geetta hideeda, ea gilinyooh ea dabichcheanda sisna gujaweeda gil, ea gilinyooh ea dabichcheanda geetta haw sheayeat gil, ea dea gharinyeanda areara, ea gharinyeanda ea lagheanga suguura marumaru,
66018013	ea geetta ng'andit suguura mdalasiini, ea geediga ng'andidi siyiina jeeda nyeanyiida, ea hideeda ng'andit, ea nagheeda ng'andit, hideeda ng'andit bea dumbeecheanda, ea difaayi, ea nagheeda, ea dearanga miyaas bea ngano, ea dugwa ea gisilga, ea farasajeega, ea muttukwajeega, ea ging'ng'oonyanga, nea guroruunatka buuneeda.
66018014	“Haghweega bwariiy jeadaang'u ninung'useey heeda, ea hamichchoojigaagu ibwariinyi ea haleanjeeda miyeenooda nirooda aba headaang'u, ak ea maygudu ebiikta gichcha eanyas!”
66018015	Ak fuga ageakshachchi aba haleanjeeni, ghayi nyasa meanang'oochcheanduumeeda headaannyi, gayghamiinaada nea sheagi, aba muuwda sawanadeadaannyi, hean gooyeawda nea gaguuttu heareega aba ghuutta haw,
66018016	“Dashageada, dashageada, mujiineetta hawiin siikwealsa hang'da bumbun miyiin, ea hang'weakka omng'i ea gea areeriin, nea geetaamdaam aba lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, ea lagheanga sheayeeda haw, ea sageekka!
66018017	Aba jeemba aseadeanagi haleanjeeni seaniin sihista.” Ak fuga sean ambal maleambajeega ea fuga weay bareanyeekka aba maleambooda ea gearnoodiga maleambooda ea fuga ageakshi aba jeeda basooda, hean ghamiinaada nea sheagi
66018018	gooyeawda iidaa aroosta beasta sighwardaawa niny, “Ana mujiinajaan gil uurji mujiineani hawiin?”
66018019	Hean gwajaksa iheenga nyaawa birjeanda, ak gooyeawda nea gagiisan, hean gooyeawda nea gwayi, “Dashageada, dashageada, mujiineetta hawiin nea gea mideawa maleambajeega hees aba jeeda basooda ghwanyas baruureega aba meanang'oochcheandumeadaannyi! Ak aba jeemba aseadeanagi ea sijakta.
66018020	Ahoosana appadaydaannyi, Ea humng'eeda, Ea fuga ghaydidi ea giijasoodiga ea sibanga, aba gideaba Aseetta nugoneegwa girgweaksiinda appadaydaannyi!”
66018021	Hean gagatgat malaykajeanjagi mideawa uurda, lagheaneeda uurji lagheaneeda haw bea ng'ealdeayda ak gwajaksa jeeda basooda, nea gwayi, “Asi gajeejakseey ng'eanyi Babelooneetta was mujiineeda hawiin aba nyarasta, ak ea maygudeebiikta eadaah;
66018022	ak eara ghuusiga fuga mideawa gidondoorajeega ea gea sarman, ea gea seawiir ea gea aguul, ea maygudu eebiikta eeyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay; ghana siida geariir aba giliwas gearinda maygudu eanyasa jeadaang'u earahay; ghana ghuutta lagheaneeda ng'ealshi maygudu eyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay;
66018023	ak eara weeshinda gheaboong'nyeanda ea maygudu gabiikta ghoabwaay aba jeadaang'u earahay; ak eara ghuutta siida geeshshi ea dea gatmooda sighi maygudu ebiikta eyiing'sa jeadaang'u earahay; aba gideaba fiisu ikaagu ageakshiin ghayi saawa fuga hees bea ng'eanyiida gil, ak emoojiga sean easireengani aba beneetkweandumeadaang'u.
66018024	Nea jeadaannyi geenyasa foojeanda sibanga ea gea fuga ghaydidi, ea gea fuga ghayi sinuus appadayda ng'eanyiida.”
66019001	Ng'atta ng'asheesu ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw uurji dea emeeda saang'a aba humng'eeda, nea gwayi, “Haleeluuya! Lealeanooda ea giigheambiitta ea uurda gaba Aseetteanya,
66019002	aba gideaba girgweageadaannyi dea huumwa gil nea doabiiwaat; aba gideaba nirgweaksa hiseadaydida hawiin ghayi datas ng'eanyiida aba hiseadayeandumeandaannyiin, ak ea niwalda appadaydaannyi foojeanda soomjoogaaschi.”
66019003	Geebiikta gichcha echchuur nea geeyi, “Haleluuya! Aroosta leabu heedeaba gatmoodida gwadiyeada ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.”
66019004	Nea gweargiga at diktam ea ang'waniin sea diyeangiga assang'wan majeekcheewiin goobeedeayi ak ghoaghadoawan Aseetta apteada appadayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda nea gwayi, “Amin. Haleluuya!”
66019005	Hean gwarinna ghuutta nyaasha jeedeaba hoorgeetta bea gheambalmeedean nea gwayi, “Edumsheesiina Aseetteanya, agoogeani sean owaschi soomjoagaaschiin, agoogeeni owalli gheang'daanyiin, was gea manang'i ea gea hees.”
66019006	Hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta uurji dea emeetuw, ak ghwanyaashta ghuutta beega saang'a ak gabiissa ghwanyaashta dea gighweandandeeda haw nea gwayi, “Haleluuya! Aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetteanya Hoauur nimbaliischi.
66019007	Asi ehoosana nea geeng'weelayi nea geattawji gigheambiitta, aba gideaba geeshshooda Dayeenda Gisilleanda nihidu, ak eara gatmoadaannyi ea nisissin geaw ea ghwahit;
66019008	ak ea sikwealsa hang'weakka miyaas bumbuni, meang'meang' nea miyaas,” aba gideaba hang'weakka miyaas sinaweega doabiiw bea fuga ghaydidi gil.
66019009	Hean gwayeeshshean malaykajeanda, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu: Ghang'wana fukka suguursa hamitta geshshooda Dayeenda Gisilleandean.” Ak gwayeeshshinean, “Suuh ng'asheega huumwa bea Aseetta.”
66019010	Ak geabeedeaysi madeeda geeshangaaschi ak ghaaghadoowannyi niny hean gwayeeshshinean, “Adiiduw gisni ng'asheesu! Aniini geawoschi soomjeanda sea ang'iing'i sea fuga iduupcheewi mideawa muuwunooda Yeesu. Ghadoawana Aseetta.” Aba gideaba muuwunooda Yeesu gurorooda sibaneandumeeda.
66019011	Hean ghaadaayi nea ghwajaada humng'eeda, ak ghaadaayi, faraseedeesh! Nea gwanda badaydaannyi siida suguura Doobiiwnatta ea Huumwa, ak niny aba doobiiwnatta goorgweaksa nea gwasin ng'uchcheeda.
66019012	Ak gheanyangaaschi gawuurji ngu'shapta beasta, ak uhuudaannyi gwanda shiipka saang'a; ak gheawunga sung'waar mwanala eara siih geaghus niny.
66019013	Ak niny ea sikwealsa hang'da sing'uda foojeanda, ak gheawungaaschi geeguura Ng'asheanda Aseetta.
66019014	Nea ghwaat geeshta Lugooda humng'eeda, nea gookkwa hang'weakka bumbuni, eashis nea miyaas, ak ghwaat geeshta farasajeega eeshish.
66019015	Ak gwarinna bwaangeeda ng'aniip ghuuttaannyi jea ghabwara emoojiga, ak gayghoahaaghwiida saawa bileangida gharinyeanda; nea niny ghoallapta ng'eanyi shoomanda difaayeeda bea nyarasta haw bea Aseetta Hoauur.
66019016	Ak badayda hang'daannyi ea gibeestaannyi geeng'oorsa, gheawunga Sugoochcheanda sugoodiga ea Ng'uttamiida ng'uttamoojiga.
66019017	Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nea ghamiinaada aba badayda aseetta, nea goojuur aba ghuutta haw nea gwayeeshsha dariidakka ng'eatng'eatta aba bugusta humng'eeda, “Apkaani, abwada geat aba ghweelmeeda haw bea Aseetta,
66019018	ak ghoayaaji sasanuukka sugoodiga, ea sasanuukka shirikkaarajeega hees, ea sasanuukka fuga mideawa uurjeenga, ea sasanuukka farasajeega ea gea fuga ding'da, ea sasanuukka buuneessean, sea siida abal geaw ea ging'ng'oonyaneeda, dea mwanang' ea dea haw.”
66019019	Hean ghaadaayi diyeayda ea sugoodiga ng'eanyiida ea shirikkaarajeega nyaawa nea ghabwat geat nea gagasa gang'uchchi sea siitta apteada aba badayda farasin sea shirikkaareadaannyi.
66019020	Hean geang'ng'waay diyeaydida, sea sibaneeda ng'uyyeega ghayi sina gwadeagwajeega ammadeadaannyi, ak gwareengani fukkeanji ghayi ning'ng'waay giirooraneedeaba diyeaydida ea fukka ghadoawan gidasirattiida ninyiin. Hean geejaksa suuh assiyyeenyean jeeda basooda beasta nea majeekcheewi ak ghwaak beasta ea giikkayda.
66019021	Ak giikka sippuudiin geenuseadawa bwaangeedeaba siitta apteada aba badayda faraasiin, aba bwaangeeda rinna ghuuttaannyi; hean gwalang'u dariidakka sean aba banyeega nyaawa.
66020001	Hean ghaadaayi malaykajeanda nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda, nea ghoang'ng'waanya geadi gidasiittinna shoomanda mammuudeana ea munyaloalajeanda haw.
66020002	Ak ghoang'ng'waay ichchibooda was ichchiboodida bea garayiin was meang'nyeandeenda ea Shattaani, ak ghwarada gweanyeew sagalama,
66020003	ak gwajaksa niny jeeda shoomanda, hean gwadukuta ak ghwayiin giroraneeda badaydaannyi, aba gideaba maygabiikta gichcha gwareengani emoojiga, ea ghang'atta gweannyeew sagalama. Amang'atta hiji gajeettin gilinuwaas.
66020004	Hean ghaadaayi hoorgajeega gheambalmeeda, nea goobiitbiida badahuukka fuga jea goorgweach. Ak ghaadaayi guroruunatka fuga ghayi silajaada gheatkweaka aba badayda muwunnooda Yeesu ea appadayda ng'asheanda Aseetta, ea giikka ghayi miih ghaghadoawan diyeaydideaniin ghana gitta sirattiidean nea miighwanyas giroraneadaannyi aba gheamamuuunatka nyaawa, ghana geattinga nyaawa. Ak gwaduuttu, ak goombaliischi sea Gristo gweannyeew sagalam.
66020005	Ak muscheekkiga siippuudiin ea mabiikta gwaduuttu ea ghang'atta gweannyeew sagalam. Niih duunooda madeeda gil.
66020006	Ghang'wana nea ghaydit siida mida jeeda duunnooda madeeda! Appadahuukkeaba fiisu miyeedeaba iyyeenya manda uurda ak gayghoaw ashoohoodiga Aseetta ea gea Gristo, ak gaygoombaliischi sea niny gweannyeew sagalam.
66020007	Ak iyasha gweannyeew sagalama, gajeettin Shattaani gwarinna ghealoonigaaschi
66020008	ak gayghwahidu ak gwareengani emoojiga mida murdajeega assang'wan bea ng'eanyiida, ak ea, Googu gil ea Magoogu, ak ghoawaam saawa aba ng'uchcheeda; nea monneeda nyaawa gwadeenna iseaskweanda basooda.
66020009	Hean ghwascheang'da gaweay badayda ng'eanyiida ak geneaweesa gealga fuga ghaydidi ea mujiineetta subwariiyiin; hean ghwararang'aan beasta leabu humng'eeda ak ghwaak saawa,
66020010	ak geejaksa meang'nyeandida reengani saawaan jeeda basooda beasta ea giikkayda heeda mida diyeaydida ea sibaneeda ng'uyyeega, ak gajeesawan askweari ea eawa ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.
66020011	Hean ghaadaayi hoorgeeda haw eesh bea gheambalmeeda ea siida apteadawa uhuuda; nea madeadaannyi gamng'aw ng'eanyiida ea humng'eeda, ak ea meadaaha heeda jea goobiida.
66020012	Hean ghaadaayi fuga nimeewa, gea hees ea gea manang'i, nea ghamiinaada aba madeeda hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda, hean geettin gittaabwajeega. Ak geettin gittaabwajeanda nuut, nea gittaabooda eaweega gil. Ak geergweaksa fukka nimeewean aba ng'asheega sing'oorsa jeedeaba gittaabwajeekka, giduurji gidaghayi nisin.
66020013	Gooruudu basooda fuga nimeewa mida jeadaannyi, ak gooruudu miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega fuga nimeewa mida jeadaannyi, ak geergweaksiina sean gidaghayi nisin.
66020014	Hean geejaksa miyeeda ea Gheeda maloonghajeega jeedeaba basoodida bea beastean. Nea niih ea miyeedeaba iyyeenya gil, basooni bea beastean;
66020015	Ak gilwas siih iimiyeeng'oorsa gheawungaaschi jeeda gittaabooda eaweega, hean geejaksa jeedeaba basoodida bea beastean.
66021001	Hean ghaadaayi humng'eeda eesh ea ng'eanyiida eesh; aba gideaba humng'eeda madeeda ea ng'eanyiida madeeda goolla ghang'atta, ak basooda ea mudugwanda.
66021002	Ak ghaadaayi mujiineeda ghaydit, was Yerusaleemooda eesh, nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetta, nea hidaat gawuurji sibeeda siittaamdaam aba siyeeda;
66021003	hean ghaayiinyi ghuutta haw nyaasha heeda hoorgeedida bea gheambalmeedean nea gwayi, “Ng'ulla, giibinda Aseetta gwandeayi sea buuneeda. Ak gaygwasin giibindaannyi sea saawa, ak gayghoaw fugaaschi ak Aseetta niny gaygwandeayi sea saawa;
66021004	ak gaygoobuus giliwas dabeakka aba gheanyanga nyaawa, ak ea maygudu gwanda miyeeda, ghana giiseaneega ghana shookka ghana sawanadeeda, maygutgwanda aba gideaba, ng'asheega madeeda goolla ghang'atta.”
66021005	Ng'atta gwayi siitta apteada aba badayda hoorgeeda gheambalmeedean, “Ng'ulla, gaydanung'u gaweeriidi haleanjeessean.” Ak gwayi gichcha, “Ng'waara ng'asheesu, aba gideaba ng'asheesu doobiiwanatta gil ak ea huumwa.”
66021006	Ak gwayeeshinean, “Nisa! Gideaba Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega, ging'eetta ea huydeanda. Siida bearji muwoosh gaydaadaw mwadaagha beega leabu gheang'deenda mideawa eaweega.
66021007	Nea dea jooriischi gaygwahearan haleanjeeni, ak gaydoaw Aseettaannyi nea niny gayghoaw balleandeanyu.
66021008	Ak gea giyoonnyi, ea gea mandeawana masaweega, ea gea ririnnyeanda, ea gea nuusa buuneeda, ea gea hiseada, ea beeneediga, ea gea gadoowani gida mawosa aseetta, ea gea naba ng'uyyeega sean, heennyaawa jeeda basooda yeada beasta gil ea giikkayda, nea niih ea miyeedeaba iyyeenya.”
66021009	Hean ghwahidu malaykajeanjagi bea jeedeaba giikka as ispwaan nea gwandeawa gweeraji ispwa nyiit sawanaduut ispwa huydean ak goobaloolan, nea gwayi, “Beenni hiji, ak gaydaahiimneeyi sibeeda, was gatmooda Dayeenda Gisilleanda.”
66021010	Hit ghwaadan aba Gurorooda ea ghoahiitanaan giijeeda haw, geaw, ak ghoahiimnaan mujineeda ghaydit was Yerusaleemu nea ghwararang'aana humng'eeda heeda Aseetta,
66021011	nea gwandeawa giigheambiitta Aseetta, ak weeshindaannyi gawuurji lagheaneeda haw sheayeat, gawurji lagheaneeda mur, ak ea miyaas nea ghameang'meang',
66021012	abeeda gwanda ghamarda haw, geaw, mideawa ghuusi damaniyyeenya, ak gidaghuudajeesu gwanda malaykaji damaniyyeenya, nea gidaghuudajeesu ea sing'oorsa gheawunga emooji damaniyyeenya was balloojiga Israeeli;
66021013	meatkweeda ghayeawa gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu, wilooda ng'eanyiida ghayeawa gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu, wilooda ng'eanyiida biyeara gidaghuudaji samwagu, heeda biyeara gwanda gidaghuudaji samwagu.
66021014	Ak ghamarda mujiini abeeda gwandeawa sindeechcheewi damaniyyeenya, ak badaydeaba sindeechcheekkiga gwanda gheawun damaniyyeenya bea giijasoodikka attamaniyyeeenya bea Dayeenda Gisilleandean.
66021015	Nea siitta abaloolaniin abeeda gwandeawa bileangida sisna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i, jea goodeena mujiineedida ea gidaghuudajeegaaschi ea ghamarda.
66021016	Nea mujiinean gooyang'deayyi meadajeega sean, nea geawundaannyi gooyang'deayyi sea baraknatta; ak goodean mujiini aba bileangidaannyi, gilomittaji sagalamnyooji iyyeenya ea bughalaji ang'wan; nea geawunda ea baraknatta ea geawunda gal humng'eeda gooyang'deayyi.
66021017	Hean goodeen eara ghamardaannyi, ak ghwanyas geattin bughala ea haradam ea ang'wan aba gidadeeniida buuneeda nea diitta ea malaykajeanda gil.
66021018	Ak ghamardida geadeasa lagheang'su murjeewi, ak mujiineedida geesna lagheanga meeng'meeng'i miyaas nea ghawaar ginyooh.
66021019	Nea sindeechcheekka ghamarda mujiini abeeda siittaamdaamwa aba giliwas laghaana haw sheayeat; dea madeeda ea mur, deabiyyeenya gameaji ea oomu, deaba samwagu ea ng'oreadi, deaba ang'wan ea nyawiish,
66021020	nea deaba muut ea bwaash, nea deaba lah aareara, nea deaba ispwa gameaji anyawiish, nea deaba sis ea booshcheanda, nea deaba shageash ghawaar booreega, nea deaba damanamughuush gameaji ghawaar booreega, deaba damwanagi ea dughwaang, deaba damaniyyeenya ea oomu.
66021021	Ak gidaghuudajeekka attamaniyyeenyean gwanda sageek damaniyyeenya, gilinyooh ea gidaghuut gil gwanda sageeyeanjagi, nea naweeda mujiini ea lagheanga meeng'meeng'i miyaas sing'ng'weerdaawa uurji giyoohi.
66021022	Ak ea mwaadaahi, gheeda sibatta Aseetta aba mujiini, aba gideaba gheennyaawa sibatta Aseetta Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta Hoauur ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda.
66021023	Ak mujiineedida ea magassa gideaba gayghoobwaay aseetta ghana sheeda, aba gideaba giigheambiitta Aseetta weeshindaannyi, ak gheaboong'nyeandaannyi ea Dayeenda Gisilleanda gil.
66021024	Aba gideaba weeshindaannyi gaygwaneayeewa emoojiga jeeda; ak sugoodiga ng'eanyiida gaygweadu giigheambiitta nyaawa jeadaannyi,
66021025	ak gidaghuudajeegaaschi ea mwajearat askweari earahay, aba gideaba jeani manda eaweeda;
66021026	ak saawa gaygweadu jeannyaawa giigheambiitta ea mureeda emoojiga.
66021027	Nea jeadaannyi ghanyea maygawa gidamuy, ghana deasina ng'asheega munyas ghana gea ng'uyyeega, geaghus giikka sing'oorsa jeeda gittaabooda eaweega bea Dayeenda Gisilleandean.
66022001	Hean ghoahiimnaan enda beega mideawa eaweega, nea eesh ea ghameang'meang', nea ghwadalalaana hoorgeeda Aseetta ea dea Dayeenda Gisilleanda,
66022002	nea bugusta naweadinga mujiini, earada, meatkwajeega sean bea enda, abeeda gwanda geetta eaweega, mideawa haghweega heeluut damaniyyeenya, nea inyeessa gooruudu haghweagaaschi gilashsheah; nea seengeaba geedi gaba giheapta emoojiga.
66022003	Ak ea maygutgwanda gilinyooh ea moshteayda gil, nea hoorgeeda gheambalmeeda bea Aseetta ea dea Dayeenda Gisilleanda gaygwanda jeadaannyi, nea soomjoogaaschi gayghoaghadoawan niny,
66022004	ak gayghwadaa gheamamdaannyi, nea gheawungaaschi gaygwanda gheamanunatka nyaawa.
66022005	Ak ea maygutgwanda eaweeda; nea magasa weeshinda gheaboong'nyeanda ghana aseetta aba gideaba Ng'uttamiida was Aseetta gayghoaw weeshinda nyaawa, saawa gaygoombaliischi ea ghoaw damanda manda muudeanooda.
66022006	Hean gwayeeshshinean, “Ng'asheesu ghwadoabiiw ak ea huumwa gil. Nea Ng'uttamiida, was Aseetta bea guroruunatka sibanga, abeeda gaygoojeagu malaykajeandaannyi goohiimsa soomjoagaaschi ng'asheega jea gabean ghwahidu.
66022007	Ak ging'ulayi, gaydahidu nea ghaalamwajaannyi.” Ghang'wana siida ang'ng'waay ng'asheega siramoaran aba jeedeaba gittaaboani.
66022008	Aniini Yohaana ghaayiinyi nea ghaadaayi ng'asheesu. Damandida ayiinyi nea ghaadaayiin, hean geabeedeaysi ng'eanyi ak ghaghadoawannyi aba madeeda malaykajeanda ahiimnaan ng'asheesuun;
66022009	hean gwayeeshshinean, “Adiiduw gisni gitta! Aniini geawoschi soomjeanda sea ang'iing'i sea fuga siduupcheewi was sibanga, ea fukka ang'ng'waay ng'asheegeaba gittaaboaniin. Aghadoawana Aseetta.”
66022010	Ak gwayeeshshean, “Adiiroori ng'asheega siramoaran bea gittaaboaniin, aba gideaba damanda nineekkiit.
66022011	Siida sina ng'asheega munyas daraanya sinooda ng'asheega munyas, dea mideawa ririnyeanda daraanya ririnyeanda, dea doabiiwaat daraanya doobiiwnatta, dea ghaydit ea daraanya ghaydidanda.
66022012	Ng'ulla, ghaawunnyi nea ghaalamwajaanyi, nea geayeadu gichchea daadaw siida, ak ghaadawji giliwas siih giduurji gidaghayi sin.
66022013	Aniini geawoschi Alfa ea Omeega, dea madeeda gil ea dea huydean, was dea ging'eetta ea dea huydean.”
66022014	Ghang'wana fuga ahuun hang'weakka nyaawa, ak gwandeawa doobiiwnatta jea gaweesiina geetta eaweega ak gaweay jeeda mujiini aba gidaghuudajeagaaschi.
66022015	Hoowa bea jaroodean gwanda gudajeega ea beneediga ea fuga hiseada ea fuga nuusa buuneeda ea fuga ghadoawani gidamwawosa aseetta, ea gilinyooh ghabwariiy ng'uyyeega nea gwasin.
66022016	“Aniini Yeesu, neajeagu malaykajeandeanyu headaang'u nea gweadu muwwunooni heeda ganisajeega. Aniini geawaschi hawunnyeanda ea jeatta Dawdi, was ming'weandida aboong'u bea muchchuunoodean.”
66022017	Ak gwayi Gurorooda ea Sibeeda, “Beenni.” Nea siida ing'shi dayi “Beenni.” Ak doani siida bearji muwooshta, nea dea gasa ea dageanda beega eaweega nea manda sheayeeda.
66022018	Geereekusi giliwas siih iiyi ramoorangeaba gittaaboani: giliwas siih iyahaat, gaygoheassa Aseetta sawanaduussu surgu aba jeedeaba gittaaboani,
66022019	ak giliwas siih igeanda gili aba jeeda ng'asheega siramoar bea gittaaboaniin, gaygageanda Aseetta headaannyi aba jeeda geettida bea eaweegean ea aba jeeda mujiineetta ghaydidiin, surgu ng'asheagaaschi aba jeedeaba gittaaboani.
66022020	Nea siida muuwwu ng'asheesu gwayi, “Asi aba huumwa ghaawunnyi nea ghaalamwajaanyi.” Amin. Beenni, Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu!
66022021	Gagasa anyasa dagheerjeandumeeda Ng'uttamiida was Yeesu agoogeeni sean owoschi ghaydidiini. Amin
